Comment: Sluggish early stages, remained in last few before making an effort on rails rounding home bend, baulked early in straight, showed a great turn of foot once a clear passage appeared inside 200 M to score nicely.
Raced 3 wide in midfield to straight, ran on steadily but unable to resist the late burst of speed by the winner.
Waited with, held up behind runners after straightening, finished off race well inside final 200 M to be nearest at finish.

Began well, ridden along to hold a prominent spot early stages before settling in 2L 4th coming out of back straight, similar in one-out-one-back position turning in, held up until 200 M, ran home one-paced.
Moderate start from a wide draw, improved out wide down far side to dispute lead into straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 150 M.

Began from the widest barrier, remained racing very wide without cover throughout, midfield early improving to a prominent spot coming out of back straight, with leaders early in straight until finding no extra inside 200 M.
Not far off in better than midfield, caught behind runners after straightening, kept on at the same pace without quickening closing stages.
Midfield throughout, one-paced in straight.
Soon ridden lead after beginning from the 12 gate, held running until joined into straight, dropped out tamely inside 200 M.
Began with others, chased leader on rails around the bend, ridden along for a tight gap behind and inside runners before eventually squeezed out passing 200 M, kept on to the line.
Slow to muster, gradually improved to midfield along rails, saved ground turning in, no clear run after straightening, steadied and dropped out of contention inside 200 M.
Began with others, settled on rails behind midfield, shifted out for a run turning for home, could only keep on at the one pace without quickening.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, soon recovered to midfield, not settled clipped heels blundered badly losing ground approaching home bend when hung out, found nothing in home straight.
Began with others, soon dropped backward, trailed the field into straight, no further impression.
Travelled behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Came five wide rounding the final bend and closed off nicely to snatch victory close to home.
Sent forward and lead at moderate sectionals on the rail. Had a 2 length margin at the furlong but was nabbed close to home.
Was crowded at the start settling behind midfield, along the paint. Railed up in the straight and closed off well.
Began awkwardly but managed to track the leader along the rail. Struggled to finish in the frame over the latter stages.
Raced behind midfield 3 wide with cover. Rounded the home about 6 wide and closed off reasonably.
Made its run from well back after settling along the paint. Worked home evenly without ever threatening.

Settled back in the field after losing its position near the 900m. Travelled 1 off thereafter before peeling out after 600m to race 4 deep. Copped a check on the home turn then recovered, finishing off soundly. (See incident report.)
Worked forward to race outside the leader. Rider lost the use of left stirrup early and was severely disadvantaged for most of the race. (See incident report.)
Raced with the backmakers 3-4 wide with cover. Looked for runs through the field in the straight but only paddled to the line.
Settled 3 back the fence. had every chance but failed to show any dash in the final stretch.
Travelled behind midfield but was posted 3 wide without cover and made no impression in the home straight.
Camped 1 out 1 back. Struck some interference on the home turn but was just holding its ground at that point and only plodded to the line.
Settled behind midfield, 4 wide without cover. Struck interference near the home turn but was still never likely.
Travelled 3 back, 1 off with cover. Had no excuses finishing well back.
Back with last few in a 3-wide spot. Found daylight at 350M and finished off strongly. Won with comfort.
2-wide behind pace. Ideal spot to strike home straight but lacked instant acceleration. Kept on to hold 2nd narrowly.
2-wide at midfield. Held up early home straight. Gave plenty when clear. Just denied for 2nd.
Soon led on fence. Shared lead home turn. Hung on well but failed to contain the front trio final 50M.
Checked at start and sat 2-wide at midfield. Steadied on straightening. Responded fairly well once resumed but got traffic final stages. Not fully tested.
Rolled forward from widest barrier. Trapped 3-wide from home turn. Plugged on home straight but not threatening.
Well enough away but caught wide. Raced 3-wide behind midfield from home turn. Came widest into final stretch and held ground thereafter.
Began well and took box-seat. Ran on home straight until weakened final 100M.
Trailed field on fence to home straight. Made up minor ground late.
3-wide ahead of midfield. Vigorously ridden from 400M but found nothing.
At rear to home straight. Very little impression thereafter.
Caught wide early. Gradually eased to 3-wide behind midfield. Never nearer.
Quickly into stride, ended up 2-wide at midfield. Failed to pick up home straight. Beaten final 300M.
Began awkwardly, got its head on the side and shifted out. Failed to muster despite effort of rider. Never recovered.
Broke well, settled third rail, out to challenge early straight, led 150m out ran on strongly.
Broke well, moved up wide to fourth one off, outpaced briefly early straight, ran on strongly late.
Fast away out wide, up to second rail, made ground on leader with winner straight, just outpaced late.
Fair break, settled fifth rail, kept on one pace straight.
Broke well, up to midfield one off, not really settling, ran on strongly late.
Fair break, ridden to lead early and went clear, five length lead into straight, caught 150m out, swamped.
Fair break, midfield one off, kept on, not pace to challenge.
Not fast away, ridden to mid-rear two off, third last into straight, ridden and finished well.
Fair break, lacked early speed, ridden to midfield rail, wide bid, not pace to challenge.
Broke well, taken back from wide draw, ridden early straight, kept on well between runners until gaps closed.
Lost half length start, rear one off, brought wide straight, ridden, little progress.
Fair break, settled mid-rear, ridden early straight, no progress.
Fair break, ridden and caught wide, shaken up early straight, weakened quickly.
Moderate break, third last two off, wide run straight, finished very strongly to lead last 50m.
Missed beat at break, lost half length, ridden up to third one off, challenged straight, driven and led narrowly until headed 50m out.
Good break, not rushed early, settled midfield rail, went for rail run straight, short of room, hard ridden, kept on well.
Broke well, settled fourth on rail, ridden to challenge and lead narrowly mid-straight, slight bump, weakened late.
Well away, settled midfield one off, challenged between horses, almost reached lead 200m out, run flattened late.
Broke well, settled sixth one off, ridden early straight, not pace to challenge.
Fair break, taken back to rear one off, hard ridden early straight, late progress.
Missed break slightly, settled rear rail, inside bid, ran on until no further progress last 150m.
Fluffed start, last early then ridden up to fifth last one off, kept on well in mid-pack until run flattened late.
Fair break, not much early speed, settled rail mid-rear, ridden turn, one pace.
Fast away, led early, still in front until 300m out, weakened, eased.
Well away, fourth two off, lost ground turn, ridden wide, no extra.
Fair break, taken back to rear three off, improved wide turn, ridden, short of room, no extra.
Broke fast, ridden for lead, had to settle for second one off, weakened quickly straight, eased.
Very slow away, hard ridden to regain a midfield spot, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, helped by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M to win.
Pushed along the keep up in midfield on the fence, 4Ls off the leader, favoured by the fast pace, made steady ground 400M and ran 2nd.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M to grab 3rd.
Pushed to occupy a prominent spot, 2.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, ran on ok in final stages.
Pushed forward to overcome the wide draw, sat outside the leaders, not suited by the fast sectionals, ran on well until 200M flattened.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 3 wide, suited by the fast pace, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to cross in front and led by 0.5Ls at fast sectionals, hung on until 250M overhauled and emptied.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, lacked room 300M, ran on ok.
Awkward away, at rear at usual, 7Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast pace, lack room 300M, ran on ok.
Eased to sit off the leading group, 3Ls behind the fast tempo, weakened in straight.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast pace, however trapped 3-4 wide, no progress.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off leader along the fence, favoured by the fast pace, no progress.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader, helped by the fast pace, however trapped 3-4 wide, no progress.
Hard ridden to take box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, soon dropped off 400M, checked 200M.
Jumped only fairly, settled in midfield on rail, swung widest for home, quickened well when asked 350 M out, took the lead at the 150 M, kept on soundly to score.
Settled 7-8Ls off the pace on rail, responded well when asked for efforts 350 M out, ran on soundly for 2nd.
Broke well, prominently placed in a one-off spot within striking distance, ran on to contest the lead 350 M out, lacked a kick to challenge the winner, kept on for 3rd.
Settled 4Ls off the pace on rail, on heels at 900 M, made ground steadily final 300 M, kept on for 4th.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, had every chance in the home straight, ran on to contest the lead 350 M, passed by the winner near the 200 M pole, only one-paced.
Bumped at start, taken rearward from gate 8, taken further back by a tired runner at home turn, made up gradual ground when placed under pressure final 350 M, too late.
Bumped at start, pushed up and soon settled just behind the leader, kept on satisfactorily early in the home straight, crowded at 250 M, turned one-paced.
Taken rearward from gate 11 and travelled 9-10Ls off the speed, made up gradual ground when asked for efforts at the top of the home straight, couldn't find extra final 100 M.
Pushed up to lead 1L on rail, caught 200 M out, soon got tired.
Lacked early speed as usual and settled one from the rear, crowded at 600 M, quickened slowly early in the home straight, made up some late ground final 250 M.
Lacked early speed as usual and travelled at the rear, failed to make up any ground.
Urged along to occupy a fence position just behind the leader, kept on until flattened 250 M out, soon faded.
Crowded at start, settled one-off in the mid-division, crowded again at 800 M, only gave limited response when asked 400 M out, no progress.
Caught 3-wide with no cover in the mid-division, struggled rounding the home turn, lost touch at the top of the home straight, finished tailed out. (Mucus.)
Pressed leader, tool lead inside 350M and drew 2Ls clear in mid-straight under an enterprising ride, offered strong resistance when challenged final 100M, hung on.
Away in good order, restrained and tracked leader along the inside, shifted out to clear 300M, wound up fully final 200M and closed in on the winner with every stride, just denied.
Taken across from wide draw and settled towards the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, responded well to urge, finished off the race willingly and got up for 3rd just before the line.
Chased the leader 3-wide without cover, lacked extra pace to challenge seriously but kept on well to the line.
Well covered in midpack, held up for clear running until passing 200M, finished well but gave away too much ground to the leaders.
Behind midfield, ran on steadily when put to pressure inside 350M but no additional headway final 100M.
Slow to begin, never far off along the outside of the 2nd flight, ran home one-paced.
Lacked early pace and settled towards the rear 6Ls behind leaders, picked up only fairly off a ground-saving trip, flattened late stages.
Taken back after the start and guided to the fence 7-8Ls behind leaders, had plenty to do turning in, taken widest to challenge but made limited headway only.
Held up 3-wide in midfield, angled out inside 500M to challenge, made a short lived effort on straightening and was outrun final 200M.
Slightly slow out, urged forward to chase leaders in the 2-path, came under pressure halfway round the turn, found no extra and failed to menace.
Positively ridden, crossed to the lead near 1000M and took them along steadily, headed 350M and faltered.
Raced very keenly in a midfield position along the fence, severely checked near 1000M and continued to race fiercely, not picked up in straight, eased final 150M.
At the rear throughout, struggled for pace halfway and was a beaten horse turning for home.
Prominently placed in a one-off spot 2Ls off the speed, quickened well when asked for efforts 350 M out and soon hit the front, kept on soundly to score.
Caught wide with no cover in midfield, crept closer at home turn, contested the lead at the top of the home straight but was soon shaken off by the winner, kept on well for 2nd.
Lacked early speed as usual and travelled 6Ls off the pace near the rear, responded well when asked 350 M out, ran on soundly down centre of the home straight for 3rd.
Settled at the rear on rail, held up for clear run early in the home straight, quickened well when clear 200 M out, ran on soundly, just late for a place.
Started awkwardly, urged along to hold a one-off spot just behind the mid-division, niggled along rounding the home turn, dashed well when clear 250 M.
Settled in a fence position in midfield, responded well when asked for efforts 350 M out, ran on steadily and looked possible for a place, couldn't find extra final 50 M.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot in the mid-division, had every chance in the home straight, only one-paced when placed under maximum pressure.
Given a waiting ride and travelled 5Ls off the pace on rail, only made limited progress final 350 M, rather one-paced.
Prominently placed in the box-seat, held ground until flattened near the 200 M pole, soon faded.
Jumped only fairly, pushed up to catch up 5Ls off the speed, responded only fairly when asked for efforts 400 M out, got tired near the 200 M.
Crowded at start, lacked early speed and travelled 3-wide at the rear, took long to quicken early in the home straight, made up some late ground final 150 M.
Broke well, pulled his way up to share the lead, hung out badly rounding the bend, caught 350 M out, soon got tired.
Easily ran up to share the lead, kept on until passed 350 M out, soon weakened.
Started awkwardly, caught 4-wide near the rear, unbalanced in action when turning for home, eased out at the top of the home straight.
Began in line and ended up in a midfield spot 2 wide 5Ls from lead, even trip to bend, in restricted room at 400 M, let down nicely when clear and came over the top final 200 M.
Out with rest, settled in 6th 3 wide with cover a bit keen in run, angled wide on turning, went to leaders inside 200 M but couldn't hold off winner inside 100 M.
OK away, pressed on from outside gate but posted 3 wide outside speed, worked throughout 1L back without cover, issued challenge turning, led to 200 M, kept on well.
Angled back but couldn't slot in 2 wide, raced 3 wide 6Ls or so back with cover, came very wide on bend, closed nicely down middle to make frame.
Began well, assumed ideal role 1 out 1 back, overraced in middle stages, close enough on turning, didn't dash but just held ground in straight.
Drifted back to rear from a wide alley, raced 7 to 8Ls back in 2 wide line, tracked up on bend, came widest in straight and made good progress down middle to be nearest on line.
Settled 5Ls off the speed, responded satisfactorily when asked for efforts 400 M out, made up gradual ground, couldn't find extra final 100 M.
Out with rest, settled midfield on rails, 4Ls down in middle stages, had easy time to turn, just kept on behind them without threatening.
Showed usual speed to chase forward on speed, kept speed genuine throughout racing 2 wide, in mix until 300 M but dropped out soon after and didn't see out trip.
Positioned 3 wide behind midfield from an awkward draw 6 to 7Ls back with cover to bend, didn't respond and just kept on at same speed in stretch.
Began well, took up front running, unable to dictate terms as in previous start, held front to 300 M before fading out.
Dropped down to rear division, 9Ls or so away at tail, still well back turning, made only minor ground behind them.
Crowded at start, pushed up to hold a fence position just behind the pace, outpaced at the top of the home straight, soon weakened.
Began OK, box-seated on leaders back, run of race to bend, came off reels turning and dashed well, held on for a nice run.
Ridden quietly from a wide alley, 7 to 8Ls back on rails with tempo against, made many lengths between runners in straight and unlikely not to score.
Took usual role at head of affairs, set steady sections, shaded by outside horse on bend, stayed on well for 3rd.
Settled 3 wide in midfield 5Ls back with cover, even run to bend, came widest turning, solid close to make frame.
3 wide in midfield from a wide alley, 4Ls back, improved 4 wide turning, just missed frame last 100 M.
Midfield 2 wide 3 to 4Ls back, overraced in mid-section, kept coming in behind them in straight and not far away despite steadied at 200 M.
Settled behind midfield on rails, 5Ls back, quiet trip to bend, kept on behind them without threatening.
Prominent and shading leader throughout, close enough still on turning, responded moderately and just battled in straight.
Ideal trip in 1 out 1 back slot, looked poised to strike on bend, didn't find much when asked in straight and faded tamely. (Jockey reported changed legs.)
Caught wide from an awkward alley, pushed on but posted 3 wide without cover to bend, faded after a hard trip.
Tucked in behind midfield from an awkward gate, fair run to bend, didn't respond in straight.
3 wide at tail, 8Ls back, niggled turning, didn't respond.
Settled 7 to 8Ls back on rails, always in rear division throughout, no response in straight.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began with others, niggled at when prominent without cover early, obtained cover though still 3-wide up the Rock, commenced move turning in, fought on gamely down straight to gain upper hand in the shadows of the post.
Began with others, soon driven to take up running attempting to make all, held about 1L advantage to straight when soon joined by challengers, narrowly headed about 50 M out but hung on for 2nd.
Began moderately from a wide draw, settled well back before improving to be just worse than midfield home bend, sustained progress under strong pressure in straight to be nearest at finish.
Broke better than most, settled in 3rd about 2Ls off the speed, in similar position turning in, held place chance throughout home straight but caught for 3rd final strides.
Began with others, travelled in first few on rails and never far off to straight, kept on same pace behind runners without making any serious impression in the run home.
Very slowly away, detached from the main body of field until the Rock, 3rd last around home bend but saved ground into straight, fought on nicely to be nearest at finish.
Broke well from a wide draw, settled wide without cover in rear of midfield, remained wide on home turn, fought on steadily down centre of straight to be nearest at finish. (Tactic questioned.)

Tightened and lost ground at start, gradually recovered to race in midfield, did not find much room after straightening, shifted out for a clear run over 200 M out, kept on same pace without quickening closing stages.
Began with others, soon taken back to race in rear, trailed the field into straight, fought on past well-beaten runners.
Began moderately, remained in last few to straight, saved ground on home turn, kept on steadily until finding no extra inside final 200 M.
Raced outside leader to straight, checked when fading out of contention passing 200 M, no further impression. (Tactic questioned.)
Made its run from last position after drawing the outside alley. Flew home out wide in the home straight to finish over the top of the field.
Came from back in the field after travelling 1 off with cover. Weaved a passage in the final stretch and closed off strongly. (See Incident Report regarding vet exam.)
Camped 1 out 1 back, kept on one paced in the straight had every chance.
From gate 1 was able to track the leader along the paint. Plugged to the line at the same speed.
Settled midfield on the rail with cover. Struck traffic problems in the straight and was not able to be properly tested working home soundly.
Led early on the paint before racing as joint leader after the 1000m. was a length in front at the furlong but was overhauled over the last 100m.
Settled behind the speed 3 wide with cover. Failed to make any impression in the run home. Vet reported lame in the left fore the following day.
Settled worse than midfield 2-3 wide with cover. Battled on without finding much in the run to the line.
Travelled handy to the leaders but coursed 3 wide and without cover for most of the trip. Never likely.
Began awkwardly, settling with the backmakers along the fence. Railed up making the final turn but didn't have much luck securing clear running until after the 100m.
Pushed forward to race as equal leader passing the 1000m, 1 off. Faded soon after entering the home stretch.
Raced midfield but was posted 4 wide without cover after 800m. Never a factor.
Jumped well. Rolled to the fence and led under slow tempo. Held a 1L advantage turning into home straight. Fought determinedly to the line to repel rivals by narrow margin.
Out nicely. Elected to sit behind leader on fence. Soon got clear run in the straight. Looked extremely dangerous passing 200 M but was fended off by the leader near the post.

Well enough away but trapped wide. Ended up 3-wide without cover behind midfield from first turn. Improved gradually from the Rock and raced 3-wide with leaders turning in. Kept on without threatening the front pair.
Switched off from wide draw. Progressed wide from 600 M and was 3Ls down leaving the bend. Closed off well top of home straight but remained one-paced closing stages.

Away in line. Caught wide without cover behind midfield. Allowed to stride forward passing 1300 M and parked one-off behind pace from 1100 M. Challenged the leader home turn. Ran on steadily until no extra near finish.
2-wide at midfield. Made run 4-wide from 500 M and was 3Ls away into final stretch. Held ground thereafter.
Slow to begin and settled 2-wide towards rear. Shuffled to rear on straightening. Held up until 250 M. Finished off well once into clear.
Began awkwardly and was taken to rear. Commenced run around field passing 500 M and was 5Ls off entering home straight. Made up decent ground thereafter.
Box-seat early. Sat midfield on fence middle stages. Plugged on to the post.
2-wide ahead of midfield to home turn. Ran home one-paced. Raced tight final strides.
Behind midfield on fence. Shifted 3-wide for clear run home turn. Stayed there to the line.
Back with last few always. Failed to pick up in the straight.
Well away, not rushed, settled rail in sixth, urged turn, found gaps for inside run, led 100 M out, drew clear.
Broke well, led briefly then settled fourth one off, out for mid-track challenge straight, ran on well but outpaced by winner.
Well away, found rail in third, led mid-straight until unable to cope with first two.
Far break, taken back from wide draw rear one off, last into straight, wide bid, finished strongly.
Fair break, reined back to third last one off, ridden turn for wide bid, finished quite well.
Fair break, back to fourth last on rail, went for run between rivals, ran on but not quite pace to get involved.
Missed break, lost length, rear on rail, second last into straight, made late ground but never able to challenge.
Fair break, not rushed, fifth last one off, wide bid, lugged in as run flattened.
Good break, led early, settled second, hard ridden early straight, one pace.
Fair break, not much early speed, midfield one off, ridden early straight, no progress.
Fair break, midfield three wide, ridden turn, no progress.
Fair break, ridden early to lead, led into straight, ridden, faded fast.
Broke fast, led, crossed, steadied pace, quickened early straight, soon clear, unchallenged.
Broke well, up to second one off, ridden early straight, unable to trouble winner.
Missed break badly, two lengths last early, up to third last entering turn, ridden and improved between horses, finished very strongly.
Awkward start, lost half length, up to sixth one off, improved along rail, then out under driving, kept on until no extra late.
Broke well but caught three wide, back to mid rear, wide bid, ran on.
Broke well, fifth caught three wide, fifth caught three wide, shaken up before straight, had ridden straight, no progress.
Broke well, fifth one off, out to challenge, driven, found little.
Fair break, not hurried, settled fourth last one off, ridden for mid-track bid, found little.
Taken back from wide draw, held up last on rail, shaken up straight, kept on.
Well away, ridden but no early speed, settled second last two off, wide bid, found little. straight.
Reared slightly start, ridden up quickly to third on rail, bustled entering straight, driven, found nil.
Fair break, ridden early but back to midfield rail, shaken up for rail run, found nil.
Eased back, 4-1/2Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300 M to score.
Behind midfield, 4-1/2Ls off the leaders 2 to 3-wide, dashed well 250 M for 2nd despite not suited by the slow pace.
Hard ridden to cross and shared the lead at slow sectionals 2-wide, led 300 M, overhauled 100 M, ran on for 3rd.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 to 3-wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200 M.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, 1-1/2Ls behind the slow tempo, held up 400 M, just held ground when clear.
Eased to rear, 6-1/2Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, bumped 350 M, dashed well 150 M despite all negative racing situations.
Pushed forward, 1-1/2Ls off the leaders 2-wide, benefited by the slow tempo, ran on fairly in straight, checked 100 M.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-wide throughout and lost ground, made early move 600 M, flattened 150 M.
Settled in midfield along the fence, 3Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground in straight, checked 200 M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200 M.
Very slow away, at rear, 6Ls off the leaders 2-wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed fairly.
Hard ridden to take rail in front and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, soon weakened 250 M.
Urged along to share the lead, quickened well when asked for efforts 300 M out, kept battling on under maximum pressure, just withheld the furious challenger.
Urged along early to share the lead, responded well when placed under pressure at the top of the home straight, kept on soundly, narrowly beaten.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, held up for clear run early in the home straight, dashed strongly final 200 M, just late.
Taken back from gate 10 and travelled 8Ls off the pace, kicked strongly 300 M out, hung in at 150 M, just late.
Started awkwardly, taken back from gate 7 and travelled 8Ls off the speed, proved difficult to settle, on heels at 1000 M, ran on soundly final 200 M, crowded at 50 M, too late.
Slow to begin, pushed up to hold a fence position in midfield, blocked early in the home straight, only one-paced when clear at 150 M.
Started awkwardly, taken towards the rear soon after start, niggled along rounding the home turn, made some late ground final 200 M.
Prominently placed in the box-seat, responded fairly when asked for efforts in the home straight, held ground until flattened 100 M out.
Settled cozily in the mid-division, only gave limited response when asked for efforts in the home straight, only one-paced.
Taken towards the rear soon after start, one-paced early in the home straight, checked 150 M out, soon faded.
Settled 2 to 3Ls off the speed, caught 3-wide with no cover early, held ground until got tired near the 200 M.
Settled one-off 3Ls behind the leader, proved difficult to settle early, on heels at 1200 M, blundered at 800 M, blocked in the home straight, checked at 150 M, never tested.
Began awkwardly, guided to the fence under positive riding, 4Ls off the pace rounding the home turn, accelerated to the lead 150 M, strode clear and never challenged to the line.
From wide draw slotted into a 2-wide position in midfield under good handling, asked for effort 400 M, responded well and had every chance but not matched with winner's pace.
Unhurried in early and middle stages and placed last in a fast run race, switched to widest of straight, ran on strongly to finish nearest on the line.
Slow to muster speed early, raced in a 2-wide spot towards the rear, 6Ls to make up turning for home, ran on without reaching the first three.
Switched off to the rear after the start and was 8 to 9Ls behind leader in a strongly run race, made steady headway final 250 M.
Slow to begin, travelled behind midfield 6Ls off the pace, had no clear run along the inside in early straight, ran on fairly final 200 M.
Sped to the lead and set a fast tempo, opened up a 3Ls margin in mid stages, headed nearing 150 M, no extra. (Jockey was told his ride lacked the appropriate level of judgement.)
Sat in 2nd 3Ls behind the breakaway leader, inclined to lay out during the race, kept on at the same pace turning in, weakened inside 150 M.
Raced in the 2-path not far off from the runaway leader, driven out nearing 400 M but didn't respond, dropped out rapidly final 100 M.
Caught 3-wide behind midfield and about 5 to 6Ls off the pace in mid stages, left with no cover from 700 M, found very little under pressure over the home turn, eased halfway up the straight.
Reserved near the rear, moved to the 3-path near 1200 M, 6Ls down leaving the home bend, not quickened.
Caught 3-wide no cover until 700 M then strode forward to press the leader, hung in badly shortly after straightening, soon eased. (Unacceptable Performance.)

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Settled mainly 3-wide in midfield to straight, ran on steadily to just get up on line.
Began fairly, ridden along for speed disputing lead from approaching home bend, saved ground turning in hitting front over 200 M out, only to be denied on the line.
Always thereabouts, held every chance early in straight but failed to quicken to challenge throughout closing stages.
Settled on rails in midfield, saved ground and only one off the lead turning home when not much room, shifted out for a clear run 200 M out but failed to quicken to challenge.

Close up early, gradually taken backward to travel in rear of midfield or just worse, remained similar turning in when did not find much room, made up good late ground inside final 200 M to be nearest at finish.
Soon taken back to last few after beginning from a wide draw, remained in last few and very wide around the bend, fought on steadily down centre of straight to be nearest at finish.
Always prominent, failed to quicken under pressure in the run home.
Sluggish at start, ridden along to muster, checked and lost ground on rails coming out of back straight, behind midfield rounding home bend, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Slow out, trailed the field to straight, made moderate progress under pressure past beaten runners down the centre of the track.
Soon took up running and held narrow advantage to straight, gradually weakened under pressure after straightening. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Began well from the widest barrier, raced wide without cover throughout, with leaders briefly before taken backward to just better than midfield, soon weakened in straight.
Sluggish at start, remained well back, found nothing under pressure in the run home.
Raced prominently, 3 off the grandstand side. Hit the front approaching the furlong and dug deep to draw away over the final stages for a sound win.
Missed the start but recovered to race just behind the speed. Settled towards the middle of the course, loomed up and challenged at the 200m, but was outdueled in the run to the line.
Settled towards the centre of the course, behind midfield. Responded to riders urgings after the 300m, and finished off well.
Stalked the leader towards the outside fence. Kept on one paced to finish in the frame.
Held a position worse than midfield about 6 off the outside rail. Drifted out over the final stages whilst making some ground.
Raced close to the speed near the centre of the track. Was a beaten horse after the last 200m.
Raced well back along the centre of the course. Made steady headway late.
Raced midfield well closer to the inside rail. Failed to make ay impression in the run to the line.

Didn't show any early dash and maintained a position nearest to the inside close to midfield. Found nothing when asked for an effort over the last 300m. The vet reported mucopus in the horses trachea post race.
Began awkwardly then settled midfield near the grandstand side. Only plugged to the line.
Raced with the leading division early but didn't give much at the business end fading after the last 200m.
Settled in last position near centre of the track. Struggled over the concluding stages.
Led along the grandstand side but weakened sharply over the final 100m.
Raced worse than midfield along the outside fence. never looked likely.
Jumped well. Sat 2-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Took split passing 300M and closed off strongly to chase the leader. Asserted authority near the post.
Caught wide in a forward position after start. Cut to the fence and led 1400M. Held a 2Ls advantage final 250M. Hung on until overhauled by the winner closing stages.
Ridden to take fence behind midfield after start. Held up towards rear rounding home turn. Afforded unimpeded run final 250M. Finished off well to snatch a minor placing at line.
Well enough away but insufficient speed to lead. Settled 2-wide behind midfield from first turn. Trapped towards rear turning in. Kept making up ground steadily in the straight. Just denied for 3rd.
Good jump. Sat midfield on fence from first turn. Failed to see daylight home straight until 250M. Good place chance but was narrowly beaten at the post.

Began fairly. Ridden to take a 3-wide spot behind midfield from first turn. Urged along back straight to maintain position. Hard ridden and was 5Ls off turning into home. Made up decent ground late without troubling the principals.
Slow to begin. Pressed to recover lost ground but was trapped wide first turn. Parked one-off behind leader from 1300M. Failed to progress after straightening.
At rear on fence early. Shifted 4-wide back straight and improved outside field gradually home turn. Couldn't turn up a notch in the straight.
3-wide towards rear early and middle stages. Swung widest and was the last into final stretch. Beat tired runners home.
Slowly away. Failed to muster despite of rider. Travelled wide and without cover at midfield early and middle stages. Improved to race within 2Ls of the pace from 1000M. Emptied 300M.
Began well and soon found the fence behind leader. No response when asked in the straight.
Eased towards rear from wide draw. Never improved.
Travelled wide behind midfield early and was left without cover from 900M. Progressed wide to race near the leading section home turn. Peaked soon after straightening.
3-wide at midfield. Struggled home turn. Faded inside final 300M.
Well away but settled third last two off no cover, improved wide to third entering straight, led 250m out, kept on very well.
Well away, up to second rail, led early straight, strongly ridden, just failed to hold winner.
Well away, settled fifth rail, slipped back to midfield entering straight, ridden and finished well between horses.
Sluggish start, settled fourth last one off, improved wide turn, kept on steadily wide under driving.
Well away, ridden for fourth one off, ridden early straight, not pace to challenge.
Fair break, midfield one off, urged far side, ridden early straight, kept on without being able to quicken.
Fair break, ridden for early lead, settled third rail, ridden home turn, no kick.
Fair break, ridden early but outpaced, sixth from rear one off, driven turn, little progress.
Missed break slightly, ridden early fifth rail, short of room far side, ridden straight, modest progress.
Fair break, ridden early but caught three wide first turn, midfield one off, improved wide home turn, ridden, weakened.
Moderate break, second last one off, improved wide turn, ridden, no progress.
Stumbled start, taken back, last into straight, sought inside run, ridden, little progress.
Fair start, settled rail midfield, slipped back to third last entering straight as no forward space available, ridden early straight, no progress.
Broke fast, ridden wide to lead first turn, two lengths clear far side, headed entering straight, weakened quickly, eased.
Ridden early but unable to reach rail and wide throughout, five lengths to make up last 300m, finished very strongly wide, impressive.
Fast break, led early, dictated pace, kicked and went clear early straight, unable to resist winner late.
Broke fast from out wide, tracked leaders rail in third, out to challenge early straight, kept on under diving, not quite pace to challenge.
Broke well, ridden early but not pace to go with leaders, settled midfield one off, short of room early straight, ran on strongly when clear.
Fair break, fifth last one off, wide bid, kept on without being able to threaten.
Missed break losing two lengths, up to mid-rear rail, wove through pack in straight to finish well.
Moderate break, midfield one off, awkward round home turn, ridden, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back to second last wide bid, modest progress.
Broke well, settled midfield one off, ridden early straight, some progress, soon no extra.
Missed break, lost two lengths, last on rail, inside bit but gaps closed, kept on once clear.
Well away, ridden for lead, caught three wide, up to second, chased clear leader straight, weakened.
Moderate start, up to fourth one off, ridden early straight, no progress.
Fair break, fifth on rail, inside bid straight, found nil.
Fair break, no route to rail, always wide, hard ridden straight, found nil, eased.
Eased to obtain the box seat, pressed the button at 300M and closed off strongly to win.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 0.5L at good pace, hung on strongly until 50M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Pushed forward to sit outside the leader at good pace, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace on the rails, made some ground in straight.
Slow away, hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the good pace 3 wide, hung out badly at bend, flattened in straight.
At rear, 6Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on fairly.
Eased at start and sat at rear, 8Ls off the good pace, raced 4-5 throughout and lost too much ground, ran on well to the line in final 200M.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield along the fence, 3Ls off the good pace, no progress.
Midfield, 3Ls off the good pace, hampered 800M, trapped 4-5 wide throughout and lost too much ground, no progress.
At back, raced 5 wide throughout and lost too much ground, never a factor.
Midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 3 wide, raced keenly, hung out abruptly at bend, checked 400M, dropped off.
Restrained in a one-off spot 4Ls off the pace, kicked strongly when asked for efforts 350 M out, hit the front 50 M out, kept on strongly to score.
Pushed up to hold a fence position just behind the leader, responded well when placed under pressure at the top of the home straight, finished off soundly for 2nd.
Started awkwardly, settled in midfield on rail, ran on soundly along the inner part of the home straight, got a place in the final stride.
Given a waiting ride as usual and travelled 8Ls off the speed, quickened well when asked for efforts at the top of the home straight, ran on strongly final 300 M, too late.
Broke well from gate 14, urged along to share the lead on 2-deep, quickened well when asked 300 M out, looked possible to win, reeled in final 50 M, weakened.
Niggled along to share the lead on rail, passed 250 M out, remained one-paced.
Prominently placed 3Ls off the speed on rail, gave limited response when placed under pressure in the home straight, one-paced.
Lacked early speed and travelled 9Ls off the pace, urged along halfway, quickened late at 300 M, finished off well, but really too late.
Settled one-off 6Ls behind the leaders, made some late ground final 250 M, never really troubled the principals.
Slow away, settled 11Ls off the pace at rear, responded well when asked at the top of the home straight, ran on well final 300 M, on heels at 100 M, not fully tested.
Taken back from gate 12 and travelled 9Ls off the pace, finished off satisfactorily and covered some ground final 300 M.
Prominently placed one-off just behind the speed, proved difficult to settle when restrained, checked at 1300 M, held ground until flattened at 200 M.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot 1L behind the leaders, held ground, couldn't find extra final 200 M.
Pushed up to occupy a 3-wide spot in the mid-division, lost cover 700 M out, got tired early in the home straight, soon dropped out.

Sped to the early lead, joined by a rival passing 800M and set a fast mid-race tempo, drew 2Ls clear early straight, faded 150M, headed inside 50M but fought back to share the spoils right on the line.

In a 2-wide position chasing the leading pair, ideally placed to strike turning for home, surged forward and leveled up with the leader near 50M, was briefly in front but his rival fought back for a dead heat.

Blundered when crowded for room at the start, in a rearward position and was guided to the rail before the turn, made good headway inside 300M, continued willingly in late stages and got up for 3rd near line.

Travelled along the fence 2Ls back in 5th but had to be ridden along to maintain that position, chased leader on straightening, loomed a threat 150M but flattened out late stages and lost 3rd near line.
Away in good order but was restrained to a rail position behind midfield, switched out to clear 300M, finished well and was beaten for 3rd narrowly. (Bled.)
Began awkwardly, urged along to obtain a position in midfield one off the fence, stayed on but lacked pace to seriously challenge.
Slow to muster speed, moved closer to a midfield position nearing 800M, chased 3-deep on the turn, kept on one-paced and not reached leaders.

Restrained after a good start, checked 800M and shuffled further back, hung out making the turn and became detached from the field, taken to extreme outside of straight and finished off the race fairly. (Jockey questioned.)
Unable to slot in from a wide draw, caught 4-wide towards the rear and covered more ground than rivals, lacked the needed response when asked.
Went forward and vied for the lead on the outside, set fast pace over the turn, weakened nearing 400M, dropped out rapidly final 150M.
Not hurried in early stages, settled near the rear in the 2-path, pushed along nearing 400M but could not offer the necessary response.
Positioned in the group chasing the pace, 3-wide without cover, outpaced nearing 400M and soon behind, eased mid-straight.
Started awkwardly, settled 9Ls off the speed, swung widest for home, kicked strongly when asked 400 M, ran on soundly and took the lead at 150 M, drew clear easily.
Settled one-off in midfield, responded well when placed under pressure 400 M out, ran on soundly for 2nd, but never really threatened the winner.
Pushed up to get across in front and soon settled just behind the leader, briefly led at the top of the home straight, caught 200 M out, kept on well for 3rd.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, held up for clear run early in the home straight, finished off well when clear at 300 M, too late.
Prominently placed just off the speed, responded well when asked in the home straight, kept on satisfactorily but lacked a decisive kick to challenge the principals.
Started awkwardly, urged along to hold a fence position in midfield, remained one-paced when placed under pressure in the home straight.
Lacked early speed, ended up settling just behind the mid-division, crowded at 800 M, took time to pick up when asked for efforts, made up some late ground final 250 M.
Bumped at start, urged along to lead on rail, 4Ls clear making the first turn at 800 M, reeled in 300 M, soon flattened near the 150 M.
Lacked early speed as usual, settled one from the rear, made up gradual ground final 350 M, rather one-paced.
Caught 3-wide in the mid-division, lost cover 1200 M out, only one-paced in the home straight.
Settled three from the rear, held up for clear run early in the home straight, not fully tested.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot just behind the pace, on heels at 1400 M, outpaced at the top of the home straight, soon dropped out.
Never better than midfield, on heels 350 M out, failed to make up any ground.
At rear throughout the trip, never competitive.

Showed good early speed and shared the lead along the inside, quickened into a decisive advantage 250M under confident handling, kept on well to the line and fought off a strong challenge from the runner-up in late stages.
Keen early stages, placed 4-wide towards the rear but not far off from the pace, picked up nicely but not as quickly as the winner, stayed on well final 200M and was nearest at the finish.
Waited with near the rear, swung 3-wide for home, shifted to outside of track inside 400M, finished off the race well and was just bettered by two seriously good horses.
Held up in mid-division 3-wide, made good progress to 150M, flattened late.
Not hurried, settled at the back 6Ls off the pace and raced 4-wide, made some late progress.
Held up towards the rear, not suited by the steady pace and was difficult to settle in the first half, held up 400M to 300M, progressed steadily to the line after switching out into clear.
Pushed to the lead one off the fence, headed by winner soon after straightening, kept on same pace to 200M then faded.
One off the fence in midfield and well covered, held up passing 300M when beginning his challenge, ran on when clear final 200M.
Taken across behind runners, settled out the back 6Ls off the pace, held up along the fence and unable to obtain clear running until 200M, finished off the race fairly late stages.
Taken across to the fence behind runners but was a shade keen in early stages, stayed on without threatening in straight but nevertheless a reasonable first up effort.
Slow to begin but soon recovered to track leaders, was close enough over 400M out but couldn't respond to pressure, dropped out 100M.
Raced 3-wide with leaders, shaken up nearing 400M but found nothing under pressure, dropped out rapidly inside 200M.
With leaders early on then dropped back to a midfield position along the rail, lacked a response when asked early straight, weakened 200M.
Went forward but caught 4-wide outside the leaders, soon dropped away turning for home, eased late on. (Jockey was advised not to cover unnecessary ground.)

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Settled well behind early stages, took closer order turning into back straight, circled field from just worse than midfield around the bend, defied the widest run into straight to score easily.
Settled in midfield from a bad draw, came under pressure rounding home bend, fought on steadily to claim 2nd closing stages.

Began with others, soon driven across the track to settle in a one-out-out-back position, maintained a similar spot down far side and was about 2Ls back in 3rd into straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Never too far off in 3rd or 4th on rails, similar when just over 3Ls off the speed turning for home, kept on same pace without quickening.
Led the field into back straight, ceded advantage to settle for 2L 2nd, held same to home turn, fought on under pressure until finding no extra inside final 200 M.
Began from the widest barrier, travelled wide in midfield without cover, remained similar into home straight, tightened and lost position just inside 300 M, fought on steadily to the line.
Soon dropped to tail-end, went widest into straight, ran past well-beaten horses down centre of home straight.
Slightly slow out, remained in last few to straight, only ran past well-beaten runners in straight.
Began fairly, settled mainly in midfield, saved ground turning for home to reach as close as 2L 3rd on rails, quickly swamped shortly after straightening.
Travelled behind midfield on rails most of way to straight, went home one-paced.
Began with others, soon taken back to settle worse than midfield, made no impression in the run home.
Raced outside leader early stages, took up running entering back straight, maintained a 2L advantage most of way to home turn, soon weakened under pressure after straightening.
Crowded at the start settling about third from the rear. Made a midrace dash and looped the field taking up front running duties by the 600m. Made every post a winner thereafter to win easily.
Raced prominently 1 off the fence. maintained a good gallop right to the wire.

Reared as the gates opened travelling with the backmakers 3 wide with cover despite pulling hard at times. Looked to go forward midrace but inched forward and circled the field by the home turn. Closed off soundly to snatch third spot.
Made its run from near the rear of the field after being shuffled back early, settling along the paint. Peeled out passing the 600m and commenced its run 3 wide with cover. Closed off well.
Parked 3 back the fence. Was inclined to travel a touch keenly midrace and battled on gamely.
Settled along the paint towards the rear. Made steady ground in the final stretch.
Settled at the tail of the field 1 off with cover. Got carted wide leaving the 1000m and after making a forward move near the 700m, coursed wide and without cover thereafter. Not likely.
Tracked the early leader along the fence. Drifted back after the 500m and failed to make any impression in the run home.
Led along the fence until handing up after being challenged near the 700m. Was well beaten entering the straight. Vet reported post race that the horse had blood in the trachea.
Travelled 2 wide with cover close to midfield. Copped a check after the 600m and struggled thereafter.
For the majority of the race travelled 3 wide without cover, midfield. Never likely.
Raced midfield 2 wide with cover. Tailed out rounding the home turn.
Behind leaders on fence early. Proved difficult to settle and dropped to midfield from 700 M. Rallied along the rail in the straight. Fought determinedly closing stages to get up on line.
Trapped 3-wide with leaders early. Shifted 2-wide down the Rock. Every chance in the straight and battled gamely to the line. Just denied.
3-wide towards rear to home turn. Swung widest and was 4Ls down turning into home. Covered substantial ground in the straight and was nearest at finish.
2-wide in leading section early. Led solo on fence passing the Rock. Levelled turning in. Hung on well until no extra to trouble the front pair final stages. Missed 3rd at post.
Well enough away. Elected to race 2-wide ahead of midfield first turn. Pressured 500 M and was well positioned to strike in the straight. One-paced to conclude.
2-wide behind midfield to home straight. Ran on fairly well until crowded for room and lost running final 50 M.
Travelled 3-wide and without cover ahead of midfield to home straight. Plugged on but not threatening. Weakened final stages.
Always behind midfield. Never improved from there.
On fence with leaders early. Took seat from the Rock. Failed to pick up in the straight. Beaten final furlong.
Towards rear always. Never a factor.
Soon detached. Never in the hunt.
Fair break, up quickly to lead and cross, two lengths clear entering straight, ridden, held on well.
Moderate start. Not much early pace, settled mid-rear rail, urged and out to challenge, finished well but just too late.
Broke well, second on rail, inside bid, kept on but not quite pace to challenge.
Fair break, lacked early pace, mid-rear one off, wide bid, not quite pace to challenge.
Fair break, up on rail to fifth, ridden for inside bid, kept on, lacked kick.
Fair break, slight early bobble, up three wide to fifth, mid-track run straight, driven, flattened out late.
Well away, not rushed early, back to fourth last one off, out for wide-ish bid, driven, kept on one pace.
Jumped smartly, taken back to rear three off, improved turn, wide bid, ridden, kept on one pace.
Slightly sluggish early, third last rail, bustled, ridden early straight, inside bid, modest progress.
Moderate break, back to rear one off, ridden early straight, no real progress.
Slow away, up to third one off, challenged early straight, weakened.
Broke well, fourth early one-off, ridden and weakened early straight.
Fair break, settled fifth rail, urged into turn, ridden early straight, driven between horses to lead very late.
Missed break slightly but up to fourth one off, ridden turn, aimed for wide run but hung in, challenged and led briefly, headed on line.
Fair break, up on rail to third, inside bid straight, led briefly 150 M out, unable to quicken late.
Fair break, settled sixth one off, wide bid straight, finished well under strong driving.
Broke sharply, led and crossed, two lengths clear far side comfortably dictating pace, tried to kick early straight, gradually weakened.
Good break, crossed from outside gate to sit second one off, bustled along straight, driven, weakened slightly late.
Fair break, not rushed, rail mid-rear, shaken up leaving turn, hard ridden straight, no real kick.
Air break, taken back to rear rail, second last into straight, wide bid, hard ridden, modest progress.
Slow start, settled third last rail, ridden for wide bid, no kick.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, nudged along far side, ridden turn, driven straight, no progress.
Fair break, not rushed, settled rear one off, urged into turn, inside run, found nil.
Slow start, third last one off, improved wide turn, ridden straight but flattened right out.
Settled in prominent spot, 2Ls off the leaders 2-wide, benefited by the slow pace, dashed well 250 M to win by a head.
Hard ridden to take the rail and shared the lead at slow sectionals, suited by the soft tempo, hung on strongly until 50 M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, ran on strongly to the line for 3rd.
Pushed forward to cross to 2-wide and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on to the line without much threats.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2-1/2Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-wide no cover throughout, held ground in straight despite not suited by the slow pace and tough trip.
Hard ridden early but didn't muster, 3-1/2Ls off the leaders 2-wide, harmed by the slow pace, just held ground in final stages.
Pushed early to hold the rail in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Pushed early, took rail behind midfield, 5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow sectionals, little dash 200 M.
Eased back, 6-1/2Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-wide throughout, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 200 M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leaders 2-wide, raced very last one ungenerously, harmed by the slow pace, held up 400 M, little dash 150 M.
Eased to rear, 7Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Bumped start, never competitive and tailed out.
Settled cozily just behind the leader, niggled along at home turn, quickened well when asked for efforts 300 M out, hit the front 150 M out, kept on soundly to score.
Urged along to hold a fence position 2Ls off the speed, quickened well when placed under pressure 300 M out, ran on soundly for 2nd.
Settled 5Ls off the pace on rail, on heels at 1400 M, saved ground on the inner at the home turn, ran on well final 300 M for 3rd.
Taken back from gate 10 and travelled 7Ls off the speed, responded satisfactorily when asked 350 M out, made up gradual ground without really threatening the principals.
Niggled along to lead and found the fence at 1100 M, reeled in 200 M out, soon flattened.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, checked at 800 M, swung wide for home, only one-paced.
Settled in a rearward spot until swinging widest at the home turn, responded only fairly when asked for efforts, passed a few tired runners in the home straight.
Taken to a rearward spot from gate 12, travelled 3-wide throughout the trip, only one-paced when placed under pressure in the home straight.
Pushed up to occupy a one-off spot in the mid-division, proved difficult to settle halfway, urged along at the home turn, held ground, couldn't find extra final 150 M.
Started awkwardly, settled 4Ls off the pace on rail, held ground until flattened 100 M out.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot just off the speed, struggled at the home turn, weakened near the 200 M pole.
Taken towards the rear early, on heels at 1400 M, pulled halfway when travelled with no cover, improved along 4-deep 1000 M out, flattened 250 M out, soon weakened.
Held up patiently towards the rear, pushed along inside 500 M and swung widest for home, produced a late burst inside 200 M, shot to the front near the line and prevailed in a head-bobbing finish.
Began only fairly, settled in a 2-wide position midfield, held up early straight, ran on strongly when clear and just lost out in a head-bobbing finish.
Forwardly placed just behind leading pair and had a smooth run along the rail, took over 200 M out, kept on well and was only headed close home.
Caught 3-wide without cover in mid-division, loomed a threat 200 M, finished well but could not keep pace with the first two final 100 M.
Taken across behind runners, settled out the back well off the pace, held up 300 M-100 M, finished full of running.
Taken across behind runners and tucked in behind mid-division, turned 3-wide passing 1000 M, made a short-lived effort on straightening, flattened final 150 M.
Chased leaders in 4th, had every chance turning in, outpaced final 150 M.
Guided to the fence and settled behind mid-division 5 to 6Ls off the pace, had to be niggled along passing 700 M, angled out 400 M, ran on fairly passing beaten runners only.
Settled in midfield off the rail, couldn't step up a gear when asked nearing 300 M, one paced.
Soon led along the fence, raced keenly when a rival emerged on his outside, set a good pace but had little left turning in, headed 250 M and weakened away.
Began only fairly and was slow to muster speed despite being ridden along, settled 7Ls back in 2nd last, under pressure making the turn but showed little response, one paced final 400 M.
Pressed leader on the outside, no extra inside 200 M, eased when no chance late stages. (Jockey dropped whip 300 M.)

Began with others to race among leaders early, gradually settled in 5th about 3Ls off the pace rounding home bend, came to challenge under pressure entering straight, quickened well inside final 200 M to score well late.
Driven forward to dispute lead along the rails, hit the front shortly after straightening and soon flattered, died on its run close to home.
Began with others, settled around in midfield, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.

Began awkwardly losing ground, soon driven to make up lost time, amongst leaders before losing position coming out of back straight, ran home steadily from 2L 3rd into home straight without quickening.
Began fairly from a poor draw, soon settled towards the rear, made up good ground under pressure in straight to be nearest at finish.
Settled one from last, similar turning for home, fought on steadily under pressure down centre of straight without threatening.
Began with others from a poor draw, gradually settled towards the rear, met minor interference on straightening, fought on steadily past beaten runners.
Began from the widest barrier with others, raced wide without cover in first few to straight, gradually weakened under pressure after straightening.
Began moderately, settled around midfield about 5Ls off the speed, saved ground turning for home, made no impression in the run home.
Jumped badly losing considerable ground, trailed the field to straight, never seen with a chance.
Niggled along in just worse than midfield, no closer turning for home, dropped further back after straightening.
Began well and held narrow lead far side, dropped to 3rd rounding home bend, compounded badly after straightening. (Bled.)
Rated behind midfield 4 wide with cover. Peeled out early in the straight and had the race well within in its keeping after hitting the front near the 200m.
Slow to begin then settled 4 deep at the rear with cover. Rounded the home turn widest and closed off nicely.
Camped midfield, 1 off with cover. Copped a check early in the straight but recovered and closed off well.

Stalked the leaders 2-3 wide with cover. Looked to shift out early in the home straight but went back in to find runs through the field. Failed to click up a gear in the straight but was still able to finish in the frame.
Tracked the leader along the fence. was held up in the early stages of the final stretch but failed to make any substantial impression thereafter.
Was taken back at the start from a wide gate and settled near the rear 1 off with cover. Held up early in the straight but never really looked likely.
Ridden along early but was posted 4 wide without cover on the circle ahead of midfield. Struggled in the final stretch.
Worked hard to race in the leading trio but coursed 3 wide without cover for most of the trip. Never likely.

Couldn't go the early speed of the race and settled at the tail of the field along the fence. Had some traffic problems entering the straight but was somewhat flat in the run to line. (blood in trachea.)
Began awkwardly then ridden along to take up leading duties along the rail. Faded passing the last furlong.
Raced in the middle of the leading trio. Was a beaten horse after the 400m.
Wasn't the best away then raced with the rear of the field 3 wide with cover. Tailed out in the straight. (To trial.)
Never far off the pace on stands' rail early. Ridden 400M and powered clear final furlong. Easy.
Led on stands' rail early. Overhauled by the winner final 300M. Gave plenty to snatch 2nd late on.
One-off the stands' rail behind the leader early. Hit front briefly 400M but no answer to winner's acceleration. Hung on for 2nd until final strides.
Behind midfield near the centre of the track to midpoint. Checked when attempted to pick up at 400M. Ran on fairly well once resumed. (Bled.)
Midfield to midpoint. Pressed from 400M and kept on steadily.
Trailed field to 400M. Covered decent ground near the far side thereafter.
In a forward spot until no extra to threaten the principals final 300M.
Behind leaders to midpoint. Couldn't pick up when asked. (Substantial amount of blood in horse's trachea.)
Urged early and reached leading section passing 600M. Couldn't turn up a notch when the race got serious inside 300M.
Behind midfield to midpoint. Got traffic thereafter until 300M. Plugged on once into clear.
Towards rear early. Improved briefly to midfield passing midpoint. Peaked 250M.
Towards rear always. Hard ridden 300M but found nothing. No impression.
Broke well, settled fifth rail, shaken up entering straight, ridden, led 300m out, long battle with second, held on well.
Broke well, taken back to fifth last one off, short of room then wide bid, ran on very well, just held.
Fair break, taken back to last one off, wide bid straight, ran on well.
Broke fast, up to share lead, then settled third on rail, out to challenge, slight bump, ran on quite well.
Moderate break, back to fourth last rail, brief check straight, ran on quite well.
Fair break, not rushed, midfield one off, squeezed through early straight, ran on quite well.
Fair break, bustled along to keep pitch, midfield two off, improved three wide entering straight and bumped, kept on one pace.
Well away, ridden early for lead but caught three wide, up to share lead, led into straight, headed 300m out, weakened.
Fair break, held up rear, wide bid, ran on but never able to challenge.
Fair break, not much early pace, second last on rail, checked when short of racing room mid-straight, kept on.
Moderate break, lacked early speed, back to rear, along rail to midfield, continued rail bid straight, unable to reach leaders.
Fair break, up to sixth one off, ridden early straight, no progress.
Well away, up wide to share lead three wide, back to fourth one off, ridden early straight, weakened.
Fair break, ridden up along rail to share lead, headed home turn, weakened quickly, eased.
Broke well, led, ridden early straight, kept on very strongly.
Well away, up on rail to lead, then settled third rail, ridden and chased winner all the way up straight, not quite able to get on terms.
Fair break, not rushed, third last one off, improved turn, wide bid, ran on well.
Moderate break, taken back to rear, checked when seeking run early straight, ran on well when clear.
Strange hop when leaving stalls, lost two lengths, settled mid-rear rail, found inside seam and ran on quite well straight.
Fair break, up to third two off, challenged early straight, ridden, weakened.
Fair break but no route to rail, caught four wide, wide bid straight, ran on quite well until run flattened last 150m.
Broke well, not pace to lead, settled midfield rail, inside bid, kept on but never able to threaten.
Fair break, midfield one off, wide challenge, ridden, only modest progress.
Well away, up wide to join battle for lead, back to fifth one off, ridden straight, little progress.
Well away, not pace to reach lead and caught four wide, wide into straight, ridden, no progress.
Fair break, not rushed, held up second last one off, ridden entering straight, no progress.
Fair break, taken back, rear one off, wide into straight, making ground until seemed to lose action, virtually pulled up.
Moderate start, up quickly on outside to sit second one off, ridden to challenge early straight, no response, weakened quickly.
Settled in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader on the rails, not suited by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M to win without being fully tested.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, drifted away 600M, hung on until 150M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well for 3rd despite all negative racing situations.
Pushed to obtain a prominent spot, 2.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the slow pace, ran on ok in straight, just missed 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield on the fence, 5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow sectionals, little dash 400M, run ended 200M.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, dashed only fairly.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, more than 10Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Pushed to occupy a midfield spot, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, lack room 400m, no dash when clear.
At back, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Behind midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Slow away, pushed forward to obtain the box seat, enjoyed slow sectionals, out of fuel 300M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, weakened 400M.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the slow tempo, however soon dropped off 400M.
Eased to rear, not suited by the slow pace, never a factor.
Given a waiting ride and settled in the mid-division, responded well when asked for efforts 400 M out, ran on, hit the front 150 M out, kept on soundly to score.
Jumped well, pushed up to share the lead and soon took the fence on the grandstand side, responded well when placed under pressure near the 400 M, kept on well for 2nd.
Prominently placed just behind the leader, quickened well when asked 400 M out, briefly led but soon caught by the winner at 150 M, no extra, just did enough for a place.
Broke well, soon got across towards the standside, settled in the mid-division, quickened satisfactorily when asked 350 M out, ran on steadily, just late for a place.
Settled in a rearward position 3-4Ls off the speed, only gave limited response when asked 400 M out, never really troubled the principals.
Settled 3-4Ls off the pace on the standrail, rather one-paced, on heels 50 M out, not fully tested.
Lacked early speed, settled 5Ls off the pace at the rear, hung out near the 200 M, bumped 100 M out, failed to make up any ground.
Pushed up to share the lead, struggled halfway, soon weakened, finished tailed out.

Away in good order, had the rail and settled in mid-division, made smooth headway to lead near 100M and fought off a strong challenge from the runner-up final stages. (Trainer questioned re improving performance.)

Towards the rear in early stages, along the 3-path and strode closer to pace entering the back straight, made his move with the winner early straight, dueled for 300M and was out-finished in late stages.
Taken back and given a waiting ride near the tail of the field, briefly held up 450M, ran on well but couldn't make ground on the first two.
Slow to begin, settled near the rear about 8Ls off the pace, shifted away from the fence 600M out, ran on well from off the pace, nearest finish.
Unable to slot in from draw 14 and caught at least 4-wide and without cover, moved closer to the pace from a rearward position nearing 800M, had his chance but turned one-pace final 150M.
Obtained a 2-wide position in midfield, pulled hard down the back straight and shuffled further back making the home turn, picked up steadily inside 400M and did best work late.
Dropped back towards the rear, turned 4-wide over the home turn, finished off fairly and never looked like getting to leaders.
Went forward and challenged for the lead on outside, became difficult to settle in middle stages, under pressure 500M out, fought on to 150M then weakened.
Taken across behind runners and settled at the tail of the field well off the pace, pushed very wide nearing the home turn and made no significant headway final 300M.
Broke well, restrained to a position behind midfield 7-8Ls off the good pace, saved ground on the inside but was severely checked near 450M, made limited progress thereafter.
Chased leaders along the inside then shifted to 2-wide entering back straight, under pressure 700M out to maintain position, no extra 250M.
Went forward and crossed to the fence near 1300M, pressed by a rival and became difficult to settle in middle stages, broke away from the field 600M, headed near 200M and weakened rapidly.
Made use early to obtain a forward position behind leaders, pushed to 3-wide 800M, hung in badly over the home turn, came off the bit 600M and gave ground rapidly. (To barrier trials around a bend.)
Up with the pace early then restrained to midfield passing 1400M, had to be driven along over the home turn, severely checked 450M and lost position, shuffled back to rear and eased.
Jumped only fairly, urged along to occupy the box-seat, quickened well when clear 350 M out, ran on soundly and hit the front 150 M out, drew clear.
Settled cozily just off the speed, ran on soundly when asked 400 M out, hung out, briefly led, soon caught by the winner at the 150 M, kept on well for 2nd.
Jumped fastest, settled one-off in the mid-division, quickened well when clear 300 M out, ran on soundly for 3rd.
Prominently placed just off the pace, proved difficult to settle halfway, on heels at 1000 M, kept on satisfactorily when placed under pressure in straight, just missed a place.
Settled at the rear on rail, made up gradual ground along the inner part of the home straight, lacked a decisive kick to challenge the principals.
Taken back from gate 13, caught 3-wide in midfield, covered some ground down the centre of the home straight, rather one-paced.
Pushed hard to hold a fence position just behind the mid-division, made up gradual ground from the 350 M, checked at 200 M, turned one-paced.
Slow away, travelled 5-6Ls off the pace at the rear, badly bumped at the top of the home straight, made up some late ground final 250 M.
Settled in the mid-division on rail, only one-paced when asked for efforts early in the home straight, couldn't find extra final 150 M.
Caught wide in midfield early, drifted back gradually in search of cover, badly bumped 400 M out, only made limited progress final 250 M. (Lame in left front leg.)
Raced handy but caught 3-wide with no cover, ran up to share the lead at the home turn, reeled in 300 M out, flattened, soon faded.
Urged along to hold a 3-wide spot in midfield, proved difficult to settle halfway, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Raced on-pace but caught 4-wide with no cover early, crept closer rounding the bend, got tired near the 200 M, crowded at 100 M, dropped out.
Crowded at start, urged along to share the lead on rail, got tired early in the home straight, soon dropped out.
Out with them, midfield 2 wide, 4 to 5Ls back in mid-section, travelled well to bend, loomed strongly at 300 M, ran away to score easily by a widening margin.
Taken back from a wide gate, settled last 7 to 8Ls back, took rails run on circle, weaved through pack and closed well, outclassed by winner.
No early speed, 3 wide behind midfield 6 to 7Ls back had cover to turn, made steady progress down middle to take 3rd.
Positive from an inside gate, sat behind leader on rails 2Ls back throughout, easy time to bend, didn't dash but stayed on fairly to make frame.
Pressed on from an awkward alley, angled into 1 out 1 back spot, niggled on bend, looked a brief place chance but ran out badly at 250 M, only ridden hands and heels thereafter.
Drifted back from a very wide gate, back with rear division 8Ls from top end, improved on bend and came widest turning, made some decent ground in straight.
Not much early speed, settled 6 to 7Ls back on rails, overraced in mid-section, was working into it nicely severely checked at 200 M.
Slotted in on rails in 5th, 3 to 4Ls away in run, had easy time to bend, working into it before finding traffic at 300 M, stayed on OK when clear.
Trapped wide early, behind midfield, still 4 wide without cover on circle, 6Ls back, didn't find and faded after a hard run.
Went forward and settled outside leaders girth without cover, crept closer on bend, there turning but gradually faded, dropped out last 200 M.
Out in line, posted 3 wide without cover in midfield, 4 to 5Ls back working to turn, there to 250 M but dropped out when hard run took toll.
Drifted back, raced 3 wide 8Ls back at rear, set a task to turn, never likely in straight.
Ended up 4 wide behind midfield from outside alley, had cover to bend, niggled turning, no response and beaten a long way.
Took up lead easily, held a 1L advantage throughout, joined on turning, stopped quickly.
