Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Close up, hit the front narrowly inside final 100 M. (Questioned for improved performance.)
Made use of the rails draw to lead briefly, soon taken back to settle in one-back position on rails, shuffled backward turning in, fought on under pressure to just fail to peg back winner.
Began moderately but soon took up running, led the field until headed under pressure close to home.
Soon taken well back to settle on rails after beginning from the widest draw, trailed the field to straight, ran on steadily down inner to be nearest at finish, baulked late.
Began with others, soon settled in midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, kept on steadily under pressure.

Broke well, up with leaders briefly, soon taken back to race wide without cover in forward of midfield, took closer order around the bend to be close up entering straight, unable to sustain effort in the run home.
Midfield throughout, ran home one-paced.
Prominent, hampered rounding home bend, went wide into straight, fought on steadily under pressure without quickening.
Checked after beginning from a poor draw, remained in last few throughout, widest into straight, only ran past well-beaten horses in the run to the line.

Checked and lost ground at start, racing keenly and improving towards midfield when checked again on rails, remained behind midfield to straight, forced to steady approaching home turn, ran home one-paced.
Raced wide in midfield to straight, no response under pressure in the run home.
Always in last few, made no impression in the run home.
Began well then handed up near the 600 M and box seated thereafter. Gradually wore down the leader to snatch victory on the wire.
Pressed forward to eventually cross and lead along the fence near the 600 M. Was nabbed close to home.
Made its run from behind midfield the fence. Closed off well after navigating a course through other runners over about the last 300 M.
Camped 1 out 1 back. Lost a length near the 600 M. Peeled out near the furlong and ran on soundly to hit the frame.
Copped a check at the start settling worse than midfield 1 off with cover. Loomed as a chance at the furlong but peaked on its run well short of the line.
Settled about 3 back the fence. Had every chance, battled away one paced in the final stretch.
Worked forward to cross and sit outside the leader 2 deep. Maintained an even gallop right to the finish.
Was taken back to last position from the outside alley. Peeled out early in the run home and found the line fairly down the outside.

From a wide gate was taken back and at the 1000 M was left racing wide and without cover. Was taken back further to obtain cover near 600 M & raced near the rear of the field. Made good ground in the straight.
Raced keenly in the early and middle stages and after the 600 M, was left racing 3-wide without cover behind the leading division. Offered little in the run home. (See incident report.)
Not the best away, settling with the backmakers 3-wide with cover. Struggled in the final stretch.

Away in line. Taken to sit 2-wide behind leaders first turn. Ended up midfield from back straight. Swung 4-wide and was 4Ls down on straightening. Rallied on to cut down leader and dominated final 50 M.
Began well. Led on fence until the winner stormed home final stages. Held 2nd with comfort.

Severely checked at start. Ridden to reach the back of the field from first turn. Still last and was 7Ls adrift turning in. Covered substantial ground to snatch 3rd at line but the front pair was gone.
Last out. Urged along to tack 2-wide towards rear back straight. Took inside run and was 5Ls off turning into home. Ran on steadily and was narrowly beaten for 3rd.

Pressured early and was 5-wide in leading section first turn. Eventually parked 2-wide behind pace passing the Rock. Attacked the leader rounding home turn but no extra gear final furlong. Held a minor placing until closing stages.
Pushed and raced 3-wide in a forward position first turn. Slotted 2-wide behind the speed from 900 M. Well positioned to strike in the straight but failed to make real impact.

Pressed early in a 4-wide position with leaders. Shuffled to race behind midfield on fence after first turn. Soon found run on rail but remained one-paced. Crowded final 150 M but was of limited significance overall.
Began awkwardly. Ran wide at midfield first turn. Slotted 3-wide towards rear back straight. Came wide home straight and beat tired runners home.
2-wide with leaders early. Took box-seat 900 M out. Found nothing when asked in the straight.
Driven early and caught 6-wide in the leading group first turn. Taken to 3-wide behind midfield back straight. No progress in the straight.
4-wide in a forward spot early. Raced 3-wide without cover ahead of midfield from back straight. Faded final furlong.
Travelled wide and without cover behind leaders to home straight. Beaten well before the post.
Fair break, ridden up quite strongly to take third on rail, hard ridden straight, led 50 M out, kept on well.
Fair break, not rushed, back to fourth last two off, improved wide far side, ran on strongly, just outpaced last 50 M.
Broke well, up to lead wide initially, then crossed, led until collared last 100 M, kept on.
Fair break, settled midfield one off, improved wide, kept on well without being able to challenge.
Broke well, up wide to join leaders, settled second one off, improved wide, kept on one pace.
Taken back from wide draw, settled rear one off, improved wide turn, ran on one pace.
Fair break, settled midfield one off, ridden early straight, kept on, limited progress.
Fair break, back to rear bustled briefly, ridden turn, wide bid under driving, got going very late.
Well away, found rail in fourth, back to midfield rail, wide run straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well, with leaders early, settled fifth one off, ridden early straight, kept on one pace.
Moderate start, third last rail, ridden straight but could never get clear run, kept on.
Fair break, ridden up along rail to midfield, gradually lost ground, ridden for inside bid, beaten only about three lengths in last.
Well away, up on rail to sixth, found gaps inside, strongly ridden to lead last 50 M.
Missed break, lost two lengths, circled field, led 150 M out under strong driving, headed close home.
Ridden from start, up to lead but always three wide, driven straight, kept on well.
Broke well, aimed for lead but caught five wide, second three wide into straight, kept on until no extra close home.
Moderate start, back to third last rail, ran on through gaps late, finished well.
Broke well and ridden up on outside to lead, steadied and headed before turn, ridden straight, kept on one pace.
Moderate start then lacked early speed, mid-rear ridden, kept on but never able to challenge.
Bounced out and joined multiple battle for lead, had to settle for fourth one off, kept on straight but unable to threaten.
Fair break but outpaced early, third last rail, short of room straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, just off lead early, bad check far side, third last into straight, kept on but no progress.
Fair break, midfield two off, wide turn and into straight, kept on but never able to threaten.
Taken back to rear from wide draw, soon unable to go pace and well detached, ridden straight but only able to reduce deficit on second last to four lengths.
Settled in box seat, enjoyed the very slow sectionals, dashed well 300 M to win.
At back as usual, 5-1/2Ls off the leaders 2-wide, harmed by the very slow tempo, demonstrated very strong finishing efforts 200 M and took 2nd.
Bumped start, pushed to obtain a midfield spot, 3-1/2Ls off the leaders 2-wide, dashed strongly 250 M to take 3rd despite not suited by the very slow pace.
Pushed to hold the rail in the lead, clocked very slow sectionals, ran on until 100 M flattened.
Shared lead easily at very slow sectionals in 2-wide, ran on until 100 M flattened.
Eased to rear and took rail, 5-1/2Ls off the leaders, harmed by the very slow pace, checked 250 M, little dash 100 M.
Pushed forward, sat 1-1/2Ls off the very slow tempo, however trapped 3-wide, flattened 200 M.
Eased to rear, 6-1/2Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-wide, dashed well 200 M despite not suited by the very slow pace.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-wide throughout, harmed by the very slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Prominent, 1-1/2Ls off the very slow pace 2-wide, soon weakened 300 M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-wide, harmed by the very slow pace, dashed fairly.
Given a waiting ride and settled three from the rear, responded well when asked at the top of the home straight, kicked strongly, hung in at 200 M, hit front 100 M out, drew clear.
Prominently placed in the box-seat, proved difficult to settle in the early stages, hung in 600 M out, responded well when asked 300 M out, ran on soundly for 2nd.
Taken to the rear from gate 9, niggled along at the home turn and swung widest, ran on strongly down centre of the home straight, got a place in the final stride.
Taken rearward from the widest alley, urged along rounding the home turn, finished off well down the centre of the home straight, just late for a place.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot in midfield, quickened well when asked for effort 300 M out and looked possible to win, bumped at 200 M, turned one-paced, just missed a place.
Settled cozily 3Ls off the pace on rail, crowded at 1600 M, only gave limited response when placed under pressure in the home straight, bumped 50 M out.
Settled in the one-out-one-back-spot, kept on fairly early in the home straight, couldn’t find extra final 150 M, hung in at 50 M.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot just off the speed, crowded at 1600 M, one-paced early in the home straight, bumped at 200 M, no extra.
Widely drawn, easily ran up to lead on rail, headed at the top of the home straight, soon flattened. (Lost right hind plate.)
Urged along early but soon crowded for room near the 1600 M, ended up settling in midfield on rail, outpaced at the top of the home straight, dropped out.
Sprung from gates, led easily, rolled along at good sections to bend, kicked clear and established a good break, ran away to be an easy winner.
Began well, camped on leaders back, had all favours in run, clear turning when leader skipped away, stayed on but couldn't wear down margin.
Out in line, raced midfield, 3Ls or so back, came along inside in straight and closed creditably for placing.
Behind midfield early, 5Ls back, came 3-wide at 600 M, had trail before swinging 4-wide on turn, closed hard down outside, run ended at 100 M.
No early speed, rear trail 5Ls or so away on fence, saved ground on bend, finished off well to be nearest on line.
Drifted back to race in midfield, 3-wide with cover, 4 to 5 Ls back to turn, came wide on bend, made even progress without threatening.
Allowed to slide back from an awkward ally, 5 to 6 Ls back in running line, job to do turning, made some minor progress.
Settled before midfield 4Ls or so away, severely checked at 500 M, shifted back to turn, lost momentum and just held ground in straight.
Came out with them, planted very wide at rear, hung and still 4-wide to turn, tired only bend horses home.
Box seated just behind them, 1 out 1 back thoroughly, caught behind a tired horse turning and lost valuable ground, clear when too late. (See Racing Incidents.)
Pressed on to race outside leader, did share of work with even sections, struggling on turning and faded out in straight.
Began well, went forward but trapped 3-wide without cover, used up throughout, faded final 200 M and bumped when tiring.

Soon amongst leaders, gradually crossed to rails over 1200 M out, steadied pace around the bend, fought on under pressure to prevail narrowly in the messy race.

Began with others, soon taken back to last few from the poor draw, 3-wide towards the rear around the bend, widest runner turning in, made up good ground in straight to just fail to peg back the winner.
Began awkwardly, settled in forward of midfield, moved closer up turning in, quickened under pressure to hold every chance inside final 200 M in the dash home.
Soon taken well back, remained in last few but saved ground on inner entering straight, had troubles in running early in straight, finished off race well in closing stages. (Lame.)
Broke well, soon taken back to travel at the back, badly baulked for run in the straight until 200 M out, ran home well as usual.

In rear early, soon picked up to race in mid-division, inconvenienced by slackened pace when on rails around the bend, snuck up along rails turning in, ran on to hold some chance inside final 200 M only to be swamped close to post.
Well there to straight, looked beaten when hampered and lost position over 200 M out, however, quickly renewed effort under pressure and recovered good late ground closing stages.
Settled mainly one-back in 3rd on heels of leader, angled off rails for a run upon straightening, hampered 250 M out, kept on at the one pace to finish.
Began with others, soon settled very wide in midfield, similar turning in, came under pressure to challenge after straightening but could only keep on at the same pace without quickening.
Settled in midfield, racing keenly when forced to check off heels when pace slackened around the bend, regained to midfield but wide entering straight, ran home one-paced.
Raced in better than midfield position on rails, remained similar turning in, kept on until fading out of contention inside final 200 M.
Behind midfield when hampered and shuffled backward a couple of lengths rounding home bend, towards rear into straight and found nothing under pressure.
Began moderately, driven along out wide far side to soon pick up the fourth spot, badly bumped, unbalanced and lost position on straightening, never recovered.
Failed to muster despite driven along early, remained well back throughout, badly hampered twice early in straight, ignore run. (Blood in trachea.)
Raced midfield, 1 off with cover. Rallied well after being tightened for room at the 500m. Secured clear running after the 300m and ran on strongly.
Raced behind midfield 1 off with cover. Peeled out rounding the home turn and early in the straight, swept to the lead at the furlong but was nailed late.
Settled 3 back the fence. Raced tight rounding the home bend and closed off steadily near the inside after striking some traffic early in the straight.
Camped 1 out 1 back. Hit the front at the 300m, but was overhauled approaching the final furlong, kept on to finish in the frame.
Made its run from back in the field, 2-3 wide with cover. Ran on nicely after being squeezed for room early in the straight.
From a wide alley was taken back to the tail of the field, 3 deep with cover. Was carried 4 wide without cover after the 700m. Rallied widest on the home turn, worked home soundly.
Handed up the lead after the 800m and box seated thereafter. Didn’t find any extra at the business end of the race.
Travelled 3 wide with cover, midfield. Only plodded to the line.
Parked at the rear of the field along the rails. Raced somewhat flat in the final stages.
Raced behind midfield, 3 wide with cover. Failed to make any impression in the straight.
For the majority of the race, traavelled 3 wide without cover behind the speed. Never likely.
Settled in 2nd position outside the eventual leader. Found little when asked for an effort in the final stretch.
Settled worse than midfield along the paint. Struggled in the home straight.
Worked forward from the outside gate to cross and lead along the fence after the 800m. Faded in the run home.
Urged after start. Cut to the fence and led passing 800M. Held a 1L advantage turning in. Always had enough to repel rivals home.
Pressed early to maintain a spot ahead of midfield on fence. Hard ridden and responded well in the straight. Prevailed in a battle for 2nd near the post.
Began well. Elected to sit behind leader on fence passing 800M. Every chance in the straight but couldn't quite catch the winner. Lost 2nd final strides.
Travelled wide and without cover ahead of midfield to home straight. Ran on steadily without threatening the front trio.
Midfield on fence to home straight. One-paced to conclude.
3-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Plugged on until weakened inside 150M (substantial amount of blood in trachea and lame left fore).
Out nicely. Ended up 2-wide at midfield home turn. Switched out into final stretch. Couldn't turn up a notch thereafter.
Good jump. Rolled to sit 2-wide behind leader from 900M. No extra final 300M.
Leaned against the stalls at the start and lost ground. Resumed to 3-wide behind midfield from 900M. Never pick up in the straight.
Taken to rear after start. Caught wide home turn. No impression in the straight.
Behind midfield on fence early. Dropped out gradually from 700M. Beaten well before the post.
Wide at rear early. Attempted to stay in touch with the main bunch home turn but peaked soon after straightening.
3-wide towards rear. Struggled home turn. Never in contention.
Towards rear early. Gave ground rapidly approaching home turn. Detached from 700M. Finished tailed out. (Lame right hind).
Moderate break, not rushed, settled fourth last rail, wide into straight, ridden and finished very strongly to lead 100m out.
Well away, up three wide to fourth, driven early straight, kept on and led 150m out until headed by winner.
Broke well, joined leaders, settled third one off, led early straight until headed by second, kept on.
Broke fast, led early, then back to fifth rail, ridden to challenge one off rail, kept on but unable to match pace of first three.
Broke well, not rushed, midfield one off, mid-track bid, not pace to get involved.
Fair break, lacked early pace, back to third last one off, wide bid, kept on well late.
Fair break, settled midfield rail, out to challenge, kept on under driving but no impression on leaders.
Fair break, sixth one off, mid-track bid, one pace.
Even break, not rushed, back to last, inside bid, kept on.
Slightly slow break, ridden up early but lacked pace, settled sixth rail, ridden early straight, never able to threaten.
Sluggish start, last early, short of room when tried to improve early straight and again checked late, little progress.
Broke well, up wide to share early lead, went on entering turn, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, ridden to lead, headed and sat second, ridden again early straight, weakened.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, ridden entering straight, found nil.
Even break but slight bobble after, fourth last rail, short of room early straight, wove between horses under strong driving, led 50m out.
Fair break, but forced to stay three wide throughout, improved turn, strong driving, led 300m out until headed near line.
Fair break, up three wide to early lead, raced second one off, led narrowly early straight, headed, kept on.
Missed beat start, up to midfield one off, shaken up early straight, kept on very well but not quite able to challenge.
Relaxed start, held up rear one off, improved wide turn, strongly ridden, kept on well.
Broke well, settled third rail, little room early straight, kept on quite well along rail.
Broke well, ridden early to join leading group, fifth three wide, improved turn, third into straight, ridden, weakened late.
Fair break, ridden to settle midfield one off driven straight, kept on without being able to threaten.
Slowly away, rear one off, improved wide turn, ridden but run flattened.
Fair break, midfield rail, ridden early straight, little progress.
Broke well, leading group, settled fourth one off, urged turn, ridden straight, found little.
Fast break, taken back to mid-rear one off, third last into straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well, shared early lead, then went on, headed mid-straight, weakened.
Moderate break, second last and urged, last into straight, ridden, found nil.
Box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off nicely to win.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M for 2nd.
Settled 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Settled in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Bumped start, in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow sectionals, just held ground in final stages.
Behind midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, showed little dash in straight.
Bumped start, eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, raced flat until 150M commenced to dash well to the line.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on well until 200M weakened.
Bumped start, eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader along the rails, harmed by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Checked start, pushed to obtain a midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened 300M.
Restrained in a one-off spot in midfield, swung widest for home, clicked into gear 400 M out, dashed strongly and soon hit the front, drew clear easily.
Prominently placed 2Ls off the speed on rail, quickened when clear 250 M out, finished off well for 2nd.
Urged along early to share the lead on rail, responded well when asked for efforts at the top of the home straight, headed 200 M out, kept on for a place.
Slow to begin, taken towards the rear from gate 11, responded well when asked 400 M out, dashed well down centre of the home straight, too late.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot just behind the speed, kept on fairly under maximum pressure, rather one-paced.
Settled two from the rear on rail, made up gradual ground when clear 300 M out, but lacked a kick to challenge the principals.
Pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, headed in 300 M out, soon flattened.
Slow away, lacked early speed and travelled 6Ls off the pace, only gave limited response when asked 400 M out, on heels at 200 M, one-paced. (Mucus & cut in right hind pastern.)
Settled one-off 5Ls off the speed, only passed a few tired runners in the home straight.
Settled in a one-off spot just off the speed, held up behind a tired runner at the top of the home straight, no progress afterwards.
Settled in midfield on rail, held ground until flattened 300 M out, soon dropped out.
Pushed up to share the lead on 3-deep, travelled keenly with no cover, got tired early in the home straight, finished tailed out.
Never far off the pace, travelled smoothly to straight, into clear 350M and quickly surged to the front with a devastating turn of foot, kept on momentum closing stages despite hanging out.
Held up near the rear 7Ls behind leader, started to pick up once into the straight and closed off willingly final 200M, couldn’t quite get to Lucky Nine but finished nicely clear of the rest.
Slow to begin, soon guided to the fence and travelled in midfield 4Ls off the pace, took time to gather in straight but stayed on well final 200M to claim 3rd. Good effort.
Held up out the back, in last place throughout and looked a bit outpaced approaching home straight, finished strongly when switched to widest of track and just missed out on 3rd.
Held up behind mid-field 5Ls behind leader, switched to outside of track leaving the bend, ran on well early straight but couldn’t maintain that momentum final 100M.
Slightly slow out but soon recovered to race in 6th about 3Ls off the pace, responded well early straight, loomed a threat 250M but effort petered out final 100M,
Settled in mid-division along the 2-path, travelled well to straight but found less than expected when placed under pressure, steadied 150M and never got back into the race.
Placed ahead of midfield but was3-wide without cover after 1200M, moved closer to leaders over the turn, kept on one paced, out of contention 150M.
Forwardly placed just behind leader along the 2-path, didn’t find much when the race got serious inside 400M, weakened gradually 200M out. (Trainer questioned re riding position)
Switched off to a position near the rear and settled 7Ls behind leader along the fence, stayed on under pressure 400M out but unable to quicken.
Began only fairly, driven along to chase leader, kept on at the same pace when placed under pressure nearing the top of straight, weakened final 100M.
Led uncontested at a steady tempo, collared near 250M and could offer little resistance, emptied near 100M.
Prominently placed 2-3Ls off the speed, took the lead easily at the top of the home straight, kept on soundly to score, never challenged.
Out in line, settled 4Ls off the pace in midfield, hung in early, caught 3-wide with no cover, responded well when asked for efforts 400 M out, ran on soundly for 2nd.
Settled cozily in midfield on rail, shifted wide for home, responded satisfactorily when placed under pressure 400 M out, kept on well for a place.
Urged early, caught wide with no cover in midfield, took time to quicken early in the home straight, ran on soundly final 200 M, just late for a place.
Settled 5-6Ls off the speed on rail, improved along the inner of the home straight, responded well when asked 400 M, ran on steadily until the run ended near the 100 M.
Slow away, soon taken to a rearward spot, responded well when asked 400 M out, made up gradual ground, turned one-paced final 50 M.
Settled 7-8Ls off the pace on rail, niggled along halfway, made up gradual ground final 350 M, badly bumped 250 M out, kept on but never really troubled the principals.
Taken to the rear from gate 14, swung widest for home, made up gradual ground down centre of the track, but never threatened the principals.
Urged along early, ended up in a one-off spot in the mid-division, hung in at the top of the home straight, badly bumped 250 M out, failed to make any progress.
Pushed up to hold the one-out-one-back spot, got tired early in the home straight, soon dropped out.
Lacked early speed despite being pushed along, travelled about 7Ls off the speed, niggled along halfway to maintain position, failed to make up any ground.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, niggled along rounding the bend, failed to make up any ground.
Pushed up early to occupy the box-seat, got tired early in the home straight, soon faded.
Pushed up to lead 1L, passed at the top of the home straight, weakened sharply.
Began nicely, ended up first without cover, two wide, travelled well to bend, responded well and took over at 200 M, kept on to score another strong win.
Tardy into stride, raced midfield on the rails, helped by strong tempo, came wide turning and stuck to task well but unable to pair back margin.
Rolled to front, used plenty from outside alley, led clearly and continued to widen margin, kept up strong sections to bend, held break to 200 M when overhauled. (See Racing Incidents.)
Settled 3 wide without cover in midfield, 6Ls back, did share of work with even sections, kept closing gradually to make frame.
End up 3 wide behind midfield, had cover 7Ls back to bend, switched out and closed well to be nearest on line.
Got back as usual, 7-8Ls away 2 wide, saved ground turning, closed well along rails without threatening.
Began well, ideally situated in 1 out 1 back spot, close enough to bend, lacked needed response in straight and faded out.
Showed speed to lead early, took trail on rails soon after, 4ls off runaway leader in mid section, niggled to cart field up turning and looked a brief place chance, didn’t go on late.
Slotted into spot behind midfield, 2 wide 8ls lack, pace to suit, lacked a dash at 400 M and battled in run home.
Out with rest, ended up in midfield, 6-7Ls back in midsection, didn’t find in straight and never threatened.
Pressed forward and took a trail behind first few, 5ls or so back from runaway leader, fair run to turn, lacked usual finishing efforts and steadily faded.
Settled just behind midfield on rails, 7-8Ls back, easy time and aided by speed, made some ground to 300m, didn’t see out extra journey thereafter. (Muco.)
Taken back from a wide alley, 3 wide at rear and didn’t travel well, same margin back to turn, no progress in straight.
No early speed, raced at rear on rails, best part of 9-10Ls back, never a threat.

Began with others from a poor draw, soon restrained to obtain cover behind midfield, commenced move up Rock, made steady headway out wide home bend, hit front 200 M out, fought on well to defy runner-up's late challenge.
Waited with, swung very wide into straight, finished off race well down centre of straight to be nearest at finish.
Always thereabouts, chased leader in 2nd into straight, ran home one-paced.
Began with others, soon taken backward to settle behind midfield on rails, saved ground and snuck up on rails turning for home to be 2Ls back in 3rd upon straightening, failed to quicken to threaten.
Slowly away, soon taken across from a wide gate to race in last few, circled field around home bend, quickened to look place chance over 200 M out but unable to sustain effort closing stages.
Slowly away, settled at the tail-end, went widest into straight, made up good ground past well-beaten runners in the run home down the centre of the track.
Began awkwardly and crowded at start, settled in midfield before losing position at Rock, in last few rounding home bend but saved ground turning in, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Began with others, gradually took up running and crossed for rails holding half a length advantage most of way until overhauled 200 M out.
Began with others, settled just better than midfield on rails, midfield when angled off the fence for a run entering home straight, found nil.
Began fairly, settled in 5th within 3Ls of pace, gradually gave ground from approaching Rock dropping to one of last into straight, no further impression.

Persevered from the widest gate to race prominently travelling very wide stables bend, eventually settled 3-wide without cover in 3rd far side, remained similar home bend, folded up quickly upon straightening.
Chased leader to 400 M, folded up quickly from approaching home straight.
Raced in second position, 1 off. Hit the front near the 200 M and found something extra to draw a margin over the concluding stages.
Travelled 2-wide behind the leaders. Loomed up approaching the 250 M, and maintained a sound gallop all the way to the post.
Speared straight to the front along the paint. Held a narrow advantage for most of the trip but was collard near the 200 M. Gave ground late.
Jumped awkwardly then was crowded shortly after the start parking behind midfield the fence. Closed off well to finish in the frame.
Not the best to begin, settling close to midfield the fence with cover. Kept to the inside in the home straight and worked home steadily without threatening.
Camped behind midfield 2-wide with cover. Battled away over the final furlong.
Ridden along early travelling just ahead of midfield, 1 off with cover. Lost some ground after the 600 M and was one paced in the final stretch.
Raced with the leading trio 3-wide without cover on the turn passing the 600 M. Not likely and gave ground after the 300 M.
Began awkwardly settling behind midfield 3 deep with cover. Came widest over the final stages but only plugged to the line.
Took time to muster speed before spearing forward under hard riding to settle behind the leading division. Caught 3 to 4-wide on the circle without cover. Faded in the run home.
Travelled at the rear some distance off the bulk of the field. Ran out very wide making the turn after the 600 M and was never a factor thereafter. (To trial.)
Was taken back from the outside gate settling well back. Struggled in the home straight. (See racing Incident report.)
Began well. Cut to the fence and led from 1300 M. Held a 1L advantage turning in. Seriously challenged final furlong but battled determinedly to get up on line.
Prominent position to home straight. Loomed as a strong chance final furlong. Just denied at post.
Midfield on fence to home straight. Picked up well when ridden but couldn’t quite catch the front pair.
2-wide at midfield early. Dropped behind midfield approaching the Rock. Took some time to get clear run passing 300 M. Found the line fairly well once clear.
2-wide towards rear. Hard ridden home turn and was 6Ls down leaving the bend. Closed off strongly and was nearest at finish.
Moderate start and was trapped wide. Taken to 3-wide at rear first turn. Some improvement at the Rock and made run wide passing 400 M. Covered decent ground late.
Shaken up early and parked one-off behind leader from 1300 M. Well positioned to strike in the straight but couldn't turn up a notch. Weakened final stages.
Dropped to 2-wide at rear after start. Last into final stretch. Beat tired runners home.
Slow to begin and raced behind midfield on fence. No real progress in the straight.
Away in line. Rolled to 2-wide ahead of midfield from first turn. Found nothing when asked in the straight. Faded final stages.
Travelled wide and without cover at midfield until middle stages. Very little impression thereafter.

Began awkwardly. Niggled along but couldn't cross. Trapped wide and without cover towards rear first turn. Improved wide to race ahead of midfield approaching home turn. Beaten soon after straightening.
Missed break, lost two lengths, restrained sharing last one off, improved turn, wide bid, ran on very well under strong driving.
Broke well, aimed for lead but settled for second one off, long battle with third, just getting the better of it when winner arrived down outside.
Well away, ridden up wide to lead and cross, strongly challenged and headed 100 M out, weakened slightly.
Well away, involved in five way battle for lead early, then back to fifth one off, ridden early straight, kept on, not pace to challenge.
Fair break, not rushed early, settled rear on rail, sought inside run in straight, short of racing room, kept on but not able to challenge.
Broke well, led early, headed out wide, reined back to midfield rail, ridden straight, kept on along rail but no real kick.
Broke well, mid-rear two off, wide bid, ridden, no kick.
Broke well, caught wide after slight early check, third into straight three wide, ridden, weakened.
Broke well, aimed for early lead but outpaced, back to fifth last rail, inside bid, kept on but not able to challenge.
Broke well, one of five involved in battle for lead, joint third on rail into straight, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, not rushed early, rear two off, wide bid, no progress.
Involved in five way battle for lead, outpaced and back to fifth last one off, shaken up early straight, found nil.
Taken back from wide draw to third last rail, improved turn, found gaps, finished strongly.
Fair break, ridden for early lead but not pace to reach it, second one off hard ridden straight, led briefly 150 M out until headed by winner.
Fair break, not pace to lead, slight check after 200 M, sixth one off, wide bid, driven, always just held.
Fair break, plenty of early pace, led overracing slightly after 250 M, led into straight, kept on rail, weakened late.
Missed break, back to last, wide bid straight, ran on quite well but never able to threaten.
Fair break, fourth on rail, back to midfield, ridden early straight, run flattened out late.
Broke fast, led, headed, settled second rail, third into straight, ridden, kept on one pace.
Fair break, ridden early but outpaced, last one off, switched inside and ran out of racing room, kept on.
Broke well but not pace to go with leaders, fourth last three wide, wide bid straight, kept on but little progress.
Fair break, ridden, not pace of leaders, three wide into sixth, ridden early straight, no progress.
Fair break, ridden out of inside gate but outpaced, third last on rail, ridden into straight for rail bid, no progress.
Well away but caught wide, up to third two off, ridden, found nil.
Pushed to sit in advance of midfield 2-wide, pressed forward 900 M and sat just off the leaders, not suited by the fast tempo, closed off strongly to win.
Pushed to take the rail and shared the lead easily, pressured from 900 M and clocked fast sectionals, hung on strongly until 50 M, just beaten in 2nd.
Eased back, 7-1/2Ls off the leaders along the fence, benefited by the fast pace, made ground steadily 250 M and grabbed 3rd.
Eased to rear, 7-1/2Ls off the leaders 2 to 3-wide, favoured by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300 M.
Box seat, not suited by the fast early sectionals, still held ground in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4-1/2Ls off the leaders 2-wide, benefited by the fast pace, made steady ground 200 M.
Shared lead easily in 2-wide until 900 M, being pressured to clocked fast sectionals, ran on well until 150 M weakened.
At back, 6Ls off the leaders 2 to 3-wide, benefited by the fast tempo, made some ground 200 M.
Pushed forward, 2-wide behind leaders early, raced keenly, challenged the lead 3-wide without cover from 900 M, used up all fuel during fast sections, emptied in straight.
Awkward away, took rail at rear, 9Ls off the leaders, helped by the fast pace, raced flat until 150 M, made good ground late.
Very slow away, midfield on the fence, 4-1/2Ls off the leaders, suited by the fast tempo, however no progress.
Pushed to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2-wide, favoured by the fast pace, flattened 300 M.
Settled one-off in midfield, niggled along at home turn, dashed well when clear 200 M out, led 50 M out, kept on soundly to score.
Widely drawn, ran up quickly to get across in front and found the fence near the 1400 M, ran on to contest the lead 400 M out, kept battling on bravely, just caught by the winner.
Prominently placed in the box-seat, responded well when asked for efforts 300 M out, kept on soundly for 3rd.
Taken back from gate 11 and travelled 8Ls off the pace at the rear, checked 1200 M out, swung widest for home, kicked strongly final 250 M, too late.
Settled cozily in midfield on rail, niggled along at home turn, ran on well when clear final 250 M, just late for a place.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot just off the speed, ran up to contest the lead 500 M out, kept on satisfactorily in the home straight, but lacked a decisive kick to challenge the principals.
Slow away, settled 7Ls off the pace, on heels 1200 M, tried to improve along the inner part of the home straight, ran on steadily, blocked final 200 M, not fully tested.
Travelled 3-deep in midfield, gave limited response when asked 350 M out, hung in the home straight, on heels 100 M out, not fully tested.
Started awkwardly, settled three from the rear on rail, crowded 250 M out, made up some late ground when clear final 150 M.
Pushed up to share the lead, headed near the 350 M, bumped 200 M out, soon flattened.
Pushed up to hold a 3-wide spot in midfield, no cover, struggled at the home turn, flattened near the 200 M pole, soon dropped out.
Lacked early speed despite being urged along and travelled two from the rear, proved difficult to settle early, on heels 1200 M out, failed to make up any ground.
Dropped back and confidently ridden in the rear, swung 3-wide into stretch, showed a devastating turn of foot and came from last to hit the front inside 100 M, drew away.

Broke well, close up with leaders early then restrained to a 3-wide position behind midfield, responded well to urging inside 400 M, had no chance with the winner but stayed on best of the best to go 2nd near the line.
Slow to begin, soon guided to the rail and improved to a midfield position, travelled strongly to home straight, ran on well and loomed 200 M but outpaced by first 2 over the final stages.
Towards the rear along the inside, raced a shade keen, checked 1000 M and lost ground, didn't have the clearest of runs inside 350 M and had to weave his way forward, stayed on.
Not hurried after the jump, dropped back to last but only 4-5Ls off the pace, had to shift to outside of track for clear running, stayed on.
Close up behind leaders, loomed a threat mid-straight but couldn't sustain effort inside 100 M.
Saved ground on the inside tracking leaders, had his chance in straight but could keep on at the same pace only.
Chased 6-deep on the first turn early then dropped back to race 3-wide in the 2nd flight, stayed on only fairly final 300 M and never looked like getting to leaders.
Went forward and pressed leader 2-wide, took over 1000 M-750 M then held back, had the lead again near 400 M, hung on to 200 M then gradually weakened.
Settled in mid-division along the 2-path, about 3Ls off the pace inside 400 M but had little to offer when asked, weakened 200 M.
Set the pace inside but pressed by rivals from 1200 M, outpaced when the pace got serious nearing the home straight, no extra inside 200 M.
Battled for the lead but was caught 3-wide for most of the trip, under pressure passing 500 M and had little left turning in, eased 150 M out.

Slightly slow out, quickly recovered to take up running holding less than a length’s advantage, flanked by eventual runner-ups closing stages but fought on well to defy their late challenges.
Began fairly, gradually settled in last few, commenced move from halfway out picking up nicely to just fail to get up on line.
Broke well, settled just off the speed in 3rd or 4th, came to challenge inside final 300 M, unable to draw level throughout closing stages.
Began moderately, not too far off about 2Ls off the lead, badly jostled and lost position about 600 M out, soon recovered but wasn’t good enough to be threatening.
Began fairly, settled in rear, hampered over 600 M out, similar onto course proper when shifting in for a clear run, fought on steadily but without threatening the leading trio.
Settled in midfield travelling down the centre of the track without cover, ran home steadily under pressure without quickening.
Slightly slow out, settled in last few, picked up steadily along grandstand rails to reach midfield approaching course proper, kept on steadily without quickening.
Travelled well within 2Ls of pace, came under pressure to hold position passing the 300 M mark, faded gradually.
Began with others, settled in better than midfield within 3Ls of pace, faded under pressure inside final 300 M.
Travelled just worse than midfield, jostled and lost ground about 600 M out, shifted in towards the centre of the track for a clear run coming onto course proper, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Began awkwardly, travelled mainly in rear of midfield in the middle of the track before dropping to last few onto course proper, no further impression.
Led early, travelled just outside leader before yielding ground rapidly inside final 300 M.
Soon struggling.
Broke well the low draw, soon taken back to race in midfield down the centre of the track, raced awkwardly and dropped to tail-end halfway out, never recovered.
Made its run from well back in the event, 3 wide with cover. Darted through a split near the 100m after being held up, hit the line strongly.
Parked 1 out 1 back. Wobbled out on the home turn but rebalanced nicely and was only headed close to the wire.
Raced close to midfield along the fence. eased out early in the final stretch, ranged up and stayed on well.
Camped behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Rallied five deep on the home turn. Finished in the frame despite racing tight over the final stages and not being able to be fully tested.
Raced worse than midfield posted 3 wide without cover on the circle. Never likely.
Raced with the tailenders 2 wide with cover. Closed off soundly.

Enjoyed a nice run in the race 1 off with cover, around midfield. Tried to take advantage of an inside gap turning for home but was checked when disappointed for running near the 300m. Failed to lengthen thereafter.
Raced in last position 3 wide with cover. Came widest in the straight and worked home well.
Travelled with the backmakers 3 deep with cover. Peeled out wide early in the straight and only whacked away down the running. Attempted to savage another runner near the 100m. (To Trial.)
Slow to begin settling behind midfield on the rails. Only plodded to the line. (Blood in the trachea post race vet report.)
Settled back in the field along the paint. Struggled in the home straight.
Settled in second position off a quick tempo. Didn’t find any extra over the final 300m.
Tracked the leader along the paint. Faded in the run to the line.
Worked forward a set a solid clip in the lead along the rail. Compounded in the home stretch. (To Trial.)
Urged early and raced ahead of midfield near the fence from 1200M. Made run 3-wide passing 500M and was 1L down turning in. Kept on strongly in the straight and was never seriously challenged.
Pressed to maintain 2-wide at midfield to home straight. 2Ls away passing 400M. Responded well under pressure but no answer to winner’s kick. Hung on for 2nd narrowly.
Ridden early to take a midfield spot. Left 3-wide and without cover from 900M. 2Ls back passing 400M. Kept giving but no hope with the winner. Fought on for 2nd and was just denied at post.
Away in line. Gradually dropped 2-wide towards rear. Switched 4-wide and was 3Ls off passing 400M. Closed off fairly well to make frame.
Slow to begin and sat at rear on fence. Came widest and was 5Ls adrift turning into home. Finished off satisfactorily but no extra gear to threaten the principals close home.
At rear to home straight. Covered good ground wide home.
At midfield on fence early and middle stages. Held up home straight until 200M. Ran on steadily once clear.
Moderate start. Taken to race 2-wide towards rear from 1200M. One-paced to conclude.
Travelled wide behind midfield to home straight. Beat tired runners home.
Behind midfield on fence to home straight. Picked up briefly early home straight until got traffic approaching 200M. Failed to resume when afforded clear run thereafter.
Ridden early from high draw and settled on fence behind leaders from 1100M. Still in front until no extra passing 200M. Swamped closing stages.
Began well. One-out-one-back from 1000M. Challenged the lead 3-wide approaching home straight. Plugged on until weakened 200M.
Driven forward from widest draw. Parked on fence and shared lead at 1000M. Trapped 2-wide and was steadied rounding home turn. Crowded early home straight. Ran on fairly thereafter.
Shaken up early and shared lead one-off from 1000M. Couldn’t turn up a notch after straightening. Faded final 300M.
Fair break, not rushed, eased to rail mid-rear, improved one off turn, wide into straight, ran on under strong driving, led last few strides.
Moderate break, caught wide early, settled mid-rear one off, improved three wide turn, wide bid, led 250m out, driven, caught near line.
Steadied start, settled second last one off, improved wide turn, wide bid, ran on well.
Fair break, found rail and settled midfield, inside bid straight, challenged between runners, ran on but not quite pace of wide challengers.
Sluggish start, third last early three wide, bustled up wide to improve turn, strongly ridden throughout straight, picked up and ran on late.
Fair break, caught four wide first turn, settled three wide but no cover far side, up to fourth two off into straight, kept on when gaps came.
Fair break, ridden early to take third on rail, short of room early straight, squeezed through 300m out, ridden but run flattened last 100m.
Broke well, not rushed, settled rear rail, wide bid straight, made up ground but unable to threaten.
Broke well, caught three wide, settled fourth one off, ridden entering straight, up to narrow third before run flattened.
Broke well, led first turn and until early straight, ridden, headed, weakened.
Moderate break, caught nine wide first turn, wide throughout, ridden, weakened.
Broke well, caught very wide first turn, back to third last one off, ridden straight, found little.
Fair break, three wide first turn, settled midfield one off, improved wide entering straight, ridden but no extra, weakened quickly.
Broke well, raced second one off, shaken up early straight but immediately weakened.
Fair break, midfield one off, wide bid, ran on strongly to lead 200m out and draw clear.
Broke well, settled fifth one off, short of room mid-straight, found gap, ran on well.
Well away, caught wide, took time to settle, fifth last one off, improved turn, ran on strongly late.
Broke smartly, settled second one off, narrow leader early straight, kept on gamely, not pace to challenge.
Well away, midfield three wide, powerfully driven straight, kept on gamely, not pace to challenge.
Not rushed early, settled last one off, last into straight, wide bid, ran on well late.
Slow start, rear early, up on rail to fourth last, inside bid, short of room and switched, ran on quite well late.
Missed beat start, up fast to lead three wide, crossed, led into straight, ridden, weakened last 200m.
Taken back from wide gate, last far side, swung wide turn, run flattened late.
Fair break, led early, headed and settled third rail, shaken up entering straight, short of room, ridden, minor progress late.
Broke well, front rank on rail then settled midfield rail, difficulty finding racing room when pulled out straight, run flattened late.
Sluggish start, fourth last one off, kept on under riding, weakened late.
Sluggish start, up on rail to midfield, inside bid, firmly ridden, no progress.
Slightly missed break, fifth two off, third into straight, ridden, weakened.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the good pace 3 wide, closed off steadily 400M, drifted away 200M to win in style.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace on the rails, made good ground 300M for 2nd.
Midfield along the rails, 6.5Ls off the good pace, progressed steadily in straight for 3rd.
Eased back, 7.5Ls behind the good pace 2 wide, blocked 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, under pressure majority of race, flattened 250M.
Took rail easily and led by 1.5Ls at good pace, hung on until 200M weakened.
Midfield, 6.5Ls off the good pace 3 wide, lack turn of foot in straight.
At rear, more than 10Ls off the good pace 3 wide, just ran on ok.
Pushed forward, 3Ls off the good pace on the fence, weakened 350M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 6Ls behind the good pace 2 wide, held up 400M, no progress when clear.
Slow away, hard ridden forward, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, soon emptied 400M.
Eased at start, more than 10Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no progress.
Never competitive, tailed out.
Jumped fastest, pushed up to hold a one-off spot in midfield, on heels 300 M out, soon recovered and dashed 200 M out, hit the front in the last few strides.
Settled 3-wide in midfield, lost cover 800 M out, quickened well at the top of the home straight and hit the front 250 M out, no extra final 100 M, caught in the last few strides.
Niggled along to take the box-seat, responded well when asked for efforts 400 M out, finished off soundly for 3rd.
Urged along to lead 1L on rail, quickened well when asked 400 M out, unbalanced in action 300 M out, soon caught, but still kept on, just missed a place.
Jumped only fairly, soon taken towards the rear, shifted widest for home, quickened well when clear 350 M out, ran on steadily, turned one-paced final 50 M.
Broke well, pushed up to hold a fence position in midfield, held up early in the home straight, finished off well when clear 200 M out.
Lacked early speed as usual, sat in a rearward spot 6Ls off the pace, moved closer rounding the home turn, made up gradual ground final 350 M, rather one-paced.
Out in line, settled one-off 6Ls behind the pace, quickened 300 M out, made up gradual ground, turned one-paced final 50 M.
Out in line, prominently placed 2-3Ls off the speed, only gave limited response when asked for efforts 400 M out, held ground until got tired 150 M out.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot in midfield, bumped 800 M out, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Slow away, restrained 5Ls off the pace on rail, on heels 800 M out, covered little ground early in the home straight, couldn’t find extra final 100 M.
Pushed up to occupy the one-out-one-back spot, held ground until flattened 250 M out, soon weakened.
Failed to muster early speed despite being pushed along, caught wide with no cover, hung out 700 M out, lost touch at the top of the home straight, dropped out. (Mucus.)
Slow away, urged along to hold a fence position 4Ls off the pace, bumped 800 M out, proved difficult to settle halfway, got tired early in the home straight, tailed out.
Positioned one out one back, took over 250M, was strongly challenged final 150M but found the necessary to hold on.
Held up near the rear 6Ls off the steady pace, had plenty to do turning in, ran on strongly towards the finish, just failed.
Held up in midfield, 3-wide turning for home, ran on well and chased leader from 300M, one paced final stages and lost 2nd close home.
Positioned 2-wide behind mid-division, raced tight and crowded for room between 1200-1000M, into clear 400M and closed off the race well.
Dropped back to last about 7Ls off the steady pace, stayed on encouragingly final 200M, nearest finish.
Forwardly placed behind leadng pair, loomed a threat mid-straight but couldn't sustain momentum over final 100M.
Soon driven to the lead after an ordinary start, led steadily, under pressure 500M out and hung on to the lead until 250M, weakened steadily final stages.
Crossed to race in the 2-path 3Ls behind leaders, remained one pace in straight and never threatened.
In mid pack along the fence, ran on only one paced, never likely.
Guided to the fence and patiently held up near the rear, made good headway to 200M but then held up and not properly tested for the remainder of the race.
Held up 3-wide towards the rear, pushed along inside 500M, hung away from other runners in straight, didn't respond. (Jockey dropped whip 250M.)
In midfield early, caught wide then strode forward to track leaders, no cover throughout, weakened nearing 200M, dropped away. (Bled 3rd time / compulsory retirement.)
Prominently placed in the box-seat, kicked when clear 300 M out, finished off strongly, just in time.
Pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, quickened well when asked for efforts 350 M out, kept on soundly, just caught on line.
Restrained in a one-off spot in midfield, travelled keenly halfway, on heels 1100 M out, kicked 350 M out, ran on soundly for 3rd.
Lacked early speed as usual and settled 7Ls off the pace, held up early in the home straight, quickened well when clear 250 M out, ran on soundly, too late.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot just behind the pace, responded well when asked 400 M out, made up gradual ground, turned one-paced 100 M out.
Taken back from gate 13 and travelled 5Ls off the pace, proved difficult to settle halfway, swung widest for home, made up gradual ground final 300 M.
Widely drawn, pushed hard to get across in front and share the lead, headed 250 M out, soon flattened.
Slow away, urged along to hold a fence position in midfield, on heels 300 M out, only one-paced when clear.
Taken back from gate 11 and travelled 5Ls off the pace, on heels 1100 M out, quickened well 350 M out, ran on steadily, couldn’t find extra 100 M out.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, travelled keenly halfway, checked 1100 M out, only made limited progress final 250 M.
Blundered badly at start, travelled keenly when caught wide with no cover in the middle stages, moved closer round the home turn, got tired 300 M out, soon faded.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot just behind the speed, travelled keenly in the middle stages, got tired 300 M out, soon dropped out.
Lacked early speed despite being urged along, travelled one from the rear on rail, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Pushed up early, handy but caught 3-wide with no cover, weakened at the top of the home straight, dropped out. (Heart irregularity.)
Faded back from an outside alley, raced 3 wide behind midfield 5 to 6Ls back, suited by tempo, made run at 350m and closed strongly to eventually prevail in a tight finish.
Restrained from outside alley, difficult to settle racing in rear division 7Ls back, in traffic from turning to 250m, made a strong bid when clear but lost out in narrow finish.
Drifted back from a wide alley, raced 3 wide with cover at rear. 7Ls down and helped by tempo, came widest turning and produced big close but just couldn’t get to first two.
Out in line, positioned in behind pace 3Ls back on rails, came 2 wide on circle, launched a challenge inside 300m, couldn’t match finish of place getters but stayed on to make frame.
Began ok, midfield 4Ls back on settling, a bit ungenerous early, same margin down to bend, didn’t have a clear run to 200m, finished nicely when clear.
Jumped well, 2-3Ls back on fence, tracked a fast pace throughout, came 2 wide leaving bend, loomed and led briefly at 250m, no extra when challenged and run ended soon after.
Taken back from an awkward draw, 6-7Ls back on fence, aided by fast pace, held up to 200, closed evenly when clear.
Began fairly, raced 4-5Ls back 3 wide in midfield, had cover 3Ls back on turn, swung wider straightening, just whacked away.
Displayed usual speed, posted 3 wide without cover 2Ls back, worked too hard with decent speed on, faded out last 300m.
First to break, led at strong pace, handed up front on circle, did share on work on pace, no extra in straight.
Tardy in to stride, ended up 5Ls back on rails, fair trip with pace to suit, never a threat in straight.
Showed good early speed to work forward and challenge for lead, took over on circle keeping pace strong, there until inside 300m but workload took toll and condition gave out soon after.
Out nicely, 1-2Ls back 2 wide but left without cover on circle, did share of work with decent speed on, struggling soon after turning and dropped out.

Placing: PU
Comment: No early speed, Behind midfield 6ls back, pulled up at 250m. (Bled.)

Began fairly from the widest barrier, raced wide and with cover at times in a prominent position, remained wide into straight, soon came to challenge upon straightening and hit front 300 M out, hung on well.
Soon taken back to travel in midfield, shifted out for a clear run 300 M out, ran on under pressure but not able to peg back winner throughout closing stages.
Slow out, soon picked up to join rear of field, saved ground turning in but did not find much room early in straight, obtained run over 300 M out and quickened well, ran on under pressure.
Prominent far side, lost position coming out of back straight, wide turning for home, kept on steadily without quickening.
Settled on rails in forward of midfield, saved ground turning for home, kept on in straight before coming one-paced inside final 200 M.
Niggled along in midfield early, gradually shuffled back to worse than midfield around the bend, ran home one-paced.
Always in last few, met minor interferences upon straightening but not much damage, ran home steadily past well-beaten horses.
Always there or thereabouts until finding no extra inside final 300 M.
Travelled behind midfield, saved ground on rails turning in, baulked for a run upon straightening, ran home one-paced.
Raced wide with leaders far side, gained slender advantage rounding home bend, held lead until headed over 300 M out, weakened.
Always struggling in last few.
Began moderately, soon ridden along rails to take up running, ceded lead to settle inside leader rounding home bend, in similar position in 3rd turning for home, soon folded up quickly.
Broke well to travel in first few, disputed lead turning for straight, folded up quickly after straightening. (Jockey reported bit twisted and horse difficult to settle.)

Placing: PU
Comment: Well back, very wide into straight, soon race awkwardly after straightening, pulled up. (Lame.)
Not the best to begin but worked forward to lead along the fence. kicked clear after the 300m and was never headed for a game win.
Made its run from 3 deep with cover, midfield. Closed off soundly.
Settled in 5th position, 1 out 1 back. Battled away to hold onto third spot.
Settled in last position 3-4 wide with cover. Came widest in the home straight and closed off soundly.
Raced outside the leader in 2nd position. Had no excuses, giving ground over about the final 50m.
Went back from the outside gate to settle at the rear, 3 wide with cover. Made up good ground late after obtaining clear running passing the 300m.
Raced with the backmakers 4 wide with cover. Peeled out early in the straight and finished off one paced.
Camped behind the leader along the fence. Commenced to tire over the final furlong after having every chance.
Travelled in the leading trio 3 wide without cover. Never looked a serious threat after covering extra ground.
Raced 4 wide without cover close to midfield. Maintained racing wide on the circle and was never a factor.
Travelled midfield 2 wide with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Posted 5 wide without cover behind midfield. Never likely.
Sluggish to break settling about midfield along the paint. Made no impression in the home straight.
Began well. Slotted 2-wide ahead of midfield from 1000M. Took some time to find daylight in the straight and dashed strongly when clear inside 250M. Asserted authority final stages.
Out nicely and settled one-off behind leader. Battled determinedly with the 3rd and 4th in the straight and prevailed but was wiped out by the winner near finish.
Prominent start. Ridden to establish lead and got the fence from 1000M. Levelled turning in. Kept giving in the straight when challenged and found the line well. Just missed 2nd narrowly.
Urged early to take box-seat. Ideal position to strike on fence in the straight. Rallied on with the 2nd and 3rd and looked a good chance inside 200M. Just failed to sustain effort near the post.
Taken to 2-wide at rear after start. Took inside run and was 6Ls adrift turning into home. Covered good ground in the straight for a non-threatening 5th.
Caught wide and without cover ahead of midfield to home straight. Ran on with the principals thereafter until no extra gear final furlong.
2-wide at midfield to home straight. One-paced to conclude.
Trapped wide early and was eased to 4-wide towards rear home turn for cover. Came widest into final stretch. Made up minor ground thereafter.
3-wide at midfield to home straight. Limited response when asked top of home straight. Peaked inside final 200M.
Taken to rear on fence after start. Gradually left the fence at bend. Briefly held up top of home straight but failed to make real progress when clear.
3-wide behind midfield to home straight. Found nothing when asked.
2 to 3-wide behind midfield early. Struggled home turn. No impression in the straight.
Travelled wide and without cover behind midfield. Beaten soon after straightening.
Towards rear on fence to home straight. Never picked up and faded final furlong. (mucopus).
Broke well, took them along at a good clip, kept on well final 300M under top weight and comfortably held off the persistent runner-up.
Chased leader in 2nd, began his challenge nearing 400M, had every chance but was always held by the winner.
Held up in mid-division and travelled well into straight, shifted to clear nearing 300M, finished off willingly.
Had inside run throughout and never far off the pace, had no clear run early straight, shifted out to clear 300M, stayed on without threatening.
Slow to begin and slightly outpaced early, well behind leader halfway, moved closer approaching 400M and stayed on towards the line. Encouraging run.
Taken across behind runners and patiently ridden near the rear, ran on well from off the pace despite being hampered near 300M. (Trainer questioned re riding instructions.)
Towards the rear, 11th before straight, taken widest to challenge but kept on same pace only.
Began awkwardly but soon recovered to race prominently just behind leader, outpaced passing 400M, weakened rapidly final 150M.
Didn't muster and under pressure to hold his position, at the rear of midfield the whole way, no impression on straightening.
Switched off to last on jumping from a wide barrier, over 8Ls off the pace in early and middle stages, not quickened turning in and was never a factor.
Positioned 2-wide ahead of midfield, travelled well to 500M but found very little when placed under pressure, no extra inside 200m.
Raced in mid-division along the 3-path, outpaced passing 700M and dropped back, weakened leaving the bend and soon out of contention.
Never better than mid-division, didn't respond when placed under pressure inside 400M, dropped out 200M.
Urged along to chase the pace, 3-wide over the turn and was readily left behind when the tempo increased inside 400M, tailed off (Unacceptable Performance.)
Began fairly, raced keenly and eventually pulled himself to 2nd place before the turn, took over inside 400M, soon opened up a decisive advantage and maintained a strong gallop to the line.
Held up behind midfield, caught wide early but managed to tuck in for cover before the turn, no clear run from 400M-300M, ran on well when clear, nearest finish.
Went forward, crossed to the fence 1000M and took cover behind leader, shifted out to challenge 300M out, kept on without taking much ground off the winner.
Slow to begin but soon recovered under positive handling, settled ahead of midfield off the rail, had every chance inside 400M, kept on steadily to the line.
In midfield along the 2-path and well covered, stayed on under pressure final 400M but not reached leaders. (Blood in Trachea.)
Guided to the fence soon after the start and held up patiently towards the rear, finished off the race fairly down the inside.
Switched off after the start, ended up 8Ls back in last making the turn, taken widest in straight and made only limited progress.
In mid-division off the rail, lacked a response when asked, same pace to 100M then weakened.
Driven forward from draw 14 and crossed to the lead before the turn, headed inside 400M, gradually weakened.

Away in good order but was reigned back to a rearward position, lacked room off heels of rival from middle of the turn to early straight, ran on one paced when clear 300M. (Blood in Trachea / Jockey questioned re his riding.)
Positioned 3-wide in midfield, shifted out wider near 800M and left with no cover over the turn, not picked up when the race got serious entering 400M.
Up with early pace then steadied to a 3-wide position in mid-pack, no cover from 900M, under pressure near 500M but lacked a response, eased final 100M.
In touch, settled in 4th place along the 2-path, outpaced nearing 450M, dropped away mid-straight.
Towards the rear, badly outpaced turning into straight and soon left behind.
Settled in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M to win by a neck.
Occupied a prominent, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast pace, closed off strongly, led 250M, hung on until 50M overhauled, just missed by a neck.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader 3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 400M for 3rd.
Hard ridden early to keep up at back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, favroued by the fast pace, blocked 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Midfield along the fence, 5.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast tempo, held up 4-2, made ground when clear.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls at fast sectionals, hung on strongly until 250M flattened.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, made steady ground 300M.
Pushed to cross in front and take box seat, harmed by the fast tempo, flattened 250M.
Eased to rear, 8.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, ran on ok.
Pushed forward, 3.5Ls off the fast pace, trapped 3 wide, flattened 300M.
Slow away, hard ridden to hold the rails, 6Ls off the leader, helped by the fast tempo, no progress.
Hard ridden to sit in front of midfield, 4Ls off the leader 3 wide, suited by the fast pace, however weakened 300M.
Midfield on rails, suited by the fast pace, dropped off 500M.
Prominently placed 3-4Ls off the pace on rail, quickened well when asked 350 M out, hit front 50 M out, kept on soundly to win.
Broke well, settled one-off in the mid-division, responded well when asked for efforts 400 M out and soon took the lead, caught 50 M out, kept on for 2nd.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot in midfield, bumped 1000 M out, ran on soundly when placed under pressure final 300 M, on heels 100 M out, kept on well for 3rd.
Pushed up early, ended up sitting in midfield on rail, over-raced halfway, on heels 1000 M out, check 600&500 M out, made up gradual ground final 300 M, rather one-paced.
Started awkwardly, driven to take a one-off spot just off the speed, ran on to contest the lead at the top of the home straight, headed 300 M out, remained one-paced.
Settled 7Ls off the pace on rail, checked when turning for home, responded fairly when placed under pressure, only made limited progress final 250 M, rather one-paced.
Slow away, pushed up early and travelled 9Ls off the pace, over-raced halfway, on heels 1200 M out, made up gradual ground final 300 M without troubling the principals.
Lacked early speed as usual, travelled one from the rear, only gave limited response when asked for efforts in the home straight, rather one-paced.
Settled one-off just behind the mid-division, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Pushed hard early to find a fence position just behind the leader, held ground until flattened near the 300 M, soon faded.
Urged along early, never better than midfield, made no progress in the home straight.
Slow away, travelled 10Ls off the pace at the rear, only passed a few tired runners in the home straight.
Sat just behind the leader, travelled satisfactorily until got tired at the top of the home straight, gave ground.
Easily ran up to lead, headed at the top of the home straight, soon weakened sharply, finished tailed out.
Vied for early lead, took back a bit into the turn, hit the lead 350M, responded to pressure final 200M and held off a late challenge from Sacred Kingdom.
Dropped back to rear after the start, came three deep into the straight, 4Ls off leader passing 400M, finished off well despite drifting in, flattened final 100M.
Well covered in midfield one off the fence, had every chance final 400M, kept on effort but could not get to the winner.
Towards the rear in a strongly run race, made good headway in straight but checked near 150M and lost position, ran on again in late stages and just missed out on 3rd.
In last place about 6Ls off the pace, came off the rail passing 450M in search of room but eventually shifted back to the inside to improve, ran on well when clear inside 200M.
Positioned 3-wide towards the rear, kept on to the line but was outpaced by the main rivals final 200M.
Rushed along early, sat in 3rd 2-3Ls off the runaway leader, kept on to 200M then gave way.
Slow to begin, guided to the fence and sat behind midfield 5Ls off the pace, kept on one paced, no impression.
Raced in a 3-wide position without cover, not picked up and tired inside 200M.
Chased leader in 2nd, began his challenge nearing 400M, had every chance but was always held by the winner.
Vigorously ridden to find the lead and set a strong pace in the first half, weakened passing 400M, soon headed and dropped out of contention.
Settled one-off in midfield, kicked strongly when clear 250 M out, ran on soundly, hit the front in the final stride.
Pushed up to hold a 3-wide spot in midfield, ran on soundly to contest the lead 350 M out, hit front 150 M out, kept on, just caught on line.
Travelled 3Ls off the speed on 3-deep, lost cover 700 M out, ran on to contest the lead early in the home straight, headed 150 M out, kept on for 3rd. (Lost left hind plate.)
Slow away, urged along to find a 3-wide spot in midfield, responded satisfactorily when asked 400 M out, ran on steadily down the centre of the home straight.
Taken towards the rear from gate 13, swung widest for home, made up gradual ground final 350 M, too late.
Taken back from gate 12 and travelled 6Ls off the speed, swung widest for home, made up some late ground final 300 M.
Lacked early speed despite being urged along, caught 3-wide in the mid-division, rather one-paced in the home straight, passed a few tired runners in the closing stages.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot just behind the pace, on heels 350 M out, gave no response when asked for efforts in the home straight. (Mucus.)
Urged along early and travelled one-off just behind the leaders, got tired early in the home straight, on heels 200 M out, soon dropped out.
Lacked early speed, drifted back gradually in the middle stages, on heels when turning for home, failed to make any progress in the home straight.
Slow away, travelled 4-5Ls off the pace on rail, made no progress.
Pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, headed 300 M out, crowded 200 M out, soon weakened.
Pushed hard forward and shared the lead on rail, passed 500 M out, soon flattened, crowded 200 M out.
Prominently placed just behind the speed, carried backward by a tired runner 200 M out, soon faded.
Positioned behind midfield from an awkward draw, 3 wide with cover, pace to suit to turn, chased hard final 300M and came up with goods close to line.
Taken back from a wide alley, raced 3 wide at rear nearly 10ls off lead, had pace to suit in mid section, came widest and produced a strong close to go down narrowly.
Even jump, settled behind midfield 7-8ls back, fair run with speed to suit, angled out at 400m, made a strong bid but outlasted final 50M. Good effort nonetheless.
Showed usual speed, unable to slot in and caught 3 wide without cover, 3ls or so away, crept closer on circle, challenged strongly at 300M, hard run took toll last 150M.
Prominent was usual, raced first outside leader without cover, did some work with decent speed on, took over passing 400M, in mix to 200M before tiring late.
Showed speed, took and ideal spot behind speed, over-raced in mid section, right there turning and took inside runs in straight, peaked at 200M.
Out in line, wide early before dropping into midfield, 5Ls back to turn, improved at 400M but bumped at 300M, didn’t go on final furlong.
Tardy into stride, settled best part of 10ls back on rails, well back and held up turning, received a bad check at 350M, no real impact when clear thereafter.
Even break, raced 4ls or so back on rails in midfield, easy time throughout, not much room for most of straight and was never really tested.
Faded back from an awkward draw, best part of 10ls away in two wide line, still plenty to do turning, made minimal impression.
Ok to break, nicely positioned 1 out 1 back, had good run to turn, unable to get into clear at 350M and inconvenienced, didn’t offer much from 250m when running presented.
No speed and allowed to settle at rear, raced on rails 12ls back, still well back to turn, made no impact in straight.
Showed customary speed, set a strong tempo 2-3ls clear, led to turn, soon capitulated when found trip too testing.

Placing: UR
Comment: Behind midfield on rails, 6-7ls back to bend, lost run near 300m, severely checked and lost rider.
Settled in last few racing very wide to straight, responded well down centre of straight to hit front inside 200 M, won readily.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, soon ridden to just worse than midfield, held up for a run until passing 300 M, finished off race well but found winner too strong.
Travelled in last few, went wide into straight, unable to obtain a clear run until 200 M, produced good late impression without threatening first two.
Broke well from a wide draw, gradually taken back to travel wide without cover in midfield, loomed up to hold every chance over 200 M out but unable to sustain effort nearing finish.
Settled in midfield to straight, held up for a run until after 300 M, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Well back, one of the widest on straightening, ran on steadily down centre of track without quickening.
Travelled on rails in forward of midfield, badly held up for a run early in straight and checked 200 M out, made no impression closing stages.
Always there and thereabouts to 200 M, didn’t last.
Well back, held up for a run early in straight, kept on same pace in closing stages.
Travelled in forward of midfield, badly crowded early in straight, made no impression inside final 200 M.
Raced prominently and wide without cover, challenged for lead approaching home straight, kept on before fading out of contention inside final 200 M.
Raced prominently on rails, badly held up behind weakening front-runner after straightening, made no impression thereafter.
Not far off until swinging wide for home, weakened badly.
Soon took up running and held slender lead to straight, headed upon straightening, compounded badly inside final 200 M. (Mucus.)
