Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began awkwardly, amongst leaders early, held a neck’s advantage around the bend, held on well under pressure in the run home.
Soon dropped to the rear, saved ground turning in, ran on steadily down inside of straight to be nearest at finish.

Began moderately, towards rear before taking closer order from the Rock, continued to sneak up on rails around the bend gaining 3rd into straight, shifted out for a run turning for home but could only keep on at the same pace.
Driven along for speed early travelling close up in 3rd before shuffled back to midfield home bend, fought on steadily to produce some late impression.
Began fairly, never far off to straight, ran home one-paced.
Broke well, soon taken back towards the rear and checked and lost position approaching home bend, commenced move turning in but did not find much room most of way in straight. (Tactic questioned.)
Began moderately, raced wide in midfield far side, dropped to tail-end around home bend, made up ground past beaten horses in straight.
Slightly slow out, soon recovered along rails to join leaders, close up in 2nd entering straight, kept on until fading under pressure inside final 200 M.
Settled in midfield, shuffled back towards the rear approaching Rock, renewed effort to reach midfield rounding home bend, ran home one-paced.
Ridden from a wide gate to contest lead, remained wide and dropped to midfield coming out of back straight, widest runner turning for home, made no impression in straight.
With leaders to halfway, folded up quickly after straightening.
Soon found himself in last few despite ridden along after jumping out, saved a lot of ground on rails rounding home bend, dropped away quickly from about 2L 5th into straight.
Sent forward to lead along the rails before handing up and box seating near the 600m. fought on well over the final 200m, to claim the prize.
Made its run from back in the field, 3 wide with cover. Closed off strongly.
Did plenty of work to eventually cross to the fence and make the running after the 600m. Skipped clear early in the final stretch but was overhauled over the latter stages.
Posted 3 wide without cover for most of the trip in a midfield position. Managed to finish in the frame despite peaking on its effort 50m out.
Enjoyed a nice run in transit in fifth spot on the paint. Kept on soundly to the finish line.
Raced midfield the fence. Maintained a good gallop right to the wire.
Travelled 2 wide on the speed without cover. Was a beaten horse over the last 100m.
Settled midfield, 1 off with cover. Battled away down the running at the same speed.
Travelled towards the rear, 2 deep with cover. Worked home evenly down the outside.
Settled 1 off with cover behind the speed. Was under pressure turning for home but failed to respond and gave ground in the run to the line.
Began awkwardly, settling with the backmakers along the paint. One paced in the home straight.
Settled at the tail of the field after being crowded at the start. Failed to pass another runner finishing well back.
Settled at rear to home straight. Finished off strongly inside final 300M and snatched victory near the post.
2-wide behind midfield to home turn. Commenced run 4-wide passing 400M. Rallied on and hit front final 50M. Just caught by the winner final strides.
2-wide towards rear to home turn. Swung 5-wide and was 7Ls down turning into home. Covered substantial ground thereafter and was nearest at finish.
Behind midfield on fence to home turn. Shifted 3-wide and was 6Ls off leaving the bend. Kept giving in the straight to make frame.
Towards rear on fence to home turn. Shifted out to make run wide and was 6Ls back rounding home turn. Made up good ground thereafter.
2-wide at rear to home turn. Came widest and was 8Ls adrift into final stretch. Closed off well without troubling the principals.
Slow to begin. Raced 3-wide ahead of midfield first turn. Rolled forward from 800M and sat outside leader 600M. Started run home turn and opened up a 3Ls gap at 350M. Overhauled final 50M.
Urged forward early and sat 2-wide behind leaders from 1200M. Hard ridden in the straight but was one-paced to conclude.
Sat 2-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Well positioned to strike but couldn’t turn up a notch.
Rolled to lead on fence at 1200M. Elected to take box seat from 800M. Failed to improve in the straight. (See racing incidents)
Box-seated early. Dropped to a spot ahead of midfield back straight. Some pick up early home straight but weakened final stages. (Roarer).
4-wide without cover behind leaders first turn. Strode forward from 1200M and eventually led on fence at the Rock. Dropped to 2nd from home turn and never resumed thereafter.
Travelled well in a 2-wide position behind midfield, picked up gradually inside 300M, hit top gear final 100M and got up just in time.
Urged along early to keep touch with leaders, produced with every chance final 350M, kept on momentum right to the finish, caught near line.
Away in good order, tracked leader along the rail, responded well when shifted out to clear 250M, locked in a 3-way battle final 100M and lost out narrowly.
Raced 3Ls back from leader in a position ahead of midfield, had no clear run at any stage in the straight and not able to be tested.
Placed 2-wide towards the rear, driven out passing 400M, finished off the race evenly. (Jockey reported his horse hung in the straight and difficult to ride. / Lame next day.)
Slow to begin, settled towards the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, took time to pick up turning in, stayed on well final 200M.
Guided to a midfield position along the fence, steadied nearing 200M when making his run, took a while to regroup before running on again in late stages.
Shifted out badly on jumping, steadied to a rearward position with cover but continued to lay out throughout the race, finished off the race well but left with too much to do.
Rushed along after a fair break then vied for the lead on the outside, emerged as the leader from 700M, kept on effort in straight, headed near 100M then weakened rapidly.
Quickly into stride, vied for lead 1000M - 700M then sat back in 2nd, lacked a further response turning in, faded inside 200M.
Difficult to settle in early stages, travelled 2-wide in midfield 3-4Ls off the pace, kept on same pace in straight before weakening inside 150M.
Taken back after the start, soon outpaced and detached, driven along back straight, 7Ls down in last place turning in, finished off fairly down the outside without getting past a rival.
Held up behind midfield, raced 3-wide from 900M, came widest over the turn, ran on strongly final 200M, took charge 50M and won going away.
Tracked leader, moved up to challenge nearing 400M, led 200M out, kept on well to the line but no match with winner final 50M.
Raced 2-wide in mid-pack to 1100M, hampered by the slackening mid-race tempo and taken to a 3-wide spot without cover, improved round the outside of field over home turn, stayed on to the line.
Pushed along early to maintain a midfield position along the rail, crept closer to pace rounding the home turn, kept on one paced to the line.
Began awkwardly, held up near the rear, not suited by the slow mid-race tempo and overraced from 1000M, ran on steadily from off the pace inside 300M.
Towards the rear nearly 10Ls off the pace in the first half, turned 3-wide from 900M, made some progress down the outside but not getting to leaders.
Settled in last and well off the pace in the first half, moved closer when the pace slackened from 800M, made limited progress down the outside.
Driven to the lead after a sluggish start, slowed down the pace after 1000M, hung on to lead till 200M, weakened steadily.
Urged along to obtain a forward position just behind leading pair, hampered by the slow pace and became overraced from 600M, checked early straight, finished off only fairly.
Held up in mid-division 2-wide, moved to within 3Ls of leader approaching top of straight but lacked a needed response final 300M, weakened late stages.
Went forward and raced one out one back, hung out over the final turn, weakened 200M and faded out of contention.
Began awkwardly, raced off the fence in a rearward position, moved closer to leaders over the final turn but could only keep on at the same pace. Never threatened. (Very stiff action noted next day)
Hard ridden to share the lead 2 wide, not suited by the fast sectionals, ran on strongly to win by a neck.
Hard ridden to take the rail and shared the lead at fast sectionals, closed the race off strongly for 2nd.
Hard ridden to occupy the box seat, made steady ground 200M for 3rd.
Hard ridden to keep up with the field, 3.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 200M.
Settled near front, 1.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, very one paced and just held ground in straight.
Pushed early to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Eased back, 4Ls off the leaders 3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, ran on ok in last furlong.
Very slow away, pushed to keep up in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, suited by the fast tempo, flattened 200M.
Trapped 6 wide throughout in midfield, ran on ok in final stages despite the significant amount of ground lost on bends.
Eased to sit just behind the leaders, trapped 5 wide throughout, not suited by the fast pace, hung out badly, flattened in straight.
Trapped 5 wide throughout behind the pace group, not suited by the fast tempo, emptied 400M.
Jumped well, prominently placed in the one-out-one-back spot, quickened 250 M out and soon took the lead, kept on soundly to win.
Urged early and ended up settling one-off in midfield, swung widest for home, responded well when asked 300 M out, finished off soundly for 2nd.
Started awkwardly, urged along to hold a fence spot just off the pace, bumped 1300 M out, held up early straight, finished off well when clear 250 M out, ran on for 3rd.
Given a waiting ride, settled two from the rear on rail, improved along the inner of the home straight, finished off well when clear 200 M out, just late for a place.
Restrained in a one-off spot 2-3Ls off the pace, looked possible for a place early in the home straight, only one-paced when asked for efforts.
Taken towards the rear from gate 10, responded satisfactorily when placed under pressure 300 M out, made up gradual ground between horses.
Settled one-off just behind the mid-division, swung widest for home, made up some ground final 250 M without threatening the principals.
Taken back from gate 12 and travelled rearward until the home straight, only made limited progress when clear 250 M out.
Niggled along to lead and found the fence at the first turn, headed 250 M out, soon flattened.
Taken back from gate 11, never better than midfield, flattened 150 M out.
Pushed hard early to hold the box-seat, held up behind the tiring leader at the top of the home straight, failed to quicken when clear 200 M out, soon faded.
Jumped only fairly, driven to take a one-off spot in midfield, on heels 1200 M out, got tired early in the home straight, finished tailed out.
Within striking distance, moved up alongside leader nearing 400M, went head to head with that rival final 300M, gained upper hand nearing 50M and won decisively.
Sped to the front and led at a solid pace under restraint, was taken on passing 400M, dueled with the winner for 300M in straight, flattened nearing 50M while clear of the rest.
Settled in mid-division well covered, finished off well to claim 3rd but posed little threat to first two which drew clear.
Guided to an inside position behind midfield, ran on evenly final 350M without getting to the top two.
Restrained to a 2-wide position behind midfield, difficult to settle down the back straight, taken widest in straight and stayed on. (Jockey and Trainer questioned re riding position.)
Tracked leader, kept on same pace to 100M then weakened.
Broke well from the inside barrier and always in touch, driven inside 350M but not quickened. One paced throughout.
Slow to begin, settled 8Ls back in last in a strongly run race, kept on one paced to the line.
Slow to begin, raced a shade keen towards the rear 7Ls off leader, made little impression in straight and went past beaten horses only.
Not far off in 4th, placed under pressure nearing 400M but didn't respond, faded out of contention approaching 100M.
Raced along the 3-path in midfield, no cover over the home turn, weakened steadily inside 200M.
Taken across after the start, settled in 2nd last 7-8Ls off the strong pace, didn't pick up and hung in badly inside 200M. (Lame next day)

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began with others, soon settled one from last and waited with, saved ground on inside turning for home, quickened well early in straight, sustained effort to just get up on line.
Settled in 3rd and not far off the speed, soon hit front after straightening gaining about 1L break inside 200 M only to be caught final strides.
Began well from the one draw, soon taken back to race in a not far off position, baulked after straightening before switched off rails to challenge, ran on steadily without threatening.
Slightly sluggish at start but soon picked up to rear of field, took closer order along rails approaching home bend, gained closer on rails turning in, ran home one-paced without quickening.
Driven along from a wide gate to join leaders early, settled outside leader far side and still up there into straight, soon weakened.
Soon taken back to the tail-end after beginning from the widest barrier, trailed the field to straight, made good progress past well-beaten runners down centre of the track.
Began fairly, settled just better than midfield in 3L 5th, ran home one-paced from 4-wide into straight.
Slightly slow out, gradually picked up to midfield along rails always niggled along, ran home one-paced.
Travelled wide in forward of midfield, widest runner turning in, kept on under pressure until finding no extra inside final 200 M. (Blood in trachea.)
Lacked early pace despite ridden along, settled in midfield to straight, came under pressure approaching home turn but made no impression in straight.
Raced wide in midfield after beginning from a wide draw, remained similar throughout far side and around the bend, found nothing under pressure in the run home.
Amongst leaders early, gained narrow lead far side, held similar advantage to straight, dropped out quickly.
Never better than midfield, found nothing in straight.
Began from a wide draw, soon dropped to last few while racing wide throughout, never seen with a chance.
Began quickly and led along the grandstand side. Made every post a winner to register a solid win.
Travelled along the outside rail in a midfield position. Closed off soundly.
Settled just off the speed. Maintained the same pace over the final stages.

Slow to begin settling in front of midfield with cover. Was held up at vital stage, ran on nicely after securing clear running passing the furlong. Closed off well and finished towards the grandstand side.
Tracked the leader along the fence. Faded somewhat over the concluding stages.
Checked at the start then ran on out abruptly. Settled some distance off the 2nd last horse. Made up good ground in the run to the wire.
Settled in a handy spot towards the middle of the course. Hung in badly passing the 600m and soon after worked towards the inside running rail. Struggled over the concluding stages. (To trial.)
Jumped well and camped behind the pace. Was asked for an effort after the 400m, but failed to respond and finished well back.
Raced handy position well off the grandstand side. Gave little when placed under pressure at the business end of the race.
Raced worse than midfield towards the middle of the course. Kept on one paced in the run to the finish.
Travelled near the middle of the course midfield. Looked flat over the final furlong.
Raced just behind the speed towards the outside rail. Was struggling after the 400m.
Travelled well during the first half of the race, close to the speed. Was under pressure soon after and faded badly over the latter stages. (To trial.)
Settled at the back of the field along the centre of the course. Was a beaten horse after the 400m.
Away in line but was checked to 2-wide towards rear at 1300M. 4Ls off turning into home. Rallied and hit front 200M. Hung on well to score victory.
2-wide behind pace. Held same spot final stretch until 250M. Finished off strongly when clear but the winner was gone. Snatched second at line.
Settled 3-wide towards rear to home straight. Shifted wider and was 3Ls down passing 400M. Responded well under pressure. Just failed to figure in quinella.
At rear to home straight. Switched widest for clear run and was 5Ls adrift passing 350M. Covered substantial ground and was nearest at finish.
Caught wide and without cover near the speed to home straight. Ran on top of home straight but couldn’t turn up a notch. Held ground final furlong.
Prominent spot early and middle stages. Blocked home straight until 200M. Made some headway when clear but the race was over.
Midfield on fence. Trapped same spot home straight until 250M. Resumed fairly when afforded clear passage.
Slow to begin. Shaken to obtain a spot 2-wide behind midfield from 1200M. Peeled out and was 3Ls down on straightening. Weakened final 250M.
2-wide in a forward spot until faded passing 200M.
Travelled wide and without cover behind midfield to home straight. Found nothing when asked.
Led on fence until swamped final 250M. (Substantial amount of blood in horse’s trachea.)
Fair break, midfield one off, ridden leaving turn, short of room early straight, ran on very strongly once clear.
Broke well, restrained midfield rail in sixth, looking for room early straight, led 200m out, unable to resist winner.
Fair break, urged to fifth one off, ridden to challenge mid straight, kept on until no extra late.
Not rushed early, restrained fifth last rail, ridden early straight for inside run, not pace to trouble leaders.
Fair break, held up third last one off, bid between horses, not pace to challenge.
Well away, settled third rail, ridden early straight, not pace to take gap 300m out, kept on.
Well away, led and crossed, joined far side, went on again, two lengths clear into straight, ridden, weakened.
Up wide to share early lead, pestered leader, second into straight, weakened, blood in trachea, later found to be lame.
Fair break, midfield two off, short of room and awkward mid straight, kept on without being able to challenge.
Fair break but caught wide, up three wide to fourth, driven entering straight, no progress.
Fair break, midfield two off, wide bid, little progress, weakened late.
Taken back from wide draw, rear group two off, taking time to settle, wide into straight, lugged in, straightened, little progress.
Slowly away, ridden early, second last rail, urged far side, tried to improve along rail, found little.
Aken back from wide draw, inside bid, no impression.
Fair break, eased back from wide to midfield rail, found gap mid-straight, finished fast under strong driving.
Broke fast, up along rail to share lead, led turn, kicked clear early straight, kept on, winner too strong.
Fast away, disputed lead then restrained in fourth one off, mid-track bid straight, not pace of first two.
Eased back from wide draw, last one off, improved turn, wide bid, ran on very well late.
Fair break, up wide to share lead, second into straight, kept on until faded late.
Fair break but wide throughout, jostled early straight, kept on well without being able to threaten.
Fair break, back to fourth last one off, wide bid, kept on until weakened late.
Slow start, fourth last rail, urged, mid-track bid, strongly ridden, one pace.
Missed break slightly then slow into stride, urged up to midfield rail, ridden straight, weakened late.
Broke well, settled sixth rail, third into straight, ridden, weakened.
Not fast away, settled second last rail, urged into turn, rail run, no progress.
Fair break, midfield two off, wide bid, flattened out late.
Fair break, midfield one off, mid-track bid, found nil.

Placing: DNF
Comment: Injured early straight, did not finish.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, closed the race off strongly 300M to score.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader along the fence, hampered 700M, suited by the fast pace, made ground steadily 300M for 2nd.
Settled in front, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast sectionals, held ground for 3rd.
Hard ridden to keep up with the field at rear, more than 9Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 250M.
Slow away, at back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, helped by the fast pace, made minor ground in straight.
Hard ridden to keep up with the field at rear, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made steady ground 250M.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 1L at fast early sectionals, hung on strongly until 200M weakened.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, weakened 300M.
Prominent, 2Ls behind the fast pace, trapped 3 wide, emptied 400M.
At back 3 wide, favoured by the fast pace, never a factor.
Pushed to sit hold the rail in midfield, became badly unbalanced 700M and lost significant amount of ground, never competitive.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leader on the fence, suited by the fast tempo, however dropped off 400M.
Out in line, urged along to share the lead on rail, quickened well when asked for efforts at the top of the home straight, kept on soundly, just prevailed.
Urged along to take the one-out-one-back spot, ran on to contest the lead 400 M out, kept battling on under maximum pressure, narrowly beaten by the winner.
Bumped at start, prominently placed in the box-seat, responded well when asked 400 M out and ran on to contest the lead, kept on for 3rd, narrowly beaten by the top two.
Started awkwardly, urged along to hold a fence position in midfield, took bit long to pick up early in the home straight, made up gradual ground final 250 M, just missed a place.
Taken back from gate 11 and travelled 6Ls off the pace, kicked strongly when clear 250 M out, finished off soundly, too late.
Settled one-off 2Ls off the speed, one-paced when placed under maximum pressure in the home straight.
Slow away and crowded at start, restrained in the mid-division, raced keenly in the middle stages, covered some late ground when clear 250 M out, rather one-paced.
Lacked early speed as usual and travelled 6Ls behind the speed, only made limited progress in the home straight.
Taken back from gate 12, swung widest for home, only made limited progress when clear 250 M out.
Pushed up to hold a 3-wide spot 2-3Ls off the speed, urged along in the middle stages, lost cover 1000 M out, held ground until flattened 200 M out.
On-pace but caught wide early, gradually eased towards the rear, travelled without cover, gave no response when asked 400 M out, eased out near the 250 M.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, held ground until flattened 250 M out, checked 150 M out, soon dropped out.
In 4th place never far off the pace, travelled strongly into straight, surged to the lead 250M out and drew away to win by nearly 3Ls. Impressive.

Proved difficult to settle behind leaders, strode forward after 1200M to race outside the lead, quickened well and looked a possible winner 300M out, kept on effort to the finish but no chance with the winner.
Towards the rear 2-wide and raced a shade keen in early stages, switched to outside passing 600M, ran on well to go 3rd close home.
Restrained in midfield, saved ground running along the fence, stayed on over the final 400M but no extra pace to seriously challenge.
Patiently held up, sat in last for first half then advanced 3-wide over the turn, 6th turning in, stayed on in straight without threatening.
Placed in midfield one off the fence, , kept on one paced under a strong drive but never looked like getting to the leaders.
Driven to the lead and took them along at a steady pace, all out from 450M, caught nearing 200M then weakened rapidly.
Behind mid-division along the inside, switched out nearing 400M for a clear path but made limited progress only. No impression.
Held up behind midfield along the 2-path, found disappointingly little when placed under pressure turning in, out of contention 100M. (Jockey unable to offer any explanation.)
Raced outside the lead for 800M then held back to 3rd, couldn’t keep up with the pace inside 400M, weakened steadily.
Near the rear throughout, outpaced from 400M, soon behind.
Slow away, pushed up and soon took the lead on rail, 3Ls clear at the top of the home straight, kept on well, no extra final 50 M, still won.
Widely drawn, pushed hard early to get across in front, tracked the leader, responded well when asked for efforts 350 M out, ran on soundly for 2nd.
Bumped at start, settled 4Ls off the pace on rail, kicked well when clear 300 M out, finished off soundly for 3rd.
Settled one-off 2Ls off the speed, crowded 700 M out, made up gradual ground final 250 M without threatening the top three.
Taken back from gate 9 towards the rear, swung widest for home, made up gradual ground down centre of the home straight final 250 M, rather one-paced.
Niggled along to occupy the box-seat, only one-paced early in the home straight, could not find extra final 100M.
Started awkwardly, pushed up early and travelled 1.5L off the pace on 2-deep, held ground until flattened 100 M out.
Lacked early speed and travelled 5Ls off the speed on rail, made up some late ground final 200 M.
Caught 3-wide in midfield, held ground until got tired 200 M out, on heels 150 M out.
Taken back from gate 11 and travelled 6Ls off the pace, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Broke well, sat in midfield early but drifted back gradually halfway, 7Ls away turning for home, made no progress in the home straight.
Settled in midfield early, on heels 700 M out, outpaced and hung out rounding the home bend, dropped out. (Bled.)
Sprung from gates, crossed comfortably from wide out, set speed to suit in front, kicked clear turning and ran out a convincing winner.
Fractious at start, began evenly, settled 3Ls or so away on rails, unbalanced when galloped on at 700m, took time to make impact from 400M and couldn’t wear down winners margin inside 150M.
Reasonable break, assumed 1 out 1 back role, all chance with steady tempo in mid section, stuck on bravely in stretch but couldn’t catch first two.
Showed some early speed, elected for a trail on leaders back, terms to suit with slow speed, kept on competitively in straight.
No early speed and taken back from a wide alley, raced 3 wide behind midfield, 6-7Ls back throughout, improved at 400m, made some ground but was unsuited by slow tempo.
Began well from wider out, pressed forward and raced outside leader, aided by slow speed, right there turning but lacked extra final 300m.
Even break, trapped 3 wide without cover, 3Ls back to bend, worked too hard in mid section and unable to find final 300m.
Tardy into stride, assumed spot nearer to last, 7 to 8Ls back on rails, had job to do turning, made some minor ground without threatening.
Began with rest, ended up 3 wide in mid section, had cover 4-5ls back, tracked up to turn, condition gave out in straight.
Awkwardly away, angled into midfield spot, difficult to settle in mid section with slow pace on, 4Ls down turning, lacked usual dash and didn’t offer much when race turned into a sprint home.
Moderate beginning, raced in midfield 4-5Ls back on rails, easy time to turn, niggled turning and struggled in straight.
Slow into stride, settled two wide at rear 8Ls or so away, not helped by pace, made limited ground in straight.
No real early pace, settled behind midfield, 6-7Ls back in two wide line, made no real progress despite being steadied at 150m.
Drifted back from a wide gate, 8Ls or so back racing 3 wide at rear, still last turning, no serious impact.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Virtually made all, gradually crossed to take up running holding 1L advantage most of way to finish.
Ridden along early, settled one-back in 2nd on rails, turned home in similar position, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began moderately, improved to midfield on rails before Rock, ran on steadily in straight to do best work late.
Never far off and mainly in 4th on rails, similar upon straightening, one-paced under pressure in the run home.
Began fairly before steadied, settled towards rear to straight, saved ground on inside turning in, kept on well to be nearest at finish.
Began from a wide gate, travelled keenly in midfield, met minor interferences approaching home bend and shortly after straightening, kept on steadily at the same pace to finish.
Always well back to straight, saved ground turning for home, found nothing under pressure.
Ridden along from the 9 gate to join leaders, travelled one-back in 3-wide position to straight, soon faded.
Began well, settled about 2Ls off the pace in 4th or 5th, swung wide into straight, kept on well down centre of track.
Began from a wide gate, gradually obtained cover in midfield down far side, dropped towards rear and shifted widest turning in, made no impression in the run home.
Soon taken back to last few from the widest gate, racing keenly early in far side, no impression in the run home.
Reared at start losing considerable ground, ignore run.
Settled third in the run, 2 wide without cover. Closed off gamely over the final 100m and grabbed the lead close to home.
Worked forward to lead along the fence, setting good fractions in the early stages. Was taken on after the 800m and despite being well clear near the 200m, was nailed close to the post.
Parked midfield, along the rail. Ran on steadily in the home straight.
Settled at the tail of the field 1 off with cover. Made a forward move around runners racing 4 wide after the 700m. Plodded home to finish in the frame.
Had no excuses after enjoying the run of the race behind the leader along the fence. Whacked away in the run to the finish line.
Copped a check early in the race and settled worse than midfield, 2 wide with cover. Worked home fairly without ever threatening.
Camped midfield, 1 off with cover. Kept on one paced in the straight before tiring over the latter stages.
Settled at the rear of the field, 1 off with cover. Sent forward after the 800m and looped the field, positioning outside the leader. Was gassed after the 200m.
Raced at the rear of the field along the paint. Laboured over the final furlong failing to close off.
Raced behind midfield 3 wide with cover. Struggled in the final stretch.
Throughout the race travelled wide and without cover in about a midfield position. Never likely.
Travelled towards the rear of the field along the paint. Tailed out in the run home. (To trial.)
Urged early to hold the fence. Took box-seat from 1200M. Ideal position to strike in the straight and hit front final furlong. Kept on to hold off rivals home.
3-wide behind midfield early. One spot closer back straight. Made run and was 3Ls down 400M. Finished off strongly final furlong but the post came too soon.

Slow to begin. Ridden to occupy the fence towards rear first turn. Improved gradually home turn and was 4Ls back leaving the bend. Progressed before steadied near 250M. Resumed fairly well for 3rd but the front pair had gone.

Knuckled over badly at start. Raced 2-wide towards rear first turn. Shifted 3-wide and moved to a spot behind midfield back straight. Commenced run wide and was 5Ls off at bend. Ran on satisfactorily.
3-wide at rear early. Shifted 2-wide and raced towards rear from 1100M. Took inside run home turn. Swung out and was 6Ls adrift turning into home. Covered decent ground home straight. (Mucopus).
Travelled 3-wide and without cover near the pace to home straight. No extra gear thereafter.
3-wide in the leading section first turn. Parked 2-wide behind leader from 1100M. Challenged the leader rounding home turn but failed to sustain effort after final furlong.
Driven forward after start and took lead on fence from 1200M. Hung on top of home straight. Peaked 250M.
Jumped well. Elected to sit on fence at midfield first turn. Dropped behind midfield home turn. Never recovered in the straight.
3-wide behind midfield early. Slotted 2-wide ahead of midfield 1200M. Pressed home turn but couldn’t pick up. Flattened in the straight.
Always at rear. Never a factor.
Well enough away. Gradually dropped to 2-wide behind midfield back straight. Continued to give ground home turn. Finished tailed out.
Broke fast, led and crossed, then joined on outside, went on again, kicked early straight, always in charge thereafter.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, improved wide turn, wide bid, ran on well.
Fair break, not much early speed, back to third last rail, looking for room early straight, picked up well late.
Air break, short of early speed, fourth last one off, wide bid, ran on well.
Fast away, led briefly then third on rail, pulled out to chase winner, unable to quicken.
Broke well, settled fifth with cover one off, found gap early straight, driven but unable to quicken.
Fair break, not much early speed, midfield rail, inside bid, hard ridden, not quicken.
Missed break slightly, second last early and ridden, quickly up wide to fourth three off, ridden straight, one pace.
Missed break, last early, ridden for rail bid, kept on without being able to threaten.
Fair break, lacked early pace, midfield one off, bid between horses kept on one pace.
Well away, caught four wide, midfield three off, slight bump early straight, ridden, no impression.
Fair break, urged early to third three wide, up to share lead, headed entering turn, ridden, weakened.
Broke well, settled fifth one off, rousted entering straight, wide bid, responded to strong driving to lead 150m out.
Fair break, not much early speed, fourth last rail, improved turn, ran on well between horses, just failed.
Broke well but caught wide, taken back to mid-rear two off, wide bid, ran on very well.
Fair break, up to third one off, switched inside, led narrowly and briefly 300m out, no extra.
Broke well, restrained in second rail, inside run, never quite pace to lead, kept on.
Fair break, taken back from wide draw to second last one off, ridden early straight, kept on without kick to reach leaders.
Missed break, three lengths last early, kept on well under driving to finish just behind leading bunch.
Fair break but caught five wide, up to second three wide, ridden, weakened late.
Broke well, ridden for lead but outpaced, back to midfield one off, improved wide straight, ridden, no extra.
Fast away, led three wide and crossed, headed early straight, weakened.
Fair break but outpaced early, back to midfield rail, ridden early straight, found little.
Moderate break, third last rail, ridden for rail bid, found nil, tailed off.
Pushed to gain a midfield spot, checked early, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, closed the race off strongly 300M to win.
Eased back for cover, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, dashed strongly 250M for 2nd.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-4 wide and lost too much ground, dashed well 300M for 3rd.
Awkward away, at rear, 7.5Ls off the leaders on the rails, swept 3 wide to make move 700M, blocked 4-2, dashed strongly when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 2-3 wide, made early move 600M, ran on well until 100M, run ended.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5Ls off the leaders along the fence, held up 4-2. dashed well when clear.
Slow away, took rail at back, 6Ls off the leaders, blocked 4-2, just ran on when clear.
Pushed forward to hold the rail in front, not suited by the fast early sectionals, flattened 300M.
Hard ridden forward to involve in a pace battle in 2 wide, checked first bend, used up too much fuel in the fast early sections, flattened 250M.
Hard ridden to sit in midfield on the fence, 3.5Ls off the leaders, held up 4-2, no progress.
Pressed forward, trapped 3-4 wide first bend, clocked fast early sectionals to share the lead, dropped off 300M.
Pushed forward to take the rail and shared the lead at fast early sectionals, weakened 300M.
Prominently placed in midfield, quickened well clear 250 M out, hit the front 150 M out, kept on soundly to win.
Settled 7Ls off the pace on rail, kicked when asked 300 M out, finished off soundly along the inner for 2nd.
Caught 3-wide in midfield with no cover, moved closer 700 M out, ran on to contest the lead 300 M out, headed by the winner 150 M out, kept on for 3rd.
Settled one-off 6Ls behind the pace, on heels 600 M out, quickened well when clear 200 M out, just missed a place.
Settled one from the rear on 2-deep, carried wide 600 M out and then improved along the outside, kept on satisfactorily, one-paced final 100 M.
Pushed along to hold a fence position in midfield, took time to quicken when asked 300 M out, made up little ground final 200 M.
Niggled along to get across in front and took the lead 1000 M out, headed and bumped 200 M out, soon faded.
Settled 8Ls off the pace at rear, only passed a few tired runners in the home straight.
Widely drawn, pushed hard forward to get across in front, ended settling in the box-seat, kept on satisfactorily early in the home straight, passed and checked 150 M out, soon faded.
Settled 2-3Ls off the speed on rail, gave no response when asked 300 M out, failed to make up any ground.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot just off the pace, struggled rounding the final bend, weakened at the top of the home straight, soon dropped out.
In midfield about 4Ls behind leaders, came with a well-timed challenge inside 400M, made rapid headway to lead 150M out, kept on well once in front and held off the fast finishing 2nd and 3rd.

Positioned behind midfield about 6Ls off the pace, raced in the 2-path following the eventual winner, didn’t pick up as quickly as the winner but stayed on very strongly towards the line. Good effort.
Behind midfield 6Ls back in first half, moved closer approaching the home turn, responded well inside 300M and finished off the race willingly.
Never far off in 4th, came with a strong challenge inside 300M, kept on effort to the line but was outpaced by the top 3 over the final 100M.
Caught 3-wide no cover making the 1st turn, strode forward after 1200M to join leaders, looked a threat early straight but flattened passing 150M.
Always in touch with leaders but didn’t quicken when urged nearing 300M, weakened final 100M.
Track leader early, took over nearing 1000M, was strongly challenged once into straight, briefly resisted, headed 150M out and weakened away.
Switched off to last 10Ls off the pace, had plenty to do turning in and not in the clear until 300M, made limited progress.
Taken across behind runners, settled near last over 8Ls away, made no headway in straight and hung out under pressure. No impression.
Took up early running, relinquished lead near 1000M and sat back in 3rd, outpaced passing 200M, no extra late stages.
Positioned 2-wide towards the rear, under pressure inside 500M and didn’t respond, left behind 200M out.
Near the rear throughout, didn’t pick up when asked inside 350M, never a factor.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Held up behind midfield, responded well inside final 200 M to claim victory short of post.
Soon taken back to race in rear, waited with, finished off well down centre of the track to just fail to get up on line.
Amongst leaders far side, tracked leader around the bend, fought hard to hit front 50 M out only to be denied final strides.
(K335) Never far off on rails, chased leader into straight, fought on steadily under pressure to be nearest at finish but without threatening.
Always thereabouts, took up running around the bend, held 1L break early in straight, unable to sustain effort and overhauled closing stages.
Well back to straight, did not find much room early on and steadied 200 M out, finished off race well.
Held prominent positions after beginning from a wide draw, within 2Ls of speed in 4th into straight, ran home one-paced.
Began with others, gradually settled in forward of midfield before making home bend, soon came under pressure to challenge after straightening, ran on steadily without threatening.
Midfield throughout, ran home one-paced.
Never better than midfield, did not find much room early in straight, made no impression closing stages.
Raced wide in better than positions, similar turning in, made no impression in straight.
Slowly away, trailed the field to straight, saved ground turning in, ran home one-paced.
Slowly away, gradually improved out wide in back straight to reach midfield, remained wide into straight, no further impression.
Began moderately, persevered out wide down far side to hold prominent positions, similar turning in, soon weakened.
Sent forward and travelled nicely in 5th position 1 off with cover. Swept to the front near the furlong and fought on well to hold the advantage.
Made its run from back in the field along the paint. Closed off well near the inside after obtaining clear running passing the 350m.
Posted 3 wide, midfield with some cover on the circle. Chased gamely down the home straight.
Settled midfield 2 wide with cover. Kept on soundly to make the frame after being checked early in the straight.
Raced behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Came widest on the home turn, whacked away to the finishing line.
Camped worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Only plodded to the wire.
Travelled at the tail of the field. Made some ground on tiring runners down the running.
Travelled midfield along the paint with cover. Maintained an even gallop right to the line towards the inside.
Box seated after the 800m. Had every chance and was a beaten horse turning for home.
Ambled forward to race close to the speed before becoming badly unbalanced at the 800m. Raced wide thereafter and was not ridden along from that point on finishing well back. (See Racing Incident.)
Settled at the rear of the field 2-3 wide with cover. Made no impression in the home straight.
Settled in 3rd position, 2 deep no cover. Struggled in the final stretch.
Worked forward and crossed to the fence and took up leading duties after the 800m. Was gassed passing the 300m.
Got a bump at the start and failed to rally settling behind midfield, 3-4 wide with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Urged early along fence after start. Improved to race behind leaders at 500M. Rallied on in the straight and hit front 150M. Kept on to hold off rivals.
Sat 2-wide behind leaders to home straight. Fought on well but couldn’t catch the winner.
Led on fence to home straight. Hung on until overhauled by the front pair inside 150M. Held 3rd narrowly.
Drawn high and was taken to 2-wide at rear. 5Ls down at the back of main bunch turning in. Blocked top of home straight. Responded well and covered good ground once into clear.
2-wide towards rear early. Took inside run and was 4Ls off turning into home. Progressed steadily between runners and nearly made frame.
Ridden to maintain 2-wide ahead of midfield. Swung 4-wide and was 3Ls back leaving the bend. Ran on steadily without seriously troubling the principals.
2-wide at midfield. Peeled out and was 4Ls away on straightening. Found clear run inside final furlong. Worked home fairly well.
Caught 3-wide in leading section early. Parked outside leader passing 900M. Couldn’t turn up a notch when the race got serious 350M. Bumped close home and was not fully tested.
Travelled 3-wide at midfield early. Checked and became unbalanced at 800M. Came wide and was 5Ls adrift into final stretch. Briefly picked up thereafter but no extra gear final 250M.
Taken to 3-wide towards rear from widest barrier. Stayed widest home turn. Made up minor ground home.
3-wide without cover behind leader. Found nothing when asked early home straight. Beaten 250M.
3-wide behind midfield to home straight. No impression thereafter.
Towards rear always. Never a factor.
Away in line from high draw. Trapped wide and without cover towards rear early. Progressed wide to midfield at bend. Weakened soon after straightening and dropped out rapidly 300M.
Fast away, led and crossed, uncontested lead, kicked clear entering straight, kept on gamely when challenged, just held on.
Good break, not rushed early, settled midfield rail, progress along rail entering straight, out to challenge, ran on well, just held.
Broke well, ridden to early lead, headed and settled third rail, challenged leader mid-straight, not get past.
Fair break, not much early speed, settled third last one off, improved turn, wide bid, ran on well but not quite able to threaten winner.
Broke well, up to third one off, settled fourth, mid-track bid, ran on but unable to challenge.
Fair break, reined back from wide draw, second last one off, wide bid, ran on but not able to trouble leaders.
Fair break but not much early speed, settled third last one off, inside bid, ran on between horses, not pace to challenge.
Fair break, short of early pace, settled sixth one off, urged turn, driven, ran on but unable to threaten.
Broke well, taken back seeking rail, settled mid-rear one off, kept on one pace, never able to threaten.
Fair break, taken back to rail in last, urged entering turn, driven early straight, no real response.
Moderate break, ridden up five wide to second one off, urged turn, ridden, weakened.
Moderate break, lacked early pace, back to mid-rear one off, urged turn, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, mid-rear, lost pitc and last into straight, ridden, no progress.
Moderate break, midfield three wide, ridden early straight, found nil.
Broke well, settled midfield rail, made ground inside from turn, ran on strongly under driving, led near line.
Missed break slightly, not rushed, settled last rail, shaken up turn, wide bid, finished fast, just failed.
Fair break, ridden to lead, two lengths clear entering turn, three clear mid-straight, ridden, caught.
Taken back from wide draw, second last one off, wide bid off turn, ran on well, not quite able to challenge.
Fair break but caught mid-rear four wide, up to sixth last one off, mid-track bid, ran on, not quite pace to challenge.
Fair break, aimed for lead but caught four wide, settled sixth rail, improved to fourth early straight, ridden, no extra.
Fair break, short of early speed, ridden early straight, slow to respond, kept on quite well late.
Fair break, up on rail to fifth, improved turn, third into straight, ridden, one pace.
Broke fast, led but four wide first turn, headed and second one off, tried to challenge leader early straight, ridden, weakened.
Broke well, joined battle for lead, settled for fourth one off, ridden early straight, no progress.
Fair break, lacked early pace, urged far side, settled fifth last rail, ridden entering straight, no impression.
Missed beat start, mid-rear rail, ridden entering straight, found little.
Fair break, not pace to lead, raced midfield one off, ridden into straight, found nil.
Fair break, caught six wide looking for lead first turn, no route to rail, third leaving back, wide into straight, weakened quickly.
Led easily by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, drifted away 200M to score a comfortable victory.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on well to the line to secure 2nd.
Eased back for cover, 4.5Ls off the leader, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace and took 3rd.
Settled just off the leaders, favoured by the slow tempo, ran on well until 100M flattened.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 300M.
Eased to sit behind the leaders, flattened 200M.
Eased back to get closer to the outside fence, 4.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 4-2, little dash when clear.
Settled just off the leader, benefited by the slow sectionals, emptied 250M.
Midfield, not suited by the slow pace, no dash.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow tempo, no progress.
Pushed early to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow pace, no progress.
Bumped start, in front of midfield, soon weakened 300M.
Prominent, suited by the slow tempo, however soon dropped off 300M.
Bumped start, harmed by the slow pace, never competitive.
Prominently placed in the box-seat, quickened when clear 350 M out and soon hit the front, kept on satisfactorily under maximum pressure, just prevailed.
Urged early, caught 3-wide with no cover, crept closer rounding the home bend, ran on to contest the lead 400 M out, kept battling on, narrowly beaten.
Jumped fastest, niggled along to share the lead on rail, responded well when asked for efforts 350 M out, headed 200 M out, kept on for a place.
Crowded at start, settled in a one-off spot near the rear, bumped 800 M out, finished off well when clear 200 M out, just late for a place.
Started awkwardly, settled 5Ls off the pace on rail, hung out at the first turn, improved along the inner of the home straight, finished off well final 300 M.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot just behind the speed, blundered 700 M out, made up gradual ground final 300 M, but lacked a decisive kick to challenge the principals.
Out in line, settled cozily in the mid-division, held up for room early in the home straight, only one-paced when clear 200 M out.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, only gave limited response when asked for efforts at the top of the home straight, failed to make up any ground.
Pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, held ground until flattened 200 M out.
Settled 5Ls off the speed, caught wide with no cover early, took time to quicken early in the home straight, made up some late ground final 200 M.
Taken back from gate 11, travelled wide with no cover at rear, proved difficult to settle in the early stages, crowded 800 M out, never competitive.

From a wide draw raced without cover for 900M then crossed to a 2-wide position ahead of midfield, responded well inside 400M and kept grinding away, led near 50M and just got the better of the 2nd in a head-bobbing finish.
Began awkwardly, positioned midfield off the fence, angled out to clear inside 550M, came with a late surge final 200M and collared winner close home only to lose out in a photo finish.
Given a waiting ride near the rear, turned 3-wide nearing 700M, had plenty to do turning in, ran on strongly down the outside beaten by a diminishing neck.
In touch with the runaway leader, showed good acceleration to hit the lead 200M out, looked a winner but was outpaced by the top 3 over the late stages. Narrowly beaten.

Chased leaders early then held up in midpack of the main group, 6Ls behind runaway leader over the turn, picked up well inside 400M, held up near 200M then checked again near the finishing line. Would have been closer.
Ordinary jump but soon moved to the lead, restrained nearing the turn and sat 4Ls behind breakaway leader, quickened well early straight but turned one-pace final 150M.

3-wide with leaders down the back straight, raced keenly and pulled himself to the front 900M, built up a 4Ls lead over the turn, couldn’t sustain effort and was headed 200M, weakened gradually. (Jockey questioned.)
Raced 3-wide towards the rear, no cover from 900M and came widest over the turn, responded well early straight but flattened out inside 200M.
Slow to begin, urged along to stay in touch with the field, last into straight and switched to widest to challenge, stayed on well.

Set early pace, relinquished the lead before the turn and was 4Ls behind breakaway leader turning home, quickened well up the rail but ran into traffic near 250M and didn’t have a clear crack to the line.
Began awkwardly and raced keenly towards the rear, kept on one paced passing beaten runners only.
Raced a shade keen along the rail behind midfield, shaken up inside 500M and made a short lived effort, no extra inside 200M.
Raced in midfield along the 2-path in early stages, turned 3-wide without cover passing halfway, outpaced nearing 300M, weakened and eased late stages.
Restrained to a rearward position off the fence, 8-9Ls behind leader going into straight didn’t pick up.
Settled 4Ls off the pace on 4-deep, moved closer rounding the bend, kicked strongly when asked 350 M out and quickly ran up to lead, drew clear easily.
Settled one-off just behind the speed, responded well when asked 350 M out and ran on to contest lead, headed by the winner 250 M out, kept on for 2nd.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, on heels 900 M out, crowded 600 M out, quickened well when asked 350 M out, finished off well for 3rd.
Taken back from gate 12 and travelled 6Ls off the pace at rear, swung widest for home, bumped 500 M out, ran on steadily final 400 M, just missed a place. (Lost right front plate.)
Given a waiting ride and settled one from the rear, bumped 500 M out, made up gradual ground down centre of the home straight final 400 M, no extra final 50 M.
Lacked early speed despite being urged along, only one-paced when asked for efforts in the home straight.
Settled in midfield on the fence, held up for room early in the home straight, only one-paced when clear 200 M out.
Easily ran up to lead 1L, headed 300 M out, no extra.
Urged along to take the one-out-one-back spot, got tired passing the 400 M pole, soon faded.
Urged along to get across in front and soon settled in the box-seat, held ground until flattened 300 M out, soon dropped out.
Settled 3-4Ls off the pace in the mid-division, gave no response when asked for efforts 400 M out, failed to make up any ground.
Settled 2Ls off the pace, caught wide with no cover, got tired at the top of the home straight, finished tailed out.
Ordinary break, rushed up to sit behind leader, ideal run in mid section, got inside runs turning, dashed clear and comfortably held a big margin in run to line.
Fair to begin, raced just behind midfield, nearly 8ls back, made a 3 wide run from 500m, closed creditably down centre although no match for winner.
Drifted back from a wider alley, raced 10ls away in running line, in last 4 turning, made good ground final 300m to take 3rd.
No speed and faded well back from a wide draw, best part of 12ls back on rails, set huge task turning, closed soundly to make frame.
Rolled forward as expected to race outside leaders, travelled strongly in mid section, loomed briefly turning but couldn’t improve from 300m and run ended.
Even getaway, raced 5ls or so away on rails in front of midfield, had all favours in run, stayed on at one speed in straight.
No much early speed, raced well back on rails, 10ls or so from top end, tracked into race leaving bend, didn’t really see much daylight in straight and kept on evenly to line. (See Racing Incidents.)
Slowly away and lost plenty of ground, raced at rear 2 wide nearly 12ls from leaders, gave big start on straightening, made some minor progress late.
Moderate beginning, settle behind midfield, 8ls back on rails, soft run thereafter, still had a bit to do turning, made some ground to 200m before run ended.
Bounced nicely, assumed a prominent spot 1 out 1 back, very keen in mid section, niggled turning, didn’t let down in straight and faded out.
Came across from wide draw to land a spot in running line, midfield throughout 5-6ls or so back, no real excuses thereafter and just lacked required pick up in straight.
Plenty of early speed to lead them, kept speed decent in mid section, niggled soon after turning, again failed to see out journey.
Out in line, unable to slot in and posted 3 wide without cover 4LS or so away, did it tough throughout, faded from 400m after hard run.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Made most of the running after beginning from the one draw, narrowly headed by eventual runner-up 50 M out only to get the bob in the shadows of the post.
Tracked leader eventual winner throughout, hit the front narrowly passing 50 M only to be denied in the bobbing of heads.
Never far off in 4th or 5th about 3Ls off the pace, commenced move turning for home, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Towards rear to straight, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Moderate start, travelled towards rear on rail to straight, produced some late impression closing stages.
Settled in midfield on rails, swung wide for a run into straight but could make no progress.
Soon taken back to race in rear of midfield, reached 5th spot but that not much closer entering straight, plodded on.
Soon taken back to race in rear from the widest barrier, remained in last few and widest into straight, ran past a few well-beaten horses down the centre of the track.
Prominent to straight, soon weakened. (Lame next day.)
Trailed the field most of way and never seen with a chance.
Began well from a wide gate but soon taken back to travel wide without cover in 5th and later on 4th, weakened out of contention from 500 M out.
Raced mainly 3-wide in midfield before fading out of contention from home bend. (Lame.)
Speared out of the machines and made every post a winner coasting along the fence. Set even sections to post a sound win.
Camped midfield the rail with cover. Chased the leader gamely all the way down the running.
Tracked the leader 1 off with cover. Held its ground over the concluding stages.
Box seated. Battled away one paced in the final stages to hold its spot in the frame.
Raced slightly further than 4 back along the paint. Kept to the inside in the final stretch and finished off evenly.
Settled 1 out 1 back. Had every chance, kept on in the run to the wire.
Taken back from a wide gate and travelled with the backmakers 3 wide with cover. Peeled wide on straightening and closed off reasonably well.
Slow away & remained in a 1 off position at the tail of the field with cover. Worked home gradually down the outside in the straight without ever threatening.
Travelled worse than midfield, posted 3 wide without cover on the circle. Not likely.
Raced midfield, 2 deep with cover. Was a beaten horse turning for home.
Settled in a rearward position, 2 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Slow to begin & settled in last position 1 off with cover. Was unable to pass another runner.
Sat behind midfield on fence to the Rock. Improved to the back of leader rounding home turn. Dashed strongly and hit front final 250M. Dominated closing stages.
Towards rear on fence to the Rock. Progressed gradually home turn. Responded well in the straight to snatch 2nd near the post but no hope with the winner.
2-wide at rear to home straight. Made up ground steadily inside. Missed 2nd narrowly.
Urged early and parked on fence ahead of midfield first turn. Taken to 3-wide passing the Rock and came wide turning in. Kept giving to make frame.
Driven forward. Eventually led on fence 1200M. Held a 1L advantage turning in. Overhauled by the winner 250M. Plugged on thereafter.
Raced 2-wide towards rear to home turn. Hard ridden from 500M but no response.
2-wide behind midfield to home turn. Failed to pick up when asked thereafter.
2-wide behind leader until dropped out soon after straightening.
Fair break, midfield three wide early, taken forward to second one off, led early straight, fought on very gamely.
Fair break, taken back to fourth last one off, improved turn, wide bid, ran on strongly, just failed.
Fair break, settled fourth on rail, inside bid, ran on well, not quite pace to challenge.
Broke fast, shared early lead three wide, back to third one off, ridden early straight, kept on quite well.
Missed beat start, up three wide to lead and cross, led into straight, headed by winner, battled until weakened late.
Fair break, settled one off in fifth, wide bid straight, ran on but never quite pace to challenge.
Fair break, ridden early for spot midfield rail, urged turn, bid two off rail, kept on.
Sluggish start, second last rail, urged, ridden early straight, inside bid, kept on.
Fair break, not much early pace, taken back to rail mid-rear, inside bid, ridden, no kick.
Slow into stride, taken back to last one off,, improved wide turn, driven, no real progress.
Fair break, up to join four way battle for lead, settled for third on rail as pace slowed, mid-track bid, ridden, weakened.
Missed beat start, midfield one off, ridden early straight, no progress.
Broke well, taken back from wide draw to fourth last one off, improved rapidly turn, ran on strongly wide to lead last stride.
Missed break slightly, sixth one off, quick move to lead and go two lengths clear far side, still clear mid-straight, caught last stride.
Fair break, fourth rail, slight check leaving first turn, rail bid, almost joined second on line but caught by winner.
Sluggish start, urged but quickly tailed off, eight lengths last far side, closed up entering straight, had to wait for run, finished strongly.
Fair break, midfield one off, improved three wide turn, ran on but no kick.
Fair start, taken back to third last one off, improved turn, wide bid, run flattened late.
Missed beat start, settled midfield rail, urged far side, inside bid, failed to pick up under driving.
Out fast, shared lead one off first turn, went on far side, crossed, headed, ridden, second into straight, driven, weakened.
Taken back from wide gate and aimed straight at rail, settled second last, driven for inside bid straight, ran on, weakened late.
Broke well, led early, headed leaving first turn, back to third one off, urged, ridden, no extra.
Well away, midfield but caught wide, never less than three off, ridden straight, no response.
Missed beat start, aimed for lead but three wide first turn, back to third one off, lost ground steadily, tailed off, found to be lame next morning.
Settled in box seat, picked up well 200M and dominated onwards.
Hard ridden to cross in front, just off the good pace 2 wide, ran on well to the line for 2nd.
Slow away, pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace, lacked turn of foot, just held ground for 3rd.
Bumped start, hard ridden to sit outside the leader at good pace, flattened 200M.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 0.5L at good sectionals, hung on until 250M weakened.
Eased back, 5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, made steady ground 200M.
Eased to rear, 7Ls off the good pace on the fence, made some ground 200M.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 3.5Ls behind the good pace 2 wide, flattened 200M.
Pushed forward but failed to cross, 1.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-4 wide throughout and lost too much ground, emptied in straight.
Eased back, 5Ls off the good pace along the fence, no progress.
Hard ridden to obtain a forward spot, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, soon weakened 300M.
Easily ran up to lead and found the rail before the first turn, opened up a margin of 5Ls halfway, quickened when asked 250 M out, kept on soundly to score.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, responded well when asked for efforts at home turn, finished off soundly for 2nd.
Prominently placed in midfield on rail, on heels 350m out, quickened well when clear 300 M out, kept on soundly for 3rd.
Settled 9Ls off the pace near the rear, responded satisfactorily when asked 250 M out, made up gradual ground, never really threatened the top three.
Urged early and soon settled one-off in the mid-division, kept on satisfactorily under maximum pressure final 300 M, but lacked a decisive kick to challenge the principals.
Settled 5Ls behind the tearaway leader, kept on fairly when placed under pressure early in the home straight, failed to match the strides of the principals final 150 M.
Taken back from gate 11 and settled at the rear, responded well when asked for efforts in the home straight, finished off soundly final 250 M, too late.
Niggled along early and travelled 5Ls behind the tearaway leader, held ground until flattened near the 200 M pole.
Settled in mid-division on rail, only gave limited response when asked for efforts in the home straight, never better than midfield.
Urged early, checked soon after start, ended up settling 10Ls behind the tearaway leader, failed to make up any ground under maximum pressure.
Lacked early speed as usual and travelled 10Ls behind the tearaway leader, no cover throughout, niggled along 700 M out, failed to make up any ground.
Quickly into stride, travelled strongly behind leader, loomed 200M out and came with a strong run to take the lead near 50M, kept on for an impressive win over some noted course specialists.
Never far off 2Ls behind leader but was 3-wide throughout, ran on under urge and made a late surge final 100M to go 2nd.Just before the line.
Overcame a wide draw and soon crossed to the lead, dictated the race with a very steady tempo, quickened again 350M out and kept on gamely, headed nearing 50M.
Chased leader, lacked extra pace to challenge inside 300M but kept on steadily to the line.
Not hurried in early stages, taken across to the fence and raced towards the rear 4-5Ls off the pace, met minor interference near 200M, stayed on well.
Restrained behind midfield but proved difficult to settle in the middle stages, closed off the race well but was awkwardly placed behind horses near 150M, ran on again when clear.
Outpaced early stages, urged along to take a midfield position along the 3-path, kept on evenly inside 300M, not beaten far.
Broke well then restrained to race in midfield about 3Ls off the pace, pushed along inside 500M but could keep on at the same pace only.
Along the fence in mid-division, made a short-lived effort on straightening, flattened 200M then weakened over the final stages.
Lost ground at the start then hampered near 1000M, ended up near last 6Ls behind leader, made limited progress final 300M. Never threatened.
Behind midfield, caught wide throughout and covered more ground than others, didn’t pick up when asked.
Checked near1000M and shuffled back to last, over 7Ls down turning in and gave no response, eased final 200M.
