Settled in midfield, commenced move turning in, obtained a run over 300 M out, responded well to take charge over 150 M, won easily.
Settled behind midfield to straight, came to challenge under pressure inside final 300 M, ran on steadily without threatening.
Settled just worse than midfield, baulked for a run after straightening until 300 M out, fought on steadily without threatening.
Settled in forward of midfield on rails, snuck up hugging inside rails turning in, baulked for a run until about 100 M out, fought on steadily without threatening.
In last few to straight, baulked for a run after straightening, finished off race well once into the clear inside final 150 M.
Began moderately, settled about 2Ls off the pace in 4th or 5th, similar turning for home, kept on steadily without quickening.
Began from a bad draw, soon taken back to race wide in rear, produced moderate impression down centre of straight. (Lame.)
Began well, soon taken back to settle 3-wide in midfield, slightly wider turning, ran home one-paced.
Broke well, held narrow advantage throughout far side and around home bend, still well there after straightening, had no more to give over 150 M out.

Began moderately, niggled along to reach striking distance, disputed lead into straight gaining slender advantage briefly after straightening, unable to sustain effort and overhauled inside final 200 M.
Slowly away, remained well back to straight, only ran past well beaten horses.
Close up briefly, soon taken back to settle wide in just worse than midfield, similar turning for home, folded up quickly in straight.
Worked from the widest gate to join leaders, remained wide without cover with leaders to straight, soon weakened after straightening.
Broke well, ridden to muster early speed, settled wide in a prominent position, soon weakened after straightening, beaten when squeezed over 300 M out.
Camped 1 out 1 back. Swept to the front near the 200m and found plenty to record an easy win.
Enjoyed the run of the race behind the leading duo, on the rails. Commenced to peel out rounding the home turn and kept responding all the way to the line.
Slow to begin, travelling behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Rounded the home turn about 6 deep, closed off soundly.
Parked midfield, 2 wide with cover. Whacked away at the same pace to hold a spot in the frame.
Steadied soon after the start and from the outside gate managed to settle along the fence, midfield. Worked home evenly towards the inside.
Raced with the backmakers 1 off with cover. Shifted out into clear running early in the straight and made some late headway.
Began poorly losing ground. Failed to muster and travelled at the rear of the field 3-4 wide with cover. Made some ground down the outside in the final stretch.
Never really had much peace when pressured by the leader while travelling in 2nd position along the fence. Commenced to weaken over the concluding stages.
From a wide barrier was taken back shortly after the start, settling at the rear of the field along the paint. Finished off only one paced.
Worked hard in the lead, travelling 1 off about ½ length in advance of the runner to its inside. Faded over the final 100m.
Began on terms and was in the leading division early before being steadied & settling around midfield 3 wide with cover. Was a beaten horse at the furlong.
Couldn’t hold its spot early despite being ridden along, settled worse than midfield, 2 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Travelled handy in the run 3 wide with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Posted 3 wide without cover behind the leaders. Never a factor.
Began well. Slotted 2-wide ahead of midfield from 1400M. Well positioned to strike in the straight. Hit front 200M. Kept on strongly to score victory with some comfort.
On fence behind pace to home straight. Saw daylight 300M. Finished off well to figure in quinella but no hope with the winner.
Urged early. Settled 3-wide slightly ahead of midfield from 1300M. 4Ls down on straightening. Rallied on but lacked the kick of the front pair. Beat the rest by a comfortable margin.
2-wide towards rear to home turn. Peeled out and was 6Ls off into final stretch. Covered decent ground late to make frame at line.
Travelled along the fence in mid-division to home straight. Plugged on and nearly made frame without troubling the front trio.
Out nicely. Gradually rolled to the fence and led from 1200M. Held a 1L advantage turning in. Hung on until overhauled by the front trio inside final furlong. Lost 4th at post.
Away in line but trapped wide. Progressed gradually to one-off behind speed from 1100M. Attempted to challenge the leader passing 400M but remained one-paced. Weakened close home.
3-wide behind midfield to home straight. No real progress thereafter.
Soon taken to rear from wide barrier. Improved to race behind midfield on fence from 1200M. Couldn’t turn up a notch in the straight.
Travelled wide and without cover behind midfield early. Strode forward and parked 3-wide behind pace from 1200M. Failed to sustain top of home straight and faded final furlong.
2-wide towards rear to home turn. Swung out and was hard ridden turning into home. Beat tired runners home.
2-wide at midfield to home turn. Pressed to maintain position from 700M. Very little impression in the straight.
3-wide towards rear to the bend. Swung widest rounding home turn. Quickened satisfactorily early home straight but dropped out noticeably after 200M.
Always at rear. Never in the hunt.
Fair break, urged early, checked far side lost three lengths, midfield one off, wide bid, ran on strongly, led 50m out.
Broke well, second one off, up on rail to share lead entering straight, ran on well, caught 50m out.
Broke fast, led three wide, prevented from crossing by eventual second on inside, second into straight, kept on well.
Fair break, settled sixth one of,mid track bid, ran on quite well but passed by winner.
Missed beat start, lost length, third last rail, wide bid, ran on quite well.
Broke well, contested lead three wide, back to fourth one off, ridden and kept on but no kick.
Missed break, lost length, ridden up along rail to sixth, driven mid straight, kept on one pace.
Sluggish start, last early, urged, still near rear entering straight, kept on quite well late to pass beaten horses.
Broke well, front rank rail, not pace to lead, settled fourth rail, inside bid, found little.
Fair break, not rushed, met interference far side and lost ground, shaken up straight, found little.
Fair break, up three wide to join leading group, third into straight, ridden, weakened, eased.
Fair break, back to second last one off, taken very wide by injured horse, no chance thereafter.
Fair break, appeared to lose action early then regained it, urged until turn, then seemed to lose action again, allowed to finish in own time.

Placing: PU
Comment: No Comments on Running information for this horse.
Fair break, eased back to last one off, still last entering straight, short of room, found gaps, finished fast to lead last 50m.
Missed break, no early pace, urged along rail to second last place, rail bid, finished well but just outpaced.
Broke well but not much early speed, urged up along rail to midfield, driven to lead 150m out, kept on but outpaced.
Fair break, lacked early pace, third last one off, urged, wide bid, driven, finished well.
Fair break, settled midfield two off, , looking for room mid-straight,, gap came and ran on, but no real kick.
Fair break, caught four wide, back to mid-rear two off, urged turn, had to wait for run, gap came, driven, ran on but not quite able to challenge.
Fair break, ridden early, led, retained narrow lead until headed and swamped 200m out.
Fair break, joined rush for lead, second one off, ridden early straight, never quite got past front runner, no extra late.
Not rushed early, held up fourth last rail, checked, short of room and unbalanced mid-straight, not a threat thereafter.
Broke well, up along rail to third, ridden mid straight, no kick.
Broke well, held up behind leaders one off, out to challenge early straight, ridden, found little.
Fair break, ridden to join leaders but caught three wide in fifth, ridden entering straight, weakened.
Missed break lost two lengths, ridden up to midfield, shaken up entering straight, found nil.
Broke well but caught four wide midfield, ridden turn, found nil, eased late.
Settled 3Ls off the good pace, progressed steadily 300M to score another comfortable victory.
Pushed to keep up in front of midfield, 3Ls off the good pace, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Shared lead, ran on well for 3rd.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the good pace, made steady ground 300M.
Shared lead, dominated 400M, hung on strongly until 150M flattened.
Hard ridden to share the lead at good pace, emptied 300M.
Pushed early to keep up with the field, 6Ls off the good pace, ran on ok.
Pushed early, behind midfield, 7Ls off the good pace, no dash.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the good pace, no turn of foot in final stages.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the good pace, no progress.
Eased to sit 1.5Ls off the good pace, weakened 300M.
Never competitive.
Never a factor, tailed out.
Given a waiting ride and settled at the rear, kicked strongly when clear 350 M out, hit the front 100 M out, drew clear easily.
Taken back from gate 11 and travelled near the rear, responded well when asked for efforts 350 M out, ran on soundly for 2nd.
Prominently placed one-off in the mid-division, quickened well when asked 400 M out, ran on to contest the lead, headed by the winner 100 M out, kept on for 3rd.
Travelled one-off in midfield, ran on to contest the lead 300 M out, jockey lost stirrup 100 M out, just missed a place. (Bleeding to right fore and lame right fore.)
Slow away, settled in midfield on rail, held up early in the home straight, ran on steadily when clear 250 M out, rather one-paced.
Settled one-off just in front of the rear, moved closer rounding the home turn, ran on to contest the lead 400 M out, no extra final 100 M. (Lost right front plate.)
Urged along to hold the one-out-one-back spot, held ground until flattened 200 M out.
Slow away, pushed up to occupy a fence position in midfield, made little ground early in the home straight, failed to keep on final 200 M.
Settled one-off 3Ls off the pace, got tired 300 M out, soon faded.
Handy with no cover, proved difficult to settle in the early stages, ran up to lead 1800 M out, got tired early in the home straight, soon dropped out.
Pushed up to hold a fence position just off the pace, badly checked 300 M out, never tested.
Travelled rearward throughout the trip, never competitive.
Tracked leaders, mad his move after switching to 3-wide nearing 600M, into the lead 350M and kept on well to fend off the persistant runner-up.
Chased the pace one off the fence, dueled with the winner from 400M and was only outstayed in final stages.
Held up behind midfield and well covered, driven along inside 500M, chased winner all the way home, nearest finish.
Towards the rear and saved grounds on the inside, lacked a turn of foot but stayed on final 200M for a non-threatening 4th.
Raced keenly towards the rear, ran on only fairly and never pose a genuine threat to the first three.
Raced in midfield along the inside, switched out inside 600M, kept on one paced.
Outpaced early stages, driven along to stay in touch with the field, caught wide then taken across to the fence near 1000M, held up early straight but made only limited progress inside 350M.
Positively ridden, crossed to the lead near 1200M and set a steady tempo, was collared soon turning in, battled on briefly and had no extra to offer inside 200M.
Reluctant to stride out in early stages but not hurried, held up in the rear 7Ls off the pace, swung widest into straight but didn't pick up. (Jockey questioned.)
Tracked leader, not quickened in straight, weakened away passing 200M.
Fractious in stalls, race 3-wide in midfield and left with no cover from 1200M, found nothing when asked passing 400M, eased mid straight. (To stalls test.)
Settled one-off in midfield, quickened well when asked for efforts 350 M out, hit the front 150 M out, kept on soundly to score.
On-pace but caught 4-wide with no cover early, ran up to share lead halfway, quickened when asked 400 M out and soon hit the front, caught by the winner 100 M out.
Widely drawn, taken to midfield in search of cover, responded satisfactorily when asked 300 M out, ran on steadily for 3rd without threatening the top two.
Lacked early speed as usual and travelled 8Ls off the pace, urged along early, clicked into gear 300 M out, finished off soundly, just late for a place.
Crowded start, pushed to hold a 3-wide spot just off the pace, bumped and lost cover 900 M out, kept on well early in the home straight, no extra final 50 M, just missed a place.
Prominently placed just off the speed on rail, blocked early in the home straight, finished off well when clear 250 M out, too late. (Lost right hind plate.)
Settled well in the mid-division on rail, held up at the top of the home straight, finished off satisfactorily final 250 M.
Handy but caught wide without cover early, ran up to share the lead 1000 M out, kept on fairly early in the home straight, passed 250 M out, soon flattened.
Lacked early speed and travelled at the rear, niggled along in the early stages, swung widest for home, made up gradual ground final 300 M, rather one-paced.
Slow away, settled one-off just behind the mid-division, only made limited progress in the home straight and passed a few tired runners.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot just behind the speed, held ground until flattened near the 200 M pole, soon faded.
Taken back from gate 14 and travelled 6Ls off the pace, on heels 350 M out, only made limited progress when clear soon later.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot in midfield, failed to keep on 250 M out, soon faded.
Niggled along to lead on the rail, eased to the box-seat before the first bend, held ground until flattened 200 M out, gave ground.
Broke fairly, drove up and went to lead soon after, dictated terms to suit throughout, travelled well at 300 M and held a comfortable margin thereafter despite being shaken up late.
Tardy to begin, ridden hard to take closer order, posted 3 wide without cover, worked hard throughout, kept fighting in straight and did a good job to take 2nd.
Even beginning, sat just off speed midfield 4Ls off pace, had easy time to bend, took inside runs and closed well, didn’t have clearest crack last 100m which probably cost 2nd place.
Faded back from a wide alley, 3 wide at rear 6ls or so back, came widest turning, closed hard down centre producing a strong effort to take frame.
Average jump but then showed more speed than usual, assumed a midfield spot 3-4Ls back in running line, not far off them to bend, closed gradually.
Fast out, couldn’t cross and drifted back to race in 3 wide line, 3Ls or so back with cover to bend, stayed on at same pace in straight.
Taken back to race 3 wide behind midfield, 5-6Ls back settling, came wider turning. Closed off steadily for an even debut.
First to break, took spot outside leader, did some work with pressure from outside horse, niggled turning but lacked a fight and faded final 150M. (Lame and muco post race.)
Out in line, took a position just behind midfield, 4-5ls away throughout, just held ground at business end.
Angled in behind midfield to race in running line, back with last few 6ls down to bend, made no serious progress.
Began fairly, overraced and pulled way forward to be 3 wide just off front runners, came 4 wide turning, dint offer much last 250M.
Taken back, to race behind midfield, had an easy time on rails 5ls or so back, showed little in straight.
Began fairly, took a trail behind leader, reasonable trip throughout, on eventual winners back turning but gradually weakened out.

Began moderately, soon worked his way forward to join the leader coming out of back straight, drew clear inside final 200 M for a comfortable victory.

Began moderately, made swift progress to midfield going up Rock, steadied and lost some ground coming out of back straight, remained in mid-division turning in, hampered over 200 M out before finishing off race nicely.
Settled in 5th mainly about 3Ls off the pace, swung wide turning into straight, only produced moderate impression in the run to the line.
Began fairly, settled one-back in 4th on rails to straight, crossed by eventual winner upon straightening, kept on same pace but swamped for a placing nearing finish.
Began well, soon ridden to lead but not fast enough to cross to rails, joined by eventual winner on rails coming out of back straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 200 M.
Began from a wide gate, travelled 3 wide in midfield down far side, swung wider into straight, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began moderately, soon recovered to forward of midfield, saved ground on inside turning in, forced to switch off rails for a run over 200 M out, kept on steadily without quickening.
Travelled very wide in last few, swung widest into straight, produced good impression under pressure down centre of the track, never nearer.
Settled at the back, did not find much room in straight.
Ridden for pace early, travelled mainly in one-out-one-back position to straight, soon weakened after straightening.
Never better than midfield, made no impression in straight.
Soon taken well back from the widest gate, made short-lived effort on rails coming out of back straight but was soon forced to be steadied, remained well behind thereafter.
Stalked the leader along the rails. Came around one horse in the straight and was able to hold off all challengers.
Raced in 2nd position, 1 off no cover. Kept finding all the way down the running.
Had every conceivable chance settling 1 out 1 back from a wide gate. Maintained a good gallop right to the wire.
Made its run from second last position. 2 wide with cover. Came widest in the straight and kept coming late to land in the frame.
Raced midfield 2 wide with cover. Rallied 5 deep on straightening and battled away gamely in the straight. Copped some crowding on the post.
Parked midfield the fence. closed off well despite striking some traffic problems near the 250m and also over the concluding stages. Not fully tested in the run to the line.
Dictated terms in front along the paint. Faded over the final 100m.
Camped 3 back the fence. Had every chance working to the line evenly.
Blew the start hopelessly due to being fractious, settling a long last. Rattled home strongly. (See Racing Incident report.)
Settled behind midfield the fence. kept towards the inside in the home straight and finished off soundly.
Taken back from a wide barrier to a position worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Never managed to close off.
Scrubbed along early, settling towards the rear of the field 2 deep with cover. Failed to run on.
Towards rear near the fence to home straight. Forced its way out final 200M. Finished off strongly to contain rivals home.
2-wide behind midfield. Pressured 500M. Swung wide and was 4Ls off turning in. Dashed well but was fended off by the winner late.
Taken to rear on fence after start. Hard ridden and took inside run home turn. Kept making up ground early home straight. Forced into run 50M to snatch 3rd near the post.
2-wide towards rear. Came wide home turn and was 4Ls back leaving the bend. Closed off fairly well to make frame at line.
Box-seated to home straight. Hit front briefly passing 200M but couldn’t repel the principals final 50M.
2-wide ahead of midfield. Made run 3-wide home turn. Ran on top of home straight until bumped and became badly unbalanced final 200M. Held ground once resumed.
Led on fence until overhauled 250M. Interfered final 50M but was well beaten anyway.
On fence at midfield to home straight. Plugged on along the rail until checked severely final 50M.
2-wide behind leader until dropped out on straightening. No impression thereafter.
Broke well, restrained, midfield one off, quickened turn to circle field and lead, ran on well.
Slightly sluggish start, ridden up along rail to midfield, off rail to improve turn, fourth into straight, wide bid, ran on well.
Fair break, third last one off, improved turn, slightly short of room 200m out, ran on well when clear.
Broke well, up on outside for lead but three wide, back to fifth one off, improved turn, chased winner, weakened slightly late.
Bobbled start, second last rail, inside bid, driven, kept on well late.
Fair break, taken back, two lengths last far side, wide bid, driven, kept on.
Broke well, settled midfield two off, back to second last two off, ridden entering straight, kept on without kick.
Fair break, fourth rail, back to midfield far side, driven early straight, no kick.
Broke fast, up to join leaders but caught three wide, settled third one off, improved leaving back to lead, headed, weakened.
Broke well, shared lead one off, went on far side, headed leaving back, ridden, weakened.
Broke well, ridden early, led rail, headed leaving first turn, unable to hold position, ridden, steadily weakened.
Broke well, not pace to join leaders, caught three wide mid-rear no cover, last into straight, found nil, eased.
Broke well, led rail, headed entering back straight, settled fourth, ridden inside to challenge, led 150m out, held on well.
Well away, ridden up to share lead one off, went on far side, headed, challenged again straight, driven, just outpaced.
Fair break, ridden up to fourth one off, bustled entering turn, wide bid, kept on under driving.
Slow away, taken to rail mid-rear, inside bid straight, ran on under drive, not pace to challenge.
Moderate break, back to rear one off, improved leaving back, wide bid, kept on, run flattened late.
Broke well, not pace to lead, sixth three wide, up to lead into straight, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, not rushed, midfield rail, back to fifth last entering straight, ridden, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back from wide, settled rear rail, ran on, too much to do.
Fair break, fifth rail, back to midfield, ridden, no kick.
Fair break, fourth last one off, ridden turn, then driven, no real progress.
Moderate break, midfield one off, urged far side, given slap, found nil.
Fair break, mid-rear but caught three wide, up to midfield, ridden, found nil, eased late.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, made early move from 800M, favoured by the slow pace, led 300M, hung on to win.
Prominent, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, closed the race off strongly for 2nd.
Eased to sit just behind the front group, 2.5Ls off the slow tempo, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, trapped 2-3 wide throughout, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Pushed early but not muster, 5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M.
Eased to rear, 6.5Ls off the leader on the rails, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased at start, 4.5Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 250M, run ended 100M.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls, enjoyed the slow sectionals, however soon emptied 300M.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 6Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, held up and checked 300M, no progress.
Pushed to take up the box seat, suited by the slow tempo, but soon dropped off 300M.
Easily ran up to lead 1L on the rail, quickened well when asked for efforts 300 M out, drew clear easily, never challenged.
Niggled along to hold a fence position in midfield, quickened well when clear 250 M out, finished off soundly for 2nd.
Out in line, settled one-off 2Ls off the pace, responded well when asked for efforts 300 M out, hung in 200 M out, finished off satisfactorily for 3rd.
Pushed up to take the box-seat, responded satisfactorily when asked 300 M out, kept on fairly, couldn’t find extra final 50 M.
Taken back from gate 10, travelled 6-7Ls off the pace at rear, held up early in the home straight, ran on strongly when clear 150 M out, too late. (Bleeding to left hind fetlock)
Jumped fast, settled one-off just off the speed, niggled along rounding the final bend, only gave limited response when asked 300 M out, no progress. (Mucus)
Taken back from gate 9 and travelled rearward early, only gave limited response when placed under pressure 300 M out, made some late ground final 150 M.
Out in line, settled one from the rear, saddle shifted halfway, only made limited progress final 200 M.
Worked hard early to hold a fence position in the mid-division, niggled along rounding the final bend, made no progress in the home straight.
Pushed up to hold a 3-wide spot in midfield, got tried early in the home straight, never competitive.
Widely drawn, pushed up to get across in front and ended up in the one-out-one-back spot, weakened sharply 250 M out, gave ground. (Heart irregularity)
Soon guided to the fence under some positive handling, tracked leader in 3rd and always travelling strongly, quickened well to lead 200M out, drew clear nearing 100M.
Dropped back to 2nd last about 10Ls off the pace, urged along inside 600M, stayed on well for 2nd but the winner had gone beyond reach.
Held up in last over 10Ls off the pace, waited with till nearing 400M, made good headway outside to claim 3rd just in time.
Soon took up running, led evenly and was unchallenged to straight, kept battling on when headed 200M, tired over the final stages.
Raced 6Ls back in midfield along the 2-path, driven inside 400M and progressed steadily to the finish.
Broke well, sat in 5th 4Ls behind leader, went 3rd 200M out, turned one-pace final stages and was swamped close home.
Towards the rear 7-8Ls off the pace, unable to obtain clear run until near 150M, finished off well and would have been closer.
Fractious in barriers, reared and lost ground at the start, positioned on the fence 7Ls back towards the rear, made some progress final 300M but never looked dangerous.
Away in good order, restrained to midfield and had inside run throughout, no extra pace to challenge in straight, weakened late stages.
Tracked leader in 4th place, not quickened turning in, no extra inside 100M.
Settled in mid-division 2-wide, one paced throughout, faded passing 200M.
Tracked leader, found little when asked, weakened 200M out and gave way.

Began fairly, travelled never far off in 6th or 5th within 3Ls of pace, had troubles finding a run early in straight until inside 200 M, finished off race well to just get up on line.

Began well from the widest gate, wide in first few far side, crossed to lead approaching 800 M, gained rails run shortly and led until joined into straight, driven 1L clear over 100 M out only to be caught final strides.
Began with others, soon taken back to rear of midfield and 3-wide most of way, soon switched out to challenge upon straightening, finished off race impressively.
Ridden to lead early, headed over 800 M out settling one-back on rails around the bend, remained similar into straight, kept on steadily under pressure without quickening, no extra final strides.
Began nicely, settled just off the pace mostly in 2nd, disputed lead after straightening but unable to sustain effort inside final 200 M.
Prominent to 200 M, gradually weakened under pressure closing stages.
Jumped moderately and soon found itself in tail-end, trailed the field until taken wide into straight, made some progress past well-beaten horses in the run home. (Tactic questioned.)
Jostled at start, remained in last few to straight, briefly baulked upon straightening, kept on same pace to the line.
Began awkwardly and then hampered losing ground, remained in last few to straight, shifted in for a run after straightening, produced moderate short-lived impression early on.
Soon restrained to be just worse than midfield, raced awkwardly in similar position turning in, kept on at the one pace without swamped close to home.
Had a moderate start followed by a bump, remained in last few throughout and was last into straight, made no impression.
Began moderately, soon picked up to rear of midfield on rails, lost position turning in on inside, found nothing in the run home.
Ridden for speed early settling within 3Ls of pace, very wide turning for home, soon weakened after straightening.
Niggled along in midfield, similar turning in, soon weakened under pressure after straightening.
Raced in fourth position, 2 deep with cover. Peeled out turning for home and once balanced, let down convincingly.
Enjoyed all the favors while tracking the leader along the fence. maintained a strong gallop all the way down the running.
Received some significant crowding at the start, settling along the paint, behind midfield. Peeled out into clear running at the 150m, and finished off well.
Made its run from near the rear 3 wide with cover. Closed off well down the outside in the final stretch.
Went forward from a wide gate and faced the breeze in second position outside the leader. Couldn’t find much extra at the business end of the race.
Parked midfield the fence. stayed on one paced in the home straight making slight ground.
Travelled behind midfield 2 deep with cover. Kept poking through to try and hold its position after the 700m. Closed off only.
Rated 3 back. 1 off with cover. Never properly settled and after the 800m, was permitted to shift out and race In a 3 wide line on the circle, no cover thereafter. Not likely.
Tightened badly for room at the jump settling towards the rear along the paint. Failed to make any impression in the run to the line.
Badly crowded at the start travelling at the back of the field. Only plodded to the line. (Bled both nostrils.)
Worked forward to eventually cross and lead the fence near the 1400M. Was collard after the 400m, and gave ground quickly.
Raced 3 wide with cover on the circle, in about a midfield position. Was a beaten horse turning for home.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled at the rear of the field, 2 wide with cover. Struggled in the run home.

Away in line. Soon slotted 2-wide ahead of midfield. Shifted out and was 3Ls down into final stretch. Picked up well without ridden top of home straight. Fought gamely when challenged inside 200M to hold off rivals home.
2-wide behind midfield to home straight. Swung out and was 5Ls off passing 350M. Dashed strongly but was always fended off by the winner. Beat the rest by a fair margin.
Eased to 3-wide towards rear after start. Came wide and was 6Ls back turning in. Covered good ground to snatch 3rd near the post without troubling the front pair.
Behind leaders on fence to home straight. Ideal position to strike in the straight. Ran on fairly well but lacked the kick of the front pair. Hung on for 3rd until final strides.
Slow to begin. Soon driven to rail behind midfield. Urged along to maintain position home turn. Took inside run leaving the bend. Kept making headway for a non-threatening 5th.
Taken to 2-wide at rear from widest barrier. Bumped and became unbalanced 900M. Nearly 10Ls adrift turning into home. Made up considerable ground thereafter.
First out and raced outside the leader to home straight. Hit front briefly at 400M but couldn’t sustain effort final furlong.
Began well. Parked one-out-one-back from home turn. Failed to turn up a notch in the straight. Weakened final 250M.
Midfield on fence to home straight. No progress thereafter.
Taken to rear on fence from high draw. Bumped and became unbalanced 900M. Last entering home straight. No impression thereafter.
Hard ridden early but trapped 3-wide without cover ahead of midfield. Struggled home turn. Faded soon after straightening.
Pressured early to share lead on fence to home straight. Overhauled 400M and dropped out after 300M.
Back with last few always. Never a factor.
Steadied start, settled rear one off, wide bid, ran on strongly to lead 50m out.
Broke well, taken back from wideto fifth last two off, wide bid, ran on, outpaced by winner.
Fair break, midfield three off, mid-track bid, ran on gamely but no kick.
Moderate break, fourth last rail, short of room early straight, eased wide, kept on well.
Broke well, eased back to midfield one off, denied run mid-straight, pulled out, kept on well.
Broke well, up to fifth on rail, short of room mid-straight, found gap late, kept on.
Fair break, midfield rail, short of room and repeatedly checked mid-straight, gap came late, ran on.
Fair break, sixth one off, mid-track bid, led briefly mid-straight, weakened.
Broke well, up wide to lead and cross, led into straight, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, up wide to second on rail, out to challenge and lead briefly early straight, driven, weakened.
Moderate start, back to third last one off, wide bid, little progress.
Fair break, ridden up to join leading group, fourth one off, ridden early straight, weakened.
Broke fast, led briefly then third rail, ridden straight, no extra.
Fair break, ridden but no early speed, back to rear rail, inside bid straight, no real progress, eased late.
Fast away from wide draw, led and crossed, kicked early straight, ran on very well, just held on.
Well away, up to second one off, challenged strongly all through straight, just denied.
Broke well, up with pace then back to midfield one off, mid-track bid, ran on well under driving but not quite peg back leaders.
Reined back from wide draw, third last rail, inside bid, ran on well.
Broke fast, fourth one off, ridden early straight, kept on but not reach leaders.
Missed break slightly, up along rail to midfield, shaken up straight, ran on steadily until ran out of room late.
Fair break, taken back to rail mid-rear, eased out for clear run early straight, driven, kept on.
Missed break slightly, midfield one off, ridden straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back to rear, wide bid straight, ran on but not pace to challenge.
Broke well, midfield rail, driven straight, no extra.
Fair break, not rushed, fourth last one off, driven, found little.
Steadied start, back to rear two off, wide bid, little progress.
Well away, led early rail, headed and settled third, ridden, found nil.
Moderate start, mid-rear three off, ridden for wide bid, found nil.
Box seat, held up most straight, closed off strongly when clear to win by narrow margin.
At rear, 7.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace and ran a creditably 2nd.
Slow away, hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, lack room 400M, dashed well when clear for 3rd.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 100M flattened.
Settled in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
Midfield on the fence, 3.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, blocked 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, held up most straight, dashed well when clear.
Eased at start, 8.5Ls off the leader, trapped 4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, made early move 800M, dashed well 400M, run ended 150M.
Pushed forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed by the slow tempo, flattened 150M.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, blocked most straight, dashed well.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, flattened in straight.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
At rear, 7.5Ls off the leader on the rails, not suited by the slow tempo, no dash.
Taken back from gate 10 and travelled one from the rear, swung widest for home, kicked when asked 400 M out, led 100 M out, finished off soundly to score, hung in final 50 M.
Urged along to take a fence position just off the pace, quickened well when clear 300 M out, kept on soundly under maximum pressure, narrowly beaten by the winner.
Taken back from gate 8 and travelled 7Ls off the speed on rail, responded well when asked for efforts 350 M out, ran on soundly for 3rd, bumped 50 M out.
Taken rearward from gate 9 and travelled 7Ls off the pace, took time to quicken early in the home straight, finished off satisfactorily when clear 200 out.
Broke well, restrained one-off in midfield, pulled early, responded well when asked 300 M out and looked possible for a place, one-paced final 100 M, crowded 50 M out.
Easily ran up to take the one-out-one-back spot, quickened 400 M out and soon hit the front, kept on fairly well until caught 150 M out, soon flattened.
Taken back from gate 11 and travelled at rear on rail, blocked at the top of the home straight, made up gradual ground final 300 M without threatening the principals.
Settled cozily in midfield on rail, blocked at the top of the home straight, finished off only fairly when clear 300 M out.
Prominently placed in a one-off spot just behind the speed, held ground until flattened near the 200 M pole.
Pushed to get across in front and travelled cozily in the box-seat, ran on to contest the lead at the top of the home straight, but couldn’t find extra final 200 M.
Slow away, pushed up to lead 2Ls on rail, headed at the top of the home straight, weakened sharply.
Stalked leaders along the 3-path, responded kindly and took lead nearing 300M, battled on well once in front and found the necessary to hold off pursuers over final 200M.
Given a waiting ride in the rear, showed a neat turn of foot when swung to challenge down the outside of straight, finished fastest to go 2nd close home.
Never far off in the group chasing the pace, emerged to throw down a challenge to the eventual winner inside 300M, had every chance but was always held, lost 2nd place close home.
Held up behind midfield, turned wide inside 600M, loomed a threat 300M out but had no more to give in the final 100M.
Well covered in mid-division, didn't have the pace to seriously challenge but kept on to the line.
Always close to the pace in 5th, ran on fairly inside 400M and never pose a threat to the top 3.
Near the rear 6-7Ls back, made a bold move out wide rounding the turn into the straight, kept on one paced to the line.
Driven forward and shared lead on the inside, travelled well to straight but didn't find extra when placed under pressure 300M, tired 100M out.
Held up towards the rear, didn't find much when asked, steadied near 200M and dropped out of contention.
Shared lead on the outside, gave way nearing 300M then eased in late stages.
Prominently placed within striking distance to the leader, kicked strongly when asked 350 M out and took the lead 100 M out, drew clear easily.
Pushed hard early, ended up travelling in the box-seat, quickened well when asked 350 M out, ran on soundly for 2nd.
Jumped fast, settled one-off in the mid-division, responded well when asked 350 M out, finished off soundly for 3rd.
Started awkwardly, prominently placed 2Ls behind the leader, kept on satisfactorily when placed under pressure 350 M out, but lacked a decisive kick to challenge the top three.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot in midfield, no cover, made up gradual ground final 300 M under maximum pressure, rather one-paced.
Taken to the rear from gate 14, swung widest for home, hung in in the home straight, finished off soundly final 250 M, too late.
Out in line, caught 3-wide with no cover in midfield, only one-paced in the home straight.
Taken back from gate 13 and travelled 3-wide behind the mid-division, gave limited response when asked for efforts in the home straight, rather one-paced.
Pushed up to share the lead on rail, proved difficult to settle when restrained halfway, headed 250 M out, soon flattened.
Taken back from gate 12 and travelled one from the rear, only made limited progress when clear 300 M out.
Pushed up to take the one-out-one-back spot, held ground until got tired 300 M out.
Taken rearward from gate 10 and travelled 8Ls off the pace, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Slow away, urged along to take a fence position 8Ls behind the speed, made no progress in the home straight.
Started awkwardly, pushed up early and travelled in midfield on rail, outpaced 300 M out, soon faded.
Taken back from an outside draw, unsuited by speed two wide at rear 6Ls or so back, came three wide turning and responded to vigorous riding final 300m to stave off late challenger.
Standard jump, settled midfield on rails 3-4ls back, in traffic turning when taking inside runs, made good ground final 250m to miss narrowly.
Faded back as usual, raced 3 wide with cover just behind midfield, 3-4ls back to bend, produced decent effort in stretch but just out dashed final 100m.
Began well, up challenging for early lead, pace not strong in mid section, took over at 400m and in it for most of straight but overhauled by those with better runs in transit.
Fair to begin, ended up in midfield about 4ls back, fair run to bend, in traffic to 300m but didn’t dash when clear and just kept on to line.
Settled nearer to last 5-6ls back on rails, improved turning but held up passing 200m, made some good ground late when race was over.
Even break, midfield before improving behind leader, right on leaders back turning and took inside runs at 300m, looked a place chance but peaked at 100m.
Fast away, assumed coveted 1 out 1 back spot, right there to bend, didn’t find much at business end and weakened out final furlong.
Drifted out from wider alley, 3 wide at rear 6Ls back, tracked into race ok on bend, didn’t have required finish and battled in stretch.
Showed early speed as expected, took up running but was worried by outside horse, speed suited to turn but when pressured lacked usual fight and gave in cheaply at 350m.
Went forward, posted 3 wide without cover, did some work despite speed being steady, right there on turning, found little and faded after a hard run.
Drifted back to tail, 7Ls or so away, pace against, dropped out in straight.

Broke well with others, given a reminder to gather pace, tracked the leader on rails to straight, hit the front 200 M out, held on under pressure.

Broke well, gradually taken back to midfield before reaching far side, came under pressure to challenge after straightening, only produced moderate impression in the run to the line. (Tactic questioned.)
Settled in midfield on rails, briefly baulked turning into home straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Settled in last few, commenced move rounding home bend, soon found a gap upon straightening, finished off race okay down the centre of the track.
Well there to 200 M, gradually weakened.

Began moderately, soon ridden to a prominent no cover position, took further closer order up Rock but soon received a bump and shuffled back to forward of midfield, swung wide turning in, ran home okay.
Well back, saved considerable ground on rails turning in, gradually weakened after straightening.
Never seen with a chance.
Hard driven to lead going over 2Ls clear halfway out, came under strong pressure to hold place after straightening, unable to sustain effort and faded away quickly inside final 200 M.
Began moderately, soon picked a prominent spot far side racing wide without cover after the Rock, gradually faded after straightening.
Began awkwardly, soon tailed off, never on terms. (Bled.)
Began from a wide gate, travelled wide on outside in a prominent position before taken back for cover in rear of midfield at around Rock, swung wide and dropped well back turning in, never recovered.
Settled in about a midfield position along the paint with cover. Grabbed the lead at the 100m and drew away to claim the prize.
Parked 1 out 1 back. Hit the front at the 200m but was overhauled not long after, stayed on satisfactorily.
Rated behind midfield the fence with cover. made some late headway.
Led very early before handing up and box seating after the 1400m. Had every possible chance but was flat over the latter stages.
Was last early before improving to race worse than midfield the fence after the 800m with cover. made good steady ground in the home straight.
Took some time from the outside gate to eventually cross and race outside the leader by the 1000m. was gassed over the concluding stages.
Raced midfield 1 off with cover. Peeled out midrace to travel 3 wide with cover. Ridden along after the 500m to improve but only battled away at the same speed in the run to the post.
Travelled in last position on the rails for most of the race. Went to the line one paced.
Settled at the rear of the field, 2-3 wide with cover. Came widest in the final stretch and only plodded to the line.
Went forward and crossed early to lead along the paint. Faded inside the final furlong.
Slow to begin settling with the backmakers, 3 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Copped a check early then settled just behind the speed but was posted 3 wide and without cover for the duration of the trip. Never a factor.
Urged to maintain 2-wide behind midfield to home turn. Swung 4-wide and was 3Ls down on straightening. Finished off well to cut down rivals final stride.
Handy position to home straight. Hit front and looked set to victory final furlong. Nailed at post.
3-wide ahead of midfield early. Shifted 2-wide at the Rock. Peeled out and was 2Ls off turning in. Kept giving but lacked the finishing touch of the front pair.
Elected to sit 2-wide ahead of midfield early. Crowded to the fence at the Rock. Picked up fairly well inside home straight to make frame with some comfort.
Soon taken to rear on fence. Still last turning into home. Made up ground in the straight without troubling the principals.
2-wide towards rear. Hard ridden and came widest passing 500M. Made decent headway in the straight.
One-off behind leader to home straight. Failed to sustain after 350M.
Driven forward to lead on fence from 1100M. Clung on until swamped final furlong.
Always back with last few. Never progressed.
Broke fast, led early, back to third on rail, challenged early straight, led again, held on well, perfect trip.
Broke well, settled sixth rail, pulled off rail to challenge, then inside bid, ran on well.
Moderate break, squeezed back by horses either side, ridden to hold mid-rear position rail, driven for wide bid, ran on.
Well away, up to fifth but caught three wide, ridden turn, driven, kept on.
Well away, up wide to lead and cross, pressed early straight, headed, ridden, weakened.
Well away, up to fourth one off, shaken up entering straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well, ridden up to sixth one off, driven straight, maintained position but no progress.
Moderate break, driven early and aimed for rail, settled third last rail, wide bid, ran on one pace.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, ridden for inside bid, not quicken.
Moderate break, third last one off, improved three wide turn, ridden, no extra.
Moderate start, caught behind horse when being ridden for lead, ridden up wide when extracted, up to second, driven turn, weakened steadily.
Missed break, lost length, last early, ridden, no improvement.
Fair break, not rushed, fourth rail, out to challenge, led mid-straight, soon clear, comfortably.
Fair break, up to sixth one off, improved turn to share lead briefly mid-straight, winner swept past.
Fair break, up along rail to lead, challenged by second entering straight, kept on under pressure.
Taken back from wide draw, up along rail to mid-rear, inside bid, kept on without being able to threaten.
Fair break, ridden up early to share lead three wide, then back to midfield two off, wide bid, ran on, weakened slightly late.
Fair break, taken back to rear rail, mid track bid, kept on, unable to threaten.
Fair break, taken back to rear, improved to fourth last one off, mid-track bid then switched inside, kept on one pace.
Good break, settled third one off, lost pitch turn, ridden, kept on one pace.
Moderate start, wide midfield, wide bid, modest progress.
Fair break, lacked early pace, second last one off, last into straight, driven, found little.
Fair break, up to second one off, swung wide turn, ridden, no response.
Broke well, ridden early but not pace to reach lead, wide straight, shaken up, found nil.
Settled in box seat, not suited by the fast tempo, closed the race off strongly to win.
Pushed to take the rail and shared the lead, under pressure throughout at fast sectionals, hung on until 150M overhauled, ran on well for 2nd.
Very slow away, pushed to keep up in midfield, 5Ls off the leaders along the fence, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Eased 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, made ground 200M.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the fast sectionals, flattened 200M.
Bumped start, hard ridden to share the lead 2 wide, used a bit given at fast sectionals, weakened 200M.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders along the fence, benefited by the fast pace and rails run, just held ground in straight.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, made ground in straight, lack room 200M.
Eased at start, 6Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made minor ground 200M.
Slow away, pushed to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, no progress.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leaders, suited by the fast pace, but trapped 3 wide throughout, no progress.
Trapped 3 wide without cover throughout, never better than midfield, dropped off badly 500M.
Prominently placed one-off 2Ls off the speed, ran up to contest lead 500 M out, hit the front 250 M, kept on under maximum pressure, just prevailed.
Bumped at start, pushed up to hold a fence position in midfield, quickened well when asked 250 M out, finished off soundly for 2nd.
Crowded start, settled one-off in midfield, responded well when asked for efforts 300 M out, ran on soundly for 3rd.
Awkward start, urged along to hold a fence position 6Ls off the speed, finished off satisfactorily when clear 250 M, ran on for 4th.
Taken back from gate 11 and travelled 7Ls off the pace at rear, made up gradual ground final 200 M, never really troubled the principals.
Restrained early and travelled one from the rear, swung widest for home, only made limited progress final 250 M.
Pushed up to lead 1L on rail, passed 250 M out, no extra.
Settled in the one-out-one-back spot, held ground until got tired near the 200 M pole.
Travelled 3-deep with no cover, raced keenly in the early stages, moved closer at the home turn, gave no response when asked for efforts in the straight, gave ground.
Awkward start, settled in the box-seat, hung in 300 M out, blocked in the home straight, not fully tested.
Crowed start, pushed early and travelled 7Ls off the pace, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Restrained after the start, held up 2-wide in midfield 4Ls off the pace, showed a neat turn of foot on straightening and got to the front close home.
Soon driven to a one-out-one-back position from wide barrier, responded to pressure to take charge 150M out but was unable to fend off the winner in late stages.
In 4th place within striking distance, kept on evenly final 300M.
Lost ground at the start but not hurried, raced in midfield along the fence 4-5Ls behind leader, swung wide into straight and stayed on well, nearest finish.
Quickly into stride and led steadily to straight, headed inside 150M and weakened.
Settled in midpack but never far off the pace, kept on steadily in straight but inclined to hang in, steadied 100M and again near finish.
Dropped back to last from draw 12, 9Ls off the pace middle stages, progressed steadily to 50M then not able to find clear running.
In the slipstream of leader, kept on one paced, steadied 100M out and was momentarily inconvenienced.
Towards the rear, had to be taken wide for clear run, stayed on fairly.
Taken across behind runners, settled near last and was well off the pace turning for home, ran on fairly.
Slow to muster, raced towards the rear along the fence, not quickened when asked. No impression.
3-wide no cover at the back, soon left behind on straightening.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Bounced out, sat at leaders quarters throughout, took over passing 300m and ran away to score with some in hand.
Showed speed to lead, all favours in front, defied them to 250m but found winner too good thereafter, held spot late.
Jumped ok, couldn't go with first few early, 3Ls back on rails to turn, plugged on to take 3rd.
Standard jump. 2 wide behind midfield, 7Ls or so back behind midfield, in traffic turning, made some ground late to make frame.
Usual speed to hold spot on leaders back, all favours to bend, into clear but only plugged away.
Well back on rails, 8Ls or more away turning, passed a few tired runners in straight.
Ridden hard to hold a midfield position, 2 wide 3-4Ls back, no sprint at business end.
Posted 3 wide without cover 2-3Ls back, niggled turning, faded out after using too much.
Awkwardly away and slow to muster, posted 4 wide no cover throughout, faded when tough run took toll.
Caught wide and just behind midfield, had cover 5ls back to turn, didn't go on with it in straight.
No early toe, 6ls or so back on rails, struggled throughout.
No speed, trapped 3 wide 6ls of so back, struggling on bend and beaten a long way.
Showed great early speed to spear forward and lead easily along the grandstand side. Kicked well clear after the furlong and cruised to the line.

Settled in last position some distance from the bulk of the field. Commenced to tack on after the 800m. Closed off strongly whilst weaving a passage through after the 200m towards the outside rail. (See incident report.)
Chassed the on speed runners without cover when positioned closer to the middle of the course. Was nabbed close to the finish for second.
Raced near the grandstand side in second position, no cover. Peaked on its effort about 100m.
Raced closest to the inside traveling midfield. Closed off well despite wanting to lay out over the final 400m.
Raced about 3-4 off the outside fence handy to the leaders. Never really quickened when asked for an effort and steadied over the final stages to avoid heels.
Positioned along the outside rail midfield. Battled away one paced in the final stages.
Worked home evenly after racing in a midfield position with cover.
Camped on the back of the speed about 3-4 off the grandstand fence. commenced to tire inside the final 100m.
Raced behind midfield, 2-3 off the outside rail. Struggled over the final 200m.
Positioned worse than midfield 3-4 away from the outside fence. Failed to show any dash when placed under pressure from the 300m.
Settled near the tail of the field towards the centre of the course. Struggled to keep in touch throughout.
Settled with the backmakers nearer to the grandstand side. Switched inwards closer to the centre of the track passing the 400m, did nothing thereafter.
Back with last few to home straight. Found clear run outside passing 400M. Dashed strongly inside final furlong to cut down rivals home.
Never far off the pace. Well positioned to strike in the straight. Kept on well and hit front 50M. Just caught by the winner.
Rolled forward after start. Cut to the fence and led home turn. Held a 1L advantage 400M. Hung on until overhauled by the front pair final 50M.
Travelled along the fence at midfield to home turn. Made run inside home straight. Progressed steadily and nearly got 3rd.
Sat 2-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Plugged on without seriously challenging the principals.
Trapped wide early in a forward spot. Driven from 1300M and parked outside the leader home turn. Ridden inside 300M. Held ground.
Taken to 2-wide towards rear after start. Shifted 3-wide home turn. 7Ls off into final stretch wide. Covered good ground thereafter.
Behind midfield on fence to home straight. Made up some late ground.
3-wide behind midfield. Swung wide and was 6Ls down leaving the bend. Ran on early home straight but no extra gear final furlong.
Began well but caught wide. Eased to 2-wide behind midfield from 1300M. Baulked for run top of home straight. Resumed only fairly when clear.
Towards rear on fence early. Struck heels and blundered near 900M. No impression in the straight.
Taken to rear after start. Never in the hunt.
Slightly ahead of midfield early and middle stages. Faded soon after straightening.
Hard ridden early to hold the fence in a forward position. Took box-seat middle stages. Weakened badly inside final 350M.
Slightly sluggish start, settled midfield rail, ridden early straight, not pick up immediately, through gaps to lead final strides.
Broke well, up to fourth but three wide, shaken up early straight, led 50m out until last strides.
Fair break, bustled early, sixth one off, mid-track bid, ran on well, failed narrowly.
Fair break, up to third one off, challenged early straight, kept on, just outpaced.
Well away, up along rail to second, led turn, two lengths clear mid-straight, weakened.
Well away, shared early lead one off, settled fourth one off, challenged mid-straight, outpaced late.
Fair break, taken back to third last one off, wide bid, ran on quite well but never able to challenge.
Fair break, not rushed but caught three wide mid-rear, wide bid, some late response to driving.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, improved turn, two slight checks straight, kept on but never a factor.
Fair break, ridden early, midfield one off, wide bid, run flattened late.
Fair break, taken back from wide to last one off, two lengths adrift entering straight, ridden, kept on past beaten horses.
Slightly missed break, fifth last rail, ridden entering straight, very little response.
Well away, ridden to lead but not quite able to cross, joined on inside turn, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, ridden early, up along rail to fifth, ridden early straight, no progress.
Fair break, not much early pace, back to rear rail, began to improve entering turn, found gaps, driven, ran on well to lead 50m out.
Fair break, back to midfield two off, took time to settle, wide bid, ran on strongly, just failed.
Fair break, fourth rail, moved up comfortably turn, led 200m out going well, ridden, headed, weakened.
Fair break, back to second last one off, wide bid, kept on well.
Fair break, not much early pace, third last rail, shaken up early straight, kept on well but never able to challenge.
Fair break, ridden early, midfield one off, out for clear run, kept on, not pace to challenge.
Fair break, second one off, back to third rail, inside bid, modest progress.
Fair break, midfield rail, fifth into straight, ran on until flattened out late.
Fair break, up to second, ridden early straight, little progress.
Fair break, not much early pace, fourth last one off, driven, modest progress.
Missed break, lost three lengths, last early, tried to improve along rail, modest progress past beaten horses.
Broke fast, led and went clear, six lengths clear leaving back, four clear entering straight, ridden, weakened rapidly.
Fair break, ridden to join leading group, back to fifth one off, ridden, weakened.
Led easily by 1.5Ls at good pace, just hung on to win.
Settled in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, dashed well 200M, just missed win by a nose.
Dipped start, but soon obtain a forward spot, 1.5Ls off the good pace, ran on well for 3rd.
Eased to sit just off the leader, 2Ls off the good pace, checked 400M, flattened 200M.
At back, 5Ls off the good pace, ran on fairly in final stages.
Eased back, 5Ls behind the good pace, ran on ok.
Bumped start, at back, 5.5Ls off the good pace, no turn of foot.
Very awkward away, 2.5Ls off the good pace, no progress.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace, weakened 200M.
Hard ridden early, midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, emptied 400M.
Bumped start, never competitive at rear.
Easily ran up to lead 1L, responded well when asked 300 M out, kept on soundly to score, never challenged.
Prominently placed 2-3Ls off the pace, on heels 1200 M out, quickened well when asked for efforts in the home straight, finished off soundly for 2nd.
Knuckled start, raced on-paced but caught 3-wide with no cover, quickened well when asked 300 M out, ran on soundly for 3rd.
Lacked early speed as usual and travelled 7Ls off the pace, clicked into gear 250 M out, ran on strongly, too late.
Travelled cozily in the one-out-one-back spot, kept on satisfactorily early in the home straight, but couldn't find extra final 50 M.
Pushed up to hold a fence position in midfield, only one-paced when asked for efforts in the home straight.
Lacked early speed despite being urged along, blocked at the top of the home straight, only made limited progress when clear 200 M out.
Pushed hard early to take the box-seat, held ground until got tired 200 M out, soon faded.
Taken back from gate 9 and travelled 5Ls off the pace, never better than midfield, made no progress in the home straight.
Caught 3-wide with no cover in midfield early, shifted to a one-off spot rounding the bend, gave no response when asked for efforts 300 M out, soon dropped out.
Caught 3-wide in midfield early, checked 700 M out and drifted back, made no progress in the home straight.

Began awkwardly and lost ground, ended up towards the rear 7Ls off the pace, remained on the inside turning in, steered into clear 300M and quickened impressively, led 150M and kept on strongly to the line.
Positioned 2-wide towards the rear, ran on well when switched to outside on straightening, chased the winner in the final 200M, nearest finish.
Chased the pace in 3rd, kept on evenly final 400M but could make no real impression on the first two.
In midfield 3-wide and was left without cover making the turn, ran on steadily inside 400M for a non-threatening 4th.
Never far off the pace in 4th, produced with every chance but turned one-pace final 150M.
Held up behind midfield, saved ground along the fence, ran on final 400M but no extra pace to seriously challenge.
Taken across behind runners from draw 10 and raced towards the rear throughout, swung widest into straight and made only limited progress.
Slow to begin, settled behind midfield 2-wide, had difficulty obtain clear running until after 200M but ran on fairly when clear.
Held up 2-wide in midfield, kept on fairly, checked 150M and out of contention.
Raced along the fence in mid-division, made a short-lived effort on straightening, one paced final 200M.
Sped to the lead and set a decent pace at the front end, opened up a 3Ls gap leaving the home turn, weakened mid-straight and headed 150M. No extra.
Tracked leader in a strongly run race, weakened 300M out and dropped away.
Towards the rear in early stages, outpaced making the turn and soon detached from the field. Tailed-off. (Lame left hind leg.)
Settled in midfield on rail, kicked strongly when clear 300 M out and soon took the lead, drew clear easily.
Started awkwardly, settled cozily just off the speed on rail, quickened when clear 350 M out, finished off satisfactorily for 2nd, but lacked a decisive kick to challenge the winner.
Lacked early speed as usual, travelled one from the rear, urged along halfway, swung widest for home, finished off soundly under maximum pressure for a place.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, checked 1600 M out, blocked at the top of the home straight, finished off well when clear 300 M out, too late.
Given a waiting ride and travelled 6Ls off the pace, shifted wide at home turn, ran on soundly 400 M out and looked possible for a place, couldn't find extra final 100 M.
Easily ran up to share the lead, headed 250 M out, failed to keep on.
Proved difficult to settle when travelling 3Ls off the pace with cover, checked 700 M out, made some late ground when clear 300 M out, rather one-paced.
Lacked early speed as usual and travelled at the rear, urged along round the bend, quickened slowly in the home straight, made some late ground final 200 M.
Settled in midfield on rail, niggled along rounding the bend, only one-paced in the home straight.
Travelled 3-wide just off the pace, gave limited response when asked for efforts in the home straight, held ground until got tired 200 M out.
Pulled his way up to share the lead, raced greenly in the early stages, headed 300 M out, soon weakened.
Started awkwardly, on-pace but caught 3-wide with no cover, urged along at home turn to maintain position, got tired 300 M out, soon faded.
Pushed up to occupy a one-off spot 2Ls off the pace, struggled when turning for home, got tired 300 M out, soon dropped out.
Taken back from gate 14 and travelled 5Ls off the speed, never competitive. (Lost left front plate.)
Began well, posted 3 wide outside leaders without cover, aided by steady tempo, went to front easily at 300m and fought bravely to defy late challengers for another solid win.
Out nicely, assumed ideal spot behind leader, travelled well throughout, saved ground turning and kept finding to be right in mix, edged out late.
No early speed and settled at rear, 5-6Ls away on rails throughout, kept improving position turning and stoked up when in clear from 250m, flew late and unlucky not to be closer.
Faded back from an awkward draw, raced 3 wide just off midfield, had cover 5ls back on circle, didn't dash but worked home well to make frame.
Rolled forward and sat outside the leader, even run with the absence of any real speed, right there in mix turning but couldn't lift last 250m, battled on late.
Ideally positioned 1 out 1 back, had all favours 3Ls away and aided by speed, one paced in straight.
Settled behind midfield as usual, back with last few 2 wide 6Ls of so away, well back to bend, lost whip at 350m but still made some minor ground all the same.
Settled 3 wide in midfield, had cover 3Ls or so back tracking eventual winner, fair run to turn, switched wider turning but couldn't offer much and dropped off late.
Taken back soon after start to take spot on rails, next to last on rails on circle, overaced and angled wider and came 4 wide turning, no extra in straight.
Ended up taking a midfield role, fair trip 4Ls off them to bend, struggled in run to line.
Worked a bit to cross them, steadied tempo once there, headed soon after turning in and folded tamely.
No early pace, raced behind midfield, 4-5Ls back throughout but proved difficult to settle, niggled on turn and lacked usual response, ordinary in run to line.
Out in line, situated midfield 3-4Ls back, easy trip but under substantial pressure on bend, folded easily and beaten a long way.

Driven along after jump, broke 1L clear on top of the bend, briefly headed after straightening, re-gained advantage 200 M out, just held on.
Never far off, soon came to challenge upon straightening, unable to peg back winner the length of the straight.
Began with others, disputed lead throughout far side, chased leader into straight gaining narrow advantage briefly shortly afterwards, soon overhauled.
Niggled at early but failed to muster until improving towards midfield on rails up the Rock, in similar position turning in, fought on steadily in straight without threatening.
Ridden along soon after start, settled in midfield on rails, switched off rails for a run after straightening, kept on same pace in straight without quickening. (Questioned.)
Well there on rails, steadied and lost position coming out of back straight, gained closer saving ground on rails turning for home, faded gradually in straight.
Ridden along from a wide gate to be with leaders, remained wide without cover until home straight, failed to quicken under pressure.
Began awkwardly losing ground, soon recovered to better than midfield position down far side, swung wide into straight, ran home one-paced.
Soon settled in last few of bunched field, baulked for a run after straightening and forced to steady 100 M out, never recovered.
Gradually dropped to last few, swung wide into straight, made no impression in the run home.
Raced wide without cover in midfield, widest runner turning in, no extra in straight.
Began awkwardly losing ground, soon recovered to rear of field, became tailed-off after Rock, no further impression.
Travelled midfield along the paint. Kept to the fence in the home straight and found the shortest way home to grab the prize.
Had every possible chance after box seating in the run. Showed plenty of determination in the straight but came up just short.
Ridden along to lead on the fence and after coasting along in front was challenged after the 800m. Vied for leading duties thereafter and was running on empty inside the last 50m.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race, eventually tracking the leaders, 1 off with cover. Plugged away late to make the frame.
Rated second from the rear, along the rails with cover. Worked home well without threatening.
Crowded at the start settling worse than midfield the fence. made up nice ground in the run to the line.
From the outside gate was taken back to travel at the rear of the field, 1 off with cover. Ran on well late.
Raced midfield early 2 deep with cover then was sent forward after the 1000m when the tempo steadied. Dueled as equal leader after the 800m, racing 1 off no cover. Faded inside the last 50m.
Raced behind midfield 2 wide with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Travelled with the backmakers, 1 off with cover. Failed to close off and finished well down the placings.

Settled midfield 1 off with cover. Got racing when the tempo steadied near the 1000m and shifted out to travel 3 wide without cover. Rolled in to race 1 off with cover on the circle. Failed to fire thereafter.
Settled midfield, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the final stretch.
2-wide at midfield early. Improved gradually home turn and was 3Ls down turning in. Rallied on in the straight and asserted authority closing stages.
Towards rear on fence until switching out for clear run rounding home turn. 6Ls away passing 350M. Covered substantial ground to figure in quinella at the line.
Led on fence until overhauled by the strong finishing front pair final strides.
Began well but caught wide. Took box seat from first turn. Ideal position to strike in the straight. Plugged on without threatening the front trio.
One-off behind leader early and middle stages. Hard ridden approaching home straight but couldn't turn up a notch.
Ahead of midfield on fence early. Shuffled to behind midfield passing 800M. Same position leaving the bend. Made up minor ground late.
Eased to rear after start. Progressed briefly at bend but failed to sustain effort in the straight.
Back with last few always. Never picked up. (See racing incidents.)

Taken to race behind midfield after start but trapped wide and without cover. Strode forward from 900M but posted 3-wide ahead of midfield at the Rock. Struggled home turn and was well beaten on straightening.
Fair break, ridden to lead rail, kicked early straight, never challenged.
Moderate start, up along rail to fourth, rail bid, tightened up slightly by winner late, but never able to challenge.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, wide bid, ran on well.
Broke fast, second one off, back to fourth one off, driven straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, ridden but not pace to hold position, rail midfield, driven, kept on one pace.
Fair break, lacked early pace, third last rail, mid-pack run, kept on quite well late.
Broke well, ridden for lead, second one off, shaken up early straight, ridden, no progress.
Fast break, lacked early pace, midfield one off, wide bid, one pace.
Broke well, ridden for lead but caught third three wide, still wide into straight, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, ridden for lead but not enough pace, midfield one off, driven, no progress.
Fair break, ridden early, fourth last one off, slight check mid-straight, found little thereafter.
Slightly sluggish start, ridden but still slipped back to last, six lengths adrift entering straight, weakened, eased late.
Fair break, held up midfield one off, shaken up turn, challenged between horses, led near line.
Broke well, up to third on rail, restrained, inside bid, finished well but just outpaced.
Broke fast wide, up to lead and cross, kicked three clear early straight, caught and headed last 100m.
Fair break, fourth one off, mid track bid, up to second briefly, not match finish of first two.
Fair break but caught three wide midfield, wide bid, kept on quite well.
Fair break, lacked early pace, third last one off, wide bid, kept on well under driving.
Not fast away, fourth last rail, inside bid, short of room 200m out and slight check, kept on well.
Broke well, midfield rail, inside bid, making ground well when ran out of racing room, passed post on heels of leaders with no opening.
Fair break, mid-rear three wide, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Moderate break, short of early pace, last one off urged, wide run, driven, kept on but unable to challenge.
Fair break but short of early speed, back to second last, urged, ridden and kept on one pace, never able to threaten.
Fair break, ridden up to second one off, driven straight, weakened.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, closed the race off strongly to score will ease.
Eased to sit behind the pace group, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M for 2nd.
Held the rail easily and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung out in straight, overhauled 250M, ran on for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed by the slow sectionals, carried wider in straight, flattened 100M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Awkward away, hard ridden to obtain a midfield spot, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased at start to take rail and rear, 6Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Midfield on the fence, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, weakened 200M.
Urged along to share the lead on rail, quickened well when asked 250 M out, kept on soundly to win without being challenged.
Settled in the mid-division on rail, responded well when asked 300 M out, bumped 200 M out, finished off soundly for 2nd.
Bumped after start, settled one-off in midfield, raced keenly halfway, made up gradual ground final 250 M, got a place in the final stride.
Prominently placed 2Ls off the pace on rail, kept on well under maximum pressure, hung out 100 M out, just missed a place. (Abnormal breathing noise)
Slow away, pushed up to hold a fence position 5Ls off the speed, took time to quickened early in straight, finished off well final 150 M, too late.
Pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, held ground until flattened near the 200 M pole.
Taken back from gate 12, travelled wide with no cover, only made up little ground in the home straight.
Settled one-off 2Ls off the pace, held ground, bumped 200 M out, soon flattened. (Lost right front plate)
Urged along to hold a one-off spot 5Ls off the speed, only made limited progress final 200 M.
Crowded at start, soon taken towards the rear, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot in midfield, crowded 1100 M out, got tired 250 M out.
Bumped after start, soon taken towards the rear, never competitive.
Took early lead then sat back in 3rd, responded well turning in, quickened to lead 50M from home, drew away.
Vied for lead on the outside, took over 250M, kept on well but not pace of winner final 100M, headed 50M out.
Held up midfield along the fence, angled out nearing 250M for a clear passage, stayed on to go 3rd close home.
In 4th place within striking distance, kept on in straight but not pace of front pair, lost 3rd near line.
Towards the rear on inside, 7Ls off the pace at the 400M mark, stayed on but no danger final 200M.
In mid-division early, shuffled back over the turn, ran on only fairly and never going pace to reach leaders.
Went forward on inside and dueled for the lead throughout, weakened nearing 200M, no extra late stages. (Lame next day.)
Travelled 3-wide towards the rear, kept on one paced and never threatened.
Taken across behind runners after the start, over 8Ls back in last turning in, lacked a needed response and ran past beaten runners only.
Dropped back, positioned 3-wide near last, swung widest into straight but failed to pick up.
Lost a considerable amount of ground at the start, ended up in the rear over 8Ls behind leaders, not quickened turning in. (To stalls test.)
Mid-division, pushed along over home turn, weakened steadily passing 200M.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
