Began from the widest gate, held narrow advantage when gradually shifted across to race outside second, remained similar into straight, hung on under pressure.

Very slowly away, remained well behind, came under pressure around home bend, swung widest into the straight, made significant progress down centre of track to be nearest at finish. (Tactic questioned.)

Began fairly, close up early, gradually taken back to 3L 4th and then to 6th just better than midfield rounding home bend, renewed effort upon straightening, fought on steadily to be just swamped for 2nd late.
Broke well, amongst leaders early, gradually settled just off the joint leaders, soon came under pressure to challenge after straightening, kept on steadily without quickening.
Settled in midfield near rails, made modest progress in straight without threatening.
Settled in rear of midfield, kept on steadily without quickening in straight.
Soon taken back from a wide gate to settle in last few, last turning for home, ran on past well-beaten horses in the run home.
Began fairly, soon settled in forward of midfield, inconvenienced and forced to switch out for a run 350 M out, fought on steadily before finding no extra inside final 50 M. (Blood in trachea.)
Began with others, soon settled in 4th about 2Ls off the pace, became further back when pace quickened around the bend, made short-lived effort from 5th into straight, soon weakened.
Just better than midfield early stages, took closer order coming out of back straight, given reminders when 3rd some 2Ls back around the bend, soon weakened after straightening.
Settled behind midfield, kept on under pressure early in straight, no extra.
Always in last few, never seen with a chance.
Began moderately, snuck up on rails to join the leader, disputed lead around the bend and into straight, gradually weakened. (Distressed and elevated heart rate.)
Began with others, gradually dropped behind midfield, found nothing in straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Raced midfield 2-3 wide with some cover on the circle. Proved a little difficult to settle midrace but once out into clear running in the straight, lengthened well.
Went forward and led along the rails. Was tackled at the furlong and fought on well right to the post.
Rated 3 back along the fence. Chased the principals gamely all the way to the wire.
Raced in 2nd position outside the leader. Kept plugging away over the final stages to make the frame.
Box seated. Ran into some traffic problems in the straight. worked home evenly after obtaining clear running near the 300m.
Raced worse than midfield, close to the running rail with cover. Made some ground early in the straight but peaked on its run well before the line.
Taken back from a wide barrier to settle behind midfield, 2-3deep with cover. Had to steady near the 600m when tightened for room, went to the line one paced.
Raced in a midfield position, 2 wide with cover. Whacked away at the same speed in the home straight.
Raced at the rear of the field 1 off with cover, peeled out after the 700m and traveled 3-4 wide without cover. Straightened the widest & only plodded to the line.
Settled 1 out 1 back. Had every chance but failed to capitalize.
Travelled at the tail of the field along the paint with cover. Struggled when under pressure in the home straight.
Eased to rear after start. Made up ground outside rapidly passing 600M and was 3Ls down on straightening. Kept on strongly and battled well to prevail at line.
One-out-one-back to home straight. Ideal spot to strike at 400M. Fought determinedly with the eventual winner final 200M. Nailed at post.
Box-seated to home straight. Kept on behind leader until afforded clear run on fence final furlong. Dashed fairly well to land 3rd by a narrow margin.
2-wide towards rear until straightening. Ran on top of home straight and shifted out for clear run final 150M. Closed off strongly thereafter and nearly snatched 3rd.
One-off behind leader to home straight. One-paced to conclude.
Towards rear always. Beat a tired runner home.
Led on fence until no extra final furlong. Weakened closing stages.
Broke well, up to sit on leader's shoulder one off, nudged into lead early straight, kept going to win.
Fair break, not rushed, midfield one off, fourth last into straight, wide bid, ran on under driving, unable to reach winner.
Broke well, eased back to rear not settling, improved three wide turn, wide bid, kept on well.
Broke fast, settled rail, trailing leader, shaken up early straight, ran on well.
Fast away, led and crossed, joined on outside, led again into straight, headed, kept on.
Fair break, eased back to mid-rear rail, wide bid, kept on well.
Fair break, third last then back to rear early turn, wide bid, kept on well.
Slow away, up along rail to midfield, bid three off, kept on quite well in bunch finish.
Held up rear, last entering straight, bid between runners, short of room, ran on quite well.
Broke well, up to join leaders but caught four wide, ridden, kept on quite well.
Fair break, up to fourth one off, ridden and every chance, unable to quicken.
Broke well, up to leading group, back to midfield one off, ridden, found little.
Moderate break, up to fifth two off, ridden early straight, weakened.
Well away, up to second one off first turn, led entering straight, opened two length gap, held on well.
Broke well, fourth one off first turn, ran on to chase winner, never quite able to get on terms.
Taken back from wide draw, last one off, wide bid, ran on well.
Fair break, fourth one off, inside bid, kept on but unable to challenge.
Fair break, not rushed, back to fifth last one off, improved wide turn, wide bid, kept on unable to challenge.
Slightly slow into stride, settled rear rail, mid-pack run, kept on quite well.
Fair break, caught five wide first turn, midfield three wide far side, up to share second mid-straight, ridden, weakened.
Slow away, second last rail, shaken up entering straight, mid-track bid, short of room, unable to quicken.
Moderate break, midfield rail, nudged along far side, driven turn, kept on one pace.
Fair break, crossed to one off midfield, driven entering straight, not quicken.
Moderate start, ridden to midfield but caught three wide, improved wide turn, driven, no extra.
Fair break, leading group but four wide first turn, improved to third entering straight, ridden, weakened.
Well away, third on rail, ridden leaving back straight, drive, no progress, eased late.
Fair break, led and crossed, headed entering straight, ridden, found nil.
Pushed early, 4.5Ls off the good pace along the fence, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Pushed to take rail and led by 1L at good pace, hung on until 100M overhauled, ran on well for 2nd.
Pushed to dominate in front as usual, just off the good pace 2 wide, closed off strongly for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the good pace 3 wide, checked 800M and 600M, progressed steadily 300M.
Pushed to hold the rail in front of midfield, 3Ls off the good pace, blocked most straight, ran on well.
Hard ridden early but not muster, trapped 3 wide in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, made minor ground 200M.
Pushed early to keep up at rear, 8Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, ran on ok.
Very slow away, 7.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, made steady ground 200M.
Eased at start, detached at rear, 9Ls off the good pace, raced 4-5 wide throughout and lost significant amount of ground, still progressed steadily 200M.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-4 wide, flattened 200M.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no turn of foot in straight.
At back, 6.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-4 wide, ran on fairly.
Pushed to cross in front of midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, checked 800M, weakened 350M.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 4 wide throughout and lost too much ground, soon emptied 400M.
Settled 3Ls off the pace on rail, quickened well when clear 350 M out, ran on soundly down centre of the home straight, just late.
Bumped at start, pushed up to lead 1.5L on rail, headed by the winner 350 M out, kept on soundly for 3rd.
Taken back from gate 11, sat 5Ls off the pace, swung widest for home, made up gradual ground down the centre of the straight, hung in 200 M out. (Blood in trachea.)
Urged early to occupy the box-seat, only one-paced when asked for efforts 350 M out, kept on fairly without threatening the principals.
Settled one from the rear on rail, on heels 650 M out,took time to quicken early up the home straight, made up some late ground final 250 M.
Pushed hard to take a one-off spot just off the pace, one-paced early up the home straight, no extra final150M.
Taken towards the rear from gate 10, only made upsome late ground final 250 M, never really threatened the principals.
Settled 4Ls off the speed on rail, niggled along halfway,only made limited progress when asked for efforts in the home straight.
Raced on-pace but travelled 3-wide with no cover, held ground until got tired near the 200 M pole.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot in midfield, outpaced soon after being crowded at the top of the home straight,dropped out.

Placing: DISQ
Comment: Bumped at start, pushed up to hold the one-out-one-back spot, ran on to lead 350 M out, kept on soundlyunder maximum pressure, just prevailed.

Caught wide early, restrained to a rearward position 8Ls behind leaders, went through a gap 350M and showed impressive acceleration to join leader near 200M, surged ahead 150M out and kept on strongly to line.
Jumped well, prominently placed behind leaders, travelled strongly to straight and quickly accelerated to lead 350M out, joined by winner near 200M, rallied on but was well held at the finish.
Towards the rear 6-9Ls off the pace, guided to the outside for clear passage passing 500M, stayed on well to go 3rd 150M from home but offered little threat to the top two.
Held up behind mid-division, turned 3-wide over the home turn, made good progress but was sandwiched near 200M and severely checked, re-gathered and stayed on well over late stages to claim 4th.
Slowly away, driven along the fence and improved to a position ahead of midfield, had every chance in straight, moved to 3rd briefly near 200M, one paced late stages.
Broke well, restrained to a midfield position along the 2-path, difficult to settle from 1000M-800M, kept on one paced to the line.
Positioned 2-wide in midfield, angled out to clear 450M but stayed on only fairly.
Slowly away, held up mid-division along the fence, held up early straight and not pace to challenge when clear.
Not hurried early, dropped back to near last 8-9Ls off the pace, hampered 500M out, ran on only fairly from the rear.
Began awkwardly then dropped back to last over 10Ls off the pace, made a wide turn for home, badly hampered 500M out and was pushed wider, not quickened and ran past beaten runners only.
Ordinary jump, driven forward to race at the hindquarters of the leader, had little left when pressed 400M, out of contention inside 200M.
Set good early pace, led to nearing 350M, dropped out.
Positively ridden, settled just off the pace in 2nd flight, didn't respond to pressure on straightening, dropped off 300M out, heavily eased.
Caught 3-wide no cover in mid-field, under serious pressure 500M out, weakened tamely passing 400M and finished tailed-out.
Easily ran up to share the lead on 2-deep, quickenedwell when asked 400 M out, fought hard under maximum pressure, held off the furious challenger to score.
Prominently placed just off the speed, quickened 400 M to contest the lead, kept battling on under maximum pressure, couldn’t match the strides of the winner final 50 M.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, responded well when asked for efforts at the top of the home straight, finished off soundly for 3rd, but never threatened the top two.
Sat in midfield on rail, swung wide for home, finished off well down the centre of the home straight final 350M, just missed a place.
Pushed up early to hold a rail spot in midfield, made up gradual ground when clear 300 M out, bit too one-pacedand just late for a place.
Taken back from gate 14 and travelled two from the rear, niggled along at the final turn, swung widest for home, made up gradual ground final 350 M, rather one-paced.
Taken from gate 13 towards the rear, only made upsome late ground final 250 M.
Given a waiting ride and settled 10Ls off the pace, on heels 1500 M out, made up gradual ground final 350 M.
Settled one-off in midfield, urged along 700 M out,only made limited progress early up the home straight, couldn’t find extra final 100 M. (Mucus.)
Easily ran up to share the lead on rail, headed at the top of the home straight, soon weakened.
Settled in midfield on rail, held ground until got tired 200 M out, soon faded.
Pushed hard early to hold a fence position 3Ls off the speed, struggled rounding the final bend, got tired at the top of the home straight, soon dropped out.
Pushed up to a one-off spot just off the speed, flattened 300 M out, soon weakened. (Blood in trachea.)
Broke amongst first few, pressed to take up running, set terms to suit, kicked strongly at 350m and defied some smart rivals for a strong win.
Away well enough, slotted in to spot in midfield behind pace, good run 4Ls back in midfield, came 3 wide turning and chased gamely but unable to peg back winner despite gaining late.
Reasonable break, assumed ideal position 1 out 1 back, had run of race to bend, loomed strongly at 250m but couldn’t find extra final 100m.
Began nicely, assumed role on leaders back, tracked well throughout, right there turning, no extra 200m but fought on ok.
Settled 3 wide just off midfield, had cover 6Ls or so back on bend, swung wider turning and made even progress to be nearest on line.
Began best, pushed on to sit outside leader, fair run to bend, niggled turning and hung on to 200m before fading.
Drifted back to rear soon after start, more than 10Ls back at tail, took inside runs, closed ok without threatening.
Went back as usual, 3 wide at rear 9Ls off top end, came even wider turning, lacked usual finish and just made modest progress.
Ended up midfield on rails, 5-6Ls back throughout, easy time on fence to bend, lacked an extra gear and just plugged away in straight.
Ended up midfield 3 wide with cover from an awkward draw, did it tough 5Ls of so away in mid section, made a little ground in straight but saddle shifted 150 M, no run on thereafter.
Faded back from an outside draw, 8Ls away in 2 wide line, plenty to do turning, made no real progress.
Settled just behind midfield 6Ls back in 2 wide line, no excuses in run, lacked a dash in straight.
Posted 3 wide without cover 3Ls back, worked too hard to bend, was a spent force soon after and faded out.
Behind midfield on rails, 8Ls of so back to bend, unable to quicken at business end.

Began well, ridden but soon dropped to midfield, swung wide into straight, finished off race strongly down centre of the track to grab victory inside final 100 M.
Settled just worse than midfield, soon came to challenge after straightening down the centre of the track, fought on doggedly to snatch 2nd late.
Always thereabouts in 4th just over 2Ls off the speed, switched out for a run making home turn, fought on steadily but unable to match pace of winner, just caught for 2nd final stride.

Settled in midfield, checked and lost some ground coming out of back straight, saved ground turning for home, improving well from forward of midfield when forced to steady over 100 M out, fought on to the line.
Began with others, settled towards the rear, commenced run after straightening, forced to switch out for a run 300 M out, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Broke well, tracked leaders on rails, soon came to challenge upon straightening, held some chance early in straight but unable to sustain effort inside final 200 M.
Soon driven to a close up position chasing leader far side, came under pressure to hold place rounding home bend, ran home one-paced.
Quickly ridden to lead and attempted to make all, died on its run 200 M out.
Settled just better than midfield, saved ground on rails turning in, kept on same pace until finding no extra inside final 200 M.
Began with others from a wide gate, raced wide around first bend settling just better than midfield in 5th or 6th about 4Ls off the speed, remained similar until turning in, gave ground gradually.
Soon taken back to last few from the widest barrier, saved ground on rails turning for home, ran home one-paced.
Never a factor.
Slightly slow out, quickly recovered to midfield, raced wide without much cover far side and lost position rounding home bend, never recovered. (Lame next day.)
Soon dropped to tail-end, detached from halfway out. (Blood in trachea.)
Rated 1 out 1 back. Grabbed the lead at the 100m and hit the line well.
Speared forward and parked outside the leader. Took the lead near the furlong but was rounded up inside the 100m.
Enjoyed the run of the race stalking the leader. Kept on one paced in the run to the finishing post.
Slow to begin settling worse than midfield the fence. railed up in the home straight and closed off soundly to make the frame.
Made its run from well back, 2-3 wide with cover. Closed off fairly down the outside.
Taken back from a wide barrier to settle near last along the paint with cover.. Had some traffic problems midway in the straight, battled away over the final stages.
Camped midfield, 2 deep with cover. Only plodded to the line.
Settled in 5th position, 3 wide without cover. Offered nothing when asked for an effort in the final stretch. Pulled up lame in the left fore leg the following day.
Sent forward and led along the fence. had one travelling on its outside for most of the trip on the circle, faded inside the final furlong.
Began awkwardly settling near the tail of the field 3-4 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Travelled with the backmakers, 2-3 deep with cover. Copped a slight check near the 700m but despite this was well beaten in the home straight.
Didn’t begin well and was steadied soon after the jump. Thereafter was posted 4-5 wide without cover at the rear. Never looked likely.
Jumped well. Rolled to lead on fence 900M. Held a 1L advantage turning in. Widened the break by 3Ls inside final furlong but was seriously challenged closing stages. Just lasted.
2-wide at midfield early. Moved closer and shifted 3-wide turning into home. 3Ls behind the leader inside 200M and kept chasing hard. Just denied in a ding-dong finish.
Midfield near the fence to home straight. Kept giving to hold 3rd narrowly.
Well enough away but was trapped wide. Gradually taken to race 3-wide behind midfield from 900M. Swung wider on straightening and finished off satisfactorily to make frame.
2-wide behind midfield to home straight. Ran on fairly well and nearly made frame.
One-off behind leader. Remained one-paced in the straight until weakened final stages.
Began very awkwardly and lost a considerable amount of ground. Tacked on the back of the field on fence 900M. Peeled out into final stretch and made decent headway.
Behind midfield on fence to home straight. Beat tired runners home.
Wide and without cover ahead of midfield to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch thereafter and faded final 150M.
Tracked leader on fence to home straight. Found nothing when the race got serious.
Away in line. Gradually eased to race 2-wide towards rear early. Same position home turn. No show in the straight.
Back and wide with last few always. Never in the hunt.
Fair break, urged early to fifth rail, brought three wide for mid-track bid, led 200m out, ran on well.
Taken back from wide draw, last by three lengths, ridden leaving back straight, wide bid, finished strongly, just failed.
Not fast away, settled midfield rail, inside bid straight, caught behind horses and blocked, ran on well when out, too late.
Broke well, taken back to mid-rear one off, bid between runners, ran on but not quite pace to challenge.
Fair break, up to share third rail, inside bid, kept on but no kick.
Fair break, ridden early, midfield one off, improved wide turn, one pace.
Fair break, ridden for lead, not pace to get there, shared third one off, challenged two off rail, weakened late.
Fair break, ridden early, led till mid-straight, headed, weakened.
Moderate start, not rushed, rail mid-rear, inside bid, good progress until checked by weakener, no chance thereafter.
Fair break, sought rail but route blocked, settled third last three off, improved wide turn, ridden, no kick.
Fast away, ridden to second one off, challenged leader turn, not get past, weakened.
Broke well, sixth one off, mid-track bid, little response.
Fair break, six wide and bump first turn, three wide far side, tried to improve wide, ridden, found nil.
Fair break, taken back but still caught wide first turn, second last two off, ridden, found nil.
Broke well, led rail, kicked mid-straight, held on well.
Broke well, ridden early but caught three wide, still wide turn, ran on strongly, post came too soon.
Broke well, taken back to fourth last one off, inside bid, path blocked, ran on well when gap came.
Moderate break, third last three off, last into straight, wide bid, kept on well.
Broke well, sat on leader’s shoulder one off, challenged early straight, not get past, weakened.
Broke well, ridden and outpaced early, rear entering straight, rail bid, short of room, ran on well late.
Moderate break, midfield one off, up to third mid-straight, driven, flattened out.
Missed break, five lengths last, ridden early, up on rail to narrow third mid-straight, flattened out.
Fair break, ridden to join leaders three wide, back to third, ridden, no extra.
Broke well, sixth one off, ridden early straight, one pace.
Moderate start, up to fourth rail, ridden, weakened.
Moderate break, midfield three off, angled out turn, ridden, no progress.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, lacked room 400M, dashed well when clear to score.
Pushed to obtain a prominent spot, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield early, trapped 3 wide throughout, moved forward 900M, took advantage from the slow pace, led 300M, overhauled 100M, ran on for 3rd.
Midfield on the fence, 4.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, held up 4-2, demonstrated strong finishing efforts when clear.
Pushed early, 6Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M, run ended 100M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit in midfield early, moved up 1000M, sat just off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the slow tempo, weakened 250M.
Pressed forward, checked early, 2.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened in straight.
Took rail easily and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, emptied 300M.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls behind the slow pace on the fence, weakened 400M.
Eased back, never a factor, tailed out.
Lacked early speed and travelled rearward, niggled along at the bend, swung widest for home, dashed strongly when asked 350 M out, hit front 50 M out, drew clear.
Pushed hard to occupy a one-off spot just off the speed, ran on to contest the lead early in the home straight, briefly led 100 M out, but soon caught by the winner.
Slow away, taken back from gate 11 and travelled 7Ls off the pace, quickened well when asked 300 M out, bumped 50 M out, kept on soundly for 3rd. (Lame in left fore leg)
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot in midfield, on heels 600 M out, finished off satisfactorily final 250 M, bumped 50 M out, just missed a place.
Easily ran up to share the lead on rail, kept on satisfactorily when placed under pressure in the home straight, headed 100 M out, no extra.
Lacked early speed as usual and travelled one-off in midfield, checked 600 M out, made up gradual ground final 350 M, never really troubled the principals.
Pushed up to take the one-out-one-back spot, kept on satisfactorily early in the home straight, couldn't find extra final 100 M.
Very slow away, urged along early to try to catch up, 6Ls away turning for home, finished off satisfactorily final 300 M, too late.
Taken back from gate 12, proved difficult to settle when travelling 3-wide with no cover in midfield, strode forward halfway, held ground until flattened 150 M out.
Pushed up to take the box-seat, held ground until got tired 200 M out, soon faded. (Lame in left hind leg)
Pushed hard to hold a fence position in midfield, got tired 300 M out, soon faded.
Pushed hard early and travelled 2-3Ls behind the pace, flattened at the top of the home straight, soon dropped out.
Held up 4Ls back in midfield along the 2-path, nudged along 600M out, stayed on well in straight, did best work late and got up near finish.
Travelled strongly in 4th place and never far off from leaders, surged to the lead 150M out, kept on but was caught close home.
Taken across to the rail before the turn and settled behind mid-division, shifted out to clear 300M, closed off well and got up for 3rd near the line.
Driven forward and set steady pace, kept on well enough in straight, headed near 150M, flattened out late and lost 3rd place near line.
Patiently ridden in a rearward position, 6Ls off the pace at 400M, ran on steadily to the line but not reaching leaders.
Restrained in last over 8Ls off the pace, turned very wide halfway round the home turn, finished off only fairly. (Blood in trachea.)
Held up near last, raced along the 3-path and taken wider making the home turn, made limited progress only over final 300M.
Along the fence not far off leaders in 5th place, switched out near 600M, soon pushed along but couldn't step up a gear, one-paced to the finish.
Raced in a one out one back position reluctantly, loomed a threat early straight but had no more to give final 150M, weakened rapidly. ( Jockey questioned re his riding position.)
Broke well and tracked leaders, came under pressure nearing 400M, gradually weakened from 300M.
Caught 3-wide no cover in midfield, outpaced halfway round the home turn, soon behind on straightening, eased mid-straight.

Began from the widest barrier, raced wide with cover behind midfield far side, shuffled back to last few coming out of back straight, ran home well to snatch victory over 50 M out.
Soon taken across from a wide gate to settle at the back, widest runner turning in, made up good ground down centre of the track to do best work late.
Wide in prominent position far side, disputed lead around home bend hitting front inside 200 M, unable to sustain effort and caught final strides.
Mainly in rear of midfield, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Raced wide in forward of midfield, still wide in similar position turning for home, kept on steadily without quickening.
In rear of midfield, saved ground turning for home, tight run on rails early in straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Mostly in forward of midfield, saved ground turning in, ran home one-paced.
Always prominent until fading out of contention inside final 200 M.
Settled in tail-end, baulked for a run after straightening, obtained clear passage inside final 200 M, kept on to the finish.
Soon took up running and led to 300 M, weakened under pressure.
Ridden to a prominent position early, gradually settled in forward of midfield, similar turning in, one-paced before finding no extra inside final 200 M.
Midfield, wide into straight, gradually weakened under pressure.
Began moderately, soon picked up along rails to be just off the pace in 3rd, held similar spot to straight, weakened under pressure inside final 300 M.
Soon dropped to last few, never seen with a chance.
Pushed to take rail and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on to win.
In front of midfield, 5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly for 2nd.
Eased to sit 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off strongly for 3rd.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, held 2nd until 100M, very one paced.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, 6.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 250M.
Eased to sit 2.5Ls off the leaders, suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 7.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Very awkward away, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow sectionals, showed little dash 200M.
Eased at start to cross behind the field, 9Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash in straight, lack room 200M.
Eased back, 9Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, just ran on ok.
Very slow away, at tail, more then 10Ls off the leader 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 200M.
At back on the fence, 8Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, no progress.
Not suited by the slow pace, never a factor.

Away in line but trapped wide. Gradually eased to 3-wide towards rear from 1000M. Looked unlikely when 5Ls down at 400M but picked up very well final furlong to cut down leader closing stages in emphatic fashion.

Enjoyed best possible run to home straight. Picked up gradually 350M. Looked set for victory when 2Ls clear final furlong but was swept by the strong finishing winner near the post. Held 2nd by a fair margin.
Closed to the pace early. Hung out and dropped to midfield making home turn. Ran on well despite hanging out in the straight. Landed 3rd with comfort but no hope with the front pair.
Behind midfield early. Improved to the back of leaders on fence turning in. Kept on steadily to the line.
Bumped and became unbalanced at start. Failed to muster early and settled 2-wide behind midfield home turn. Soon afforded clear run in the straight but couldn’t turn up a notch.
Strode forward from wide barrier after start. Slotted one-out-one-back home turn. Good spot to strike in the straight but couldn’t' find extra gear.
Taken to 2-wide towards rear after start. Took inside run home. Covered some ground in the straight before checking twice inside final 200M. Not fully tested.
Urged early and shared lead on fence home turn. Stayed in front until peaked 250M.
Towards rear near the fence early. Improved to midfield rounding home turn. Plugged on home straight until checked 300M. Resumed fairly.
At rear to home straight. Beat tired runners home wide.
Began well. Parked outside leader home turn. Found nothing when asked top of home straight and weakened badly inside 150M.
3-wide behind midfield to home straight. No impression thereafter.
3-wide ahead of midfield early. Left without cover at midfield home turn. Faded soon after straightening.
Travelled wide and without cover at midfield to home straight. Compounded well before the post.
Broke fast, second one off, joined leader 250m out, long duel, nostril in front on line.
Jumped fast, led, challenged 250m out, long duel, just failed.
Moderate start, ridden to keep mid-rear rail, finished well under pressure.
Slow start, quickly up to midfield three off, kept on well late but never able to challenge.
Fair break, quickly into stride, tacked across towards near rail, third one off, weakened late.
Fair break, not rushed, near rail, ridden halfway, blocked for run when making some progress.
Broke well, settled one off tracking leaders, ridden halfway, not pick up, weakened late.
Fair break, tacked across towards near rail, midfield three off, ridden, no extra.
Fair break, ridden early, tracked leader rail, ridden halfway, driven, weakened.
Fair break, stayed wide, near leaders halfway, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, ridden early, wide, driven, weakened.
Moderate start, lacked early speed, jostled slightly, ridden, no progress.
Sluggish start, mid-pack midfield, ridden halfway, weakened.
Missed break, never on terms, driven, found nil.
Fair break, midfield one off, out for mid-track bid, ran on strongly to lead 150m out and draw away.
Fair break, caught wide three off, midfield into straight still wide, ran on very well under driving.
Broke well, settled sixth rail, inside bid, kept on but no kick.
Fair break, up to fourth one off, mid-track bid, not match winner’s pace, weakened late.
Broke well, led and crossed, ridden 300m out, headed, weakened.
Broke well, back to rear one off, shaken up approaching straight, ran on but unable to challenge.
Moderate break, ridden early, third last one off, driven early straight, kept on but never able to threaten.
Fair break, ridden up to second one off, challenged leader early straight, not match stronger finishers.
Fair break, taken back to rear one off, wide bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, up along rail to third, ridden early straight, one pace.
Sluggish start, ridden early, mid-rear one off, shaken up entering straight, no progress.
Slow away, rear rail, rousted entering straight, wide bid, no progress.
Moderate break, three wide mid-rear, ridden, found nil.
Missed break badly, ridden up to mid-rear rail, driven but no impression, eased late.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M to win.
Awkward away, pushed forward to cross, shared the lead at fast sectionals 2 wide, led 400M, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled, ran on for a creditable 2nd.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders 3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made steady ground 400M for 3rd.
Eased to sit just off the leaders, not suited by the fast tempo, ran on ok in final stages.
Slow away, 6.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M.
Awkward away, hard ridden forward, 3.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 4 wide throughout and not suited by the fast pace, held ground in straight.
Eased at start to cross at rear, 7Ls off the leaders on the rails, benefited by the fast pace, held up 4-2, checked 300M, made steady ground when clear.
Hard ridden forward, used up too much fuel during the fast early sectionals, sat just off the leaders in middle stages, weakened 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide and raced very keenly, 2.5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the fast tempo, out of fuel 300M.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, however no progress in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, suited by the fast tempo, emptied 250M.
Pushed forward, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, weakened 300M.
Hard ridden to take the rail and shared the lead at red hot sectionals, faded 400M.
Midfield, trapped 4 wide throughout, dropped off badly 500M.
Easily ran up to share the lead, raced keenly when restrained halfway, quickened well when asked 450 M out, kept on strongly to score.
Settled one-off in midfield, blocked early in the home straight, hung in late, quickened well when clear 200 M out, finished off soundly for 2nd.
Taken to rear from gate 11, swung widest for home, finished off strongly final 400 M for 3rd. (Bled.)
Handy but caught 3-wide with no cover, hung out throughout the trip, one-paced in the home straight.
Prominently placed on rail just off the pace, kept on fairly well when placed under pressure in the home straight but lacked a kick to challenge the principals.
Settled one-off just behind the speed, quickened well when asked 400 M out, kept on satisfactorily, couldn't find extra final 50 M.
Settled one from the rear on rail, only made limited progress in the home straight.
Urged along to take a fence position in midfield, only one-paced when asked for efforts in the home straight.
Slow away, lacked early speed and travelled one-off behind the mid-division, hung out 900 M out, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Pushed up to hold a 3-wide spot just off the speed, gave no response when asked for efforts 400 M out, soon weakened. (Roar.)
Pulled his way up to share the lead on 2-deep, raced keenly halfway, got tired early in the home straight, finished tailed out.
Positioned 2-wide in mid-division, responded strongly when asked and powered clear of his pursuers in the last 200M.
Settled in midfield 4-5Ls off the pace, out into clear nearing 300M, ran on well final 200M but not pace of winner.
Travelled behind midfield, turned 3-wide over the home turn, stayed on for 3rd but made little impression on the winner.
Never far off the pace, came with a strong looking challenge inside 350M, led briefly but was readily outpaced by the top three over final 200M.
Towards the rear along the inside, made steady progress to 150M, one-paced final stages.
Held up last but one, swung widest into straight, finished off fairly, just held ground final 200M.
Held up at the rear 8Ls off the pace, moved away from fence 600M out, stayed on without threat.
Caught wide early, moved to a one out one back position before the turn, no extra pace to challenge in straight, faded out of contention inside 300M.

Restrained after the start but over-raced from 1300M, allowed to stride forward but remained 3-wide without cover throughout, not quickened under pressure and gave ground passing 300M. (Blood in trachea.)
Showed early speed to get to a forward position tracking leader, box-seated turning in and had no clear run to the line.
Soon driven to the front, led uncontested to 250M, weakened rapidly final 100M.
Pushed up early, handy but caught wide with no cover, ran up to share the lead rounding the bend, quickened when asked 400 M out, kept on soundly, just prevailed.
Bumped start, prominently placed one-off in midfield, on heels 800 M out, contested the lead 350 M, had every chance, kept on soundly, narrowly beaten.
Pushed up early, travelled 3-wide in midfield, responded well when asked for efforts 400 M out, ran on well for 3rd.
Taken to the rear from gate 14, swung widest for home, finished off strongly down centre of the home straight, just late for a place.
Handy but caught 4-wide with no cover, raced keenly halfway, kept on satisfactorily in the home straight, on heels 250 M out, unlucky to miss a place.
Settled 3-wide in the mid-division, bumped 800 M out, made up gradual ground final 300 M, rather one-paced.
Pushed up early, caught wide in midfield and soon eased towards the rear, finished off satisfactorily final 350 M, but too late.
Pushed hard early to hold a one-off spot just off the speed, only one-paced when placed under pressure in the home straight.
Prominently placed in the box-seat, failed to keep on at the top of the home straight, soon dropped out.
Pushed hard early to share the lead, headed 350 M out, soon got tired.
Travelled keenly when restrained in the one-out-one-back spot, got tired 300 M out, soon faded.
Crowded at start, travelled one-off in the mid-division, raced keenly early, failed to make up any ground.
Crowded at start, settled in midfield on rail, weakened 300 M out, gave ground. (Bled and lame in right fore.)
Taken back from gate 12, rearward throughout, never competitive.
Even break, raced in midfield 4Ls or so back, came 2 wide on bend, tracked nicely to 400m and set out after leaders, fought most of straight gaining upper hand late.
Plenty of early pace as expected, took ideal spot behind leaders, had run of race and came 2 wide on bend, loomed turning and led until 50m but lost out narrowly late.
Out well enough, gradually worked up rails to be first behind leader, all favours in run, gained gap turning but couldn’t dash with principals at 300m, stuck on well.
Taken back and slotted in along rails, raced 6Ls back just off midfield, saved ground on bend, kept to task well and stayed on to make frame.
Midfield 2 and 3 wide throughout, 4Ls back on circle, didn’t quicken but kept to task evenly in straight.
No early pace, 7Ls or so away in rear division on fence, improved with rails run on turning, made steady ground despite not much room last 100m.
Bit tardy into stride, posted 3 wide 4 wide on bend 6Ls or so back, tough run to turn, just held ground in straight.
Faded back and raced 3 wide at rear 7-8Ls back, had cover throughout, made gradual progress down middle but never really looked likely.
Showed customary speed, took up running and set an even tempo with pressure from outside, headed at 300m and dropped off thereafter.
Slow into stride, at rear nearly 10Ls back, niggled turning, made only minor progress.
Ended up in midfield 5ls or so away, raced 3 wide with a trail on circle, lacked usual finish and just battled to line.
Went forward from an awkward draw and pressured leader early, worked a bit outside leader early, still there but niggled turning, faded from 300m.
Well back, 2 wide 8Ls or so away throughout, didn’t respond in straight.
Pressed forward but posted 3 wide without cover, used too much to bend, dropped out soon after turning.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began with others, settled just off the leader of the main group far side, came within 3Ls of one-time tear-away pacemaker turning for home, fought on well to just get up on line.
Held a prominent position in the main group behind the tear-away leader, switched wide from within striking distance turning in, fought on gamely down centre of straight to miss narrowly.
Began awkwardly, settled in midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Jostled at start losing ground, travelled behind midfield until straight, ran home nicely to do best work late.

Attempted to make all, soon drew clear a tear-away leader by as many as 8Ls far side, came back to the main group rounding home bend but still held 1L advantage turning for home, just swamped final strides. (Jockey warned.)

Soon restrained from a wide gate to race at the back of the field, remained same when widest of all runners turning for home, finished off race strongly down the centre of the straight, did best work late.

Quickly into stride to cross for rails from the widest barrier, led the main group just trailing the tear-away leader by 8Ls far side, came within 1L of leader when its pace slackened rounding home bend, kept on steadily.
Began fairly and niggled at early, not far off the leader of the main group far side, became midfield rounding home bend, kept on steadily under pressure in the run home.
Soon settled at the back, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Settled behind midfield, made short-lived effort around home bend, ran home one-paced.
Settled in midfield, commenced run at Rock to reach 3rd when wide around home bend, soon weakened after straightening. (Lame next day.)
Made no show. (Lame next day.)
Led early then handed up near the 1200m, box seating along the paint. Surged to the lead passing the final furlong and kept on nicely to the wire.
Camped in second position outside the leader, no cover. Stayed on soundly in the final stretch.
Took control of the race near the 1200m settling along the fence. Set even fractions and fought gamely after being headed near the 150m.
Parked 1 out 1 back. Worked home steadily to stay in the frame.
Slow to begin travelling midfield, 3 wide with cover. Swung wide on the final turn but reached its peak near the 100m and was one paced thereafter.
Rated behind midfield 1 off with cover. Angled out 5 deep on the home turn & made some late ground without threatening.
Travelled 3 back along the paint with cover. Commenced to give some ground after the 500m and in the home straight failed to find any extra.
Raced in last position along the rails with cover. Kept to the inside in the straight and whacked away at the same pace over the final furlong.
Settled worse than midfield the fence. Only plodded home.
Jumped on terms then from a wide barrier was taken back. Was unable to gain cover and was posted 3 wide midfield for most of the trip. Never likely.
Showed no early speed and settled at the rear of the field on the rails. Worked off the fence after the 900m racing 2-3 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Travelled 3 wide behind midfield with cover. Struggled in the run to the line.
Soon led on fence. 2Ls clear top of home straight. Kept on strongly until seriously challenged closing stages. Clinging on by a narrow margin.
Ridden early to track leader on fence. 2Ls back entering home straight. Kept chasing and posed serious threat to the leader final stages. Post came too soon.
Rolled to sit 2-wide ahead of midfield. Swung out on straightening and kept on steadily for a non-threatening 3rd.
Hard ridden early but insufficient speed to lead. Eased to 2-wide behind midfield at the Rock. Niggled on bend and made up some late ground home straight.
Always midfield on fence. One-paced to conclude.
Towards rear on fence. Closed off fairly in home straight.
Towards rear to home straight. Covered minor ground late.
Slow to begin and raced at rear. Beat a tired runner home.
One-off behind leader until weakened after 300M.
Broke well, always close up tracking leader, took inside run final 300M, hit the front 50M out and prevailed in a close finish.
Sat handily just off the pace, travelled strongly throughout, responded well and looked the likeliest winner going into 100M only to lose out in a head-bobbing finish.
Restrained on jumping from draw 12 and travelled in a 3-wide position out the back, made up a lot of ground when brought widest on straightening, nearest finish.
From draw 11 driven forward to find the lead, kept responding to urgings from 300M and was only worn down nearing 50M.
Began well, held inside running in midfield, kept on well final 300M, nearest finish.
Not hurried in early stages, crossed to a 2-wide position behind midfield, kept on evenly having had every chance.
Dropped back to last 7-8Ls off the pace, stayed on from the rear without threatening.
Raced in a 2-wide position in midfield, plugged on at one pace, never a real threat.
Began awkwardly, raced behind midfield along the inside, steadied 600M, made a short-lived effort early straight, flattened out late stages.
Blundered at the start, kept 3-wide without cover in midfield, not quickened under pressure.
Held up out the back, last turning in about 7Ls off leader, gave limited response only.
From a wide draw hard driven early to go forward, sat just behind the pace along the 2-path, found nothing under pressure and was eased off inside 200M. (Blood in trachea.)
Soon crossed to the rail under positive riding and travelled nicely on the heels of the leader, took lead 200M and accelerated away for a comfortable win.

Sent to the front and took them along steadily, put up a brief resistance when challenged by the winner early straight, lost lead 200M, faded late stages and just held on for 2nd but finished well clear of the remainder.
Had the rail draw and held a midfield position along the inside, chased the runaway leaders from 300M, ran on well at the finish and just missed out 2nd place.
Caught wide early stages, restrained to last place before the first turn, 6Ls off the pace turning in, made limited progress only and no impression on the top three.
Settled in chasing group one off the fence, kept on one paced to the line.
Held up towards the rear along the 2-path, couldn't step up a gear final 300M, finished off at the same pace.
Dropped back to near last, saved ground on the inside, responded fairly and never found the pace to challenge.
Restrained after the start then crossed to a 3-wide spot at the back, last turning in, didn't have a clear run early straight and was steadied 200M.
Behind midfield and travelled 3-wide without cover for most of the trip, under pressure inside 500M but didn't respond to urging, bumped near 200M and eased out of the race.
Driven to a forward position outside leader, came under serious pressure nearing 400M, soon weakened turning in.
Raced along the 3-path but never far off from the pace in the first half, struggled to keep up rounding the home turn, soon left behind.
Caught wide going into the first turn, strode forward to a 3-wide position outside the lead, outpaced passing 500M and gave ground rapidly in straight. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Pushed to share the lead 2 wide, benefited by the track pattern that favouring front runners, ran on strongly to the line to score.
Hard ridden to take the rail and shared the lead, benefited by the track pattern that favouring front runners, closed the race off strongly, just beaten by a neck in 2nd.
Hard ridden to occupy prominent spot 2 wide, benefited by the track pattern that favour front runners, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leaders along the rails, crowded 400M, not suited by the track pattern that favour front runners, made some ground 200M.
Eased at start to get cover at rear, 7.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, demonstrated very strong finishing efforts 150M despite not suited by the track pattern that favour front runners.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders on the rails, not suited by the track pattern that favour front runners, dashed well 200M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders, trapped 2-3 wide, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the track pattern that favour front runners.
Bumped start, 4.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, not suited by the track pattern favouring front runners, little dash in straight.
Bumped start, hard ridden but not muster, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the track pattern favouring front runners, made ground 200M.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 2-3 wide, not suited by the track pattern that favouring front runners, hung in 300M, checked 100M, just held ground.
Slow away, hard ridden to keep up at rear, 7.5L s off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the track pattern that favour front runners, no progress.
Trapped 3 wide outside the leaders throughout, emptied 300M.
Bumped at start, settled one-off in midfield, quickened well when asked 500 M out, hit the front 250 M out, drew clear easily.
Crowded at start, settled 5Ls off the pace on rail, blocked early in the home straight, quickened well when clear 150 M out, ran on soundly for 2nd.
Settled one-off just behind the pace, over-raced early and halfway, checked 1000 M out, hung in 250 M out, finished off soundly for 3rd.
Lightly pushed to share the lead, headed 250 M out, kept on satisfactorily under maximum pressure, just missed a place.
Settled in midfield on rail, bumped 500 M out, responded well when asked for efforts 300 M out, ran on steadily, just late for a place.
Settled in midfield on rail, crowded 1400 M out, ran on well when clear 250 M out, just late for a place.
Bumped at start, settled cozily in the box-seat, crowded 250 M, only one-paced in the home straight.
Taken towards the rear from gate 10, on heels 1200 M out, made up little ground 300 M out, on heels 150 M out, no extra.
Urged along to share the lead on 2-deep, hung in 250 M out, soon weakened.
Awkwardly started and crowded, urged early and travelled one-off in midfield, bumps 500 M out, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Close up to the pace throughout, tracked leader in 3rd making the home turn, shifted out to clear 250M, took off inside 150M and powered away from the 2nd. Won with ease.

Tracked leader along the rail early, turned 2-wide entering back straight, picked up well from 400M and moved to the lead nearing 250M, kept on well but had no answer to the winner’s late surge final 100M.
Held up midfield along the inside, pushed along nearing 400M, stayed on well to go 3rd 100M out under hands and heels riding. (Jockey fined for dropping the whip early straight.)
Dropped back to a rearward position after the start, taken to 4-wide approaching home turn but eventually directed back to the inside nearing 400M, ran on well from off the pace.
Positioned 2-wide in midfield, driven along 500M out, kept on evenly to the line but found less than expected.
Held up behind midfield and looked to be travelling strongly throughout, went clear inside 300M, stayed on without threatening.
Sent to the front soon after the start and led uncontested, came under pressure nearing 400M but could find no extra under a forceful ride, headed 250M out, eased passing 100M.
Forwardly placed in 3rd in the first half, pushed 3-wide no cover from 900M, ran on one-paced final 300M. (Jockey advised not to cover unnecessary ground.)
Towards the rear over 10Ls back in early stages, driven 450M out but could only make limited progress, never threatened.
Towards the rear, made a short-lived effort when taken to 4-wide halfway round the home turn, flattened out passing 200M. (Lame next day.)
Began awkwardly and raced in clear last for the first half of the race, made a bold move from 800M round the outside of field, weakened and no extra nearing 200M.
Caught 3-wide no cover in midfield, outpaced approaching the entrance of home straight, soon out of contention.

Began awkwardly from a wide draw losing ground, soon ridden out wide down far side to take up running passing 1200 M, led or disputed lead on rails around the bend, gained a 1L break under pressure 200 M out, just held on to the line.
Began well, soon taken back to race in midfield, similar turning in, fought on steadily under pressure to be nearest at finish.

Broke well from the widest barrier, soon taken back to race in last few, saved ground turning in, did not find much room early in straight and baulked until 200 M out, finished off race well to do best work late.

Began moderately, settled just off the pace before going forward to join the leader coming out of back straight, disputed lead turning for home, hanging in when unable to sustain effort over 200 M out, one-paced.
With leaders early, soon settled in 5th or 6th within 3Ls of speed, ran home steadily without threatening.
Not far off the speed far side, remained similar turning in, kept on before coming one-paced inside final 200 M.
Began awkwardly losing ground, soon settled in midfield on rails, ran home one-paced from a similar position into straight.
Jumped well, soon settled in last few, wide turn, ran home one-paced under pressure down the centre of the track.
Began fairly, raced outside leader early before settling in one-out-one-back position, similar turning for home, yielded ground steadily after straightening.
Began with others, soon settled just worse than midfield, saved good ground on rails turning in, ran home one-paced.
Showed early speed to lead early stages, ceded advantage to travel one-back in 4th on rails around the bend, angled off rail for a run entering straight, faded gradually.
Began awkwardly losing ground, remained in last few throughout, made no impression in the run home.
Lost considerable ground at start, soon ridden forward to join the backmarkers, trailed the field throughout.
Travelled with the backmakers 2-3 wide with cover. Rolled out rounding the home turn and let down nicely along the outside to have the race in hand after the furlong.
Coursed 3 wide without cover, midfield. Maintained a good gallop right to the finish.
No luck posted worse than midfield 4-5 wide without cover for most of the trip. Fought on gamely despite the tough run and overracing early.

Jumped well then from a wide barrier was taken across behind runners shortly after the start to settle near the rear of the field 3 wide with cover. Came widest on the home turn and ran on strongly to make the frame.
Raced midfield, 2 wide with cover. Straightened 3 wide and closed off soundly.
Began awkwardly then settled behind midfield 3wide with cover. Peeled out after the 600, racing 4 wide without cover. Straightened up about 5 wide and never threatened.
Closed off nicely from a rearward position, 2 wide with cover. Took runs through the field in the straight but copped interference near the 50m and should have finished much closer.
Tracked the 2 leaders in 4th position with cover, 1 off. Had no excuses.
Made its run from last position. Railed up in the straight and worked to the wire evenly.
Enjoyed the run off the race box seating. Weakened over the final stages after having every chance.
Raced keenly in second position outside the leader. Went fast in front and failed to keep on in the run to the line, fading over the concluding stages.
Travelled behind midfield the rails. Kept towards the inside in the straight but failed to close off when asked for an effort over the latter stages.
Ridden along early to lead along the fence at a solid clip. Compounded in the final stretch. (See incident report.)
Rated close to midfield the paint with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Jumped well. Rolled to the stand's side and led passing 600M. Always had enough to contain rivals home.
Fair start but soon resumed a forward spot. Parked on stand's rail behind leader at 600M. Chased hard inside 300M but couldn't catch the winner.
Raced within 2Ls of the pace. Pressured 400M and kept on steadily. No hope with the front pair but beat the rest by a fair margin.
Urged early and raced behind midfield. Made run passing 400M and plugged on for a non-threatening 4th.
Away in line and sat midfield. Pressed from 400M and was one-paced to conclude.
Ahead of midfield throughout. Never found extra gear to threaten the principals.
Tracked leader early and middle stages. Found nothing when asked from 400M.
Ahead of midfield early. Hard ridden from middle stages to maintain position but never picked up.
At rear early. Improved slightly to a spot behind midfield midpoint. Never nearer.
Raced at the back of the main bunch. Never likely.
Settled behind midfield on stand's rail. Became unbalanced and lost ground when reluctant to maintain position outside runner 600M. Never recovered.
Always at rear. Never in the hunt.
Given reminder early to stay midfield. Ridden from 500M but no response. Beaten well before post.
At last throughout. No impression.
Broke well, sixth three wide, wide bid, led 200m out, ran on well.
Broke well, ridden up to share lead one off, narrow lead early straight, outpaced.
Slightly missed break, fourth last rail, shaken up early straight, ran on well.
Broke fast, led early rail, joined by two horses, ridden, kept on one pace.
Fair break, settled fifth one off,ridden early straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, up wide to share lead two off, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, short of early pace, second last one off, driven, kept on one pace.
Broke well, led early, soon headed, fourth rail, inside bid, found little.
Fair break, short of early pace, last rail, ridden straight, not much room, no impression.
Fair break, not much early pace, held up fourth last three wide, ridden early straight, no impression.
Broke well, comfortable on rail in sixth, pulled out and shaken up turn, slow to respond then ran on very strongly to win going away.
Fair break, midfield one off, wide bid, ran on well.
Broke well, settled fourth one off, shaken up early straight, led 250m out, not match winner's kick.
Fair break, taken back to third last one off, wide bid, strong late run.
Bobbled start, last early rail, last into straight, ran on under driving, finished well.
Good break, led and crossed, led to mid-straight, headed, weakened.
Moderate start, fourth last one off, bid between horses, kept on late.
Fair break, not rushed early, fifth last rail, inside bid, kept on, no kick.
Fair break, taken back to rear one off, improved wide turn, modest progress, no kick.
Fair break, midfield one off, driven straight, not much response.
Fair break, ridden wide early, second one off, ridden, weakened.
Missed break, lost length, ridden to midfield rail, ridden early straight, little response.
Fair break, led early, headed and settled third rail, ridden early straight, found nil.
Moderate break, ridden up to join leaders, fifth rail, shaken up early straight, no response.
Took rail in front easily, led by 1L and clocked very slow sectionals, made all without much threats.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the very slow pace, lack room 400M, dashed strongly when clear.
Eased to sit just behind the front runners 2 wide, not suited by the very slow tempo, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Midfield along the fence 3.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the very slow pace, little dash 300M.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, enjoyed the very slow tempo, flattened 250M.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, benefited by the very slow tempo, flattened 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the very slow pace, just held ground in final stages.
Eased at start, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the very slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Slow away, 6Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the very slow pace, no turn of foot in straight.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the very slow pace, no dash.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, trapped 4 wide throughout, harmed by the very slow pace, emptied 400M.

Placing: DISQ
Comment: Eased to rear, 6.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the very slow pace.
Prominently placed 3Ls off the speed, quickened well when asked 350 M, ran on to lead 100 M out, kept on soundly to withhold challenger.
Taken to midfield from gate 12, hung in in the home straight, finished off strongly final 350 M under maximum pressure, only failed to catch the winner.
Urged along to take the one-out-one-back spot, took the lead 400 M out, headed by the winner 100 M out, kept on well for 3rd.
Pushed up the take the box-seat, kept on satisfactorily in the home straight, but lacked a decisive kick to challenge the top three.
Jumped well, settled 3-wide in midfield, kept on satisfactorily when asked 350 M out, but lacked a kick to threaten the principals.
Settled in midfield on rail, only made up gradual ground final 350 M, rather one-paced.
Slow away, settled 6Ls off the pace, only made limited progress final 250 M.
Very slow away, travelled one from the rear on rail, covered some late ground final 250 M.
Jumped fast, taken back from gate 14, made up some late ground final 200 M and passed a few tired runners.
Settled 2-3Ls off pace, drifted back gradually rounding the bend, no kick when asked 350 M out, faded.
Urged along to lead 1L on rail, headed at the top of the home straight, soon weakened. (Mucus.)
Awkward start, settled 3-wide in midfield, failed to make up any ground.
Slow away, urged along to hold a fence position 6Ls off the pace, over-raced halfway, made no progress in the home straight.
Raced handy but caught 3-wide with no cover, struggled turning for home, weakened 400 M out, tailed out. (Heart irregularity.)
Allowed an easy lead, was strongly challenged soon on straightening but kept responding to pressure, well in control inside 100M.
Slow to begin, settled towards the rear 4Ls off the pace, quickened well inside 400M and went 2nd 50M from home. Encouraging first up.
Tracked leader along the fence, loomed a threat 300M out but couldn't quite to the leader, faded inside 100M and lost 2nd 50 from home.
Near the rear early but improved to a midfield position approaching the home turn, stuck to inside throughout, stayed on for 4th without too much of a threat.
Within striking distance but was 3-wide without cover, kept on only at the same pace final 400M. (Jockey reported the horse felt uncomfortable in its action in the straight.)
Taken back on jumping from a wide barrier, raced in last 5-6Ls off the pace, taken widest in straight but made limited progress only.
Moved forward to track leader one out one back, couldn't keep up turning in, weakened rapidly inside 200M. (Jockey reported his saddle shifted 700M.)
Travelled 2-wide in midfield, found little under pressure, dropped away 250M out.
Near the rear and didn't respond to pressure in straight, soon behind and eased 200M from home.
Held up in a prominent spot just off the speed, quickened well 400 M out and soon hit the front, kept on soundly to score without being really challenged.
Prominently placed in a one-off spot in midfield, finished off soundly final 300 M for 2nd, but never really threatened the winner.
Settled cozily just behind the leader, contested the lead early in the home straight but soon caught by the winner, kept on well for a place.
Proved difficult to settle when restrained in midfield, crowded 1500 M out, ran on soundly final 350 M, just late for a place.
Settled cozily on rail in the mid-division, finished off satisfactorily but lacked a decisive kick to challenge the principals.
Settled on rail in midfield, only made limited progress final 300 M, rather one-paced.
Taken to the rear from gate 9, swung widest for home, only made limited progress final 300 M.
Caught 3-wide with no cover in midfield, failed to make any progress in the home straight.
Taken back from gate 11, never better than midfield.
Taken back from the widest alley, shifted wide for home, only made limited progress when clear 200 M out.
Out in line, taken to a one-off spot two from the rear, failed to make up any ground ion the home straight.
Easily ran up to lead 1L, headed at the top of the home straight, soon weakened, finished tailed out.
Away evenly, sat behind pace group, made strong move at 300M, let down well and held a comfortable margin in run to line for another strong win.
Standard getaway, gradually improved on stands side rail, loomed strongly at 400m, couldn’t peg back winner but was well clear of 3rd.
Plenty of early pace, led field at decent tempo, held advantage to 200m but couldn’t sustain sprint, held on for 3rd.
Ok break, not far off pace in early stages, 3Ls down at midpoint, no dash but battled away ok despite hanging.
Early speed, not far from leader in middle of course, 1L or so back and midpoint, tired out last furlong.
Just behind midfield early, 4-5Ls back at midpoint nearer to outside rail, made a brief sprint but struggled to make an impact late.
Began well, 3Ls or so away at midpoint closer to middle, tired at business end. (See Racing Incidents.)
Behind midfield soon after start, 7Ls or so back closer to middle, made no impression final 400m.
Ordinary break, soon at rear, 8Ls or so away drifting towards middle, only passed tired runners late.
Showed early toe, 1L away at midpoint, soon under pressure, faded easily.
Struggled from outset to go speed, always at rear, never got into it over insufficient journey.
Assumed ideal spot 1 out 1 back, close to slow pace throughout, took advantage and made a 3 wide move approaching bend, duelled with favourite final 200m and just prevailed.
Prominent from outset, pressed on to race first outside leader in running line, had terms to suit with slow speed, took front at 300M and fought strongly but just caught on line.
Posted 3 wide in midfield from an awkward draw, no cover 4Ls back on circle but steady pace helped, kept finding in straight for a respectable 3rd.
Out in line, drove up behind them for an ideal spot on rails, on leaders back approaching bend, kept finding in straight to make frame.
Settled behind midfield on rails, 6Ls or so back throughout, pace harmed chances in mid section, ran on well to be nearest on line.
Fair to begin, raced in midfield on rails, 5Ls or so back not suited by the pace, angled wider turning and looked a brief place hope but couldn’t find extra inside 200m.
Led briefly before taking a trail, all favours with slow speed, made bid at 400m and took front, couldn’t dash with principals and tired final furlong.
Moderate beginning, soon at rear, 8-9Ls back with pace against, took inside runs turning and closed OK despite harmed by the way race was run.
Showed usual speed to take up running, set slow terms to suit, no fight from bend and was disappointing.
Drifted back nearer to rear, 2 wide 8-9Ls back, slow tempo against in mid section, made some progress but couldn’t make much impression given circumstances.
Angled into midfield spot in running line from an awkward alley, race not run to suit with slow tempo, made no real impression (roarer).
No early pace, 3 wide at rear with cover 9Ls back, disadvantaged by pace, never a factor.
3 wide behind midfield, had cover 7-8Ls back, pace against in mid section but didn’t respond at all in straight.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began well, held lead from three off the fence far side, crossed to rails coming out of back straight, kicked 2Ls clear after straightening, hung on well to the line.
Soon taken back to rear and crossed for rails run, snuck up to forward of midfield on rails rounding home bend, ran on steadily from midfield into straight but without threatening.
Began moderately but soon ridden along rails, gradually settled in forward of midfield about 3Ls off the speed, met minor interferences turning in, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began well from the widest draw, contested lead early before settling in 2nd outside leader, similar turning in but could only keep on at the one pace in the run home. (Lame next day.)
Began with others, settled one-back on rails, remained similar turning in, soon faded under pressure. (Mucus.)
Began fairly, driven along in midfield out wide before gaining a prominent position going up Rock, lost position entering straight and ran home one-paced.
Soon found itself in last few, only ran past well-beaten horses in straight.
Gradually dropped to last few, trailed the field around the bend, went past well-beaten horses closing stages.
Close up, dropped to 5th just over 2Ls off the speed passing the Rock, hampered and lost position entering straight, made no impression thereafter. (Blood in trachea.)
Began moderately, settled in midfield, yielded ground from coming out of back straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Began with others, niggled along but soon dropped towards rear, found nothing in straight.
Broke well from a wide gate, gradually settled in forward of midfield, soon faded out of contention after straightening.
Ridden along to travel in second position outside the leader. Shot clear at the 300m, and never looked in doubt.
Rated behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Peeled out near the 500m to race 3 wide with cover. Rounded the home bend 6 deep and closed off strongly over the concluding stages.
Sent forward to lead along the paint. Maintained a good gallop down the running but was nabbed in the shadows of the post.
Checked at the start but recovered to box seat. Battled away to hold a spot in the frame.
Parked 3 back the fence. Kept on somewhat one paced in the run to the line.
Posted 3 wide without cover, midfield. Never looked likely.
Settled at the rear soon after the start, 2 deep with cover. Peeled out widest on the home turn and passed tiring runners over the latter stages.
Camped midfield 1 off with cover. Came up flat in the final stretch.
Travelled 1 out 1 back. Had every chance but failed to capitalize.
Severely checked soon after the start settling with the backmakers along the fence with cover. Kept to the inside in the straight but only plodded to the line.
Began awkwardly and settled at the rear 2 wide with cover. Travelled 3 wide with cover after the 500m, was a spent force early in the home straight.
Copped a check on jumping and then for some distance near the 800m, proved very difficult to settle whist positioned behind midfield the fence. Running on empty over the last 100m.
Niggled early. Took a handy position behind leader from first turn. Well-positioned to strike in the straight. Battled determinedly to the line and prevailed at post.
Raced 2-wide at midfield early. Found the fence passing 1100M. Peeled out and was 3Ls down turning into home. Fought gamely with the eventual winner inside 300M. Just failed.
Taken to 2-wide at rear after start from highest draw. Stayed near the fence and was last turning in. Rallied on down the centre of the home straight and was nearest at finish.
Driven early and led solo on fence from first turn. Shared lead home turn. Hung on well top of home straight but couldn't sustain effort closing stages.
Urged early and cut to the fence behind midfield from first turn. Made steady headway when asked home turn. One-paced to conclude.

Ridden early and settled on fence ahead of midfield first turn. Shifted 2-wide 1100M. Made run and reached outside the leader passing the Rock. Kept giving early home straight but no extra passing 150M.
Well enough away but trapped wide. Slotted 2-wide towards rear from first turn. Pressed and swung wide for clear run passing 400M. Made decent headway thereafter.
Fair break. Caught 3-wide at midfield early. Tucked 2-wide behind midfield 1200M. Same position rounding home turn and made up minor ground late.
Towards rear on fence to home straight. Never really picked up.
Back with last few always. Beat tired runners home.
Trapped wide and without cover at midfield early. Switched 2-wide from top of back straight. Hard ridden home turn but failed to improve. Well beaten soon after straightening.
Shaken up to occupy a forward spot but trapped 3-wide first turn. Eased to one-off behind leader 1200M. Dropped out gradually from the Rock and struggled home turn. Weakened badly in the straight.
Broke fast, up to share lead one off, then settled third, led 250m out, ran on well.
Broke well, settled fifth rail, improved far side, challenged with winner, just outpaced.
Slight bobble start, taken back to second last one off, improved turn, wide bid, ran on well.
Fair break, fifth one off, shaken up entering straight, driven, kept on.
Sluggish start, third last rail, driven straight, kept on well between horses.
Clumsy start, ridden early but two lengths last, rail bid straight, kept on well but never near to challenge.
Fair break, steadied, midfield rail, ridden and angled out straight, kept on, no kick.
Fair break but slow into stride, ridden early, fourth last one off, bid between horses, kept on, uncooperative.
Fair break, midfield one off, angled out straight, little progress.
Broke well, dueled for early lead, headed, led again briefly early straight, faded.
Awkward start, ridden up to lead three wide, led to straight, driven, weakened, lame.
Broke well, over-racing then settled midfield rail, gaps came for mid- track bid, ran on strongly to lead 50m out.
Fast break, led early, headed and third rail, led again 250m out, unable to resist winner.
Fair break, fourth one off, driven entering straight, kept on without kick.
Fair break, taken back but caught three wide in third last, wide throughout, ridden, ran on gamely.
Very untidy start, last by two lengths, then second last rail, not settling, ridden for bid between horses, stayed on well.
Broke well, led, headed mid-straight, no extra.
Fair break, midfield one off, driven early straight, no kick.
Broke well, ridden early, midfield rail, driven, kept on one pace.
Broke well, looked to lead but caught three wide, up to second one off, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, taken back mid-rear one off, ridden, found little.
Fair break, lacked early pace, last and urged one off, wide bid, no progress.
Fair break, midfield three wide, hanging, wide bid, ridden, found nil.
Eased to sit in midfield, raced keenly, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M whilst hanging in, dominated 50M
Pushed to take rail and led by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 100M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Eased at start to take rail behind the field, 6Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, blocked 4-2, dashed strongly when clear, stormed home for 3rd.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, suited by the slow tempo, but lacked room most straight, ran on well to the line.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, lack room 300M, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, progressed steadily 250M, checked 100M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, blocked most straight, little dash when clear.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, flattened 200M, checked 150M.
At rear, 7.5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader, raced 3 wide throughout and lost too much ground, harmed by the slow tempo, flattened in straight.
At rear, 6.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout and lost too much ground, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Pushed up to share the lead on rail, quickened when asked 250 M out, kept on soundly, just prevailed.
Prominently placed 2Ls behind the pace, finished off soundly when clear 250 M out, just late.
Raced handy but caught 3-wide with no cover, responded satisfactorily when asked 250 M out, kept on for a place.
Travelled one-off in midfield, shifted wide for home, finished off well final 250 M, just late for a place.
Pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, kept on satisfactorily early in the home straight, no extra final 50 M, just missed a place.
Started awkwardly and bumped, settled one-off in midfield, made up gradual ground final 250 M, rather one-paced.
Settled well in midfield on rail, made limited progress when clear 150 M out, rather one-paced.
Slow away, eased back from gate 9 and settled one from the rear, over-raced 800 M out, made up some late ground final 200 M.
Lacked early speed and travelled at the rear, urged along throughout the trip, quickened well 200 M out, blocked in concluding stages, not fully tested.
Urged along to hold a fence position in midfield, made no progress in the home straight.
Bumped at start, held up in touch, got tired 250 M out, soon weakened.
Taken back from gate 12, rearward throughout the trip, never competitive.
Moved forward to race outside leader early stages, took over entering the back straight, broke away from the field passing 500M, built up a sizable lead going into 200M and was never challenged.
Never far off the pace, driven out nearing 400M, advance to 2nd place turning in, couldn't gain on the runaway leader but held on gamely for 2nd when strongly challenged close home.
Guided to a rail position behind midfield, had a smooth run along the inside throughout, stayed on well but never had a chance of catching the runaway winner, missed out on 2nd in a close finish.
Slow to begin, held up in midfield along the fence, shifted out inside 250M for a clear run, stayed on.
Behind mid-division racing along the 2-path, stayed on final 300M but not getting to the leaders.
Began well and settled just off the pace, found less than expected when put to pressure 400M out, plugged on one paced.
Not hurried in early stages, settled near last 7Ls off the pace, stayed on making some late headway.
Settled 2-wide in mid-division, finished off one-paced and not able to pose any threat.
Towards the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, made his challenge on the outside of straight, not quickened.
Taken across from draw 12 and settled at the tail of the field, switched widest on straightening but didn't respond to pressure.
Took early lead, restrained and relinquished the lead passing 1000M, came under serious pressure turning in, dropped away inside 200M. (Jockey questioned / Unacceptable Performance)
Not far off the pace but was kept 3-wide no cover throughout, outpaced passing 500M, soon left behind on straightening.
