Began well, with leaders and wide early before settling in 4th about 3Ls off the speed, came to challenge under pressure and hit front inside 200 M, just held on to the line.
Niggled along to keep up with pace early, settled in 5th about 3Ls off coming out of back straight, similar turning for home, ran on steadily under pressure to be nearest at the finish.
Showed early speed, disputed lead on rails, settled just off the pace coming out of back straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Soon dropped well behind, snuck up on rails early in straight, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish. (Tactic questioned.)
Began with others, settled towards rear, made up good ground down centre of straight to be nearest at finish.
Soon found itself towards the rear ridden along, remained similar into straight, made steady progress down centre of track to be nearest at finish.
Slightly slow into stride, not too far off early, shuffled back to rear of midfield coming out of back straight, saved ground on rails turning in, kept on same pace without quickening.
Midfield throughout, ran home at the same pace.
Made running to 200 M, weakened noticeably out of contention.
Raced keenly in forward of midfield, gradually faded under pressure after straightening. (Blood in trachea.)
Soon dropped to last few despite ridden along, made no impression throughout.
Led or disputed lead far side, settled in joint 2nd around the bend, soon weakened out of it after straightening. (Heart irregularity.)
Tracked the leader a couple of lengths back along the paint. Speared through late to snatch victory on the line.
Enjoyed an uncontested lead and held a two length margin for most of the trip, only to be nabbed in the shadows of the post.
Camped midfield the fence. Peeled out after the 600m, to race 1 off with cover. Struck some traffic problems near the 100m whilst closing off strongly.
Raced in second position, 2 deep no cover. Kept on gamely to make the frame.
Travelled behind midfield 2 wide with cover. Zipped forward when the pace was sedate after the 800m, settling outside the leader passing the 600m. gave way over the final 50m.
Rated behind midfield the fence. Railed up in the home straight, worked home steadily.
Raced with the backmarkers 2 deep with cover. Ground away fairly in the final stretch.
Parked midfield, 2 deep with cover. Came under pressure near the 600m, working out to race 3 wide with cover. Battled on dourly in the run to the wire.
Travelled near the rear of the field 2-3 wide with cover. Rolled out and endeavoured to improve after the 500M. Only plodded to the line.
Settled at the tail of the field on the rails. Failed to close off.
Gave away ground at the start, settling towards the rear. Raced wide and without cover for most of the trip. Never likely. (See Racing Incident Report.)

Began well. Taken to a spot ahead of midfield on fence. Peeled out home turn and was 3-wide 3Ls down turning in. Picked up steadily in the straight and battled well with the leader closing stages. Prevailed final strides.
Rolled forward after start and led on fence from 1100M. Held a 2Ls advantage passing 400M. Kept on well but couldn't repel the finishing effort of the winner near the post.

Away in line. Niggled along and raced one-off behind leader back straight. Well positioned to strike entering home straight but remained one-paced. No hope with the front pair but ran 3rd with comfort.
Slow to begin but soon resumed 2-wide behind midfield. Same position turning into home. Hard ridden 300M but failed to turn up a notch. Held 4th narrowly.
Driven early but failed to muster. Raced 2-wide at midfield to home straight. Closed off fairly.
Towards rear to home straight. Made up minor late ground.
Behind midfield on fence to home straight. Brief headway top of home straight but no extra final furlong.
Eased to rear from highest draw. 9Ls adrift entering home straight. Beat tired runners home.
2-wide ahead of midfield to home turn. Forced 4-wide into final stretch. Dropped out rapidly thereafter.
Never far off the pace until weakened badly final 300M.
Positioned inside of midfield in a steadily run affair, picked up well when clear 350M, hit lead near 50M and well in control.
Restrained in a midfield position one off the fence, stayed on well final 300M to go 2nd near line.
Driven to a forward position early, settled in 3rd place 2Ls off the lead, had every chance but not pace of top two final 100M.
Held an inside position 3-4Ls off leader, clear run from 400M but unable to quicken once asked, stayed on final 200M.
Tracked leader one out one back, looked a winner when hitting the lead inside 300M but unable to sustain effort and was caught near 50M.
Raced a shade keen in a 3-wide position towards the rear, switched to outside of straight, ran on but never looked like getting to the leaders.
Held up 7Ls off the pace, saved ground on the inside, stayed on without threatening.
Patiently ridden and almost 10Ls behind leader turning in, switched widest in straight for a clear run, ran on.
In mid-division along the 2-path, turned 3-wide over the turn, had no excuse final 400M, kept on at the same pace only.
Held up near the rear, short of room early straight but couldn't pick up when presented a clear run.
Positioned 3-wide towards the rear, found very little under pressure and was out of contention 200M out.
Not hurried early but unable to tuck in for cover, caught very wide throughout the race and was a spent force going into final 200M.
Had an uncontested lead to 350M, emptied passing 200M and dropped away.
Not far off the pace but was 3-wide without cover, struggled for pace from 600M and dropped right away on straightening. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Travelled nicely in a rail position ahead of midfield, moved out near 400M in search of room, awkwardly placed from 300-200M, got going again 150M from home, surged late to get up close home.
Slow to muster and raced as the back-marker about 8Ls off the pace, finished off strongly but not matched winner's pace final 100M.
In touch, responded well once in line for home, briefly led from 150M, caught late.
Restrained to a 2-wide position towards the tail of the field, travelled strongly to straight but had not much room until 200M, finished fastest of all and should have been closer.
Taken back to the rear and was 7-8Ls behind leaders in middle stages, shifted to the outside of straight turning in and stayed on from off the pace.
Awkwardly away, was well covered behind midfield, shifted out to clear 350M, ran on fairly and inclined to hang in throughout the straight.
Settled towards the rear after beginning slowly, kept to inside throughout, made some progress from off the pace but not getting to the leaders.
Chased the lead, kept on to 150M then weakened.
Sped off and crossed to the lead just before the turn, faltered inside 200M, no extra late stages.
On the outside of the pair chasing the pace, had to be driven along inside 600M, weakened on straightening and soon out of contention.
Along the fence in midfield, angled out passing 600M for a clear path, found disappointingly little under pressure. (Jockey questioned.)
Settled behind mid-division but didn't pick up when asked inside 400M. No impression.
Caught 3-wide in midfield and didn't respond to riding on straightening, never likely.
Raced along the 2-path 6Ls back in midpack, held up early straight but found nothing when clear running presented, well beaten.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M to score.
Hard ridden to share the lead in 2 wide, clocked very slow sectionals, hit front 400M, hung on until 50M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Prominent, 1L off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Took rail easily and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on until 150M flattened.
Eased to rear, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, just held ground when clear.
Pushed forward, 1Ls off the leaders 3 wide, enjoyed the slow tempo, flattened 300M.
Box seat, ran on until 200M flattened.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, lack room 400M, no turn of foot when clear.
Eased at start to cross towards rail behind the field, 5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow pace, held up 4-2, ran on fairly when clear.
Slow away, pushed early, 5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, raced very keenly, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Midfield, 2.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, weakened 300M.
Eased to rear and took rail, 6.5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Eased back, never competitive and tailed out.
Shared the lead easily, quickened when asked 300 M out, kept on well under maximum pressure, just prevailed. (Blood in trachea.)
Taken towards the standside behind runners, unbalanced in action 800 M out, kicked strongly 250 M out, ran on soundly for 2nd.
Settled just off the pace on the standrail, responded well when asked 300 M out, ran on soundly for 3rd.
Settled well in midfield with cover, made up gradual ground final 250 M when placed under maximum pressure, never really troubled the principals.
Shared lead easily, caught by the winner 200 M, couldn't find extra.
Bumped at start, settled well in midfield, took time to quicken when asked for efforts 400 M out, made up some late ground final 200 M.
Settled just behind the leader, responded only fairly when asked 400 M out, got tired 150 M out.
Started awkwardly, lacked early speed and travelled near the rear, only made limited progress final 200 M.
Held up in touch, gave no response when asked 400 M out, failed to make up any ground.
Bumped at start, settled just behind the leaders, got tired 300 M out, soon faded.
Bumped at start, travelled just behind the speed, got tired passing the 400 M pole, soon weakened.
In 3rd place always within striking distance, responded strongly when pressed inside 300M, got past leader 100M out and well in control final stages.
Soon moved across to the Stands' side tracking leader in a strongly run race, took over 350M, led to near 100M, well held by the winner late stages.
In touch, ran on under pressure to go 3rd 150M out but couldn't quite get to the first two.
In mid-division, driven out inside 350M, stayed on but failed to seriously threaten.
Settled along the Stands' rail in midfield, ran on fairly and not getting to the leaders.
Slow to begin, towards the rear, pushed along halfway, made some progress but never threatened.
Showed plenty of early speed, led at a good tempo and got across to the stands' rail 600M, headed near 350M, weakened gradually.
Slow to muster, near the rear for the first 500M, made limited progress final 400M.
Midfield, didn't find much when put under pressure 400M out, kept on at the same pace, no room and not ridden out over concluding stages.
Pushed along early to maintain a position in midfield, didn’t respond to riding passing 400M, no extra final 150M.
Outpaced early stages despite ridden along, last going into final 400M, ran past beaten horses only.
Broke well, not far off the pace in the first 200M, outpaced mid stages and dropped back to near last going entering 400M, soon out of contention.
Slow to begin, used early to obtain a midfield position from off the pace, under pressure halfway and dropped off rapidly inside 250M, well beaten.
Fractious in the barriers and slow to begin, did not travel throughout the trip and came under serious pressure 500M out, eased 300M.
Pushed up to find a one-off spot in midfield, quickened well when asked 250 M out, hit the front 50 M out, kept on soundly to win.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot in midfield, over-raced halfway, checked 700 M out, ran on strongly final 350 M for 2nd, just late.
Prominently placed just off the pace, on heels 800 M out, ran on to contest the lead early in the home straight, caught 50 M out, crowded 20 M out, kept on for a place.
Settled 3Ls off pace on rail, bump 800 M out, contested the lead early in the home straight, kept on under maximum pressure, crowded 20 M out, just missed a place.
Slow away, urged along to take a fence position in midfield, ran on satisfactorily when clear 300 M out, just missed a place.
Settled one-out-one-back, ran on to contest the lead early in the home straight, headed 100 M out, rather one-paced.
Lacked early speed as usual and travelled 7Ls off the speed, made up some late ground final 200 M, never really threatened the principals.
Settled cozily in the box-seat, kept on satisfactorily early in the home straight, on heels 200 M out, blocked, not fully tested.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot just behind the pace, checked 800 M out, only one-paced in the home straight.
Urged along to lead 1L on the rail, headed 200 M out, soon flattened.
Urged along early, caught 3-wide behind the mid-division, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Taken back from his high draw, travelled rearward throughout the trip, never competitive.
Lacked early speed as usual and travelled two from the rear, made no progress in the home straight.
Taken towards the rear from his high draw, bumped the rail 800 M, soon outpaced, finished tailed out. (Lame right fore and wounded left fore.)
Out in line, faded back to settle 3 wide behind midfield, 6ls back with cover, swung widest turning and let down with a big finish, took control inside 100m.
Began better than usual, took ideal spot two wide just behind pace, tracked well to bend, loomed at hit lead at 300m, kept fighting and was caught in final 50m.
Jumped with rest, posted 3 wide without cover 2-3Ls back, did it tough in mid section, joined in at 300m and stuck on bravely just missing 2nd.
Taken back to rear from outside alley, settled last 7-8ls back on rails, same position but made 2 wide run turning, gradually shifted into clear and closed hard to make frame.
Even break, unable to slot in and trapped 4 wide without cover, hard work in mid section, didn’t dash but kept on soundly given workload to be not far away in finish.
Standard jump, pushed up to race midfield 3-4ls back on rails, quiet time in mid section, saved ground turning, stayed on ok to be nearest on line.
Tardy into stride, positioned behind midfield 5-6ls back in running line, keen in mid section, made some ground down middle but couldn’t get closer last 150m.
Moderate beginning, raced behind midfield on rails, 5ls or so away throughout, stuck on ok without looking likely.
Taken back from a wide gate, shared rear 7ls or so back, still well back turning, made some minor progress without threatening.
Even getaway, settled 3 wide in midfield, 3-4ls back with cover, not far away to bend, flat footed when they sprinted and just held ground in straight.
Began smartly and soon took up running, had a fair run setting ok sections in front, tackled soon after turning and gave in quickly, faded out.
Amongst first few to begin, all favours situated on leaders back, kept to rails throughout, weakened out from 300m.
Lobbed in a midfield position 4-5ls back in running line, no excuses to bend, stopped soon after straightening.
Pushed early to take a prominent spot, up close throughout outside leader racing two wide, struggling turning and faded out tamely to be beaten a long way.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began with others, settled better than midfield, commenced move turning in, hit front under pressure over 200 M out to soon draw clear.
Prominent without cover early, rolled forward to lead far side approaching home bend, held 1L break turning in but soon overhauled by winner, just held on under pressure for 2nd.
Settled behind midfield, fought on steadily without quickening.

Began fairly but showed early speed from a wide draw to go forward, soon taken back for cover around stables bend settling in forward of midfield on rails, shifted out to challenge entering straight, ran on steadily.
Never far off, kept on one pace.
Began with others and close up early, soon settled in midfield, kept on at the one pace without quickening.
In last few in straight, never nearer.
Towards the rear, saved ground on rails turning in, made short-lived impression after straightening.
Never better than midfield.
Used low draw to gain prominent position on rails, remained similar before coming under pressure to hold position approaching home turn, gradually faded under pressure after straightening.
Never in contention.
Began moderately, never seen with a chance in last few.
Slow away, soon picked up to first few and lead from stables bend, overtaken approaching 1000 M mark, dropped out rapidly from 2nd upon straightening.
Slow away, gradually picked up to midfield, remained similar into straight, folded up quickly.
Settled slightly behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Peeled out turning for home and was able to finish over the top of its rivals after the 100m.
Enjoyed a good run in the race, box seating. Hit the lead approaching the 300m, but was overhauled inside the 100m.
Rated in fourth position, 1 off the rail with cover. Ran on soundly.
Parked midfield the fence. Worked home steadily but ended its run well short of the line.
Camped in second position, 1 off without cover. Was gassed by the 200m, giving thereafter.
Posted 4 wide without cover for most of the trip, racing in about a midfield position. Never likely.
Positioned behind midfield, 3 wide with cover. Kept on one paced in the run to the line.
Travelled with the backmakers along the paint. Only plodded to the line down the inside in the final stretch.
Got its head up at the start and lost ground, settling at the tail of the field near the fence. Ridden along after the 500m, and in the home straight made no real impression. (see incident report)
Speared forward to lead along the fence. Faded quickly approaching the furlong.
Slow to begin, settling travelling towards the rear, 1 off with cover. Came under pressure near the 600m, and was a spent force soon after. (To trial.)

Placing: FE
Comment: Travelled midfield 3 wide with cover. Gave ground after the 500m, suffered a bleeding attack and collapsed near the 200m.
Away in line and raced 3-wide at midfield. Left without cover home turn. Dashed strongly top of home straight. Battled determinedly inside final 200M and came out on top final strides.
Well enough away. Elected to sit 2-wide ahead of midfield from 800M. Rallied on with the eventual winner home straight. Just failed to sustain effort near the post.
Ridden early back straight from wide barrier. Cut to the fence and led home turn. Kept on well and held a 2Ls advantage 200M. Caught by the front pair close to home.

Jumped well but caught wide. Gradually eased towards rear early and middle stages. Improved outside and was 5Ls down rounding home turn. Picked up satisfactorily thereafter but couldn't trouble the front trio.
Slowly away. Soon switched to the fence at rear. Took inside run turning into home stretch. Made up good ground in the straight and nearly made frame.
Bumped at start and was taken to 2-wide towards rear at 1000M. Shifted 3-wide home turn. Came widest and was 6Ls adrift 350M. Closed off the race fairly well.
Rolled forward and led on fence early. Took seat behind pace home turn. Couldn't turn up a notch in the straight.
Began awkwardly. Shaken up but took time to muster. Raced behind midfield on fence from 1000M. Peeled out for clear running on straightening but gave very limited response when asked.
Handy position on fence to home straight. Failed to accelerate when the race got serious inside 300M.
Driven early but insufficient speed to cross from highest draw. Ended up 3-wide towards rear from 1000M. Very little impression thereafter.
Pressed early to stay 2-wide behind midfield. Niggled home turn to maintain position but soon lost touch after straightening.
Taken back from wide draw, improved along rail to mid-rear following eventual third, squeezed through on rail 150m out to win going away.
Fair break, not rushed early, second last rail, followed winner through gaps, ran on well, winner too strong.
Fair break, settled midfield rail, ridden early straight, ran on but not match pace of first two.
Fair break, urged up to share lead one off, four lengths ahead of third, led approaching turn until last 150m.
Fair break, not rushed, midfield one off, checked leaving back loosing places, ridden early straight, progress, run flattened late.
Fair break, ridden to lead, joined on outside, headed after brief battle, second into straight, kept on but no kick.
Moderate break, ridden early to reach third rail four lengths behind leaders, challenged early straight, no extra.
Fair break, taken back to rear one off, driven entering straight, modest late progress.
Well away, not pace to go forward, settled fourth last, ridden early straight, very modest progress.
Fair break, lacked early pace, third last one off, running on under driving when path blocked, run flattened, eased late.
Fair break, caught midfield two off, wide bid, no progress.
Broke well, fourth one off, driven early straight, some progress, faltered, eased, lame.
Broke well, not rushed, found rail in fourth, driven, squeezed through on rail to win.
Broke well, led far side, driven straight, caught close home.
Fair break, ridden for lead but had to settle for third two off no cover, ridden and kept on straight, no kick.
Broke well, led rail headed entering back, second one off, driven and kept on straight, never quite reached lead.
Broke well, not rushed, midfield one off, short of room early straight, kept on well when clear.
Slow start, second last one off, wide bid, driven, no extra late.
Broke well, not rushed, fourth last one off, urged entering turn, wide bid, modest progress.
Broke well, fifth one off, driven straight, kept on, no kick.
Missed break, fifth last rail, up to midfield rail, ridden early straight, no progress.
Moderate break, no early pace, third last rail, urged, driven straight, found little.
Moderate break, taken back to rear, shaken up then hard ridden, no impression.
Hard ridden to share the lead in 2 wide at good pace, drifted away 400M to score.
Took rail in midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace, ran on well to the line for 2nd.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Settled nicely just behind the leaders 2 wide, ran on well until 150M flattened.
Pushed to share the lead at good pace on the fence, emptied 300M.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield along the fence, 6Ls off the good pace, just held ground in straight.
Badly missed the start, more than 10Ls behind the good pace 2 wide, ran on ok in straight.
Hard ridden early but not muster, more than 9Ls off the good pace along the fence, no progress.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, trapped 4 wide, flattened 300M.
Eased back, hung out badly at bends, never competitive.
Eased back, never a chance.
Hard ridden throughout but never muster, 3.5Ls off the good pace 3 wide, weakened 500M.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot just off the speed, quickened well when asked for efforts 350 M out, kept on soundly to win.
Settled cozily in midfield, shifted wide at home turn and improved along 4-deep, responded well when asked 350 M out, kept on soundly for 2nd.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot 2Ls off the pace, on heels 300 M and 100 M out, kept on well for a place.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot in midfield, took time to quicken early in the home straight, ran on steadily final 250 M, just late for a place.
Lacked early speed and travelled 8Ls off the pace, finished off strongly final 300 M, too late.
Started awkwardly, pushed up to take the box-seat, blocked early in the home straight, rather one-paced when clear 150 M out.
Niggled along to share the lead on the rail, kept on, headed 150 M out, soon flattened. (Lost right hind plate)
Settled 3Ls off the pace on rail, blocked early in the home straight, only one-paced when clear in the concluding stages.
Taken back from wide draw, fourth last rail, improved turn, wide bid, some progress, weakened late.
Urged along to share the lead on 2-deep, held ground until got tired 150 M out.
Blundered after start, lacked early speed despite being urged along, 7Ls away turning for home, made up some late ground final 200 M.
Failed to muster early speed, never better than midfield, weakened early in the home straight, tailed out.
Began awkwardly, moved up to share the lead on the outside, went head to head with that rival from 700M, gained upper hand inside 100M despite hanging in and being difficult to ride.
Showed early speed to lead on the inside, joined by eventual winner before the home turn, dueled with that rival throughout the straight, kept battling on but was just picked off near the finish.
Never far off the pace in 4th, stayed on well inside 200M, nearest finish.
Guided to a rail spot and travelled behind midfield, picked up well from 300M and did best work late.
Tracked leading pair, kept on one-paced to the line, lost 3rd place inside 100M. (Blood in trachea.)
Dropped back to the rear, 7Ls off the pace in middle stages, switched to outside of track and made only limited progress.
Held up 2-wide in mid-division, kept on at the same pace and not getting closer to leaders.
Not far off leaders but didn't find extra under pressure, weakened 150M.
Restrained to a position towards the rear, hung out badly from 700M, finished off the race fairly. (To barrier trial around a bend.)
Not hurried and placed at the back 6-7Ls off the pace, pushed 4-wide without cover making the turn, not quickened when put to test 350M out.
Taken back purposely, raced at the tail of the field along the fence and was in an unpromising spot turning in, didn't pick up and was eased final 150M.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Soon taken back to race in last few, commenced move along rails rounding home bend, snuck up on inside turning for home, sustained effort to gain upper hand inside final 50 metres.
Settled in rear of midfield, made forward move going up the Rock, disputed second into straight, hit the front over 200 metres out, caught close home.
Began with others, settled in 5th just better than midfield, switched off rails for a run turning in, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began with others, soon settled in rear of midfield, hampered and lost position approaching the Rock, behind midfield turning into straight, fought on under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Began with others, gradually settled in midfield on rails, went wide into straight, made moderate progress without threatening.
Settled in midfield, widest runner turning in, ran home steadily without quickening.

Began awkwardly but quickly raced to the front, led until headed approaching 1000 metre bend, remained in 2nd about 3Ls back most of far side, hit front momentarily 200 metres out only to be overhauled closing stages.
Began well, soon found cover to settle just off the speed on rails in third and then fourth on home bend, in similar position turning in, one-paced before fading inside passing 150 metres.
Soon prominent, took up running rounding stables bend going nearly three lengths clear far side, came back to the main field around home bend, soon swamped under pressure after straightening.
Slightly slow out, trailed the field to straight, produced moderate late impression, never nearer.
Began from a wide draw, always in last few. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Raced wide early in prominent positions, settled in fourth better than midfield far side, dropped away quickly from approaching home turn. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Jumped well and soon crossed to the fence travelling in 2nd position. Enjoyed the run of the race. Swept clear all of the field early in the straight and the race in its keeping a long way from home.
Sent forward and remained 1 off in the lead holding a half length advantage for the better part of the trip. Maintained a good gallop down the running.
Settled behind midfield, travelling a loose 2 wide until joining the fence near 500m. Had to be eased after the 500m, peeled out on straightening and closed off soundly. Pulled up lame.
Had every chance after box seating. No excuses.
Settled towards the rear, 1 off with cover. Came widest in the straight and made good late headway.
Camped 1 out 1back. Gave little when placed under pressure in the final stretch.
Raced back in the field along the paint. Worked home evenly under moderate pressure. (see incident report)

Jumped well then was taken back however was posted early and covered some ground before slotting into a 1 off position close to midfield approaching the 500m. One paced in the home straight. (see incident report)
Travelled at the tail of the field along the rail. Kept to the inside in the home straight but only plodded to the line.
Parked 3 back, 2 wide with cover. Overraced in the early and middle stages and failed to finish the race off.
Raced in last position, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the run home.
Posted wide and without cover for most of the trip, travelling in about a midfield position. Never likely.
Shaken up from high draw after start. Cut to the fence and led from first turn. Held a 1L advantage turning in. Hung on well in the straight to repel rivals late.
Raced 2-wide towards rear until swinging wide on straightening. Made up substantial ground to snatch 2nd near the post.
Urged early and settled behind leader on fence from first turn. Chased hard in the straight but couldn't quite reach the leader. Lost 2nd close to home.
Away in line. Parked 2-wide behind midfield from first turn. Made some headway in the straight for a non-threatening 4th.
Driven early and settled on fence behind midfield from first turn. Checked towards rear 500M. Took inside run turning into home. Made up minor ground late.
Well enough away and elected to sit ahead of midfield on fence from first turn. Pressured and was well positioned to strike entering home straight. Plugged on until weakened final 100M.
Began awkwardly. Niggled early and ended up 3-wide midfield first turn. Left without cover ahead of midfield passing the Rock. Gave very limited response in the straight.
Pushed along and eventually slotted one-off behind leader passing the Rock. Peaked soon after straightening.
Eased to 3-wide towards rear after start. Same position home turn. Beat tired runners home.
At rear always. Never any real progress.
2-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Failed to pick up thereafter.
Hard ridden early but insufficient speed to go forward. Ended up 4-wide without cover behind midfield early. Found cover 3-wide home turn. No show in the straight on.
Fair break, no early rush, held up second last one off, shaken up entering turn, wide bid, led 200m out, drew clear.
Fair break, settled third rail, challenged and led briefly 250m out until headed by winner, kept on.
Steadied start, settled midfield one off, bid between horses, driven but not match winner's kick, kept on.
Fair break, urged early but sixth three wide no cover, improved to third one off, ridden early straight, kept on well.
Steadied start, taken back to rear rail, wide bid as field quickened turn, kept on well.
Broke fast, up four wide first turn, settled fifth one off, crossed and slightly checked mid straight, stayed on one pace.
Slow away, urged along rail to midfield, bid between horses, no kick.
Fair break, fourth last one off, kept on past beaten horses straight.
Fast away, led and crossed, hurried and briefly headed far side, led again and two lengths clear mid-straight, weakened.
Fair break, urged early, fifth rail, inside bid, no extra.
Taken back, rear group rail, inside bid straight, no progress.
Fair break, second early, joined leader and went on narrowly far side, ridden approaching straight, headed, weakened.
Broke fast, neck lead one off early, went on approaching turn, kicked clear early straight, hung on under strong driving.
Broke fast, shared lead early, headed approaching turn, fought back very well straight, just failed.
Fair break, up fast to third one off, front two got away at top of straight, ran on but unable to peg them back.
Not fast away, third last one off, wide bid, finished well but unable to threaten.
Fair break, three wide midfield, kept on well under driving until weakened close home.
Fair break, not rushed, second last one off, ridden entering straight, finished well.
Missed beat start, up along rail to midfield, inside bid, some late progress but no kick.
Fair break, fourth rail, ridden before turn, no extra late.
Broke fast but not speed to lead, caught wide, back to midfield two off, ridden, one pace.
Sluggish start, lacked early pace, last by three lengths, ridden for inside bid, minimal progress.
Broke well, ridden early but not pace to hold position, back through field, ridden, found nil.
Box seat, enjoyed the perfect run, closed off strongly 200M to win.
Pushed to obtain prominent spot, 2Ls off the leaders 2 wide, made early move 600M, ran on well for 2nd.
Very slow away, 3Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, made ground 400M.
Eased back early, raced keenly whilst being trapped 3 wide, moved forward 800M, led on fence 600M, flattened 200M.
Eased at start to take rail behind the field, 4.5Ls off the leaders, made steady ground 250M.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 3Ls off the leader, just held ground in straight.
Pushed to share the lead 2 wide, pressured 600M, emptied 300M.
Pushed to take rail and share the lead, pressured 600M, weakened 300M.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, lacked turn of foot in straight.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, ran on ok.
At back, 6Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, no dash.
Trapped 3-4 wide in midfield throughout, dropped off 500M.
Urged along to lead on the rail, quickened well when asked 300 M out, fought bravely to withhold the challenger, kept on soundly to score.
Pushed up to take the one-out-one-back spot, ran on to contest the lead at the top of the home straight, headed by the winner 150 M out, kept on well for 2nd.
Lacked early speed and travelled 6Ls off the pace, checked twice halfway, finished off soundly final 250 M for 3rd.
Lacked early speed despite being urged early, travelled 9Ls off the pace at the rear, on heels 600 M out, swung widest for home, ran on strongly final 250 M, too late.
Caught wide early, drifted back towards the mid-division gradually to obtain cover, made up gradual ground when clear 300 M out.
Jumped only fairly, urged along to take the box-seat, failed to quicken when asked for efforts early in the home straight, held ground until flattened 150 M out.
Pushed up early and travelled 3-wide in midfield, bumped 800 M out, swung widest for home, only one-paced, couldn't find extra final 150 M.
Travelled one from the rear, took time to quicken early in the home straight, blocked 150 M out, finished off satisfactorily final 100 M.
Caught very wide with no cover in midfield, made no progress in the home straight.
Urged along to hold a fence position just off the pace, checked twice halfway, failed to make up any ground in the homes straight.
Slow away, pushed up to take a one-off spot just off the speed, bumped 800 M out, got tired soon after entering the home straight, dropped out. (Bled)
Pushed hard early to hold a fence position in midfield, on heels 800 M out, checked 600 M out, outpaced early in the home straight, gave ground.
Tracked leader along the inside, had a smooth trip and travelled the best of all making the home turn, found plenty when asked, hit lead 150M from home and drew nicely clear for a comfortable win.
Made some use early to obtain an one out one back position, responded to pressure and briefly led mid-straight, kept on but was outstayed by winner final 100M.

Given a waiting ride as expected, 7Ls off the steady pace in middle stages, driven approaching the home turn and improved round the outside of field, stayed on well and almost caught the 2nd horse at the finish.
In 4th place never far off the pace, not pace of first two but kept on steadily to go 3rd for a brief moment near 150M, flattened final stages.
Settled towards the tail of the field, improved his position passing 800M but was held up 500M-400M by a beaten runner, made some progress on straightening but was left with much to do.
Dropped back to a rail position behind midfield, switched to 2-wide 800M out, driven out near 400M, kept on at the same pace and never threatened.
Vied for lead early but was allowed an uncontested lead from 1600M, driven nearing 400M and found little, weakened rapidly final 250M.
Settled in midfield along the 2-path, turned 3-wide over the home turn, driven inside 500M but found disappointingly little. (Mucopus)
In mid-division, came under pressure inside 800M and commenced to give ground making the home turn, eased 300M out. (Abnormal breathing noise reported by Jockey.)
Taken back to last soon after the start, outpaced and became detached from the field passing 800M, soon eased. (Irregular heart rhythm.)
Prominently placed in a one-off spot just behind the speed, kicked when clear 250 M out and soon hit the front, kept on soundly to score.
Taken back from his high draw and travelled one from the rear, quickened well when asked 250 M out, ran on strongly for 2nd.
Urged along early, travelled one-off in the mid-division, crowded 1400 M out, finished off satisfactorily final 250 M for 3rd.
Crowded at start, settled 6Ls off the pace at the rear, responded well when asked 300 M out, finished off strongly, blocked 150 M out, unlucky to miss a place.
Settled one-out-one-back, kept on satisfactorily early in the home straight, hung out 200 M out, soon got tired.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, crowded 1400 M out, only one-paced in the home straight.
Caught wide with no cover early, ran up to lead 1200 M out, kept on fairly early in the home straight, headed 150 M out, soon flattened.
Travelled in midfield on rail, crowded 1100 M out, urged along to maintain his position halfway, checked 300 M out, made no progress in the home straight.
Travelled wide with no cover in midfield, got tired soon after entering the home straight.
Prominently placed in the box-seat, raced keenly early, got tired 250 M out, finished tailed out.
Used a bit early to take a prominent spot outside leader, did some early work with speed on, applied pressure from 600m, took over turning, streeted rivals in run to line.
Blew start, settled next to last two wide, aided by early pace, made a wide move around them from 700m to be outside leader, left behind by winner turning, battled on.
Restrained from widest gate, aided by solid speed early, 6ls or so back throughout, still at rear turning, closed off strongly late down outside.
Settled behind midfield as usual, 5ls or so away in 2 wide line, came 3 wide from 600m when pace slackened, made some late ground to make frame.
Taken back soon after start, 4-5ls back on rails, a little keen in mid section, taken back to inside turning, made some minor ground without threatening.
Showed usual speed, slotted into 1 out 1 back after being a little wide, in decent speed early, niggled at 500m, no extra final furlong.
Some speed, drifted into midfield with early speed 3ls or so back, even run on fence throughout, urged along approaching turn, lacked usual finish and faded in straight.
Nestled on leaders back throughout, even trip despite early speed, same margin back but came off bridle at 600m, struggled thereafter and dropped out.
Took up a midfield position, 2 wide 4ls or so back, had chance to improve from turn but didn’t find and battled away in straight.
Plenty of early toe, took up running at decent early sections, tackled at 600m, struggling and gave in approaching turn
Posted 3 wide without cover from an awkward draw, 3-4ls back doing it tough throughout, faded before turn.

Quickly away, ridden along from the middle draw to gradually cross for rails run, held about 1L advantage around the bend, careered away on straightening for a dominant victory.

Soon taken back to the rear of field after beginning from the widest draw, waited with until making a move around the bend, finished off race nicely down the centre of the straight to snatch 2nd final strides.
Began with others, always thereabouts in 3rd or 4th racing 2-wide, kept on steadily in straight without quickening.
Began with others, settled in 5th about 3Ls off the pace, ran home steadily without threatening.
Began with others, pressed on from a wide draw to race outside leader far side, continued to chase leader into straight, kept on same pace under pressure but swamped for a placing nearing finish.
Began awkwardly, soon picked up to midfield on rails, remained similar throughout, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Began fairly, always prominent on rails to straight, gradually faded under pressure after straightening.
Settled in last few, saved ground turning in, kept on well for a nice debut.
Began with others, soon taken back to settle in midfield, hung in and a difficult ride in straight, ran home one-paced.
Very slowly away, remained well behind throughout, ran past two well-beaten runners in the run home.
Began moderately, settled in midfield early stages before steadily shuffling backward towards the rear, dropped to one from last turning for home, no further impression.
Slowly away, travelled behind midfield, no further impression in straight.
Was able to find the fence and travel 3 back by the time the field had reached the 600m. Finished off well over the concluding stages to land the prize.
Managed to slot in and race 1out 1 back by the 600m. Kept up a strong gallop right to the wire.
Didn’t show any early dash and settled midfield, 1 off with cover. Closed off soundly.
Stalked the leader on the fence. Had every chance.
Taken back from a wide barrier to settle at the tail of the field, 1 off with cover. Worked home satisfactorily.
Held the fence as joint leader. Was well and truly gassed by the final 200m.
Raced as equal leader, 1 off no cover. Faded over the final furlong.
Raced back in the event, 2-3 wide on settling and had some cover on the circle. Battled away in the home straight.
Raced in about a midfield position 2 deep with cover. Only plodded to the winning post.
Slotted across to race in a midfield position on the fence. Was held up for clear running over the final 200m and as a consequence was not able to be tested.
Began awkwardly settling at the rear of the field along the rails. Failed to close off.
Settled with the backmakers along the paint. Struggled in the home straight.
2–wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Battled determinedly to the line to repel rivals at post.
Midfield on fence early and middle stages. Finished off strongly down the centre of home straight. Just missed.
Box-seated to home straight. Rallied along the fence with the front pair. Settled for 3rd narrowly and beat the rest by a fair margin.
Away in line. Taken to 2-wide towards rear from first turn. Swung widest and was 5Ls down turning in. Made steady headway for a non-threatening 4th.
At rear on fence to home straight. Covered some ground late.
2-wide behind midfield early. Pressed home turn but no significant improvement. Held ground final furlong.
Driven early and led on fence from first turn. No extra gear final 300M.
Began fairly. Shaken up and parked one-off behind leader from first turn. Ridden turning for home but failed to pick up. Weakened final furlong.
Slowly away and raced towards rear on fence. Never looked likely in the straight.
Travelled wide and without cover at midfield until dropped out final 300M. (Lame left hind).
Broke well, settled sixth one off, improved turn, three wide into straight, kept on well to lead 150m out.
Fair break, settled fifth rail, improved rail entering straight, led 250m out until headed by winner.
Broke well, back to mid-rear one off, improved wide entering straight, ran on under driving.
Fair break, held up rear, improved wide approaching turn, ran on well but no extra after covering plenty of ground.
Fair break, fifth last one off, shaken up entering straight, kept on, no kick.
Fair break, midfield rail, slight check turn, slightly short of room straight, kept on.
Fair break, shaken up early but still settled second last one off, improved wide entering straight, kept on but unable to challenge.
Fair break, fourth rail, improved inside entering straight, driven, no extra.
Broke well, led rail, pestered first turn, went on again far side, led into straight, headed, weakened.
Fair break, ridden for lead but third two off, then rail, held up in traffic and lost ground badly as field quickened, no extra.
Missed break, lost two lengths, fourth last rail, tried to quicken turn, driven found nil.
Fair break, up to second one off, joined leader exiting straight, then shared lead one off until shaken off, lost ground quickly, tailed off.
Slightly missed break losing half length, midfield one off, wide bid, ran on well to lead 200m out.
Slightly missed break but still found rail in fourth, out for mid-track bid, led briefly until headed by winner, kept on.
Broke well, urged early, settled fifth one off, wide bid entering straight, led briefly, kept on.
Fair break, not rushed, mid-rear rail, looked for room between horses straight, checked, kept on well.
Fair break, sixth rail, inside bid, ran on well but not pace to challenge.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, inside bid, kept on, no kick.
Broke well, led rail, joined first turn, led again early straight, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, taken back rail second last, tried to improve wide turn, one pace.
Fair break, joined leader one off, went on narrowly far side, headed entering straight, weakened.
Fair break, taken back third last rail, inside bid, unable to threaten.
Broke well, up four wide to join leaders, then third one off, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, taken back last, urged far side, ridden into straight, found nil.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace and scored.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M for 2nd.
Shared the lead easily 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, closed the race off well for 3rd.
Hard ridden to occupy the box seat, enjoyed the slow early sectionals, ran on well to the line.
Pushed to obtain a prominent spot, 2Ls off the leaders 2 wide, suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased to rear and took rail, 8Ls off the leaders, swept for toward 3-4 wide to make ground, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, blocked 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, made move 600M around the field, run ended 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield along the fence, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, held up 300M, no dash when clear.
Hard ridden forward, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened in straight.
Hard ridden to take rail and shared the lead at slow sectionals, soon weakened 250M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders, trapped 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, checked 400m, no progress.
Pushed up early, travelled 3-wide with no cover just off the speed, quickened well when asked 250 M out and soon led, kept on well to win.
Sat one-off in midfield, shifted wider to improve rounding the home turn, finished off soundly final 250 M for 2nd.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot just behind the leaders, crowded 200 M out, quickened well when clear 150 M out, ran on well for 3rd.
Pushed hard early to share the lead on the rail, responded satisfactorily when asked 300 M out, headed 150 M out, kept on, just missed a place.
Pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, hung in 200 M out and soon headed by the winner, still kept on, just missed a place.
Pushed up to take the box-seat, only one-paced when asked for efforts at the top of the home straight.
Travelled 3-wide in midfield, raced keenly early, carried wide turning for home, only one-paced in the home straight.
Prominently placed in midfield on rail, had every chance in the home straight, only one-paced.
Lacked early speed and travelled 6Ls off the pace at the rear, checked 1100 M out, only made limited progress in the home straight.
Failed to muster early speed, travelled 3-wide 5Ls off the pace, crowded 1100 M out, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Crowded when being eased back from gate 9, crowded again 900 M out, travelled one from the rear on the rail, made no progress in the home straight.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot behind the mid-division, crowded 900 M out, urged along rounding the home turn, outpaced 300 out, tailed out. (Elevated muscle enzymes)
Sped to the front and dictated at a steady pace, responded strongly when driven out in straight and kicked clear inside 200M, never challenged.
Taken across behind runners from draw 11 and settled at the tail of the field, ran on well despite hanging in and finished clear 2nd best.
Caught 3-wide without cover in midfield, driven along passing 500M, kept on evenly for 3rd.
Restrained to a midfield position along the 2-path, well covered throughout, stayed on final 350M, raced in restricted room near line and narrowly missed out on 3rd.
Held the 4th spot under restraint, kept on to 100M but couldn't pick up sufficiently to threaten the runaway winner, lost placing near finish. (Lame left front leg.)
Got a good start from draw 2 and settled just in 3rd just off the pace, had every chance but couldn't step up a gear, plugged on at the same pace final 150M.
Tracked leader in a steadily run race, hung in under pressure inside 350M, finished off one-paced.
Travelled 3-wide towards the rear, taken wide in straight and ran on only fairly.
Guided to a rail position towards the rear, kept on one paced and never looked like getting to the leaders.
Began awkwardly, 6Ls off the pace in last turning in but had very little in reserve with which to respond.
Slowly away, held up in midfield along the fence, not quickened when the race got serious 300M out, eased off nearing 100M.

Began moderately, settled just over 2Ls off the pace early, hit the front onto course proper, careered away for a comfortable victory inside final 200 M.
Slightly slow out, settled in the middle of the pack early, gradually improved to join leaders over 600 M out, outsprinted by winner closing stages, kept on steadily to the line.
Began awkwardly, soon took up running, led until joined onto course proper, failed to quicken to threaten.
Slowly away, travelled just over 2Ls off the pace along grandstand rails, fought on under pressure past well beaten horses inside final 200 M.
Prominent, faded under pressure after coming onto course proper.
Began awkwardly, prominent early stages, came under pressure after coming onto course proper, kept on same pace without quickening.
Soon dropped to last few, made no impression under reminders down the centre of the track.
Began fairly, close up early, gradually lost touch from 600 M out.
Enjoyed a nice run on the back of the forward division of runners, settling midfield 1 off with cover. Responded well and hit the front after the 300m to register an easy win.
Parked just shy of midfield the fence with cover. Finished off well.
Camped behind midfield 3 deep with cover. Ran on nicely.
Stalked the leader along the fence early before shifting out to race 1 out 1 back passing the 1200m. Battled away to finish in the frame.
Settled worse than midfield the fence. Made reasonable ground in the run home.
Traveled midfield 3 wide with cover. Kept on soundly.
Raced with the backmakers, 1 off with cover. Closed off fairly without threatening.
Travelled at the rear along the paint. Worked home evenly but hung in for most of the home straight.
Raced behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Stayed on one paced in the final stretch.
Shared leading duties along the fence. Regained the front near the 350m, but gave ground in side the 150m.
Raced 1 out 1 back early before being carted into a 3 wide position with cover after the 1200m. Never likely.
Settled at the tail of the field, 1 off with cover. Failed to close off.
Slow to begin then mustered sufficiently to box seat after the 1200m. Weakened tamely over the final 200m after having every possible chance.
Sent forward and raced as equal leader, 2 wide without cover. Hung out on the home turn & faded in the run home.
Fair start. Resumed to a forward spot one-off the stand's rail at 800M. Ridden when challenged at 300M but soon asserted authority. Easy.
Behind the main bunch early. Improved to midfield passing 400M. Finished off well closing stages for 2nd but was beaten by the winner.
Led on stand's rail after start. Pressed the winner briefly at 300M but was soon knocked out. Hung on for 2nd until closing stages.
Closed to the pace early and middles stages. Pressured 400M and kept on steadily to make frame.
Ahead of midfield on stand's rail early. Niggled passing mid-point. Closed off one-paced.
Urged after start but lacked early speed and raced towards rear. Shaken up passing mid-point and made up some ground late.
Behind speed early and middle stages. Couldn't pick up when the race got serious passing 400M.
Never better than midfield. Beaten final 200M.
In leading section until dropped out gradually from 400M. Faded final furlong.
Away in line and raced with the main bunch. Driven in for clear run passing 400M but made no progress. Weakened final 250M.
Behind midfield always. Never likely.
Towards rear always. Never a factor.
At rear throughout. Never in the hunt.
Behind midfield until lay in and weakened rapidly from mid-point. No impression.
Broke well, settled fourth rail,inside bid, led 150m out, ran on well.
Fair break, midfield one off, urged, mid-track bid, just missed out in three horse war.
Broke well, not rushed, settled fifth last one off, wide bid, ran on strongly, just failed.
Broke smartly, led rail until headed 150m out, fought on.
Fair break, ridden up to join leaders, second one off, kept on under driving, not quite reach lead, weakened.
Fair break, taken back, settled third last rail, off rail to challenge, kept on quite well.
Fair break, not rushed midfield rail, inside bid, ridden, one pace.
Broke well, ridden for lead, not pace to get there, third two off, driven no extra.
Fair break, up wide looking for lead then reined back to fifth one off, ridden early straight, one pace.
Moderate break, mid-rear rail, then held up last, ridden, one pace.
Fair break, held up rear, ridden early straight, kept on, no kick.
Moderate break, taken back to rear, wide bid, driven, no progress.
Fair break, ridden early looking awkward, fourth last into straight, ridden, found nil.
Broke well, back to mid-rear three off, mid-track bid, led 50m out, ran on well.
Moderate break, midfield one off, mid track bid,led 150m out until headed by winner.
Fair break, not rushed, midfield one off, wide bid, ran on well.
Moderate break, third last rail, urged, wide bid straight, kept on well.
Broke well, led rail, joined and headed, settled third rail, ridden early straight, unable to threaten.
Moderate break, ridden early, fourth rail, out to challenge, kept on but no kick.
Broke fast, reined back to sixth one off, ridden and led briefly mid-straight, weakened.
Taken back from wide, last on rail, wide bid, kept on but unable to threaten.
Fair break, fourth last one off, ridden early straight, kept on but no major progress.
Fair break, taken back, last into straight, ridden, modest progress.
Fair break, up quickly wide, then eased back to midfield one off, ridden, little response.
Fair break, led one off until joined, went on again, two lengths clear into straight, headed 250m out, weakened.
Moderate break, slow into stride, midfield rail, inside bid, ridden, no progress.
Fair break, ridden to join leaders, second one off, ridden early straight, weakened quickly.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M to win.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 3-4 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, just beaten by a short margin in 2nd.
Eased to sit just behind the leaders, 2Ls off the slow pace 3 wide, held up 400M, ran on well to the line for 3rd.
Shared the lead easily 3 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, dominated briefly from 500M, flattened 200M.
Eased to rear, 6.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Bumped start, midfield on the fence, 4.5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 300M.
Eased to sit just off the leaders 2 wide, raced very keenly and checked early, flattened 200M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight whilst hanging in.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, blocked whole straight, not tested.
Took rail easily and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, however soon weakened 400M.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leaders, trapped 4-5 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Pushed to share the lead 2 wide at slow sectionals, soon weakened 400M.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, weakened 300M.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the slow pace, trapped 4-5 wide throughout, dropped off 400M.
Sat 3-wide in midfield, responded well when asked for efforts at the top of the home straight, took the lead 200 M out, kept on soundly to score.
Lacked early speed as usual and travelled one from the rear, swung widest for home, finished off strongly final 350 M for 2nd, just late.
Urged along to hold a prominent spot just behind the speed, quickened well when asked 350 M out, kept on soundly for 3rd.
Lacked early speed and travelled 6Ls off the pace at the rear, kicked strongly when clear 300 M out, made up ground quickly but couldn't find extra over final 50 M.
Urged along early to cross in front and settled one-off just behind the leader, kept on satisfactorily in the home straight, but lacked a decisive kick to challenge the principals.
Out in line, settled midfield on the rail, responded well when asked 300 M out, crowded 200 M out, soon recovered and finished off satisfactorily. (Lost right front plate)
Settled 2Ls off the pace on the rail, only one-paced when placed under maximum pressure in the home straight.
Prominently placed one-off in midfield, only one-paced when clear 300 M out.
Easily ran up to share the lead on rail, headed 200 M out, soon flattened.
Settled 3-wide in the mid-division, quickened 350 M out and made up gradual ground, couldn't find extra final 100 M.
Started awkwardly, caught wide with no cover in midfield early, ran up to share the lead halfway, kept on satisfactorily until got tired 100 M out, soon faded.
Slow away, never better than midfield, failed to make up any ground.
Caught 4-wide behind the mid-division, failed to keep on 300 M out, dropped out. (Blood in trachea)
Caught wide with no cover, raced keenly when restrained early, checked 1400 M out, got tired at the top of the home straight, finished tailed out.
Travelled well along the fence in midfield, moved into contention nearing 600M, responded positively when asked, hit lead passing 250M and kept on well to the line under some confident handling.
Tracked leader in a slowly run race, moved to one out one back passing 800M, bid outside the eventual winner turning for home and no match while well clear of the rest.
Never far off the pace, driven inside 600M, not pace to challenge first two but stayed on final 200M to go 3rd close home.
Dropped back to last 8Ls off the slow pace in the first half, moved closer approaching the home turn, driven out 600M, stayed on fairly and not threatening.
In midfield along the 2-path, switched to 3-wide nearing 600M, stayed on fairly and never looked like getting to the leaders.
Quickly into stride, led uncontested throughout and set a slow pace especially in the first half, headed nearing 200M, weakened and lost a placing close home. (Lame next day.)

Settled towards the rear in a slowly run affair, niggled along 800M out but gave very limited response, never in contention and ran well below par. (Jockey and Trainer questioned re the disappointing performance.)
Caught 3-wide no cover early stages when urged along to obtain a forward position, was pushed wide again inside 800M, dropped right away entering the straight. (Jockey reported his horse hung in.)
Began awkwardly, settled near last 7Ls off the slow pace, taken to 3-wide approaching the home turn, pushed along 600M out but failed to reach a contending position, eased inside 200M.
Urged along to hold a fence position in midfield, swung widest for home, quickened well when asked 350 M, ran on strongly and took the lead 50 M out, fantastic win.
Prominently placed just behind the pace, kicked 300 M out and soon took the lead, kept on soundly, caught by the winner 50 M out.
Settled one-off 2-3Ls behind the leader, responded well when asked for efforts 300 M out, finished off soundly for 3rd.
Easily ran up to lead and found the fence 900 M out, kept on satisfactorily in the home straight, headed 150 M out, kept battling on under maximum pressure.
Settled one-off in midfield, raced keenly early, swung widest for home, finished off soundly final 300 M, impressive effort. (Lost right front plate)
Slow away, given a waiting ride in a rearward position, made up gradual ground final 300 M, but never really troubled the principals.
Urged along to take the box-seat, crowded 1200 M out, held ground until flattened 150 M out.
Started awkwardly, taken back from his high draw and travelled 8Ls off the pace, made up gradual ground down the centre of the home straight final 300 M.
Settled 3Ls off the pace on the rail, crowded 1200 M out, one-paced in the home straight.
Bumped start, taken to the rear from gate 13, made up some late ground final 200 M.
Settled 6Ls off the pace on rail, checked 250 M out, crowded 150 M out, never tested. (Lost right front plate)
Blundered start, settled 3-wide 4Ls off the pace, lost cover 800 M out, held ground, checked 250 M out, soon flattened.
Settled just behind the leader, held ground until got tired 250 M out, soon faded. (Lost left front plate)
Started awkwardly, settled 6Ls off the pace, made no progress in the home straight.
Showed good speed, raced outside leader and travelled strongly throughout, continued to eyeball leader on turn, kept giving and gained lead inside 200m and held off late challenge.
Angled back to settle in running line, 5-6Ls back to turn, came wide at 400m and produced a strong finish just failing to run down winner late.
Displayed usual speed to be prominent, kicked up to hold the lead, raced on bridle throughout with attention from outside horse, duelled with eventual winner to 150m before settling for a place.
Faded back from wide alley, behind midfield 7Ls or so away on rails, saved ground on bend, closed race off strongly in straight making many lengths to just miss place.
Drifted back despite an inside alley to settle behind midfield, 4-5ls back on rails throughout, angled into clear turning and produced usual honest close to be not far away.
Reasonable getaway, settled in 5th racing 2 wide 3Ls back, all favours in run, place chance at 300m but couldn't lift final furlong. Even effort.
Taken back from outside alley, raced amongst last few 8 to 9Ls back, still plenty to do turning in, made many lengths down outside to be nearest on line.
Began well, assumed nice position on leaders back, travelled well throughout, inside run turning, struggled to find extra final 200m and faded final 100m.
Positioned nicely not far off pace 3ls back on rails, quiet run throughout, didn’t quicken at business end and tired inside 200m.
Out in line, unable to slot in and posted 3 wide without cover 3ls or so back, tough run to turn, folded in straight when emptied.
Tardy into stride, raced in midfield 2 wide 5ls back, bit keen in mid section, niggled turning didn’t make any real progress (jockey reported abnormal breathing.
No early speed as usual and settled at rear, best part of 12Ls back in mid section, not travelling and slightly eased before making minor ground late (jockey reported didn’t stride out).
Amongst first few to break, took a positive spot 1 out 1 back, all favors in run, found nothing on turning and weakened out tamely.
No speed, settled 2nd last 10Ls back on rails, struggling turning and made no impression.
Slotted in to box seat 1 out 1 back, 4-5Ls off leader, suited by speed, came wider turning and showed class to dig deep wearing down margin for narrow victory.
Well enough away, camped off speed, 4Ls away on rails, lovely run to bend, joined in strongly at 300 M and just lost out late in battle with a promising horse.
Good early speed, in front but unable to lead, took sit and camped in 2nd to turn, challenged at 300m, couldn’t match first two late.
Rolled forward as expected to drive through and lead, rolled along at good sections, 2-3Ls clear on bend, came back to them at 200m but stayed on ok to make frame.
Settled 3 wide with cover, 7Ls or so down behind midfield, same margin down to bend, closed creditably down centre to be closest at finish.
Ok away, went forward to race first without cover, 2 wide 3-4Ls back, made ground too 400m and was a brief place chance but didn’t go on late.
Taken down to rails from an awkward alley, 8Ls away on rails, job to do turning, made steady progress without properly threatening.
Taken back from a wide alley, raced nearly 10Ls back 2 wide at rear, made some progress in straight but run ended inside 200m.
Restrained to slot in just off midfield, 7Ls back in running line , improved on bend, steady progress to 200m but flattened out thereafter.
Out in line, lodged 3 wide without cover in midfield, keen in mid section, ridden along turning and gave ground.
No early speed, positioned in midfield 6Ls back on rails, all favours in run, poor in straight showing no finish.
Ordinary jump, settled at rear on rails nearly 10Ls back, same margin back to bend, made no improvement in straight.
Faded back to race 3 and 4 wide at rear, 10ls off front, saddle shifted on bend, made no progress in any case.
