Settled on rails in forward of midfield, baulked briefly after straightening, responded well inside final 300 M to take command close to home.
Wide in better than midfield far side, prominent around home turn, closer but wider turning in, quickened well passing 300 M while hanging in, hit front inside 200 M only to be caught close to home.

Began well, close up before snatched back to 2L 4th coming out of back straight, had every chance when inconvenienced and carried in by runner-up in straight until 100 M, no further impression closing stages.
Settled in midfield on rails, fought on steadily without quickening.
Soon ridden to the front, led until joined into straight, gradually faded under pressure.
Soon taken back towards rear after beginning from a wide draw, in last few when widest turning for home, made up good late ground in straight, nearest at finish.
Settled in midfield, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Began from a poor draw, gradually improved down far side to travel outside leader, unable to sustain effort early in straight, weakening when hampered over 200 M out.
Settled in last few, saved ground turning in, kept on same pace under pressure in the run home.
Well back, saved ground on rails turning in, ran past well-beaten horses in straight.
Began moderately, soon ridden to pick up one-back spot on rails, remained similar to straight, soon weakened under pressure.
Never better than midfield, gave ground from around home bend.
Dwelt at start, soon settled in forward of midfield, similar turning in, kept on before fading out of contention over 200 M out.
Soon dropped to tail-end after beginning from the widest draw, made no show thereafter.
Raced in fourth position, 1 off with cover. Was taken 3 wide with some cover on the final circle, got the split early in the straight and finished off strongly.
Taken across behind runners to settle at the tail of the field, 1 off with cover. Closed off strongly out wide.
Endured a tough run 3 wide without cover as part of the leading trio. Maintained a sound gallop right to the wire.
Camped behind the speed, 1 off with cover. Was one paced over the final stages but managed to finish in the frame.
Settled behind midfield 2 wide with cover. Finished off nicely towards the inside.
Settled 3 back the fence. Made some ground late after obtaining comfortable racing room passing the 300m.
Enjoyed the box seat. Gained a saloon passage along the paint early in the straight but failed to capitalize.
Slow to begin settling with the backmakers along the fence. Kept on at the same speed without making much impression.
Was posted 4 wide without cover whilst positioned behind the leaders. Never likely.
Raced 3 wide with cover behind the leading division. Was swamped approaching the 100m.
Travelled behind midfield 3 deep with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Settled towards the rear 3 wide with cover. Failed to run on.
Led along the fence. Commence to lay out after the 500m and folded quickly passing the final furlong.
Bumped at start. Strode forward and took lead on fence home turn. Held a 1L advantage turning in. Kept on well to repel rivals home.
2-wide towards rear to home straight. Held up passing 400M. Chased hard once got clear running inside 250M. Too late.
Last out. Niggled along the fence and raced behind midfield to home straight. Kept giving to get 3rd but couldn’t' match the finishing touch of the front pair.
2-wide behind speed to home straight. Remained one-paced thereafter and lost 3rd near the post.
Began well but caught wide. Eased to 3-wide behind midfield to home straight. Matched strides with the principals but lacked extra gear to pass them.
Soon cut to the fence and led. Eased to take seat home turn. Plugged on without threats in the straight.
Steadied when hampered after start and trailed field to home straight. Closed off the race fairly well.
2-wide at midfield to home straight. Limited response when asked 300M. Couldn’t' follow inside final furlong.
Fast away, led and crossed, kicked mid-straight, never in danger.
Fair break, midfield one off, wide bid, hung in late, unable to challenge.
Poor start, third last one off, wide bid, ran on strongly but never able to threaten.
Fair break, ridden early but unable to reach lead, sixth three wide, kept on straight but not able to challenge.
Fair break, fourth rail, chased winner early straight, weakened last 100m.
Missed break slightly, fifth one off, short of room straight, ran on but unable to threaten.
Well away, settled midfield rail, inside bid, ridden, no progress.
Well away, second one off, ridden early straight, no extra.
Fair break, sought lead but unable to reach it, third three wide no cover, ridden, weakened.
Moderate break, midfield three wide, wide bid, no progress.
Slowly away, last early, tried to improve on inside, driven, no progress.
Moderate break, taken back but no route to rail, three wide mid rear, wide bid, no progress.
Fair break, reined back, held up mid-rear rail, ridden, no response.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, last into straight, ridden, found nil.
Fair break, taken back, held up second last one off, found room inside, wove between horses, led last few strides.
Fair break, held up fourth last one off, wide bid, ran on strongly, just held.
Moderate start, not rushed, back to midfield rail, improved rail turn, out for mid-track bid, driven, just failed.
Broke smartly, front rank early but six wide, up to lead early straight, two lengths clear 200m out, caught late.
Fair break, held up mid-rear one off, strong run between horses until short of room last 200m, rider lost whip late.
Broke well, taken back to mid-rear one off, wide bid, kept on, no kick.
Fair break but slightly slow into stride, up to join leaders, third one off, ridden to challenge early straight, no extra.
Fair break, taken back, last rail, improved inside turn, short of room mid-straight, one pace thereafter.
Broke well, led early rail, headed entering straight, ridden, weakened.
Taken back from wide draw, fourth last rail, over-keen, wide bid straight, little progress.
Fair break, midfield one off, short of room early straight, driven, little progress.
Fair break, settled midfield rail, up to fourth turn, driven, weakened.
Good break, up to join leaders but caught four wide, back to fidth two off, ridden, found nil.
Fair break, front rank early, then back to midfield one off, wide bid turn, ridden, no response.
Eased to rear for cover, 8.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, blocked and checked 400M, dashed well 250M to win.
At rear, 7Ls off the good pace on the rails, held up 4-2, made good ground when clear for 2nd.
Eased back, 5Ls off the good pace along the fence, held up 400M, progressed steadily when clear and took 3rd.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace on the fence, made steady ground 400M, led briefly 200M, flattened 100M.
Behind midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made ground 300M.
Box seat, pace good, lack room 400M, no dash when clear, flattened 200M.
At back, 7Ls behind the good pace 2-3 wide, ran on ok.
Hard ridden to sit outside the lead, pace good, ran on until 150M emptied.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, flattened in straight.
At back, 6Ls off the good pace 3-4 wide, no progress.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 0.5L at good pace, hung on until 200M weakened,
Eased in midfield early, 3Ls off the good pace 3 wide, moved forward 800M, weakened 300M.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the good pace 2 wide, dropped off 400M.
Eased to sit in midfield 3-4 wide, faded rapidly 500M.
Fair break, taken back to mid-rear rail, over-racing slightly, wide bid, finished strongly to lead 150m out and win going away.
Broke well, second one off, battled for lead early straight until headed by winner.
Broke well, led and crossed, steadied, narrow leader into straight, fought on, headed late by second.
Moderate break, midfield rail, driven between horses straight, ran on well.
Fair break, midfield one off, slightly short of room mid-straight, kept on under driving.
Fast break, back to midfield two off no cover, mid-track bid, ridden, not quicken.
Fair break, third on rail, pulling, inside bid, not quicken.
Fair break, third three wide taking time to settle, ridden, unable to quicken.
Taken back to rear, over-racing slightly, wide bid, driven, little headway.
Fair break, taken back, second last one off, ridden for mid-track bid, no progress.
Slightly missed break, third last rail, driven straight, little response.
Began slowly, soon guided to the fence and settled behind midfield, made a crucial move 700M out switching away from fence, picked up strongly passing 400M and gained command near 100M. Impressive.

Held up at the tail of the field and settled 9Ls behind leader in a slowly run affair, still last turning in, responded well to pressure and made significant headway down the inside, got up for 2nd near line.
Caught wide early from draw 13, moved forward to track leader one out one back, suited by the slow pace in middle stages, took lead 300M out, kept on well just failed to last over the final stages.
Settled 3-wide behind midfield, swung to widest of straight and made steady progress to the line.

Placed ahead of midfield racing along the 2-path, well covered to straight, fought on well inside 400M and briefly went 3rd mid-straight, outpaced final 100M but nevertheless a respectable run against younger opposition at this level.
Endured a rough run when making the first turn, shuffled back to midfield one off the fence, stayed on final 400M and fared best of the overseas contingent.
Reserved in striking position along the rail, pushed along nearing 600M, had every chance but lacked extra pace to challenge leaders.
Towards the rear 8Ls back, saved ground on the inside but was hampered by the slow mid-race tempo, made some progress passing 400M but never looked like getting to the leaders.
Caught 3-wide in midfield for most of the trip, kept on rather one paced in straight. Never threatened.

Driven forward and able to lead uncontested, under restraint entering the back straight and went slowly middle stages, pressed on by a rival inside 500M, lost lead 300M out, weakened rapidly final 150M.
Dropped back to near last about 8Ls back, not able to pick up when the race got serious and ran well below expectation.
Held up in mid-division along the inside, not helped by the slow pace and became very difficult to settle in middle stages, kept on at the same pace and weakened inside 200M.
Never far off the pace but was 3-wide without cover to 800M, made a short-lived effort on straightening, emptied near 200M and gave ground rapidly.
Held up 2-wide behind midfield, not helped by the slow mid-race tempo, made no headway in straight and was never in the hunt.
Fair break, settled midfield rail, followed third through gap, led 50 m out, driven out.
Taken back from wide, third last one off, wide bid, ran on strongly under driving.
Fair break, midfield one off, improved three wide turn,, led 200m out, headed last 50m.
Broke well, ridden to lead, crossed, dictated until headed 200m out, kept on.
Broke well, crossed to rail, third behind leader, inside bid, kept on, not quicken.
Fair break, fourth one off, ridden early straight, short of room, kept on one pace.
Fair break, held up fifth last, wide bid entering straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back fourth last , not settling at first, wide bid, kept on until run flattened last 50m.
Fair break, up wide to second one-off, shaken up entering straight, little response.
Broke well, fifth rail, ridden entering straight, no improvement.
Not rushed early, settled second last, ridden early straight, no progress.
Missed break badly, left five lengths, wide bid, no progress, eased late.
Angled into ideal spot, racing 2 wide 5Ls back, suited by way race played out, came with a strong run final 200m, swamped rivals late for an overdue win.
Out with first few, pressed on to end up outside leader, fair run on circle with even sections, continued closing in straight and snared 2nd final 50m.
First to break, hard ridden to lead, did some work on circle, fought strongly from 400m and just missed out on 2nd late.
Even break, went forward but posted 3 wide without cover 1L or so back, did it hard to bend, kept giving despite run to make frame.
Out in line, taken down to race behind midfield 6Ls or so back, began improving widest at 400m, didn’t have required dash but still kept coming making good ground to be nearest late.
Not much early speed, settled midfield on rails, 5Ls or so back to bend, worked home nicely between horses in straight to be close up. Nice debut.
Bounced out, took a trail on leaders back, travelled strongly in mid section, right there on turn, didn’t dash but kept touch to 150m before fading last bit.
Taken back to near last from wide gate, 8-9Ls back in running line, made wide run on turning and continued to close nicely without really threatening.
Reasonable break, lobbed in box seat 1 out 1 back, all favours to bend, didn’t quicken from turning but ground away to 150m when run ended.
Tardy into stride, mustered to race 4Ls back on rails, easy time in mid section, battled away in straight.
Taken back from widest gate, raced at rear 9Ls or so back, came 3 wide from 800m, didn’t respond and only passed tired runners in straight.
Restrained from a wide alley, raced at tail 10Ls back, set a task when still well back to bend, didn’t make an impression.
Faded back to race behind midfield, 7-8Ls away on rails, niggled turning, made no serious progress.

Always thereabouts on rails, fought hard to gain slender advantage over 100 M out, just held off runner-up's late challenge.
Drawn wide and raced wide in prominent positions mostly in 4th to straight, fought on under pressure to just fail to peg back winner.
Waited with, circled field around the bend, finished off race nicely off the rails, did best work late.
Towards the rear, raced wide into the straight, made up good ground as usual down the centre of the track, nearest at finish.
Attempted to make all, came under pressure to maintain position after straightening, folded up quickly inside final 100 M.
Midfield, came to challenge after straightening but baulked over 150 M out, kept on to the finish.
Towards the rear throughout, never nearer.
Settled just outside leader to straight, hit the front momentarily upon straightening, soon weakened.
Began from the widest barrier, soon taken across for rails run with backmarkers, saved ground turning for home, not clear run most of way in straight.
Slowly away, raced wide towards the rear early improving to midfield far side, took closer order turning for home, kept on before fading inside final 200 M.
Settled just better than midfield, not much room behind leaders early in straight, found nothing inside final 200 M.
Jumped moderately, soon settled in midfield on rails, saved a lot of ground turning in, weakened badly under pressure inside final 200 M. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Positioned midfield on the paint. Stayed to the inside in the straight and secured a run right along the fence to record a driving victory.
Stalked the leader along the rail. Stayed on gamely in the run to the wire.
Parked just off midfield, 3 deep with cover. Came widest on the home turn and closed off soundly.
Sent forward to cross and lead along the fence in the early stages. Kicked turning for home but was overhauled late.
Rated 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Stayed on one paced in over the concluding stages.
Taken back from a wide barrier but had no luck and was posted midfield 3 wide without cover for most of the trip. Battled away in the home straight.
Slow to begin camping behind midfield, the fence. Railed up in the final stretch and whacked away over the final stages to finish evenly.
Was caught 3 wide without cover early then strolled forward to cross and race outside the leader near the 1100m. gave ground inside the last furlong.
Settled in last position along the paint. Searched for runs turning for home but had no real luck in the home straight.
Travelled worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Only plodded to the finishing post.
Settled in the box seat. Had every chance but was disappointing in the run to the line.
Settled at the rear of the field, 1 off with cover. Failed to close off.
2-wide at midfield to the Rock. Improved to the back of leaders making home turn. Well positioned to strike in the straight. Responded well when asked and took charge near the post.

Driven forward but trapped 3-wide approaching winning post first occasion. Slotted 2-wide behind pace at 1300M. Shared lead home turn. Held a 1L advantage 200M but failed to repel the winner close to home.
Missed the start. Soon shaken up to race towards on fence. Shifted 2-wide back straight and progressed gradually to midfield entering home straight. Kept on well for 3rd.
3-wide at midfield early stages. Left without cover from the Rock. Progressed to leaders' back rounding home turn. Remained one-paced in the straight.
Taken to 2-wide at rear from high draw. Swung widest and was last turning into home. Covered good ground in the straight.
Eased to race on fence behind midfield after start. Ended up towards rear when trapped on fence home turn. Peeled out on straightening and made up some late ground.
Urged forward. Eventually found the fence and led at 1100M. Took seat from the Rock to home straight. Couldn't turn up notch thereafter.
3-wide towards rear early. Progressed to midfield middle stages. Plugged on in the straight.
Rolled forward from widest barrier. Caught wide until reaching the lead 900M. Levelled turning in. Overhauled inside final 250M.
Niggled along the fence early and elected to sit ahead of midfield first turn. Gradually dropped towards rear approaching home turn when unable to improve. Held ground in the straight.
Began well but insufficient early speed to cut across. Ended up 3-wide at rear first turn. No impression thereafter.
Well enough away. Got the fence and handed up lead 1200M. Dropped to midfield middle stages and further back on straightening. Couldn't pick up final stages.
Fast Away, led rail, headed wide, second rail, led early straight, kept on strongly.
Broke well, fourth one off, mid-track bid, closed well under driving.
Jumped fast, led and crossed, clear early straight, headed, kept on.
Broke well, tracked winner fifth rail, ridden early straight, kept on one pace.
fast away, ridden early, fifth last one off, wide bid, ran on under drive.
Fair break, taken back third last rail, ridden for mid-track bid, closed strongly without being able to challenge.
Fair break, taken back, second last into straight, inside bid, kept on.
Fair break, midfield rail, ridden early straight, one pace.
Broke well, second one off, ridden, weakened.
Missed break by two lengths, quickly up wide to join leaders, then reined back to midfield, driven straight, found little.
Moderate break, not much early pace, third last one off, ridden, little response.
Fair break, taken back last one off, wide bid, found nil.
Fair break, midfield one off, wide bid, strong finish, led 100m out.
Missed break one length, up along rail to fourth, driven to lead mid-straight, winner too strong.
Broke well, led narrowly two off, back to third, ridden, kept on well.
Broke well, led rail, joined, led again into straight, headed 200m out.
Fair break, midfield rail inside bid, kept on.
Fair break, fifth one off, head high, ridden, kept on.
Not well away, second last one off, ridden and improved mid-track, unable to threaten.
Fair break, held up rear, inside bid, modest progress.
Broke well, share of early lead, headed entering turn, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, up to midfield two off, urged throughout, no extra straight.
Slowly away, ridden, fourth last rail, some progress under driving, weakened late.
Fair break, not much early pace, fourth last two off, ridden, no extra.
Hard ridden to keep with the pace group, 2Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made steady ground 300M to win.
Slow away, settled at back, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M for 2nd.
Pushed to keep up behind the leaders along the fence, 2.5Ls off the fast pace, lacked room 300M, ran on well the line for 3rd.
Pushed to hold the rail in the lead, harmed by the fast pace, hung on strongly until 50M flattened.
Pushed to share the lead 2 wide at fast sectionals, ran on until 100M flattened.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 200M.
Pushed forward, trapped 4-5 wide without cover just off the leaders, harmed by the fast pace, still made good ground 200M.
Eased at start, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, made steady ground 250M, badly held up 100M, not tested.
Shared lead but trapped 3 wide, harmed by the fast pace, hung out badly home bend, flattened onwards.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2.5Ls off the fast pace, trapped 4 wide and lost too much ground, flattened 400M.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the fast pace 3 wide, emptied 400M.
Never competitive at rear.
Jumped smartly, led and crossed, narrow leader into straight, driven, held on well.
Broke well, settled third rail, out for mid-track bid, ran on strongly, just held.
Broke well, settled second one off, challenged entering straight, beaten off but kept on well.
Broke well, midfield one off, wide bid off turn, ran on well.
Moderate start, midfield one off, kept on well under driving but unable to threaten.
Fair break, eased back to third last one off, improved wide turn, driven, found good stride late.
Moderate start, fourth last rail, bid between horses, kept on without being able to threaten.
Fair break, fifth one off, ridden turn, no real progress.
Taken back to rail second last, wide bid, modest progress.
Broke well, fourth one off, fourth into straight three wide, ridden, weakened.
Taken back to rear, rail bid straight, very modest progress.
Fair break, sixth rail, ridden turn, found nil.
Travelled strongly in 2nd 3Ls off the leader, loomed 200M out, accelerated to lead near 100M and kept on to the line.
Taken back after the start and well off the pace in early and middle stages, turned 3-wide inside 450M to commence his run, closed strongly to get within half length of the winner at the line.
Held up 2-wide in midfield, pressed on passing 350M, had an uninterrupted run in straight, finished well but was always held by the winner.
Restrained in a 2-wide position behind midfield, stayed on final 300M, nearest finish.
Driven forward, opened up a 3Ls lead but difficult to settle despite rider's effort, kept on well early part of straight, headed nearing 100M and weakened.
Settled in 4th about 5Ls behind leader in the first half of the race, saved ground on the inside, kept on one-paced when asked for effort final 250M.
Pushed along early to hold his position in midfield, guided to the inside nearing 1200M, 6Ls off the pace turning in but finished off only fairly when taken away from the fence to challenge.
Broke well from the inside draw then restrained to a midfield spot on the inside, was held up until passing 300M but couldn't find much when clear.
Taken across behind runners from draw 9, raced at the back over 10Ls off the pace and had plenty to do nearing 400M, switched widest in straight but could only make limited progress.
Positioned 2-wide in 3rd about 4Ls behind runaway leader, not quickened turning into straight, bumped twice before weakening out of the race inside 200M.
Caught 3-wide making the first turn then dropped back to the rear for cover, under serious pressure 550M out and was eased soon on straightening.

Began awkwardly from a poor draw, settled in 4th or 5th not far off, commenced move turning in, hit the front over 200 M out and soon drew clear, won easily.
Began with others, settled in rear of midfield on rails, fought on well under pressure in straight to grab 2nd closing stages.
Raced wide without cover in midfield early stages, moved forward to dispute lead 3-wide far side, hit the front upon straightening, unable to sustain effort under pressure in the run home.
Broke well, settled just worse than midfield, fought on steadily under pressure from midfield into straight.
Settled in forward of midfield, came under pressure to challenge upon straightening, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began the best from the one draw, ridden along for early pace, settled just off the speed in 3rd or 4th on rails far side, came under pressure from approaching straight, faded gradually.
Trailed the field to straight, only ran past well-beaten horses closing stages.
Settled in last few, went wide into straight, ran past well-beaten runners in the run home.
Niggled along early in midfield, held similar position far side, commenced move turning in, unable to sustain effort from 5th into straight.
Always in last few, saved ground turning in, made no further impression in straight.
Midfield early, took slightly closer order far side, came under pressure rounding home bend, found nothing from midfield into straight.
Always in last few and never seen with a chance.
Driven along from a poor draw to a forward position early, joined leaders coming out of back straight, folded up quickly after straightening.
From a wide draw, soon driven to quickly take up running, joined by two others over halfway out, dropped away inside 500 M.
Enjoyed the run of the race in 3rd spot behind the leaders. Kept on well to repel late challengers.
Rated worse than midfield 1 off with cover. Finished off strongly.
Camped in second position off a good pace, 2 wide. Hit the lead turning for home but was overhauled near the 100m.
Settled in a rearward position but was posted 3-4 wide without cover for most of the trip. Ran on well to make the frame. (See Racing Incidents.)
Travelled 3 deep at the rear with cover. Came widest on the home turn and worked soundly.
Made his run from second last along the rails. Worked home evenly without threatening towards the inside.
Settled worse than midfield, 2 wide with cover. Battled away in the home straight.
Settled with the backmakers, 2 deep with cover. Only plodded to the finishing line.
Travelled near midfield 1 off, struggled in the home straight.
Went forward and led at a genuine tempo along the fence, faded quickly over the final furlong.
Settled in about a midfield position along the paint. Failed to close off.
Urged early but left wide and without cover behind pace from 900M. Rallied on in the straight and dominated final furlong.
Raced 3-wide behind midfield. Swung widest and was 5Ls down turning in. Covered good ground for 2nd.
Away in line and settled 3-wide at midfield. Responded fairly well when asked in the straight but couldn't match the finishing effort of the front pair.
Not hurried early and sat 2-wide towards rear. Kicked with the main bunch in the straight but was interfered 250M. Resumed satisfactorily to make frame near the post.
Hard ridden early. Eventually cut to the fence and shared lead from 900M. Remained one-paced home straight.
Began well but not clear to cross. Gradually eased to a spot wide and without cover ahead of midfield from 900M. Held ground without threat in the straight.
Niggled along the fence after start and raced behind midfield. Shifted 2-wide in the straight and found difficulty in obtaining clear running 200M. Made up some late ground.
Bumped at start. Soon recovered to a spot 2-wide behind leaders. Well positioned to strike in the straight but only plugged on. Weakened final 100M.
Pressed early but couldn’t muster. Raced towards rear on fence to final stretch. Beat tired runners home.
Well enough away and was taken to 2-wide behind midfield. Unable to see daylight top of home straight and was hampered at 250M. Resumed fairly.
Rolled to park outside leader from widest barrier. Hit front passing 400M and peaked 250M.
Always at rear. Never in the hunt.
Good early speed and elected to sit behind leaders from 900M. Baulked for run early home straight and just ran on thereafter.
Last out. Given reminder to occupy a position at midfield on fence. Found nothing in the home straight.
Broke well, fourth rail, gap came early straight, led 250m out, comfortably.
Fast away, back to midfield one off, followed winner through, ran on but unable to threaten.
Not fast away, midfield rail, inside bid, kept on well.
Missed break, two lengths last early, improved on inside turn, caught in traffic, stayed on well late.
Broke well, third one off, ridden early straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well, joined leaders briefly but caught wide, midfield two off, wide bid, no kick.
Broke well, led and crossed, joined turn, went on again, ridden, weakened.
Moderate break, ridden early, second last one off, last into straight, drive, modest progress.
Fair break, midfield two off, wide bid, little progress.
Not quick into stride, third last three wide, wide bid, no impression.
Sluggish start, ridden, third last rail, improved rail, driven, found nil.
Fair break, up wide to join leaders, second one off, narrow lead leaving back, ridden, weakened.
Not fast away, held up rear, last into straight, wove between horses to lead 50m out and win going away.
Broke well, settled rail behind lead, out to lead 200m out, headed 50m out.
Fair break, sixth one off, mid-track bid, kept on well.
Fair break, midfield rail, inside bid, kept on without kick.
Fair break, ridden early to lead three wide, joined on both sides, went on mid-straight, unable to resist finishers.
Fair break, taken back to second last rail, driven and improved between runners, not able to threaten.
Fair break, midfield two off, wide bid, driven, some late progress.
Fair break, back to midfield one off, ridden, kept on one pace.
Fair break, ridden up wide to share lead, driven early straight, weakened.
Fair break, fifth one off, spun wide into straight, ridden, kept on but little progress.
Broke well, up to lead rail, joined by two horses, headed early straight, weakened.
Slightly missed break, mid-rear rail, ridden, one pace.
Fair break, ridden early to hold position but rear entering straight, driven, no progress.
Fair break, caught wide, back to second last two off, wide bid, driven, no headway.
Settled just outside the lead, favoured by the slow tempo, kicked away 300M to win.
Eased to sit just off the lead in 3 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, closed the race off strongly for 2nd.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader on the fence, blocked 400M, dashed strongly when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, little dash when clear.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 1L at slow sectionals, flattened 250M.
Trapped 4 wide in midfield throughout, 3.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, no turn of foot.
At rear, 8Ls off the leader, trapped 3-5 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, weakened 300M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, weakened 300M.
Eased back, not suited by the slow pace, never a factor.
At back, 6Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Eased to sit in midfield, raced very keenly, dropped off quickly 300M.
Never competitive.
Away well, led unhurried, kicked early straight, never headed.
Broke well, settled fourth behind moderate pace, poised for sprint home, not quite pace to trouble winner.
Away well, settled second rail, followed steady pace, challenged early straight, not pace to reach winner.
Taken back, settled second last rail, wide bid, not pace to challenge.
Fair break, third one off, bid three wide straight, ran on but no impression.
Stood in stalls and left six lengths, not rushed to make up ground, wide bid, little progress.
Steadied start, fifth rail, kept on when sprint came but no impression.
Broke well, sixth one off, shaken up early straight, not keep up when sprint came.
Travelled strongly just off the pace, responded well and got to the front nearing 150M, kept on to hold off a renewed challenge from the runner-up.

Crossed to the lead without making too much use, took them along steadily, kept on under pressure and rallied back when headed near 150M, lost out narrowly. (Jockey suspended 2 days for dropping his whip 50M out.)
Behind midfield and saved ground on the inside, took time to muster turning in, did best work over the final 200M.
Restrained after the start, settled near last 7Ls off the pace, switched widest turning in, finished well despite hanging in final 200M.
Fractious in the stall and was slow to begin, raced near last and much further back than intended, held up in early straight but ran on only fairly when clear.
In midfield early, strode forward to race outside the lead when left with no cover from 1100M, kept on to 200M then weakened.
Not far off in 4th place, pushed along inside 500M, kept on at the same pace under maximum pressure.
Settled along the fence about 4Ls back in 5th, found little when asked, and never going the pace to challenge, eased when beaten 100M out.
Raced as the backmarker from 1600M, had over 6Ls to make up going into final 400M, made limited progress only and was never a threat.
Positioned 2-wide behind mid-division, not picked up when asked inside 500M, out of contention mid-straight.
Broke well, up wide then third one off, challenged mid-straight, short battle, too strong.
Broke well, led and crossed, two lengths clear into straight, unable to resist winner.
Broke well, fifth rail, sixth into straight, ridden, finished well.
Fair break, not rushed, third last rail, inside bid, made ground strongly straight.
Fair break, taken back to third last one off, last early straight, wide bid, ran on well late.
Broke well, up to third rail, inside bid but gap closed, pulled out, ran on.
Moderate break, up to midfield one off, wide bid, kept on one pace.
Taken back, held up rear, made ground strongly under driving to finish just behind leading group.
Moderate break, fourth last rail, ridden early straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield three off no cover, wide bid, unable to threaten.
Fair break, sixth one off, ridden early straight, little response.
Fair break, ridden up to second rail, driven, faded tamely.
Moderate break, midfield rail, shaken up early straight, found nil.
Slotted into midfield spot 6ls or so back in running line, aided by strong tempo, began improving approaching bend, finished strongly down centre to gain advantage and survive late challenge.
Out with them, took ideal position on leaders back, right on strong speed to bend, no clear run until 150m, dashed strongly late when clear and was unlucky not to score.
Away smartly, raced in a prominent spot outside leader, did share of work with speed on throughout, kept giving and there to 150m but could not match dash of top pair late.
Showed usual speed to take up running, set a strong speed in front, had them chasing at 400m, stuck on well when headed inside 200m to narrowly miss place.
Slotted into perfect position 1 out 1 back, all favours in run, struggled to dash from 400m, kept on solidly in run to line just missing frame.
Drifted back from a wide gate, 10Ls or so away on rails, aided by strong tempo, closed well in straight to be nearest on line.
Ended up behind midfield 8Ls back in running line, had fair run with pace on, switched out and made even progress without threatening.
No early pace, settled behind midfield on rails, 6-7Ls back, suited by solid tempo, closed gradually in straight but couldn’t get nearer final 200m.
Assumed usual role towards rear, 8Ls or so away in running line, assisted by strong tempo, still well back turning, came widest and made some ground but set too big a task.
Little speed early and ended up back with last few, more than 12Ls back in middle stages, speed on helped but gave too much start, saved ground in straight making late headway.
Took up a decent position 4Ls or so back in 6th place, raced 2 wide to bend, no extra when pressure applied and weakened out tamely.
Missed the start and lost ground, settled at rear, more that 12Ls off leaders in mid section, aided by fast tempo, made no impression in straight.
Settled well back from widest alley, 11Ls of so from top end, helped by speed, made a brief effort coming wider on turn but made no real impact.
Positioned just off pace group, 3 to 4Ls away on rails, niggled along on circled given decent tempo, weakened right out in straight.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began well, soon held back to race with cover just off the pace, commenced move coming onto course proper, hit the front about 300 M out, won unextended.
Set early pace, passed by winner about 300 M out and completely outclassed, kept on for second.
In touch early, soon came under pressure after halfway mark, failed to quicken to challenge.
Slowly away, soon recovered to come within 1L of pace, weakened noticeably over 400 M out.
Made his run from behind midfield, 3 wide with cover. Took control of the race after the 150m from home and cruised to the line.
Raced in 2nd position outside the leader. Hit the lead 200m out but was collard inside the final 100m.
Slow to begin then was beaten for speed early, settling worse than midfield, 2 wide with cover. Rounded the home bend 5 deep and closed off well.
Stalked the leader from about the 800m along the paint. Got briefly held up early in the final stretch but didn't show any real dash once out into clear running.
Raced midfield, 2 wide with cover. Was steadied and shifted out into clear running near the 300m, made steady ground thereafter.
Travelled with the backmakers on the rails had cover. Kept on soundly without threatening.
Parked behind the speed travelling 1 off with cover on the circle. Faded over the last 100m.
Travelled in last position, 1 off with cover. Only plodded to the finishing line.
Camped midfield the fence. Failed to offer any extra effort when placed under pressure in the run home.
Settled back in the field 3 wide with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Ridden along to race with the leaders but was posted 3-4 wide without cover for most of the trip. Never likely.
Sent forward and led along the paint after a furlong. Commenced to hang in over the final 150m and punctured thereafter.
Led all along the stand's rail. Never challenged. Superb debut.

Began awkwardly, resulting in its rider becoming unbalanced. Soon recovered to a forward spot down the centre of the track. Pushed passing 450M but no answer to winner's kick. Fought on gamely to hold 2nd.
Began awkwardly. Soon resumed spot in pace group. Pressed passing 400M and found the winner too strong. Battled well for 2nd. Just failed closing stages.
Raced ahead of midfield early and tracked the leading division passing midpoint. Kept on to snatch a non-threatening 4th near the post.
Never far off the pace. Ridden passing midpoint but couldn't match the finishing effort of the front trio. Hung on for 4th until final stages.
Slow to begin and was bumped. Shaken up and reached the back of midfield midpoint. Hard ridden from 400M and covered some late ground but was beaten far by the principals.
Niggled early and raced within 3Ls of the pace. Gradually dropped towards rear midpoint despite effort of rider. Made some headway closing stages.
Behind pace early. Dropped to midfield midpoint. Responded fairly when asked passing 400M. Held ground thereafter.
Got its head up at start and was then hampered. Raced behind midfield early. Brief progress passing 400M but no extra final furlong.
At rear early and middle stages. Beat tired runners home.
Severely checked after start and raced towards rear. Improved to midfield at midpoint but failed to sustain passing 250M.
Badly checked after stat and trailed field. Never a factor.
At rear throughout. No impression.
Raced at midfield. Struggled from midpoint. Faded final furlong.
Good break, fifth one off, mid-track bid, led 250m out, ran on strongly.
Fair break, midfield one off, mid-track bid, ran on strongly, just held.
Well away, led then settled back fourth on rail, inside bid, kept on steadily.
Relaxed start, second last rail, improved wide turn, wide bid, led briefly 250m out, run flattened.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, bid between horses, ran on without being able to threaten.
Fair break, midfield rail, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, fourth last rail, inside bid, kept on quite well.
Moderate start, urged early, third last one off, wide bid, driven, limited progress.
Broke well, up to share lead one off, led entering turn and into straight, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, not rushed, mid-rear one off, wide bid, modest progress.
Slow start, last one off, bid between horses, no kick.
Broke well, third one off, shaken up early straight, little response, weakened.
Broke well, shared early lead until headed approaching turn, ridden early straight, weakened quickly.
Not well away, wide mid-rear, wide into straight, ridden, found nil.
Fair break, not rushed, second last one off, wide bid, ran on strongly, led near line.
Fair break, midfield three off, driven mid-straight, kept on very well.
Fair break, midfield three wide, improved turn, led 250m out, headed last 20m.
Slow into stride, last rail, inside bid ran on very well late.
Relaxed start, not rushed early, fourth last rail, inside bid, ran on very well late.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, improved wide turn, wide bid, kept on but unable to threaten.
Missed break, lost length, up to mid-rear two off, urged, wide bid, kept on one pace.
Broke well, sixth one off, inside bid, kept on under pressure without being able to threaten.
Good break, up three wide to share third, led briefly mid-straight, weakened late.
Broke fast fourth one off, driven, modest response, flattened out late.
Broke well, led rail, headed early straight, ridden, no response.
Broke well, second one off, ridden early straight, weakened.
Moderate start, rear three wide, wide bid, found little.
Sluggish start, ridden up along rail to share third, urged turn, no response.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M to win.
Hard ridden to obtain a rail spot in front of midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, checked 700M, made steady ground 400M, just beaten by a neck in 2nd.
Eased back, 6Ls behind the good pace on the fence, progressed steadily 300M, bumped 150M, ran on for 3rd.
Settled in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made ground 400M, run ended 150M.
Eased to rear, 8.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, lacked room 400M, made some ground when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield early, however trapped 3 wide no cover, pace good, moved forward to sit outside the lead 1200M, ran on until 200M flattened.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on ok.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls at good pace, hung on until 300M weakened.
Very slow away, 7.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, checked 1200M, no progress.
At back, 7.5Ls off the good pace, raced keenly, trapped 3 wide, no progress.
Eased back, trapped 3-4 wide, never a factor.
Hard ridden forward to cross, 2.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, checked 400M, dropped off afterwards.
Pushed forward to take the box seat, 2.5Ls off the good pace, dropped off quickly 600M.
Pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, quickened well when asked for efforts 400 M out, kept on soundly to score.
Pushed up to take a one-off spot just behind the leaders, ran on to contest the lead 300 M out, finished off soundly, narrowly beaten.
Urged along to take a one-off spot in midfield, responded well when asked 350 M out, hung in 250 M out, finished off well for 3rd.
Settled cozily on rails 2Ls off the pace, urged along 500 M out, one-paced in the home straight.
Pushed up to take a fence position in midfield, quickened well when asked 350 M out, on heels 200 M out, finished off well when clear. (Lost left front plate)
Settled one-off in the mid-division, swung widest for home, made up gradual ground final 350 M.
Settled 10Ls off the pace, urged along halfway, made up gradual ground final 300 M.
Pushed up early, travelled one-off in midfield, only made limited progress in the home straight.
Urged along to share the lead on rails, headed 400 M out, held ground until flattened 150 M out.
Pushed up to take a one-off spot 3Ls off the speed, urged along 500 M out, couldn't find extra final 250 M.
Awkward start, settled 8Ls off the pace, on heels 700 M out, never competitive.
Pushed early and travelled in midfield on rails, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Slow away, travelled rearward throughout the trip, urged along 700 M out, failed to make any progress.
Taken to a rearward position from his high draw, checked 700 M out, never competitive. (Lost left front plate)
Positioned on the outside of mid-pack, responded well under pressure, put in a late surge final 100M to snatch the race just before the line.
Tracked leader in a strongly run race, cruised to the lead inside 400M, kept on well when strongly challenged final 100M and was just denied.
Never far off behind leaders, came with a strong looking challenge 250M, ran on well to the line and was just held.
Tracked leader, kept on well to 100M, faded late stages but nevertheless a pleasing debut.
2Ls behind leader along the Stands' rail, kept on steadily to the line but never looked like getting to the leaders.
Held up behind mid-division, switched to outside 400M out for a clear run, made limited progress.
In midfield, kept on one-paced to the line and never troubled leaders.
In midfield, hard ridden inside 350M but only gave limited response and never going the pace to challenge.
Soon crossed to lead on the Stands' side, took them along at a good pace, lost lead nearing 400M, weakened steadily.
Held a midfield position along the stands' rail, checked 350M and stayed on at the same pace thereafter.
Behind midfield, not picked up when asked passing 400M. Never a threat.
In mid-division, came under serious pressure halfway, dropped out rapidly inside 250M.
Didn't travel at all and had to be pushed along early, left behind when the race got serious, eased 200M out. (Unacceptable Performance.)
At the rear, outpaced halfway and became detached, tailed out. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Easily ran up to share the lead on rails, quickened well when asked 350 M out, kept on soundly to win.
Easily ran up to share the lead on 2-deep, headed by the winner 150 M out, kept on soundly for 2nd.
Urged along to hold a fence position just off the pace, crowded 700 and 500 M out, never challenged the top two but kept on satisfactorily for 3rd.
Settled one-off just off the pace, crowded 700 and 500 M out, one-paced in the home straight.
Urged along early, travelled just behind the leaders on 3-deep, urged along turning for home, one-paced in the straight.
Lacked early speed as usual, travelled 4-5Ls off the pace, niggled along at home turn, made up gradual ground final 350 M.
Pushed up early, travelled 4-5Ls off the pace on rails, only made limited progress final 300 M, on heels 100 M out.
Taken back from his high draw, crowded 500 M out, failed to make up any ground.
Lacked early speed as usual, travelled 7Ls off the pace at the rear, crowded 200 M out, made no progress in the home straight.
Started awkwardly, pushed up to hold a fence position in midfield, urged along turning for home, got tired early in the home straight.
Settled one-off in midfield, urged along 500 M out, got tired 200 M out, soon faded.
Taken back from his high draw, on heels 600 M out, crowded 500 M out, never competitive.
Posted 3 wide in midfield early, raced keenly and allowed to roll forward to race outside leader, took a 1L lead turning, drew away in straight to score easily.
Showed speed from a wide gate to race in first few, had cover from midpoint, right there on turning, stayed on nicely but found winner too good on day.
Out well, took a nice spot on leaders back, 2-3ls back, helped by slow speed, kept on soundly in straight but unable to get closer final 150m.
Drifted back from wide alley to share rear on rails, slow pace early didn't help, 8ls or more away to bend, saved ground and did make some progress late to make frame.
Tardy into stride, not helped by slow speed early, next to last 2 wide 8ls or more away, well back turning, did make some ground late.
No early pace, raced behind midfield in running line, 6ls back, early pace didn't help chances, closed gradually down middle but lacked usual finish (lame day after).
Went to front, dictated tempo before pressured at midpoint, continued to be shaded on turning, knocked up last 250m.
Showed some speed and ended up in ideal spot 1 out 1 back, 1 pair further back on bend, niggled turning and lacked usual close, just plugged away late.
Didn't muster early speed and raced in midfield on rails, further back than usual, even trip in mid section, produced an average close in straight (jockey reported didn't stride out late).
No early speed, 6ls or so back on rails, not helped by average tempo, didn't dash and made minimal impact in straight.
Settled in midfield, 4ls back in running line, overaced in mid section, moved 3 wide turning but unable to finish off and faded.
Began well, took a nice trail on leaders back, all favours in run, came around heels turning, kept finding and got up to score in the final strides.
Showed speed, took up spot outside leader, had good trip with slow sections, took over soon after turning and led until shadows when overhauled.
Out in line, pressed on but caught 3 wide without cover, used a bit in run.
Fair to begin, raced in midfield or 3Ls back, steady sections helped, kept to rails and stayed on evenly to make frame without threatening first three.
Assumed coveted 1 out 1 back spot, 2Ls back appreciating slow sections, couldn't dash with them in straight and just stayed on at same speed.
Drifted back to tail from a wide alley, shared rear 6Ls or so back, harmed by slow tempo, made some minor ground down middle without threatening.
Out with rest, allowed to obtain cover in midfield 2 wide 4Ls back, overaced with slow sections, didn't dash at business end and just held ground late.
Settled behind midfield as usual, 5Ls back on rails, soft run but slow speed harmed chances, closed only fairly in straight making minimal progress.
Unable to slot in from wide alley, posted 4 wide without cover 5Ls back near rear, further back than usual and unsuited by slow sections, unable to make impact in straight.
Drifted back to share rear, 6Ls or so away on rails, slow tempo against, no real impression.
Raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 3Ls back on bend, niggled approaching bend, didn't find at business end and dropped off.
Settled behind midfield 5Ls away in 2 wide line, chances harmed by slow speed, never nearer in run to line. (Blood in trachea.)
Faded back from a wide gate, 3 wide at rear 5-6Ls back, overaced with slow sections, never got into it.
Showed speed to take up running, set a slow tempo in mid section, led to 400m when headed, folded tamely.

Tracked leader, came to challenge under pressure shortly after straightening, gained upper hand just inside 100 M.
Settled in last few, saved ground turning in, made up good ground down inside of straight to be nearest at finish.
Jumped best from a poor draw, soon taken back to travel without cover in 3rd about 2Ls off the speed, in similar position turning in, made modest headway under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Soon ridden to lead attempting to make all, held a healthy break to straight, unable to sustain effort and swamped over 100 M out.
Began with others, never far off to straight, awkwardly placed behind horses after straightening until the 300 M, made moderate progress in the run home.
Settled just better than midfield in 5th about 4Ls off the pace, similar turning in, kept on same pace under pressure without quickening.
Settled just worse than midfield, fought on steadily down inisde of straight without threatening.
Trailed the field, widest runner turning in, made up good ground down the centre of the track, never nearer.
Settled wide in midfield to straight, went wider turning in, one-paced until gradually fading out of contention inside final 100 M.
Settled in midfield, one-paced in the run home.
Began awkwardly, soon ridden along rails to forward of midfield, switched out to challenge on straightening, one-paced before fading inside final 200 M.
Soon taken back to race in last few after beginning from a poor draw, remained towards the rear entering straight, made no impression in the run home.
Began with others from a poor draw, gradually taken backward to just worse than midfield, similar turning in, ran home one-paced.
Never seen with a chance as a backmarker.
Made its run third from the rear travelling close to the rail with cover. Made the final bend 6 wide and swooped late to snatch victory on the wire.
Camped behind the speed in a handy position 3 wide with cover. Hit the front at the 100m but was claimed late.
Sent straight to the front and crossed onto the fence after the 800m. Maintained a sound gallop all the way down the running.
Parked 3 back the fence. Railed up in the home straight & whacked away at the same pace in the run to the line.
Settled behind midfield 2-3 deep with cover. Rallied 4 wide on the home turn and made some ground in the final stretch.
Tracked the leader along the paint. Failed to quicken in the straight and plugged away to the finish.
Settled close to midfield, 2 wide with cover. Only plodded to the finishing line.
From a wide gate was posted 3-4 wide had some cover for most of the trip, midfield. Never likely.
Posted in the leading trio 3-4 wide without cover on the circle. Faded quickly over the final furlong.
Was taken across behind runners from a wide gate, settling with the backmakers, 3 wide with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Settled a long last, almost being detached from the field. Past one very tired runner close to home.
Raced outside the leader about a length back. Cornered 3 deep but was gassed buy the final furlong.
Trailed field on fence. Swung widest and was 6Ls down on straightening. Dashed strongly and prevailed near the post for a last to first victory.
Ridden from high draw. Slotted to a spot on fence behind pace from 900M. Challenged the leader early home straight and hit front 200M. Every chance to score but was caught by the winner final stages.
Shaken up early and led on fence. Headed passing 200M but hung on gamely for 3rd.
Never far off the pace on fence. Ideal position to strike in the straight. Kept giving but lacked the kick to beat the front trio.
2-wide towards rear. Took inside run and was 4Ls back turning in. Made steady headway until hampered concluding stages. Not fully tested.
Well enough away. Ended up wide and without cover behind midfield early. Improved outside to reach the back of leading section entering home straight. Plugged on until no extra final furlong.
At midfield on fence to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch thereafter.
2-wide at midfield early. Dropped towards rear rounding home turn. Failed to progress in the straight.
3-wide towards rear to home straight. Found nothing under pressure.
Failed to muster early despite effort of rider. Travelled wide and without cover behind midfield to home straight. Well beaten 300M.
Broke left and bumped hard, midfield, driven 300m out, all out, slow gain, led on the line.
Quick clean jump, sat just behind the pace in third along the rail, came free 350m out, led 200m, long drive, lost lead right at the wire.
Jumped well, last three one off the rail, swung wide top of the straight, gained smartly along the stand side for third.
Jumped well, perfectly placed in fourth behind the pace, strong urging coming home, evenly at best.
Broke sideway and knocked hard, sat ninth along the rail four back, long hard drive coming home and finished strongly late.
Jumped well, settled in rear through out, one pace at best.
Clean jump. Settled quickly three back along the fence in sixth. Free late, kept on evenly under strong urging.
Jumped a bit awkward but soon recovered. Left without cover 3-deep, one pace home, no threat.
Broke left. Last two runners through out. Swung 8-wide top of the straight, passed several tiring runners near the stand side.
Quick jump, disputed early lead, settled second one over. No threat under an all out drive.
Quickest of all. Pulled to early lead along the fence, strong drive entering the straight, weakened inside the last 100m.
Slow jump. Near rear in eighth, found little.
A bit slow from the gates. Settled last and unable to keep up. Widest of all at the top of the straight, found nothing when asked.
Missed jump and settled in 12th. No respond and beaten badly.
Quickly away and led easily. Challenged on the bend and sprinted quickly away from 600m out. Kept on well under a strong drive, just held.
Fair jump. Sat quietly in third, challenged 300m out, came strongly and just missed catching the winner.
Broke sideway and lost ground. Settled patiently in rear. Too far behind but still gained strongly near the stand rail to take third. Strong performance.
Fair jump. On pace, challenged 600m out but unable to overtake lead. All out and tired 200m from home.
Poor jump and recovered quickly enough to sit sixth along the fence. Laid in under a strong drive, no threat to the first three.
Fair jump. Rear as always. Pushed out coming home, one pace at best.
Quickly away. Taken back to fifth. Made strong headway from 600m to the top of the lane, found no more inside the last 200m.
A touch slow from the gates. Settled near rear. No threat.
Sluggish start but soon gathered his feet and settled in fourth along the rail. Shaken 600m out to keep up with pace, tired badly 300m out.
Slow jump. Sat in 11th along the rail. Found little under strong urging.
Jumped well. Left 3-deep without cover in 5th. Strong headway from 600m out when pace quickened up. Refused to change lead coming home. Beaten 200m out.
Fair jump. Lack early speed to keep up. Found nothing coming home.
Hampered badly at break. Taken to last. Beaten badly.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 400M to win.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader on the rails, benefited by the fast pace, checked 800M, progressed steadily 300M for 2nd.
Eased to sit in midfield along the fence, 5.5Ls off the leader, helped by the fast tempo, made steady ground 200M for 3rd.
Box seat, 2Ls off the fast pace, bumped 300M, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader, suited by the fast tempo, but trapped 3-4 wide, made some ground 250M.
Eased to rear, 9Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M.
Bumped start, hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, bumped 300M, flattened 200M.
Took rail easily and led by 2Ls at fast sectionals, hung on until 250M weakened.
Midfield, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, no turn of foot in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, no progress.
At back, 8.5Ls off the leader along the fence, benefited by the fast pace, no progress.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, suited by the fast tempo, however soon weakened 300M.
Never better than midfield, tailed out.
Never a factor, tailed out.
Pushed hard early to track the leader, hit front 400 M out, kept on soundly to score.
Lacked early speed and travelled 7Ls off the speed, suited by the strong pace, finished off soundly final 350 M for 2nd.
Pushed up early, travelled 2-3Ls off the pace, responded satisfactorily when asked in the home straight, kept on for 3rd.
Lacked early speed and travelled rearward, niggled along halfway, shifted widest for home, ran on well final 300 M, just late for a place.
Settled in midfield on rail, kept on fairly when asked in the home straight, rather one-paced. (Lost left front plate)
Lacked early speed despite being urged along, lost touch halfway, finished off well final 300 M and made up some late ground.
Raced handy but caught wide early, proved difficult to settle when restrained 700 M out, held ground until got tired 150 M out.
Pushed hard early and travelled 5Ls off the pace, only passed a few tired runners in the home straight.
Urged along to lead on the rail, caught by the winner 400 M out, soon weakened.
Pushed early, drifted back gradually halfway, never competitive.
Travelled rearward throughout the trip, never competitive.
Pushed up to track leaders, hung out 700 M out, weakened at the top of the home straight, dropped out.
Driven forward to race at the hindquarters of the leader, in front 300M and quickly scooted clear, kept on well over the final stages.

Guided to the fence and settled towards the rear, switched out 500M, responded well under hands and heels riding to get within half length of the winner at the line. (Jockey had his whip knocked off 300M.)
Dropped back to last soon after start, 6Ls to make up turning in, stayed on from off the pace to go 3rd a few strides from home.
Positioned 2-wide towards the rear, had every chance turning into straight, kept on evenly to line but not going the pace to seriously challenge.
Positively ridden, handily placed in 4th just off the pace, couldn't quicken with the winner when the race got serious, one-paced final 200M and lost a placing close home.
Held up behind midfield and saved ground along the fence, angled out for a clear run 450M but lacked the speed to get on terms with the leaders.
Restrained to a 2-wide position near the rear, swung widest into straight, made limited progress only and was never threatening.
3Ls back in midfield along the inside, kept on at the same pace inside 400M, steadily weakened final stages.
In mid-division, raced a shade keen in middle stages, kept on one-paced when driven out inside 400M.
Quickly into stride, soon led and set a good pace in the first half, headed nearing 300M, no extra final 150M.
Tracked leaders along the fence, not quickened when asked, weakened passing 200M.
Always prominent, quickened well when asked 400 M out and soon led, kept on soundly to score.
Easily ran up to share the lead, responded well when asked 400 M out, headed 250 M out, kept on well for 2nd.
Out in line, settled within striking distance from the leaders, responded satisfactorily when asked 400 M out, ran on steadily for 3rd.
Easily ran up to share the lead, headed 250 M out, hung in in the concluding stages, just missed a place.
Lacked early speed, drifted back gradually towards the rear halfway, badly held up until 200 M out, finished off strongly when clear, too late.
Pushed up early to catch up with the pace, hung in 400 M out, held up in the concluding stages, kept on satisfactorily, not fully tested.
Travelled in midfield early, urged along to maintain position halfway, made up gradual ground final 300 M out, crowded 50 M out.
Urged along to maintain a position in midfield, finished off satisfactorily final 300 M, crowded 50 M out.
Settled 3-4Ls off the speed, finished off fairly, only made limited progress final 250 M.
Settled just off the pace, held ground until got tired 250 M out.
Lacked early speed and travelled at the rear, urged along halfway, failed to make up any ground.
Settled in midfield, gave no response when asked for efforts 400 M out, soon faded.
Settled just behind the leaders, failed to keep on 300 M out, soon weakened. (Bled and abraded both hinds)
Settled 2Ls off the speed, outpaced halfway, gave ground.
Drifted back as usual, raced 7-8Ls back in 2 wide line, appreciated solid pace on, came to middle in straight and unleashed strong finish to get up late.
Settled in midfield 5Ls or so away in midfield, strong tempo helped, made a 2 wide run before 400m, kept closing to take lead only to be outdone final 50m.
Used a bit to cross from outside gate, kept speed strong throughout, 2Ls clear on turn, battled bravely and was overhauled final 100m.
Taken back from a wide gate, 10Ls or so away in run, aided by strong tempo, took inside runs approaching turn and made good ground late to share 4th.
Took an ideal spot following pace trio 3-4Ls back, strong pace on to bend, kept on steadily without threatening and did enough to share frame.
Began well, used a bit early, took a nice spot on leaders back, on decent pace throughout, in mix for most of straight but just tired final 100m.
Even break, taken back from an awkward draw, ended up sharing rear on rails more than 10Ls back, took inside runs and closed creditably from an impossible spot.
Ended up in midfield on rails 6ls or so back, speed suited and saved plenty of ground on bend, closed gradually before peaking at 100m.
Drifted back from an awkward draw, nearly 10Ls away racing 2-3 wide in mid section, strong speed on helped, made some progress but unable to quicken, ground away.
Showed speed to position outside leader, worked a bit with good speed on, ridden along on bend, steadily gave ground from 300m.
Settled behind pace, 2 wide 4ls back, even trip in mid section, began to struggle and lost ground from 400m, dropped right out in straight.
Didn’t muster and was further back than usual, raced 3 wide with cover 7Ls or so back, still just off midfield turning, made no real impact in straight.
Positioned 3 and 4 wide without cover, best part of 11-12Ls back near rear in run, hard run took toll in straight and folded tamely.
Missed kick, went forward but planted 3 wide without cover, struggling approaching bend and dropped right out in straight.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Broke well from the one draw to make all, went clear in straight, won readily.
Chased leader, shuffled back to 4th just over 2Ls back around the bend, fought on steadily after straightening to reach 2nd over 100 M out.
Never far off, chased leader into straight, ran home one-paced.
Settled in rear of midfield to straight, made steady headway without threatening.
Raced wide without cover in midfield, closer up going up Rock, remained wide into straight, kept on well to finish. (Tactic questioned.)
Began from a wide draw, settled at the back, commenced run around the field rounding home bend, very wide turning in, made moderate headway past well-beaten horses.
Settled in midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, kept on before fading under pressure inside final 100 M.
Began from the widest barrier, remained well back into straight, only ran past well-beaten horses closing stages.
Began in midfield, gradually shuffled back behind midfield far side, dropped to last few into straight, made no further impression.
Began with others, settled in forward of midfield in 6th, remained similar turning into straight, faded under pressure inside final 200 M. (Distressed.)
Sluggish start, driven forward to wide in midfield early, made another rapid move out wide over 800 M out joining the leader at Rock, soon found no extra and dropped out after straightening.
Always in last few and never seen with a chance.
Handed up the lead and box seated after the 700m. Wound up for most of the straight and rattled home to snatch victory in the shadows of the post.
Showed good speed to cross and take up the running. Kicked clear early in the straight but was mowed down close to the wire.
Raced in a handy position, 2 wide with cover. Battled away in the run home and finished off satisfactorily.
Copped a heavy bump early then had a nice run in transit, midfield the fence with cover. Finished off well to make the frame.
Had every conceivable chance after settling 3 back the paint. Maintained an even gallop down the running.
Slow to begin then was beaten for speed early making its run from 3rd last, on the rails. Closed off well.
Sent forward and although 3 wide after the 600m, was able to find some cover on the circle. Somewhat one paced in the final stretch.

Not the best away then became unbalanced after shifting in quickly and bumping with another runner soon after the start. Couldn't go the early pace and settled at the rear of the field. 1 off with cover. Struggled in the straight.
Settled worse than midfield but when racing on the fence, shifted out across heels near the 600m and was checked. Plugged away over the final stages.
Travelled with the backmakers 1 off with cover but was checked & carted off its line on the circle and hung out for a short distance afterwards. Came widest in the straight but was never likely.
Worked forward to race outside the leader. Was a beaten horse before the home bend.
Began from a wide gate & spent little energy early and travelled in last position on the paint with cover. Whacked away in the run home.
At rear on fence to home turn. Swung widest and was 5Ls down turning into home. Rallied on to come on top near the post.
Tracked the leading section on fence to home straight. Kept giving through runners for 2nd but no match with the winner's turn of foot closing stages.
Soon led on fence. Held a 1L advantage final 200M but failed to repel the front pair final stages.
Behind midfield on fence. Took inside run on straightening. One-paced to conclude.
2-wide at rear early and middle stages. Improved gradually 3-wide making home turn. 4Ls away turning in. Made headway steadily thereafter.
One-off behind leader to home straight. Plugged on but lacked extra gear to threaten the principals.
2-wide at midfield early. Shifted 3-wide back straight. Ridden approaching home turn but only held ground. Out of contention final 200M (substantial amount of blood in horse's trachea).
2-wide towards rear. Nothing to offer when asked home straight. Faded final 250M.
Fair jump. Settled quietly 4-back along the rail in 9th. Came free 200m out, led from 100m and won easily going away.
Head slightly in the air out of the gate. Track leader in the back straight, assumed lead entered the straight. All out to hold second.
Fair jump. Sat 7th along the fence, kept on evenly under pressure in the last 300m.
Smooth jump. Disputed early lead but jock chose to take back to the rail in mid-field. One pace under pressure.
Quickest off the block. Pressured early pace. Track leader from 1200m. One pace coming home.
Broke in air from the barrier. Kept in rear. Never totally free until the last 150m, finished well late.
Broke sideway and steadied after break. Midfield 6th. Driven from 450m out 4-deep, not much left inside the last 200m.
Fair jump, disputed lead at once, led at 1200m, allowed to lead unchallenged, shaken 400m out and found no more last 200m.
Good jump. Always in rear, ran on late when the race was over.
Good jump. Held up, driven hard to keep up from 700m out, beaten 300m out.
Slowly away. Last along the fence. Found little.
Clean jump. Prominent. Unable to drop in and parked 3 deep without cover until the 600m marker. Ridden to keep up on the home bend, beaten entered the straight.
Broke sideway from the jump. Settled in last, shaken 400m out, widest of all at the top of the straight. Continued to gain under pressure, led two jumps from the line.
Jumped well. Calmly in 8th along the rail. Well-timed move from 250m, pushed out, touched off on the line.
Fair jump. Sat easily in 7th behind the hot pace. Driven 300m out, all out and just held third place.
Fair jump. Steadied at once. Taken back to 10th along the fence. Came smartly in the last 100m, just missed the money.
Fair jump. Prominent. Sat just behind the quick pace. All chance to win coming home, one pace at best.
Quickest of all from the barriers. Pressured hard by two horses along the fence. Led and quickened away from 450m out. Weakened and overtaken in the last 50m.
Sluggish start. Recovered at once and travelled easily in the rear. Second widest 9 deep at top of the straight, caught and steadied traffic inside the last 100m, kept on well.
Quickly away. Easy in 6th along the rail, shaken 500m out, kept on one pace to the wire.
Jumped well. 3-deep without cover in 5th, not quickened.
Quickest off the block. Hard ridden to establish position, parked 3 deep and pressure the leaders all the way to the straight. Kept fighting to the line without quitting.
Slowly away. Held up towards rear in 9th. Found little under pressure.
Good jump. Hard pressed the leaders at once, led without cover from 800m to the straight, weakened from 200m out.
Shared the lead easily at good pace 2 wide, closed off strongly to win.
Hard ridden early but didn't muster, then eased back for cover, raced very keenly, 4Ls off the good pace 2 wide, held up 300M, made steady ground when clear for 2nd.
Midfield along the fence, 3Ls off the good pace, progressed steadily 250M for 3rd.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, swept 3-4 wide to make ground around the field, dashed strongly 300M.
Box seat, pace good, lacked room 300M, just held ground.
Pushed to share the lead at good pace along the fence, ran on until 200M flattened.
Midfield, 3Ls behind the good pace 2 wide, very one paced.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, raced very keenly, 4Ls off the good pace, ran on ok despite losing so much ground at bends.
Eased to take rail at rear, 7Ls off the good pace, blocked most straight, ran on well to the line.
Bumped start, pushed forward, 1L off the good pace 2 wide, emptied 250M.
Eased at start to take rail behind the field, 5.5Ls off the good pace, checked and crowded for room for a number of occasions in early middle stages, no progress in straight.
Eased to sit off the lead, 2Ls behind the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, weakened 250M.
Good jump. Led easily and never challenged until the straight. Pushed out to win.
Clean jump. In touch 4th along the fence. Steadied between horses at 250m, came well under pressure for 2nd.
Slow jump. Midfield 5th. All out, evenly at best.
Jumped well. Taken back to last along the rail. Ran on late for 4th, gave up too much ground early on.
Broke with head in the air but recovered at once. Kept near rear along the fence. Only managed to stay one pace coming home.
Good jump. Sat quietly behind the winner along the fence. Pushed out in the straight but kept on one pace to the wire.
Fair jump. Track leaders. Found nothing and beaten 200m out.
Fair jump. Kept in rear. Widest 8 deep at top of the straight, not quickened, needs race after long break.
Jumped well. Midfield, ridden 500m out but was unable to keep up, beaten 300m out.
Held up behind midfield, quickened well inside 200M, got to the front near the line and prevailed in a 3 way photo finish.
Positioned 3-wide towards the rear, driven 400M out, responded well and made good headway inside 300M, drifted in under pressure late stages and was narrowly beaten.
Sped to the lead and took them along at a sound tempo, ran on well when driven inside 300M, caught by first two final stride.
Tracked leader, loomed a threat 250M out, kept on well enough but couldn't quite get to the leader.
In midfield along the fence, kept on steadily but never going the pace to challenge.
Positioned one out one back, couldn't find extra to challenge turning in, kept on to the line one paced.
Close enough to the pace, stayed on at the same pace under a hands and heels ride. (Jockey dropped whip rounding the home turn.)
Dropped back to the rear, switched to 3-wide entering the back straight, made limited progress on straightening.
Towards the rear 5Ls back, not picked up going into straight, effort flattened out 200M.
Slowly away, ended up 5Ls back at the tail of the field, didn't respond when put to pressure inside 400M, ran disappointingly. (Jockey said his horse inclined to lay out at various stages.)
Not far off leaders but was caught 3-wide without cover, found nothing in straight, weakened rapidly nearing 200M.

Placing: UR
Comment: Away very awkwardly, rider dislodged.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
