Broke well to lead or dispute lead racing along grandstand rails, drew clear under pressure to take charge inside final 200 M. (Bled.)
Always thereabouts, came to challenge under pressure inside final 200 M but unable to quicken to threaten.

Worked his way across from the innermost draw to join leader and eventual winner on grandstand side over 700 M out, held slender advantage for about 300 metres before headed about 350 M out, plugged on for remote 3rd.
Began moderately, soon settled in last few, took closer order coming onto course proper, kept on steadily under pressure without quickening.
Not far off in 4th racing near the centre of the track before giving ground gradually from the 300 M mark.
Began well, settled just off lead in 5th, kept on one pace under pressure without quickening inside 300 M.
Not far off early stages, dropped to midfield coming onto course proper, faded further inside final 300 M.
Began awkwardly, soon given reminders before tightened early stages, came under pressure coming onto course proper racing awkwardly every now and then, faded out of it inside final 200 M.
Began fairly, settled in last few, soon came under pressure inside 400 M, found nothing.
Began well, gradually settled in last few along grandstand rails, came under pressure inside 400 M, found nothing.
Began slowly losing ground, remained in rear throughout, made no impression.
Never better than midfield racing down the centre of the track, dropped away quickly under pressure after the halfway mark.
Settled 3 back the paint. Straightened up 3 wide and quickened well to have the race in its keeping a 100m out.
Enjoyed the run of the race box seating. Punched through to lead after the 250m but was collard over the final 100m.
Settled just back from midfield, 2 wide with cover. Rounded the home turn 6 deep and maintained a strong gallop all the way down the running.
Rated behind midfield the fence. Ran on soundly over the final stages to land in the frame.
Parked 3 back, 2 deep with cover. Straightened 5 wide but didn’t find much extra in the run home.
Camped close to midfield 2 wide with cover. Loomed up approaching the 200m, but plugged away one paced thereafter.
Made his run third from the rear, 1 off with cover. Made reasonable late ground.
Was left racing 3 wide without cover after the 1200m, whilst travelling slightly worse than midfield. Came wide in the straight but was one paced over the final stages.
Copped a bit of interference early settling at the tail of the field 1 off with cover. Weaved a passage through towards the inside and made modest ground.
Strolled forward from the outside barrier to eventually cross and race as joint leader, 1 off after the 900m. Was swamped over the final 100m.
Settled 1 out 1 back. Had every chance but was a beaten horse prior to the furlong.
Settled with the backmakers along the fence, but never really travelled and failed to close off. (see incident report)
Settled as equal leader along the paint. Gave in very timidly early in the straight.
Travelled at the rear of the field 3 wide with cover after being taken back from a wide gate. Struggled in the home straight.
2-wide behind midfield. Commenced run 3-wide passing 600M and reached the leading section turning in. Kept on well to repel rivals home.
Well enough away, ended up one-out-one-back first turn. Dropped to midfield passing 600M when runners around improved. Closed off satisfactorily in the straight but post came too soon.
Trapped wide early. Strode forward to park one-off behind leader first turn. Battled gamely with the winner home straight until no extra final 100M. Lost 2nd near finish.
Never far off the pace on fence to home straight. One-paced to conclude.
Back with last few on fence to home straight and made some late headway.
Eased to 2-wide at rear after start. Swung widest rounding home turn and made up some ground.
Led on fence until overhauled passing 400M. Weakened final furlong.
Towards rear. Brief progress outside home turn but failed to sustain soon after straightening.
Jumped well. Travelled 4-deep without cover the entire trip. Pressed hard 600m out 5-deep and gaining. Came on again at 150m and never looked back.
Jumped well. Prominent, sat just behind the leaders, led 200m out, kept on well until overtaken late by the winner.
Off slowly. Near rear, 3-wide with cover while travelling easy, shaken from 250m out and finished gamely.
Fair jump. Rear, free 250m, pushed out, no match to the first three.
Clean jump. One of the two Back-markers along the rail, driven 350m out, ran on well between runners.
Bumped hard off jump. Raced 3-wide without cover from the go until the straight. One pace to the line.
Slowly away. Trailed in last. Came free last 200m, finished well passing half the field.
Jumped well. Quickest of all, track leader, one pace under pressure.
Off a step slow. Recovered and sat behind the early pace leaders, found little under pressure coming home.
Broke well. Always rear, widest of all 8-deep entering the straight, kept on evenly.
Quick jump. Midfield, one pace under drive.
Jumped well. Chased leaders, not quickened under pressure.
Missed jump. Rear, checked at 1000m to avoid clipping heels, no threat in the straight, diagnosed with internal bleeding.
Bumped at start. Disputed lead, led after 200m, unchallenged until entering the straight, found little under drive and beaten 200m out.
Quickly away. Led easily, overtaken before the bend at 800m, shaken from 350m out, all out, led again inside the last 100m.
Quickly away. Hard ridden after jump for a leading position, raced 3-wide without cover until the 800m mark, pushed out from 400m out and stayed on stubbornly to the line.
Good jump. Tracked leaders along the rail. Belated move from 200m, unable to catch the long gone winner, kept third easily.
Broke sideway. Kept in rear, finished smartly late.
Missed jump totally. Pulled hard. Driven from a long way out, no threat.
Poor jump. Settled in rear between runners, one pace under drive, first race in 6 months.
Broke sideway. Midfield. 4-back along the fence in 9th, one pace under drive.
Fair jump. Mid-pack between runners, shaken 300m out, found little.
Jumped awkwardly. Always in rear, too far behind, one pace coming home.
Fair jump. Midfield, 3-deep without cover the whole race, no threat.
Knocked hard after break. Always trailed. Weakly.
Quickly away. Forced pace. Led at 800m, beaten at top of the straight.
Broke sideway. Rear, never in contention, weak finish.
Poor break. Trailed badly, beaten from a long way out and never closed.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, won by a very narrow margin.
Eased to rear and took rail, 8Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 300M, dashed strongly when clear, just beaten by a nose in 2nd.
Eased to rear for cover, 8Ls off the leaders 3 wide, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, ran a strong 3rd.
Hard ridden forward, 1L off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, raced very keen, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M, run ended 100M.
Pushed early, settled in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, lost ground 400M, little dash 100M.
Pushed forward, sat outside the leaders 3 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, led 300M, emptied 150M.
Hard ridden forward along the rails, 2Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened 200M.
Always midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, not suited by the slow pace, no turn of foot.
Hard ridden early, 2.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened 200M.
Hard ridden to share the lead 2 wide at slow tempo, out of fuel 250M.
Hard ridden to take the rail and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, weakened 250M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leaders, trapped 4-5 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on OK.
Bumped start, 7Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Quickly away. Sat easily behind the leader. Pushed out from 350m out, fought hard between runners, pulled away late.
Slow break. Tracked leaders along the rail. Came between runners from 250m out, outkicked late.
Good break. In touch, driven from 250m out, good respond, outkicked by winner.
Missed jump. Hard held in last, gave up too much ground, good belated finish.
Fair break. 3-back in 5th along the rail, one pace under pressure.
Good quick jump. Led after 100m, unchallenged until entered the straight, one pace. No threat.
Good jump. Raced without cover 3-wide much of the way, evenly under drive.
Awkward break. Rear, one pace under pressure and never in contention.
Soon led and took them along at a good pace, acted on the rain affected ground well, drew clear inside 300M and was never challenged.
Held up towards the rear, switched to outside of track, stayed on but not getting to the runaway winner.
Positioned 3-wide in midfield, kept on steadily final 400M for a non-threatening 3rd.
Along the 2-path and never far off the pace, went 2nd going into final 250M, faded final 100M.
Hard driven to find the lead but didn't show sufficient pace to do so, caught 3-wide no cover outside leaders, one paced turning in, weakened 200M.
Dropped back to last, switched to wide outside of straight for better ground but finished off only fairly.
Near the rear, had to be pushed along 500M out, found nothing in straight.
Towards rear along the inside, not picked up when asked, eased when no chance over the final stages.
Raced outside the lead, no extra inside 300M, weakened rapidly.
Tracked leaders couldn't pick up under pressure, dropped out 200M. (Jockey reported his horse didn't stretch out in the straight.)
Clean jump. Tracked leaders easily. All out drive in the straight and fought hard to win by a short margin at the wire.
Fair break. Tracked leader in 4th, responded well under pressure, just missed.
Good jump. On pace, led at 900m. Shaken at the top of the straight, overtaken at 300m, came again and fought bravely to the line for third.
Clean break. Rear. Gave up too much room early on, came charging inside the last 100m, strong finish but unable to make up the lost ground.
Off quickly. Led but taken back at 900m. Launched long drive from 600m out, led again and found no more in the last 100m. Long rest, needs race.
Slowly away. Midfield, shaken 350m out, one pace at best.
Clean break. Settled in rear, headway from 500m out 6-wide, driven from 350m out, ran on well to the wire.
Good jump. Midfield along the rail. Let go at 350m out, not quickened.
Steadied at break. Always last, never threatened in the straight.
Fair jump. Rear, no threat.
Fair jump. 5-back along the rail in 12th, found little in the straight.
Quickest of all. Midfield, lacks respond under drive.
Slowly away. Trailed in rear, headway 4-deep without cover from 800m out, beaten 300m out.

Out well, unable to slot in, posted 4 and 5 wide without cover in midfield, 5Ls back doing it tough but gradually improved on bend, joined in at 300m, kept fighting to score a tough win given workload.
No speed as usual and soon at rear, niggled along to keep touch 10Ls off lead, came widest turning and made many lengths down outside to take 2nd.
Drifted back from an outside alley, best part of 8Ls away near rear, made a wide run turning in, kept closing for a creditable 3rd.
Pressed on to take a prominent role outside leader, enjoyed trip with steady tempo, took over at 400m and although headed kept fighting to lose a place late.
Out in line, faded back to race behind midfield, 3 wide with cover 6Ls back, tracked into race nicely on bend, produced usual honest finish to be on heels of placegetters.
Began well enough, enjoyed run of race behind leader on rails, same position turning, stayed on evenly behind them without threatening, not far away at finish.
Fairly away, settled in midfield in running line, 3-4Ls back but was difficult to settle throughout, kept finding to 200m but unable to finish off thereafter.
Out with rest, settled just off pace 3Ls away on rails, easy time in mid section, inside runs appeared in the straight but only had one speed in finish.

Lacked early pace, settled behind midfield on rails 5Ls or so away, back in plenty of traffic to turn, angled clear but lacked dash of previous start and just battled. (Jockey reported didn’t handle track.)
Reasonable break, settled a little closer 3 wide with cover 3Ls back, improved approaching turn and looked a place chance but run ended and tired at 200m.
Went forward from an awkward draw but caught 3 wide, was on speed without cover on circle, niggled turning but gradually weakened after tough run.
Showed enough dash to obtain ideal spot 1 out 1 back, all favours in mid section, didn’t respond turning and unable to see out journey final 300m.
Drifted back into a spot behind midfield, raced 2 wide 6Ls back, fair trip to bend, didn’t find in straight.

Placing: DNF
Comment: Showed speed, took up front running and set terms to suit to bend, began to weaken at 400m and broke down soon after.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Virtually made all, momentarily headed inside 200 M, soon kicked back to re-gain slender advantage 100 M out, won well.
Quickly driven from the widest barrier to join the leader, remained similar into straight, hit the front briefly inside 200 M but unable to resist winner's renewed effort close to home.
Began with others, settled in midfield on rails, commenced move angling off the rails turning in, fought on steadily to reach 3rd over 100 M out but the post came far too soon.

Settled in 5th about 3Ls off the lead just better than midfield, commenced run around the bend gaining 3rd when 1L off the lead 3-wide turning for home, unable to sustain effort after straightening and faded while hanging in.
Soon taken across from a wide gate to trail the field to 400 M, saved ground on rails turning in, made steady headway down the straight without threatening.
Settled just off the pace on rails in 3rd or 4th, remained similar into straight, could only keep on at the one pace without quickening under pressure.
Raced in rear of midfield travelling keenly at times far side, kept on steadily in the run home.
Raced mainly 3-wide without cover in midfield, remained similar into straight, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Began fairly, soon taken back to race behind midfield, similar turning in, faded gradually after straightening.
Slowly away, soon taken across to travel one from last, came under pressure approaching home turn, could only go past well-beaten horses.
Raced wide in midfield early stages, gradually improved to a prominent position but remained wide without cover throughout, gave ground from approaching home turn when widest.
Began awkwardly, settled behind midfield, given one reminder approaching the Rock, dropped out home bend.
Began awkwardly then proved difficult to settle in the early stages eventually crossing to the fence in the lead after the 900m. Dug in deep over the final stages to repel a late challenge.
Posted 3 wide without cover after the 900m, behind midfield. Inclined to lay in early in the straight, however responded well over the final furlong and closed off nicely.
Settled in fourth position, 1 off with cover. Raced tight rounding the home turn, got going late and finished off soundly.
Stalked the leader after being crossed passing the 900m. Had every chance after box seating but was swamped late.
Worked forward to sit outside the leader. Kept on evenly over the concluding stages.
Mad its run third from the rear 2 wide with cover. Came widest in the straight and ranged up as a place hope before peaking on its run well short of the finish.
Settled in last position on the rail. Looked for runs between horses in the home straight but failed to make any appreciable ground.
Settled worse than midfield, on the fence. Stayed to the inside in the final stretch but was never likely.
Ridden early and took box seat. Rallied on home straight and hit front final furlong. Hung on well to score victory.
Parked one-off behind leader to home straight. Kept giving but failed to gain ground on winner.
Urged early but trapped 3-wide behind pace group. Slotted one-out-one-back home turn. Ran on home straight for 3rd without seriously troubling the front pair.
Led on fence until headed final furlong. Plugged on to finish 4th narrowly.
Trailed field early. Progressed from home turn. Swung widest and was 5Ls down on straightening. Covering ground steadily and just failed to make frame.
Soon eased towards rear. Improved to race behind midfield home turn. One-paced to conclude.
Raced behind midfield. Dropped towards rear rounding home turn. Awkwardly placed 300M. Made up some late ground thereafter.
At rear throughout. Never likely.
Began well and sat 2-wide ahead of midfield early. Dropped to midfield when unable to hold position from 800M. No response when asked in the straight.
Broke well, up along rail to lead, saddle slipped forward after 200m, still led by two lengths into straight, never headed.
Broke well, shared early lead, then headed on inside, tracked leader one off, kept on well, just failed.
Broke well, third rail, kept on well along rail, just held third place.
Slightly fluffed start, awkward and mid-rear, ran on well on inside, just missed third.
Slightly sluggish early, ridden up along rail to midfield, driven, kept on one pace.
Not well away, third last rail, ridden for run between horses, checked, kept on late.
Fair break, fifth one off, urged throughout, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Fair break, held up rear rail, inside bid straight, kept on.
Broke well, up wide to join leaders, over-racing when taken back to fourth, ridden, weakened.
Fair start, midfield three wide no cover, wide bid, little progress.
Fair break, no option but to take back from wide, rear one off, urged, no progress.
Fair break, fourth last one off, over-racing, then urged, wide bid, found nil.
Broke well, settled midfield rail, urged turn, driven for inside bid, wore down leader to hit front last 50m.
Fair break, midfield one off, sharp move far side to lead entering turn, driven, kept on, no extra late.
Fair break, bit sluggish early, second last rail, wide bid, ran on well.
Moderate break, fourth last one off, wide bid, kept on.
Broke well, led rail, headed and settled fourth, driven up to second mid-straight, no extra late.
Fair break, fourth last rail, back to last entering straight as clung to rail, inside bid, driven, kept on.
Fair break, taken back to rear one off, improved wide far side, lost place under driving, wide bid, kept on.
Broke well, fifth one off, ridden turn, no kick.
Broke well, led early and crossed, headed when tried to slow pace, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, fifth three wide, up to second, ridden before straight, weakened.
Fair break, up to second one off, steadily lost place.
Pushed forward to sit outside the lead, enjoyed the very slow sectionals, led and dominated 200M.
Hard ridden to occupy a midfield spot on the fence, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the very slow tempo, held up 4-2, dashed well when clear for 2nd.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, dashed well 300M despite not suited by the very slow pace.
Slow away, hard ridden to keep up at rear, 7Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the very slow pace, blocked most straight, dashed strongly when clear.
Very slow away, pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 5Ls off the leader, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the very slow pace.
Settled in box seat, benefited by the very slow tempo, ran on ok until 150M flattened.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the very slow pace 2 wide, under pressure 600M, just held ground in straight.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the very slow pace, little dash 150M.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the very slow pace, ran on fairly.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, harmed by the very slow pace, no dash.
Eased back, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the very slow pace, never competitive.
Jumped well, led early, headed and settled behind leader one off, out to lead early straight, kept on strongly when challenged.
Quickly away. Swiftly taken up an inside position behind the speed. Moved off the rail at top of the straight, all out and just missed by a short margin.
Hesitated leaving the gate. Midfield, all out drive, just got up for third.
Fair jump. All chance along the fence, one pace at best, no excuse.
Good jump. Ridden for early speed and settled in 4th, no threat.
Clean jump, hampered, slightly checked. Kept near rear in 8th, swung wide top of the straight, one pace at best under drive.
Slow break. Settled in rear, ridden from 450m out, never closed.

Jumped well. Ridden hard for an early lead and finally took lead at the 1100m mark. Unchallenged in the back straight, pushed out at top of the straight and found little, dropped out tamely in the last 150m.
Fair break. Found nothing coming home.
Poor break and made contact with other runner. Trailed in last, widest of all at top of the straight, never recovered any ground.
Sped to the front and led at a steady pace, opened up a 2Ls gap turning in, kept on strongly to the line and was never threatened. Impressive.
Placed one out one back, tried his hardest to get to the eventual winner, gave all but couldn't quite get there.
Up with the pace but was 3-wide without cover, looked dangerous when making his challenge 250M out but could not close the gap on the impressive winner.
Tracked leader on the inside, had every chance turning in and kept on effort to 100M, faded over the final stages.
Not hurried in early stages, settled towards the rear 5-6Ls off the pace, took time to gather turning in, did best work late.
Unable to slot in from draw 12 and travelled 3-wide in midfield throughout, ran on fairly final 300M and couldn't reach the leaders.
Restrained after the start, lost ground near 1100M and shuffled back to a rearward position, swung widest into straight and made only limited progress. (Jockey questioned.)
Held up in midfield along the inside, kept on one-paced to 100M then weakened.
Broke well, never far off the pace, under pressure passing 500M, could make no impression in straight and ran disappointingly.
Restrained to a midfield position along the 2-path, remained at the same pace to 200M, weakened over the final stages.
Taken back to the rear 7Ls behind leader, did not pick up when asked and had little left for closing stages.
Dropped back and soon guided to the fence, didn't travel and became detached from the field making the home turn, made limited progress inside 200M. (Jockey questioned / Mucopus).

From the widest barrier, began with others, settled in prominent 3rd 3-wide without cover, remained similar into straight, fought on well inside final 200 to hit front close to home.
Soon took up running, held slender lead to straight, fought on well to retain advantage down inside of straight only to be pipped at post.
Began well, shared the pace until finding no extra inside final 200 M.
Began awkwardly losing ground, settled 3-wide without cover in midfield in 6th, commenced run rounding home bend, ran home one-paced without quickening.
Began moderately, gradually recovered to just worse than midfield, briefly baulked for a run early in straight, ran past beaten horses closing stages.
Broke well, gradually settled in midfield, ran home one-paced under pressure from similar position into straight.
Soon dropped to the rear, trailed the field most of way.
Began moderately and lacked early speed, remained in last few, went wide into straight, made no further impression. (Mucus)
Began awkwardly losing ground, gradually picked up along rails to settle in 4th about 2Ls off the speed, soon faded under pressure.
Had the run of the race box seating. Peeled out after the 200m and took control for a relatively easy win.
Speared forward and led along the fence. Kicked 2L in front after turning for home but was claimed over the latter stages.
Rated 3 back, 1 off with cover. Cornered 5 wide and kept up a good gallop all the down the running.
Parked in 2nd position outside the leader. Commenced to tire inside the last 100m, but held on to make the frame.

Began awkwardly and was slow to begin. Couldn’t go the early speed of the race and pulled hard in the early stages when racing at the tail of the field 2-3 wide with cover. Switched wide in the straight, closed off strongly.
Had every chance after travelling 1 out 1 back. Was still in contention for a placing at the furlong but gave ground soon after.
From the outside gate was unable to gain cover and was posted 3 deep, midfield. Whacked away over the concluding stages.
Camped 3 back the fence. Kept on at the same pace over the final 300m.
Travelled close to midfield, 1 off with cover. Stayed on one paced in the run to the wining post.
Positioned midfield along the rail, 1 off with cover. Never really got in to the race and failed to close off.
Settled in about second from the rear along the paint. Only plodded to the line and failed to make any impression.
Travelled with the backmakers, 3 wide with cover. Came widest in the final stretch but was a beaten horse turning for home.
Began awkwardly settling behind midfield the fence. Struggled in the home straight.
Settled worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Failed to close off and was never a factor.
Away in line and raced 3-wide behind midfield. Urged and improved gradually home turn. Swung wide and was 5Ls down on straightening. Rallied on and battled well in a 4-way finish to prevail at post.
Well enough away and was eased to race 3-wide at midfield. Progressed to race 2Ls behind pace turning into home. Fought on gamely and hit front 100M. Hung on and was nailed at finish.
Crowded for room and became badly unbalanced after start. Settled 3-wide towards rear to home straight. Finished off strongly wide. Post came too soon.
Jumped fairly and raced 2-wide at midfield. Shifted out for clear run and was 4Ls back leaving the bend. Kept giving and had every chance final 150M. Couldn’t sustain effort near finish.
Niggled along the fence and settled behind leaders from 1200M. Peeled out rounding home turn. One-paced to conclude.
Driven early and share lead on fence from 1200M. Held a 1L advantage 300M but failed to contain the principals final 100M.
Ridden early and settled 2-wide ahead of midfield from 1300M. Kept on steadily home straight without threat.
Taken to rear on fence from high draw. Stayed near the fence into final stretch. Made up decent ground thereafter.
Ridden along but could only maintain position towards rear on fence. Beat tired runners home.
Taken to rear after start from wide barrier but trapped wide. Last turning in. No real progress home straight.
Slow to begin. Shaken along the fence and raced behind midfield from 1200M. Never picked up home straight.
Soon in leading section. Parked outside leader from 1200M. No response when asked 400M and dropped out 250M.
Given reminder after start but insufficient speed to cross. Ended up wide and without cover behind midfield. Faded soon after straightening.
Raced with pace group early. Elected to sit behind leaders 1200M but was caught 3-wide without cover. Struggled from 500M and finished tailed out.
Broke well, second rail, through to lead 300m out, ran on strongly.
Broke well, tacked across to join rail group five wide, led halfway, kept on, not match winner.
Fair break, midfield four off rail, challenged 300m out, kept on till weakened slightly late.
Broke well, third one off, challenged three off, no extra.
Fair break, midfield three off, ridden halfway and short of room, kept on one pace.
Not well away, rear midfield, looking for room halfway, kept on.
Broke fast, led, caught halfway, weakened.
Moderate break, mid-rear wide, ridden, no impression.
Slightly slow away, raced wide, ridden, no progress.
Broke well, beaten for early speed, ridden from halfway, no progress.
Slightly awkward start, slotted in behind rail leaders, shaken up, no impression.
Fair break, taken back to third last one off, improved turn, wide bid, soon clear.
Fair break, midfield rail, had to wait for run, kept on well when gap came.
Fair break, not much early speed, last nudged along, improved wide turn, driven, kept on well.
Fair break, midfield one off, went for inside run mid straight but no way through, ran on well when gap finally came.
Missed beat start, rail second last, bid between horses, checked, kept on when free.
Fair break, third rail, restrained, ridden early straight, up briefly to second, no kick.
Broke well, up wide to lead and eventually cross, led into straight and until 300m out, headed, weakened.
Fair break, midfield three wide then up to join leaders four wide, ridden early straight, fought on till weakened late.
Fair break, ridden to join leaders, slotted in second on rail, then back to fifth, inside bid, not much room, no kick.
Broke well ridden early, fourth one off, ridden entering turn, gradually weakened.
Moderate break, ridden early but back to fourth last four wide, up to midfield still wide, slipped back to last into straight, found nil.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M to score.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 400M, dashed strongly when clear to grab 2nd.
Pushed to share the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, dominated from 600M, overhauled 100M, ran on for 3rd.
Prominent, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, ran on well to the line.
Prominent early, 1.5Ls off the leader on the rails, pushed back 800M, blocked 4-2, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Very slow away, 7.5Ls off the leader at rear, trapped 4 wide throughout, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader, trapped 4 wide throughout no cover, harmed by the slow pace, made early move 600M, dashed well to the line.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, moved forward 600M to take advantages of the slow pace, ran on ok.
Very slow away, 6.5Ls off the leader at rear 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 200M.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, flattened 200M.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader along the fence, pushed back 800M, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, little dash when clear.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Took rail easily and shared lead at slow sectionals, eased box seat 800M, emptied 250M.
Midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, weakened 300M.
Smooth clean break. Sat quietly behind the pacesetters along the rail. Shaken from 250m out and led from 150m with something left in reserve.
Quickly away from the barrier. Challenged from 500m out, assumed lead easily from 300m out, kept on strongly but was no match to the stronger winner.
Slowly away. Always rear, swung 7-deep at top of the straight, continued to respond under drive and took a close third on the wire.
Broke to his left and lost ground at once. Trailed in last the entire trip. Widest of all 9-deep entering the straight, came strongly and just missed the money.
Good quick jump. Settled behind the early leaders at once without using too much energy. Long hard drive from the top of the straight to the wire, one pace.
Fair jump. Restrained and pulled in midfield. No threat, little respond.
Broke sideway to his left. In the rear, blocked and never really free until the last 150m, came well late.
Good break. Taken back to the rear along the fence at once. No threat under drive.
Slightly bumped off the jump. Midfield, all out drive in the straight, one pace at best.
Broke inward, soon led along the fence and was left along until the home turn. Dropped out tamely before reaching the last 200m.
Good jump. In touch in 5th along the rail, all chance to get into the money but failed to do so, no excuse.
Knocked hard and lost balance after the break. Left without cover for most of the race near rear. Not much left after entering the straight.
Slow break. Midfield along the fence, not a drop.
Hopped in air at break. Held back in mid-division, not quickened.

Held a 2-wide position in midfield, raced a shade keen when tempo slackened in middle stages, responded well when asked and swiftly moved to the lead 300M, found extra when strongly challenged by the runner-up final 150M.
Reserved in last about 8-9Ls off the pace in the first half, travelled well to straight, picked up pace inside 300M, stayed on best of all just failed to catch the winner.
Held up in midfield and saved ground along the fence, responded well turning in and looked a chance 300M out, gave all but not pace of first 2 final 100M.
Not hurried in early and middle stages, positioned in 2nd last 7Ls off the pace, stayed on only fairly and could make no impression on the leaders.
Taken back, raced in near last along the 2-path, bid wide nearing 600M but gave very limited response turning in.
Set a steady pace off the rail, pressed by another runner from 1000M, lost lead inside 300M, weakened from 200M out.
Settled in 3rd 3Ls behind leader, moved into contention inside 500M, made a short lived effort turning in, faded 300M out.
Tracked leader in the first half, moved forward to share lead passing 1000M, under pressure inside 500M, soon gave way. (Trainer questioned re riding tactics.)
Quickly off the block. Assumed lead and led unchallenged with total control in slow sectional time. Sprinted away under an all out drive and had just enough to hold off a late challenge.
Clean jump. Gave up too much room to the winner in slow time, came charging late and just missed catching the winner at the wire.
Quickly away. Prominent, closest one to catch the winner but only managed to hold on for third.
Fair jump. Tracked leaders along the rail. All out, no threat.
Quick start. Chased leader. All chance, one pace.
Fair jump. In touch, quickened well in the straight, unable to sustain the good run and finished one pace late.
Slowly away. Rear. Too far behind, ran on, too little too late.
Missed jump and settled in rear. Blocked for a long time in the straight. Came free late, finished well.
Fair jump. Taken back to rear at once. Last along the fence, never fired coming home.
Bumped hard after the break. Raced without cover 3-wide around. One pace coming home.
Broke to his left and trailed. Always in the rear. Very wide at top of the straight. No match here.
Fair jump. One of the two backmarkers. Widest of all at top of the straight, soon beaten.
Came across to slot in for cover 2 wide 5Ls back, improved 3 wide approaching turn, let down too strongly to gain lead inside 200m and hold off rivals nicely.
Taken back as usual, right out of it from wide alley, best part of 10Ls away at tail, still well back turning, made continual progress through field and did a big job to snare 2nd.
Angled into a spot just off midfield 6Ls or so away, 2 wide throughout and tracked eventual winner turning, responded gamely in straight and finished well to figure in first 3.
Began well, pressed on to sit outside leader, even speed however applied a bit of pressure to leader on bend, took over until tackled at 200m, lost a place late.
Out in line, posted 3 wide with cover in midfield, even passage to turn 5ls or so back, came wide at 400m and made gradual progress to 100m when peaked.
Began with rest, settled 3-4Ls away on rails, easy time throughout, kept giving in straight to finish on heels of place getters.
Went back from an awkward draw, raced 3 wide 7-8Ls back, had cover throughout, made steady progress down outside without threatening first 3 (see racing incidents).
Taken back to race in rear division, 9ls back on rails, quiet time in mid section, angled out turning and kept coming in straight without showing dash to threaten.
Showed early speed to hold a position on leaders back, even run throughout, right there turning but didn’t quicken, no extra final 200m.
Positioned nicely in 1 out 1 back spot, enjoyed a good trip to turn, in a bit of traffic 400m but just whacked away when clear. (Muco.)
Didn’t have early speed, behind midfield on rails 7Ls back settling, saved ground throughout, made some progress along inside in straight and ran out of room late although not threatening.
Taken back from an awkward draw, 9ls or so back racing 2 wide at rear, unable to make any serious impression in straight.
Showed usual speed to take up front running role, set an even tempo in middle section, worried on bend and headed soon after, folded tamely in straight.
Began well enough, pressed on from outside alley but caught deep without cover, 2Ls away but still 3 wide on bend, faded after a hard trip.
First away, took a trail racing 1 out 1 back, travelled well to bend, let down strongly and put rivals to the sword final 300m to score easily by a big margin.
Showed some early speed, but settled off pace 4Ls back on rails in midfield, tracked into race turning, made sound progress down middle just snaring 2nd late, found winner in a different class.
Positioned ideally on leaders back, had nice trip in transit to turn, angled clear and stayed on gamely but no match for winner.
Settled 3 wide behind midfield, 6-7Ls back, didn’t settle but had cover on circle, chased soundly down middle making many lengths to make frame.
Raced further back than usual, 6Ls or so back on rails, used little in mid section, made some ground in straight without looking likely.
Settled just off midfield 5-6Ls back in two wide line, travelled on turning but couldn’t see daylight rounding bend, made some late ground once eventually clear.
Bounced out, pressed on to take lead, set an even tempo in front, passed soon after 400m and just kept on at same speed thereafter.
Began in line, worked forward from a wide alley to race outside lead, fair run to turn, unable to lift a notch and condition gave out at 300m, gradually faded.
No speed, failed to muster and was a clear last early, did work to catch up in mid section, still last turning, made some progress along inside, fair run given circumstances.
Drifted back from a tricky alley, 3 wide behind midfield 6Ls or so away, same margin back to bend, whacked away in straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Taken back from an outside alley, raced near rear 2 wide 7Ls or so back, still well back turning and only made modest ground late.
No speed, raced 3 and 4 wide 7Ls back at rear, made some minor ground turning but run ended at 200m and showed little thereafter.
Out with them, stuck 3 wide without cover in midfield, did it tough to bend 4Ls or so back, soon dropped out when pressure was applied.
Ended up in midfield, 2 wide 4-5Ls back, struggling on turning, dropped right out.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Settled in midfield, commenced run up Rock to be one-out-one-back around the bend, sustained effort down straight to gain upper hand inside final 100 M.
Waited with, took off down far side to be close-up 2nd at Rock joining leader around the bend, hit the front upon straightening only to be headed 100 M out.
Settled in last few, remained similar into straight when widest turning in, made up good ground down outside of straight to be nearest at finish.
Settled just worse than midfield, commenced move to circle the field around the bend, fought on steadily down straight without quickening.
Broke well, settled just off the speed on rails, lost position when pace quickened around the Rock, saved ground on rails turning in, kept on steadily without quickening.
Travelled just better than midfield, became midfield around home bend, went wide into straight, ran home one-paced.

Gradually taken back from a wide draw to settle on rails in rear of midfield, dropped backward when pace quickened going up Rock, saved ground on rails turning in, baulked for a run on rails early in straight, one-paced.
Trailed the field to straight, went past well-beaten horses under pressure.
Raced keenly in 4th just better than midfield, made rapid progress inside eventual runner-up to lead leaving Rock, joined around the bend, dropped out under pressure after straightening.
Chased leader, yielded ground steadily from Rock.
Made running to 1000 M, still held 2L 4th into straight, soon weakened.
Settled with the backmakers, 3 wide with cover. Came widest over the final stages and let down strongly to claim the race with 50m to go.
Settled a loose 2 wide with cover in fifth position. Peeled out to make its run 3 wide without cover after the 500m. Hit the front approaching the 100m, but was overhauled soon after.
Raced 3 back on the fence with cover. Saved ground on the home turn and rallied to snare third.
Stalked the leader along the paint. Had every chance but couldn’t really quicken over the final 300m.
Led along the fence. Set moderate fractions and kept on fairly despite vying for leading duties after the 700m.
Made its run from well back, after settling on the paint. Railed up turning for home and made late ground without threatening.
Raced outside the leader during the middle stages before being crossed at racing 1 out 1 back after the 700m. Cornered five wide and showed no kick in the straight.
Travelled worse than midfield the fence. Attempted to improve and shifted away from the rail after the 700m. Was steadied when crowded near the 100m, but was spent force prior to that point.
Coursed wide in the early and middle stages whilst pursuing a prominent position. Eventually crossed and raced as joint leader passing the 800m. Was gassed in the straight.
Settled in 2nd last position, 1 off with cover. Kept to the inside in the final stretch but just plugged away not making any ground.
From a wide alley was taken back after being bumped, settling at the rear. Was under pressure a long way out and failed to make any impression.
Travelled 2 wide with cover for most of the trip behind midfield. Peeled 3 wide after the 700m, lost cover on the circle and struggled in the run home.
Taken to 3-wide towards rear from highest draw. Made run widest approaching home straight. Finished off strongly and dominated final 50M.
2-wide ahead of midfield. Took run on rail into final stretch. Kept giving but couldn't match the winner's turn of foot closing stages. All out to hold 2nd.
3-wide at midfield. Ridden to keep up home turn. Swung wide and was 3Ls down on straightening. Kicked with the winner but was outpaced passing 200M. Kept on and was just denied for 2nd.
With leaders on fence to home straight. Hit front final furlong but failed to repel the front trio final 100M. (Lame left fore).

Bumped and became badly unbalanced after start. Steadied to 2-wide behind midfield passing 900M. Improved with the field top of home straight but was baulked for run 250M. Resumed and ran on after 100M.
2-wide towards rear to home straight. Made up decent ground late.
Raced with leading section but was trapped 4-wide without cover to home straight. Shifted in and crowded up runner inside near 200M. Resumed fairly.

Began very awkwardly and made heavy contact with another runner. Soon driven to take up a forward spot in a 2-wide position. Plugged on early home straight and was bumped 200M. No progress thereafter.
Shaken up early and raced 3-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Closed off fairly overall despite being hampered at 100M.
Pressed early and was caught 3-wide without cover in the pace group. Hung on top of home straight until severely checked 200M. Failed to recover thereafter.
Behind midfield on fence early. Couldn't follow from home turn. Never likely home straight.
Checked to rear shortly after start. No impression thereafter.
Fair break, not much early speed, mid-rear rail, peeled off for mid-track bid, ran on well to lead 100m out.
Fair break, third rail, inside bid, led 250m out, ran on, winner too strong.
Fair break, midfield two off, improved wide straight, ran on well.
Broke well, not rushed, no route to rail, third last two off, mid-track bid, not quicken.
Fair break, ridden to join leaders, fifth two off, mid-track bid, not quicken.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, urged, short of room, angled out, kept on.
Not best away, last one off, widest bid, kept on but unable to threaten.
Fast break, up to join leaders three wide, settled second two off, led early straight, headed, no extra.
Slow away, second last rail, looking for run mid-straight when gap closed, no threat after check.
Fair break, sixth one off, shaken up for inside bid, no real progress.
Fair break, midfield rail, inside bid, no kick.
Broke well, led, headed early straight, weakened.
Broke well, led, steadied pace entering turn, kicked early straight, fought on gamely when challenged.
Fast away, led wide then settled second rail, challenged strongly mid-straight, no extra late.
Broke well, third one off, strong mid-track bid, not quicken late.
Not well away but held rail position in fourth, driven mid-straight, kept on, no kick.
Fair break, settled fourth last rail, ridden mid-straight, no immediate response, stayed on late.
Fair break, not rushed, midfield rail, wide bid, kept on, unable to threaten.
Fair break, midfield three wide, back to fourth last one off, improved turn, wide bid, no extra.
Fair break, not rushed, second last rail, driven before straight, wide bid, little progress.
Fair break, midfield one off, driven before straight, no impression.
Fair break, third last one off, rear entering straight, wide bid, no progress.
Fair break, back to rear, improved briefly turn, wide bid, driven, found nil.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, made all without much threat.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, without cover favoured by the slow tempo, ran on well to the line for 2nd.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 250M for 3rd.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit in midfield along the fence, 3.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, little dash 100M.
Eased to obtain the box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, just ran on fairly in straight.
Settled just off the lead 2 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, however soon flattened 200M.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide throughout and lost too much ground, harmed by the slow pace, still ran on ok despite all negative racing situations.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, raced very keenly, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed fairly in straight.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 6Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow pace, no turn of foot in straight.
At rear, 7Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Bumped start, checked early, not suited the slow tempo, never a factor at rear.
Clean straight break. Good speed, taken back quietly behind the early leaders along the rail entered the back straight. Shaken 350m out, sprinted away with 150m to go, good effort.
Ridden for speed from the gate. In touch, headway between horses 450m out, kept on well for second, no match to the winner.
Good quick jump. Prominent. Challenged top of the straight, all out to hold third.
Broke sideway and bumped hard. 3-back 7th along the fence, came wide at the top of the straight, gained well under strong urging.
Slowly away. Ran on and made up some ground along the rail late.
Off slowly. Midfield along the rail. One pace under drive.
Quickest of all from the stalls. Led easily. Ridden before turning into the straight, dropped out from 200m out.
Slightly hampered from the barriers. Always rear along the fence. No factor. Lack respond under drive.
Missed break. Midfield. Found little under drive.
Knocked hard from the barrier and trailed at once. Trailed in rear without cover the entire trip. Weakened after entered the straight.
Good break. Raced close-up without cover 3-deep to the straight. Bad trip and no threat coming home.
Fair break. Rear. Shaken from 500m out, one pace, no threat.
Broke well, raced along the fence in midfield under heavy restraint, found clear run inside 300M, dueled with a rival for 200M and got on top close home.
Prominently placed behind leader, responded well turning in, led from 300M, rallied on when strongly challenged and only gave way inside 50M.
In 4th place 2-3Ls off the pace, moved into contention 400M out, stayed on well not beaten far.
Sped to the front, allowed an easy lead and was unchallenged to straight, shifted out under pressure passing 300M, headed mid-straight, kept on.
Held up 2-wide in mid-division, stayed on well final 200M, nearest finish.
Not hurried after the start, dropped back to near last 7-8Ls off the pace, moved closer making the home turn, taken wide to challenge 300M, stayed on well.
In mid-division, caught 3-wide no cover throughout, strode closer to the pace inside 500M, had his chance, weakened nearing 100M.
Slow to begin, guided to a rail position behind midfield, kept on one-paced under pressure.
Taken back to last about 8Ls behind leader, driven halfway through the home turn, not quickened under vigorous riding.
Pressed early to obtain a forward position just behind leader, found little when asked turning in, weakened mid-straight.
Reserved near the rear, used little in running but not quickened when placed under pressure. No impression.
Towards the rear along the 2-path, under pressure to maintain position passing 600M, found very little in the finish. (Jockey questioned re the disappointing performance.)

Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Awkward start, gradually recovered from worse than midfield to reach midfield on the bend, soon came to challenge upon straightening, fought on steadily to hit the front inside final 100 M.
Ridden early, settled just better than midfield, commenced move around the bend, widest turning in, fought on steadily down straight only to be overshadowed inside final 100 M.
Began with others, ridden along to soon take up running, obtained rails run in time approaching home bend and hugging the rails turning in, found on extra when headed passing the 100 M mark.
Always thereabouts, just kept on at the same pace without quickening in the run home.
Settled in last few, saved ground turning in, made up good ground in straight to be nearest at finish.
Jumped slowly, travelled in last few, saved plenty of ground turning in, fought on steadily down straight despite hampered over 200 M out.
Settled just better than midfield within 3Ls of speed, saved ground turning for home, quickened to come within 2Ls of leader after straightening but unable to sustain effort inside final 200 M.
Raced wide and keenly towards the rear, ran past well beaten horses in the run home.
Began moderately from a low draw, settled mainly 3-wide in midfield, came wider into straight, ran home one-paced.
Ridden along after beginning from a poor draw, soon settled outside the leader approaching home bend, hung out when straightening and soon folded up quickly.
Began fairly, settled just off the speed on rails, chased leaders into straight, kept on before weakening out of contention 200 M out.
Soon taken back to the rear, never seen with a chance.
Raced in rear of midfield without cover far side, widest runner turning in, made no impression after straightening.
Began with others, well there briefly far side, dropped away quickly from home bend. (Lame)
Endured a tough run racing on the speed 4 wide without cover. Eventually wore down the leader to come up trumps over the final 100m.
Led along the fence. Shot well clear early in the straight but was slowly mowed down over the final 150 M.
Camped just off midfield 3 deep with cover. Closed off soundly.
Raced towards the rear 2-3 wide with cover. Cornered five deep and made steady ground to finish in the frame.
Stalked the leaders, 1 off with cover. Battled away in the straight, tiring over the concluding stages.
Had the drop on the leaders 3 wide with cover. Struggled 200m out.
Raced 4 wide with cover worse than midfield. Never threatened.
Settled back in the field along the paint. Commenced to make up ground early in the straight but copped a check near the furlong and was never in the hunt thereafter.
Settled a long last despite the riders endeavors to tack onto the field. Made some late ground on tiring runners in the final stretch.
Coursed 3wide and without cover whilst travelling with the leading trio. Never a factor.
Settled behind midfield along the rail. Failed to close off and was never likely.
Raced outside the leader no cover. Was a spent force early in the straight and gave in quickly near the 250m.
Led on fence to home straight. Responded well to challenge passing 400M and gained the upper hand final 100M. Dominated closing stages.
Soon found the fence at midfield after start. Shifted 2-wide and was 4Ls down rounding home turn. Chased hard and made substantial headway in the straight for 2nd but no hope with the winner.
Raced 2-wide at midfield early. Shifted 3-wide and moved one spot closer turning into home. Rallied on to snatch 3rd at post.
Sat one-off behind leader. Loomed as a serious threat passing 400M but couldn't sustain effort final furlong. Hung on for 2nd until final stride.
Travelled 3-wide without cover ahead of midfield early. Reached the back of leaders on straightening. Kept on fairly well to the line.
Taken to rear after start. Took inside run making home turn. Came wide and was 8Ls adrift leaving the bend. Covered good ground home straight.
Slow to begin and raced on fence towards rear. Ran on steadily home straight.
2-wide behind leaders to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch when asked.
Away in line but was trapped wide. Taken towards rear to home straight. Made up minor ground late.
Bumped and became unbalanced after start. Eased to 3-wide towards rear to home straight. No real progress thereafter.
Box-seated early. Hung out and dropped to midfield making home turn. Never recovered home straight.
Began awkwardly and raced 2-wide towards rear. Bumped to the widest and was last turning in. Beat tired runners home.
Caught 4-wide without cover behind midfield throughout. Beaten well before post.
3-wide behind midfield and faded soon after straightening. No impression.
Moderate break, fifth last rail, taking time to settle, had to wait for run, then quickened well to win going away.
Fair break, fifth one off, ridden early straight, led 200m out, no answer to winner.
Fair break, midfield one off, wide bid, ran on well.
Broke fast, led out wide then crossed, settled third rail when headed, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, up along rail to fourth, shaken up for bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Broke well, not much early speed,, midfield rail, looked for wide run, held in briefly, stayed on but unable to threaten.
Fair break, up wide to lead after 300m, still led mid-straight, headed, weakened.
Missed break slightly, settled third last rail, driven straight, modest progress late.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, urged turn, then driven, wide bid, little progress.
Broke well, midfield rail,out for mid-track bid, driven, no kick.
Broke well, up to second one off, driven mid-straight, weakened.
Fair breal, then slow into stride, last one off, ridden early straight, very modest progress.
Slow away losing 2-3 lengths, second last rail, ridden early straight, no progress.
Fair break, third last one off, never really balanced, found nil.
Fair break, taken back to rear two off, began to improve entering turn, wide bid, led 200m out, drew clear.
Fair break, midfield one off, back to fourth last two off, wide bid, finished well, unable to trouble winner.
Broke well, fourth rail, inside bid, squeezed through and ran on, unable to threaten.
Broke well, shared lead wide then back to third one off, led briefly and narrowly mid-straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, with leaders but three wide, back to fifth one off, mid-track bid, kept on without kick.
Moderate break, mid-rear two off, wide bid, limited progress.
Sluggish start, back to rear rail, bid between horses but route temporarily blocked, kept on late.
Fair break, mid-rear two off, improved turn, aimed for wide bid, no impression.
Broke well, urged early, midfield one off not settling far side, inside bid, kept on, unable to threaten.
Moderate break, back to rear one off, shaken up, modest mid-track progress.
Broke well, up to lead rail, headed and settled second, driven early straight, weakened.
Broke well, up on outside to lead and cross, led 200m out, weakened.
Fair break, midfield rail,inside bid, driven, not quicken.
Sluggish start, fourth last rail, shaken up, no progress.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1L at good pace, made all without real challenges.
Pushed to obtain a prominent spot, 2Ls off the good pace 2 wide, closed the race off strongly for 2nd.
In front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace 3 wide, held ground in straight for 3rd.
Trapped 4 wide in midfield throughout, 5Ls off the good pace, made steady ground in straight.
Very slow away, 7.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, made good ground 250M.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the good pace along the rails, blocked 4-2, ran on ok when clear.
Midfield, 4Ls behind the good pace 2 wide, no turn of foot in straight.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, held up 4-2, ran on ok when clear.
Hard ridden early but never muster, 6Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, no progress.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, weakened 400M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace on the fence, blocked and pushed back 400M, no progress when clear.
Bumped start, never competitive at rear.
Pushed forward, 1L off the good pace 2-3 wide, dropped off 400M.
Jumped swiftly. Good natural speed, in touch, traveled easily, ran away from the field 200m out with plenty in hand.
Contact after the break. Settled in the rear at once. Came strongly between horses for second but no threat to the long gone winner.
Clean jump. In the rear. Responded well under drive, came strongly for third.
Good jump. Prominent. One pace when the question was popped, no excuse.
Made contact and lost balance after the jump. Ridden for early speed but managed only a midfield position. Gained slowly under pressure.
Jumped well. Greenly under drive, no threat.
Quickest of all, led unchallenged until the straight, kept on evenly under a strong all out drive, weakened badly in the last 100m.
Slowly away, recovered at once and sat just behind the early leader. Lacked respond under strong urging.
Clean jump and taken back to rear at once. Passed tiring horses in the last 200m.
Fair jump. Midfield, one pace under pressure, no threat.
Broke right from the barrier. In touch, shaken up before entering the straight. Kept on one pace under pressure from a long way out.
Missed jump. Rear. Lacked respond under drive.
Quickly away. Unable to find cover and soon raced without cover 3-wide. Kept on fighting and found no extra inside the last 200m.
Clean jump. Midfield. Shaken from a long way out and beaten soon entered the straight.
From a wide draw crossed to race outside leader, responded well when asked to raise his effort inside 400M, joined the lead 100M and had the measure of the runner-up near line.
Soon led, broke away from the field passing 1000M, had 2Ls advantage going into 400M, battled on when strongly challenged final 200M, headed close home.

Up with the early pace then dropped back to midfield, pushed to a 3-wide spot without cover near 1200M, moved into contention nearing 600M, kept on to the line but couldn't quite get to the first two.
Reserved in mid-division, saved ground on the inside, went 4th 300M out, kept on to the line but couldn't get on terms with the leaders.
Began very awkwardly and knuckled over at the start, ended up almost 10Ls back at the rear, into clear 350M, stayed on well, nearest finish.
Held up behind midfield, took time to gather turning in, did best work final 200M, awkwardly placed late stages and not able to be ridden out.
Slowly away, raced at the tail of the field as expected, pushed along 500M, stayed on from a fair way back, but couldn't muster the pace to pose a serious threat.
Close enough to the pace early, lost running near 1200M and shuffled back to midfield, under pressure 500M, made limited progress turning in, one paced final 200M.
Reserved near the rear, hard driven inside 600M, stayed on fairly going past beaten runners.
Sat behind leaders, not quickened when the race got serious, run ended near 300M, weakened and eased.
Towards the rear 8Ls back, didn't pick up on straightening, no impression.
Not far off the pace in early stages, dropped back to midfield entering home turn, found little under pressure, eased 200M. (Jockey reported his horse was badly galloped on during the race.)
Bumped start, ridden at once to maintain a striking position in sixth. Came free inside the last 250m, responded strongly under a strong drive and pulled away from the field 75m out.
Quickest of all from the gate. Sat just next to the early leader. Pushed out at the top of the straight, kept on fighting to the line for second.
Quick and smooth jump. Backed off from quick pace and settled just behind the early leader. Came free at the 400m mark, pushed out and led briefly at 150m, overtaken by stronger horses late.
Poor jump. Soon ridden to rejoin and found a midfield spot along the rail. Came on late in the last 200m and just missed catching the leaders.
Good jump. Midfield. Challenged top of the straight, hampered slightly at 250m, balanced, came on well again late.
Good quick jump. Led unchallenged until the straight. One pace under strong urging and weakened badly in the last 100m.
Jumped well. Near rear along the fence. Boxed solidly behind horses in the straight. Checked hard and altered course at 250m and blocked again. Kept on well to the line.
Clean jump. Settled calmly along the rail in mid-division. One pace at best under pressure coming home.
Head turned outward from the break. One pace under pressure. No threat.
Interfered and steadied after jump. Trailed in last. Ran on evenly, no factor late.
Broke to his left. Unable to find cover on the 3-path in the rear. Kept on well under pressure in the straight, weakened late.
Good jump. Dispute lead and was parked 3-deep without cover all the way to the straight. Never quit under pressure, weakened inside the last 150m.
Slow start, knocked hard and steadied off the barrier. Not quickened coming home.
Slowly away. Near rear. Moved off cover from 800m out but not gaining in the process. Dropped out half-way in the straight.
Angled into running line to race 3Ls or so back, appreciated decent speed early, tracked into race well turning and let down with a strong sprint to hit lead at 300m, always in control late.
Even getaway, raced 3Ls back on fence, bumped a bit at top turn, kept improving rounding bend, switched inside and closed strongly to snatch 2nd late.
Showed speed and ridden more prominently, positioned ideally 1 out 1 back, had run of race to turn, hit lead briefly at 300m, stayed on well and lost 2nd in shadows of post.
Fairly away, raced in midfield 5Ls back on rails, easy time to bend, came out and made gradual progress in straight to make frame.
Showed early toe, settled behind the leader, used a bit with decent speed on, right there turning, looked a place chance but just held ground final 200m.
Slotted into a midfield role, 5Ls back in running line, aided by speed on, made some even ground in straight but never really threatened.
Taken down to rear from an awkward draw, raced 8Ls away on rails, began to improve at 500m, passed a few horses but set too great a task.
Settled behind midfield 7Ls back in two wide line, quiet trip in mid sections, same margin back to turn, one paced in straight.
Displayed usual speed to race outside leader, pressed inside horse throughout setting some decent sections, still there turning but soon tired and dropped right out late.
Pressed on early but unable to slot in, posted 3 wide without cover 2Ls back, used too much in first half, faded approaching turn, dropped right out.
Ridden up to take the lead, set tempo but worried by outside horse for first part, bit keen in mid section, lost advantage at 300m and weakened out. (See racing incidents.)
Didn’t go forward as usual, ended up sharing rear 8Ls or so back racing two wide, still last turning, never factored. (See racing incidents.)
Faded back to settle 3 wide at rear, best part of 8Ls away, worked wide to 400m, no finish in straight.
Checked early and blundered, raced 6-7Ls back on rails, ridden along on bend, struggled and was well beaten at finish.

Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Ridden along in close up position from the one draw, within striking distance in 2L 4th around the bend, switched out to challenge turning in, gained upper hand final strides.
Began well, travelled outside leader most of way, fought on under pressure but unable to peg back winner.
Failed to muster, remained towards the rear into straight, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Forward of midfield, turned home on rails saving ground, kept on steadily without quickening.
Travelled just better than midfield to straight, kept on steadily without quickening. (Suspensory ligament injury)
Slow out, failed to muster, trailed field to 400 M, saved ground on rails turning home, nearest at finish.
Slightly slow out, quickly recovered to just better than midfield, wide around home bend, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Driven along to share the pace, gained slender advantage coming out of back straight, headed inside 200 M.
Raced wide in midfield without cover far side, dropped to last few coming out of back straight, no further impression.
Ridden from poor draw early but failed to muster, gradually settled in last few, no further impression.
Prominent early, just worse than midfield most of way to straight, no further impression.
Moderate start, driven forward to share pace, close up 3-wide without cover most of way, dropped away on straightening. (Mucus) (Questioned for disappointing performance)
Slow to begin travelling 2 deep with cover, third from the rear. Cornered widest and let down well to hold on for a sound win.
Settled behind midfield along the rail with cover. Got all the favors along the inside in the home straight and ran on strongly.
Ridden along early from the outside alley to travel in second position, 1 off. Maintained a good gallop in the straight, only tiring close to home.
Made its run from the back in the field after travelling along the rail with cover. Came widest over the final furlong and closed off nicely to make the frame.
Parked midfield the fence. Kept up a fair effort most of the way down the running.
Sent forward from a wide gate and led at good fractions along the paint. Looked likely early in the straight but was a spent force over the concluding stages.
Settled behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Whacked away one paced over the final stages and never really threatened.
Stalked the leader along the fence. Had every chance but failed to convert after enjoying the run on the race.
Camped 1 out 1 back. Was under pressure prior to the home turn and struggled in the run to the wire.
Ridden along early but was unable to find cover and coursed 3 wide for most of the trip in about a midfield position. Never likely.
Raced towards the tail of the field, 1 off with cover. Failed to close off.
2-wide midfield. Made run 3-wide and reached the leading section rounding home turn. Rallied on home straight and dominated final furlong.
Always in a forward spot. Just failed to repel the winner final furlong and hung on for 2nd.
One-out-one-back to home straight. Responded fairly well when asked but was always fended off by the 2nd placegetter.
Midfield on fence. Swung 4-wide and was 2Ls down on straightening. Finished off satisfactorily without seriously troubling the front trio.
Missed start and lost a considerable amount of ground. Trailed field to home straight and made good headway late.
Taken towards rear on fence from highest draw. Shifted out and got traffic top of home straight. Saw daylight final 200M and ran on.
2-wide behind midfield. Some improvement 4-wide home turn but couldn't sustain final 200M.
Box-seated to home straight but failed to pick up when the race got serious.
Led until swamped soon after straightening. Weakened badly thereafter. (Irregular heart rhythm).
Broke well, fourth one off, then third rail after horse broke down, got split mid straight, led 50m out, ran on well.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, improved turn, wide bid, finished fast.
Broke well, fourth one off, mid-track bid, ran on well.
Lost half length start, midfield rail, checked by broken down horse far side, hard ridden to challenge between horses, not quite enough.
Fast away, led wide, then second one off, hard ridden straight, narrowly outpaced.
Well away, led after 300m until mid-straight, headed, outpaced.
Moderate break, mid-rear two off, mid-track bid, modest late progress.
Fair break, taken back to rear, ridden entering straight, kept on but no kick.
Fair break, lacked early pace, second last rail, urged, inside bid, weakened late.
Not well away, up to midfield one off, minor checks, wide bid, found little.
Moderate break, mid-rear three wide, last into straight, ridden, found nil.

Placing: DNF
Comment: Away well, with leaders when broke down after 300m.
Fair break, urged to take fifth one off, up to second leaving back, led early straight, strongly ridden, held on well.
Well away, third rail, then fifth, followed winner through, hung in slightly when driven, ran on, just failed.
Broke well, led and crossed dictating pace, headed by winner early straight, kept on well.
Broke well, not rushed, midfield rail, wove through, kept on, but unable to threaten.
Fair break but squeezed back by rivals early, midfield three wide, improved wide turn, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield two off, always wide, kept on, unable to threaten.
Moderate start, midfield one off, urged turn, wide bid, no kick.
Fair break, fourth three wide, up to challenge leaving turn, driven, weakened.
Fair break, up wide to join leaders, second one off, then fourth rail, urged turn, ridden, found little.
Moderate start, urged early, third last rail, driven, little response.
Taken back from wide draw, last one off, driven early straight, no response.
Broke well, restrained, held up second last one off, improved wide far side, wide bid, driven, no response.
Hard ridden to occupy the box seat, finished off strongly to win.
Pushed to share the lead at fast sectionals 2 wide, dominated 300M, hung on until 50M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Hard ridden to obtain a midfield rail spot, checked early, 3Ls off the leader, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 250M for 3rd.
Prominent, 2Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, checked 600M, hung out badly, still held ground in straight.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, made steady ground 200M.
Eased midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, suited by the fast pace but trapped 3 wide, ran on fairly.
Prominent, 1L off the leader, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the fast pace, flattened 200M.
Pushed along at back to keep up, 6.5Ls off the leader along the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, ran on ok.
More than 8Ls off the leader 2 wide at rear, favoured by the fast tempo, made some ground 200M.
Bumped start, at rear, more than 8Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast pace, made ground 200M.
Hard ridden to take the rail and shared the lead at fast sectionals, soon weakened 300M.
Fair jump. Settled midfield. Came free 200m, responded well under strong urging, led near the wire.
Ridden for early speed. Led after 200m. Unchallenged in moderate sectional time, pushed out, overtaken by the stronger winner close to the line.
Good quick jump. Sat next to the leader for much of the trip. Shaken from 500m out, all out to hold third.
Good jump. Taken back to rear and trailed in disadvantage moderate sectional time. Ridden from 500m out when the pace quickened, widest of all entered the straight, ran on well under drive.
Broke slowly. 3-back midfield along the fence. Blocked solidly behind the two runner-ups along the fence in the straight. Altered course and came free inside the last 50. Ran on well.
Quickly away from the stalls. Sat perfectly in 5th along the fence. Found nothing under pressure in the straight.
Brushed start. Midfield, hard ridden from 450m out, kept on evenly under pressure to the wire.
Brushed start. Lack early speed to keep up in last along the rail. Long drive from 600m out when the pace quickened. Stayed on without threatening.
Clean quick jump. Settled on the 3-path with cover the entire trip. Ridden from 400m out, no threat.
Fair jump. Raced without cover 3-wide the entire trip. Shaken from 450m out, kept on one pace to the line.
Led slowly, was taken on for the lead passing 800M, kicked clear turning into straight, kept responding to pressure in front and was never in danger of being caught.
Reserved near the rear in early stages, improved to midfield halfway but raced with no cover from 800M, stayed on well final 250, nearest finish.
Tracked leader on the inside, lacked pace to mount a serious challenge but plugged on throughout the final 200M and was not beaten far.
Began awkwardly, held up behind midfield along the 2-path, took time to gather in straight, did best work late.
Held a midfield position along the fence, travelled well to straight but could only run on at the same pace final 300M.
Caught 3-wide in mid-division, strode to the lead inside 900M, kept on to 150M, weakened late stages.
Taken across behind runners and settled towards the rear 6Ls off the pace, saved ground on the inside but made very limited progress turning in.
Never far off the steady pace, niggled along nearing 400M, ran on one-paced and made no impression.
Towards the rear, under pressure rounding the home turn and found disappointingly little turning in.
Closest to leader in first half of the race, struggled for pace making the home turn, gave way inside 250M.
Slow to begin, raced in the rear for most of the way, did not pick up under pressure. (To stalls test.)
Towards the rear, hung out making the first turn and ended up racing wide without cover for rest of the trip, already beaten turning in. (To official barrier trial around a bend.)
