Soon took up running and gradually crossed to grandstand rails, joined by eventual 3rd coming onto course proper, fought on gamely under pressure to prevail by a slender margin.
Settled about 2Ls off the speed, came to challenge inside final 300 M holding every chance, just failed to peg back winner.
Always thereabouts, came to share the pace passing the 400 M mark, unable to sustain effort inside final 100 M.
Slow out, always at the back and never seen with a chance while laying in.
Slow out, always at the back and never seen with a chance.
Tracked the leading duo. Had to be checked near the 200m, but recovered nicely to take the lead 50m out.

Ridden and along and eventually crossed from an inside gate to race towards the grandstand side and lead after the 500m. Shifted to the outside fence near the 250m, and maintained a good gallop to the finish.
Settled midfield near the center of the course. Closed off well.
Travelled in fourth position about 2 off the outside fence. Ran on gradually without threatening.
Settled well back close to the middle of the track. Made some ground over the final 300m.
Camped midfield just off the grandstand side. Ran on well despite having to be steadied to avoid heels near the 200m.
Raced in a handy position about 4 off the outside fence. Showed little when placed under pressure after the 400m.
Led along the outside rail but was headed prior to the 450m. Copped interference near the furlong and struggled thereafter. Vet reported respiratory noise post race. (See Racing Incident report.)
Missed the start then was crowded soon after settling in last position. Drifted towards the middle of the course and passed some tiring runners.
Slow to begin settling midfield on the grandstand side. Plugged away in the run to the line.
Raced near the tail of the field near the outside rail. Laboured over the last 300m.
Raced close to the grandstand side close to midfield. Failed to make any ground when asked for an effort at the business end of the race.
Raced towards the centre of the course in about a midfield position. Failed to find any extra when placed under pressure over the final furlong.
Didn’t show any early dash and settled well back in the event. Never looked likely and struggled over the final 300m.
Driven early and sat behind leader on fence to home straight. Got clear run 400M and responded well when asked. Dominated closing stages.
Led on fence until knocked out by the winner final 100M. Hung on for 2nd by a narrow margin.
Eased to rear from high draw. Ridden and shifted out gradually approaching home straight. 5Ls down 400M. Finished off strongly and was denied for 2nd narrowly.
Raced within 3Ls of the pace in a 2-wide spot to home straight. Every chance but couldn't trouble the front trio.
Away with them. Eased to 3-wide behind midfield 1200M. Commenced run wide rounding home turn. Kept on steadily top of home straight but couldn't turn up a notch final furlong.
Began awkwardly and lost ground. Shaken up to race ahead of midfield on fence from 1200M. One-paced to conclude.
Urged early but insufficient speed to cross. Settled 2-wide behind midfield 1200M. Swung wide on straightening and plugged on to the line.
Pressed early and parked one-off behind leader. Clung on until peaked final furlong.
Slow to begin and raced 3-wide towards rear. Shifted widest turning in but never really picked up.
At rear on fence to home straight. Directed to the outside on straightening and made up some late ground.
Niggled to maintain position behind midfield on fence early and middle stages. Took inside run into final stretch. Failed to quicken.
2-wide at midfield to home straight. Beaten passing 300M.
Away in line. Pressed to race 3-wide ahead of midfield 1000M. Dropped out 350M.
Towards rear throughout. Never likely.
Fair break, ridden early to midfield one off, improved turn, mid-track bid. Finished well to lead 150m out.
Fair break but had to be driven to lead, led into straight and kicked clear, kept on well when headed.
Broke well, steadied to midfield rail, dropped back slightly approaching turn, ridden and closed well until no extra late.
Broke well, short of early pace, back to second last rail, wide bid, finished well.
Fair break, up wide to fourth one off, second mid-straight, weakened late.
Broke well, third rail pulling slightly, midfield rail, driven straight, kept on one pace.
Taken back from wide draw, three lengths last early, checked off heels far side, bustled but still last into straight, late progress under driving.
Broke well, led early then headed on inside, settled third rail, chased leader until weakened late.
Broke fast but unable to lead, fifth one off, wide bid, no progress.
Fair break, not much early speed, second last rail, inside bid, some progress until flattened out late.
Fair break, second last two off, improved three wide, ridden, found nil.
Poor start, lost two lengths, ridden up wide to take second one off, driven entering straight, weakened.
Jumped fast, shared lead rail, went on entering straight, ran on strongly.
Fair break, not much early speed, midfield one off urged, wide bid, driven, stayed on late.
Away well, shared lead one off, headed early straight, fought on well.
Lost length start, back up along rail to midfield, inside bid, kept on under driving.
Fair break, midfield one off, urged entering turn, wide bid, made late ground.
Fair break, fourth last one off, bid between horses, kept on late.
Fair break, fifth one off, improved turn, wide bid, flattened out late.
Slightly missed break, ridden to fourth one off, bid three wide entering straight, one pace.
Broke well, up wide to join leaders, third one off, ridden early straight, one pace.
Not well away, mid-rear rail, inside bid, found little.
Fair break, back to third last one off, ridden into straight, aimed wide, no progress.
Taken back from wide to last, urged far side, ridden, no progress.
Moderate break, back to rear, reminders early straight, found nil.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, dashed well 300M to score.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, led 250M, hung on until 50M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Prominent, 2Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, lack room 4-2, ran on well for 3rd.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, dashed strongly when clear.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, momentarily held up 400M, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed along to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
Shared lead at slow sectionals 2 wide, ran on until 200M flattened.
Pushed to take rail and shared the lead at slow sectionals, hung on until 200M weakened.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 8Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 400M, ran on ok when clear.
Slow away, not suited by the slow tempo, never a factor at rear.
Prominent, trapped 3 wide, eased to sit 2Ls off the slow pace, faded soon after straightening.
Took rail easily and shared the lead at slow sectionals, dropped off quickly 400M.
Good clean jump. In touch, not pulled, let go from 250m out, drew away late under an extremely light assignment of 106 pound.
Quick jump. Prominent in third, led from 250m out, overtaken late while giving 25 lbs to the winner, strong finish.
Clean jump. Soon in contention, settled in the middle of the course, ridden from a long way out, no match to the first two, kept on smartly for third.
Quickest of all from the stall. Unchallenged along the stand side, ridden from 250m out, kept on one pace to the line.
Quick jump and knocked off balance. Soon recovered and track leader. Pushed out last 250m, kept on one pace.
Missed jump and steadied due to early interference. Recovered and settled in mid-division along the stand rail. Kept on without threatening.
Quickly away. Near rear, ridden from a long way out, one pace at best.
Broke to his left from the gates. Good speed, tracked leaders without pulling. Ridden from 300m out, one pace under drive, weakened in the last 150m.
Contacted and steadied after jump. Outpaced from half-way, never a factor.
Good break. Midfield. Shaken from 400m out, not gaining, not much left inside the last 150m.
Bumped start. Always rear, lack speed to keep up, never closed.
Missed jump and steadied due to interference. Outpaced at once, never a factor.
Broke sideway from the barrier. Rear, hard ridden to keep up, found nothing.
Fair break. Always in rear. Ridden almost immediately to keep up, beaten from a long way out.
Always going well sitting in the slipstream of the leader, quickened impressively turning in and took lead passing 200M, kept on strongly to the line.
Held up at the back, 6Ls to make up inside 400M, couldn’t quite get to the winner but stayed on best of the rest.
Near the tail of the field, saved ground racing along the inside, stayed on final 300M to go 3rd near the line.
Shared lead on the inside, quickened tempo near 600M and established a 2Ls lead turning for home, headed by the eventual winner inside 200M, weakened into 4th over the final stages.
Failed to muster speed despite vigorously ridden and raced further back than intended, finished off only fairly final 400M, hung in mid-straight and was difficult to ride.

Moved forward to join leader, raced fiercely when being restrained in middle stages, kept on one-paced when put to pressure early straight before giving some response final 200M. (Jockey and Trainer questioned.)
Positioned 4Ls back in midfield and raced 3-wide for much of the way, came with a promising run early straight, had his chance but effort flattened out final 150M.
Tracked leaders along the 2-path, didn’t pick up when the tempo quickened inside 500M was left behind mid-straight.
Taken back from a wide barrier and guided to a midfield spot along the rails, didn’t respond to urging approaching home straight, weakened rapidly passing 300M.
Never far off the pace, caught 3-wide in chasing group and was left racing with no cover from 1100M, not quickened when the race got serious, dropped out 250M from home.
Fair jump. Chased leader 3-wide without cover the entire run. Given his head with 200m to go, powered away strongly to win by a most easy 2.5 lengths.
Jumped well. Settled easily in 5th along the rail. Ridden from 350m, no match to the much better winner, ran on well for second.
Clean break. Right behind the pacemaker along the fence. Trapped behind two tiring runners for a long time, came free in the last 100m, came on strongly for 3rd.
A touch slow from the barriers. In the rear the entire trip, blocked for a long time entered the straight, came free the last 150m, finished well and just missed third.
Fair break. Midfield, 4-deep around without cover. Continued to respond well under strong urging from the top of the straight to the line.
Good jump. Ridden vigorously for early speed. Settled just behind the leader travelling on the 2-path until the straight. Ridden from a long way out, one pace.
Slowest of all from the barriers. Ridden from 350m out, not quickened.
Pushed off to his left from the barriers and trailed in last. Ran on well but unable to regain lost ground.
Steadied off the jump and dropped to the rear along the fence at once. Never free in the straight, good response and strong late finish.
Broke to his left and contacted. Recovered and chased hard racing 5-wide without cover. Never quitted fighting coming home.
Good break and quickest of all. Led easily after 200m. Shaken after entered the straight, kept on one pace and outkicked badly in the last 200m.
Broke sideway to his right. Midfield, all chance, found nothing in the straight.
Went forward from a wide gate to camp in 4th, 2 and 3 wide just off speed on circle, joined in strongly at 300m and fought on well to score nicely.
Even break, sat off speed 2 wide 3-4Ls back in midfield, easy time to bend, made nice progress in straight but couldn’t peg back winner late.
Away smartly, slotted in on leaders back, all favours to bend, took inside runs turning, made a strong bid but peaked final 150m and lost 2nd late.
Standard beginning, settled behind midfield on rails, 5-6Ls back, improved position approaching bend, produced usual honest finish to make frame.
Slowly away, settled at rear and struggled to hold position early, ridden up to join on racing 8Ls away, made some good ground under hands and heels in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Even jump, settled in midfield 4Ls back on rails, had a quiet trip to bend, closed gradually to 300m without clearest running but just held ground when running presented thereafter.
Fair to begin, raced 3 wide behind midfield before dropping in on circle, 6Ls back throughout, made some progress in straight.
Ordinary break, settled back with last few 7Ls away 2 wide, still well back to bend, didn’t find much in straight.
Out in line, took up spot first outside leader, even run 1L back to bend, struggling at 400m and faded out.
Rolled to front as expected, kept speed even in mid section, kicked on turning but couldn’t sustain effort and weakened when didn’t see out journey.
Jumped OK, rider lost iron for a short while. Posted 3 and 4 wide without cover in behind midfield, 7Ls or so back throughout, did it tough to bend, never made impression.
Rearward as usual, 3 wide 7Ls back, still well back turning, didn’t produce trademark finish and struggled in run home. (Lame day after.)

Began well from a poor draw, soon taken back to race in rear and waited with, ran on strongly down outside of track to snatch victory near the line.
Began moderately, soon dropped to last few, obtained rails run at Rock, saved ground turning in hugging the rails, baulked for a run early in straight, finished off race well.
Always thereabouts on the rails, hit the front 400 M out, unable to sustain effort and swamped final few strides.
Settled in forward of midfield, well placed turning in, fought on steadily to hold some chance closing stages, failed to quicken to impress closing stages.

Hampered and lost ground early, soon recovered along rails to forward of midfield before home bend, continued to save ground turning for home, one-back in joint 2nd upon straightening, baulked until 200 M but one-paced late.
Ridden along early but soon dropped to just worse than midfield, remained similar turning in, fought on steadily inside final 100 M to be nearest at finish.
Drawn wide, soon taken back to trail the field, saved ground on rails turning in, unable to find clear passages most of way in straight despite switching for a couple of times.
With leaders early, settled mainly 4-wide in midfield, just worse turning in, fought on steadily down centre of straight, never nearer.
Began with others, held slender lead early, remained 4-wde throughout far side and around the bend, lost position turning in, made no impression in the straight. (Mucus)
Began moderately, contested lead early and remained amongst leaders far side, folded up quickly after straightening.

Began with others, settled just off the pace, 2L 5th at Rock, 3-wide rounding home bend, dropped further back turning in, raced tightly between and behind runners in straight before dropping out tamely.
Began with others, soon gained slender advantage down far side, narrowly headed rounding home bend, folded up quickly after straightening.
Parked in 2nd position outside the leader. Took control of the race 60m out and scored well.
Led along the fence at steady fractions. Quickened nicely early in the straight and held an advantage until being mowed down near the 50m.
Rated worse than midfield 1 off with cover. Worked home well.
Stalked the leader along the paint. Copped a bump early in the straight, fading over the final 100m but manages to finish in the frame.
Settled 1 out 1 back. Had every possible chance but couldn't convert.
Slowly away settling behind midfield 2 deep with cover. Peeled out into a 3 wide line with cover after the 700m. swung widest on the home turn made some ground on the tiring brigade.
Raced prominently but was posted 3 wide without cover for most of the trip. Never likely.
Camped midfield 3 wide with cover. Was only able to hold its ground in the final stretch.
Slow to begin settling at the tail of the field 2 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Settled midfield the fence. Only plodded to the line.
Never looked entirely comfortable in the run when travelling behind midfield. Shifted out across heels and was checked near the 450m. whacked away without threatening.
Settled at the rear of the field. Attempted to go forward 3 wide with cover after the 800m but was unable to do so & was allowed to remain in a rearward position. Struggled in the run home.
Prominent spot behind pace group to home straight. Rallied on and battled determinedly inside final 200M. Prevailed near the post.
On fence behind leader to home straight. Fought on gamely with the winner final furlong. Beaten close to home.
Near the fence at midfield until swung out for clear run home straight. Finished off satisfactorily to snatch 3rd at post.
Slow to begin. Pressed along the fence and raced behind midfield to home straight. Ran on steadily to make frame.
Well enough away but couldn't cross. Ended up 3-wide towards rear. Came wider and was 6Ls down turning in. Covered decent ground home straight.
Ridden early and took lead on fence from 900M. Hung on until no extra gear final furlong. Weakened closing stages.
Away in line and was eased to 2-wide towards rear to home straight. Made some headway thereafter.
Driven early and parked 2-wide behind leading section. Pressed to maintain position home turn but couldn't turn up a notch. Held ground home straight.
Taken to rear from high draw after start. Swung widest into final stretch and made up minor ground late.
2-wide at midfield early and middle stages. Peeled out home straight. Plugged on without threat.
Hard ridden early but failed to muster. Settled 2-wide behind midfield to home straight. No progress thereafter.
Trailed field throughout. Never likely.
Fair break, taken back to rear one off, improved turn, wide bid, led very late.
Broke well, fifth one off, led mid-track early straight until headed near line
Fair break, mid-rear one off, challenge between horses, not quite pace of first two.
Missed break two lengths, up along rail to midfield, shuffled back in traffic entering turn, finished well when gaps came.
Fair break, not much early pace, rail second last, back to last entering turn, wide bid, ran on but unable to challenge.
Broke well, up to third one off racing a little erratically, inside bid, ran on under driving.
Broke well, not rushed, midfield two off, quickly up to second approaching turn, just led early straight, weakened.
Fair break, not rushed, third last two off, up to midfield far side, wide bid, slight checks, no extra late.
Moderate break, up wide to lead and cross, headed when tried to steady pace, raced second, inside bid, no progress.
Moderate start, ridden early to second four wide, then led and crossed, headed early straight, weakened.
Broke well, fourth rail, lost place leaving back, inside bid, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, midfield one off, wide bid, ran on strongly to lead 150m out, held on.
Broke well, midfield rail, challenged strongly between rivals, just failed.
Slightly missed break, mid-rear one off, ridden early straight, driven, just took third.
Fair break, taken back to rear one off, wide bid, ran on under driving.
Broke well, third rail, inside bid, kept on, no kick.
Fair break, up to fourth one off, mid-track challenge, run flattened late.
Missed break a length, ridden early, third last rail, inside bid, kept on.
Fair break, back to third last one off, wide bid, ran on.
Broke well, mid-rear one off not settling, wide bid, little progress.
Broke well, second one off, led early straight, driven, weakened.
Fair break, rear one off, shaken up entering straight, wide bid, no progress.
Fast away, led and crossed not settling, headed entering straight, faded fast.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, enjoyed by the slow sectionals, closed off strongly to win by a short head.
Hard ridden to take the rail and share the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on strongly until last few strides, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Settled in midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader along the rails, not suited by the slow tempo, lacked room 4-2, dashed well when clear to take 3rd.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit in midfield, trapped 3 wide, 3Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no progress.
Pushed forward to cross, 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, weakened 200M.
Eased back as usual, 6Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, dashed well 200M.
Very slow away, at rear, 7Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on fairly.
Bumped start, 4.5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Eased to sit in midfield, checked first bend, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened in straight.
Behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, flattened in straight.
Fair jump, ridden hard for early lead, led at 700, never looked back and pulled away to win easily from 200m out.
Good quick jump. Balanced and let go from 250m out, all out to take second on the line.
Quickly away. Prominent, sat third along the fence. Responded well under drive, ran on well for third.
Good jump. Settled near rear, lost cover after 400m and raced 3-deep without cover. Widest at the top of the straight, continued to respond under drive to the wire.
Quick jump. Disputed lead and raced 3-wide without cover to the top of the straight. Stayed stubbornly under drive to the line.
Good jump, taken back from early pace and settled in midfield. Never free in the straight behind horses, stayed on well.
Good jump, ridden for speed at once. Sat just behind the fast pace along the fence, let go at 350m, kept on well until he was hampered and taken up at 100, could have been closer.
Missed jump. Shaken from 350m out, no factor.
Slowly away. Trailed in last. Ridden to keep up but unable to do so. Beaten from 200m out.

Placing: UR
Comment: Awkward jump, dropped rider, horse deemed as a runner by the Stewards.
Held up behind mid-division, 5Ls to make up on leader passing 400M, picked up strongly 250M out, led inside 50M.
Positioned 2-wide ahead of midfield in a strongly run race, ran on well turning in, chased winner final 200M but was always held.
Sped to the front and led at a strong pace, maintained a good gallop turning for home and only lost lead inside 50M. (Jockey questioned.)
Settled in 4th about 3-4Ls off the strong pace, kept on evenly final 300M but not able to challenge the leaders.
Towards the rear 8Ls off the good pace, turned wide on straightening, stayed on for 5th.
In midfield along the inside, was pushed along passing 600M, kept on at the same pace and couldn't get near to the leaders.
Reserved in the rear last just over 10Ls off the good pace, had plenty to do turning for home, made steady progress from the rear but never looked likely.
Forwardly placed just behind leader, looked a threat 300M out, emptied nearing 100M and weakened over the final stages. (Jockey and Trainer questioned re tactics.)
Taken back, crossed to the rail and settled about 10Ls behind leader, directed to the outside nearing 500M and came widest on straightening, limited progress final 300M.
In 3rd and never far off the leader in a strongly run race, struggled for pace inside 400M, weakened and no extra mid-straight.
Positioned 2-wide in midfield but found disappointingly little when asked, eased 100M out.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Showed early speed to hold slender lead early stages, gradually steadied pace coming out of back straight, strolled clear upon straightening to win unextended.
Began well, restrained to settle just off the speed in 3rd on rails, within 2L of pace rounding home bend, kept on steadily without threatening in straight.
Slowly away losing about 3L, raced keenly in last of 4-runner field about 4L off the lead, ran home one-paced.
Moderate start, travelled about 3L off the lead in 3rd, took closer order approaching home bend to race outside leader, folded up quickly after straightening.
Settled just ahead of midfield on the rail. Was checked on the home turn but rallied well and stormed home.
Rated behind midfield 2 wide with cover. Cornered six wide and closed off soundly.
Had a good run in transit following the tear away leader settling in 2nd. Gave way late.
Enjoyed a nice run in 3rd position travelling 1 off the rail with cover. Kept on one paced in the final stretch but was able to finish in the frame.
Raced worse than midfield, along the rail. Ran on gamely despite copping a bad check near the 450m.
Couldn't go the early speed of the race settling midfield the fence. Struck interference on the home turn but recovered to finish off evenly.
Settled with the backmakers 2-3 wide with cover. Made fair ground in the straight without ever threatening.
Slow to begin settling in last position. Made some steady ground towards the outside of the field in the home straight.
Raced behind the speed posted 3 wide without cover. Was never in the hunt.
Travelled near last, 1 off with cover. Never a factor, failing to close off.
Settled with the backmakers along the paint. Only plodded to the line down the inside.
Raced handy to the leaders, 1 off with cover. Copped a check near the 450m, and was not likely thereafter.
Settled midfield 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the final stretch after being severely checked on the home turn.
Proved a real handful hanging out badly on the first corner then pulling hard in the lead before capitulating on the home turn. To trial on 3 consecutive occasions.
3-wide at rear until swung widest on straightening. 9Ls adrift 400M. Dashed strongly and drew clear final 50M.
Pressed early and raced 3-wide towards rear from 1100M. 8Ls down rounding home turn. Covered substantial ground wide to snatch 2nd at post without serious threat to the winner.
On fence behind pace group to home straight. Rallied on but failed to repel winner final 150M. Lost 2nd at line.
Eased to race towards rear on fence after start. Kept giving in the straight and made good headway to make frame at finish.
Niggled early but trapped wide in a forward spot. Slotted 2-wide ahead of midfield home turn. Peeled out into final stretch and ran on for a non-threatening 5th.
Trailed field to home straight. Made up decent ground late.
Away in line and was taken to race at midfield on fence to home straight. Soon saw daylight but remained one-paced. Steadied passing 100M.
Shaken up early and travelled 3-wide in the leading section to home straight. Couldn't pick up thereafter and weakened final 200M.
Ridden along the fence early. Disputed lead to home straight. Hung on until passing 200M. Faded final stages.
Pressured early from highest draw. Parked 3-wide at midfield from 1100M. No progress in the straight. (Substantial amount of mucopus.)
One of the leaders early. Raced 2-wide behind pace group 900M. Plugged on top of home straight and dropped out 300M.
2-wide ahead of midfield early. Dropped towards rear turning in. No show in the straight. (Substantial amount of mucopus.)
Driven early to race 2-wide in the leading section. Struggled from early home straight and finished tailed out.
Broke well, led, headed and settled second, led again mid-straight, short battle with second, well on to by line.
Broke well, third one off, challenged with winner, brief tussle, second best.
Taken back from wide, fourth last one off, wide bid, finished well.
Away well fourth rail, switched away from fence nearing 400M, kept on well.
Away well, back to midfield one off, mid-track bid, kept on.
Moderate start, not rushed, fifth last rail, inside bid, kept on well late.
Broke well, ridden early, back to sixth one off, mid-track bid, kept on under pressure.
Slightly fluffed start, lost length, second last rail, wide bid, modest late progress.
Fair break, midfield rail, bid between horses, weakened late.
Broke well, front rank but very wide, went on and crossed, two lengths clear entering straight, headed, weakened.
Moderate break, ridden early, third last three wide, slightly unruly, wide bid, no impression.
Missed beat start, back to last, urged but never travelling, three lengths last into straight, lost further ground.
Fair break, hurried up to settle fourth one off, challenged three off rail, led 150m out, kept on well.
Moderate break, rail fifth, followed winner through, driven, not quite able to challenge.
Broke fast, led and crossed, headed mid-straight, kept on.
Broke well, up to second one off, narrowly headed third briefly mid-straight, kept on one pace.
Jumped well, up along rail to second then settled third, driven, kept on one pace.
Fair break, ridden to settle midfield one off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield one off, wide-ish bid, kept on.
Moderate break, back to mid-rear rail, inside bid, kept on, no kick.
Taken back from wide, second last rail, went for inside run, one pace.
Broke well, up wide to fifth, three wide throughout, one pace, weakened late.
Back from wide to second last one off, slight interference from injured horse, wide bid, no impression.
Taken back from wide, rear not settling immediately, wide bid, no progress.
Fair break, taken back to third last two off, ridden for wide bid, minor interference, no progress.

Placing: DNF
Comment: Broke down far side, pulled up.
Settled just off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the slow early sectionals, closed off well to win.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 250M for 2nd.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide throughout and lost too much ground, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace and got 3rd.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M overhauled, flattened 100M.
Slow away, 4.5Ls off the leader along the fence, checked 800M, not suited by the slow tempo, lack room 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Very slow away, 5.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Hard ridden to keep up in box seat, no turn of foot in straight.
Very slow away, pushed to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Pushed forward, 1L off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, weakened 250M.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leader, trapped 4 wide throughout and lost too much ground, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 2Ls off the slow pace 3 wide, weakened 300M.
Jumped well, backed off from early pace, settled easily with good speed in sixth along the fence. Came free between horses at 150m, pulled powerfully away with something in reserve.
Quickly away. Sat just behind the leaders, shaken from 300m out, ran on well for second.
Bumped hard but recovered at once. Disputed lead for the first 400m, pushed out entered the straight, kept on well to the line, no match to the powerful winner.
Clean jump. Took up a position near rear. Steadied and slowed three times between 800m and 600m. Wide turn entering the straight and continued regained lost ground in the last 200m.
Jumped well. Settled near rear. Checked hard during the race and began to pull. Balanced entered the straight and responded kindly to strong late drive.
Bumped hard off the barrier and dropped to rear. Headway 500m out, widest of all at top of the straight, came well on the stand side and finished smartly.
Quickly away. Chased early pace but soon dropped back to fifth behind the early leaders. One pace under drive.
Slowly away. Always rear. Shaken 350m out, evenly at best.
Quickly away. Settled in third along the rail. All chances in the straight but finished one pace under drive.
Broke left. Always in rear. Lost cover at 800m and headway 4-deep to the straight, ran on evenly until reaching the 200m pole.
Broke left. Midfield, not much under drive coming home.
Broke sideway but recovered at once. Disputed early lead, led fence, not quickened under drive.
Slowly away. In the rear, one pace under drive.
Poor jump and steadied at once in rear. Pulled hard from 700m out while travelling 4-wide without cover, widest of all at top of the straight, weakened inside the last 200m.
Reserved in midfield and travelled strongly to the straight, cruised into contention inside 300M, swiftly took over 150M and was always in control thereafter. Won with plenty in hand.
Showed customary early speed and crossed to the lead inside 1200M, led to near 150M, no match with the impressive winner but ran on well to hold 2nd.
In mid-division along the inside, stayed on well for 3rd but couldn't get on terms with the first two.
Held up towards the rear tracking the eventual winner, took time to gather on straightening, made steady progress inside 200M just missing out on 3rd.
Handily placed in 3rd, had his chance but didn't find the pace to seriously challenge, faded 100M.
Not far off the good pace but was 3-wide without cover throughout, kept on effort to 200M, weakened.
Broke well then restrained to a spot behind midfield, shifted out from the fence halfway over the turn, kept on same pace to the line only.
Held up in the rear 7Ls off the good pace, gave very limited response turning in, never a factor.
Tracked leader, ideally placed to strike turning in but not quickened under pressure, weakened inside 200M. (Mild lameness next day.)
Began awkwardly, settled at the back 7Ls behind leader, not picked up on straightening, eased 200M.
Clean quick jump, chased early lead, led after 400m, total control of the pace, let go at the top of the straight, kept on stubbornly for a close win.
Clean jump. Raced without cover 3-deep almost the entire trip. Stayed on well under an all out drive for second.
Good clean jump. Rider preferred to settle in midfield along the fence. Blocked for a long time in the straight, came free in the last 100m, strong finish and just missed second.
Hopped jump and steadied. Midfield, all chances in the straight, evenly under drive.
Poor break. Rear, blocked after entered the straight, free late and came well under drive, best of the rest.
Good break, taken back to rear. Raced without cover near rear. One pace coming home.
Quickly away, in touch, found little under hard drive.
Clean jump. Always in the rear, headway 4-deep without cover on the bend, found little coming home.
Fair jump. Shaken from 600m to keep when the pace quickened, one pace at best.
Quickly away. Disputed early lead for the opening 400m. Settled behind the leader but found little under drive.
Broke left. Always in the rear. Nothing coming home.
Bumped hard from the barrier. Settled in last the entire trip, widest of all at top of the straight, not quickened.
Showed customary speed to take up front running, set a decent tempo in front, skipped away under light weight turning, never challenged and ran out an easy winner.
Even jump, ridden up to hold leaders back, all favours thereafter despite reasonable tempo, kept giving in straight but couldn't match leader with weight pull.
Drifted back to race just off midfield, raced 2 wide 6Ls back, came through runners turning and did best work late to take a place.
Away well, took an ideal spot 1 out 1 back, good run in mid section, hung throughout as usual, in mix to 200m but lost place thereafter.
Outpaced early, shared rear on rails, 8Ls back throughout, took inside runs turning and made solid progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Fast into stride and settled prominently first outside leader without cover, forced to work at a decent speed in front, was a place chance to 200m but tired out of it late.
Tardy into stride, 7Ls or so away on rails, had a quiet time and aided by tempo, held up in straight early in and didn't have much room for most final 300 M and never able to improve.
Began well from a wide gate, trapped 3 wide without cover, had a tough run throughout, struggling turning and weakened after a hard trip.
Out in line, ended up in midfield 5Ls back, fair run to bend, one paced and condition gave out, folded soon after 250m.
Standard brake, positioned in midfield on rails 6Ls back, easy time to bend, unable to close off and gradually faded from 300m.
Drifted back from a wide alley, raced 3 wide behind midfield 7Ls back, had cover before coming 4 wide from turn, struggled to finish off down middle.
Didn't have early speed, settled at rear 3 wide 8Ls back, had cover but never really comfortable, struggling turning and showed nothing.
Out well, positioned ideally on leaders back, had ideal trip to bend, angled out and soon took care of rivals, held healthy margin in run to line.
Settled in midfield 2 wide 5Ls back, fair run in mid section, began to improve approaching bend, produced decent finish but no match for winner late.
Very slow into stride, rushed up around them to position outside leader, worked a bit to keep speed genuine, headed soon after turning but fought on well given workload to take placing.
Out in line but didn't go early speed, raced 3 wide in midfield without cover, 4-5Ls back gradually improving on circle, came 4 wide turning, kept giving and worked nicely to line to make frame.
Prominent early, settled 1 out 1 back, in scrimmage at 1100m and overaced, came 3 wide rounding bend, loomed strongly but unable to quicken from 200m, lost a place late.
No early pace, rear division on rails 8-9Ls back, pace helped in mid section, took inside runs and worked home well final 300m to be nearest on line (lacked a little room late)
Went forward to take up running, did a bit of work with attention from outside horse, still there to 300m but soon collared and tired final furlong.
Settled just off pace 3Ls or so back, copped a bad check in scrimmage at 1100m, 3 wide thereafter, ridden along turning but just lacked usual close and struggled final 300m.
Positioned 3 wide behind midfield, 6Ls or so back, checked at 1100m and forced 3 wide, had cover to bend, made a brief bid but peaked at 200m and struggled thereafter.
Just off pace group early 2 wide,1 checked at 1100m and forced down to rail, had even trip thereafter, didn't quicken in straight and struggled late.
No early speed, in usual position at rear, 3 wide 10Ls back, checked at 1100m, plenty to do turning, didn't show usual finish and just battled.
Settled just off midfield 2 wide 6Ls back, badly checked at 1100m, same margin back to bend, showed nothing in straight.
Faded back from a wide gate, raced 10Ls back, still last turning, made no impression in straight.
Settled 3Ls or so back on rails. Severely checked at 1100m and forced further back, didn't appear to stretch out much thereafter and gradually faded out in straight. (See racing incidents.)

Ridden along for pace early, settled one-back in 3rd on rails, came to challenge under pressure after straightening, gained upper hand inside final 50 M.
Settled in forward of midfield, commenced run in 5th passing 400 M, fought on steadily under pressure, just failed to peg back winner.

Slow to muster despite ridden along early stages, settled just off the speed one off the rails, in similar position turning for home, held every chance early in straight but unable to sustain effort inside final 200 M.
Began well from a poor draw, soon crossed to lead passing 1000 M bend, made running until joined early in straight, swamped inside final 100 M.
Soon dropped to tail-end and trailed the field to straight, saved ground turning in, produced good late impression to be nearest at finish.

Squeezed and lost position at start, soon recovered to just better than midfield, about midfield on rails rounding home bend, saved ground gaining joint 4th joining in, unable to sustain effort shortly after straightening.
Began moderately, raced behind midfield, ran home one-paced. (Jockey warned to ensure beginning with the field.)
Given reminders early, not far off before going backward far side dropping to rear of main group, saved ground turning in, found nothing in the run home.
Wide without cover in midfield early, took closer order down far side, went wider into straight, made no show thereafter.
Raced wide without cover in midfield or just worse, towards rear when wide into straight, ran home one-paced.
Midfield early stages, checked and shuffled back to rear of main group, hampered again at Rock, widest of all turning in, made no impression in straight.
Began with others, settled wide without cover in midfield, remained similar until dropped out of contention in straight.
Parked in 2nd last position, 2-3 wide with cover. Swung widest on the home turn and unleashed a barnstorming run down the outside to grab victory close to home.
Camped 3 back the fence. Swept to the front at the 100m and looked the winner until pipped in the shadows of the post.
Stalked the leader along the paint. Kept on well over the concluding stages despite drifting out in the run to the line.
Led along the fence from a wide gate. Went a steady gallop in front but commenced to shift out near the 150m & was collard over about the final 100m.
Settled midfield 1 off with cover. Raced in restricted room for some distance approaching the 400m, finished off well after obtaining clear running near the furlong.
Slow to begin settling at the rear along the rail. Kept to the inside in the final stretch and closed off soundly.
Jumped awkwardly then was ridden along to settle in 2nd position outside the leader. Faded over the last 100m.
Travelled worse than midfield the fence after beginning awkwardly. Only plodded to the line.
Settled 1 out 1 back. Was under hard riding after the 500m but couldn't quicken and never really responded.
Settled back in the field, 3 wide with cover. Peeled out to race 4 wide after the 500m, but failed to run on.
Faced the breeze 3 wide & without cover for most of the trip when travelling in a midfield position. Never likely.
Settled behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Passing the 1200m, the saddle shifted forward, placing the rider at a considerable disadvantage for the remainder of the race.
Led throughout . Never seriously challenged.
Tracked leader on fence to home straight. Never trouble the winner but did the best of the rest.
Taken to rear from highest draw after start. Finished off well home straight to snatch 3rd at post but was beaten fair way by the winner.
Eased to rear on fence from wide barrier. Last turning for home. Progressed steadily home straight to make frame at finish.
Well enough away. Gradually eased to race 2-wide towards rear to home straight. Made up decent ground thereafter and nearly made frame.
Away in line and raced 3-wide without cover ahead of midfield early. Strode forward at the Rock and parked one-off behind leader home turn. One-paced to conclude.
3-wide towards rear to home straight. Ran on down the centre of the track thereafter.
Hard ridden early to maintain a 2-wide spot ahead of midfield. Pressed from home turn but couldn't turn up a notch.
Niggled early but was trapped wide. Gradually eased to midfield back straight but remained wide and without cover most of the trip. Plugged on home.
Midfield on fence to home straight. Couldn't pick up when the race got serious.
Never better than midfield early and middle stages. Struggled soon after straightening. (Jockey reported didn't handle track.)
Clean jump. Near rear. Headway between runners before the home bend. Came wide and responded strongly, led at 100m, pushed out for a close win.
Fair jump, allowed to settled in rear. Ridden from 450m out while tracking the winner every move. Balanced and switched course at 250m, came powerfully late for a strong second.
Good jump. Settled just behind the early speed along the rail. Pushed out at the top of the straight, kept on well for third.
Clean jump. In touch, driven from 500m out, kept on one pace to the line.
Jumped well. Prominent. Challenged for the lead at the rock until the straight. Kept on stubbornly to the line.
Quickly away. Disputed lead and led after 400m. Pressed from the rock and held lead. Strong drive coming home, kept on evenly.
Good jump. Midfield along the fence. One pace under drive.
Hopped in air and trailed at once in rear. Never a factor.
Good jump. Near rear. Found little coming home, outran.
Clean jump. Always in rear. Hard ridden from 600m out but not gaining. No threat.
Quickly away. In touch, raced 3 deep without cover for the entire trip.
Poorly away. Near rear. Raced 4 wide without cover, hard ridden from 600m out, beaten before the top of the straight.
Jumped well. Settled patiently in midfield. Made well-timed move from 150m out, came on and led late, a perfect ride indeed.
Quickly away. Patiently save ground along the fence in 4th, pushed out on the same path from 300m out, came on well, led briefly, overtaken by the winner in the last 50m.
Fair jump. Disputed lead from the widest gate and led at the 1300m mark. Led along the rail and was challenged after the rock. Increased the pace from 450m out, kept on fighting to the line.
Off slowly. Settled last along the fence. Came on smartly in the straight, gained well, too far behind earlier and just missed the money.
Clean jump. Midfield. Ridden from 450m out when the pace quickened, one pace coming home.
Quickly away and disputed early lead, settled behind the leader after the first turn. Launched attack from 600m out, stayed on one pace to the finish.
Good break. Always rear, strong headway at 450m 5-deep without cover, 6-deep top of the straight, kept on one pace under drive.
Missed jump. Rear, shaken from 400m out, found little.
Clean quick jump. Midfield, all chance, not quickened, disappointing.
Jumped well. Settled in rear, came wide top of the straight, no threat.
Good jump. Midfield along the rail. Found little in the straight.
Fair jump. In touch, launched challenge without cover 3-deep at the rock, kept on without losing ground until getting weak in the last 200m, bumped hard at 150m, never recovered.
Pushed early but didn't muster, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 200M to win.
Took rail easily and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 50M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, lacked room 300M, dashed strongly when clear to grab 3rd.
Pushed forward, sat just off the pace but trapped 3 wide throughout, lost too much ground on bends, ran on until 100M flattened.
Settled just off the lead 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, flattened 150M.
Hard ridden to hold the box seat, enjoyed the slow tempo, however soon weakened 250M. (Jockey reported didn't handle going.)
At back, 6Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, trapped 3 wide throughout and lost too much ground, ran on ok.
Checked start, at rear, 8Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, trapped 4 wide throughout and lost too much ground, ran on ok despite all negative racing situations.
Very slow away, hard ridden along the fence, 4Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, no progress.
Eased back, 3Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow pace, trapped 3 wide throughout and lost too much ground, weakened 400M.
Checked start, never a factor at rear.
2Ls off the leader tempo, trapped 3 wide throughout and lost too much ground, dropped off 500M.
Quickest of all, led after 50m, set pace along the fence. Shaken up at top of the straight, pushed all out, weakened last 100m, all out and barely held on by a head.
Bumped hard, steadied, rejoined at 800m and saved ground along the fence in 8th, came strongly under drive last 200m, continued to gain and just missed catching the winner on the line.
Off slowly and steadied. Settled along the fence in rear. Responded generously under strong urging and finished well for third.
Bumped start. Recovered and sat behind the leader and eventual winner. Kept on, no threat to the first three.
Slowly away. Interfered and steadied at 1000m mark. Recovered, settled in rear. Evenly under drive coming home, best of the rest.
Clean jump. Midfield, travelled easy, came wide top of the straight, one pace under drive.
Jumped well, hustled at once for better position but was unable to do so. Settled near rear and raced without cover the entire trip, 6-deep top of the straight, kept on trying.
Broke sideway and bumped. Raced wide 3-deep without cover in midfield, outclass here.
Knocked hard from the gate. Recovered and settled just behind the leaders in 4th. Found little under drive.
Jumped well. Hustled to chase leader and hard ridden from 500 to close the gap and had little left with 300m to go.
Fair jump. Ridden hard in the back straight but was unable to keep up with the pace. Dropped to rear and was beaten from a long way out.
Poor break and trailed at once. Running greenly and bumped into the rail at the 800m mark. Trailed through out and was badly beaten before the straight.
Not hurried, settled towards the rear 7Ls off the pace, found plenty when asked early straight to eventually draw away inside 100M for a back to back win.
Positioned behind midfield, held up a bit nearing the entrance of straight, finished well final 200M to go 2nd near line but was never quite getting to the winner.
Handy from the start, moved to the lead near 400M, kept on well, headed near 100M.
Held up behind midfield, stayed on under a forceful ride, did best work late.
Crossed to the lead near 1300M, steadied tempo from 800M, lost lead inside 400M, ran on one paced over the final 300M.
Tracked leader in the 2-path, ran on one-paced, steadied near 200M but didn't find much after.
Taken back from a wide draw, raced near the rear for much of the way, switched wide turning for home and made limited progress.
Ahead of midfield about 3Ls behind leader in the first half, moved into contention nearing 400M, had his chance but finished off only fairly.
In mid-division and saved ground sticking to the inside, had every chance but couldn't find extra inside 150M.
Held up in midfield, not much room early straight, had to shift ground but found disappointingly little in the finish.
Chased leaders in early stages, caught 3-wide without cover in 4th, weakened and out of contention passing 300M.
Began awkwardly and lost ground, raced at the back throughout, taken widest on straightening, not quickened.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Settled behind midfield, commenced move over 200 M out, quickened well to take charge inside final 100 M.
Always thereabouts, came under pressure over 300 M out, ran on to hold some chance over 100 M out only to find winner too strong closing stages.
Began moderately, gradually settled behind midfield, commenced move passing 400 M, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began well, settled just off the speed without cover, held similar position until failed to quicken inside final 200 M.
Held slender lead to 400 M, gave ground steadily inside final 400 M.
Began with others, soon settled behind midfield on stands rails, inconvenienced passing 400 M, produced some late impression closing stages.
Broke well, ridden to soon join the pace, disputed lead until finding no extra inside final 200 M.
Began with others, well there until approaching course proper, soon faded under pressure.
Began with others, ridden along to keep up with the pace early, unable to sustain effort and faded under pressure inside final 300 M.
Began awkwardly before hampered and lost ground shortly after start, remained well behind and only went past well beaten horses late.
Drawn badly, gradually crossed to the centre of the track from the lowest draw to race with others in midfield, made no impression closing stages.
Began restrained to quickly cross to stands side, remained well behind throughout despite coming under pressure inside final 300 M.
Midfield early stages, gave ground gradually while hanging in passing 400 M.
Behind midfield, came under pressure passing 400 M, soon weakened.
Travelled in 2nd last position the fence. Got a nice passage between the field in the home straight and let down well to land the prize.
Made its run from worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Peeled out widest on the home turn and closed off nicely.
Stalked the leader, 2 deep with cover. Worked to the lead at the 300m, and stayed on soundly.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race in fifth position, 1 off with cover. Kept on at the same speed in the run to the line to finish in the frame.
Settled half a length second on the rails after handing up near the 1200m. Maintained its ground most of the way down the running.
Settled midfield the fence. Hung In as usual in the final stretch and made steady ground.
Worked forward to race in the lead after the 1200m, 1 off slightly in advance of the runner to its inside. Was a beaten horse at the furlong.
Camped midfield, 1 off with cover. Whacked away at the same pace in the run home.
Settled near the rear 2 deep with cover. Came wide in the straight but only plugged home.
Travelled behind midfield the fence. Kept to the inside in the home straight but failed to make any impression.
Was posted for the majority of the race 3 wide and without cover, midfield. Never likely.
Settled in 2nd last position, 1 off with cover. Failed to close off.
Hard ridden most of the way to stay in touch with the field, settling a long last. Struggled in the home straight.
Raced handy to the leaders along the paint in a tracking position. Compounded quickly in the home straight, Pulled up very distressed. (See incident report.)
Urged early to obtain a forward spot. Cut to the fence and led home turn. Seriously challenged final 300M but battled well to fend off rivals. Drew clear final stages.
Began well but trapped wide. Eased to 3-wide ahead of midfield from 1100M. Chased leader turning in. Loomed as a real danger 300M but couldn't sustain effort inside 100M.
Soon in leading section on fence. Took seat behind leader home turn. Every chance in the straight but lacked the finishing touch of the front pair.
Quickly into stride but caught wide. Travelled 3-wide and without cover behind pace to home straight. Kept on fairly well without seriously troubling the front trio.
Elected to sit 2 to 3-wide behind midfield to home straight. Picked up from 250M and covered decent ground but was beaten far by the principals.
Niggled early and slotted 2-wide ahead of midfield from 1100M. Well positioned to strike in the straight but was once-paced to conclude.
At rear as usual. Took inside run rounding home turn. Made some headway home straight without threat.
2-wide at midfield early. Raced ungenerously and shifted 3-wide at bend. Plugged on home.
Never far off the pace on fence to home straight. Couldn't find extra gear when the race got serious.
Slow to begin. Shaken up along the fence and raced behind midfield from 1200M. Shifted 2-wide and looked for clear run turning into home. Failed to progress home straight.
Back with last few always. Never likely.
Away in line and settled at midfield on fence early. Peeled out home turn and afforded clear run home straight. Found nothing when asked.
At rear division throughout. Never in the hunt.
Always at rear. No impression.
Broke well, ridden to uncontested lead, three lengths clear far side, allowed field to gain, headed briefly straight, ridden to lead again near line.
Fair break, ridden to settle fourth on rail, pulling slightly, four wide challenge entering straight, led 200m out until narrowly headed.
Fast away, settled second rail, slightly short of room and lost places turn, pulled out, finished strongly.
Fair break, fifth one off, mid-track bid, led briefly 150m out, weakened late.
Fair break, sixth three wide, mid-track bid, kept on steadily.
Sluggish start, rear one off, wide bid, finished well.
Fluffed start, ridden to compensate, midfield one off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back, then up to third one off, up to second early straight, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, midfield two off, back to fifth last one off, mid track bid, slightly short of room, one pace.
Fair break, midfield rail, inside bid, ridden and wavered mid-straight, little progress.
Moderate start, rear group three off, wide bid, driven, modest progress.
Stumbled leaving stall, jockey lost iron, back to last before regained it, up to midfield two off, wide bid, weakened late.
Fair break, not much early speed, fourth last urged, inside bid, no progress.
Moderate start, second last one off, ridden, found nil.
Broke fast from wide gate, led and crossed, steadied in lead, kicked straight, unchallenged.
Fair break, midfield one off, mid-track bid, ran on well.
Fair break, taken back to rear rail, inside bid, not clear run briefly, ran on well.
Fair break, back to fourth last one off, wide bid, ran on late without real kick.
Away well, back to rear one off, made good ground between rivals under driving, kept on well.
Fair break, not much early pace, third last rail, improved turn, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, up along rail to third, ridden early straight, one pace.
Fair break, caught wide racing ungenerously, back to rear group, wide bid, one pace.
Fair break, ridden early, second one off, ridden early straight, weakened.
Moderate start, mid-rear three wide not settling, last into straight, kept on past beaten horses late.
Fair break, sixth two off, mid-track bid, flattened out mid-straight.
Fair break, bustled early but not pace to lead, sixth one off, ridden straight, no response.
Broke well, led briefly then outpaced, midfield one-off into straight, ridden, no response.

Placing: PU
Comment: Bled, pulled up.
Settled in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, drifted away 300M to win.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, blocked 400M, progressed steadily when clear and got 2nd.
At rear, 7.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-5 wide, made ground steadily 300M for 3rd.
Eased to rear, 8.5Ls off the good pace, made ground around the field, raced 3-5 wide, progressed steadily 300M, run ended 100M.
Slow away, at rear, 7.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, held up 400M, made steady ground when clear.
Bumped start, eased back, 6.5Ls behind the good pace 2-3 wide, made ground in straight.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, soon emptied 450M.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, out of fuel 350M.
Pushed early but not muster, trapped 3-5 wide in midfield, 5.5Ls off the good pace, weakened 300M.
Awkward away, box seat, emptied 400M.
Never muster, not competitive.
Never better than midfield and tailed out.
Never better than midfield and tailed out.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls at good pace, dropped off 400M.
Good clean jump, good natural speed and taken back behind the heated early pace. Launched attack from 250m out, sprinted clear at 200m and never looked back.
Bumped hard, recovered at once and settled easily in rear. Came on strongly in the last 200m, no match to the still unbeaten winner.

Fair jump. Dropped into a rear position along the fence. Widest of all 7-deep at top of the straight, long hard drive from 350m out, came like a freight train inside the last 100m and just missed catching the first two.
Good jump. In touch, settled 5-deep without cover, kept on stubbornly to the line.
Quick jump. Used his natural gate speed to challenge for an early lead. Raced 4-deep without cover the entire trip, stayed on strongly coming home.
Missed jump. Settled in rear along the rail. Ran on well under strong urging and finished best late.
Squeezed after jump, recovered at once and contested early lead. Settled just behind the pace after 300m, steadied after entered the straight, came on again inside the last 100m.
Missed jump. Rear along the rail, came passing the tired ones late.
Slowly away, ridden hard at once and stayed in touch at midfield, lost cover at 800m and travelled 4-deep without cover to the straight. Pushed all out coming home and only weakened in the last 100m.
Good clean jump, ridden at once for a striking position behind the speed along the rail, found little under drive.
Off a step slow, recovered immediately using his good early speed, disputed lead on the 2-path from 800m, led at 450m, kept on well under drive until the last 150m.
Broke sideway and contacted. Lack early speed and trailed in last the entire trip, no threat.
Quickest of all. Disputed lead and took control after 400m. Pressed again from 800m out, gave up lead at before entering the straight, found no more last 200m.
Hesitated at jump. Rear, beaten badly from 300m out.
Chased leader and always in touch, showed impressive acceleration passing 300M, got up inside 100M, eased off once in control.
Sped off and crossed to lead along the Stands' rail, going strongly into final 400M, headed inside 100M but finished well clear of the rest.
Never far off leader, shifted out badly when put to pressure 400M out causing interference to rivals, kept on for 3rd but was never going to trouble the first two.
In mid-division, urged along halfway, unbalanced when bumped near 300M, kept on for a non-threatening 4th.
Prominently placed in the flight chasing leader, kept on steadily under pressure but not making headway to the leaders, hampered near 200M but made little difference to the result.
Checked at the start, soon recovered to race in midpack, not much room passing 250M and was checked, one-paced over the final stages.
Near the rear and placed towards the outside of the field, made limited progress from off the pace.
Dropped back to the rear, 5-6Ls back in middle stages, hung out and proved difficult to ride nearing 400M, no impression.
Began awkwardly, steadied near 900M and raced further back in the field, not quickened when put to pressure, tight for room late stages. (Distressed after race.)
Behind midfield, outpaced in middle stages, didn't have the clearest of runs final 400M but never going the pace to challenge.
Within 3Ls of the leader, moved up to challenge passing halfway, checked near 300M, lost momentum and never got back into contention.
Behind midfield, not quickened going into final 400M, never a factor.
Behind midfield racing along the stands' rail, weakened inside 300M.
Behind midfield, under pressure halfway, outpaced final 300M.
Quickest of all, led, settled easily along the rail behind the early pace. Came off cover at top of the straight, responded strongly and powered away from 150m out.

Jumped well and ridden at once for an early lead without cover 3-deep until taking a clear lead at the 1000m marker. Let go from 300m out, ran on strongly but no match to the quicker winner from 150m out.
Fair jump and bumped by neightbour on his left. Settled midfield between horses. Came on well between runners in the last 150m, no threat to the first two runners.
Quick jump. Midfield along the fence. Kept on evenly in the last 300m.
Quickly away. Ridden for speed and led after 150m. Overtaken at 1000m, launched challenge from 450m out, all out from 350m, one pace to the line.
Jumped well and dropped to the rear along the fence at once. Strong drive after entered the straight, one pace at best.
Fair jump. Midfield 3-deep with cover until reaching the 1000m, lost cover and left without cover to the straight. Outsprinted and offered no challenge.
Poor jump, interfered and checked after leaving the barrier. Near rear, swung wide top of the straight, laid in under left hand urging, beaten from 250m out.
Slowly away. Always in the rear, swung widest of all 8-deep top of the straight, not much under drive.
Poor jump and broke to his right. In the rear, one pace coming home.
Hampered and steadied from the gate. In the rear, came wide top of the straight, not quickened.
Fair break, settled in rear due to poor wide draw. Trailed in last the entire trip. Strong urging from 500m out, wide turn top of the straight, found little.
Knocked hard and contacted others after break. Recovered, pulled hard and settled in 5th between runners. Greenly under drive, no factor.
Broke right and bumped hard. Recovered and stayed in touch with early leaders. No threat at all and beaten badly from 300m out.
Slotted into box seat 1 out 1 back, enjoyed run of the race to turn, set out after leader and gained advantage final 100m for another strong win.
Began well from a wide gate, able to get outside leader easily, 1L back throughout, joined in with eventual winner at 200m, just couldn't hold out late. Good effort.
Even getaway, posted 3 wide without cover throughout, 3Ls back improving on bend, kept finding and did well to stay with them after hard run and take a creditable 3rd.
Out well, took ideal position on leaders back, every hope in run, in behind them in straight but couldn't pick up when clear and just ground away to make frame.
Unbalanced on jumping, settled amongst last few 8Ls or so away in running line, began to improve turning in, made a decent impression in straight.
Even getaway, assumed a midfield 4ls or so back, had every chance but didn't quicken as expected in straight, just held ground final 300m.
Out with rest, raced midfield on rails 4-5Ls back, easy run to bend, stayed on at same pace in straight.
Faded back as usual, raced 3 wide at rear 10ls back, came wide on turning, closed off best of rest final 300m making good ground to be nearest on line.
Showed usual speed to take up running, uncontested lead in front, 1L clear to bend, overtaken at 300m and gave in easily, dropping off late.
Settled behind midfield on rails, 6Ls away in mid section, spent nothing to bend, didn't run on as in previous starts and just whacked away final 300m.
Restrained form a wide gate, shared rear 9ls away on rails, plenty of work to do turning, took inside runs but made minimal ground.
Drifted back from an awkward alley, ended up 3 wide at rear 8ls back, set task when still well back turning, no impression.
Unable to slot in and ended up 3 wide behind midfield, had cover in mid section 6-7Ls back, overaced in mid section, dropped out final 300m.
Positioned behind midfield, 7Ls away in 2 wide line, fair run to bend, struggling turning and unbalanced in action soon after, eased down late.
