Began well, amongst leaders early stages settling one-out-one-back in 3rd position, similar when 2nd around the bend, hit the front passing 300 M, won easily.
Shared the 4th spot on rails, commenced move entering straight, fought on steadily without threatening the winner.
Slow away, gradually recovered along rails to midfield home bend, shifted out wide to challenge turning in, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Soon took up running, led the field to 250 M, weakened under pressure.
Broke well from a poor draw, settled better than midfield sharing 4th about 4Ls off the speed, one-paced from similar position into straight.
Slow away, remained well behind to straight, ran past well-beaten horses only.
Began fairly, soon driven to join leaders, became one back on rails coming out of back straight and dropping to 2L 3rd around the bend, dropped out under pressure after straightening.
Never better than midfield.
Always well behind, ran past only well-beaten horses in the straight.
Began fairly from a poor draw, soon dropped to worse than midfield despite ridden along, made no impression in the run home.
Soon dropped to last few and never seen with a chance.
Disputed 4th most of way far side, hampered and lost position around the bend, never recovered.
Began moderately, soon dropped to rear of midfield despite ridden along, weakened after straightening.
Rated in fifth position, 2 deep with cover. Hit the lead at the 200m, and drew away for an easy victory.
Parked midfield on the rails. Shifted out into clear running near the 300m and closed off soundly.
Handed up after the 800m and enjoyed a trailing position behind the leader passing the 800m. had every chance.
Camped 3 back the paint. Peeled out 3 deep at the 400m and looked likely at the furlong before its run ended near the 50m.
Made its run from worse than midfield, the fence. Made some ground along the inside without threatening.
Crowded at the start & raced near midfield, 1 off with cover. Peaked on its effort close to the 100m.
Parked behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Kept on at the same speed in the run to the line.

Botched the start and lost considerable ground travelling worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Hung out after the 900m and was never likely from there on racing wide on the bend. Vet reported blood in trachea. (To trial.)
Travelled at the tail of the field along the fence. Whacked away one paced in the run to the line.
Settled in 4th position, 1 off with cover. Hung out rounding the home turn and in the straight failed to find any extra.
Worked forward and lead crossing to the fence after the 800m. faded over the final furlong.
Raced with backmakers 1 off with cover. Struggled in the home straight. (Bled from both nostrils.)
From the outside gate, settled at the rear of the field 2-3 wide with cover. Never a factor.
Travelled 3 wide and without cover for most of the trip in about a midfield position. Tailed out. (To trial.)
Hard ridden early to hold the fence in a forward spot. Took seat behind leader entering back straight. Finished off strongly top of home straight. Ran away from 250M.
Raced 2-wide with leaders first turn. Settled 2-wide at midfield back straight. Shifted 4-wide to make run turning in. Never threatened the winner but did the best of the rest.
Taken to 2-wide rear after start. Switched out for run but got traffic top of home straight. Closed off fairly well inside 250M for 3rd.
Well enough away and raced 3-wide in leading section first turn. Settled 2-wide behind midfield back straight. Shifted 3-wide turning into home. Plugged on to make frame.
Checked at start when crowded for room. Soon took fence towards rear. Shifted 2-wide entering home straight. Held ground to the line.
Raced 3-wide towards rear. Swung wider on straightening. Never posed danger to the principals.
Raced on fence behind midfield to home straight. Made up some ground until severely checked at 200M. Resumed fairly.
Shaken up early from widest gate. Eventually found the fence and led from back straight. Overhauled and weakened 250M.
Pushed early but couldn't muster. Travelled 3-wide behind midfield to home straight. No show thereafter.
Pressed early but trapped wide first turn. Slotted 2-wide behind leader from entering back straight. Faded soon after straightening.
2-wide towards rear. Ran out abruptly after 200M. Never in the hunt.
At midfield on fence early and middle stages. Shifted 2-wide entering home straight. Found nothing when asked.
At rear always. Never a factor.
Driven up early and caught 3-wide without cover ahead of midfield. Emptied inside 300M.
Broke well, led rail, kicked early straight, kept on well.
Fast break, midfield one off, slight check far side, second last mid-straight, wide bid, finished fast.
Fair break, midfield one off, sharp move three wide to third, challenged leader throughout straight, no extra late.
Sluggish start, rear early three wide, wide bid, stayed on steadily.
Fair break, not much early speed, held up fourth last pulling slightly, wide bid, kept on.
Broke well, fifth rail, inside bid, one pace.
Well away, back to midfield three wide, wide bid, kept on, no kick.
Broke well, midfield one off pulling, driven for mid-track bid, found little.
Moderate break, third last not settling, bid between horses, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield two off, ridden early straight, found little.
Fair break, midfield rail, improved inside entering straight, ridden, found very little.
Moderate break, little early pace, rear rail, inside bid, found little.
Fair break, tried to join leaders wide but not enough pace, three wide into straight, ridden, found nil.
Fair break, quickly up wide, led but unable to cross, second into straight, ridden, weakened.
Broke well, led and crossed, kicked early straight, soon clear, unchallenged.
Fluffed start, up alog rail to midfield, inside bid, kept on well, no chance with winner.
Broke well, up wide to second one off, challenged entering straight, weakened late.
Taken back from wide draw, last rail, made ground inside turn, driven straight, hung fire briefly, ran on well.
Fair break, ridden to third rail, driven early straight, no kick.
Fair break, lacked early pace, third last rail, urged, short of room early straight, looking awkward, made ground late.
Moderate break, second last two off, ridden, modest progress.
Fair break, urged wide looking for lead, had to settle for midfield two off, urged before turn, wide bid, one pace.
Fair break, fourth one off, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, with leaders early but outpaced but outpaced, back to rear group two off, ridden, no progress.
Fair break, midfield two off, mid-track bid, found nil.
Fair break, ridden early but caught wide, back through field to last three off, wide bid, found nil.
Pushed to keep up in midfield along the fence, 4Ls off the good pace, held up 4-2, made good ground when clear, scored by comfortable margin.
Pushed to take the rail and share the lead at good pace, hung on strongly until 150M overhauled, ran on well for 2nd.
Failed to muster early, 6.5Ls off the good pace along the fence, held up 4-2, progressed steadily when clear.
Settled behind the leaders, 2Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, progressed steadily 300M.
Bumped start, at rear, 8Ls off the good pace on the fence, blocked 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no turn of foot in straight.
At back as usual, 7Ls off the good pace, trapped 4 wide throughout and lost too much ground, ran on ok.
Slow away, hard ridden to obtain the box seat, ran on until 250M weakened.
Very slow away, trapped 3 wide in midfield, 5Ls off the good pace, no turn of foot in final stages.
Shared lead at good pace 2 wide, emptied 400M.
Behind midfield, 6.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no progress.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2Ls off the good pace 3 wide, moved forward 800M, weakened 400M.
Eased back, raced 5 wide throughout and lost too much ground, never a factor.
Broke sideway, recovered at once and led after 150m under minimal pressure. Pushed out from 350m out, kept on well for a comfortable win.
Fair break. Prominent and sat right behind the leader. Ridden from 450m, kept on evenly under an all out drive, just held second.
Quickly away. Ridden for early speed but unable to get a forward position and settled near rear. Long drive before the home straight and came on fighting and finished strongly for third.
Broke sideway and bumped hard. In touch along the rail, finished gamely under a strong ride and just missed finished in the money.
Bumped hard off the break, recovered and rejoined group after 300m and settled in midfield along the fence. Ran on and rallied well in the straight, a much better effort.
Jumped well. In the rear, swung wide top of the straight, rallied well inside the last 200m.
Hit gate and lost balance. In the rear, blocked behind runners for a long time until last 200m, ran on late.
Clean break. In touch. Pushed out from 400m out, one pace at best.
Good jump. Midfield. Shaken from 400m out, not quickened.
Good jump. Midfield, raced 3-deep with cover, second widest top of the straight, one pace under drive.
Jumped well. Trailed in last the entire race. Came passing tired runners in the straight.
Slow break. Always rear, widest at top of the straight, no threat.
Clean jump. In the rear, outpaced in the straight, no factor.
Fair break. Chased early leader 3-deep without cover the entire trip, weakened top of the straight and beaten 400m out.
Settled in 5th about 4Ls behind leaders in a strongly run race, quickened impressively inside 300M, strode clear 100M out, untroubled to win with a decisive margin of 2.5Ls.
Began awkwardly, raced in midfield along the 2-path, tracked eventual winner from 600M, ran on well in straight but couldn't get near to that rival.
Placed 2-wide in the group chasing the pace, didn't have the winner's acceleration but stayed on to go 3rd nearing 100M.
Driven along early, always in touch in chasing group, kept on at the same pace for a non-threatening 4th.
Raced 3-wide without cover in mid-division, taken to wide outside on straightening, finished off fairly and never looked dangerous at any stage.
Severely checked on jumping, recovered to race behind midfield 7Ls off a good pace, ran on fairly on straightening.
Dropped back to last over 10Ls behind leaders, had plenty to do turning in but made limited progress from the rear only. (Lame next day.)
Vied for the lead on the inside and set off at a good pace, opened up a 1L advantage turning in, headed near 200M, weakened.
Settled along the fence 4-5Ls behind leaders, kept on same pace turning in, no extra 200M. (Mucopus.)
Taken back on jumping from a wide barrier, 10Ls off the strong pace going into final 400M, made no impression running past beaten runners only.

Severely checked on jumping, ended up towards the rear well off the pace, did not respond to pressure passing 400M, never a factor. (Jockey reported his horse did not feel balanced in its action throughout the race.)
Driven forward and vied for the lead on the outside, no extra inside 300M, dropped out rapidly. (Mucopus.)
Dropped in behind midfield, didn't find much when the race got serious, well beaten going into final 200M.
Held up towards the rear, not quickened under pressure inside 600M, soon no extra, eased when no chance 200M. (Jockey reported his horse did not travel comfortably throughout the race.)
Jumped well. Midfield, 3-deep cover and travelled easy, came wide and responded smartly under drive, led late at the wire.
Quickly away. Good early speed and led with little pressure after 200m. Responded well under drive and lost a close decision on the line.
Good break. Save ground in fifth along the fence. Kept on evenly under drive, held third.
Hesitated at break. Chased speed and quickly settled behind the leaders along the fence. Kept on one pace.
Broke in air and hampered after jump. In the rear, swung wide, free late and came on best in the last 200m.
Jumped well. In the rear, all chances, one pace.
Hopped in air. In the rear, one pace coming home.
Jumped well from the barrier. Prominent, no factor over this distance.
Missed jump. In the rear, not quickened coming home.
Broke sideway and hard contact. In the rear, found little in the straight.
Broke inward and bumped hard. Recovered at once and settled next to the pacemaker the entire trip. Pushed out entered the straight, not much left in the last 200m.
Jumped well. Near rear along the fence, not quickened under drive.
Bumped hard from the barrier. 3-wide cover the entire trip, found little coming home.
Good jump. In touch early, unable to keep up when pace quickened before the home bend, soon beaten at the 300m mark.
Settled behind midfield, best part of 6Ls back in two wide line, niggled along turning, closed strongly out of pack and did best work final 200m to score with some in hand.
Average break, made up ground to sit behind pace, 3-4Ls back on rails in run, drove through to lead soon after 300m, couldn't hold out winner late.
Faded back as usual, raced 3 wide 8Ls or so away, improved gradually rounding bend, produced usual honest finish making good ground for 3rd.
Ended up behind midfield in rear division racing two wide, 7-8Ls off front end, made some progress turning, kept coming to be not far away in 4th.
Showed usual speed to work across from outside gate and take up running, set even tempo in mid section, led turning but soon tackled, gradually lost advantage final 300m.
Showed more speed than at debut, raced 1 out 1 back, there to bend, didn't show extra in straight and struggled final 200m (lame next day).
Faded back from a wide draw, raced 3 wide 9ls back near to last, well back to bend and had plenty to do turning, made some even progress in straight.
Took a midfield spot 5Ls back in running line, easy time to bend, just battled away straight.
Tardy into stride, drifted back from an awkward gate, 6-7Ls back on rails, easy time to bend, just battled away in run to line.
Showed good speed to lead before taking trail, had fair run thereafter with standard tempo, found little when asked and soon folded.
Positioned prominently 2Ls or so away racing 2 wide, raced 3 wide without cover from 1000m, working hard approaching bend, steadily faded after using too much.
No early speed and raced next to last 10ls off leaders, always well back, never a factor.
Posted 3 wide in midfield, 5Ls back with cover to bend, folded soon after straightening.
Came out very awkwardly and was detached, never really competitive (fractured nose and bleeding although not deemed to have bled).
Showed plenty of speed to take up running, rolled along at a pace to suit, skipped clear turning under light weight, kept on comfortably to score a handy win.
Drifted back to settled near to last on rails, 7-8Ls back in run, saved ground to bend, angled clear at 300m and closed well making good ground final furlong.
Closer than usual racing first behind leader on rails, all favours in run, forced to chase leader from bend, stayed on well for 3rd.
Settled well back 6-7Ls away just off midfield, lost position in traffic approaching turn, switched back to inside and made gradual headway despite not clearest run.
Began with them, pressed on but posted 3 wide without cover, 2ls or so off lead, did work wide in mid section, couldn't sustain effort and dropped off in straight.
Well enough away, assumed box seat 1 out 1 back, all favours to bend, niggled along turning and only produced a 1 paced finish.
Went forward to take closer order and raced first outside leader, even run in middle stages, struggling turning and faded out badly final furlong.
Drifted back as usual, 8ls or so away early, made a 3 wide run leaving bend, made only minor ground in straight.
Posted wide in behind midfield from an awkward draw, 6Ls or so back, improved mid section, no extra from bend and dropped out in straight.
Standard getaway, angled into spot behind midfield, 6-7Ls back and further behind on bend when tempo increased, just battled away in straight.
Even getaway, positioned in midfield 4Ls back in two wide line, struggled in mid section, folded tamely from bend to be beaten a long way.
Didn't muster and take up a prominent spot as expected, raced 4 wide with cover in midfield, 5ls of more back to bend, unable to close off after hard run.
Reasonable break, sat 3Ls or so away on rails, ok run before severely checked at 600m, never factored thereafter.
Failed to muster and trapped 4 wide without cover, 3Ls or so back, worked too hard in mid section, dropped off before bend.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began with others, settled in 6th about 2Ls off the pace, commenced move turning in, gained upper hand under pressure over 150 M out.
Began fairly, settled in 6th on rails in forward of midfield, fought on steadily without threatening.
Travelled outside leader, hit the front turning in, led until finding no extra over 150 M out.
Soon crossed for rails and settled just worse than midfield, went widest into straight, finished off race well to narrowly miss the placegetters.
Slightly slow out, soon taken across for rails run at the back, trailed the field to straight, made up good ground down centre of the track to do best work late.
Slowly away, settled well behind, saved ground turning in, made up good ground down inside of straight to be nearest at finish.
Began with others, settled in last few, ran on steadily in straight, never nearer.
Began well, prominent early stages, settled in rear of midfield to straight, ran home one-paced.
Raced prominently without cover to straight, soon weakened.
Began awkwardly, settled 2-wide in midfield, shifted wider turning for home, ran home one-paced.
Driven to soon take up running passing winning post the first time, held narrow advantage until headed into straight, folded up quickly.
Settled in 2L 4th, weakened under pressure inside final 200 M. (Heart irregularity)
Managed to park in 2nd position, 1 off after the 600m. Kept up a good gallop and repelled challengers over the final stages.
Camped in fourth position 1 off with cover. Finished off nicely.
Settled 3 back the rail. Stayed to the inside in the run home and ran on soundly.
Eventually crossed and led along the paint after the 600m. Kept up its workload in the straight to finish in the frame.
Slow to begin then blundered soon after settling in last position. Swung widest on the final turn and motored home late.
Hard ridden from the jump after being bumped but was posted 3 wide without cover on the circle whilst in a prominent position. Maintained an even gallop despite the trip.
Jumped well then was steadied to settle in a rearward position 3 wide with cover. Closed off well down the outside.
Travelled behind midfield the fence. Kept to the inside in the final stretch and got home fairly.
Raced worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Only plugged away in the run to the line.
Sent forward and lead along the paint before handing up and taking a trialing position near the 600m. Found little when placed under pressure in the straight.
Began awkwardly then was ridden along to hold its midfield position, 1 off with cover. Gave in easily in the final stretch.
Settled behind midfield 3 deep with cover. Copped a bump near the 500m, and was never really in the hunt thereafter.
Quickly into stride. Took seat behind leaders from 800M. Ideal position to strike in the straight. Battled determinedly to prevail near the post.
Pressed early but trapped wide first turn. Parked 2-wide outside leader from the Rock. Every chance in the straight and ran on strongly. Just failed to repel the winner close home.
In leading section on fence to home straight. Kept on well but lacked the finishing touch of the front pair final stages.
Slow to begin. Improved gradually along the fence and reached midfield at the Rock. Shifted out and found clear run 300M. Finished off the race satisfactorily.
Taken to 2-wide at rear. Swung wide and was 7Ls down on straightening. Covered good ground home straight.
Towards rear on fence to home straight. Made steady headway to the line.
Hard ridden early but failed to muster. Travelled wide and without cover in midfield back straight. Progressed to 3-wide behind leaders home turn but couldn't sustain final 200M.
2-wide towards rear to home straight. Made up minor ground late.
Ahead of midfield on fence to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch when the race got serious and weakened final 100M.
2-wide ahead of midfield early and middle stages. Switched 5-wide turning into home. Failed to respond when asked.
Shaken up early but insufficient speed to cross. Ended up 3-wide without cover at midfield back straight. Never progressed from there.
2-wide at midfield early. Severely checked to behind midfield from 1000M. Similar position home turn. Ran on fairly top of home straight. Got traffic inside 150M.
Slowly away, back to last on rail, still last into straight, strong run wide, led on line.
Broke well, settled fourth one off, improved turn, led 200m out, caught on line.
Fair break, steadied to second last rail taking time to settle, ran on well when pulled out straight.
Broke well, led, then rail in fifth, inside bid, up to second briefly, not sustain run.
Fair break, fourth two off, then led and crossed, two lengths clear into straight, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, midfield one off, slight bumping first turn, mid-track bid, one pace.
Fair start, mid-rear rail, made slow ground under driving although short of room mid-straight.
Moderate start, settled third last one off, driven straight, one pace.
Fair break, up to front rank but caught four wide, went second far side and still there into straight, ridden, found nil.
Broke sharply, up on outside to lead and cross, headed, settled third, ridden before straight, weakened.
Fair break, not much early, midfield two off, ridden turn, dropped out tamely.
Broke well, midfield rail, improved turn, challenged and led early straight, ran on strongly.
Fair break, settled mid-rear rail, improved inside turn, ran on well without being able to challenge.
Quite well away, mid-rear one off, wide bid, finished strongly.
Moderate break, taken back to rear rail, improved inside, stayed on well late.
Broke well, up to join leaders but caught four wide, back to fifth one off, stayed on under driving but no kick.
Stood still in stalls, lost 15 lengths, made ground to join field, second last into straight, ridden, kept on very well.
Broke well, shared lead one off, ridden and weakened straight.
Well away, shared lead rail, then settled third, inside run to lead early straight, headed, weakened.
Broke well, up wide to join leaders, then back to joint third three wide, ridden entering straight, no extra.
Squeezed back slightly just after start, no early speed, back to long second last six lengths behind main pack, ridden, minimal progress.
Broke well, up wide looking for lead, back to midfield one off, ridden turn, weakened quickly, eased.
Moderate break, ridden up to join leaders, caught wide, ridden, weakened, eased.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, dashed well 250M to score.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leaders, trapped 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 200M to take a creditable 3rd.
Pushed to sit outside the lead, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on until 150M flattened.
Pushed to take rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on until 150M flattened.
Pushed to obtain a midfield sport, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in final stages.
Very slow away, at rear, 7.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, dashed strongly 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Hard ridden forward, 3Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout without cover, not suited by the slow tempo, held ground in straight.
Eased back, took rail behind midfield, 5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Eased to rear, 6.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 150M.
Hard ridden early, hold rail in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, flattened 200M.
Eased back, 4Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout with cover, harmed by the slow pace, ran on fairly.
Jumped well. Sat quietly along the fence in midfield. Launched challenge from 250m out, bumped at 150m, balanced and came powerfully late to win a close on at the wire.

Knocked hard and steadied at break. Recovered at once and sat behind the early leaders. Moved off cover at the top of the straight, responded strongly under drive, led from 100m out, caught on the line by a stronger finisher.
Quickly away. Led along the fence and was pressured for almost 500m. Shaken from 250m and yield grudgingly inside the last 100m to hold third.
Broke sideway and made hard contact. Kept on evenly in the straight and outran late.
Quick jump. Raced 3-deep without cover the entire trip, wide turn at the top of the straight, lack finish.
Clean jump. Taken back at once and settled in rear. Swung wide top of the straight, one pace at best.
Slow jump. Midfield. Contacted after entered the straight, unable to recover in the last 200m.
Quickly away from the gate. Backed off from the early pace and stayed in touch. Shaken from 300m out, one pace inside the last 200m.
Hard contact and steadied from the barrier. Settled in rear along the rail. No threat.
Quick jump. Pressed early pace. Disputed lead until the 600m mark. Kept on smartly under drive and weakened late.
A touch slow and bumped. Always rear. Not quickened.
Bumped hard after break. Settled last the entire trip. Found nothing.
Took early lead, restrained nearing 1300M and sat just behind the pace, into clear inside 300M and swiftly moved up to press leader before wrestled the lead 50M out.
Positively ridden, sat one out one back and going strongly into straight, led 200M out, rallied on when pressed by the eventual winner, headed nearing 50M.
Checked at the start, recovered to race in midfield 4-5Ls off the pace, gradually picked up, did best work final 200M, nearest finish.
Never far off the pace but was a shade keen in running, moved into contention passing 500M, took time to gather on straightening, stayed on well final 150M.
Tracked leader early, went forward and crossed to the lead 1100M out, put up a brief resistance when being challenged inside 250M, faded passing 150M and weakened into 5th.
Driven early to hold a position 3Ls off the pace, pushed along over the home turn, kept grinding away but never going the pace to seriously challenge.
Hampered at the start and was pushed back to a rearward position early stages, made his move passing 600M and fanned wide into straight, ran on to 150M but was then flattened.
Held up along the fence in a position behind midfield, urged along inside 500M, kept on at the same pace and made little headway on straightening.
Towards the rear about 6-7Ls off the pace, saved ground on the inside, run ended near 200M and faded.
Positioned 2-wide towards the rear, found very little when asked and never threatened.
Dropped back to last 8Ls behind leader, niggled along over the home turn but failed to pick up, eased when well beaten inside 150M.
Forwardly placed but caught wide no cover throughout the race, struggled inside 500M and gave ground rapidly.

Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Soon took up running on rails despite a poor draw, narrowly headed around the bend but soon re-gained advantage upon straightening, held on well to the line.
Began with others, never far off on rails, came to challenge upon straightening, fought on without threatening.
Began moderately, soon picked up to better than midfield position, saved ground turning in, fought on steadily to narrowly miss second.
Prominent early, soon settled in midfield, ran on steadily under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Always thereabouts. Ran home one-paced.
Close up briefly, better than midfield to straight, ran home one-paced.
Never better than midfield,
Raced in last few, ran past well-beaten horses in the run home.
Travelled behind midfield, kept on without quickening in straight.
Always in last few, very wide into straight, made no impression.
Never on terms.
Began moderately, soon picked up under pressure to a forward position, took up running coming out of back straight, led the field until shifting ground shortly after straightening.
Began with others, soon taken back to just worse than midfield, made no impression in straight.
Began with others from a poor draw, soon dropped to last few.
Camped midfield the fence. Switched into clear running back towards the inside soon after straightening and managed to hold on close to the wire after hitting the front near the 100m.

Stalked the leaders, a couple of lengths back, along the paint. Peeled out into clear running after the 350m, hit the front at the 150m. Fought back tenaciously in the last 100m, but came up just short.
Rated behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Peeled out to into the centre of the course in the straight and let down well.

Jumped well then drifted back to settle near the rear of the field along the fence. Made up gradual ground prior to the home turn and in the straight ran on well despite hanging out. (See incident report.)
Made his run from 2nd last position, 1 off with cover. Switched wide on the home turn and worked home soundly.
From a wide barrier was taken back and settled in last position along the paint. Worked home strongly through the field.
Attacked the speed from the outside gate but was posted 3 wide without cover after the 800m, in the leading trio. Faded approaching the 100M.
Camped midfield 3 wide with cover. Whacked away at the same speed in the run to the wire.
Settled midfield, 1 off with cover. Didn't find any extra in the home straight and hung in over the last 200m.
Sent forward and crossed to lead along the fence after the 800m. Was a spent force approaching the furlong.
Began very awkwardly, blundered & lost ground settling worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Failed to find any extra in the tank at the business end.
Ridden along early and enjoyed the run of the race on the back of the leaders. Struggled in the run home. (Vet reported mucopus.)
Speared forward and raced in the centre of the leading trio. Was gassed early in the final stretch.
Posted 4 wide without cover on the circle whilst travelling worse than midfield. Never likely.
2-wide behind midfield early. Ridden and swung 4-wide rounding home turn. 6Ls down at 400M. Rallied on and snatched victory in a huge finish at line.
Travelled 3-wide without cover in a forward spot to home straight. Kept giving and hit front near the post but was caught final stride.
Sat behind pace on fence to home straight. Responded well when afford clear run 250M but the post came too soon.
Shaken up early but failed to muster. Ended up 3-wide towards rear to home straight. Covered good ground wide and was narrowly beaten by the front trio.
Pressed early and parked one-off behind leaders from 1100M. Every chance in the straight but failed to repel the principals near finish.
Midfield on fence to home straight. Closed off fairly well and was nearest at post.
2-wide at midfield early and middle stages. Switched out for clear run on straightening. One-paced to conclude.
Driven early but insufficient speed to lead. Settled 3-wide with cover ahead of midfield from 1000M. Under pressure entering home straight. Held ground to the line.
Niggled early and took lead on fence from 1100M. Held a 1L advantage turning in. Headed passing 200M and weakened final 100M.
Well enough away but was taken back due to high draw. Made run outside from 800M and reached midfield turning into home. Couldn't sustain effort thereafter.
Began awkwardly and bumped another runner. Consequently raced at rear. Shifted wide at home turn. Made up some ground late.
Behind midfield near the fence to home straight. Never picked up thereafter.
2-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Faded after 400M.
Back with last few always. Never a factor.
Steadied from the barrier. Settled easily near rear along the fence. Free 300m, responded kindly under an all out drive, led 150m and never looked back.
Head in air off jump. Always in the rear, came free from the rail 150m out, came on well for second.

Good quick jump. Hard ridden to dispute early lead. Pressed all the way until the straight along the fence. Shook off challenger at top of the straight. Kept on determinedly under an all out drive, held on well for third.
Clean jump. Saved ground in midfield. Pushed all out for fourth.
Good jump. Taken back to midfield. Came free entered the straight, one pace.
Broke left from the barrier. Recovered and pressed early pace until the top of the straight. Used hard early and found little in the last 250m.
Half a step slow from the barrier. Rear, blocked long time in the straight, came free late and ran on in the last 150m.
Clean jump. In the rear. Wide turn top of the straight. One pace under drive.
Poor jump. Trailed in last along the fence. Outkick by better coming home.
Fair jump. In touch behind the early leaders along the fence. Not quickened.
Jumped well. Kept in rear, widest of all top of the straight, one pace at best.
Quick jump. Chased early pace, raced 3-deep without cover for much of the way. Shaken top of the straight and soon beaten with little fight.
Fair jump. Taken back at once but was left 3-deep the entire race. One pace coming home, no factor.
Good jump. In touch, shaken entered the straight, soon beaten reaching the 350m mark.
Fair break, not rushed, third last rail, improved wide turn, strong run to lead 100m out, held on well.
Taken back from wide to second last one off, followed winner's through turn, wide bid, just failed.
Broke well, up to share lead one off, ridden to lead mid-straight, headed, kept on.
Broke well, led rail, headed mid-straight, no extra.
Fair break, midfield rail urged, had to wait for run, kept on without kick when gap came.
Fair break, ridden early, third last one off, improved wide turn, kept on one pace.
Broke well, settled fifth rail, inside bid, drifted to mid-track, one pace.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, ridden early straight, one pace.
Fair break, steadied, mid-rear rail, ridden and kept on, not pace to challenge.
Fair break, midfield one off, driven early straight, little response.
Sluggish start, ridden early but last rail, reminders turn, checks and path blocked, unable to challenge.
Ridden up wide to join leading group, third three wide, driven early straight, weakened.
Fluffed start, lost length, ridden up to settle sixth one off, driven, found nil.
Ridden for early lead, caught three wide, back to third two off, gradually lost ground, tailed off.
Took rail easily and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, made all without threats.
Eased back, took rail, 5.5Ls off the leader, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit behind the leaders, 2.5L off the slow pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Pushed to sit outside the leader, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on until 150M flattened.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, held up 400M, little dash when clear despite not suited by the slow tempo.
Hard ridden to obtain the box seat, checked 350M, weakened afterwards.
Eased at start to cross behind the field, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, blocked 4-2, little dash when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, held up 400M, lack turn of foot when clear.
Eased midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, trapped 4 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, flattened 350M.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Midfield along the fence, 3.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, held up 4-2, checked 300M, ran on fairly.
Eased midfield early, moved forward 1000M, trapped 3 wide outside the leaders, soon weakened 350M.
Eased back, 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, never better than midfield.
Eased back, raced very keenly and wide, harmed by the slow pace, never a factor.
Jumped well and quickly saved ground in midfield. Swung wide at the home bend, let go from 250m out, sprinted clear and won going away from 150m.
Jumped well. Quickly settled behind the pacemakers along the fence in fourth much of the way. Challenged the winner from a long way out, outkick but kept on well to the line.
Jumped well. Settled nicely in rear, gained between rivals in the straight, split horses from 100m out and came strongly for third.
A touch slow from the gate, ridden at once and found a rail position in mid-division. Long drive from 350m out, kept on evenly under an all out drive.
Clean break. Always rear, widest of all at top of the straight, finished well under drive.
Jumped well. Preferred to settle in last along the fence. Gained strongly along the rail coming home.
Quickly away. Hustled at once and led after 100m. Pushed out in the straight, kept on well until the last 100m.
Clean jump. Settled five-back along the rail in rear. Slightly hampered at 300m out, blocked and steadied at 150m out, balanced again and ran on late.
Head lifted in air off break. Recovered at once and saved ground along the fence in midfield. One pace under pressure, no match here.
Broke to his left and contacted. Ridden at once for an early lead but only able to settle in second. Lacked respond under pressure, beaten from 100m out.
Clean jump and bumped hard. Soon re-balanced and was forced to race wide 3-deep the entire trip. No rally.
Fair break. Travelled 3-wide the whole race, found little coming home.
Slowly away. Near rear between runners, every chance after entered the straight, not quickened under drive.
Quick jump, soon pushed along but only managed to lay third behind the early leaders. Shaken behind the home bend but found no respond, beaten soon. First race after long break.
Raced keenly in a 3-wide position ahead of midfield, quickened well under top weight inside 300M, swept to the front nearing 100M and drew clear. Impressive.
Travelled strongly just behind leader, ideally placed to strike turning in, took over 250M, held every chance and only got picked off by the winner near 100M.
Guided to a rearward position 5Ls off the pace after a sluggish start, stayed on steadily final 300M to go 3rd near line.
Held up in midfield, loomed and looked threatening behind leaders 300M out, kept on but turned one paced final 100M, lost 3rd near the finish.
Dropped back on jumping from draw 14, settled near the rear 5-6Ls off the pace, no clear run to 200M, finished off well when shifted into clear. Encouraging first up.
Positioned along the inside behind midfield, kept on final 400M without getting to the leaders.
Never far off in the group chasing the pace, held up a bit early straight but responded only fairly when shifted out into clear.
Reserved at the back of the field, ran on only fairly turning for home, never factored.
Caught 4-wide in midfield, kept on at the same pace to 200M, weakened.
Held up towards the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, last turning in, not quickened when put to pressure.
Driven forward and crossed to the lead along the fence nearing 800M, headed 300M out, no extra and weakened rapidly over the final stages.
Up with the pace 3-wide but had little left turning in, shifted in under pressure 200M, weakened rapidly.
Well covered in midfield, similar position making the turn, didn't pick up in straight, eased final 100M.
Travelled keenly towards the rear, turned 3-wide making the home turn, found nothing when asked, soon behind.
Quick jump. Took up a position in midfield, came free 300m out, led at 250m and pushed out to win with something in reserve.
Jumped sideway and bumped. Settled in midfield on the 3-path with cover. Wide turn and chased home the easy winner with good respond.
Clean jump. Near rear, altered course at 300m, driven from 300m out, gained well under pressure for an easy third.
Good quick jump. Jockey decided to take up the rear position. Widest of all at the top of the straight. Laid in and hard contact at 350, re-balanced and came smartly inside the last 150m.
Poor jump with head in the air. Settled in rear. Hard drive in the straight, came well between horses inside the last 200m.
Fair break. In the rear. Hard contact at 350m, one pace late.
Good jump. Saved ground in fifth behind the speed. Shaken at 450m but found little. One pace at best late.
Hesitated from the barrier. Settled in rear as one of the backmarkers. Bumped hard and lost balance at the 350m mark, never recovered.
Bumped hard after the break. Recovered and chase early pace, taken back at 900m near rear. Hard contact at 350m, lacked late respond.
Good jump and good early speed. Led after the first 200m and had control of the pace. Shaken from 300m out, not quickened and beaten from 150m out.
Fair jump. Disputed lead on the 3-path without cover. Beaten after entered the straight at 350m.
Good jump, chased early pace 3-wide without cover until the 1000m marker. Weakened at the top of the straight, beaten 250m out.
Jumped well, in touch, weakened from a long way out, no factor.
Clean jump. Always rear, never closed.
Standard getaway, regathered to be in midfield 4Ls back, had an easy time in mid section, angled clear soon after turning, produced decent finish under hard riding for a strong win.
Faded back as usual, ended up 6ls back in running line, not helped by slow speed, improved wide turning, produced a strong burst making many lengths in straight, ducked in late and narrowly missed.
Showed speed to take up spot outside leader, had brief look for lead early, challenged again when speed went on at 500m, in mix to shadows of the post.
Plenty of early speed to take up running, set even sections early, had to wind up speed with pressure from 400m, kept fighting and just missed a place late.
Drifted back from outside alley, raced 2 and 3 wide at rear, 6Ls or so away at rear, always well back to bend, produced usual honest close to be nearest on line.
Went back from an awkward draw, raced 5-6Ls back on rails, kept improving turning, made steady progress to be closest at finish.
Positioned just off midfield 4-5Ls back, in running line throughout, made some minor progress without threatening.
Well enough away, planted 3 wide without cover 2Ls back, improved on circle and made an early challenge at 400m, spent force by 200m and faded.
Away nicely, took ideal spot 1 out 1 back, all favours in run, ridden along turning but left flat footed and just whacked away in straight.
Didn't have much early speed, raced 3 wide midfield or worse 5Ls away, had cover but niggled along turning, didn't show turn of foot in straight and just struggled to line.
Began well, ideally positioned on leaders back, always there and didn't work with steady sections, unsuited when they sprinted and gradually lost touch final 400m.
Standard jump, hunted up to hold leaders back, always travelled in mid section, in clear from 300m and showed good turn of foot to dash clear and score well.
Angled into spot behind pace, 4Ls or so away in midfield, no excuses in mid section, came home well once clear in straight but no match for winner late.
Posted 3 wide from a wide alley, 3Ls or so back working with speed on, kept giving despite workload and maintained effort in straight to take a creditable 3rd.
Settled in midfield 5ls or so away in 2 wide line, reasonable trip to bend, kept coming final 500m but didn't have extra final furlong to take a place.
Tardy into stride, raced 6ls or so back on rails, quiet time mid section, in traffic turning, closed evenly once clear making some late progress.
Settled 3 wide in midfield from wide draw, 5Ls or so away in mid section, worked a bit with decent pace on, made a bit of progress but peaked at 200m.
Away well, slotted into 1 out 1 back, fair run on back of decent speed, niggled turning, lacked usual fight and tired out of it final 250m.
Faded back from an outside alley, raced 3 wide at rear 7-8Ls back, helped by strong tempo, well back and widest on bend, passed a few tired ones late.
Ended up 3 wide behind midfield from a tricky alley, had cover 7Ls back to bend, came wide but unable to make real impact and just closed off at same speed.
Snagged back from a wide alley, further behind than usual sharing rear 7-8Ls away, still well back to bend, made only minor progress from difficult spot.
Raced in rear division, 7Ls or so away in running line, paced helped but still job to do turning, swung wide but didn't have usual finish and just battled.
Checked early before settling in midfield 4-5Ls back on rails, used little in run, produced nothing in straight.
Showed plenty of sped to take up running, ran along at strong tempo, led to 250m before stopping quickly, faded right out.
Showed pace to be up close to speed, used a bit with pace on 1L off lead, niggled soon after turning and gave in rapidly.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began well, soon taken back to race on rails behind midfield, shifted out for a run turning for home, obtained a clear passage 300 M out, responded well to take charge over 70 M out.
Began well from the middle draw, niggled along to gradually take up running, attempted to make rest of running but overhauled 100 M out.
Began with others, soon restrained to race in midfield, wide turning in, quickened under pressure to challenge upon straightening but unable to sustain effort inside final 100 M.
Niggled along but slow to muster early stages, gradually picked up to midfield on home bend, briefly baulked after straightening, fought on nicely to the line.
Soon taken back to race in rear, trailed the field to straight, saved ground turning in, baulked early on, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Slow to muster, settled at the back, remained well behind into straight when widest, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly from a poor draw, gradually taken back to settle wide in forward of midfield, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Began from the widest draw, soon taken back to race wide behind midfield, baulked for a run early in straight, kept on steadily without threatening.
Niggled at in first few early stages gradually settling 3-wide in 5th about 2Ls off the lead, held some chance after straightening, but could only keep on before giving ground inside final 200 M.
From a poor draw, began with others, gradually taken back to race wide without cover in rear of midfield, similar rounding home bend and into straight, soon faded after straightening.
Broke well, settled mainly in 4th within 2Ls of pace, obtained a clear passage on rails after straightening, kept on before finding no extra inside final 100 M.
Began fairly settling in midfield on rails, tired noticeably shortly after straightening.
Began well, settled wide outside leader, kept on until folded up quickly 250 M out.
Began slightly awkwardly, soon picked up a prominent position along rails, weakened out of contention soon after home turn.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race camping in 4th position the fence. Swept to the lead approaching the 100m and held on gamely.
Parked in last position from a wide ally, 1 off with cover. Swung widest on the home and let down convincingly.
Settled in about a midfield position, 2 wide with cover. Cornered 5 deep and finished off well.
Took a sit along the paint and parked in 2nd position. Tracked the leader until hitting the front near the 250m, was overhauled late.
Settled at the rear of the field on the rails. Endeavoured to come to the outside of runners in the home straight but was unable to do so, ran on nicely through the field.
Travelled with the backmakers, 1 off with cover. Closed off soundly towards the outside.
Settled midfield, along the paint. Stayed to the inside in the run home, kept on one paced in the run to the wire.
Raced behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Worked home satisfactorily.
Travelled in a handy position, settling 5th, 1 off with cover. Commenced to tire inside the final 200m.
Settled in 3rd position, 2 wide with cover. Had every chance but failed to capitalize and was well beaten early in the straight.
Raced worse than midfield the fence. Only plodded to the line.
Travelled 3 wide without cover on the circle behind midfield. Carted wider on from the 600m and was never likely.
Caught wide early then was able to shift into 3 deep with cover near the 800m, travelling near the tail of the field. Failed to close off.
Sent forward and led at a good clip opening a 4L lead. Steadied the ship midrace but was a spent force at the furlong.
Jumped well, gradually eased to rear on fence. Got one spot closer home turn. Swung out and was afforded clear run soon after straightening. Dashed strongly and asserted authority closing stages.
Good jump, elected to sit 2-wide behind midfield to home turn. Finished off well but couldn't repel winner final 100M.
Settled midfield on fence to home turn. Found clear run 350M. Ran on well but no real thereat to front pair.
Began awkwardly and raced 2-wide towards rear. Travelled 3-wide home turn. Kept on steadily home straight to make frame near finish. (Lame Right Front.)
2-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Hard ridden passing 400M but was one-paced to conclude.
Sat behind leader on fence to home straight. Plugged on when asked and weakened closing stages.
Awkward start and raced towards rear. Dropped to last home turn. Made up good ground wide steadily home straight.
Led on fence until swamped final 100M.
Good jump, ridden for early pace. Unable to get near lead and had to take back to rear. Shaken up 300m out, continued to gain under drive, led 100m out, won going away.
Sluggish jump, broke sideways and bumped hard. Settled in rear until strong 7-wide move entering straight. Gained well but no match for winner.
Quickly away. Taken back to rear group until the top of the straight. Kept on evenly for close third.
Clean jump. Midfield. Came free between horses near 200m marker, finished well between runners, just missed third.
Swiftly away from the barrier. Hard ridden for early lead and used up energy 3-deep until the 800m marker. Shaken up from top of straight, kept fighting, stayed on.
Clean jump. Near rear along the rail. Kept on one pace.
Good jump. Ridden for early speed and led after 200m. All out coming home, stayed on one pace.
A touch slow from gate. Soon collected himself and in touch with leaders after 300m. Every chance straight, stayed on one pace under drive.
Broke in the air and bumped hard after jump. Taken back to rear and remained last until entering the straight. Managed to pass several tiring rivals last 200m.
Quickly away. Sat just behind pace with cover 3-deep until losing cover at the 800m mark. One pace under drive and had to take up at 100m mark to avoid clipping heels.
Jumped well. Sat quietly in fifth along the rail. Never got free in the straight behind the tiring leaders.
Slowly away and ridden at once for early speed but unable to get near lead. Settled near rear and swung 6-wide into straight, finished weakly under drive.
Fair jump. Taken back to rear and last rail. Blocked solidly in the straight and never a chance to show his best.
Broke right and made contact. Travelled easily in midfield along the fence. Found nil under drive, beaten from 200m out.
Fair break, squeezed between runners after the jump. Pushed along to keep up the whole trip and settled eighth until straight, gained steadily from 350m out and never looked back from 100m out.
Well away. Settled calmly in rear. Widest of all 7-deep top of the straight, gained strongly last 100m, just missed catching the winner who had first run.
Quickly away from wide draw, settled rear group. Came 6-wide at the top of the straight, ran on well but no match to the first two.
Clean break from wide draw. In touch with the fast early pace but left racing without cover 3-deep throughout. Kept on well.
Good quick jump, settled rear rail. Finished strongly, unable to challenge.
Quick jump and ridden hard for early speed, took clear lead from 900m out, kept on straight until no extra last 100m.
Sluggish break and leaned left. Trailed throughout in last place, strong gain inside the last 150m, line came too soon.
Good jump. Chased hot early pace and stayed in touch in third. Kept on one pace until finished weakly.
Fair break. In the rear. One pace when asked.
Broke in air. Recovered at once and managed to stay close in fifth after 200m. One pace in the straight.
Fast away but unable stay with hot early pace and soon back to the rear group. Ran on between horses without being able to threaten.
Jumped well and ridden for speed. Settled just behind leaders fourth on rail. Every chance to win at top of the straight, found little when the question was popped.
Hit gate but recovered at once to dispute lead. Used energy to chase early leader until 600m mark. Nothing left from 300m out.
Good jump. Saved ground midfield rail. Driven from 400m and found nil.
Hard ridden forward for the box seat, 3.5Ls off the fast pace on the rails, kicked away 300M to win without threats.
Pushed early to cross, then eased to sit 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, ran on well to the line for 2nd.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M for 3rd.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader, suited by the fast tempo but trapped 4-5 wide throughout, made steady ground 400M, run ended 100M.
Eased to rear, 9.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, blocked 400M, made good ground when clear.
Settled in midfield, 6Ls off the leader on the fence, suited by the fast pace, briefly held up 400M, ran on fairly when clear.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, ran on ok in straight.
Behind midfield along the fence, 7.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast pace, lack room 400M, ran on fairly when clear.
Pushed early, 6Ls off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, checked 600M, no progress.
At back, 8Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, ran on ok.
Eased back, 8Ls off the leader, suited by the fast pace but trapped 4-5 wide throughout, no progress.
Hard ridden forward, 3.5Ls off the fast pace 2 wide, weakened 300M.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 3.5Ls at fast sectionals, dropped off quickly 400M.
In front of midfield 3 wide, stumble badly 600M and eased out of race.
Broke well, travelled comfortably in fourth on rail, blocked for run early straight, pulled out for gap, surged through to lead 100m out.
Broke well, joined leaders then restrained to third one off, led mid-straight, no answer to winner's burst.
Broke well, settled fifth one off, mid-track bid,, narrow lead mid-straight, weakened slightly after winner swept past.
Good break, taken back to second last, wide bid straight, ran on steadily.
Sluggish start, tailed off after 200m, made ground but still last into straight, wide bid, ran on well.
Broke well, settled fourth last one off, wide bid, kept on.
Fair break, strode up to lead but unable to cross, headed early straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, settled rail mid-rear, shaken up straight, not pace to challenge.
Broke well, ridden to lead, headed but kept leader from crossing, led briefly early straight, weakened.
Fair break, midfield three wide, ridden, fleeting response, weakened.
Settled nicely behind leaders, taken out to challenge nearing 400M, responded well under hands and heels riding, led 100M out and clear, won by 1.75L unextended.
Handily placed just behind leaders and travelled smoothly throughout, took up inside 300M, ran on gamely only lost lead nearing 100M.
Reserved towards the rear, pushed along 600M out, ran on steadily final 400M to go 3rd just before the line.
Dropped back from draw 1 and settled towards the rear, picked up well passing 250M, did best work late and just missed out on 3rd.
Moved up to join leaders passing 800M, all out and had every chance final 300M, faded inside 100M and lost 3rd close home.
Not hurried in the first half of the race, held up in 2nd last just over 3Ls off the pace, made steady progress final 300M but never any chance with winner.
Outpaced early stages, took closer order passing 700M, stayed on same pace when driven final 400M.
Soon bustled along to chase leaders, hung in and proved difficult to ride, kept on same pace and made no impression.
Went forward and vied for the lead, driven 400M out but only one-paced, gave ground final 200M. (Jockey said his horse's condition gave out over the late stages due to the fast early sectionals.)
Broke well and was soon in front sharing the lead, driven and limited response inside 350M, weakened final 200M.
Slow to begin, near the rear throughout, no impression over final 400M, never dangerous.
Along the stand's rail never far off leaders, found little under pressure passing halfway, soon beaten.
Ridden from gate to lead, settled in front, kicked early straight, kept on strongly.
Broke well, settled fourth rail, ridden to challenge late, kept on but winner had first run.
Broke well and ridden out wide to take second one off, kept on straight until no extra late.
Fair break, fifth last two off, wide bid, kept on well.
Good break, ridden early, settled midfield two off, improved wide entering straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not rushed, back to third last rail, kept on straight but no kick.
Fair break, outpaced early, second last one off, urged into straight, kept on well late.
Fair break, settled midfield rail, driven, kept on one pace.
Broke well, third one off, wide bid, limited response, short of room when already beaten.
Broke well, third two off, ridden early straight, faded.
Good break, fifth one off, midfield bid, no progress.
Sluggish start, up to mid-rear, wide bid, found little.
Fair break, midfield rail, wide bid, found nil.
Taken back from wide draw, rear rail, ridden early straight, no progress.
Out with first few, took trail on leaders back, all favours to bend with no speed on, dashed clear final 300m to go on and score comfortably.
Went forward, posted 3 wide outside leaders, did some work but helped when speed steadied, loomed at 300m but couldn't match dash of winner, stayed on ok.
Faded back from a wide alley, unsuited when tempo slowed, 6Ls back upon settling, gradually worked into clear at 250m and made solid progress late.
Standard jump, ended up in midfield 4Ls or so back, fair run in midfield to turn but pace against, made steady ground when clear.
Even getaway, positioned just behind speed 3 wide with cover, helped by lack of pace, battled away at same speed in straight.
Pressed on to race outside leader, had a fair time with steady tempo, took lead briefly passing 400m, couldn't match finish of others and tired last bit.
Drifted back to rear from a wide gate, 6Ls back on rails, pace against in mid section, worked home evenly in straight with conditions not to suit.
Slow to jump, settled 5Ls away on rails, not helped by pace to bend, just worked home steadily without threatening.
Got back a touch after average jump, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield 4-5Ls back, overaced and checked with slow speed, made gradual ground but never likely in finish.
Faded back to race 3 wide at rear, 6Ls or so away with speed not to suit, came to outside and made some headway late with racing factors against.
Out in line, settled close up in 1 out 1 back spot, no excuses in run, gave in easily and dropped off in stretch.
Posted 4 wide without cover from a tricky alley, steady pace helped but still worked to bend, dropped out after hard run.
Began in line, settled 3Ls or so away on rails, overaced in mid section, didn't find in straight and just plodded.
Took up running, steadied tempo on bend, didn't respond when headed and faded out quickly.

Made all, kicked about 4Ls clear after straightening, won eased down.
Travelled within 3Ls of speed most of way in joint 4th, kept on steadily in straight without quickening.
Slowly away, settled in last few in 10th, finished off well down centre of straight, did best work late.
Travelled just worse than midfield racing keenly at times, came under pressure around home bend, fought on steadily.
Settled behind midfield, fought on steadily.
Began with others, settled just better than midfield in 6th on rails, came under pressure after straightening but failed to quicken to threaten.
Travelled in 2nd within 2Ls of pace most of way without cover, unable to sustain run inside final 200 M.
Slow to muster, gradually recovered to rear of midfield position in 8th, saved ground turning in, kept on steadily without quickening.
Soon dropped to last, remained well back until home bend, saved ground on rails turning for home, kept on same pace without quickening.
Chased leader in 3rd on rails, soon faded under pressure after straightening.
Raced very wide in joint 4th most of way to straight, tired noticeably on home turn.
Began fairly from the widest gate, soon taken back to race in rear, made no progress in straight.
Took some time to eventually cross to the fence and settle as outright leader near the 900m. Opened up a break after the 600m & maintained a good gallop to the wire.
Parked midfield the fence with cover. Closed off strongly through the field in the home straight.
Settled 3 back, 1 off with cover. Cornered five deep & ran on soundly.
Camped midfield, 2 deep with cover. Swung the home turn 6 wide and ran to the line well.
Coursed 3 wide & without cover before taking up a 1 off position near the 800m, outside the leader. Faded inside the final 100m.
Travelled behind midfield along the rails. Was one paced over the concluding stages.
Settled in last position with cover. Turned widest into the final stretch and worked home evenly without threatening.
Positioned 3 back the paint. Couldn't sprint after the 500m and only plodded to the line.
Travelled behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Failed to close off.
Raced with the backmakers, 2 deep with cover. Struggled in the run home.
Led early along the rail before taking a sit after the 1000m. Slapped along passing the 800m, but failed to show much interest and was well beaten inside the final furlong.
Raced prominently early before being crossed and travelling 1 out 1 back after the 900m. Was a spent force passing the 250m.
Pushed early to race in leading section. Hung on well home straight to repel rivals.
Switched to rear after start. Improved along the fence to reach midfield turning in. Saw daylight and dashed strongly after 200M but was fended off by the winner.
Taken in rear from high draw. Took inside run rounding home turn. Found clear run on rail and finished off satisfactorily final 100M to snatch 2nd at post.
Slow to begin and was then crowded for room. Pressed to resume a forward spot on fence from 800M. Held a 1L advantage into final stretch. Clung on until overhauled closing stages.
Ahead of midfield on fence to home straight. Kept on but lacked the finishing touch of the principals.
Urged to race ahead of midfield in a 3-wide position to home straight. Plugged on to the line.
Niggled to stay 2-wide at midfield early. Same position turning into home. Made up some late ground.
Shaken up early but insufficient speed to cross from wide barrier. Ended up wide and without cover to home straight. Ran on steadily to finish.
Towards rear to home straight and covered minor ground thereafter.
Driven along wide after start and reached the lead approaching home turn. Faded soon after straightening.
3-wide behind midfield early and dropped to rear on straightening. No improvement thereafter.
Hard ridden early but couldn't keep up with the leading section. Dropped off gradually from home turn and was well beaten top of home straight.
Smoothly away and ridden hard for position. Dropped in behind leader at the 800m marker until straight. Sprinted clear from 150m out for convincing win.
Off quickly. Settled between runners near rear. Allowed to swing wide at top of the straight, responded to drive and finished smartly for second.
Good jump. Took up a 4-back inside position and ridden patiently until shaken up from 250m out. Ran on well.
Jumped well. Midfield between horses, shaken up from 450m out, kept fighting all the way to the line.
Fastest away. Took the lead within strides and led by 3 lengths before the first turn. Led without pressure until the top of the straight, driven, weakened.
Fair jump. Lacked early speed and settled rear. Ridden from a long way out, kept on evenly late.
Quick jump. Soon in striking position behind the early leaders. Not quicken when asked.
Swiftly away. Fourth rail until reaching straight, found little when asked.
Broke sideways and caught 3-deep without cover for most of the race, weakened before the 400m marker. No threat.
Hopped in air and trailed at once. Always in the rear group. Never a factor.
Hit gate and broke sideways. Trailed at once and unable to keep up, beaten from a long way out.
Fair jump. Left chasing without cover 4-deep until the 500m, still three deep home bend, kept on one pace under drive, beaten from 200m out.
Broke smartly, third one off then settled fourth, inside bid, through gap to lead 200m out, soon clear, kept on well.
Taken back from wide, settled rear rail, inside bid following winner through, never able to challenge.
Broke well, ridden to lead then settled second, third into straight, mid-track run, kept on well.
Fair break, bustled early, mid-rear one off, wide bid, finished well.
Fair break, not hurried early, check first turn, settled midfield rail, urged turn, kept on well when gap came.
Fair break, caught midfield three wide, went forward far side to share lead one off, kept on until weakened late.
Taken back to third last rail, looking for room early straight, had to go wide for run, kept on.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, inside bid, not quicken.
Fair break, midfield one off, wide bid, no kick.
Fair break, up to join leaders four wide, sent wider by bump first bend, fourth one off, mid-track bid, no extra.
Broke well, led and crossed, steadied in front and joined far side, headed early straight, weakened.
Fair break, mid-rear four wide first turn, wide bid straight, found nil.
Pushed early, 3Ls off the good pace along the fence, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Hard ridden forward but failed to cross, trapped 3 wide throughout just behind the leaders, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Pushed to take the rail and share the lead at good pace, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Settled in box seat, pace good, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, ran on well to the line.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace 2 -3 wide, made some ground 200M.
Very slow away, took rail in midfield, 5.5Ls off the good pace, just held ground in straight.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls behind the good pace 2 wide, soon flattened in straight.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead 2 wide at good pace, soon weakened 250M.
Behind midfield, 6Ls off the good pace along the fence, no turn of foot.
Very slow away, at rear, 9Ls off the good pace on the rails, no dash.
Eased at start, 7Ls off the good pace 2 wide, no progress.
Fair break, midfield rail, short of room early straight, wove between horses to find split, led 50m out, ran on well.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, looking for room home turn, pulled out, ran on strongly.
Broke well, led briefly, then settled third rail, found gap to lead narrowly mid-straight, no extra late.
Fair break, rear group four wide first turn, improved far side to fourth still wide, led briefly mid-straight, kept on until no extra late.
Missed break losing length, third last rail, short of room mid-straight, pulled out and stayed on.
Fair break, not rushed, midfield rail, wide bid, joined leaders 150m out, no extra late.
Fair break, ridden to fourth one off, driven to stay close till final 200m, weakened.
Fair break, fourth last one off, tongue lolling as usual, driven straight, picked up briefly but no kick.
Fair break, aimed for lead but headed, settled second one off, challenged leader early straight, no extra, weakened.
Fair break, sixth one off, ridden turn, wide bid, weakened.
Broke well, shared early lead rail, headed early straight, weakened.
Moderate break, shaken up early, fly-jumping and running erratically past post first time, ridden turn, found nil, eased late.
Shared lead on the outside, shook off pursuers 150m, kept on strongly to the line.
Well covered in midfield one off the fence, into clear once turning in, finished well but couldn't quite get to the winner.
Settled nicely behind leaders, had every chance turning in but not getting to the winner, was struck on the back leg and lost balance over the late stages.
Slowly away, settled at the rear 5-6Ls off the pace, taken wide to commence his run near 400M, finished fastest of all down the outside and narrowly missed out on 2nd place.
Held up behind midfield, saved ground on the inside, ran on steadily in straight and just missed a place.
Checked shortly after the start, shuffled back to a rearward position, ran on steadily final 200M.
Began awkwardly, soon shuffled back to the rear 5Ls off the pace, stayed on final 300M but was tightened for room closing stages.
Broke well and vied for the lead along the inside, weakened inside 100M, and was swamped late.
Driven forward from wide barrier, chased leaders 3-wide and no cover from 800M, not quickened turning in.
Broke well, tracked leaders in 3rd, pushed along nearing 400M but never going the pace to challenge.
Held up towards the rear and was 3-wide for most of the trip, not quickened when asked inside 300M.
Caught 3-wide in midfield from draw 12, found nothing under urge near 300M, soon behind.
