Soon taken back to race wide in worse than midfield, came under pressure to challenge upon straightening, gained upper hand inside final 100 M.
Began with others, settled not far off about 2Ls behind leader and mainly in 5th, fought on gamely to reach 2nd final strides.
Settled in rear, shifted out for a run on home turn, ran on under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Settled in forward of midfield on rails, ran on to hold some chance passing 200 M but unable to sustain effort nearing home.
Settled well back, came under pressure upon straightening, ran on to do best work late.
Began with others from a wide draw, settled wide in forward of midfield, ran on under pressure to hold every chance early in straight, unable to sustain effort inside final 200 M.
Settled in midfield, ran home one-paced.
Never better than midfield, saved ground on rails turning in, shifted off rails for a run turning in but could only keep on at the same pace.
In last few early stages, effort out wide around the bend, widest runner turning in, kept on fairly in the run home.
Raced wide without cover in prominent position, improved approaching home turn to lead field into straight, soon weakened.
Settled in last few, briefly baulked early in straight, one-paced in the run home.
Disputed lead or led far side, settled just off the speed on rails, baulked for a run until 300 M when shuffled backward, weakened.
Began from a wide gate, raced very wide in a prominent position, joined leader briefly over 1000 M out, settled one off the speed around the bend, dropped out tamely upon straightening.
Gradually took up running, crossed for rails run over 800 M out, led until joined into straight, folded up quickly.
Sent forward and led at steady fractions along the rails. Kicked clear approaching the furlong and hung on to prevail by a short margin.
Camped 3 back the fence. Peeled out after the 600m and rallied strongly to come up just short.
Settled behind midfield, 2 deep with cover. Raced tight rounding the home turn, closed off well after obtaining clear running early in the straight.
Travelled prominently but was posted 3 wide without cover. Gave ground late.
Travelled midfield, copped a squeeze near the 800m, settling 3 wide with cover. Straightened up about 8 deep and got to the line soundly.
Slow to begin settling at the tail of the field. Peeled widest in the run home and closed off nicely despite being inclined to hang out.
Travelled behind the speed, 1 off with cover. Stayed towards the inside after turning for home, kept on one paced over the final stages.
Crowded at the start settling towards the rear along the fence. Made up good ground in the final stretch.
Parked in 2nd position outside the leader. Gave little when asked for an effort in the straight and weakened in the run to the post.
Got in to race 3 deep with cover after the 800m, in a midfield position. Faded over the last 200m.
Caught 4 wide & without cover on the circle, worse than midfield. . Had a tough run and was never likely.
Began very awkwardly with its head up and lost ground settling back in the field. Struggled over the final furlong.
Raced at the rear, 2 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race stalking the leader along the paint. Was a beaten horse turning for home.
Prominent spot throughout. Ran on strongly inside 350M. Powered clear final stages.
Raced with leaders early. Challenged the winner 350M but was soon knocked out. Kept on well to snatch 2nd near the post.
Behind leaders early. Hard ridden 400M. Had every chance but lacked the finishing touch of the winner. Lost 2nd close home.
Behind midfield on stands' rail to midpoint. Shifted in for clear run 400M. Picked up steadily and nearly got 3rd.
Slow to begin. Driven up to tack on the back of the field. Under pressure from 350M and was nearest at finish.
At rear early. Improved to midfield midpoint. Plugged on home.
At midfield throughout. Held ground to the line.
Soon in a forward spot. Failed to kick when the race got serious passing 400M.
Began awkwardly and raced at rear. Pressed from midpoint and made up some late ground.
Behind midfield always. Never looked dangerous.
In forward division on stands' side until weakened 300M from home.
With leaders on stands' rail until faded 300M.
Towards rear always. Failed to accelerate with the rest of the field passing midpoint.
At midfield until dropped out inside 300M. (Bled from both nostrils.)
Fair jump, settled easy along the fence near rear, swung wide top of straight, came strongly under drive, ran away from the field 100m out.
Fair jump, immediately taking up an inside position in rear, widest of all home bend, gained well under drive, took second on line.
Hard ridden after jump, took lead easily on rail after 100m, pressed hard all the way, stayed on evenly and lost second last stride.
Broke in air and right, ,mmediately hard ridden to 600md, fought hard and kept on strongly.
Good jump, ridden for early speed, sixth throughout, kept on evenly to the line.
Clean jump, sat fifth along the fence, one pace at best.
Fair jump, bumped, recovered immediately to sit behind early leaders rail, every chance straight, all out, one pace.
Clean jump, allowed to find stride and settled rear, near rear between runners, no threat when asked.
Poor jump and trailed at once, widest of all top of straight, weak finish.
Good jump, hard ridden to dispute lead, wide without cover 3-deep until the 800m marker, let go 350m out, found no more at the 200m pole.
Off slowly, raced without cover 3-wide midfield, 4-deep turn, found no more before home straight.
Swift jump, soon ridden hard along rail but lost ground, looked most uncomfortable racing on all-weather, inside bid, found nil.
Fast away, easy lead after 100m, had total control in the first three quarters, quickened away smartly top of straight, never looked back.
Fast away, in touch in fifth, gained strongly last 100m, just missed in an extremely quick last quarter.
Fair jump, soon shared lead with eventual winner, challenged early straight, stayed on smartly but tired last 100m and lost two places near line.
Clean break, held up rear, widest of all 8-deep top of straight, gained powerfully and just fell short in very fast last 400m.
Fast away, not quick enough and stayed near rear, free 250m out, strong finish under drive.
Fair jump, taken to midfield at once, never got free in straight for all out drive, kept on well.
Broke poorly to left, recovered and travelled 3-deep with cover midfield, kept on well, outsprinted.
Clean break, one pace.
Broke sideways and head in air, soon recovered to fourth rail, taken up at 600m to avoid clipping heels, one pace at best, weakened badly last 100m.
Good jump, ridden at once and settled midfield rail, found nothing coming home.
Poor jump, squeezed, checked hard and trailed in rear, no threat in a very fast last quarter.
Good jump, ridden to dispute lead, prominent in slow fractions, inside bid, hard drive, found little.
Slowly away and trailed in last at once, beaten from a long way out.
Fair jump, wide turn top of straight, kept on until 200m when hampered, never recovered.
Eased to rear and took rail, 9Ls off the leader, lack room 400M, dashed strongly when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Settled in front of midfield, 4Ls off the leader on the rails, dashed well 300M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, off the bridle 500M, dashed well 300M.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on strongly until 150M overhauled.
Hard ridden forward, box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, just held ground in straight.
Midfield on the fence, 6Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well, never had clear running 200M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, lack room 400M, dashed strongly when clear.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 100M.
Pushed early but not muster, 9Ls off the leader 2 wide at rear, harmed by the slow pace, blocked most straight, little dash when clear.
Behind midfield, 7Ls off the leader, trapped 4 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed fairly.
Very slow away, 7.5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, only little dash 250M.
Eased early, but soon moved forward to cross, 1L off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, however soon emptied 300M.
In front of midfield, 4Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, soon weakened 350M.
Away well, third one off, urged along entering straight, responded well to lead 150m out, just held on.
Missed beat start, settled midfield rail, followed winner through, finished powerfully, needed one more stride.
Fast away, settled fourth rail, found seam for inside bid, driven, slightly outpaced by first two.
Fair break, third last one off, mid-track bid, stayed on late.
Broke well, up wide to lead and cross, three lengths clear turn, weakened.
Fair break, fifth one off, ridden mid-straight, one pace.
Ridden early but headed, settled second rail, still second mid-straight, weakened.
Moderate start, second last rail, ridden for mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair start, slight check after 50m, four length last, closed up approaching straight, ridden, no further progress.
Settled nicely in midfield before making headway to challenge leaders passing 350M, powered clear final 150M to win with possibly something in hand.
Behind midfield 4Ls off the pace, finished well final 400M despite hanging in but was no match for the classy-looking winner.
Steadied at the start and ended up a bit too far back at the rear, ran on very well from off the pace.
Urged along after the start to settle in the group chasing the leaders, quickened well in straight and came to have every chance, turned one pace final 100M and lost 2nd place close home.
Along the fence behind midfield, under urdge halfway round the turn, brief effort turning in, flattened out nearing 100M.
Slow to begin and failed to muster under urge, 3-wide at the back for most of the trip, made limited progress in straight and never got to leaders.
Vied for the lead early before dropping back behind leaders entering home turn, kept on one paced to the line.
Chased the pace, kept on to mid-straight and couldn't sustain his effort thereafter, eased 100M out. (Blood in trachea.)
Dropped back to a rearward position about 5Ls off the pace, attempted to make his run up the inside but was badly held up by a beaten runner, out of contention already when clear inside 150M.
Vied for the lead in early stages, set a good gallop and emerged as race leader rounding the turn, headed inside 250M and no extra. Eased.
Went forward to contest the lead, caught 3-wide no cover turning, weakened rapidly inside 350M.
Broke well, taken back to midfield rail, wide bid, finished strongly to lead near line.
Broke well, second one off, kept on strongly to lead 80m out, just caught.
Missed beat start, taken back to second last one off, still plenty to find mid-straight, finished strongly.
Quick jump, led and crossed, dictated pace, driven mid-straight, no extra.
Fair break, ridden to fifth one off, shaken up early straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, up along rail to third, gap came straight but not pace to take it, kept on, no kick.
Moderate break, ridden early but unable to lead, second rank three wide, driven, not pace to challenge.
Fair break, outpaced early, last after 200m and into straight, wide bid, kept on but never near to challenge.
Broke well, outpaced early, third last rail, inside bid, modest progress.
Fair break, sixth one off, ridden early straight, no real progress.
Broke well, not much early speed, taken back to fourth last one off, wide bid, found little.
Fair break, ridden to midfield rail, found nil under pressure.
Drifted back from a wide gate, settled 8ls back 2 wide, travelled up on bend but had job to do turning, let down with a big sprint final 250m to defeat rivals easily.
Went forward and slotted in 2 wide just off speed, raced 3 wide on circle, gradually joined in and hit lead at 200m, found winner too strong final furlong.
Out in line, came across to race 3 wide just off midfield 4Ls or so back, loomed as a strong threat inside 300m but couldn't go with winner, chased gamely.
Settled just off midfield 4-5Ls back in 2 wide line, even run in mid section, came wider turning and closed well to make frame.
Began fairly, went forward but posted 3 wide without cover, used too much to bend, fought on well given hard run.
Moderate Jump, 5Ls or so away on rails, easy trip to bend, in traffic in straight and made decent progress despite this to be nearest on line.
No early pace, settled back with last few 7Ls or more from lead, improved approaching bend, made some progress without clearest passage final 200m.
Standard break, raced 3-4Ls back on rails, no excuses to bend, just ran on at same speed in straight not looking likely.
Fastest into stride, took up running, set an even tempo in front with pressure from outside horse, shaded on bend, fought on well to 150m but couldn't sustain effort and faded late.
Out well enough, ended up behind leaders on rails, had trip to suit, came 2 wide on circle, in traffic turning, just stayed on fairly despite not getting the clearest running to 200m.
Settled behind midfield 6Ls or more from leaders, assisted by even speed, plenty to do turning, made no serious progress.
Showed early speed and part of pace trio, right there 1 out 1 back to bend, didn't offer a finish and weekend final 200m.
Missed start by 8Ls or more, a clear last, eventually tacked on but had to work, stayed with tail enders creditably given circumstances.
Began with purpose, up pressing for lead soon after start, shaded inside horse applying pressure to bend, niggled turning and soon weakened.

Began with others, settled one-back on rails in 2nd, hit the front over 200 M out, won readily.

Began with others, settled in forward of midfield, made swift progress on outside passing 800 M to be close-up 3rd 3-wide around the bend, kept on steadily under pressure without quickening in straight.

Settled in midfield, commenced move on outside passing the Rock, closed to within 3Ls of speed around the bend, fanned out wide turning for home, fought on under pressure despite shifting ground slightly closing stages.
Began from the one draw, settled on rails in forward of midfield of strung-out field, commenced move rounding home bend, ran on steadily while tight between runners, nearest at finish.
Began with others, soon settled behind midfield in 8th, made steady headway on outside around the bend, fought on steadily down centre of straight to do best work late.
Soon taken back from a poor draw to race in last few, jostled on inside upon straightening, finished off race nicely.
Slowly away losing about 3Ls, remained well behind until effort home bend, ran home steadily to be nearest at finish.
Settled in remote 3rd far side, closer up climbing the Rock before making swift progress alongside eventual runner-up, disputed lead turning in, faded under pressure passing 200 M.
Broke well, soon taken back to settle in remote 4th on rails, shuffled further back to midfield rounding home bend, found nothing under pressure.

Planted at start losing considerable ground, trailed the field to 400 M, saved a lot of ground on inside turning in recovering to within 3Ls of leader, baulked for a run inside 200 M, no further impression.

Ridden along from a poor draw to take up running coming out of home straight, held over 2Ls advantage despite the steady pace far side, joined turning in, soon folded up. (Questioned for performance.)
Never better than midfield, wide into straight, tailed off under pressure.
Parked in midfield, 2 wide with cover. Rallied 4 deep on the home turn and swept to the front near the furlong and hit the line strongly.
Landed in 2nd last position, 1 off with cover. Came with a strong run down the outside of the field.
Camped 1 out 1 back. Stayed on reasonably well after having every chance.
Speared forward from an outside alley and took up leading duties on the rails. Kicked a length clear near the 350m, faded over the final stages.
Taken back from a wide gate to settle with the backmakers along the fence. Was taken out into a 3 wide position with cover after the 1100m. Swung widest on the home turn, made some ground late.
Settled 3 back the fence with cover. Battled away in the run home staying on one paced.
Settled near the rear of the field after being severely checked near the 1300m. Got pulling near the 1000m, travelling 3 wide without cover. Never likely.
Hampered at the start then ridden along, copping a check near the 1300m, settling behind midfield the paint. Never let down at the business end.
Rated behind midfield 1 off with cover. Came under heavy pressure passing the 500m, but failed to keep in touch and only plodded to the line.
Cruised across to race outside the leader in 2nd position. Found nothing when asked for an effort turning for home.
Slow to begin then was crowded soon after the start, settling last along the fence. Failed to close off weakening noticeably inside the final furlong. (see incident report)
Enjoyed the run of the race tracking the leader. Was a beaten horse early in the straight & struggled thereafter.
Trapped 3-wide with leaders early. Slotted 2-wide ahead of midfield from 1200M. Swung out and dashed strongly on straightening. Asserted authority final 100M.
2-wide behind midfield to home straight. Finished off well wide to snatch 2nd near the post without threatening the winner.
Shaken up to obtain a forward spot in a 2-wide position early. Took lead near the fence from 1000M. Overhauled by the winner final 150M. Hung on for 2nd until final strides.
Caught wide and without cover at midfield early. Strode forward and parked 2-wide behind leader back straight. Plugged on home straight.
Taken to 2-wide at rear from high draw after start. Came widest for clear run rounding home turn. Covered ground steadily final stretch.
Hard ridden to race in leading section early. Settled behind leader on fence from 1200M. Couldn't turn up a notch home straight.
Driven early to hold the fence at midfield. Dropped to behind midfield back straight. Closed off the race fairly.
Always at rear. Never looked dangerous.
Towards rear and was left wide and without cover for the major part of the race. No impression.
Bump start, prominently placed just off the speed, quickened 300 M out and soon took the lead, drew clear easily.
Crowded start, urged along to catch up 3Ls off pace rail, ran on soundly final 250 M for 2nd.
Taken behind runners from high draw, finished off soundly final 250 M for a place.
Urged along to take box-seat, crowded 400 M out, blocked 300m out, kept on fairly well, just missed place.
Settled 4Ls off the pace, on heels 600 M out, check at home turn, finished off satisfactorily final 200 M.
Settled nicely just behind speed rail, check 400 M out, one-pace straight.
Pushed up to lead 1L on rails, headed 250 M out, soon flattened.
Awkward start and crowded, pushed up early, caught wide with no cover midfield, failed to make ground.
Slow away, lacked early speed and lost touch halfway, made some late ground.
Bump, start, bump 600 M and 400 M out, held ground until weakened 200 M out.
Pushed up early, failed to get in and caught 3-wide, held ground, weakened 150m out.
Settled one-off just behind speed, pulled early, checked 600 M and 400 M out, never recovered.
Taken back from high draw, kicked strongly top of straight, took lead 50 M out.
Bump start, pushed out to share lead on 2-deep, quickened 300 M out, caught by winner 50 M out.
Taken back from high draw, finished off soundly final 250 M for 3rd.
Settled one-off midfield, ran on steadily final 250 M, just missed a place.
Settled nicely rail midfield, made up gradual ground final 300 M out, no extra 50 M out.
Urged along to take one-off spot just behind speed, one-pace straight.
Taken back from gate 12, check 150 M out, made up some late ground final 100 M.
Caught wide midfield throughout, held ground, no extra final 200 M.
Settled cozily box-seat, held ground, no extra final 100 M.
Check after start, lacked early speed, sat behind the mid-division, on heels 350 M out, soon weakened.
Bump start, handy but caught 3-wide no cover, struggled home turn, soon weakened.
Pushed up to share lead rail, passed at home turn, weakened sharply 200 M out.
Pushed to take rail and share the lead at good pace, drifted away 250M to score.
Eased to sit in midfield, checked early, 4Ls off the good pace on the fence, progressed steadily 250M for 2nd.
Pushed to secure box seat, ran on well for 3rd.
Hard ridden to cross, shared lead at good pace 2 wide, out of fuel 150M.
Midfield, 4Ls behind the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, checked early, 6Ls off the good pace along the fence, ran on fairly in final stages.
Hard ridden early, checked badly first bend, 2.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, flattened in straight.
Eased back, checked early, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, ran on fairly in straight.
Pushed early but not muster, 2.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-4 wide throughout and lost too much ground, weakened 400M.
Pushed forward, 1Ls off the good pace 2 wide, soon emptied 300M.
Eased back, checked early, never a factor.
Slow away, checked early, 5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, no progress.
Well away, held up fourth last one off, inside bid, wove between runners to lead 50m out, soon in charge.
Taken back to rear rail, wide bid, finished well.
Well away, joined leaders then settled third one off, led briefly 150m out, outpaced by first two.
Fair break, bustled early to midfield one off, wove through to join leaders mid-straight, lacked final kick.
Broke well, led rail, headed and restrained to fourth, short of room mid-straight, kept on one pace.
Moderate start, rail mid-rear, back to rear turn, checked mid- straight when trying to improve, kept on but unable to challenge.
Broke well, joined leaders but caught three wide no cover, narrow lead into straight, headed 150m out, weakened.
Missed beat start when jumped in air, ridden to improve but caught midfield three wide, ridden straight, one pace.
Fair break, aimed for rail but caught wide, went forward to fourth but still four wide, kept on but no extra late.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, improved three wide far side, wide bid, one pace.
Fair break, fourth rail then back to midfield, inside bid, limited progress, weakened
Broke well, ridden to lead first turn, headed early straight, driven, weakened, eased.
Chased leaders in 4th, picked up strongly turning in, led inside 250M, forged clear and won with plenty in hand.
Strode forward to race outside the lead after 800M having been wide in midfield, tussled briefly with the eventual winner inside 300M, not pace of winner but kept on well for 2nd.
Broke well, tracked leader from 1000M, had every chance but turned once pace inside 200M, hung on for 3rd.
Reserved behind midfield, took time to find his stride turning in, did best work late and narrowly missed out on 3rd place.
Not hurried after the start and dropped back to the rear 8-9Ls off the pace, stayed on fairly to the line.
Along the fence in midfield, had every chance down this inside 300M, one-pace over final stages.
Towards the rear, found clear run down outside of straight final 300M, made some progress but couldn't quite get to the leaders.
Settled behind mid-division, kept on evenly turning in but effort flattened out passing 100M.
In mid-division 2-wide and was a shade keen in middle stages, kept on same pace and no impression from 200M out.
Not mustered early, ended up in the rear 9Ls behind leaders, found little when taken to challenge on the outside of straight.
Fractious in the barriers and was slowly away, held up towards the rear 7Ls off the pace, not quickened passing 300M.
Worked to the front from draw 10 and led them steadily, weakened rapidly after being headed 250M.

Pushed along from the widest gate to contest lead, took up running and shifted in to be just 2-wide around the bend, kicked clear to obtain rails run about 600 M out, kept on well to keep others at bay the length on straight.

Ridden from towards rear early to a prominent position but remained wide far side, taken back to midfield for cover around the bend, came to challenge upon straightening, ran on steadily under pressure without threatening.
Prominent early, shuffled backward to midfield before losing position coming out of back straight, midfield turning in, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.

Used early to kick from a wide draw to contest lead, remained wide down far side before crossing for rails run in 2nd around home bend, in similar position turning in, faded under pressure inside final 200 M.
Began moderately, settled wide towards rear, remained wide around the bend and into straight, kept on steadily under pressure without threatening.
Sluggish at start, ridden along in last few but soon dropped to tail-end, trailed the field into straight but saved ground turning in, made moderate headway early in straight without threatening.
Raced wide in last few, even wider when well behind entering home straight, fought on steadily down centre of track.
Settled just worse than midfield, kept on same pace before producing some late impression.
Soon dropped well back, trailed the field far side before joining the back-markers rounding home bend, ran home one-paced.
Broke well to lead, gradually taken back to settle 3Ls back on rails around the bend, in similar position turning in but faded steadily under pressure.
Began with others, prominent most of way until losing touch over 200 M out.
Prominent early but dropped towards rear after first 400 M, remained in last few turning for home despite saving ground on rails, made no further impression.
Enjoyed the run of the race tracking the 2 leaders. Peeled out passing the 500m and after rounding the home turn let down strongly to win easily.
Settled close to midfield, travelling near the fence approaching the circle. Shifted out 6 wide after the 400m, found the post well.
Camped 1 out 1 back. Carried 3 wide without cover after the 600m, kept on one paced in the home straight.
Sent forward and led along the rails with another runner racing close to its outside. Faded inside the final 100m.
Travelled 3rd from the rear, 1 off with cover. Made some ground over the concluding stages without threatening.
Raced midfield, 2 wide with cover. Commenced to peel out after the 600m. Stayed on at the same speed at the business end.
Sat outside the leader in 2nd position. Gave ground quickly inside the final furlong.
Went forward but after being caught wide early was eased and settled midfield 2 deep. Plugged away in the run home.
Positioned close to the rear along the fence. Whacked away at the same speed in the final stretch.
Raced back in the field 3 deep with cover. Came widest in the straight but failed to make any real impression.
Had every chance settling 3 back the paint. Struggled in the run home.
Raced at the tail of the field along the fence. Failed to pass another runner in the final straight.
Behind midfield to midpoint. Ridden 350M. Ran on strongly and powered clear closing stages.
Pressed along to race ahead of midfield. Responded well when asked 300M. Lacked the finishing touch of the winner but kept on for 2nd.
Driven early and shared lead on stands' rail. Overhauled by the winner passing 200M. Lost 2nd final stages.
Niggled early and settled at midfield. Checked at 400M. Picked up satisfactorily to make frame.
Soon in forward spot. Badly crowded for room and was severely checked at 400M. Resumed fairly well.
Behind leaders to midpoint but remained one-paced when the race got serious passing 400M.
Shared lead early and middle stages but failed to turn up a notch passing 350M. (minor wounds to left hock).
Back with last few and plugged on home.
At rear always. Never a factor.
At rear on stands' rail. Checked at 400M. No impression thereafter.
Fast away, led rail, kicked early straight, soon clear, unchallenged.
Fair jump, up fast outside to join leaders, taken back to fifth one off, had to wait for gap, ran on but winner had fled.
Broke well, sixth one off, had to wait for run, kept on well when free.
Fair break, up three wide to sixth, kept on quite well mid-track.
Missed beat start, rear one off, wide bid, kept on well.
Broke well, fourth rail following eventual winner, split came, not pace to challenge.
Broke well, looked for lead but caught four wide, still three wide turn, ridden, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield one off, mid-track bid, one pace.
Fair break, midfield rail, inside bid, no kick.
Sluggish start, back to third last one off, ridden, one pace.
Fair break, ridden early but not pace to join leaders, midfield four wide, urged into straight, found little.
Fair break, not rushed, rail mid-rear, shaken up entering straight, little response.
Broke well, ridden for lead but just outpaced, second one off, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, ridden but lacked early speed, back to rear, shaken up, no progress.
Broke slightly left, rebalanced and ridden for speed, took lead at1200m marker, breather back straight, all out from 250m, just held on.
Swiftly away, caught traffic and had to be taken back, headway 5-deep from 450m out, widest of all into straight, continued to gain strongly, just missed.
Good break, hampered and lost momentum after 50m, rear, blocked at 300m, switched wide and came free inside 200m, came flying for third.
Bumped after jump, recovered, settled near rear 3-deep, ridden patiently until straight, ran on under drive but no match to the first three.
Clean jump, taken back to fence at the first turn, pushed all out, slightly short of room, finished well when free.
Broke in air, ridden for speed, wide first turn, reached second at 1200m mark, shaken from a long way out, one pace, weakened late.
Clean jump, sat back in rear, ridden, ran on past tiring horses.
Missed jump, settled rear in 8th rail, shaken up from 350m out, checked to avoid clipping heels, lost all momentum.
Quickly away, unable to find cover and left racing 3-deep around the track, no threat.
Fair jump, shaken up at once for a midfield position, not quicken when asked from 350m out.
Clean jump but not as quick as some, midfield throughout, lacked response under drive.
Quickly away and ridden at once to dispute lead, taken back to follow leader rail, found nil when asked.
Quickest of all from gate, led at once,dropped back to fifth, came off the bridle back straight, ridden from a long way out found nil.
Clean jump, taken back to last along the fence but never comfortable on the surface, always trailed.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, made all.
Settled in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, lack room 400M, dashed well when clear for 2nd.
Eased to rear to take rail, 9.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 4-2, demonstrated strong finishing efforts when clear.
Progressed forward steadily to cross, 1L off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, ran on well until 150M flattened.
Hard ridden early to keep in touch with the field, 8Ls off the leader on the rails, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, held up 100M.
Hard ridden early but not muster, 4Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
Very slow away, hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader on the fence, dashed well despite not suited by the slow pace, held up 100M.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, favoured by the slow sectionals, flattened in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Eased back, 8.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 250M.
Midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no turn of foot.
Eased midfield early, however trapped wide, moved forward to sit 2.5Ls off the slow pace, still 3 wide, soon emptied 300M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, not suited by the slow pace, weakened 400M.
Broke well, allowed to slide back to fourth last one off, blocked briefly mid-straight, pulled out to lead 100m out and win going away.
Broke well, up along rail to settle midfield, out to challenge, led 200m out, no answer to winner.
Fair break, taken back to third last one off, shaken up turn, made ground steadily under driving.
Taken back to rear rail, urged turn, short of room mid-straight, good late progress.
Steadied start, back to fifth last one off, wide bid, stayed on without threatening.
Fair break, midfield one off, urged turn, wide bid, stayed on one pace.
Broke fast, ridden to lead and cross, settled back fourth rail, asked to improve early straight, slightly short of room, no kick.
Fair break, raced just forward of midfield two off, peeled off to challenge turn, one pace, weakened late.
Fair break, ridden early, settled fifth one off, checked early straight, limited progress thereafter.
Taken back to rear one off, last into straight, wide bid, little progress.
Broke well, up wide to join leaders, third one off, ridden early straight, brief and narrow lead, weakened.
Slightly sluggish start, soon recovered to midfield rail, inside bid, checked twice and no way through, no chance thereafter.
Fast break, up to lead and cross, joined entering turn, headed mid-straight, weakened quickly.
Broke fast, taken back but still caught four wide midfield, up to lead but unable to cross, ridden, weakened quickly.
Vied for the lead, pulled away from pursuers near 300M, kept responding to pressure once in the lead, held off fast finishing runner-up by a diminishing margin.
Travelled well towards the rear, came through to deliver a strong challenge entering 200M, drifted out badly final 50M which might have cost him victory.
Well covered in midfield, took a while to get going in straight, did best work final 150M and got up for 3rd close home.
Tracked leaders along the fence, forced his way into clear near 350M, had his chance but not pace of first two final 200M, drfted out late stages and lost 3rd towards finish.
Rushed to the lead and was soon pressed by the eventual winner, all out 300M, kept on same pace before weakening inside 100M.
Quick from the stalls, chased leaders, was bumped and became unbalanced near 350M, kept on fairly to the line.
Unbalanced coming out of the gates, held up near the rear 5-6Ls behind leaders, taken widest turning for home, ran on towards the finish but was never a real danger.
Towards the rear 4Ls off the pace, difficult to settle in mid stages when being steadied, didn't have the clearest of runs in straight but was never going the pace to challenge.
Not hurried early stages, held up 3-wide behind mid-division, not picked up under pressure.
Reserved at the rear, behind a wall of horses turning in and no clear run until 250M, made limited progress.
Up with early pace, dropped back to midfield before the home turn, driven nearing 300M but could only kept on at the same pace, no impression.
Slightly slow away, held up behind midfield 4Ls back, not quickened when put to pressure turning for home, outpaced passing 200M.
Driven forward but was unable to cross from a wide draw, found little under pressure 400M out, weakened mid-straight.
Ridden early but failed to muster speed, caught wide no cover throughout, weakened gradually turning in, left behind 200M.
Fast away, shared lead one off, then reined back to fifth one off, stayed on strongly mid-track for impressive win.
Awkward start, lost length, up fast out wide to lead, kicked early straight, stayed on well but winner too strong.
Fair break, not rushed, held up fourth last one off, still eight lengths off lead mid-straight, ridden, stretched out very well late to finish fast.
Broke well, settled sixth one off, mid track bid, kept on well.
Fast away, led and crossed, tried to steady pace but quickly headed, settled third rail, fought on well straight until no extra late.
Broke well, aimed for lead but not quite enough pace, second one off, ridden, one pace straight.
Broke well, up along rail to fourth, steadied off heels and lost a little ground, driven for inside bid, one pace.
Moderate start, mid-rear rail, driven straight, kept on one pace.
Moderate start, held up rear one off pulling, wide bid, kept on well late.
Good break, then looked for route to rail, had to settle for mid-rear one off, ridden straight, one pace.
Fair break, not much early pace, rear rail, inside bid, little progress.
Broke well, reined back to mid-rear three off, shaken up early straight, no progress.
Fair break, midfield rail, ridden into straight, found nil.
Taken back from wide draw, rear three wide, driven before straight, no response.
Ended up settling 3 wide in midfield 5ls back with cover, even trip to bend, kept working into it and let down best final 200m to score a solid win.
Showed speed to take up running, rolled along at decent sections, skipped clear at 400m, stuck on well only to be collared late.
Slotted in to ideal spot 3ls back in 2 wide line, tracked well to bend, had difficulty obtaining clear run until after the 200m, closed hard late.
Began well, took a trail on leaders back, fair run to turn, angled out and kept giving, lost a place late but did well to make frame.
Taken across behind runners shortly after the start, shared rear 8ls away on rails, improved on turning, finished strongly to be on heels of place-getters on line.
Drifted back behind midfield, 7ls or so away on rails, quiet time to bend, not clearest running in the early part of the straight, worked home to be nearest on line.
Settled behind midfield 2-3wide 7ls back, aided by pace on, improved at 400m, didn't dash but kept working steadily to line to be closest at finish.
Positioned just behind midfield, 5-6ls away on rails, even trip to bend, took inside runs and made some ground to 200m but flat thereafter.
Drifted back to rear as usual, best part of 8ls back racing 2 wide, near last turning, closed well down middle without threatening.
Away ok, travelled 3 wide without cover and did share of work with speed on, 3ls away on circle, crept closer turning, dropped off when run ended at 200m.
Settled behind midfield, 5-6ls back to bend, in traffic and steadied near the 200m when disappointed for running, no ground thereafter.
Faded back to race 3 wide at rear, best part of 8ls away, aided by speed on, no serious progress in straight.
Box seated 2ls off lead in 2 wide line, reasonable run to bend, weakened soon after 400m and dropped out.
Pressed forward to sit outside leader, used a bit with decent sections, folded tamely upon straightening.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began with others, gradually taken back to midfield on rails, commenced move rounding home bend, stuck to rails run on straightening, fought on steadily to gain upper hand final strides.
Began with others, settled in 3rd or 4th far side within 2Ls of pace, hit front under pressure about 200 M out only to be headed close to home.

Raced wide in midfield early, took closer order far side to dispute lead from Rock to approaching home bend, remained well there turning in, held some chance early in straight but failed to quicken under pressure.
Began restrained, soon taken back from the poor draw to settle in last few, remained well back to straight, made up good late ground inside final 200 M.
Settled just worse than midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, fought on steadily down inner of straight but without threatening.
Began moderately and hampered, settled in midfield, kept on same pace under pressure without threatening in straight.
Settled in rear of midfield, remained similar but wider turning in, ran on steadily down centre of straight without threatening.
Amongst leaders early, settled in 2nd just off the pace around stables bend, became 3rd in one-out-one-back position far side, came under pressure entering straight, ran home one-paced.
Trailed the field most of way, widest turning in, only ran past well-beaten horses.
Began fairly from the widest draw, soon taken back for cover to race in last few, no further impression. (Lame and stiff next day.)
Began awkwardly but did not lose ground, took up running from stables bend and led until joined passing Rock, still in front turning into home straight, folded up quickly. (Stiff and sore next day.)
Ridden along from the start, settled not far off the pace, 3-wide without cover far side dropping to midfield home bend, wider turning in, found nothing.
Raced with cover in 4th position, 2 deep. Maintained a good gallop down the running to have the race in its keeping after the 100m.
Enjoyed the box seat. Hit the lead near the 150m, stayed on nicely.
Camped behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Turned for home four deep, closed off soundly.
Traveled midfield the fence. Worked home steadily in the final stretch.
Settled near the tail of the field along the rails. Made some ground without ever threatening.
Sent forward and settled in 2nd position, 1 off outside the leader. Ran along at good sections, tired over the concluding stages.
Raced in last position along the paint. Searched for runs through the field in the home straight, got home fairly.
Ridden positively to take up the running in the early stages along the paint. Set good fractions, gave ground inside the last 100m.
Settled back in the event, 2 deep with cover. Cornered about 7 wide, only plugged to the line. Post race vet exam showed a substantial amount of mucopus in the trachea.
Raced with the backmakers, 1 off the fence. Came widest on the home turn but only struggled in the run home.
Pressed early and settled at prominent spot from 800M. Fought on gamely to make run between two runners top of home straight. Prevailed closing stages.
Driven along to maintain 3-wide at midfield. Picked up steadily early home straight and was steadied approaching 200M. Resumed well but the post came too soon.
Hard ridden early and took lead on fence 800M. Levelled on straightening. Kept giving but couldn't resist the front pair final stages.
Travelled wide behind midfield to home straight but finished the race off fairly well.
Raced 2-wide at midfield to home straight. Well positioned to strike at 300M but remained one-paced.
Niggled along and slotted 2-wide behind leaders at the Rock. Challenged the leader on straightening. Every chance final furlong but weakened 100M.
Behind midfield on fence to home straight. Made up some ground thereafter.
Last out. Back with last few rounding home turn. Made some improvement home straight before awkwardly placed near the post.
Trapped 3-wide and without cover in a forward spot to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch thereafter.
Away in line from high draw. Gradually taken to 2-wide at rear. Found nothing when asked in the straight.
Began awkwardly and lost ground. Raced 2-wide behind midfield 800M. Failed to accelerate home straight and faded final 100M.
Always at rear. Well beaten before straightening.
Settled nicely on rails in midfield, kicked strongly when clear 200 M out, soon led, drew clear.
Settled well on rails near the rear, quickened well when clear 250 M out, finished off soundly for 2nd.
Prominently placed on rail just off the speed, finished off soundly final 250 M for 3rd, bump 50m out.
Awkward start, caught 3-wide with no cover in midfield, kept on well in the home straight, unlucky to miss out a place.
Awkward start, pushed hard to share lead on rails, kept on satisfactorily in the home straight, bump 150m out, failed to match to strides of the top four final 100 M.
Travelled one-off in midfield, finished off satisfactorily in the home straight, bump 50m out, but never really threaten the principals.
Pushed hard to share lead on 2-deep, quickened 400 M out, kept on fairly, bump 150m out, no extra final 100 M.
Pushed up to hold a one-off spot just behind the pace, one-paced in the home straight, on heels 200m out.
Eased to the rear from high draw, made up some late ground final 200 M.
Caught 3-wide in midfield, failed to make up any ground in the home straight.
Bump start, taken rearward from high draw, made no progress in the home straight. (Lame right fore.)
Travelled one-off in the mid-division, drifted back gradually at the home turn, finished tailed out.
Settled one-off in midfield, check 1100 M out, kicked when asked 250 M out, took lead 100 M out, drew clear.
Pushed up to share lead on rails, kept on soundly in the home straight, caught by the winner 100 M out.
Cozily box-seated, on heels 1100 M out, kept on well for a place.
Settled on rail in midfield, bump 1100 M out, kept on well in the home straight, just missed a place.
Taken back from high draw, finished off satisfactorily when clear 200 M out.
Lacked early speed, travelled one from the rear, made limited progress along the inner of the home straight.
Settled one-out-one-back, only one-paced when asked final 250 M. (Swollen left stifle.)
Pushed up to share lead on 2-deep, hung in 1100 M out, held ground until flattened 200 M out.
Awkward start, travelled 3-deep in midfield, no kick when asked 300 M out.
Eased towards the rear, made no progress in the home straight.
Caught wide with no cover in midfield, no response when asked 300 M out, soon faded.
Caught wide with no cover in midfield, bump 500 M out, lost balanced and gave ground.
Pushed to hold the rail in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 200M to win.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 1L at fast sectionals, hung on strongly until 50M overhauled, ran on for 2nd.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader, helped by the fast tempo, made steady ground 300M for 3rd.
Hard ridden forward to occupy box seat, not suited by the fast sectionals, ran on well to the line.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader along the fence, benefited by the fast pace, made minor ground in straight.
Bumped start, dropped to rear, more than 9Ls off the leader on the fence, helped by the fast pace, made good ground 200M.
Bumped start, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, just ran on fairly.
Eased to sit 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, soon weakened 250M.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, ran on fairly.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader on the fence, suited by the fast tempo, however no progress.
Behind midfield, trapped 2-3 wide, dropped off 500M.
Fair break, taken back to mid-rear rail, improving far side until path blocked, mid-track bid, led 150m out, kept on well.
Well away, fifth one off, ridden turn, wide bid, kept on well, just outpaced.
Moderate break, up to third one off, then second, asked to quicken entering turn, led until mid-straight, kept on when headed
Well away, settled fourth last one off, rapid move to join leaders three wide entering turn, kept on well until weakened slightly late.
Broke well, midfield one off, then held up mid-rear, ridden entering straight, finished quite well but unable to get to grips.
Fair break, up along rail to fifth, inside bid, kept on but no kick.
Fair break, taken back to third last rail, inside bid, improved under driving but unable to threaten.
Taken back to third last one-off, improved wide entering turn, wide bid, no kick.
Broke well, led rail, headed entering back straight, tracked leader in third, caught flat-footed turn, short of room when inside bid, weakened late.
Fair break, midfield one off, ridden turn, mid-track bid, unable to challenge.
Taken back to rear, driven early straight, unable to improve.
Broke well, up wide to lead first turn, joined and headed early straight, weakened quickly, eased.

Broke well then restrained to a position behind midfield, travelled strongly to straight, showed good acceleration when guided to the outside, powered away final 100M to record a back to back victory.
Slow to begin, raced 3-wide in mid-division, made good headway to challenge inside 350M but was no match for the winner.
Dropped back to the rear, had 5Ls to make up turning in, picked up well to snatch 3rd late on.
Towards the rear, saved ground on the inside but was badly held up to 150M, finished off strongly when clear.
Settled in mid-division 2-3Ls off the pace, box-seated coming off the bend and had no clear run for most part of the straight.
In midfield along the 2-path, had to shift out for clear run turning into straight, made some headway final 150M.
Vied for early lead, unbalanced and struck the running rail near 600M, lost lead 100M, weakened. (Lame front leg.)
Rushed along to a forward position behind leaders, pushed very wide near 600M and covered extra ground making the turn, kept on to 100M, weakened.
Slow to begin, settled at the tail of the field 6Ls behind leaders, travelled strongly off the bend but was badly held up early straight and again passing 200M.
Chased the pace along inside, had every chance but not going the pace to challenge.
Vied for the lead on the outside, was bumped near 600M and pushed to 3-wide making the turn, hung in home straight, faded 150M and out of contention.
Chased leaders, severely hampered near 600M, had no clear run in straight having checked near 200M and 100M.

Settled just better than midfield, remained similar into straight, soon came to challenge upon straightening, hit the front 200 M out, held on.
Began awkwardly from a poor draw losing many lengths, remained in last few, placed awkwardly behind runners rounding home bend, baulked for a run until 200 M out, finished off race well.
Ridden to the front early, settled just in 2nd outside leader approaching home bend, hit the front again after straightening, but unable to sustain effort inside final 100 M.
Began fairly, gradually improved along rails to take lead approaching home bend, led until narrowly headed over 300 M out, kept on but ran out of a placing late.
Began moderately, never far off on rails, did not find much room early in straight, kept on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Settled towards the rear, gained closer behind midfield when pace slackened around home bend, within 3Ls of speed turning in, baulked for a run 200 M out, finished off race well.
Sluggish at start, soon ridden to midfield position along rails, shifted off rails for a run entering straight, produced only moderate progress inside final 200 M.
Raced keenly in last few, remained towards rear into straight, steadied passing 300 M before obtaining a clear passage, finished off race well.
Settled in midfield, kept on steadily down the centre of the track until hampered late closing stages.
Began from a poor draw, travelled wide without cover in prominent positions, faded out of contention 200 M out.
Began with others, close up early, gradually dropped back to wide in midfield by home bend, kept on under pressure early in straight, beaten when steadied over 100 M out. (Blood in trachea.)
Soon dropped to well back and never seen with a chance. (Lame next day.)
Failed to muster early, gradually settled in rear of midfield, shuffled further back around home bend, found nothing in straight. (Blood in trachea.)
Began from the widest draw, gradually settled wide without cover in midfield, remained similar around the bend and into straight, dropped out after straightening.
Sent forward crossed to the fence in the early stages and led along the rails after the 900m. Made every post a winner thereafter, holding off challengers to score a solid win.
Settled midfield the fence. Ran on well in the home straight whilst shifting out near the 100m to continue into clear running.
Travelled behind midfield, 3 wide with cover. Closed off strongly after having a wide run.
Stalked the leader along the paint. Maintained a good gallop right to the wire.
Slow to begin settling behind midfield the fence. Railed up turning for home and ran on strongly.
Camped worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Closed off well although ran into traffic problems in the final stretch.
Settled with the backmakers 2 wide with cover. Cornered the widest, however closed off nicely despite shifting ground inwards early in the straight.
Parked 2nd from the rear along the rails. Finished off well although at times experienced some difficulty obtaining clear running in the run home.
Parked in last position 2 wide with cover. Came widest in the home straight and made good ground in the run to the line.
Led early before taking a sit and racing in 2nd position, 1off after the 900m. Faded inside the final furlong.
Had every possible chance after settling 1 out 1 back. Only plodded to the finishing line.
Travelled midfield, 3 deep with cover. Kept on only one paced over the concluding stages.
Parked midfield, 1 off with cover. Struggled in the final stretch.
Never a factor after being posted 3 wide without cover, whilst travelling in a prominent position.
Occupied a prominent spot to home straight. Steadied at 400M but soon found clear run. Ran on well to repel rivals home.
Away in line and was gradually taken to behind midfield. Improved outside and reached leading section home turn. Kept giving home straight but was fended off by the winner.
Checked at start and resumed to race behind midfield on fence from 1000M. Checked again at 350M. Closed off strongly when clear and was nearest at finish.
Out nicely, elected to sit 2-wide at midfield approaching home turn. Shifted 3-wide 700M. Kept on satisfactorily down the centre of home straight without seriously threatened the front trio.
Switched to rear from highest draw. Swung wide into final stretch. Covered good ground thereafter and nearly made frame.
Hard ridden early. Led 2-wide until overhauled top of home straight. Plugged on thereafter.
Hampered at start and raced 2-wide behind midfield. Back with last few turning in. Made minor progress late.
Began awkwardly and was bumped. Driven to race with leaders on fence from 900M. Couldn't turn up a notch passing 250M. Weakened closing stages. ("Roarer".)
Taken to rear from wide barrier. Came widest rounding home turn. Beat tired runners home.
3-wide towards rear always. Never likely.
Travelled wide and without cover in a forward spot to home straight. Faded final 300M.
2-wide ahead of midfield early. Dropped out from home turn. Compounded badly home straight.
Jumped well, settled quietly sixth rail, ridden with total confidence straight, shot through between runners with 200m out, for comfortable victory.
Fair jump, in touch in fifth, ran on evenly, all out for second.
Good jump, bumped hard, left without cover 3-deep around the track, pushed all out and held third courageously.
Quickest off the block, sat next to early leader, shaken up from 350m out, led until overtaken inside last 100m.
Clean jump, backed off from slow pace and settled midfield, ran on well inside the last 200m behind wall of horses.
Fair jump, bumped off balance and trailed, rear, swung wide top of straight, ran on strongly late.
Fair break, hard ridden for early speed, near rear, shaken up early straight, kept on well in last quarter.
Broke sideways, recovered and dropped in behind early leader along rail, fought hard, outsprinted coming home.
Jumped sideways, ridden hard for early speed, led after 300m, unchallenged until top of straight, one pace all the way to finish.
Clean jump, taken back to rear, ridden and came home well last 100m, unable to challenge.
Quickly away, rear between horses, asked to improve 500m out, some progress, weakened late.
Jumped sideways, widest top of straight, found nil when asked.
Clean jump, settled in rear along rail, unable to quicken straight.
Slightly hampered early, one of backmarkers along the rail, found little straight.
Quickly away, sat behind early leader along stand rail, gap came 200m out, drove through for convincing win.
Good jump, raced without cover mid- track, kept on strongly for second.
Broke awkwardly, near rear stand rail, gained strongly inside last 100m.
Swiftly away, prominent, settled in second one off, shaken up from 300m out, kept on.
Sluggish break, rear, came powerfully late stand side.
Good quick jump, settled rear mid-track, came smartly between runners inside the last 100m.
Bumped hard start, recovered at once and sat fifth, ridden from a long way out, one pace last 100m.
Quickly away, taken back from early pace, blocked solidly behind runners and never free for a run coming home.
Quickest of all into stride, crossed and led along the stand rail after 200m, shaken up from 300m out, soon beaten.
Quickly away, disputed lead, kept on one pace under drive.
Missed beat start, soon rejoined leading group, shaken up from 200m out, one pace.
Clean jump, rear, no threat.
Broke fast, not pace to go with leaders, mid-rear, ridden, weakened.
Poor break, last entire trip, ridden and beaten long way out.
Settled nicely in box seat, benefited by the slow sectionals and the rail-trip, closed off strongly to win.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, blocked 4-2, dashed strongly when clear and took 2nd.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, overhauled 200M, ran on for 3rd.
Pushed to hold a midfield spot along the fence, 4Ls off the leader, lack room 4-2, dashed strongly when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Very slow away, 5.5Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, dashed well when clear.
Hard ridden forward, enjoyed the slow sectionals outside the leader, however soon emptied 300M.
Eased to rear, 9Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit behind the leaders, 2Ls off the slow pace, trapped 3 wide, soon weakened 300M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, no turn of foot in straight.
Pushed early but not muster, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, no progress.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, no dash.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the leader, raced 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Broke smartly, tracked leader until took over soon after halfway, held second when that horse challenged to win with very little fuss.
Broke well, not rushed, held up behind pack in second last, had to weave way through to challenge, winner too strong.
Lost half length start, raced mid-track then wide bid, kept on but unable to threaten.
Fair break, raced on outside, six off rail, joined winner mid-race, soon shaken off and unable to quicken.
Broke well, settled last rail, ridden from midway, ran on quite well, unable to threaten.
Jumped fast from outside, soon led four off rail, headed mid-race and outpaced, kept on one pace.
Away smartly, led rail, headed 300m out, kept on one pace.
Fair break, leading group two off rail, shaken up halfway, no extra.
Fair break, second rank rail, outpaced mid-race, kept on along rail until short of room late.
Fair break, second rank, ridden, unable to respond.
Slightly awkward start, ridden to join leaders one off rail, under pressure halfway, weakened quickly, eased.
Settled nicely behind midfield and travelled with consummate ease to straight, quickened up smartly inside 350M, led 150M and drawing away from a high class field.
Slow to begin, settled near the rear 8Ls off a strong pace, held up at a crucial stage nearing 200M, finished well when clear and got up for 2nd just in time.
Chased the pace 2-wide, kept on steadily turning for home but was merely battling on for a minor placing when the winner swooped past inside 200M.
Not hurried early stages, settled 7Ls off the pace in 11th position, into clear 350M, stayed on for 3rd but no chance with the impressive winner.
Slow to muster, travelled towards the tail of the field 9Ls off the pace, niggled along passing 600M but took time to get going, did best work final 150M.
Broke well then held back to a midfield position, came a bit wide over the home turn, made some progress when driven inside 500M, run ended 100M out and faded.
Vigorously ridden to find the lead, set a strong mid-race tempo, opened up a 3Ls lead turning for home but run ended nearing 200M, headed 150M and no extra.
Positioned ahead of midfield, kept on steadily in straight but lacked the pace to seriously challenge.
Dropped back to the rear from a wide barrier, over 10Ls off the pace in a strongly run race, held up 300M to 100M, stayed on well when clear.
Raced just behind midfield, saved ground on the inside but was held up for some distance after 300M, kept on same pace final 100M.
Travelled keenly in midfield, outpaced inside 300M, no impression.
Briefly led in early stages, in 3rd place turning for home, not quickened under pressure, dropped away 100M out.
Nudged along to chase leaders early, sat in 5th making the turn, weakened turning in and was soon left behind nearing 200M, eased.
Assumed a forward position after striking interference near 1300M, driven but no response passing 400M, weakened rapidly, eased. (Unacceptable Performance.)
Fair break, fifth one off, had to wait for run, finished strongly on inside to win going away.
Fair break, taken back to third last one off, spun off turn for wide bid, led 200m out, winner too good.
Steadied and taken back to three length last, closed turn, short of room early straight, strong run, flattened out late.
Fair break, up wide then taken back to rear, wide bid, kept on but unable to threaten.
Awkward jump, lost two lengths, last early, made ground along rail to midfield, short of room when looking for inside run, kept on well once free.
Broke fast but caught three wide midfield, mid-track bid, kept on until no extra late.
Broke well, joined leaders three wide, led briefly and narrowly mid-straight, no extra.
Fair break but caught midfield three wide, wide bid, one pace.
Fair break, fourth rail, no room mid-straight, kept on well when free but unable to threaten.
Fair break, not much early speed, midfield one off, ridden, no progress.
Fair break, lacked early pace, second last rail, ureged, ridden, no progress.
Jumped fast, led, headed mid-straight, weakened rapidly.
Broke well, ridden for lead but had to settle for second one off, challenged early straight, checked while fading, weakened quickly.
Slotted in nicely on rails, had an easy time 3-4Ls back, tracked into race well to bend and had tailor made run appear, kept finding to take advantage late.
Showed speed, took trail on leaders back. Enjoyed all favours to the bend, angled clear at the top of the straight, fought on bravely but just lost out late.
Settled 3 wide just off midfield from an awkward alley, had cover and suited by speed, 6Ls or so back on bend, kept finding and made nice ground down middle for 3rd.
Posted 3 wide without cover 3Ls back from outside alley, did some work with pace on, crept forward turning, battled respectably given trip.
Didn't muster, just off midfield 5-6Ls back, in traffic turning and didn't see daylight to 200, did best work late to be on heels of place getters.
Settled in box seat 1 out 1 back 2Ls back, even trip with decent speed on, into mix from 400m and looked a place chance but proved a bit one paced late.
Obtained a midfield position 4-5Ls back, easy time in mid section, stuck on evenly in straight and was held up from 200-100m, was nearest on line.
Pressed forward to take up running, rolled along keenly setting a decent speed, backed off on circle, 2ls clear turning, run ended inside 200m after early work.
No early pace, ended up 5Ls back on rails in midfield, had easy time and aided by pace, kept to inside and worked to the line well without looking a threat.
No early speed and dropped down to rear on rails, 7Ls back in mid section, aided by speed, held up for most of straight and was unable to be properly tested.
Assumed usual role near to last 8Ls or so away racing 2 wide, aided by tempo, came 3 wide on bend, made some ground but didn't have finish to factor.
Worked forward to race outside the leader, used a bit on solid speed, niggled along on turning, dropped off from 200m.
Faded back from a wider alley, settled 2 wide 7Ls back, always well back, didn't run on in straight.

Placing: DISQ
Comment: Didn't begin well. Raced 3 wide in midfield once mustered, 5Ls or so away with cover, had ok run to bend but didn't let down when making run, just plugged late.

Ridden along to keep pace with leaders far side, still sharing the pace rounding home bend, kicked over 3Ls inside final 300 M and soon flattered, held on to the line.
Began restrained from a poor draw, soon taken well back and across for rails run, remained in last few to straight, did not find much room until the 200 M, finished off race very well.
Began well from the middle draw, gradually settled one-back just off the speed, angled out for a run entering straight, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began with others, tightened shortly after start settling in last few, remained wide and well behind turning in, made significant progress in straight despite not clear run passing 100 M.

Remained wide far side after beginning from a poor draw, racing prominent early but soon settled in midfield, switched wider turning into straight, ran on well down centre of the track to be nearest at finish.
Began moderately, settled in forward of midfield in 5th on rails, hugged the rails turning for home, kept on steadily at the same pace without quickening.
Began with others, gradually shuffled back to the last, trailed the field onto home bend, produced only moderate impression in straight.
Ridden along to hold a very narrow lead flanked by two other front-runners, swung a bit wider turning for home, soon weakened under pressure.
Began with others, settled towards the rear, saved a lot of ground on inside turning for home, hampered on rails 250 M out, made no further impression closing stages.
Took advantage of the one draw and ridden to join leaders, tightened on rails and lost position approaching home bend, still just one back turning in, compounded badly. (Severely lame.)
Ridden along from a wide draw to dispute lead 3-wide, still well there turning in, folded up quickly after straightening.
Travelled outside the leader in 2nd position, 1 off. Hit the lead soon after entering the home straight and fought on strongly to hold off challengers.
Settled 3 back the fence. Held on gamely in the run to the wire.
Camped worse than midfield along the paint. Took runs through the field in the home straight, finished off soundly.
Enjoyed the run of the race after having box seated. Loomed up at the furlong but hit a flat spot 100m from home.
Parked in 2nd last position along the paint. Railed up in the straight and made good late ground.
Camped midfield, 1 off with cover. Cornered 5 wide on the home turn, stayed on evenly.
Made its run from the tail of the field, 2 deep with cover. Closed off satisfactorily.
Travelled towards the rear of the field, 2 deep with cover. Came widest turning for home, kept on one paced to the finishing line.
Settled behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Worked home steadily without threatening.
Sent forward and lead along the rails. Was overhauled at the 200m and faded thereafter.
Travelled with the backmakers, 2 wide with cover. Failed to make any impression in the home straight.
Settled 1 out 1 back. Had every chance but struggled in the final stretch.
2-wide in leading section to home straight. Fount on well and asserted authority closing stages.
Led on fence to home straight. Battled gamely with the winner but couldn't sustain effort final stages.
Ahead of midfield on fence to home straight. Kept on but no real threat to the front pair.
Behind midfield on fence to home turn. Took inside run into final stretch and plugged on.
Soon raced at rear. Way back early stages. Tacked on the back of the field home turn. Made up ground steadily home straight before checked at 150M. Ran on thereafter.
Failed to muster early. Posted 3-wide behind midfield to home straight. Made up minor ground late.
2-wide at midfield to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch when asked.
Hard ridden early to occupy a forward post but trapped wide. Elected to sit 3-wide at midfield back straight. Beat tired runners home.
3-wide with leaders to home straight. Peaked 250M.
Behind midfield early. Dropped towards rear home turn. Never recovered.
Always at rear. Never likely.
Travelled wide and without cover at midfield for the major part of the race. Beaten soon after straightening.
Broke well, fifth one off, mid-track bid to lead 100m out, ran on well.
Broke well, up wide to share three ways lead, back to second one off, led early straight, unable to resist winner.
Broke well, led briefly, then third rail when headed, inside bid, kept on.
Slightly sluggish start, last rail, wide bid, ran on well.
Broke well, not pace to lead, settled midfield rail, modest progress, no kick.
Moderate break, last one off, improved turn, kept on mid-track without being able to threaten.
Broke well, not much early speed, back to fourth last one off, wide bid, one pace.
Moderate break, fourth last two off, improved wide to midfield far side, ridden, one pace.
Moderate break, midfield one off, shaken up straight, one pace.
Fair break, lacked early speed, back to third last rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fast break, had to work for it but led, steadied pace, joined entering straight, tried to kick, weakened.
Moderate break, ridden early, mid-rear four wide, improved wide to third entering straight, no extra, weakened.
Settled 3Ls off the pace on rail, quickened well when asked 250 M out, soon led, kept on to score.
Lacked early speed as usual, sat one from the rear, held up early straight, kicked strongly when clear 150 M out, ran on for 2nd.
Travelled with no cover throughout, in midfield early until ran up to share the lead 600 M out, kept on well under hard riding for 3rd.
Knuckled start, settled one-off 3-4Ls off the pace, made up ground steadily in the home straight, just late for a place.
Pushed up to hold a fence position in midfield, improved along the inner of the home straight, made up gradual ground.
Bump start, unbalanced 1300 M out, sat one-off in midfield, one-paced, never threatened the principals.
Out in line, drifted gradually towards the rear when caught 3-deep, lost cover 600 M out, held ground, no extra final 150 M.
Taken back from high draw and travelled rearward, made home turn awkwardly when caught wide, only made limited progress in the home straight.
Taken rearward from high draw, failed to make up any ground.
Easily ran up to take a rail spot just behind the leader, checked 600 M out, held ground until flattened 200 M out.
Pushed up to get a cross in front and lead on rail, joined 500 M out, no extra final 150 M.
Bump start, pushed hard to get across and took a seat just behind the leader, struggled at home turn, no extra final 200 M.
Pushed to hold the rail in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, progressed steadily 200M to win.
Hard ridden early to keep up with the field along the fence, 6Ls off the good pace, made steady ground 250M and got 2nd.
Hard ridden early, 4.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, progressed steadily 250M for 3rd.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, made some ground 250M, however run ended 100M.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 8.5Ls off the good pace, blocked most straight, made good ground when clear.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on ok.
Hard ridden forward to take rail and shared the lead at good sectionals, ran on until 150M weakened.
Eased at start, 6Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made steady ground in straight, held up and checked 100M.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 4Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, ran on ok.
Pushed early, trapped 3 wide throughout, 2Ls off the good pace, made ground 400M, out of fuel 150M.
Hard ridden forward, shared lead 2 wide at good pace, soon dropped off 250M.
Fair break, not rushed, mid-rear one off, wide bid, strong finish to lead 50m out.
Fast away, up to lead and eventually cross, headed and eased back to second far side, led again 150m out, caught 50m out.
Slowly away, two lengths last after 100m, closed up far side, second last turn, wide bid, finished very strongly.
Broke fast, up to share lead then back to third two off, mid-track bid, driven, one pace.
Fair break, ridden early, fifth rail, peeled off for mid-track bid, no kick.
Broke well, third rail, inside bid, no kick.
Fair break, unable to go early pace, rear one off urged, ran on quite well late.
Fair break, not go early pace, fourth last rail, inside bid, modest progress.
Bounced out fast, shared lead then went on, two clear entering straight, headed, weakened quickly.
Not fast away, third last one off, mid-track bid, one pace.
Moderate start, mid-rear one off, up along rail, not settling, driven straight, no response.
Taken back, settled 2 off the fence 7Ls behind leader, picked up strongly once shifted into clear 250M, good headway final 150M under a forceful ride and got up close home to justify favouritism.
Held up in midfield, travelled smoothly and had a ground saving trip along the fence, came through a narrow gap on the inside 200M, hit lead inside 100M only to be caught by winner in dying strides.
Went forward, crossed to the lead near 1200M having been wide in early stages, set steady tempo to straight, headed inside 100M but battled on well to hold 3rd.
Settled in midfield but was 3-wide without cover for most of the trip, strode closer to leader over the home turn, briefly looked threatening mid-straight, kept on final 200M but not pace of first 2.
Positively ridden early stages to hold a position not far off the pace, responded well when driven 300M out, turned one pace final 100M.
Raced 2-wide in midfield, well covered, ran on only fairly final 300M and never going the pace to challenge.
Dropped back at the start and settled 6-7Ls back towards the tail of the field, held up behind a wall of horses early straight, shifted to wide outside for clear run near 200M, finished off well.
Vied for early lead, crossed to the fence nearing 1200M and sat behind leader, not quickened when put to pressure in straight, faded final 100M.
Travelled 3-wide in mid-division, kept on same pace in straight and was never a threat.
Slow to begin, outpaced in last nearly 10Ls off the pace in middle stages, had plenty to do turning in, gave limited response running past beaten runners only.
Positioned 2-wide behind midfield, outpaced making the home turn and was never a factor.
Up with early pace, chased leader down the back straight, weakened passing 200M, eased.
