Tracked leader, took charge shortly after straightening and soon drew clear.
Began well, settled in 2L 3rd on rails, came to challenge passing 300 M, chased winner in vain throughout closing stages.
Began moderately losing ground, gradually picked up to 5th in rear of midfield, went wide into straight, quickened up upon straightening but unable to sustain run inside final 200 M.
Began with the others, soon took up running and attempted to make all, folded up quickly inside final 200 M.
Soon taken back from a wide draw, took slightly closer order around the bend, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Close up briefly, soon dropped backward to last few, never a danger.
Close up early, settled in 4th in mid-division of small field, closer up rounding home bend, kept on before fading under pressure shortly after straightening.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, travelled well back despite niggling along, dropped to last rounding home bend, no further impression.
Slow to begin settling a handy fifth, 3 wide without cover. Hit the lead near the furlong and drew a margin to win well.
Raced 3 deep early before crossing to the fence and taking up leading duties after the 800m. Maintained a good gallop down the running.
Rated 1 out 1 back. Kept on well to stay in the frame.
Camped behind midfield the fence. Worked home soundly through the field in the home straight.
Was posted at least 4 wide without cover, behind midfield. Came widest in the straight and made good ground.
Began very awkwardly losing ground, was then ridden along to eventually cross and settle outside the leader near the 800m. Was still there at the furlong but faded over the concluding stages.
Raced midfield, 3 deep with cover. Battled away gamely over the concluding stages.
Travelled with the backmakers, 2 deep with cover. Rounded the home turn about 7 deep and made fair ground without threatening.
Parked midfield the fence. Railed up in the home straight and made some ground before coming up flat over the final stages.
Missed the start settling behind midfield, 2 wide with cover. Kept on one paced over the concluding stages.
Began awkwardly settling at the tail of the field along the fence. Never really hit top gear in the straight and only plodded to the wire.
Settled back in the event, 3 wide with cover. Just plugged away to the finishing line.
Led early then handed up at the 800m and box seated. Had every chance but struggled in the run to the line.
Travelled 3 back, 1 off with cover. Failed to make any impression in the final stretch.
Away in line but trapped wide. Gradually taken to 2-wide towards rear from 1100M. Shifted out but was held up rounding home turn. Dashed strongly when afforded unimpeded run 250M. Did just enough.
Awkward start. Ridden along and reached 3-wide behind speed from 1100M. Raced 4-wide with leaders home turn. Hit front and had every chance inside 250M. Clung on until final strides.
At rear to final stretch. Made up substantial ground wide home.
Soon taken to 2-wide towards rear. Same position turning in. Kept giving home straight but lacked finishing touch of the front trio.
Raced 4-wide towards rear to home straight. Ran on without threat.
Began well and settled 2-wide at midfield from 1000M. Couldn't turn up a notch home straight.
Pressed early and occupied a forward spot near the fence to home straight. No extra final 250M.
Began awkwardly. Resumed to race 2-wide behind midfield from 1400M. Failed to pick up home straight.
Slow to begin. Soon resumed to race at midfield on fence. Shifted 2-wide home turn. Hard ridden top of home straight but failed to respond.
Behind midfield on fence to home straight. No show thereafter.
3-wide behind midfield throughout. Never progressed.
Shaken up early and raced 2-wide in leading section. Peaked 300M.
Travelled 3-wide with leaders to home straight. Faded passing 400M.
Driven early and sat ahead of midfield on fence. Soon got clear run home straight but found nothing when asked.
Broke well, settled midfield one off, mid-track bid, led 200m out, drew away impressively.
Fair break, reined back to fifth last three off, followed winner through, kept on but outpaced.
Broke fast, led, joined entering turn, went on again, kicked early straight, no answer to winner, weakened slightly late.
Broke well, settled fifth one off, mid-track bid, soon outpaced.
Fair break, up along rail to fourth, inside bid, one pace.
Fair break, ridden up to take third one off, asked for effort early straight, kept on one pace.
Missed break, lost length, up along rail to midfield, blocked for run mid-straight, kept on quite well once free.
Fast away, ridden to share lead one off, challenged early straight, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, not much early speed, third last one off, out for wide bid, found little.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, mid-track bid, no kick.
Fair break fourth last rail, inside bid, no progress.
Fair break, taken back to rear, driven, found little.
Moderate break, second last two off, tried to improve wide turn, found nil.
Fair break, taken back to mid-rear three off, spun off turn for mid-track challenge, led 100m out.
Taken back to rear one off, wide bid, ran on well.
Broke well, third one off, inside bid, kept on well.
Fair break, midfield one off, checked mid-straight, kept on well when clear.
Fair break, midfield two off, wide bid turn, led early straight, headed 100m out, weakened.
Broke well, mid-rear one off, improved turn, short of room mid-straight kept on well once free.
Fair break, midfield rail, inside bid, no extra when slight check late.
Broke well, settled fourth rail, three wide challenge turn, kept on one pace.
Missed break, last early, rail, short of room early straight, kept on quite well.
Taken back to third last one off, slightly short of room mid-straight, ridden, no progress.
Away well, led and crossed, led into straight, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, not much early pace, settled mid-rear rail, inside bid, no progress.
Broke well, led early, headed and settled second, inside bid, found nil.
Pushed early, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, progressed steadily 300M to goal.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, helped by the fast pace, hung in 400M, made ground 200M for 2nd.
Eased to sit behind the pace group, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, suited by the fast tempo, made ground 300m, run ended 100M.

Pushed early but not muster, eased to sit 2.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, moved forward into the lead 800M, dominated 400M, however used up too much fuel in early stages, flattened 150M, checked 100M,
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, made good ground in straight.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, not suited by the fast sectionals, ran on until 150M flattened, checked badly 100M.
Eased to rear, 9Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the fast pace, lack room 4-2, made steady ground when clear.
Bumped start, took rail in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, suited by the fast tempo, ran on fairly in final stages.
Bumped start, took rail behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader, helped by the fast pace, however no progress.
Settled in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, favoured by the fast tempo, flattened 200M.
Hard ridden to keep up at rear, 8.5Ls off the leader on the fence, suited by the fast pace, no progress.
At rear, 7.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, benefited by the fast tempo, no progress.
Allowed to roll forward, led by 1L at fast sectionals, soon weakened 350M.
Slow away, hard ridden forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the fast sectionals, emptied 400M, bumped 350M.
Broke well, settled third rail, pulled out to challenge early straight, led 150m out, kept on.
Broke well, ridden early to second one off, led narrowly early straight, worn down by winner.
Broke well, eased back to midfield one off, shaken up entering straight, ran on.
Fair break, midfield rail, inside bid, ran on well under pressure.
Fair break, back to fourth last two off, inside bid, kept on late.
Broke well, joined leaders on inside, then back to fifth one off, ridden, kept on, no kick.
Fair break, ridden to join leaders three wide, then led, tried to kick early straight, headed, no extra.
Fair break, fourth rail, ridden straight, one pace.
Fair break, not much early, ridden mid-rear rail, shaken up straight, no response.
Moderate break, second last one off, driven, no progress.
Fair break, taken back, last rail, pulled out straight, shaken up, found little.
Missed break slightly, second last rail, inside bid, found nil.
Held up towards the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, responded well when driven early straight, loomed behind leaders inside 200M, led near 50M.
Placed ahead of mid-division, quickened well and hit lead 150M, battled on under pressure over the final stages, caught late.
From wide draw slotted into a 3-wide position in midfield, quickened up nicely inside 400M, rallied when strongly challenged from both sides inside 200M, narrowly missed out.
Taken back to the rear, 8Ls off the pace mid-race, gradually picked up from 400M, strongly pressed final 200M, nearest finish.
Settled 3-wide behind midfield, found clear run from 350M, plugged on but no threat to leaders.
Raced keenly after the start, failed to settle and took a reluctant lead, driven 400M, headed mid-straight, weakened.
Towards the rear, saved ground on the inside, nudged along near 500M, kept on same pace and never got involved in the finish.
Not able to cross from a wide barrier and raced 3-wide just off the pace, kept on one pace and was never a factor.
Held up 2-wide behind midfield, put under pressure inside 400M but never going the pace to challenge, eased final 100M. (Jockey said his horse did not stretch out properly in the Straight.)
Slow to begin, raced as the back marker for most of the way, fanned very wide into the straight, gave very limited response running past beaten runners only.
Tracked leader, ideally placed to strike coming out of bend but didn't pick up, weakened and out of contention nearing 200M.
Prominent and disputed early lead, not quickened under pressure 400M, weakened rapidly over final 150M. (Mucopus.)
Held up in midfield, dropped out right away on straightening, heavily eased. (Bled.)
Broke well, second one off, led mid-straight, soon clear, kept on.
Slightly missed start, midfield one off, inside bid, ran on well, unable to threaten winner.
Broke well, five wide first turn, then fourth two off, ran on very gamely, just caught for second.
Fair break, taken back to third last one off, pulled wide straight, finished very strongly.
Slightly missed jump, up fast to lead and cross, two clear far side, settled in front, tried to kick early straight, weakened.
Fast away, led rail, headed first turn and settled fifth rail, mid-track bid, one pace.
Broke well, not rushed, settled fifth one off, ridden turn, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not rushed, mid-rear one off, improved far side, ridden turn, modest progress.
Moderate break, sluggish early and ridden, fourth last rail, urged turn, driven, modest late progress.
Fair break, not much early, mid-rear rail, shaken up turn, no significant progress.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, wide bid off turn, little progress.
Moderate break, up along rail to midfield, urged entering turn, driven for inside bid, no headway.
Taken back from wide to rear rail, tried to improve turn, no progress.
Broke fast, up to join lead then , driven , weakened quickly.
Angled into midfield from a tricky alley, raced 3 wide with cover in midfield, 4Ls back in run, made effort turning and looked to labour before closing too well last 100m to score easily.
Showed speed, took up front running role, set terms to suit to turn, skipped clear and made rest chase, outdone final 75m.
Taken back from widest alley, nearer to last 7Ls or so away, well back to bend, weaved passage through on worst going and produced big finish for 3rd.
Mustered to take up spot outside leader, travelled well to bend, forced to chase leader from 300m, layed in throughout straight but stuck on well to make frame.
Trapped wide and pressed forward, raced 3 wide without cover, 2ls back working on circle, continued to find in stretch and did well first up only tiring last bit.
Bounced out, faded into a midfield role, raced 2 wide 4Ls or so back, kept on reasonably in straight but didn't quicken as expected to be a factor.
Went back to last from wide alley, raced 8ls away 2 wide, all to beat turning, made good ground under hands and heels to be nearest at finish.
Settled behind midfield 3 wide with cover, 5-6Ls or so away at midpoint, was behind eventual winner turning, closed at one speed.
Planted 3 and 4 wide behind midfield without cover in mid section, 6ls away to bend, made a brief bid turning but weakened after hard run.
Bounced out, ideal trail on leaders back, there but niggled on bend, dropped off without much fight.
Out well enough, assumed box seat 1 out 1 back, had chance to bend, didn't pick up as usual and struggled to go on with it late. (See racing incidents.)
Broke well enough, positioned behind midfield 5-6Ls back on rails, in traffic and checked at 300m, didn't find much thereafter.
Standard jump, settled midfield on the rails, 3-4Ls back, easy time to bend, dropped out tamely.
Not much early pace, back with last few 7Ls away on rails, always rearward thereafter finding them too slick over this trip.
Out in line, took a trail off speed 3Ls away on fence, easy time to bend, looking for a run turning, clear from 300m and dashed well, took control for an easy win.
Pressed forward to slot into 1 out 1 back spot, had ideal trip to bend, came 3 wide at 400m and took control at 300m, no match for winner final 150m.
Went forward from outside gate, posted 3 wide without cover, 3Ls away, kept improving approaching bend, stayed on well given run to just hold 3rd.
Drifted back to race behind midfield 6Ls or so from top end, raced 3 wide with cover, came even wider on bend and made sound progress down middle just missing place.
Ended up in midfield, 5ls away in 2 wide line, every hope from there, caught a bit flat footed but kept working away to be closest at finish.
Posted 3 and 4 wide in midfield 4Ls or so back, did it tough in mid section, didn't quicken but kept working to line well given run.
No early speed, back near last 8Ls away on rails, shared rear with field to beat on turning, closed best of rest making many lengths last 300m.
Settled in midfield 5Ls back in 2 wide line, fair run to bend, angled out but didn't show much turn of foot, made some ground without threatening.
Faded back to rear racing 3 wide with cover, 7Ls or so away on bend, came wider turning and made some progress without looking likely.
Away well, positioned up outside leader, had a fair run to bend, came under pressure at 400m and didn't find, weakened thereafter.
Displayed customary speed to take up running, set decent tempo in front, niggled to hold off challengers at 400m, folded tamely soon after.
Drifted back from a wide gate, bit keen racing 6-7Ls back in running line, still had a job to do turning but lacked customary finish. (See racing incidents.)
Missed start, ridden up to get into an ideal spot behind leaders, within striking distance turning but reluctant to take run, battled away last 300m. (Lame next day.)
Slow to begin, raced 5Ls back on rails behind midfield, struggled and offered little in run home.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Niggled at early, settled just off the speed on rails, just 2Ls off the leader of the main group far side, quickened to challenge upon straightening, hit the front 100 M out, won well.

Soon came in from a wide draw to settle in close up position, led the main group when lone leader broke 4Ls away far side, took lead from tiring pacesetter upon straightening, unable to sustain effort and caught 100M out.
Began fairly travelling wide without cover in midfield early stages, strode forward to travel just off the leader of the main group, still close up turning into straight, ran home at the one pace.
Jostled at start, soon settled towards the rear, saved ground on inside turning for home, ran home steadily without threatening.
Jumped awkwardly losing ground, reluctant to stride out early stages travelling well behind as a consequence, saved ground on rails turning in, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began restrained, travelled well behind, switched wide into straight to only run past well-beaten horses.

Began from the one draw with others, settled in forward of midfield of main group far side, came under pressure to challenge turning in, awkwardly placed behind runner and had to be straightened 200 M out, no extra.
Began moderately, settled in mid-division of main group, went wide into straight, ran home one-paced.
Soon taken back to race in last few, given reminders around the bend, made no impression in the run home. (Tactic questioned.)
Soon took up running, kicked over 4L clear far side, came back to the field rounding home bend, tired noticeably and compounded badly upon straightening.
Began with others, settled just worse than midfield, wide into straight, found nothing under pressure.
Began with others, soon taken back to race in mid-division of main group, remained similar into straight, soon faded. (Irregular heart rhythm.)
Sent forward and dictated terms in front along the paint. Kept finding all the way down the running to make every post a winner.
Wasn't the best to begin then was crowded soon after the start settling midfield the fence. Cornered five deep and closed off soundly.
Was hampered at the start settling back in the field along the rails. Ran on strongly despite having to alter course in the straight to continue into clear running.
Had every possible chance after box seating. Was overhauled inside the final 100m, but held on to stay in the frame.
Crowded at the start settling worse than midfield, found the fence by the 600m. Made some ground in the final stretch without threatening.
Took advantage of a gap near the 600m, settling 1 out 1 back. Loomed up near the furlong before coming up flat over the concluding stages.
Began on terms then was hampered soon after settling 3 wide without cover, midfield. Kept on at the same speed in the run to the line.
Camped in 2nd position, 1 off with cover. Faded inside the final 150m.
Settled 3 pairs back, 2 deep with cover. Only really plodded to the wire.
Settled in last position 1 off with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Parked with the backmakers, 2 wide with cover. Failed to make any impression in the run home.
Shifted in at the 600m and travelled 1 off, behind midfield. Was a beaten horse turning for home.
Shaken up early and maintained a 2-wide position ahead of midfield to home straight. Fought on determinedly to score victory at line.
Began well and raced at midfield on fence to home straight. Rallied along the rail and had every chance 100M. Just failed to fend off winner at post.
Rolled forward from high draw and parked one-off behind pace from first turn. Challenged leader turning in. Kept on well but couldn't contain the front pair.
Ridden early and found the fence behind midfield first turn. Swung wide on straightening. Covered good ground until raced in restricted room final 100M.
Raced 2-wide behind midfield early and middle stages. Came wide rounding home turn. Made steady progress to the line.
Out nicely. Sat behind speed on fence from first turn. Ideal position to strike home straight but lacked the finishing touch of the principals.
Pressed along after start and slotted 2-wide towards rear from first turn. Finished off the race fairly.
Well enough away. Crossed to the fence and led from first turn. Levelled into final stretch. Peaked 250M.
Travelled 3-wide without cover ahead of midfield to home straight. Beaten 250M.
Back with last few on fence always. Never a factor.
Raced 3-wide at rear early. Improved outside field to reach midfield 1000M. Pressured 400M but no progress.
Always at rear. No impression.
Quickly away, led after 50m, headed 800, third rail, challenged 200, pushed out.
Good jump, steadied rear, patiently ridden, came on smartly, just missed.
Quickly away, in touch, shaken up top of straight, kept on under drive.
Quickly away, mini duel back straight, led 600 to straight, no extra 150m out.
Fair jump, settled eighth rail, kept on one pace.
Slowly away, trailed throughout, strong late run.
Clean jump, midfield rail, mid-track bid, no impression.
Swiftly away, taken back to rear, swung wide top of straight, weakly under drive.
Hopped in air start, kept in rear, showed little inside the last 200m.
Quick jump, pressed early pace, mini duel until 600m marker, shaken up again from 300m out, not much left last 100m.
Good jump, raced without cover 3-deep around the course, one pace coming home.
Good break, in touch, asked for more at 450m, pushed out, weakened.
Settled one-off 2Ls behind the speed, quickened well when asked 350 M out, took the lead 150 M out, drew clear.
Slow away, settled one-off 5Ls off the pace, quickened 400 M out, crowded 200 M out, finished off soundly for 2nd.
Urged along to take a one-off spot in midfield, urged along from 400 M, crowded 200 M out, on heels 50 M out, kept on well for 3rd.
Pushed up to lead on rail, quickened 400 M out, caught by winner 150 M out, kept on satisfactorily.
Broke well, settled nicely in midfield on rail, finished off well when asked 300 M but never really threatened the top three.
Cozily placed in the box-seat, responded well when asked 300 M out, kept on until flattened 150 M out.
Prominently placed just behind the leader, kept on satisfactorily when asked 300 M out, one-paced final 100 M.
Settled one from the rear, only made limited progress in the home straight.
Taken back from high draw, made no progress in the home straight.
Settled 2Ls off the pace on rail, one-paced in the home straight.
Taken back from high draw, niggled along at home turn, failed to make up ground in the home straight. (Abraded left fore.)
Travelled wide in a rearward position with no cover, niggled along at home turn, failed to make up any ground.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace and scored.
Eased to rear, 7Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 250M to grab 2nd.
Pushed to take rail and led by 2Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 50M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Midfield, raced keenly, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, dashed well 300M.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 6Ls off the leader, lack room 300M, dashed strongly when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Settled in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Crossed easily and secured box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden early, only kept up in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader on the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 300M, little dash when clear.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, made early move 600M, emptied 250M.
Pushed early but not muster, 6Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, not suited by the slow tempo, no dash.
Pushed early but not muster, trapped 3 wide in midfield, moved forward 800M to sit outside the leader and to take advantages of the slow pace, soon weakened 250M.
Fair break, not rushed, fourth last one off, peeled off for wide bid, quickly overpowered rivals.
Broke well, taken back to rear, followed winner through, ran on.
Broke well, settled midfield rail, out for mid-track bid, ran on, slightly outpaced.
Broke well, aimed for lead but caught five wide, up to third still three wide, narrow lead mid-straight, kept on bravely but no more to give.
Broke fast, led and eventually crossed, kicked entering straight, headed mid-straight, no extra.
Moderate break, ridden, third last rail, inside bid, not much room, kept on, no kick.
Fair break, up to second rail, then fourth rail, urged turn, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, mid-rear two off, ridden entering straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, vied for early lead, then fifth one off, mid-track bid, no progress.
Fair break, midfield one off, ridden early straight, little response.
Fair break, caught four wide, up to second one off, ridden entering straight, weakened.
Slightly missed break, ridden, mid-rear three off, urged but lost ground, wide into straight, found nil.
Restrained to the rear and travelled 3-wide without cover entering back straight, badly hampered nearing 400M and pushed very wide, ran home strongly down outside, got up just in time.
Led uncontested from 1100M, travelled strongly throughout and went 2Ls clear turning for home, looked certain to win going into 100M only to be caught by fast finishing winner near line.
Up with early pace, never far off in 3rd, chased runaway leader from 350M, stayed on well, nearest finish.
Positioned 2-wide behind mid-division, pushed wide nearing 400M, kept on steadily to line, nearest finish.
Settled 2-wide in a position ahead of midfield, pushed along nearing 500M, stayed on final 300M to retain 5th.
Tracked leader in 2nd place, driven out nearing 400M, kept on same pace to the line.
Settled towards the rear after a slow start, saved ground on the inside made some progress early straight but never mustered the speed to get seriously competitive.
Held up in midfield, kept on same pace under pressure, drifted in final 200M and tired up near line.
Caught 3-wide early stages then reigned back to the rear for cover, had 8Ls to make up passing 400M, made limited progress only.
Dropped back towards the tail of the field, gave limited response once in line for home, no impression.
Bagged the inside rail soon after the start and never far off the pace in 4th, shaken up 400M out, not picked up, steadied near 150M and faded out of contention.
In mid-division one off the fence, had to shift out nearing 400M to improve, not quickened under pressure. (Sustained deep laceration wound to right hind.)

Began well, soon taken back to travel just better than midfield, came to challenge shortly after straightening, hit the front inside 200 M, hung on under pressure.
Began fairly, gradually came across from a poor draw to settle wide in midfield, remained similar and wide into straight, fought on under pressure to reach 2nd late.
Slightly slowly away, settled just worse than midfield, made steady progress under pressure in straight to reach 3rd closing stages.
Began fairly from a poor draw, settled not far off in 3rd or 4th, remained similar but reached 2nd briefly home turn, found nothing in the run home. (Lame next day.)
Began fairly, gradually shifted back to last few, obtained a clear passage 300 M out, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Began with others, settled mainly in midfield, similar turning in, one-paced until making some late impression closing stages.
Began awkwardly from the widest draw, soon settled well back, went wide into straight, ran on down centre of straight past well-beaten horses.

Soon taken backward to race in last few on rails, remained well behind throughout far side and around the bend, saved ground on rails turning in, checked and lost position 300 M out, ran home at the one pace.
Ridden along to hold prominent position early, settled mainly in midfield far side, similar turning in, ran home one-paced. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Towards rear, snuck up on rails early in straight, inconvenienced and switched for a rails run 200 M out, made no further impression.

Began well, ceded advantage to FULL HOUSE coming onto back straight, became 3rd when SABINA sped past 1100 M out, remained prominent in main group until finding on extra 300 M out. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Began restrained, gradually taken back to race towards the rear and wide without cover far side and around the bend, made no impression in straight.

Well back early stages, let go and rushed up to lead 1000 M out, kicked over 5Ls away rounding home bend, tiring badly when headed under pressure 200 M out. (Jockey said horse pulled hard and saddled shifted when tactic questioned.)
Began awkwardly, advanced to take up running over 1600 M out, set steady pace down far side until headed halfway out, chased leader into straight, gradually weakened.
Settled behind midfield towards the grandstand side. Obtained runs through the field and responded when asked for an effort near the 250m to win nicely.
Tracked the leaders along the stand side. Hit the lead near the 150m, maintained a good gallop right to the wire.
Took its time to eventually cross and settle on the speed racing 3-4 off the outside rail after the 500m. Tired inside the final 50m.
Settled midfield towards the far side of the track. Kept on evenly over the concluding stages.
Began awkwardly then mustered to lead along the grandstand side. Faded inside the last furlong.
Travelled behind the leaders on the stand side. Battled on only fairly in the run to the post.
Camped inside the leader along the stand side. Was a beaten horse passing the 300m.
Raced towards the middle of the course, in a midfield position. Only plodded to the line.
Parked behind the speed about 3 off the outside fence. Commenced to tire inside the final 150m.
Settled back in the field near the centre of the course. Failed to make any impression at the business end of the race.
Travelled about 5 off the stand side rail, midfield. Never fired when placed under pressure.
Travelled behind the speed nearer to the centre of the track. Struggled a long way from home.
Never properly travelled and was well beaten after settling behind midfield, towards the middle of the course. (See Racing Incident.)
Tailed the field for most of the race and finished distant. To trial before racing again.
Quickly into stride. Taken to sit 2-wide ahead of midfield to home turn. Swung 3-wide and was 3Ls down into final stretch. Battled determinedly to repel rivals home.
Travelled wide and without cover behind midfield to home turn. Moved closer approaching home straight. Loomed as a serious threat 250M. Fended off by the winner narrowly.
Raced 2-wide at midfield to home straight. Every chance final furlong but couldn't sustain effort closing stages.
At rear despite effort of rider. Same position turning into home. Finished off well through runners inside 350M to make frame.
Soon switched to rear. Swung widest on straightening. Made up good ground without threatening the principals.
Began well. Settled 2-wide behind speed to home straight. Ideal position to strike but was one-paced to conclude.
Away in line. Gradually taken to 2-wide behind midfield from 1500M. Dropped towards rear home turn. Made decent progress home straight.
2-wide in leading section to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch when asked 350M. Weakened final 100M.
3-wide towards rear to home straight. Came wide turning into home. Ran on fairly.
Never better than midfield on fence early and middle stages. No improvement home straight.
Behind midfield on fence back straight. Dropped towards rear rounding home turn. No impression thereafter. (Substantial amount of blood in horse's trachea.)
Led on fence until faded 250M.
Ahead of midfield on fence to home straight. Beaten soon after straightening.
Settled one-off close to the pace, kicked 350 M and took the lead at the 200 M, kept on soundly to score.
Slow away, pushed to catch up a one-off spot in midfield, quickened when clear 350 M out, finished off strongly for 2nd.
Settled cozily on rail in midfield, ran on well when clear 250 M, kept on for 3rd. (Lost right front plate.)
Prominently placed on rail just behind the leaders, bumped 300 M out, kept on fairly when asked for efforts, rather one-paced.
Slow away and crowded, settled on rail in the mid-division, on heels 800 M out, blocked early straight, made up gradual ground when clear 250 M out.
Taken to the rear from high draw, finished off soundly down the outside of the home straight but never really threaten the principals.
Jumped fast, settled one-out-one-back, held ground until flattened 200 M out.
Lacked early speed and travelled one from the rear, made up gradual ground final 300 M.
Pushed up to share the lead on rail, passed 700 M out, bumped 300 M out, held ground until flattened 200 M out.
Bump start, taken rearward from high draw, only made limited progress in the home straight.
Lacked early speed, ended up settling one-off in midfield, failed to make up any ground.
Bump start, restrained to midfield but still caught wide, failed to cover any ground.
Pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, quickened 700 M out, headed 300 M out, soon weakened.
Caught wide with no cover in midfield, flattened 300 M out, soon weakened.
Settled cozily on rail just behind the pace, on heels 800 M out, easily ran up to lead 250 M out, won impressively.
Lacked early speed and travelled just behind the mid-division, blocked early straight, kicked strongly when clear 200 M out, ran on for 2nd.
Out in line, urged along to hold a one-off spot in midfield, on heels 800 M out, blocked early straight, quickened well when clear 250 M out, ran on for 3rd.
Check start, lacked early speed and travelled two from the rear, finished off satisfactorily when asked 400 M out, never really threatened the top three.
Given a waiting ride and travelled rearward, on heels 350 M out, finished off soundly final 300 M, checked 150 M out, not fully tested.
Pushed up to the front, held ground, could not offer extra final 150m.
Pushed up early, caught 3-wide with no cover just off the speed, held ground, no extra final 150 M. (Mucus.)
Bump start, urged along to share the lead on rail, headed by winner 200 M out, no extra.
Settled nicely in midfield, kept on until flattened 150 M out.
Urged along early, caught 3-wide with cover just off the pace, held ground, no extra final 200 M.
Pushed up to share the lead on 3-deep, flattened 250 M out, soon faded.
Slow away, lacked early speed and travelled at the rear, raced greenly, made no progress.
Urged along to take a fence position in midfield, held ground until got tired 250 M out, soon faded.
Taken back from the widest gate, no response when asked, never a factor.
Settled in prominent spot, 2Ls off the leader 3 wide, benefited by the very slow tempo, closed off strongly 300M to score.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the very slow tempo, lack room 4-2, dashed strongly when clear and grabbed 2nd.
Midfield, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300M despite not suited by the very slow pace.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, raced very keen, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the very slow pace.
Eased back for cover, 8Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the very slow pace, dashed well 250M, on heels 100M.
Settled 1.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Took rail and led easily by 1.5Ls at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M flattened.
Slow away, pushed forward, 3.5Ls off the slow pace, trapped 4 wide and raced too keen, made early move 800M, flattened 250M.
Eased to rear, 8Ls off the leader 3 wide, harmed by the very slow pace, little dash 300M, run ended 150M.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the very slow tempo, weakened 300M.
Awkward away, checked early, 6.5Ls off the leader 3 wide, raced very keen, harmed by the very slow tempo, no dash.
Pushed early but not muster, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the very slow pace, no progress.
Checked early, not suited by the very slow pace, never competitive at back.
Broke well, settled third rail, challenged three wide entering straight, led 150m out, kept on strongly.
Broke well, led rail, headed and settled second, narrow lead mid-straight, kept on well.
Broke well, second one off until went on far side, headed mid-straight, kept on.
Fair break, settled third last rail, inside bid, kept on quite well.
Steadied early, fourth last one off, wide bid, ran on, no kick
Broke well, slightly fresh early, midfield rail, ridden straight, kept on but unable to challenge.
Moderate break, taken back second last one off, wide bid kept on one pace.
Taken back to rear, last into straight, wide bid, one pace.
Fair break, fourth one off, ridden early straight, found little.
Guided to a 2-wide position with cover from 14, travelled strongly in midfield throughout, unleashed a powerful run from 400M with minimum urging, lead near 100M, won unextended.
Dropped back, held up in last pair, difficult to settle mid stages, stayed on well final 400M despite hanging in, got up for 2nd late but the winner belongs to a different class.
Led from the off and set a decent clip mid race, opened up a sizable lead passing 300M, headed inside 150M, weakened and lost 2nd close home.
Crossed to a midfield position along the inside, held up 400m to 200M, finished well and would have been closer.
Positioned 3-wide towards the rear, about 6Ls behind leader turning in, ran on steadily from off the pace, in contention for a minor placing final 200M but flattened late stages.
Chased leader but caught 3-wide without cover, lacked the needed response when called upon, outpaced final 150M.
Placed ahead of midfield, kept on one pace and never looked like getting to the leaders.
Not hurried after the start, held up near the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, kept on same pace in straight and ran past beaten runners only.
Slow to begin, quickly recovered to race prominent behind leader, not quickened turning in, failed to keep pace final 150M.
Towards the rear along the inside, urged along passing 500M but never going the pace to challenge.
Not far off the pace, steadied near 600M, failed to respond inside 250M and gradually gave way.
Chased the pace 2-wide, kept within striking distance until weakening inside 300M.
Raced keenly in midfield, turned 3-wide home bend, found little when pressed nearing 400M, eased when well beaten mid-straight.
Settled at the back well off the pace, saved ground on the inside but didn't have a clear crack turning in, held up mid-straight and was eased over final stages.
Quickly away, raced 3-deep without cover on the pace entire trip, strong response under an all out drive, led on line.
Broke sideways, ridden to recover, found spot behind pace along rail in third, long drive from 400m out, hard fight, just missed.
Bumped hard after break, backmarker one off, powerful late run.
Broke in air, rear rail, good gain late, no match for first three.
Broke left, recovered at once, second one-off, shaken up top of straight, led briefly 300m out, one pace late.
Broke sideways, one off ninth, ran on well, no match.
Quickly away, one off sixth, ran on evenly.
Broke sideways, chased speed and led after 100m rail, all out, one pace.
Fair break, kept in rear one off eleventh, passed tired horses late.
Clean break, twelfth 3-deep with cover, driven, outpaced.
Sluggish start, tenth rail, inside bid, one pace.
Good break, asked for speed, one off in fourth, found nil when asked.
Clean break, 3-deep seventh, widest of all top of straight, little response.
Broke well, taken back to midfield rail, finished weakly, beaten 200m out.
Began well, positioned nicely behind speed 3Ls back on rails, all favours to bend, came clear and to middle turning, let down strongly and drew away inside 100m to win well.
Plenty of early speed, took up running and set terms to suit, challenged turning, fought well but condition gave out inside 150m and winner came over top.
Angled in behind pace group 3rd pair back in running line, 3Ls or so down to bend, kept grinding away in straight and snared 3rd final 50m.
Ended up in a midfield spot, 5-6Ls back in 2 wide line, even run although pace not to suit, closed evenly to make frame.
Drifted back from a tricky draw, 3 wide behind midfield in mid section, 6-7Ls back without cover, widest turning and made good progress given trip to just miss frame.
Crowded early and taken back, back with last few 7Ls away in 2 wide line, pace was against in mid section, closed soundly from rear in stretch to be nearest in line.
Pressed on to take ideal spot outside leader, had nice run to turn, leveled up at 400m, place chance to 100m but just faded out last bit.
Showed some early toe, dropped in behind leader for an ideal trail, no excuses with slow tempo, one paced in straight and just battled in behind them.
Restrained from a wide alley, raced at tail on rails 10Ls back, not aided by slow speed, still plenty to do turning, made ok progress from too far back to be closest on line.
No early speed, settled in rear division, 7Ls or so back on rails, pace against to turn, made only minor ground in straight.
Began smartly, occupied spot 1 out 1 back, all favours with steady speed to bend, niggled turning but lacked extra gear, battled final 200m.
Drifted back, settled behind midfield, 2 wide, 6Ls back, bit keen when speed slowed, same margin down turning, didn't really get into it.
Raced behind midfield on rails, 6Ls off leaders, average pace not to suit, saved ground on bend, didn't close off final 200m.
Went back from an awkward draw, at rear best part of 8-9Ls back, pace against and had field to beat on bend, never really got into it.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began with others, virtually made all holding slender advantage most of way until joined early in straight, fought on to just prevail final strides.

Began with others, settled just off the speed in 5th within 3Ls of pace, made headway around the bend to dispute lead early in straight, held every chance but unable to sustain effort inside final 80 M.

Began in line with others, circled the field around stables bend to reach 3rd without cover down far side, and then just outside leader from 800 M out and a joint leader entering straight, unable to sustain effort close to home.
Broke well, settled just off the pace mainly in 4th on rails, in similar box-seat position entering straight, failed to quicken to challenge.
Tardy start, settled in midfield on rails, did not find much room early in straight, made up some late ground closing stages.
Broke well from a poor draw, taken back for cover travelling in rear of midfield, remained wide and with cover at times to straight, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began awkwardly, checked early when taken in for inside run, saved ground home turn, fought on steadily past well-beaten horses close to home.
Raced awkwardly briefly early, soon picked up to race outside leader coming out of stables bend, lost position over 800 M out, ran home one-paced.
Began with others but quickly dropped backward to last few, made a forward move when widest around home bend, produced little impression in the run home.
Began with others, gradually settled just worse than midfield, ran on past well-beaten horses in straight.
Slowly away, soon improved to a wide in midfield position, made short-lived effort out wide to gain close order rounding home bend, faded gradually under pressure inside final 300 M.
Slowly away, settled towards the rear, made headway on rails coming out of back straight, saved ground on inside entering home straight, ran home one-paced.
Slow out, always well behind, no danger.
Midfield early, dropped away quickly from halfway out.
Camped on the speed, 2 wide with another runner to its outside. Worked to the lead near the 200m and dug deep to fight of late challenge.
Settled prominently, 3 deep with cover. Swung the home turn five wide and stayed on gamely in the run to the line.
Made its run third from the rear, 1 off with cover. Finished off strongly to snare third.
Parked in a handy position, 2 wide with cover. Kept on well over the final stages to finish in the frame.
Travelled strongly in a midfield position, 2 deep with cover. Ranged up widest at the 200m, but peaked on its run 100m out.
Posted 3 wide without cover whilst travelling outside the leading duo. Maintained a sound gallop right to the wire.
Travelled in last position 2 wide with cover, settled along the fence on the circle. Tacked onto the field approaching the home turn and made late ground without threatening.
Settled toward the rear along the fence with cover. Battled away one paced in the final stretch.
Blundered at the start, lost ground and settled 3-4 wide behind midfield. Never a factor.
Bustled to the lead ad crossed to the fence leaving the 700m. Straightened a length in advance but faded over the last 150m.
Travelled at the rear of the field 3 deep with cover. Failed to close off.
Hard ridden in the early and middle stages to take up a position on the back of the leader along the paint. Was a beaten horse after the final furlong. (See Racing Incidents.)
Pushed early and raced towards rear. Made run 3-wide 500M. Finished off strongly and prevailed near the post.
Pressured early and occupied prominent spot home turn. Fought on well but lacked finishing touch of the winner.
Driven forward but couldn't cross. Caught 3-wide without cover in leading section to home straight. Kept on well and hit front final furlong. Failed to repel the front pair closing stages.
Well enough away but trapped wide. Raced 3-wide behind midfield approaching home turn. Progressed steadily 500M and was 3Ls down into final stretch. Kept on and made frame at line.
Niggled early. Shared lead on fence from 800M. One-paced to conclude.
2-wide behind midfield to home turn. Got closer turning into home. Plugged on to the line.
Hard ridden early and raced 2-wide in the pace group to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch thereafter.
Slow to begin and was detached early despite effort of rider. Tacked on the back of the field passing 400M. Beat tired runners home.
Back with last few always. Never looked dangerous.
Away in line but trapped wide. Gradually dropped towards rear home turn. Never recovered.
Niggled early and raced in a forward spot wide. Dropped out from home turn and was well beaten soon after home straight.
Shaken up early to hold the fence ahead of midfield. Couldn't quite follow passing 600M. Faded soon after straightening.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, urged approaching turn, wide bid, finished strongly to lead 100m out, drew away.
Fair break, midfield rail, ridden approaching straight, ran on well to lead 200m out, winner too strong.
Fair break, taken back and held up last, wide bid, ran on well.
Well away, settled back fifth rail, found gap mid-straight, not pace to challenge.
Broke fast, aimed for lead, caught six wide first turn, three wide thereafter, one pace straight.
Fair break, midfield rail, short of room straight, kept on.
Fair break, fourth last one off, wide bid, modest progress.
Fair break, through on rail to lead, kicked early straight, headed, weakened.
Broke well, joined leading group three wide, ridden early straight, no extra.
Fair break, midfield one off, ridden, one pace.
Fair break, sat behind leaders rail, ridden, no progress.
Moderate start, taken back, third last, ridden before straight, no real progress.
Missed break, second last rail, back to last turn, found very little.
Broke well, aimed for lead, second one off, second into straight, weakened quickly.
Fair break, found rail fifth, led 150m out, in charge thereafter.
Broke fast but sixth three wide, ridden to lead 200m out, no extra.
Fair break, taken back near rear, peeled wide turn, finished well.
Fair break, midfield one off, finished well to move into third, just caught for place.
Fast away, second one off, ridden early straight, kept on, no kick.
Fair break, caught three wide then forced further wide at turn, widest bid, kept on but unable to challenge.
Taken back, second last rail, kept on through traffic straight but unable to challenge.
Broke well, third rail, short of room when leader dropped back on him, kept on one pace.
Taken back from wide, pulling early, settled rear, mid-track bid, modest progress.
Missed break, mid-rear rail, improved turn, inside bid, faded.
Broke well, restrained midfield but three wide, ridden, one pace.
Fair break, moved fast to lead, led by a length into straight, ridden, weakened quickly.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, checked 1200M, raced very keen, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M to win by a short head.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed well 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow pace, closed the race off strongly 200M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leaders on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300M.
Shared lead easily 2 wide at slow sectionals, hung on until 150M flattened.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 3 wide, bumped 1200M, moved forward 900M to take advantageous of the slow pace, ran on until 150M flattened.
Midfield on the fence, 3.5Ls off the leaders, checked 1200M, raced very keen, not suited by the slow tempo, lack room 400M, dashed well.
Eased at start to cross behind the field, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, blocked most straight, dashed well to the line.
Eased back as usual, 6Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Eased back, bumped 1200M, 4Ls off the leaders 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, moved forward 800M, ran on ok in straight.
Box seat, favoured by the slow tempo, soon weakened 300M.
Took rail easily and shared lead at advantageous slow sectionals, however soon dropped off 400M.
Broke well, midfield rail, split came early straight, inside bid to lead late, just held on.
Moderate break, not speed to lead early, midfield four wide, six wide into straight, kept on very strongly, just failed.
Well away, ridden, eventually reached lead but unable to cross, led until 100m out, kept on for third.
Broke well, joined leaders then back to midfield one off, short of room mid-straight, ran on well late.
Fair break, not much early speed, third last rail, inside bid, short of room, kept on.
Moderate break, up to join leaders one off, drive, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not rushed, midfield three wide, ridden, kept on one pace.
Fair break, last and found nil early despite urging, closed up turn, inside bid, had to wait for run, kept on.
Fair break, caught three wide, driven, one pace.
Moderate break, third last one off, wide bid, one pace.
Fair break, not much early speed, second last one off, inside bid, no progress.
Ridden from gate to lead, headed turn, driven, weakened quickly.
Travelled strongly in 5th place 4Ls off the pace, showed his class with a powerful turn of foot final 250M, led near 100M and lengthened away from the consistent runner-up.
Tracked leader, wrestled the lead nearing 200M, kept on well but could not match winner's turn of foot inside 150M.
Taken back to last about 8Ls behind leader, switched wide passing 600M, never looked like getting to the first two but ran on best of the rest to claim 3rd in a blanket finish.
Slow to begin, settled behind midfield along the rails, ran on steadily up the inside for a never threatening 4th.
Chased leaders, couldn't sprint with the first 2 when the race got serious, kept on to 100M then faded and lost 3rd near line.
Close up in 4th, well placed to strike turning in, not pace of first 2 inside 300M, flattened out late stages.
Began awkwardly and lost ground, settled in 2nd last 7Ls off the pace, hung in over the final straight and was difficult to ride as usual, stayed on.
Slow to begin, slotted into a 2-wide spot just behind midfield, made some progress turning in and was in contention for a minor placing 200M out, one paced late stages.
Dropped back to near last, inclined to hang out over the turn, made limited progress final 350M running past beaten runners only.
Soon bustled along but not going the pace to reach the lead, 3-wide no cover turning, kept on same pace final 350M.
In midfield, guided to the fence before the turn, not quickened when asked, no impression.
Sped off to the lead and took them along at a good pace, headed inside 200M, weakened rapidly late stages.

Broke well, held slender lead on rails for first 300 M before taken back to track the leader, remained in box-seat on rails to home turn, responded well in straight to take command 200 M out, won well.
Began with others, ridden to gain prominent shortly after the start, improved to outside leader rounding home bend, unable to match winner's late burst of speed inside final 100 M.
Not far off, dropped slightly backward after the Rock, renewed effort home bend, met slight interference passing 300 M, fought on doggedly to snatch 3rd final strides.

Began fairly, ridden along in close-up position to keep pace with leaders, carried backward 800 M out though soon recovered lost ground, fought on steadily under pressure from 2Ls back into straight, denied 3rd late.
Vied for early lead under pressure, took up running when leader under restraint and crossed to rails 700 M out, led to 250 M and weakened under pressure.
Hard ridden early, settled just worse than midfield to straight, kept on same pace without quickening while drifting and a difficult ride in the run home.

Began from the 12 gate, travelled in midfield and very wide without cover throughout far side, came under pressure briefly passing the Rock, widest turning in, went past well-beaten horses in the run home.
Contested lead from a poor draw, settled prominent with cover in a 3-wide spot, remained same through to straight, gradually faded under pressure. (Blood in trachea.)
Well back, made slight progress 800 M out, dropped backward to last turning in, found nothing in straight.
Drawn wide, hard ridden for pace early, remained in prominent positions down far side, unable to sustain effort from approaching home straight.
Close up early, ridden along when tightened and lost position on 1000 M bend, dropped to tail-end 800 M out, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Sluggish at start, always well behind on rails.
Made its run from midfield, 2 deep with cover. Hit the straight 3 wide, swept to the lead near the 100m and had the race in its keeping soon after.
Settled in 2nd position outside the leader. Held a narrow advantage at the furlong but was overhauled inside the 50m.
Copped a check early, settling in 2nd last position, along the rail. Worked off the fence after the 800m, swung widest in the home stretch and ran on with plenty of purpose.
Camped in 5th position, 2 wide with cover. Stayed on well, but flattened out over the final stages.
Worked across from the outside gate to eventually cross & lead along the paint after the 1100m. Was collared near the furlong and faded soon after.
Parked worse than midfield along the paint. Cornered five deep, passed tiring runners over the concluding stages.
Enjoyed the box seat after drawing a low gate. Had every chance but failed to capitalize.
Rated behind midfield1 off with cover after being checked off heels near the 1400m. Failed to close off.
Crowded near the 1400m and settled midfield the fence. Kept to the inside in the final stretch but failed to make any impression.
Travelled 2-3 deep, with some cover towards the rear of the field. Was carried out into a 3 wide line after the 900m and was never a threat thereafter.
Settled in last position along the fence. Struggled in the straight.
Posted 3 wide without cover whilst travelling in a prominent position. Never a factor.
Raced behind midfield on fence early. Moved closer and shifted 2-wide home turn. Swung wider into final stretch. Rallied on and powered clear closing stages.
Raced at rear on fence. Took inside run turning in. Finished off well to snatch 2nd at post but no hope with the winner.
Travelled 3-wide in a forward spot early. Slotted 2-wide behind leaders home turn. Shifted out for clear run on straightening. Ran on steadily and lost 2nd at post.
Urged along the fence to hold a spot behind pace group to home straight. One-paced to conclude.
Away in line. Gradually taken to race towards rear. Closed off the race fairly well and nearly made frame. (bled from both nostrils).
Began well. Elected to race 3-wide behind midfield before home turn. Taken wider passing 500M. Covered decent ground late.
Niggled along and shared lead on fence from the Rock. Couldn't turn up a notch home straight.
Pressed forward and eventually parked outside leader 500M. Peaked final furlong.
2-wide at midfield early and middle stages. Came wide turning into home for clear run but never picked up.
Driven early but insufficient speed to lead. Gradually dropped behind midfield. No show home straight.
Travelled 3-wide behind midfield to home straight. No impression thereafter. (Mild abrasion wound to the inside of the left hind fetlock.)
With leaders early. Dropped out from home turn. Beaten soon after straightening. (Cut wound to the upper left hind cannon.)
Broke well, settled midfield rail, then switched to one off, wide bid, ran on strongly to lead near line.
Away well, up to share early lead, settled third rail, inside bid, led 200m out, soon 2 lengths clear, caught close home.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, bit eager, settled fourth last one off, ridden entering straight, ran on late but unable to challenge.
Took pull leaving gate, held up mid-rear rail, improved turn, mid-track bid, short of room and slight check 200m out, kept on well when clear.
Broke well, taken back to mid-rear one off, mid-track bid, ducked in slightly, moved wide and ran on well.
Away well, joined leadrs three wide, then settled second one off, shared lead three off early straight, weakened slightly late.
Well away, joined leaders three wide, then settled second one off, shared lead three off early straight, weakened late.
Taken back, third last rail, kept on one pace.
Out quickly, led and crossed first turn and until mid-straight, ridden, weakened.
Away well, settled fifth rail, wandered when ridden for inside bid, found very little.
Fair break, taken back to second last one off, mid-track bid, found nil.
Moderate start, rear rail, already bustled entering back straight but still well adrift home turn, no improvement.
Broke well, settled midfield rail, improved approaching turn, inside bid, ran on strongly to lead 50m out.
Fair break, midfield rail, ridden to improve turn, wide bid, led, headed 50m out.
Broke fast, joined leaders, then back to fifth one off, peeled off for wide bid, ran on late but unable to challenge.
Broke quickly, urged to fourth rail, lost places as field quickened approaching turn, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Broke well, up wide to join leaders, three wide first turn, settled second one off, led into straight, driven, one pace.
Steadied start, second last rail, stuck to rail for inside bid, tried to follow winner through, kept on.
Fair break, up to join leaders three wide, settled fourth one off, up to challenge entering straight, ridden, weakened.
Moderate start, ridden early but last, three lengths adrift, driven when losing further ground as field quickened, wide bid, but passed only beaten horses.
Taken back to second last one off, pulled out for wide bid, little response.
Lost length start, mid-rear one off, hard ridden from turn, little response.
Fair break, up to early lead, led or shared lead until home turn, ridden, weakened quickly.
Hard ridden to sit outside the lead, enjoyed the slow sectionals, closed off strongly to score.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leaders 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, dashed well 250M for 2nd.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, dashed strongly 200M despite not suited by the slow pace and took 3rd.
Hold the rail easily and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 150M flattened.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader on the fence, little dash 250 despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, however soon weakened 250M.
Eased back, 4Ls off the leaders, trapped 4-5 wide throughout and lost ground, harmed by the slow pace, still ran on well in straight despite all negative racing situations.
Eased to rear and took rail, 6.5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok in final stages.
Eased to sit 2Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, not suited by the slow tempo, emptied in straight.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, weakened 250M.
Broke fast, taken back to fourth last one off, wide run, led 150m out, easily.
Broke well, fourth one-off, then rail, inside bid, led briefly 200m out until headed by winner.
Fast away, led rail until headed entering last 200m, kept on one pace.
Broke well, up one off to lead, but unable to cross, headed turn, kept on well mid-track.
Fair break, taken back to midfield one off, improved turn, short of room straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well, ridden to join leaders but lacked pace, back to fifth one off, mid-track bid kept on one pace until weakened slightly late.
Broke well, taken back second last rail, head high, kept on quite well once he got the hang of things.
Fair break, joined leaders three off, ran wide turn, no impression thereafter.
Missed break, ridden early but three lengths last, still urged, well adrift into straight, ran on past beaten horses late.
Sluggish start, third last rail, made ground into midfield 200m out, no extra late.
Slightly missed break, up to midfield two off, wide bid, no progress.
Fair break, ridden to join lead but lacked pace, soon dropped back on rail, driven straight, found nil.
Tracked leaders in 3rd, poised to strike passing 400M, ran on well to lead inside 200M, drifted out under pressure final stages but had enough in hand to secure victory.
Taken across behind runners, raced in 2nd last 8-9Ls off the pace, came out and driven inside 500M, finished fastest outside to go 2nd close home but never looked like catching the winner.
Given a waiting ride, settled well in a rearward position 7Ls back, stayed on for 3rd without threatening the winner.
Led slowly early stages, increased tempo from 1200M, headed passing 200M, kept on same pace final stages.
In 4th spot never far off the pace, had every chance turning in, kept on same pace final 200M.
Tracked leader one out one back, ideally placed to strike turning home, battled on under urging final 300M but lacked the needed late kick, one paced final stages.
Settled behind midfield and had an uneventful trip to straight, responded fairly turning in and never going the pace to challenge.
Held up in midfield along the fence, nudged along halfway round the final turn but made only limited progress, run ended nearing 100M.
Positioned 2-wide in midfield but raced keenly middle stages, no impression in straight and inclined to lay in final 300M.
Caught 3-wide without cover in midfield, came under pressure inside 500M, had little left final 250M.
Awkwardly away and lost ground, ended up 10Ls back in last, struggled to keep up home turn, eased when well beaten mid-straight.
Not fast away, urged to midfield rail, driven for mid-track bid, led and hung left slightly, hung on.
Fair break, taken back to second last rail, improved turn, made good ground straight but hung in behind winner who also drifted out slightly, objection overruled.
Broke well, midfield rail, improved rail turn, ran on well when gap appeared, first two just too strong.
Good break, led rail, headed entering turn but drove back up inside, led straight until headed 100m out, kept on one pace.
Reined back from wide draw, last one off not quite settled, inside run, kept on late but unable to challenge.
Fair break, up wide to join leaders, led entering turn but unable to cross, headed, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, fifth one off, ridden turn, wide bid, kept on one pace.
Broke well, not rushed, midfield one off, wide bid, only modest progress.
Broke well, led one off entering turn but unable to cross, reined back to fourth one off, mid-track bid, weakened.
Moderate break, mid-rear three off, wide bid, found little.
Fair break, taken back to third last one off, last into straight, ridden, passed one.
Fair break, ridden for lead but caught four wide, ridden before straight, swung wider, found nil.
Angled into a midfield role, had pace against in mid section, improved approaching bend, closed improved approaching bend, best wide out and came over top gaining lead in final 50m.
Drifted back to occupy spot behind midfield 6ls back, not helped by steady tempo, let down well and dashed strongly being denied narrowly late.
Away well enough, camped on leaders back, all favours in the run with slow speed, angled back to inside turning and in mix before overtaken final 100m.
Began with slightly more purpose and raced behind midfield 6Ls away on rails, not helped by steady tempo, took inside runs turning and worked home well to make frame.
Average jump but ended up just behind pace group, 3Ls or so away on rails, easy time with slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Pressed on and settled outside leader, helped by slow pace, all favours to turn when pace quickened, tightened at 200m but proved one paced at business end.
Ended up 3 wide when going forward, faced breeze 1-2Ls off lead, aided by steady tempo, close enough on turning but struggled to pick up and just one speed in straight. (See Racing Incidents.)
Plenty of early speed to take up running, set slow tempo in front, had terms to suit to bend, average response when tackled and weakened.
Drifted back from a tricky alley to race at rear on rails, harmed by slow pace, well back turning, made some progress before checked at 150m, no real look in thereafter.
Dropped in just behind first few, had ideal run in 1 out 1 back spot, right there turning but crowded at 150m, not able to be ridden out thereafter.
Drifted back to settle off midfield form a wide alley, raced 3 wide with cover, pace against in mid section, niggled turning and didn't improve. (See Racing Incidents.)
Taken down to rear from wide alley, slow pace didn't help chances, always well back, never really threatened. (See Racing Incidents re hanging and bit pulling through.)

Began well, took up running 1000 M out and soon crossed to rails, held comfortable lead throughout to win easily.
Began well, settled in 3rd within 3Ls of pace, soon came to challenge upon straightening, gained 2nd 200 M out but winner too strong.
Began well, driven along to chase leader, headed by eventual second 200 M out when failed to quicken under pressure.
Travelled keenly in midfield, commenced run on top of home bend, gained 4th into straight, one-paced.
Broke with others, settled in midfield on rails, kept on steadily in straight.
Settled just worse than midfield, kept on steadily in straight.
Settled in last few, saved a lot of ground turning in, kept on same pace in straight.
Began from the widest gate, soon taken back to the tail-end, saved ground on the turn, ran past well-beaten runners.
Began fairly, soon dropped back to one from last, commenced run passing 500 M and went widest into straight, one-paced.
Began with others, prominent early, gradually shuffled backward up the Rock to be just better than midfield, soon faded in straight.
Began from a wide gate, remained wide without cover in midfield most of way to straight, gradually weakened.
Began with others, settled towards the rear, dropped to last into straight, made no other impression.
Enjoyed all the favors settling 3 back the fence. Speared through along the inside to take the lead near the furlong and maintained a good gallop right to the wire.

Checked on jumping settling worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Peeled out to race 3 deep with cover after the 600m, left a bit flatfooted approaching the home turn. Responded well to pressure closing off nicely.
Midfield on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, lacked room 200M, dashed well for 3rd.
Camped midfield, 2 wide with cover. Ranged up as some hope near the furlong, before peaking on its run 100m out. Stayed on to make the frame.
Led along the paint setting slow early fractions. Dictated terms nicely but couldn't capitalize and weakened inside the last 100m.
Slotted in 1 out 1 back by the time the field had settled after the 1200m. Rounded the home bend about 5 deep and finished off evenly after being disappointed for running near the 150m.
Had every possible chance after sitting outside the leader. Was running on empty over the final stages, no excuses.
Travelled in last position along the fence. Only plodded to the line.
Settled with the backmakers along the paint after being checked at the start. Found little when asked for an effort in the home straight.
Camped midfield, got cover after the 1200m, and settled 3 deep. Failed to make any appreciable ground in the final stretch.
Taken back from a wide barrier and settled at the rear, 1 of with cover. Peeled out and attempted to roll forward after the 600m. Found little and struggled in the run home.
Raced prominently but was posted 3 wide without cover for most of the trip. Never likely weakening noticeably over the concluding stages. (See Racing Incident report).
Urged and raced 2-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Improved 4-wide turning in. Battled determinedly home straight to snatch victory at post.
Eased to sit 2-wide towards rear after start. Took inside run rounding home turn. Dashed well through runners home straight. Just failed to score at the line.
Failed to muster early despite effort of rider. Raced on fence behind midfield to home straight. Picked up satisfactorily but couldn't repel the front pair near the post.
Quickly into stride and settled 2-wide behind leader to home straight. Every chance but lacked the finishing touch of the front trio closing stages.
Away in line and was taken to sit 2-wide at midfield first turn. Swung widest turning into home. Made up good ground to make frame.
Prominent spot to home straight but was one-paced to conclude.
Taken to race 2-wide behind midfield after start. Made up minor ground late.
Ridden early and sat on fence at midfield. Came wide for clear run into final stretch. Plugged on thereafter.
Soon in a forward spot and took lead on fence from the Rock. Held a 1L advantage leaving the bend. Hung on until no extra final 100M.
At rear to home straight. Ran on without threat.
Trailed field to home straight. Beat a tired runner home.
Raced 2 to 3-wide behind pace to home straight. Weakened 250M and dropped out thereafter. (Bled from both nostrils.)
Squeezed and slowed from the barrier, midfield rail, came through 200m out, ran on strongly to lead 100m out.
Fair jump, kept in rear, perfect 3-wide covered trip, all out and just got up for second on the line.
Good jump, disputed early lead, then 3-deep without cover whole trip midfield, challenged turn, led briefly, kept on stubbornly for third.
Fair jump, mid-division one off without using too much energy, wide bid, all out for fourth.
Fair jump but bumped hard, disputed lead rail, easy lead in slow fractions back straight, outsprinted, stayed on last 200m.
Bumped hard and taken back, one off tenth, first one to fire from 500m out 5-deep, widest of all home turn, stayed on until last 100m.
Quickly away, chased early pace, one-off easy second in slow fractions, outpaced coming home.
Good jump, prominent, easily one-out in fourth, ridden, not quicken, no threat.
Awkward jump, second last one off, shaken up 450m out, one pace.
Jumped well, settled in last, checked 450m, not quicken.
Broke sideways, recovered and found rail in 3rd, ridden top of straight, slightly hampered 200m out, weakened.
Poor jump hopped in air and trailed at once, shaken up rail entering the straight, found nil.
Fair break, taken back, second last one off, found mid-track gap, finished strongly to lead 100m out and come away.
Broke well, ridden up to fourth one off, swung slightly wide home turn, ran on but unable to hold winner.
Moderate break midfield rail, driven into straight, slightly short of room, kept on, no kick.
Away well, led, then second one off, led again briefly but narrowly mid-straight, no extra late.
Fair break, back to mid-rear rail, inside bid, had to wait briefly for gap, kept on well late.
Fair break, taken back to third last two off, improved wide turn, kept on quite well until no extra late.
Fair break, sat third rail throughout, gap came early straight but lacked kick to take it, kept on one pace.
Fair break, fifth one off, urged far side, ridden, one pace.
Slightly missed break, last rail urged, inside bid, some progress when checked late, no chance thereafter.
Fair break, not rushed, mid-rear one off, improved wide entering straight, one pace late.
Fair break, midfield two off, improved wide turn to join leaders mid-straight, weakened late.
Broke well, ridden early to lead and cross, two lengths clear far side trying to dictate, led into straight, driven, weakened.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the slow tempo 2 wide, dashed well 300M to score.
Pushed forward, enjoyed the slow sectionals just off the leader 2 wide, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Midfield, 3Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M for 3rd.
Settled in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the slow tempo, little dash in straight.
Eased back, checked 1000M, more than 9Ls off the leader 2 wide, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Very slow away, hard ridden to keep up at rear, 5.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, raced very keen, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well 300M, run ended 100M.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on ok.
Eased back, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Eased at start to take rail, checked badly 1000M, 7Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, no dash.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 150M weakened.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leader, trapped 4 wide and lost too much ground, harmed by the slow pace, weakened 200M.
Settled in front, 2Ls off the slow pace, trapped 3 wide, emptied 300M.
Settled one-off cozily just off the speed, kicked strongly when asked 300 M out, soon led and drew clear.
Pushed up to share the lead on rails, headed 250 M out, kept on soundly for 2nd.
Out in line, caught 3-deep in midfield, on heels at 1300 M, lost cover at 700 M, ran up gradually at home turn, finished off soundly for 3rd.
Pushed up and then took a seat just behind the leaders, responded fairly when clear 300 M out, rather one-paced.
Out in line, lacked early speed and travelled two from the rear, crowded 150 M out, finished off well, too late.
Settled on rails in midfield, one-paced in the home straight.
Settled one-off in midfield, made limited progress when asked 300 M out, no extra final 100 M.
Raced keenly, restrained one from the rear, made limited progress in the home straight, rather one-paced.
Crowded start, travelled at the rear, made up gradually ground from 300 M, bumped 150 M out, not fully tested.
Slow away, pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, drifted back gradually from 500 M, weakened at the top of the home straight.
Ridden from gate to join leaders, fourth two off then three off, challenged and led briefly turn into straight, ridden, weakened.
In midfield about 4Ls off the pace, had a smooth trip to straight, ran on strongly final 250M and reeled in long-time leader near 50M.
Had to use up a bit to lead from draw 12, took them along steadily, kept on well home straight, collared by winner nearing 50M and went down narrowly.
Not far off the pace in 4th, took some time to get going on straightening, responded well passing 200M, nearest finish.

Settled behind midfield 2-wide, in 6th place 4-5Ls off the pace for most of the trip, steadied when making his run near 250M, had his chance after that but only managed to stay on for a non threatening 4th.
Unable to slot in and was kept behind midfield 3-wide without cover, driven out nearing 400M, made some headway early straight, looked a possible winner until 200M, gradually weakened late stages.
Close up in 3rd, well placed to strike passing 400M, briefly threatened early straight, one paced over final 200M and no extra late stages.
Checked on jumping and shuffled back to last 8Ls off the steady pace, bid 3-wide home turn, stayed on final 300M without threatening.
Held up near the rear 7Ls behind leader, outpaced as the race got serious nearing home straight, last going into final 200M, ran past beaten runners only.
Positively ridden from the off and tracked leader one out one back, niggled along nearing 500M to stay with the pace, run ended 150M and weakened.
Towards the rear 6Ls back, pressed on nearing 400M but couldn't find another gear, tightened for room inside 100M, eased when no chance.
Settled behind midfield 5Ls off the pace, saved ground on the inside but not picked up when asked, one paced throughout.

Placing: TNP
Comment: Stood flat-footed as the start was effected, lost a considerable amount of ground and took no active part in the race. (Deemed to be a runner.)
