Began from the widest draw, restrained outside leader before allowed to share pace into straight, soon came to tackle leader upon straightening but could only gain upper hand final strides.
Jumped well from a middle draw, soon led on rails to nearly make all, only to be headed final strides.
Settled one-out-one-back in 2L 4th, soon came to challenge upon straightening, kept on same pace without quickening.
Slow into stride, soon driven up along rails to gain midfield position, came off rails for a run turning in but failed to quicken under pressure.
Settled in midfield, shifted wide for a run into straight, could only produce modest progress without threatening.
Began fairly, settled one back on rails in 3rd within 2Ls of speed, faded steadily under pressure after straightening.
Soon settled well back after beginning from a poor draw, wide turning in, ran past beaten horses in run home. (Tactic questioned.)
In similar position in rear of midfield throughout, found nothing in straight.
Raced wide without cover in midfield to straight, ran home one-paced down centre of the track.
Soon taken backward from a poor draw, remained in last few throughout.
Sluggish at start, gradually picked up a position just worse than midfield, saved ground on rails turning in, soon faded.
Settled in last few, cropped a check around the bend, widest turning in, never recovered.
Settled wide without cover in midfield early, took closer order out wide around the bend, soon weakened in straight.
Stalked the leader along the fence. Hit the front near the furlong and held off challengers.
Made its run third from the rear after settling along the rails. Closed off strongly after obtaining clear running early in the straight.
Taken back from the outside stall to settle at the tail of the field along the fence. Held up early in the straight but managed to finish off well.
Raced 3 back the paint. Peeled out 3 deep after the 300m and maintained a sound gallop right to the line.
Camped 1 out 1 back. Switched to the inside on straightening, got out under pressure but kept on only evenly after enjoying a nice run in the race.
Parked midfield the fence. Worked home soundly along the inside after obtaining clear running early in the straight.
Led along the fence. Whacked away one paced in the run to the line.
Settled 3 wide, midfield with cover. Obtained clear running early in the straight and had every possible chance but failed to impress.
Bounded in the air on jumping and lost ground, settling midfield 1 off with cover. Ran into traffic in the home straight, battled away over the final stages.
Travelled midfield, 3 wide with cover. Peeled out on straightening but failed to close off.

Drifted back early from an outside barrier to settle in a rearward position. 2 deep with cover. Came widest in the straight but only plodded to the line. Vet reported post-race, irregular heart rhythm.
Raced prominently but was posted 3 wide without cover. Struggled in the final stretch despite being checked near the furlong.
Did plenty of work early to settle in 2nd positron, 1 off no cover. Copped a check early in the straight but was beaten at the time.
Ridden along from a wide gate but couldn't muster and settled 1 off with cover, worse than midfield. Never likely.
Soon raced 2-wide behind leader. Rallied on and hit front final furlong. Won with plenty to spare.
Away in line and sat 3-wide behind midfield. Swung wider turning in. No hope with the winner but did the best of the rest.
Eased to rear from highest draw. Still last rounding home turn. Covered substantial ground for a minor placing.
2 to 3-wide at midfield. Kept giving to make frame at post.
Behind midfield on fence to home turn. Came wide leaving the bend. Ran on steadily and nearly made frame.
Midfield on fence to home straight. Made up some ground late.
Led on fence until overhauled final furlong.
2-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Remained one-paced until no extra final 100M.
Ahead of midfield on fence to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch thereafter.
Never better than midfield early and middle stages. No show in the straight.
Towards rear early. Picked up wide at bend. Couldn't sustain effort home straight. (Lame Right Front).
Driven forward but trapped 3-wide without cover. Found nothing when asked home straight and faded 200M.
Back with last few always. No impression.
Towards rear throughout. Never a factor.
Well away, settled fourth rail, out for four wide challenge, strong kick, led 200m out, drew clear.
Fair break, settled second last rail, followed winner through, kept on but outpaced.
Well away, settled third one off, challenged with winner, soon outpaced.
Well away, steadied to sixth one off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Taken back to rear, improved turn, wide bid, one pace.
Fast away, led rail, joined and headed far side, nudged entering straight by rival outside him, ridden, one pace.
Quickly away, up to second one off, led far side but unable to cross, headed mid-straight, driven, no response.
Pushed up and soon settled well in box-seat, blocked early straight, kicked when clear 200 M out, finished off soundly to score.
Pushed up to lead on rails, kept on strongly when asked for efforts in the home straight, just caught by the winner on line.
Restrained in a one-off spot in midfield, pulled early, on heels at 1000 M, contested the lead 400 M out, kept on soundly for 3rd.
Patiently ridden and travelled just behind the mid-division, crowded at 800 M, bumped at 350 M, finished off soundly when clear 300 M out.
Crowded start and travelled at the rear, blocked early in the home straight, made up gradual ground final 300 M.
Prominently placed one-off just behind the pace, blocked at 400 M, only one-paced when clear 200 M out.
Taken rearward from high draw, blocked early in the home straight, finished off satisfactorily when clear 200 M out.
Lacked early speed and travelled just behind the mid-division, no cover, only one-paced in the home straight.
Taken rearward from high draw, only made limited progress in the home straight.
Settled two from the rear on rails, blocked early in the home straight, only one-paced.
Pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, flat 200 M out, soon weakened.
Pushed up early and soon settled just behind the speed on rails, checked at 800 M, only gave limited response when asked for efforts in the home straight.
Urged along to hold a fence position in midfield, on heels at 800 M, crowded at 350 M, soon faded.
Pushed up to track the leaders, caught 3-wide with no cover, crowded at 400 M, soon weakened.
Settled in prominent spot, 2.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, closed off strongly 300M to win without much threats.
Bumped start, behind midfield, 6.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, lacked room 400M, progressed steadily when clear and got 2nd.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, made steady ground 300M to take 3rd.
Settled in front of midfield, 4Ls off the good tempo 2 wide, lacked turn of foot, just held ground in straight.
Eased at start to obtain cover, 9Ls off the good pace 2 wide, held up 4-2, progressed steadily when clear.
Eased back, 8Ls off the good tempo, trapped 3 wide, made minor ground in straight.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, still held ground in straight.
Midfield, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden forward to share the lead at good sectionals 2 wide, soon emptied 300M.
Eased back, 8Ls off the good pace along the fence, lacked room 400M, ran on fairly when clear.
Slow away, soon obtained a midfield sport on the rails, 4.5Ls off the good tempo, flattened 200M.
Pushed forward, 3Ls off the good pace on the fence, weakened 250M.
Eased back, along the fence, never progressed.
Hard ridden to take the rail and shared the lead at good sectionals, soon dropped off 350M.
Fast away, kept near rear in eighth 3-deep with cover, came off cover top of straight, let go 200m, easy win.
Broke well, in touch in sixth one off, asked for effort 300m out, good response but no match for winner.
Moderate break, recovered to settle one-off in fourth, blocked briefly straight, free 150m out, ran on.
Jumped well, midfield seventh rail, came on, no match to the first three who had first run.
Good jump, last rail, blocked straight, finally came free last 100m, finished strongly.
Fair jump, prominent, second one off, shaken up 400m out, one pace.
Jumped well, disputed lead, taken back to fifth rail, never free last 400 until last 50m, ran on late.
Good break, disputed lead 3-deep without cover in 3rd, expended energy trip, kept on well.
Fair break, pressed early pace but not quick enough, taken back to ninth one-off, kept on one pace.
Fast break, led after 200m, driven 400m out, weakened last 150m.
Broke well, taken back to rear, 3-deep with cover at 600m, swung widest 7-deep top of the straight, one pace.
Clean jump, taken back at once, tenth rail, ridden, found little.
Awkward jump and lost ground, recovered and ridden to rejoin, checked off heels 1100m out, took tenth one off, twelfth 3-deep turn, found nil.
Sluggish start, second last one off, mid-rear one off at 600m, driven, found nil.
Showed good early pace to chase leader in a 3-wide position, travelled strongly and loomed a serious threat inside 400M, surged forward and drew alongside leader near 50M, got up near line.
Driven forward from wide barrier, crossed to the lead approaching 800M and set good pace, pressed by the eventual winner from 250M, kept on well towards finish, headed near line.
Held up 2-wide behind mid-division about 5Ls off the pace, denined a clear run early straight, switched right and finished off well final 250M.
Settled in midfield 4Ls back, turned wide nearing 500M, had every chance in straight, stayed on without threatening and got up for 4th near line.
In 5th place ahead of midfield, urged along nearing 400M, kept on one paced.
In midfield and saved ground along the inside, not going the pace to challenge when urged passing 400M, faded final stages.
Handy in early part of the race, outpaced nearing 600M and soon pushed along, kept on same pace in straight, weakened late stages.
Slow to begin, held up in last 9Ls off the pace, made some progress final 400M but not getting to leaders.
Guided to the fence soon after the start, settled towards the tail of the field 7-8Ls back, had plenty to do turning in, ran past beaten runners only.
Rushed up to track leader, run ended 200M out, weakened gradually. (Mucus.)
Eased to the rear on jumping from 14, 3-wide turning for home, not picked up under pressure, never a threat.
Slow to begin, ended up near the rear 6-7Ls off the pace, found little when asked, no impression final 200M.
Caught 3-wide without cover in midfield, pushed wider halfway round the turn, had little left for the home run, no extra mid-straight.
Not mustered despite ridden along early stages and ended up behind midfield, beaten early straight, soon behind and eased.
Fair break, not rushed, rear one off, last into straight, wide bid, ran on strongly to lead 50 m out.
Fair break, ridden up to second one off, led mid-straight, ran on well, winner too strong.
Broke well, settled fourth rain, slightly lit up as horse on outside tried to cross, had to wait for gap till mid-straight, ridden, kept on well.
Fair break, not rushed, third last one off, mid-track bid, kept on but unable to threaten.
Broke well, held up midfield two off, mid-track bid, kept on quite well.
Fair break, fifth one off, every chance when gap came mid-straight, driven, kept on one pace.
Fair break, fourth last two off, wide bid, kept on, no kick.
Moderate start, vigorously ridden to midfield rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back to third last rail, slightly short of room early straight, kept on quite well.
Fair break, steadied back to midfield one off, shaken up early straight, kept on but unable to threaten.
Fair break, midfield one off, ridden and modest progress mid-straight, weakened slightly late.
Broke fast, led and crossed, still in front mid-straight, ridden, weakened.
Broke well, midfield rail, urged, inside bid, no progress.
Broke well, aimed for lead but caught three wide in fourth, up to third 300m out, weakened.
Patiently ridden, settled at the rear 9Ls off a steady pace, in a near impossible spot turning in, made strong headway when a gap opened up final 300M, got up near line.
Positioned 2-wide ahead of mid-division, angled out to clear near entrance of straight, ran on well and briefly led 100M out, outsprinted by winner closing stages.
Held up towards the rear, switched wide passing 500M for his challenge, looked a possible winner mid-straight with a strong challenge, came close to win but had to settle for 3rd in a close finish.
Led steadily, continued on well in straight, led to inside 100M, good effort under top weight.
Never far off leaders but was badly held up on straightening, finished strongly when switched ground nearing 150M and would have featured in the finish if given a clear run.
Tracked leaders along the inside, kept on well but had no answer to winner's late surge, met slight interference near 100M and could have finished closer than the official margin suggested.
Held up in midfield along the fence, had some difficulty obtaining clear run early straight, stayed on final 200M and did reasonably well as a seasonal debut.
Switched off to the rear, almost 10Ls off the pace at one stage, switched wide nearing home straight, made steady headway final 300M but not getting to the leaders.
Dropped in behind midfield early stages, not helped by the steady tempo, switched wide nearing 500M for clear run, couldn't find enough to seriously challenge but kept on nonetheless.
From wide barrier crossed to race 3-deep in midfield, left with no cover passing 1000M, ran on at the same pace before fading away final stages.
Tracked the pace early, crossed to race outside leader entering home turn, not quickened under pressure early straight, weakened passing 200M.
Always close up behind leaders but didn't find much when asked inside 400M, weakened mid-straight.
Dropped back to near last from draw 14, stayed on only fairly and never threatened.
Well covered in mid-division but didn't respond under pressure turning for home, never got competitive and dropped to last nearing 200M.
Travelled strongly in a 2-wide position ahead of midfield, quickened up well inside 400M under minimal pressure, cruised past leader 200M out and drew away for a very easy victory.
Not mustered despite ridden along early stages, at the rear for most of the way, ran on well from 300M to claim 2nd near line but no impression on the runaway winner.
Taken keen hold in a position behind midfield, angled out to clear 350M, stayed on to take 3rd near line but no chance with the winner.
Bagged inside rail and raced close up with leaders, checked 1000M and switched to 2-wide making the turn, had clear run from 350M, battled on well but never going the pace to challenge the winner.
Emerged as leader from 1200M, set steady pace, led to near 200M, ran out of steam late stages and was swamped near line.
Settled in mid-division along the inside, short of room turning into straight, found daylight up the inside 300M out, stayed on without threatening.
Crossed to track leader, raced a shade keen middle stages, kept on a the same pace when the race got serious, gave way final 100M.
Held up behind midfield 5Ls off a steady pace, made limited progress on straightening and could never get close to the leaders.
Slow to begin, raced in last 6-7Ls behind leader, turned 3-wide halfway round the turn, made some progress from off the pace but never looked like getting involved.
Caught 3-wide without over from 900M and strode closer to pace, had every hope , weakened passing 300M.
Raced up with the pace throughout, weakened inside 300M.
Taken back from draw 14, not suited by the steady pace and raced keenly in middle stages, found disappointingly little in the finish, eased when no chance final 150M.
Towards the rear, bid 4 wide making the home turn, not quickened in straight, eased inside 200M when well beaten. (Unacceptable Performance / To Official Barrier Trial.)
Positioned 3-wide in midfield and proved difficult to settle, had little left turning for home, tailed out. (To Official Barrier Trial.)

Began fairly, soon prominent, settled just behind leader on rails, shifted out for a run turning in, hit the front under pressure over 200 M out, just held on.
Began fairly, settled in 4th on rails or one out within 3Ls of pace, soon came to challenge upon straightening, fought on under pressure but failed to peg back winner throughout.
Began with others, settled in rear of midfield on rails, commenced move around the bend, obtained a clear passage shortly after straightening, ran on steadily under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Began from a poor draw with others, soon settled in rear of midfield, briefly baulked upon straightening, ran on under pressure to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly from a wide draw, soon taken back to rear of field, kept on steadily without quickening in straight.
Well there and wide early, crossed inside to race just outside the heels of the leader, hit the front briefly upon straightening, soon headed over 200 M out.
Settled in midfield, carried wider to 3-wide approaching home turn, no response under pressure over 200 M out. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Ridden along in slender lead early, went 1L clear coming out of back straight, soon headed after straightening, dropped out under pressure.
Began well from a wide draw, soon taken back to midfield but remained wide without cover throughout, fan home one-paced.
Always towards rear, wide into straight, found nil.
Slightly slowly away, always in last few, saved ground on rails turning in, found nothing.
Began from the widest gate, soon taken back to trail the field, never a danger. (Jockey reported saddle shifted.)
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 3 wide, closed off strongly 200M to win.
Midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, blocked 400M, progressed steadily when clear and took 2nd.
Pushed early, progressed steadily into the lead, pace good, hung on until 200M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Pushed to obtain a midfield spot, 3.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, held up 4-2, made ground when clear.
Behind midfield, 4Ls off the good pace 3 wide, made steady ground 300M.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, progressed steadily 250M.
Extremely slow away, 7Ls off the good pace 3-4 wide, made some ground in straight.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 6.5Ls off the good pace, made some ground 200M.
Eased back, 5Ls off the good pace, trapped 4 wide throughout and lost too much ground, no progress.
Hard ridden to take the box seat, pace good, weakened 300M.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, out of fuel 350M.
Hard ridden forward, 2.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, emptied 300M.
Never better than midfield.
Pressed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, faded badly 300M.
Behind pace early. Ridden 350M to challenge leader. Hit front 150M. Kept on to score with comfort.
Led until overhauled by winner 150M. Hung on well to hold 2nd.
At midfield to midpoint. Pressed 400M. Finished off fairly well for a minor placing.
Slow to begin. Resumed to midfield at 600M. Driven 300M and responded satisfactorily until no extra to offer final stages.
Began awkwardly and raced towards rear. Pressured passing midpoint and made up some late ground.
Raced ahead of midfield near the centre of the track. Never nearer.
Crowded for room at start and raced behind leader. Shaken up passing 400M but couldn't turn up a notch.
Never better than midfield.
Never far off the pace on stands' rail early and middle stages. Found nothing when asked passing 400M.
Behind midfield throughout. Never progressed.
Towards rear always. Never a factor.
At midfield early. Faded passing midpoint. No impression.
Raced in a forward spot early. Struggled passing midpoint. Beaten well before post.
Always at rear. Never in the hunt.
Quickly away, soon led, challenged back straight, shaken top of straight, all out, just held on.
Jumped well, eighth along rail, improved when free 150m out, strong finish just failed.
Slow break, soon disputed lead, one-off second entire race, challenged 450m out, all out, one pace late.
Fair jump, fifth rail behind leaders, all out, outkicked.
Quickly away, prominent, one-off third, headway 500m out, all out, one pace.
Broke well, taken back from fast pace, seventh between runners one-off, every chance straight, one pace.
Good break, taken back to twelfth one-off, one pace when asked for effort.
Slow and awkward break, trailed in last rail, evenly passed weakening rivals.
Broke in air, in rear eleventh 3-deep with cover, long drive 500m out, found nil late.
Off slowly, hard ridden to keep up with leaders, 3-deep without cover in third, strong headway 500m out, beaten 200m out.
Bumped hard after break, tenth one-off, unable to quicken, beaten long way out.
Jumped well, midfield sixth three-deep with cover, hard ridden from 450m out, beaten 300m from home.
Poorly away, ninth three-deep with cover back straight, long drive 700m out, beaten top of straight.
Broke well, settled third one off, quickened to lead 200m out, ran on well.
Fair start, midfield rail, then moved to one off, improved turn, had to wait briefly for run, kept on well, unable to reach winner.
Taken back to fourth last one off, wide bid, ran on well.
Fair break, ridden early, mid-rear rail, slightly short of room mid-straight, ran on well.
Taken back to second last, urged, wide bid straight, driven, little response until kept on late.
Broke fast, shared lead rail, then back to second, narrow lead mid-straight, headed, weakened.
Broke well, not rushed, midfield one off, spun wide turn, driven, one pace.
Not best away, urged up to midfield rail, inside bid, slightly short of room, kept on one pace.
Fair break, urged early to fourth rail, shaken up early straight, little response.
Fair break, midfield three wide, some progress straight, weakened late.
Missed break one length, ridden early but still only third last rail, inside bid, no progress.
Taken back to rear, last into straight, slightly short of room, found little.
Broke well, ridden to lead and eventually cross, soon three lengths clear, led into straight, weakened abruptly.
Pushed forward, sat outside the leader, benefited by the slow tempo, drifted away 200M to score without any threats.
Settled in front, 2Ls off the leaders 2 wide, enjoyed by the slow sectionals, ran on well to the line for 2nd.
Secured a more prominent spot than usual in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash in straight for 3rd.
Pushed to take rail and led by 0.5L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M flattened.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, blocked 400M, dashed well when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Very slow away, took rail behind midfield, 5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, lack room 400M, ran on fairly.
Eased at start to take rail at rear, 7.5Ls off the leaders, held up 4-2, little dash when clear despite not suited by the slow pace.
Bumped start, 6Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, moved forward 600M, no turn of foot in straight.
Behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow tempo, trapped 4 wide throughout, moved forward 600M, emptied 250M.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, flattened 300M.
Box seat, 2Ls off the slow pace, weakened 300M.
Hard ridden to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leaders 3 wide, not suited by the slow pace, soon emptied 400M.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, checked badly 800M, not suited by the slow tempo, weakened 350M.
Fair break, not much early speed, urged to fourth one off, driven, kept on to wear down front runner and win going away.
Well away, led, kicked early straight and holding winner until worn down 150m out.
Fair break, not rushed, midfield rail, kept on well between horses but never able to challenge.
Broke fast in spite of slight stumble, shaken up early straight, kept on, never closer.
Fair break, not rushed, fourth last one off, improved turn, kept on, no kick.
Quick break, second two off, ridden early straight, kept on one pace.
Slightly awkward start, third last three wide, urged, kept on under pressure straight.
Broke well, steadied to rear one off, inside bid, kept on but never able to threaten.
Moderate break, back to rear rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield three wide, wide bid, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, taken back rear two off, wide into straight one pace.
Bobbled start, soon midfield two off, lost ground turn, weakened quickly, tailed off.
Began awkwardly but showed good speed to be close up behind leaders, picked up well inside 300M, led near 50M making a winning return from a long absence.
Close up behind leaders, strode to the lead inside 500M, dueled with the eventual 3rd all the way to the line, caught by winner near 50M.
Right up with the pace, ran on well and looked a possible winner going into 200M, not pace of the winner final stages.
Fractious in the stalls and slowly away, moved closer to track leaders inside 600M, stayed on but not getting to the first 3.
Never far off the pace, found less than expected inside 400M, kept on one-paced to the line.
Tracked leaders along the Stands' rail, kept on evenly but never going the pace to challenge leaders.
Held up towards the rear, headway from 500M out, had no clear run final 200M and would have finished closer.
Always close up, had his chance but couldn't step up a gear, kept on same speed final 200M.
Held up in midfield, ran on one-paced when pushed along nearing 400M and made little impression on debut.
Began awkwardly, lacked pace and soon dropped to last, made limited progress passing halfway, never threatened.
Lacked early pace and had to be pushed along to stay in touch with the main group, stayed on fairly final 400M, not much room late on but would have made little difference to the results.
Behind midfield and travelled only fairly, not quickened when the race got serious passing 500M, eased when no chance over final stages.
Led at steady pace, headed passing halfway, dropped away inside 300M, eased when well beaten.
Up with the pace, driven along midway but found nothing in reserve, soon dropped out of contention.
Steadied start, midfield one off, slight traffic problems mid straight, pulled out to lead 150m out, held on well.
Settled mid-rear two off, wide bid, ran on well, not quite reach winner.
Taken back, settled midfield rail, mid-track bid, ran on well.
Broke well, took time to settle, then fifth one off, mid-track bid, ran on, no extra late.
Broke well, third one off, challenged leader entering straight, led very briefly, kept on one pace.
Well away, midfield two off slightly eager,, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Away smartly, up to share lead one off, just led into straight, headed, no extra.
Broke well, led rail, narrowly headed far side, led again turn to mid-straight, could not resist closers.
Well away, up to fourth rail slightly eager, split came early straight, hard ridden, not pace to take it.
Away well, up to midfield rail, not clear run mid-straight, kept on one pace once free.
Taken back, third last two off, wide bid, one pace.
Taken back from start, fourth last one off, wide bid, kept on but little impression.
Sluggish start, settled rear one off, wide bid, already beaten when met interference from hanging rival.
Taken back from wide to rear, not settling immediately, aimed for wide bid but hung out badly, lost action 200m out, tailed off.
Showed early pace, took a trail on leaders back, had nice trip in transit despite early speed, angled out at 300m and went to leader, kept on too well late.
Began with race, took ideal spot in midfield 3-4Ls back, used nothing in run, clear at 250m and closed hard but found winner too strong.
Pressed forward and did a bit of work to lead, was taken on in mid section and shaded throughout, still there turning and fought on but couldn't natch first two final 300m.
Began ok, Ended up in midfield racing two wide 3Ls or so back, had ideal trip in mid section, didn't dash but kept grinding away in straight.
Began well, pressed forward to race in 1 out 1 back spot, on decent speed 1L back to bend, came 3 wide to challenge and loomed as a place chance but peaked at 300m and just nosed out of frame late.
Broke with rest, taken into a midfield spot, 2 wide 4Ls or so away, even trip to bend, one paced effort and just held ground in stretch.
Settled behind midfield 5-6Ls back in 2 wide line, not helped by pace, still well back to turn, made some minor ground late.
Positioned 3 wide in midfield 4-5Ls back, had cover in mid section, lacked usual close and battled away in straight.
Attempted to go forward but trapped 4 wide without cover from a wide gate, did too much work in mid section, still 5-6Ls back to bend, weakened after a hard run.
Drifted back from a wide gate, raced 3-4 wide at rear 6Ls or so from front, came wide turning, unable to make any real headway.
Standard getaway, shuffled back, to rear 7Ls or so from top end, pace not to suit, unable to get closer.
Went forward in search on lead, raced outside leader shading inside horse, continued to apply pressure to bend, quickly gave in turning and weakened out.
Attempted to take a closer position but posted 3 wide without cover in midfield, used too much to bend and didn't see out extra journey.
No early pace, soon at tail, always at rear and never sighted.

Began moderately, ridden to pick up pace before settling on heels of slow pacesetter, remained in coveted position until angling out for a run in straight, hit the front under pressure 100 M out, just held on.
Began with others, settled in midfield on rails, became worse when pace quickened approaching home bend, came to challenge upon straightening, obtained a clear passage inside 200 M, just denied.
Raced keenly in midfield or just worse, commenced run and made rapid headway up the Rock to join pacesetter around the bend, gained slender lead briefly 200 M out, effort unsustainable.
Settled in last few, made rapid progress up the Rock to gain one-out-one-back position coming out of back straight, failed to quicken further after turning for home, ran home one-paced.
From the widest draw, quickly taken back to cross to rails settling towards rear, commenced move passing 400 M, baulked for a run early in straight, ran on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began well, restrained to travel in 5th and then 6th in midfield, lost ground and went wide into straight, one-paced.
Began fairly, settled in 3L 5th on rails, became midfield coming out of back straight, commenced run on rails approaching home straight but effort short-lived.

Jumped well, gradually taken back to travel on heels of leaders racing keenly at times due to slow pace, dropped to 4th 3Ls back far side, found nothing in straight. (Questioned for disappointing performance.)
Fair start from a poor draw, driven to take up running over 1700 M out and set a slow pace, held lead until joined over 500 M out, fought on under pressure but tired badly at the 200 M.
Never on terms.
Travelled wide without cover in midfield, took closer order passing the winning post the first time settling in one length 2nd, gave ground from approaching home bend.
Began with others, gradually taken back to race in last few, made no impression.
Scored a comfortable win after making every post a winner along the rails. Was pressured in the lead during stages but easily drew a margin over the final furlong.
Slow to begin, traveling worse than midfield along the paint. Baulked for a run on straightening shifted in soon after and hit the line well.
Camped 2 deep, midfield with cover. Angled out into clear running near the 300m and finished off steadily.
Crowded at the start settling behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Rattled home well despite some traffic problems in the home straight.
Settled in the leading division, 2 deep whilst having a runner to its outside. Faded over the last 100m.
Enjoyed all the favours after box seating. Kept on one paced in the home straight.
Tightened on jumping settling at the tail of the field. Worked home soundly,
Wasn't the best away settling worse than midfield the fence. Railed up in the straight but was out of action after being checked near the 50m.
Parked behind the speed 3 wide with cover. Struggled in the home straight,
Taken back from the outside gate and travelled in last position along the fence. Worked home steadily after obtaining clear running near the 200m.
Settled 1 out 1 back. Failed to capitalize after having every chance.
Sent forward but was posted 3 deep without cover whilst travelling in the leading trio. Compounded in the final stretch.
Ahead of midfield on fence to home straight. Battled determinedly along the rail to fend off rivals by narrow margin.
Quickly into stride. Settled at prominent spot from first turn. Every chance home straight. Just repelled by winner at post.
Behind midfield on fence to home turn. Shifted wider rounding home turn. Finished off well through runners until hampered near 100M. Ran on for a minor placing.
Soon switched to 2-wide towards rear from highest draw. Progressed wide and was 4Ls down turning into home. Kept on well but failed to offer extra to threaten the front trio close home.
Rolled forward and took lead on fence from 1100M. Hung on until overhauled by the principals final stages.
Towards rear on fence to home turn. Took inside run and made up some ground steadily home straight.
Gradually taken towards rear from wide barrier early. Made run widest home turn. Covered good ground home straight.
2-wide at midfield to home turn. Swung out for clear run into final stretch but couldn't turn up a notch.
Travelled wide and without cover at midfield early. Strode forward to race wide behind leaders back straight. Found nothing when asked home straight.
2-wide behind pace early and middle stages. Challenged leader entering home straight. Plugged on until hampered and lost running final 100M.
Always at rear. Never likely.
2-wide ahead of midfield early. Pressed to maintain position 500M. Faded soon after straightening.
Fair break, taken back to mid-rear rail, squeezed through gap mid-straight to lead 75m out, soon in charge.
Broke well, ridden to third one off, narrow lead 100m out until collared by winner.
Broke well, mid-rear two off, mid-track bid alongside winner, just outpaced.
Broke well, taken back to rear rail, out for wide bid, ran on strongly.
Broke fast, good early speed to lead rail, steadied to half length second, kicked early straight, led 150m out, weakened slightly.
Broke well, midfield rail, kept on strongly straight, slightly outpaced.
Fair break, not much early speed, third last one off, wide bid, unable to quicken late.
Broke well, ridden but not pace to lead, midfield one off, slightly short of room mid-straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, fourth rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield three off, mid-track bid, weakened.
Fair break, up fast to share lead one off, ridden early straight, weakened.
Moderate start, last one off, urged entering straight, found nil.
Well away, fifth one off, mid-track bid, kept on strongly to lead last 50m.
Fair break, up wide to reach third rail, led 100m out until headed by winner.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, mid-track bid, ran on.
Fast break, second one off, still with leaders mid-straight, weakened slightly late.
Fast away, led rail, still in front mid-straight, headed, weakened.
Fast away, fifth rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back to third last one off, angled out for wide bid, lacked kick.
Fair break, not much early speed, fourth last rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, sixth two off, ran green round turn, wide bid, one pace.
Fair break, not much early speed, mid-rear two off, mid-track bid, found little.
Badly fluffed start, lost three lengths, second last rail, not corner well, inside bid, no progress.
Missed break badly, last early, shaken up early straight, found nil.
Eased to rear for cover, 7Ls off the leader, made the move 600M around the field 3 wide, dashed strongly to win despite not suited by the slow pace.
In front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, checked 200M, closed off strongly to grab 2nd.
Progressed steadily into the lead, comfortably clocked slow sectionals, hung on strongly until 50M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 200M.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader along the fence, dashed well 150M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pressed forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the slow tempo, hung out badly after straightening, shifted in abruptly when being corrected, just ran on ok.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well to the line despite all negative racing situations.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, checked 200M, just held ground.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, blocked 4-2, little dash when clear.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, however soon weakened 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, just held ground when clear.
Midfield, trapped 3 wide throughout, 2.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, emptied 300M.
Missed jump, taken back tenth fence, ridden 400m out, strong finish, led on line.
Quickest away, quietly third fence, shaken up top of straight, led 150m out, caught on line.
Jumped well, ninth one off, swung wide top of straight, powerful finish, too late.
Fair jump, seventh rail, shaken up 450m out, kept on.
Slowly away, last rail, pushed out, finished well, not in time.
Fair jump, ridden for early speed, settle fifth one off, stayed on, outsprinted late.
Slightly hesitant jump, eighth 3-deep without cover back straight, shaken up 450m out, widest of all turn, strong finish.
Good jump, near rear, one off the rail, wide turn, ran on late.
Clean jump, second last one off, effort 300m out, checked off heels 100m out, stayed on.
Jumped well, chased early speed, fourth one off, off bridle 600m out, soon beaten.
Swiftly away, disputed lead, led rail, challenged 700m out, kept on well until 150m, weakened.
Quick jump, disputed lead, second one off entire trip, pressured 600m, found no more from top of straight.
Crossed to the lead 1400M then slowed things down in middle stages, stepped up tempo 600M and kicked 3Ls clear turning in, continued on well to 100M, faded late but hung on.
Settled one out one back, pushed along to chase breakaway leader passing 600M, stayed on and made a late surge inside 100M, just denied.
Settled in 4th 3Ls off the pace, caught flat-footed when the leader broke away passing 600M, stayed on final 300M but not going the pace to challenge, held on for 3rd just.
Held up near last and used little in early and middle stages, had almost 10Ls to make up passing 400M, finished well and fared best of those who came from off the pace.
Slow to begin, raced 2-wide in midfield, 6-7Ls behind runaway leader inside 400M, kept on same pace in straight, never threatened.
Given a waiting ride, not used until passing 400M, stayed on only fairly over final 300M.
Driven forward early, sat in 3rd place about 2-3Ls behind leader in middle stages, outpaced as the tempo increased passing 600M, weakened mid-straight.
Switched off to last over 8Ls off the pace, stuck in traffic when the race got serious passing 500M, had plenty to do turning in but made limited progress only.
Along the fence in mid-division, travelled only fairly passing halfway, switched out into clear inside 300M, didn't pick up.
Behind midfield early stages, was pushed to 3-wide spot without over near 1200M, raced keenly down the back straight and had little left turning for home.
Held up behind midfield, overraced when the pace slackened from 1300M, didn't pick up when the race got serious inside 600M, no extra final 200M and eased.

Driven along from the start, held prominent position in 3rd before coming 2nd outside leader around the bend, hit the front under pressure over 200 M out, kept on well to finish.

Began with others, gradually settled in rear of midfield, carried backward and lost position rounding home bend, shifted off rails for a run entering straight, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Soon taken back from the wide gate to travel at the back, remained well behind until approaching home turn, finished off race well inside final 200 M, did best work late.
Settled well behind, made steady headway down the centre of the straight to be nearest at finish.
Settled wide in forward of midfield, took closer order around the field on home bend to be close-up 3rd entering straight, fought on under pressure but unable to sustain effort inside final 200 M.
Sluggish early, gradually recovered to rear of midfield before home bend, came under pressure between runners in straight but failed to quicken to challenge.
Began with others, settled worse than midfield, widest into straight, kept on before fading inside final 150 M.
Well there on rails, chased leader into straight, failed to quicken under pressure and faded inside final 200 M.
Began moderately, settled in last few on rails, remained same into straight, made no impression.

Began moderately, gradually improved along rails to forward of midfield, raced awkwardly behind runners rounding home bend and baulked in forward of midfield early in straight, faded inside final 200 M. (Blood in trachea.)
Broke well from the widest gate to soon take up running, led until headed over 200 M out when weakening. (Blood in trachea.)
Never far off to straight, gave ground gradually after straightening.
Displayed good gate speed before being restrained an taking up 2nd position, 1 off. Assumed the lead early in the straight and drew clear in the run to the post.
Pushed through and held the lead along the fence after the 1100m. Set an even tempo and maintained a good gallop right to the wire.
Settled back in the field, 3 wide with cover. Worked home soundly out wide.
Taken back from a wide gate to settle second from the rear, along the paint. Hit the line well.
Slow to begin then proved difficult to settle in the middle stages, travelling midfield 1 off. Made reasonable ground in the final stretch.
Camped 1 out 1 back. Kept on soundly but was unable to show any sprint early in the straight.
Allowed to settle just ahead of midfield, 4 wide with cover. Kept on one paced in the run to the line.
Coursed 4-5 wide without cover while racing on the speed. Did plenty of work and was never a factor.
Settled in a handy position 3 deep with cover. Came up flat over the concluding stages.
Raced midfield, 4 wide with cover on the circle. Came widest in the straight but struggled in the run to the line.
Knuckled over at the start and settled midfield the fence, with cover. Struggled in the home straight.
Posted 3 wide without cover whilst on the speed. Never likely.
Enjoyed the box seat. Had every possible chance but was well beaten by the furlong.
Couldn't muster any speed despite being ridden along and settled a long last. Failed to pass another runner at any stage.
Never far off the pace early. One-out-one-back from 1100M. Shifted 3-wide to challenge leaders turning into home. Hit front 200M. Hung on well to score.
Ahead of midfield early. Left wide and without cover from 1100M. 2Ls down turning in. Fought on gamely but was fended off by winner.
Settled at midfield on fence to home straight. Finished off satisfactorily but lacked finishing touch of the front pair.
Rolled forward and led one-off to home straight. One-paced to conclude.
Prominent spot to home straight. Held ground thereafter.
2 to 3 wide at midfield to home straight. Ran on without threat.
3-wide behind midfield to home straight. Plugged on to the line.
2-wide towards rear to home turn. Gradually shifted widest for clear run home straight. Made up some ground late.
At rear early. Made run widest rounding home turn. Failed to offer extra home straight.
In a forward spot on fence. Clung on until peaked final 300M.
Pressured early and raced behind midfield on fence. Never nearer.
At rear throughout. Never a factor. (Small wound to the left front pastern).
2-wide behind midfield on fence to home straight. Faded final 300M.
Away in line and was gradually taken towards rear. Couldn't pick up top of home straight. Well beaten final furlong. (Substantial amount of blood in horse's trachea).
Clean break, near rear one off, came free 300m, strong sprint, easy win.
Broke well, bumped hard, fourth one off, quickened and led top of straight, no match to winner.
Slowly away, second last rail, shaken up 400m, strong finish for third.
Good jump, third last one off, shaken up top of straight, came well, too late.
Quick jump, eighth 3-deep covered, stayed on well.
Jumped well and knocked off balance, eleventh 3-deep covered, wide turn top of straight, kept on.
Fair break, last rail, shaken up 500m out, ran on well between runners, kept on.
Fair jump, sixth one off, one pace under drive.
Good jump, second one off, one pace under drive.
Quickly away, disputed lead, led rail, ran on, evenly last 150m.
Good break, fifth 3-deep without cover, kept on well to the line.
Poor jump, recovered, midfield rail, not much under drive.
Badly hampered and checked after jump, found nil.
Broke sideway and hard contacted, third rail, not quicken.
Fair break, tenth rail, headway 600m out, powerful finish in fast run last quarter.
Good break, ninth rail, came smartly for second, no match for winner.
Quick jump, disputed lead, second one off, led briefly straight, kept on well.
Fair break, midfield sixth rail, shaken up straight, stayed on for fourth.
Fair break, eighth 3-deep covered, shaken up 450m out, kept on well.
Fair break, seventh one off, let go 400m out, kept on without threatening.
Slowly away, used hard whole race, third 3-deep no cover, stubbornly.
Poor break, second last one off, wide turn, came on, too far behind.
Poor break, rear rail, one pace at best.
Broke sideways, last rail, widest of all home turn, ran on late.
Quickly away, fifth one off, outsprinted in fast last quarter.
Poor break, twelfth one off, no threat.
Hopped in air start, recovered to dispute lead, led rail, soon clear, weakened.
Fair break, fourth rail, shaken up 450m out, beaten 300m.
Midfield on the fence, 4Ls off the leaders, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, scored without being fully tested.
Pushed forward, settled just behind the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, led 300M, overhauled 100M, stayed on for 2nd.
At rear, 7Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, blocked 4-2, dashed strongly when clear for a remarkable 3rd.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
At rear, 7Ls off the leaders along the fence, dashed well 250M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 250M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leaders, trapped 4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 250M.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow tempo, held up 4-2, raced flat when clear.
Took rail easily and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on until 250M weakened.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, no progress.
Slow away, pushed to hold the rail behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow pace, no progress.
Pushed forward to share the lead 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, however soon emptied 300M.
Eased back, harmed by the slow pace, never competitive, tailed out.
Good break, midfield rail, eager, had to wait for run before bursting through, battle with second, led close home.
Ridden to lead rail, kicked mid-straight, kept on very well, just caught.
Well away, fifth rail, out for mid-track bid, no match for first two.
Broke well, sixth one off, out for wide bid, kept on quite well.
Broke well, led early then third rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back to rear one off, wide bid, ran on strongly late.
Fair break, up wide to share lead, then second one off, challenged leader early straight, not get by, weakened.
Slightly missed break, rear rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, wide bid, one pace.
Broke well, steadied back to mid-rear two off, aimed wide, little progress.
Fair break, midfield rail, found very little when asked for effort.
Fair break, ridden early but unable to lead, fourth two off, driven, weakened.
Moderate break, mid-rear one off, ridden before straight, no progress.
Fair break, mid-rear rail, ridden, found nil.
Settled 3-wide towards the rear, had a smooth trip to straight, responded well to pressure hitting the front near 100M, held on when tackled by the runner up in final stages.

Held up towards the rear, behind an unsettled runner in middle stages and was hampered near 1100M and 700M, chased eventual winner from 400M, came close to win 100M but the winner found the necessary to hold on.
Strode forward to race outside the leader, led passing 300M, soon pressed by a rival but rallied on under a forceful ride, not pace of first two inside 100M.
Handily placed behind leading pair, mounted a serious challenge inside 300M, had every chance but not pace of first two inside 100M.

Slowly away, became very difficult to settle when taken in behind runners, loomed a threat behind leaders 300M out but was pushed into a pocket mid-straight, didn't get out until late, not properly tested.
Travelled 3-wide in midfield and was left with no cover from 800M, found less than expected in the finish and never looked like getting to the leaders.
Held up in midfield along the fence, stayed on fairly, held up for a few strides inside 100M but made little difference to the results.
Settled near last about 7Ls off the pace, made some progress from the rear over the final 400M but had no impression on the leaders.
Positioned 2-wide ahead of mid-division, kept on same pace to 200M then weakened.
Failed to muster early speed despite being vigorously ridden, ended up near last on the inside, found little in straight, eased inside 150M.
Switched off to last on jumping from 14, 3-wide turning for home, found nothing and was never a threat at the back.
Crossed to the lead and took them along at a steady pace, headed passing 300M, dropped out rapidly.
Tracked leaders, found nothing turning into straight, eased inside 300M when no chance.
Settled along the fence in midfield, weakened passing 300M and dropped to last.
Taken back to midfield two off, improved turn, switched inside, strong run to lead on line.
Taken back to mid-rear two off, eager, wide bid, led 50m out, caught on line.
Fair break, settled fifth rail, inside bid, led mid-straight until caught last 50m.
Fair break, not rushed, third last rail, mid-track bid, stayed on well late.
Quick break, led and crossed, headed mid-straight, kept on one pace.
Taken back to rear rail, came through runners straight, kept on well but unable to challenge.
Fair break, back to mid-rear rail, wide bid until flattened out late.
Fast break, midfield rail, inside bid, kept on one pace.
Taken back but still caught three wide, up to fourth two off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Taken back to second last one off, traffic problems early straight, no chance thereafter, but no kick either.
Broke well, second rail, driven for inside bid, no progress.
Fair break, up to second one off, driven but one pace straight.
Fair break, midfield two off, lost ground approaching straight, aimed for mid-track bid, found nil.
Moderate break, held up fifth last two off, improved wide turn, ridden, dropped out tamely.
Jumped well, ridden across to share lead, controlled tempo in front, kicked clear in straight, found plenty to score well.
Jumped well and shared lead early before taking a sit behind the leader, enjoyed good run behind leaders, angled out at the top of the straight, couldn't run down leader, every chance.
Began with field, settled worse than mid field, ridden along in the middle stages to improve mid field, clear running in straight and made steady ground.
Jumped only fairly and ridden along to hold position better than mid field, raced keenly in behind the leaders, held ground in the straight.
Began fairly with field and tightened for room, caught wide and raced 4 wide mid field without cover for the duration of the race, brought wide into straight, made run and peaked final 100m.
Away well from wide barrier and ridden across to share lead, held ground entering straight, faded final 100m.
Jumped with field, taken back from wide barrier to settle at rear of the field, improved position along the rails from the 800m, ran on one paced in the straight.
Slow to begin and settled at rear of the field, entered the straight at the rear of the field looking for runs, taken back to the inside and made steady ground.
Began well with the field, settled worse than mid field, ran on one paced in the straight.
Jumped slowly and ridden along to hold prominent position on rails, one paced entering the straight and gave ground.
Jumped well and raced prominent early before restraining to race mid field, raced wide with cover, made no ground in the straight.
Jumped well and settled mid field, lost position mid race when tightened for room. Entered straight at rear of the field, made no ground.
Jumped with field and taken back from wide barrier to settle at rear of the field. Raced wide with cover, entered straight at rear of the field and made no impression in the straight.
Out fairly when crowded for room at the start, raced keenly on pace wide without cover for duration of the race, faded in the straight after hard run.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began well, settled in midfield, commenced move approaching home bend and widest into straight, ran on well down centre of track to win easily.

Began with others, hampered early stages and settled just worse than midfield, commenced move approaching home bend but baulked briefly when wide in midfield on straightening, made good progress down centre of track to snatch 2nd late.

Began with others, settled in prominent position before carried backward to 4th on rails just better than midfield, shifted wide into straight but badly baulked for a run on straightening, fought on steadily to claim 3rd late.
Blundered shortly after jump, settled well behind, saved a lot of ground on inside turning in, loomed up to hold some chance over 200 M out, unable to sustain effort closing stages.
Began with others, settled in midfield on rails, hugged inside rails turning in, fought on to hold some chance over 200 M out but unable to sustain effort closing stages.
Jumped in air losing ground, quickly recovered to midfield out wide, continued headway to take up running 800 M out, led the field into straight but unable to sustain effort and headed 200 M out.
Began awkwardly losing ground, soon crossed for rails and travelled well behind, hampered 500 M out, ran on in straight to be nearest at finish.
Began moderately, settled towards the rear, very wide on home turn, did not make much impression in the run home.
Began moderately, ridden early to vie for early lead, taken back for cover far side travelling 2Ls off the lead in 4th or 5th, wider turning in, kept on one pace.

Began with others, contested early lead under pressure, came out of home straight in front before taken back for cover early far side, one-back on rails around home bend, faded gradually after straightening.

Began awkwardly and failed to muster under hard driving, midfield when hampered and lost about 2Ls on stables bend, remained towards rear and hampered twice on home bend, saved ground turning for home, found nothing under pressure.
Began fairly, prominent without cover rounding first bend, moved up to share the lead early far side and one-out-one-back around home bend, soon weakened in home straight.

Taken back from the outside alley and parked at the tail of the field, 2 wide with cover. Came down the centre of the track with a blistering run to swoop over its rivals and grab victory close to the wire.
Sluggish at the start then was ridden along to maintain touch with the field whilst settling at the rear along the paint. Motored home to grab 2nd in the shadows of the post.
Camped midfield, 3 wide with cover. Loomed up as a threat and was in front with 50m to go but was collard late.
Showed good speed to settle 1 out 1 back. Kept on well.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race after box seating. Hit the front near the 200m and looked likely but was overhauled inside the 100m.
Settled worse than midfield, 1 off with cover. Copped a check approaching the 100m whilst running on then was hampered over the final 100m and never really got a clear shot.
Hustled along early and camped just off the speed 3 wide with cover on the circle. Was a spent force over the concluding stages.
Began well and took its time to eventually fold across and travel outside the leader2-3 wide without cover. Faded over the final 100m.
A little slow to begin but soon gathered momentum and led along the fence. Was running on empty by the furlong.
Raced with the backmakers, 2 wide with cover. Plugged away in the home straight.
Travelled behind midfield the fence. Commenced to close off fairly but ran into traffic problems over the final 100m and because of this was not properly tested.
Settled in a midfield position, 2 deep with cover. Kept to the inside in the straight but failed to run on.
In a forward spot early. Settled 2-wide ahead of midfield from 1100M. Hard ridden and swung wide rounding home turn. Rallied on and prevailed at line.

Driven forward from high draw and eventually parked one-off behind pace from 1200M. Shifted 3-wide and challenged leaders turning in. Hit front final furlong and rider lost balance inside 100M. Just failed.
Urged early and occupied a prominent spot to home straight. Swung out to make run 350M. Matched strides with eventual winner but couldn't sustain effort near the post.
Pressed early and raced 2-wide behind midfield to home straight. Finished off well to make frame final stride.
Switched to a spot towards rear on fence after start. Took inside run home turn. 4Ls down 350M. Closed off satisfactorily and nearly made frame.
Began well. Eased to 2-wide at midfield first turn. Pressured and came wide leaving home turn. Progressed steadily without threatening the principals.
Back with last few to home straight. Covered decent ground late.
3-wide behind midfield to home straight. Plugged on.
Led on fence until overhauled final furlong. Weakened closing stages.
At midfield on fence to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch when asked.
Taken to rear from highest draw. Same position entering home straight. Ran on fairly.
Trapped wide at midfield first turn. Strode forward and sat outside speed 1100M. Struggled 400M and faded soon after straightening.
Fair break, settled fourth rail, out for mid-track bid, led 100m out, won comfortably.
Broke fast, led rail early and through straight until passed by winner 100m out.
Sluggish start, held up midfield rail, mid-track bid, kept on.
Fair break, not rushed early, third last rail, kept on steadily.
Fair break, midfield one off, slight check far side, ridden entering straight, modest progress.
Fair break, sixth three off, wide bid, kept on one pace.
Well away, ridden for lead but caught four wide, back to mid-rear but still three off, switched inside, came past weakeners late.
Taken back from wide draw, two lengths last until straight, swung wide, kept on quite well but never a factor.
Fast break, second one off, mid-track bid, weakened.
Broke well, up with leaders early then back to fifth one off, aimed wide, driven, weakened late.
Fair break, urgent bid for lead, then settled fourth two off, ridden entering straight, no progress.
Fair break, taken back to rear one off, inside bid, found nil.
Jumped well and bumped, calmly in seventh one off, six-deep home bend, came powerfully last 100m, led late.
Clean break, shown good speed, hard held in fifth one off, came on well, led briefly, lost lead late.
Fair jump, in touch fourth rail, ran on well along rail coming home, held third.
Tardy break, last rail, wide turn, came strongly last 100m, just missed money.
Quickly away, prominent third one off, all out, evenly, outsprinted last 100m.
Swiftly away, mid-division sixth rail, all out, one pace coming home.
Fair jump, tenth one off, ran on evenly.
Quickest off the blocks, led rail unchallenged, one pace once headed.
Fair jump, eighth rail, pushed out one pace.
Quick jump, disputed lead second one off, shaken up top of straight, found nil.
Hopped in air, eleventh rail, all out, one pace, no threat.
Jumped well, raced without cover 3-deep near rear, strong headway 500m out, widest of all top of straight, beaten 200m out.
Crossed easily in front, settled in box seat at good pace, closed off strongly 300M to score.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace 2 wide, made steady ground 300M to get 2nd.
Behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the good pace along the fence, progressed steadily 200M for 3rd.
Pushed forward for prominent spot, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden early to keep up with the field, 4.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, held up 300M, made some ground when clear.
Eased at start to get cover at rear, 6Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, made steady ground 200M.
Midfield, 3Ls behind the good pace, trapped 4 wide throughout and lost significant amount of ground, no dash, but still ran on well to the line.
Pushed early, 4.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, lack turn of foot, just held ground in straight.
Pushed forward to take the rail and led by 0.5L at good pace, ran on until 200M weakened.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 2.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, flattened 200M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, flattened 150M.
Slow away, pushed forward, sat outside the leader with good pace, soon weakened after straightening.
Broke well from wide, quickly up to second one off, slightly inconvenienced by loose horse far side, led 150m out, soon in charge.
Fair break, settled third rail, pulled out for mid-track bid, winner too strong.
Broke well, settled midfield rail, inside bid, ran on well under pressure without quite being able to challenge.
Jumped fast, led rail, checked by loose horse far side, kicked clear early straight, weakened slightly late.
Fair break, fourth one off, wide bid, kept on but just outpaced.
Fair break, not rushed early, settled third last rail, inside bid, kept on steadily but not pace to challenge.
Awkward start, last early, improved turn for wide bid, kept on quite well.
Fair break, rear group one off, slight check approaching turn, kept on one pace.
Broke well, not pace to lead, back to midfield three off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not much early speed, midfield one off, ridden turn, driven early straight, kept on one pace.
Moderate start, caught three wide whole trip, shaken up straight, no progress.

Placing: UR
Comment: Veered and unseated rider start.
Travelled strongly behind midfield, made a crucial move away from the rails passing 500M, into clear 300M and settled the race with a decisive burst final 150M.
Held up in midfield one off the fence, moved into contention passing 400M, responded well once in line for home and was just gunned down by winner final 50M.
Always in touch, loomed a threat inside 250M, led 150M-100M, kept on well but not pace of first two final stages.
Close up, pressed leader from 800M, briefly led mid-straight, one paced final 150M.
Taken back after the start and was patiently held up to near 400M, probably not helped by the steady tempo in middle stages, made headway inside 300M but was never quite getting to leaders.
Switched off to last after the start, settled 9Ls off the steady pace in middle stages, made only limited progress inside 300M and never looked likely.
Held up in midfield on the fence about 3Ls behind leaders, found less than expected turning in and was outpaced by leaders inside 200M.
Held up at the rear of mid-division, pushed along inside 500M, taken widest turning for home, not quickened under pressure.
Slow to begin, raced towards the rear 7Ls off the pace, shaken up halfway round home turn but never going the pace to threaten leaders, weakened final 100M.
Tracked leaders, bustled along passing 400M, outpaced early straight, no threat to leaders after.
Strode forward and crossed to the lead passing 1400M, led steadily to straight, headed near 250M, weakened final 200M.
Never far off leaders but travelled 3-wide without cover for most of the way, had little left turning in, weakened to last nearing 200M.
