Began well and quickly into stride to get across for rails run in the lead, held running until joined early in straight, fought on well to maintain clear advantage inside final 100 M.
Began moderately, travelled mainly in midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, briefly baulked after straightening, made steady progress down inner without threatening.

Began fairly from the middle draw, raced wide without cover in a prominent position down far side, around the bend and into the straight, came under hard driving inside final 350 M but failed to quicken to threaten. (Tactic questioned.)
Began with others, soon taken back to race 3-wide behind runners in midfield, looked quickening after straightening but unable to sustain effort inside final 200 M.
Reared shortly before the start, began with others but soon taken well back, hampered 300 M out before making up good late ground in the run home.
Began fairly, niggled along for pace early, settled outside leader in 2nd spot, disputed lead upon straightening, faded under pressure inside final 200 M.
Began moderately, quickly moved up to first few settling one-back in 4th on rails, baulked after straightening, found nothing inside final 300 M.
Began with others, soon settled wide in last few, remained well back racing keenly at times and wide to straight, made some progress down centre of track without threatening.
Began with others, soon picked up to a prominent position in 2L 5th, remained similar into straight, gradually faded under pressure.
Began with others, settled worse than midfield, baulked for a run after straightening, made no impression in the run home. (Tactic questioned.)
Settled in rear of midfield, raced awkwardly coming out of back straight, midfield turning in, switched out for a run on straightening but failed to quicken under pressure.

Began with others, soon taken back to cross for rails run, awkwardly placed behind runners in rear coming out of back straight, remained towards the rear around the bend, saved ground on rails turning, made no impression in the run home.
Slowly away, travelled just worse than midfield, similar turning in, ran home one-paced down the centre of the track.
Began with others, raced wide in midfield throughout, soon weakened after straightening.
Settled worse than midfield, 2 deep with cover. Ran into traffic problems early in the straight but once in the clear was able to unleash a strong sprint and grabbed victory close to home.
Made its run from the rear, 2 wide with cover. Looped the field after the 700m and shot clear at the 350m, looked the winner only to be nailed on the wire.
Stalked the leader along the rails. Held on willingly in the home straight.
Parked 3 back the fence. Finished off gamely to make the frame.
Settled at the tail of the field 3 wide with cover. Was carted 4-5 wide no cover on the circle, came widest on the home turn and closed off soundly.
Settled midfield, 1 off with cover. Maintained a steady gallop right down the running.
Camped midfield, 3 wide with cover. Stayed on one paced in the run to the winning post.
Eventually crossed and settled in 2nd position outside the leader after the 1100m. Was challenged near the 400m, and didn't find any extra when asked for an effort, struggling over the final furlong.
Sent forward and led along the paint. Was headed at the 400m and weakened inside the final 100m.
Slow to begin travelling behind midfield, 3 deep with cover. Failed to make any appreciable ground in the straight.
Ridden along early & settled behind midfield the fence. Kept to the inside in the home straight and plugged away to the line.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race 1 out 1 back. Had every chance but failed to capitalize.
Taken back from a wide alley to settle with the backmakers along the paint. Struggled in the final stretch.
Raced prominently but was left racing 3 wide without cover approaching the circle and was never likely thereafter finishing well back. (To Trial)
Ridden early and settled 3-wide behind midfield. 8Ls down rounding home turn. Rallied on and asserted authority final 50M.
Prominent spot to home straight. Kept on well after afforded clear run 350M. Couldn't resist winner close home.
Ahead of midfield near the fence to home straight. Kept giving for 3rd.
2-wide towards rear early. 9Ls off home turn. Covered substantial ground to make frame.
Back with last few to home straight. Gradually shifted out for clear run passing 400M. Made up good ground thereafter.
Settled 2-wide at midfield to home turn. Swung out and was 4Ls back on straightening. Progressed steadily until weakened closing stages.
Travelled wide and without cover towards rear to home straight. Made some improvement thereafter.
At midfield on fence to home straight. Plugged on without threat.
2 to 3-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Remained one-paced until no extra final 100M.
Behind midfield on fence early. Dropped towards rear home turn. Ran on final 300M.
At rear to home straight. Never a factor.
Niggled early and sat outside pace to home straight. Faded final 300M.
Sat 2-wide behind leaders to home straight. Couldn't pick up passing 400M and was eased final furlong. (Substantial amount of blood in horse's trachea.)
Pushed early and shared lead on fence approaching home turn. Opened a 3Ls gap with the rest of the field passing 600M. Compounded soon after straightening.
Quickest of all, led easily rail, uncontested, kicked 300m out, held on well.
Good jump, good speed, prominent fourth one-off, shaken up 350m out, strong finish, just missed.
Broke well, tenth one-off, widest of all top of straight, laid in under drive, strong finish for third.
Broke well, third rail, every chance straight, kept on one pace.
Hopped out of gate, slipped, dwelt, recovered, twelfth rail, gained smartly late.
Broke well, ninth rail, pushed out 350m, all out, kept on one pace.
Quickly away, sixth one-off, wide home turn, one pace.
Fair break, eighth one-off, shaken up 450m out, one pace, no threat.
Broke well, chased leader, second three-deep without cover until 800m, kept on late.
Clean break, chased early pace, fifth three-deep without cover, kept on until 100m, dropped out tamely.
Broke sideways, eleventh one-off, not quicken.
Broke in air, recovered seventh rail, driven 400m out, found nil.
Broke sideways, second last one-off, found nil under drive.
Bad jump to left, last rail, found nothing when asked.
Fast break, fourth one-off, long drive from 350m out, slow gain, led near line.
Moderate break, midfield rail, gained slowly between runners, just missed.
Quickly away, settled eighth one-off, finished well for close third.
Broke fast, disputed lead, second rail after 200m, led early straight, all out, one pace last 100m.
Bumped at start, recovered, in touch fifth one-off, kept on, outkicked late.
Good break, chased pace, raced 3-deep without cover until 800m when third rail, challenged from 200m out, kept fighting to line.
Swiftly away, ninth three off, came on late.
Quickly away, midfield three off no cover without cover, all out drive from top of straight, kept on one pace.
Slow break, tenth rail, blocked for run until last 150m, one pace to line.
Clean break, twelfth, one pace, no threat.
Clean break, last rail, found nil.
Quickest from the barrier, disputed, led after 200m, uncontested, beaten 350m out.
Broke left, second last three-off, wide turn, found nil.
Fair break, raced greenly four-deep without cover entire trip midfield, beaten 400m out.
Settled in front, 3Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, closed off strongly 300M to score.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 250M and gained 2nd.
Pushed to keep up in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader on the rails, not suited by the slow tempo, held up 4-2, dashed well when clear for 3rd.
Eased back, 6.5Ls off the leader on the fence, blocked most straight, dashed well to the line despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to rear, 7.5Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 200M without much threats.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M flattened.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, 2.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, held up 4-2, no dash when clear.
Eased to rear and took rail, 9.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Pushed forward, sat 1L off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, however soon weakened 250M.
Taken back to last one off, wide bid, very strongly ridden, ran on well to lead close home.
Broke fast, found slot midfield one off, quickened early straight, led by length mid-straight, just caught.
Well away, taken back to third last one off, quickened well to join leader 100m out, just outkicked late.
Taken back, fourth last rail travelling comfortably, eased out for run but gaps closed on him throughout straight.
Taken back to second last rail, ran on well until short of room then badly checked mid-straight, kept on again but no chance thereafter.
Fair break, midfield rail, challenged between horses, kept on until weakened slightly late.
Broke quickly, led rail then back to fifth rail, short of room mid-straight, kept on well once free.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, shaken up early straight, some progress until outpaced late.
Broke well, fourth one off, ridden early straight, one pace late.
Fair break, ridden to lead, headed and third rail, inside bid, blocked for run, kept on one pace once free.
Ridden up from wide draw, wide first bend, eventually led and crossed, tried to kick early straight, headed, weakened.
Fair break, with leaders three wide first turn, then second one off, challenged early straight, weakened.
Held up in midfield along the rails, peeled out to find clear running early straight, had some work to do going into 200M, put in a strong late surge to nail Ambitious Dragon right on the line.
Settled 3-wide ahead of midfield, no cover from 1200M and pushed wider over the home turn, soon alongside leaders in straight, led 200M out but strides shortened final stages, caught on the line.
Always handy behind leaders, short of room early straight but responded well once a gap opened up on the rail, went 3rd 50M out hung on to that position in a tight photo finish.
Given a waiting ride towards the rear of the field, laid out under pressure early straight, late surge inside 200M, nearest finish.
Taken back to last about 7Ls off the slow pace, peeled out into clear running nearing 400M, finished fastest, nearest line.
Emerged to lead from 1200M, set a slow pace middle stages, unable to shake off pursuers turning into straight, headed nearing 200M, faded late stages and was swamped in the shadows of the post.
In mid-division and well covered, kept grinding away in the straight and wasn't beaten far, ran a fine race considering the strength of the opposition.
Up with early pace then restrained to sit behind leaders, pushed wide 700M out, responded well early straight and looked a threat, but run ended passing 200M then gave way.
Dropped in behind midfield along the 2-path, not quickened inside 400M, no impression on the much higher rated rivals.
Took keen hold, held up in last pair, kept on same pace turning for home, never threatened.
Led early then sat behind leader approaching the turn, not quickened when pressed on inside 400M, weakened out of contention mid-straight.
Taken back and settled near last 6Ls off the pace, switched wide passing 500M but found little under pressure, eased final 100M.
Caught wide with cover in midfield, responded well when asked 350 M out, finished off soundly and soon took the lead, won easily.
Travelled one-off just behind the pace, quickened well when asked 300 M out, ran on well for 2nd.
Taken rearward from high draw, pulled early, on heels at 700 M, kicked when clear 300 M out, finished off soundly for 3rd.
Lacked early speed and travel rearward, obtained clear running at the top of the home straight, ran on well but lost a place in final 100 M.
Prominently placed just off the speed, ran on to contest the lead 350 M out, kept on satisfactorily but could not match the strides of the top four in the final furlong.
Niggled along to track the leader, kept on satisfactorily early in the home straight, could not find extra final 150 M.
Crowded start, settled well just behind the mid-division, hung in late, made up gradual ground final 250 M.
Awkward start, rider lost his left stirrup after start, soon ran up to take the box-seat, only gave limited response when asked 300 M out.
Lacked early speed and travelled one-off just behind the mid-division, held ground until flattened 200 M out. (Lame right fore.)
Crowded start, settled on rail in midfield, on heels at 300 M and 200 M, only gave limited response when asked for efforts.
Urged along to hold the one-out-one-back spot, only held ground, failed to keep on final 200 M.
Pushed along to hold a fence position just off the pace, held ground until weakened 250 M out.
Pushed up to lead at a solid tempo, headed 300 M out, soon weakened.
Taken rearward from high draw, never competitive.
Began slowly and ridden along to settle in handy position. Entered the straight 3 wide with cover, got the split, dashed and went away late for a strong win.
Jumped well and settled to race outside the leader. Quickened entering the straight and kicked clear to be caught final 50m.
Away well and was restrained to settle mid field. Raced wide without cover throughout the race. Commenced run entering the straight and made good ground given tough trip.

Bounced with field, restrained from wide barrier then ridden to improve position to settle mid field the rails. Raced in restricted room entering the straight. Clear running from the 300m, strong run making good ground.

Jumped well, restrained from wide barrier to settle worse than mid field. Raced at the rear of the field and entered the straight behind runners where briefly held up for clear running. Made good ground in the straight.
Began well and ridden along to lead. Controlled tempo throughout the race, headed entering the straight and held ground in the straight.
Jumped well, no early speed and settled at the rear of the field. Raced wide with cover throughout race, circled the field entering the straight and made strong run.
Jumped well and held handy position from inside barrier. Raced keenly in the middle stages. Held ground in the straight. (Lame next day.)
Out in line and restrained from wide barrier to race at the rear of the field. Made steady ground along the inside in the straight.
Jumped fairly and raced worse than mid field. Raced wide with cover throughout race. Commenced wide run entering the straight and made steady ground, peaked final 100m.
Jumped well and raced behind the leaders. Raced keenly in the middle stages. Gave ground in the straight.
Jumped fairly and settled mid field the rails. No run on in the straight.
Jumped with the field and settled mid field. No run on in the straight.
Jumped well and raced in a handy position, wide without cover for the duration of the race. Commenced run entering the straight, sharing the lead before quickly giving ground in the straight.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Began fairly, ridden to keep in touch on rails holding 2nd spot, fought on doggedly in straight, gained upper hand inside final 100 M.
Settled in rear of midfield, saved a lot of ground on rails turning in, inconvenienced for a run until 100 M out, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Began from a high draw, soon settled well back, wide into straight, rattled home down centre of the track to do best work late.
Ridden along from the widest gate down far side, soon took up running but remained one off the rails, headed under pressure 100 M out and lost placing late.
Prominent early, lost ground and dropped to forward of midfield coming off the Rock, similar but wider turning in, fought on steadily to be nearest at finish.
Began well, with leaders briefly before shuffled back and lost 2Ls to just better than midfield 900 M out, held 5th under pressure into straight, kept on same pace without quickening.

Began with others, settled in midfield on rails, carried backward towards the rear coming out of back straight, gradually recovered to midfield approaching home straight, made modest progress early on, one-paced inside final 150 M.
Slowly away, crossed for rails run at the back, trailed the field to straight, ran on past well-beaten runners but baulked inside final 100 M and not ridden out.
Never better than midfield, inconvenienced for a run 250 M out, kept on steadily without threatening.
Began moderately, travelled in last few and never seen with a chance. (Heart irregularity.)
Began with others, with leaders early far side, shuffled back to 2L 3rd coming onto home bend, folded up quickly upon straightening. (Blood in trachea.)
Midfield early, gradually picked up to within 2Ls of pace, shuffled back to 3L 4th around the bend, widest runner turning in, soon weakened.
Parked midfield, 2 deep with cover. Closed off strongly and had the race in its keeping 50m out.
Caught a little wide early but managed to slot in and track the leader on the rails after the 1200m. Saved ground on the home turn, peeled out around 1 early in the stretch and stayed on well.
Sent forward and led along the fence. Maintained a sound effort in the straight.
Made its run from the tail of the field along the fence. Closed off well despite having to be steadied and taken out into clear running near the 100m.
Raced prominently establishing a position 1 off the fence, had cover. Peeled out after the 500m and commenced a run 3 deep. Paddled away in the home straight.
Went back from the outside gate and raced with the backmakers, 3 wide with cover. Made some late ground without threatening.
Raced 3 back the fence. Had every chance but only plugged away in the run to the wire.
Settled behind midfield along the paint. Wouldn't settle at times, shifted out to race 1 off after the 800m. Never really quickened in the final stretch.
Settled towards the rear, 2 deep with cover. Peeled out into a 3 wide line after the 500m but failed to run on.
Caught wide early without cover and after the 900m, went forward and crossed to race outside the leader near the 600m. Faded in the run home.
Travelled at the tail of the field, 1 off with cover. Struggled in the straight and was disappointing.
Raced in a rearward position 3 wide. Lost its cover after the 700m, was taken wider on the circle and was never likely.
Eased to sit 2-wide towards rear after start. Improved to behind midfield on fence 1100M. Peeled out and was 3Ls down turning in. Finished off strongly and took charge final 50M.
Niggled along and raced 3-wide behind leaders first turn. Slotted 2-wide ahead of midfield 1100M. Made run 4-wide passing 500M. Lacked finishing touch of winner but kept giving to hold 2nd.
Prominent spot to home straight. Every chance but no answer to winner's kick. Beaten narrowly in a battle for 2nd at line.
Shared lead on fence to home straight. Clung on until overhauled by the front trio inside final furlong.
At rear to home straight. Swung widest 350M. Covered good ground thereafter.
Driven forward from widest draw but trapped 3-wide without cover behind pace early. Tucked 2-wide behind leaders 1000M. Ridden 3-wide 500M but couldn't turn up a notch.
Towards rear on fence to home straight. Made up minor ground late.
2-wide behind midfield. Never nearer.
Away in line and was caught 3-wide at midfield early. Parked 2-wide towards rear from 1100M. Beat tired runners home.
Raced 2-wide at midfield to home turn. Pushed to maintain position 500M. Faded soon after straightening.
Midfield on fence early and middle stages. Pressured 500M but failed to pick up. No show home straight.
Pressed forward and sat outside speed. Came under pressure soon after straightening. Well beaten before post.
Good jump, prominent, second rail, gap came 200m out, all out, held on well.
Clean break, second last 5-back rail, had to wait for gap until 100m out, came powerfully for close second.
Quickly away, sixth rail, gap opened last 75m, strong finish.
Good jump, hard ridden to dispute lead, led 700m out, shaken up entering straight, stayed on well to line.
Fair jump, ninth one-off, strong headway 500m out, kept on well to line.
Quickest of all, third one-off, all out one pace.
Sluggishly away, eleventh 4-deep without cover bend to straight, ran on smartly late.
Hopped and poor break, last one-off half-way, kept on one pace.
Hopped at break, soon recovered, eighth rail at 700m out, no threat.
Broke well, midfield one-off, unbalanced under drive, never recovered.
Quick jump, midfield 3-deep without cover, headway 600m, kept on one pace.
Clean break, midfield one-off, not quicken, beaten 100m out.
Jumped well, seventh rail, came free last 100m, won going away.
Quickest of all, led rail, uncontested, all out, held second.
Quick jump, chased early pace, second one-off, all out, kept on one pace.
Fair jump, fifth rail, kept on one pace late.
Swiftly away, third rail, pushed out, one pace.
Slow jump, sixth one-off, wide home turn, kept on one pace, no threat.
Missed jump, eight one-off, shaken up 250m out, came on late.
Sluggish break, fourth one-off, one pace.
Fair jump, tenth one-off, widest of entering straight, no threat.
Fair jump, last one-off, found nil.
Clean break, ninth 3-deep without cover, headway 450m out, wide bid, soon beaten.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, although not suited by the slow tempo, dashed strongly 250M without any traffic congestion, won by short head.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, checked 300M, held up 4-2, dashed strongly when clear, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300M for 3rd.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on strongly until 50M overhauled, ran on for 4th.
Pushed to occupy box seat, benefited by the slow tempo, just ran on ok.
Eased to rear and took rail, 9Ls off the leaders, blocked 300M, harmed by the slow pace, dashed well to the line.
Hard ridden to hold the rail in midfield, 4Ls off the leader, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Eased to sit behind midfield, 6Ls off the leader on the rails, harmed by the slow tempo, blocked 300M, little dash when clear.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, checked 300M, held up 4-2, just held ground when clear.
Trapped 3 wide throughout in midfield, 4Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, still held ground in straight despite all negative racing situations.
At rear, 8Ls off the leader along the fence, not harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Settled 1L off the leader 2 wide, enjoyed the slow sectionals, soon weakened 250M.
Easily ran up to lead 1L on rails, quickened at 600m and three lengths clear at home turn, kept on strongly, never challenged.
Settled one-off in mid-division, crowded 250 M out, finished soundly final 200 M under hard riding, ran on.
Jumped fast, prominent just behind leader, niggled along when pace quickened at the home turn, kept on well.
Prominent, responded well when asked 350 M out, kept on, just missed place.
Taken back from high draw, on heels at 800 M, rider dropped whip 200 M out, finished well final 200 M, too late.
Travelled well one-off midfield, crowded 250m out, made up gradual ground final 200m, never able to threaten.
Taken back from high draw and settled one from the rear, made up gradual ground final 250m, blocked at 100m, not fully tested.
Settled nicely midfield rail, crowded at 1300m, one-pace straight.
Restrained just behind midfield, on heels at 1400 M, little progress straight.
Urged along to one-off spot just off pace, held ground until flattened 200 M out.
Taken to the rear from high draw, never in contention.
Broke fast, settled midfield rail, outpaced entering straight, soon weakened.
Settled well in mid-division, switched to 3-wide 500M out, moved into top gear inside 200M and stayed on strongest to hit lead 50M.
Always prominent, moved up to one out one back from 1200M, kept grinding away under pressure in straight, hit lead briefly near 100M, not pace of winner final 50M.
Held up in mid-division, not suited by the lack of pace and overraced from 900M, travelled wide from midway, chased winner from 300M but was always held.
Held up in 5th, raced a shade keen in middle stages and seemingly unsuited by the slow pace, kept on steadily final 300M.
Patiently held up, raced near the rear in the first half, moved closer making the home turn, steadied early straight, ran on final 250M.
Used a bit to find the lead then slowed things down, led unchallenged, headed inside 100M, weakened and was swallowed up late.
Dropped back to last about 8Ls behind leader in a slowly run affair, held up near 450M when attempting to improve position, switched wide into straight, stayed on but not getting to the leaders.
Soon taken across behind runners, settled near the rear about 6-7Ls back in a slowly run race, ,held up from 300M-200M but had little to offer once getting a clear run.
Tracked leaders in a slowly run race, pushed along 450M, kept on same pace, weakened inside 150M.
Restrained after the start, settled behind midfield along the inside, plodded on one-paced final 300M, never likely.
Dropped in behind midfield, travelled 3-wide without cover from 1300M, shuffled to near last turning for home, made limited progress final 300M, never threatened.
Settled in 4th place always in touch with leaders, not quickened inside 300M, faded in the final stages.

Ridden from a wide draw and soon took up running, joined over 1000 M out, strolled clear after straightening to win unextended.
Prominent early, raced awkwardly in 3L 5th 800 M out, moved forward around the bend to dispute lead into straight, soon outsprinted but fought on for 2nd.
Began well, soon taken back to travel just off the speed on rails, hampered and lost some ground 1200 M out, remained in similar position to straight, kept on same pace without quickening.
Began moderately, gradually ridden to a prominent position in 4th within 2Ls of pace, lost position into straight, plugged on under pressure.
Began moderately, settled in midfield on rails, shifted out for a run entering straight, kept on same pace without quickening.
Slowly away, settled one from last, remained well back into straight, made moderate late impression past well-beaten runners.
Travelled wide in midfield racing greenly at times, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Began moderately, settled in rear of midfield, ran home one-paced.

Drawn poorly, began with others, raced wide without cover in prominent position far side, settled just outside leader around the bend, became 3rd into straight, dropped out of contention after straightening.
Slowly away, soon recovered to 9th position just worse than midfield on rails, saved ground turning in, found nothing under pressure in the run home.
Began with others, soon taken well back, never a danger.
Travelled nicely in 2nd position near the centre of the course. Hit the front approaching the 300m and drew away for a convincing win.
Showed good gate speed to take up the lead along the grandstand side. Maintained a good gallop to the line.
Settled midfield about 5 horses from the grandstand side. Finished off soundly.
Raced midfield approximately 6 off the outside fence, no cover. Ran on well to finish in the frame.
Parked near the pace about 2 off the stand side. Kept whacking away at the same speed over the latter stages.
Raced closest to the outside fence behind the speed. Didn't find any extra when asked for an effort passing the 400m, maintained an even gallop to the post.
Settled about 4 horses from the grandstand rail in a prominent position with some cover. Held its ground over the final stages.
Sluggish at the break settling about 5 horses off the stand side in a handy position without cover. Kept on one paced in the run to the wire.
Slow to begin then tailed the field along the outside rail. Had trouble keeping up midrace. Was put pressure after the 600m and made gradual ground under constant riding.
Camped closer to the far side rail in a midfield position without cover. Battled away over the final stages.
Settled midfield along the grandstand side. Ran into traffic problems after the 400m and never got into clear running and wasn't tested thereafter. (see incident report).
Missed the start settling back in the field towards the centre of the course. Switched in near the 350m after being held up and finished off one paced.
Travelled midfield nearer the rail side, had cover. Failed to find any extra in the run to the line.
Raced towards the centre of the track, midfield no cover. Struggled over the final furlong.
Out nicely. Gradually eased to 3-wide slightly ahead of midfield from 1200M. Rallied on home straight and drew clear closing stages.
Raced 2-wide slightly ahead of midfield to home straight. Not the clearest until 350M. Finished off well but no answer to winner's kick.
2 to 3-wide behind midfield to home straight. Swung wide and kept finding the line satisfactorily for a minor placing.
3-wide towards rear to home straight. Picked up well until held up 200M. Kept on in restricted room thereafter and was not fully tested.
Prominent spot to home straight. Hit front 200M. Failed to repel principals closing stages.
Pressed forward from high draw and eventually took lead on fence home turn. Shared lead 700M. Overhauled final 200M but was not beaten far.
2-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. One-paced to conclude.
Never far off the pace but was taken 3-wide from 800M. Hard ridden home straight but couldn't turn up a notch.
Travelled wide and without cover behind midfield to home straight. Never nearer.
Raced behind midfield on fence early. Dropped towards rear home turn. Made up some ground home straight before disappointed for running 300M. Bumped and was crowded for room final 100M.
Quickly into stride and raced in leading section until no extra final 250M.
At rear to home straight. Made some progress inside until shifted out for daylight 250M. Bumped and became badly unbalanced passing 150M. Badly crowded for room inside 100M.
On fence behind midfield early and middle stages. Made some improvement 3-wide home straight until bumped and became badly unbalanced passing 150M. Checked final 100M.
Lifted front feet off the ground at start and began awkwardly. Always at rear and finished tailed out.
Broke well and raced prominently rail; disputed second in leader's slipstream; switched out off turn, led with 350m our, gamely repelled challengers.
Quickest into stride, led early and dictated, hard ridden off turn; headed 350m out, battled on but not match winner.
Tardy start, outpaced early; progress rail around the turn, switched out entering straight; angled back inside with 300m remaining, ran on to the line.
Sloppy out of the gate; rousted early to hold a midfield position; progress 500m out, fourth with 400m out, one-paced thereafter.
Taken back from wide draw; settled in last, improved 450m out, wide bid, made good late ground.
Fast away, raced near the pace in third; ridden turn; unable to match winner's kick.
Broke well, lacked early pace, rear; travelling well when short of room turn; second last 400m to race picked up readily but unable to threaten.
Smartly away but hampered early strides and lost ground; rear, rail, last 200m out, kept on quite well.
Dwelt slightly, then bustled, midfield wide, pushed along 450m out, modest response.
Well away but caught wide in midfield, tenth and under pressure 300m out, no impression.
Decent start, not settle early, mid-rear when squeezed up after 500m; hard ridden 600m out, little response.
Smart early pace to chase front rank; handy fourth 450m out, driven, little to give, faded quickly.
Fluffed start; recovered to sixth rail; niggled turn, beaten but battling when baulked 250m out, unable to recover.
Well away tracked wide and disputing fourth, fifth and pressured turn; wilted in run to line.
Jumped well, ridden early to settle fourth, peeled off home turn for three wide bid, led 80m out, kept on well.
Fluffed start, rear early, improved to settle third last one-off, had to wait for run early straight, finished fast when free.
Broke well, not pace to lead, settled third rail, kept on steadily under pressure.
Broke well, ridden early to share lead one off, headed and half length second into straight, narrow lead mid-straight, no extra.
Fair break, not much early speed, fourth last rail,, short of room early straight, ran on strongly rail.
Well away, fast up along rail to share lead, led entering straight, battle with fourth, headed, weakened.
Broke well, ridden but not pace to join leaders, midfield one-off, progress straight till run flattened out late.
Moderate break, no early speed, last rail, four lengths adrift into straight, hard ridden but never near to challenge.
Fair break, not much early, second last rail, ridden, little response.
Broke fast, led, ridden, headed, fourth one-off, pressured throughout but gradually lost ground.
Broke well, ridden but caught three wide midfield, wide bid, nothing to give.
Slightly missed kick, ridden to midfield rail, ridden again early straight, found nil.
Settled in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M to win.
Pushed early, at back, 5Ls off the leader on the fence, benefited by the fast tempo, held up 400M, made good ground when clear, took 2nd.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at fast sectionals, hung on until 200M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Eased to rear, 6Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, benefited by the fast pace, progressed steadily 300M.
Behind midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader, helped by the fast tempo, however trapped 3 wide, made steady ground 300M.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, benefited by the fast pace, blocked 4-2, made some ground when clear.
At rear, 6Ls off the leader, favoured by the fast pace but trapped 3-4 wide, held up 400M, made good ground 200M.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, checked 300M, ran on ok.
At back, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the fast pace, lack room 400M, ran on fairly.
Prominent, 2Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, not suited by the fast tempo, emptied 300M.
Settled in box seat, not suited by the fast sectionals, out of fuel 250M.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide, suited by the fast tempo, flattened in straight.
At rear, 6.5Ls off the leader on the fence, suited by the fast pace, lack room 400M, ran on fairly when clear.
Pushed forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the fast tempo, soon weakened 400M.
Clean break, settled midfield rail, came free 300m out, powered away for facile win.
Tardy break, eleventh rail, gained smartly inside last 200m, no match for winner.
Quick break, third one off, led briefly early straight, outpaced last 150m, held third.
Broke in air, recovered to three deep without cover in fifth, driven from long way out, kept fighting to line.
Good break, ninth one off, wide turn, pushed out, ran on late.
Jumped well, in touch fourth rail, lost several positions before turn, all out, one pace.
Poor break, last rail, nine-deep home turn, passed tiring horses late.
Missed break, twelfth one off, wide turn home bend, driven, one pace.
Fair break, in touch, sixth one off, found little under drive.
Fair break, eighth three-deep with cover, not quicken.
Slow break, second last rail, ridden, little response, soon beaten.
Quick break, disputed lead, led after 400m, uncontested, hard drive, weakened.
Slow break, disputed lead, settled second rail after 400m, awkward gait after straightening, eased.
Fair break, tenth rail, beaten immediately at top of straight.
Went forward, shared lead 2-wide, accelerated away early straight and kicked clear, in total control 100M out.
Switched off to last after the start, travelled strongly, into clear 350M, stayed on well, couldn't quite get to the winner but pulled clear of the rest.
Behind midfield early, took closer order making the turn, couldn't match strides with first two final 250M, stayed on for a non-threatening 3rd.
Driven forward to be outside of leading trio, had every chance turning in, not pace of first two, weakened gradually final 150M and lost 3rd close home.
Settled in midfield, kept on over final 300M without threatening principals.
Driven along early from wide barrier but unable to reach the lead, had no cover and was pushed very wide making the turn, one paced and no impression on leaders.
Always in touch but responded only fairly when being asked inside 400M, never going the pace to challenge.
Not far off from the pace in early, stages, raced wide when hung out near 700M, shuffled back to near last coming off the bend, ran past beaten runners only.
Blundered at the start and lost ground, rushed along early to make up lost ground, found little turning in, soon out of contention.
Average jump only, driven forward along the fence to join leaders before the turn, run ended nearing 200M, weakened rapidly.
Pushed along after the start but failed to muster, ended up near last 4-5Ls off the pace, never got going, eased when no chance final 100M.
Quickly into stride, raced a shade keen behind leaders making the turn for home, weakened passing 300M, heavily eased. (Lame right hind leg.)
Quickest of all, led rail, uncontested, all out from 350m out, held on.
Good break, taken back to rear one off, came 9-deep top of straight, finished powerfully, just missed.
Jumped well, eleventh rail, inside bid, blocked until the 200m out, came strongly late for close third.
Good break, pulled, fifth one off, stayed on well coming home.
Fair break, fourth rail, long drive after straightening, kept fighting.
Broke sideways, tenth one-off between runners, ran on but no kick.
Clean break, settled last rail, blocked and checked 300m out, came free last 50m, good finish.
Fast away, chased early pace, three deep without cover entire trip, all out, hampered late, kept fighting.
Clean break, eighth one off, one pace, no threat.
Touch slow, bumped start, midfield rail, blocked straight, checked off heels at 150m and 50m out, unlucky runner.
Hopped in air, recovered at once, prominent second one off, all out, kept on one pace.
Good break, in touch, seventh three deep with cover, not quicken.
Clean break, ninth three deep with cover, came 7-deep top of straight, outpaced.
Slow break and bumped start, twelfth three-deep with cover, ten-deep top of straight, found nil, beaten long way out.
Began well with field and settled behind the leaders. Made strong run to grab the leader in the final stride.
Jumped well and settled to share the lead. Kicked strongly only to be caught in the final stride.
Avail nicely and settled mid field with cover. Made strong ground in the concluding stages.
Jumped with the field and allowed to settle worse than midfield, one off the fence. Ridden along from the 400m and hit the line strongly, making good ground late for place.
Out slowly and ridden along to join the field. Raced in midfield down the centre of track, without cover. Made steady ground over concluding stages.
Jumped well and raced in midfield in the centre of track. Held ground over concluding stages.
Jumped well and settled at rear of field to race with cover. Brought across heels to make run down centre of track, making steady ground.
Began fairly and settled worse than midfield on the grandstand side rail. Made steady ground in the straight.
Away slowly and raced at the rear of the field. Was held up for clear running near the 100m, making some ground late.
Began with field and settled midfield. Under pressure from a long way out and gave ground over the concluding stages.
Jumped with field. Settled midfield in centre of track. Under pressure from long way out, racing in restricted room after the 400m before giving ground.
Standard jump, settled midfield in centre of track. Under pressure from the 500m and commenced to give ground.
Jumped well to find the lead easily. After 400m, got its head up and commenced to hang in. Gave ground badly over the concluding stages.
Jumped fairly and settled worse than midfield. Under pressure early, giving ground late.

Jumped well and settled just off the pace. Allowed the leaders to roll forward, bringing up the rest of the field. Brought into clear running at the top of the straight before letting down strongly to score with ease.
Restrained to settle midfield. Enjoyed good run in the middle stages and made strong run in the straight, no match for the winner but kept on well for 2nd.
Avail fairly and settled midfield, the rail. Tracked winner into the straight, making strong finish to beat the rest of the field convincingly.
Jumped well with good pace early to take the lead, setting a good tempo. Led entering the straight before being claimed in the final 300m. Held ground over concluding stages.
Jumped well and taken back from wide barrier to settle at the rear of the field. Entered the straight at the rear of the field and made good ground late.
Jumped well with field and settled worse than midfield. Brought into clear running in the straight, making steady ground.
Faded back from wide barrier to settle at the rear of the field. Commenced to hang in the early stages of the straight. Made steady ground.
Crowded shortly after the start. Settled worse than midfield and raced wide with cover. Taken wide into the straight to commence run making some ground.
Jumped well. Was difficult to settle in early stages and raced on pace, behind the leader. Weakened over the concluding stages.
After being crowded early, was restrained from wide barrier to settle worse than midfield. One paced in the straight.
Jumped well and ridden along to race on pace. Commenced run entering the straight before giving ground over the concluding stages.
Was slow to begin and settled at the rear of the field. Was disappointed for a run near the 100m and was not fully tested over the concluding stages.
Jumped well and was crowded shortly after the start, settling at the rear of the field. Taken wide entering the straight and made no ground.
Jumped well. Was extremely difficult to settle and as a result was allowed to roll forward racing midfield, wide without cover. Gave ground badly in the straight.

Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Began fairly, settled just off the speed in box-seat on rails, came to challenge upon straightening, hit the front over 200 M out to win readily.
Began well, niggled along to eventually take up running approaching the Rock, led until headed over 200 M out, plugged on for 2nd.
Broke well to lead, ceded advantage going up Rock, one back in 2-wide position turning in, one-paced under pressure.
Began with others, settled just worse than midfield, produced good late impression inside final 200 M.
Began moderately, niggled along behind midfield out wide far side, remained similar turning in, ran on under pressure past well beaten horses in the run home.
Began awkwardly from the widest gate, settled in rear of main body of field on rails, remained well behind turning for home, made up good ground down centre of straight.
Began well, settled just off the speed in prominent 5th, met minor interference 600 M out, remained in similar position into straight, ran home one-paced under pressure.
Began moderately, ridden along in midfield on rails and given a reminder 800 M out, saved ground turning in, could only run home one-paced.
Settled in midfield, shifted wide into straight, found nothing under pressure in the run home. (Bled.)
Began fairly, niggled along early to make prominent positions, swung wide and lost position entering straight, soon faded. (Blood in trachea.)
Soon taken back from a wide draw, travelled well behind to straight, saved a lot of ground on rails turning in, found nothing under pressure.
Began awkwardly losing considerable ground, never recovered and trailed the field throughout.
Given all the favours settling 3 back the rail. Grabbed the lead at the 100m and battled on to claim the prize.
Sent forward and enjoyed an uncontested lead for much of the journey. Still had a decent break on straightening and maintained a good gallop down the running.
Had every possible chance slotting in to travel 1 out 1 back after drawing wide. Worked to the line soundly.
Settled leaders back along the paint. Gave way over the last 100m, held on to make the frame.
Parked midfield, 1 off with cover. Turned for home about 3-4 deep and stayed on one paced in the run to the wire.
Settled with the backmakers along the fence. Went for runs in the straight towards the inside and made only moderate ground.
Eventually settled 4 back the fence. Railed up turning for home but failed to find any when placed under pressure soon after the 350m.
Travelled at the tail of the field, 1-2 wide with cover. Kept to the inside in the home straight but only plugged away.
Settled back in the field, 3 deep with cover. Made a forward move near the 800m but was posted 3 wide without cover thereafter and was well beaten passing the furlong.
Remained 1 off the fence, close to midfield with cover, despite being hard ridden in the early stages to be a touch closer. Failed to find any extra in the home straight.
Coursed 3 wide without cover, behind midfield in the early & middle stages before improving and racing outside the leader after the 900m. Was running on empty over the final stages.
Slow to begin settling worse than midfield 3 wide with cover for most of the trip. Struggled in the final stretch.
Never far off the pace on fence to home straight. Kept giving to score victory near the post.
Led on fence early. Sat behind pace back straight. Challenged leader turning in. Every chance but couldn't contain winner close home.
Ridden early and took lead on fence back straight. Held a 1L advantage entering home straight. Fought on but couldn't repel front pair final stages.
2-wide towards rear to home straight. Afford clear run 250M. Finished off well to make frame.
Slightly behind midfield to home straight. Improved steadily and nearly made frame.
Raced 2-wide behind midfield to home turn. Swung wide turning into home. Closed off satisfactorily and was nearest at finish.
Raced 3-wide behind midfield early. Pushed 4-wide 800M. Caught wide and without cover behind speed home turn. Plugged on until severely checked concluding stages.
Travelled wide and without cover ahead of midfield until 600M. Ran on without threat thereafter and was severely checked closing stages.
Urged early and raced 2-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch thereafter.
Taken to rear from widest barrier. Still the last rounding home turn. Made up some ground late.
Back with last few always. Never likely.
Bounded in the air at start, began awkwardly and lost ground. Was then taken to rail behind midfield to home straight. Found nothing when asked.
Missed break, sat quietly in third rail, launched challenge 250m out, led 100m, won going away.
Quickly away, disputed early lead, led uncontested 1600m out, all out straight, caught by winner 100m out, kept on well.
Fair break, sixth one-off, ran on well for third.
Slowly away, seventh rail, came on well but no match for first three.
Clean break, fourth one-off, came wide top of straight, kept on well.
Good break, taken back to last rail, blocked top of straight, came free from 200m out, came on charging late.
Fair break, tenth rail, came past tiring horses last 100m.
Fair break, fifth rail, all out straight, not quicken.
Fair break, ninth one off, headway 450m out three deep without cover, one pace under drive.
Quick break, not able to obtain cover, eighth three deep no cover, long drive from 450m out, kept on one pace.
Fair break, second last one off, widest of all top of straight, not quicken.
Jumped well, on pace, pulled hard second one-off, long drive from 450m out, beaten from 100m out.
Well away, not much early speed, third last one off, gaps came, sliced through for facile win.
Fair break, ridden up to share lead rail, led early straight, caught 50m out, no extra.
Fair break, not much early, mid-rear one off, wide bid, ran on well.
Good break, fourth one-off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, outpaced early, last rail, wove through as he realized what was expected, finished strongly.
Jumped sideways, bumped, mid-rear rail, short of room far side, kept on until no extra late.
Fair break but bumped and squeezed by horse outside him, up along rail to midfield, inside bid, kept on until weakened late.
Broke fast, had to work hard for share of lead, spun wide into straight, weakened.
Fair break, ridden early but caught in second rank four wide, dropped back to midfield, wide bid, no extra.
Awkward break, last early two off, then second last rail, inside bid, no extra from mid-straight.
Broke fast, had to work hard to share lead, eventually went on but still working, headed early straight, weakened.
Fair break, hard ridden but not pace to lead, midfield one off, very awkward turn, weakened quickly.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 250M, scored by narrow margin.
Pushed to secure the box seat, enjoyed the slow sectionals, closed off strongly, just beaten by a short head in 2nd.
Eased at start, 4.5Ls off the leader on the fence, dashed well 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Very slow away, 4.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, dashed well 200M despite all negative racing situations.
Pushed forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, flattened 150M.
Hard ridden to take rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 200M weakened.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no turn of foot in straight.
Pushed forward, 2.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, emptied 250M.
Pushed to keep up at the back of the field, 6Ls off the leader on the rails, not suited by the slow pace, no turn of foot.
Eased back, 6Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no dash.
Midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader, trapped 3 wide throughout and lost too much ground, harmed by the slow tempo, weakened in straight.
Eased back, on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, never competitive.
Broke well, settled third rail, peeled off turn for three wide bid, led 200m out, soon in charge.
Broke well, midfield four wide first turn, at least three wide throughout, kept on very well but no match for winner.
Fair break, ridden early, midfield rail, went for inside run but no way through, switched out, kept on.
Broke well, aimed for lead but caught four wide first turn, up to second one off, then went on but unable to cross, headed mid-straight, weakened.
Fair break, led entering back straight, headed far side, rejoined leader early straight, weakened final 200m.
Fair break, not rushed, midfield one-off, pulling, restrained to fourth last one off, shaken up straight, kept on.
Fair break, mid-rear one off, improved turn, ridden, kept on one pace.
Taken back to rear rail, shaken up far side, checked badly entering straight, wide run, passed beaten horses.
Fair break, aimed for lead but caught three wide, settled midfield one off, then rail, shaken up straight, no progress.
Slow start, third last rail, trying to improve when bad check far side, unbalanced after, stumbled turn, found nil when asked.
Taken back, second last one off, driven straight, found nil.
Fair break, aimed for lead but not pace to get there, fourth one off, driven before turn, found nil.
Bustled along to take the lead early, set good pace throughout, pressed on nearing 250M, kept finding extra and repelled a strong challenge from the runner-up over final 100M.
Began only fairly but was able to obtain a forward position under positive riding, well placed to strike turning in, chased winner from 300M out, late surge final 100M, just held.
Dropped in behind midfield, 6Ls away from leader and the eventual winner passing 400M, finished with a flourish final 250M and got to within 1L of the winner.
From wide barrier guided to a 2-wide position ahead of midfield, hung in under pressure home straight, chased front pair from 300M but was always held.
Steadied soon after the start, taken across to fence racing behind midfield, stayed on from off the pace, did best work late.
Positioned ahead of midfield, driven 400M out but never going the pace to seriously challenge.
Slightly slow out, in mid-division 5Ls off the pace, shuffled back to near rear over the turn, kept on same pace in straight.
Switched off to 2nd last after the start, switched wide coming out of the bend, made limited progress, never threatened.
In mid-division, made little impression turning in, one paced throughout.
Raced outside the lead, inclined to hang out making the turn, under pressure to keep pace nearing 400M, weakened and no extra final 150M.
Driven forward to chase leaders, not picked up under pressure, run ended passing 200M.
Slow to begin and didn't muster despite being ridden along, detached in last over 10Ls away in middle stages, made up some lost ground final 300M, ran well below par.

Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.

Used the one draw well to share early lead, settled one back on rails in 2nd far side, shifted out for a run entering straight, hit the front from the tiring leader over 200 M out, just held on to the line.
Broke well, soon taken back to race wide in rear of midfield, remained wide around home bend, ran on under pressure in straight to just fail to get up on line.
Began with others, jostled 1400 M out before settling in 10th behind midfield, soon came to challenge upon straightening, finished off quite well inside final 200 M.
Began with others from a wide gate, gradually picked up 4th position about 3Ls off the pace but wide without cover far side and around the bend, kept on same pace before fading inside final 200 M.
Broke well, settled in 5th in forward of midfield, commenced move rounding home bend to be one back in 3rd turning in, unable to sustain effort after straightening.

Awkward start losing ground, soon recovered to forward of midfield before shuffling back a length behind interference coming onto back straight, remained in midfield to home turn, kept on one pace under pressure.
Dipped jumping out, soon taken across for rails run in midfield or just worse, saved ground on rails turning for home, baulked inside 200 M before producing some late impression closing stages.
Began fairly, held rails run throughout, prominent early, settled in midfield far side, kept on one pace despite minor inconvenience inside 200 M.
Soon well behind, shifted wide for a run entering straight, ran past beaten horses down the centre of the straight.

Ridden for speed early settling in 3rd about 2Ls off the pace far side, hampered and lost half a length coming out of back straight, became 5th rounding home bend, kept on well for good impression in the run home
Worked from the widest gate to circle the field on stables bend for lead, set up a length break far side before coming back to the field home bend, no response under pressure on straightening.
Began fairly from a wide gate, settled at the back, went widest into straight, made no show.
Began moderately losing ground, midfield early before settling towards rear, made short-lived effort circling the field home bend, soon weakened in straight.
Began awkwardly losing ground, soon dropped to last few, never seen with a chance. (Blood in trachea.)
Parked handy to the speed 3 off the stand fence. Was niggled along to stay in touch midrace and when asked for an effort inside the 300m, responded well for a game win.
Camped in 2nd position, 1 off the outside rail, no cover. Kept up a sound effort to the finish line.
Raced in a handy position near the stand fence, had cover. Wound up nicely over the latter stages.
Was full of running in the early stages and led them up within the first furlong, along the stand side. Maintained a good gallop right to the wire.
Began awkwardly then was crowded, settling midfield 3 away from the outside fence, had cover. Made steady progress in the run to the post.
Raced on the speed near the centre of the course no cover. Faded over the last 100m.
Took the box seat position, stands rail. Had every chance.
Slow to begin settling at the rear along the outside rail. Battled away fairly in the run to the finish.
Settled midfield approx 5 away from the grandstand side rail with cover. Commenced to tire over the last 200m and gave way soon after.
Raced midfield, about 4-5 off the stand side with cover. Hard ridden to keep in touch and never looked likely.
Travelled behind the speed, near the middle of the track, without cover. Was a spent force passing the furlong and gave ground thereafter.
Settled ahead of midfield towards the centre of the course with cover. Failed to make any impression at the business end of the race.
Settled at the tail of the field 1 off the grand stand side. Struggled over the concluding stages.
Quickly into stride and was eased to sit ahead of midfield on fence. Shifted 2-wide passing 800M. Well-positioned to strike home straight. Ridden 250M and soon took charge. Won with plenty to spare.

Slow to begin. Progressed gradually and reached midfield in a 2-wide position home turn. Swung wider and was 3Ls down on straightening. Fought on gamely to snatch 2nd near finish but no hope with winner.
Soon in a forward spot. Raced 2-wide behind pace 800M. Challenged leaders turning into home. Picked up well but no answer to winner's kick passing 200M. Hung on for 2nd until final strides.
3-wide ahead of midfield early. Taken wider and dropped behind midfield 800M. Finished off fairly well to make frame.
Niggled early and raced towards rear. Moved closer and took inside run home turn. Plugged on without troubling the principals.
Away in line but trapped wide. Gradually taken to 2-wide towards rear. 5Ls away turning in. Ran on without threat.
Pushed early an raced ahead of midfield on fence to home straight. Couldn't turn up a notch inside 250M when the race got serious.
Eased to rear from high draw. Came widest into final stretch. Beat tired runners home.
Moderate start. Pressed forward and shared lead on fence 800M. Overhauled 250M. (substantial amount of blood in horse's trachea).
Began awkwardly. Raced wide and without cover at midfield after 800M. Weakened soon after straightening.
Rolled forward and sat outside speed 800M. Peaked 300M and faded final furlong.
At midfield early. Struggled before home turn. Well beaten 500M.
Given a waiting ride and settled two from the rear, swung widest for home, finished off strongly final 350 M, took the lead 50 M out.
Prominently placed in the one-out-one-back spot, kicked 350 M out and soon took the lead, kept on soundly, just caught by the winner 50 M out.
Prominently placed on rail just off the pace, quickened well when cleared 350 M out, ran on soundly for 3rd.
Settled one-off behind the mid-division, finished off soundly final 300 M for 4th.
Settled one-off just off the pace, quickened well at the top of the home straight, looked possible for a place, failed to offer extra final 100 M.
Crowded start, urged along to take the box-seat, crowded at 400 M, only one-paced when asked in the home straight.
Crowded start, settled rearward, only made limited progress in the home straight.
Urged along to hold a fence position behind the mid-division, struggled round the home turn, gave no response when asked 350 M out.
Urged along early and soon took a seat on rail in midfield, outpaced 250 M out, too faded.
Pushed up to lead on rail, headed 300 M out, soon flattened.
Travelled rear, checked at 1300 M, only passed a few beaten horses in home straight.
Bumped start, caught very wide at the first turn and drifted back behind the mid-division, no cover throughout, never competitive.
Awkward start, urged along to hold a one-off spot in midfield, outpaced 350 M out, soon weakened.
Pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, crowded at 400 M, soon weakened.
Broke smartly, settled fifth unhurried rail, third on rail entering straight, pulled out for run, found gap, ran on strongly to lead close home.
Fair break, up quickly to third rail, mid-track bid, led 200m out, headed near line.
Broke well, settled mid-rear rail, improved turn, out for mid-track bid, ran on well.
Broke well, ridden to lead, dictated, kicked early straight but unable to break clear, headed, kept on.
Missed beat start, lost length, second last rail, improved inside turn, kept on quite well, but not late kick.
Moderate break but quickly up to lead, reined back to second one off, challenged for lead early straight, soon beaten off and one pace.
Fair break, fourth last one off, tried to improve entering straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well, midfield rail, fifth one off into straight, mid-track bid, one pace.
Fair break, not rushed, midfield two off, mid-track bid, little progress.
Taken back to mid-rear one off, mid-track bid, little progress.
Taken back to rear one off, then had to be urged briefly to keep up, wide bid, one pace under driving.
Fair break, up to fourth one off, lost ground two wide turn, ridden, weakened.
Slightly missed break, second last one-off, reminders turn, wide bid, found nil.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leaders 2-3 wide, dashed strongly 400M, gained consecutive victory just by a short head.
Pushed to share the lead at good pace 2 wide, dominated 400M, hung on until 50M overhauled, just beaten by a narrow margin.
Pushed forward to take rail and shared the lead at good sectionals, soon flattened 300M, ran on for 3rd.
Prominent, 1L off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Midfield, 4Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, made minor ground in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 2.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, just held ground in straight.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, checked 300M, made steady ground to the line.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 4Ls off the good pace on the rails, blocked most straight, ran on well to the line.
Midfield, 2.5Ls behind the good pace, trapped 3 wide, ran on ok in straight.
Eased early but raced too keen, trapped 3 wide 1L off the good pace, ran on until 250M weakened.
Eased to rear, 9Ls off the good pace, raced 3-5 wide, ran on ok.
Eased to take box seat, pace good, emptied 300M.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the good pace on the fence, no progress.
Midfield, 2.5Ls off the good pace along the fence, flattened 250M.
Stumbled, recovered, seventh rail, came free 150m out, strong response late to lead near finish.
Knocked hard jump, disputed lead, 3-deep without cover entire trip, strong response under drive, led 100m out, overtaken late.
Good break, midfield, 3-deep with cover, came wide top of straight, all out, just missed.
Slowly away, eleventh one off, blocked for room until last 75m, powerful finish.
Jumped well, disputed lead, hard travelling 4-deep no cover until 900m out, shaken up from 300m out, kept on well.
Fair break, in touch, fifth one off, shaken up 300m out, one pace.
Broke left, chased early pace, second one off, kept on one pace, no threat.
Quickly away, disputed lead, third one off and used hard keeping up, weakened 200m out.
Tardy break, tenth rail, found nil.
Poor break, eighth one off, never on bridle, beaten long way out.
Bumped hard leaving gate, ninth 3-deep with cover, shaken up from 300m out, found nil.
Good break, hard ridden to keep up, never closed.
Showed good early speed, up with the pace throughout, tackled the leader from 350M, rallied strongly over the final stages and prevailed in a thrilling photo finish.
Quickly into stride, race right up with the pace, emerged as leader halfway, dueled with eventual winner over final 300M and only lost out in a photo finish.
Tracked leaders, raced tight inside 400M, had to shift ground near 200M for a clear passage, kept on evenly over final stages but not pace of first two.
Not showing natural speed and always under pressure to hold his position behind leading quartet, kept on final 400M without threatening first two.
In mid-division, driven near 400M, did best work final stages giving the impression that he may need further.
In touch with leaders, kept on same pace to line not unable to seriously challenge.
Took up early running along the stands' rail, vied for the lead middle stages, tight for room near 300M, weakened over final 200M.
Fractious in barriers, slowly away, chased leaders midway, not quickened inside 400M, faded from 250M.
Held up behind midfield, plodded on one-paced, weakened final 200M. (Blood in trachea)
Behind mid-division, under pressure to keep up halfway, made no impression final 400M.
Well covered in midfield, found little when the race got serious passing halfway, never got involved.
Behind midfield, niggled along 500M out but made no headway, soon out of contention.
Badly outpaced from the off, soon detached from the field, never in contention.
Didn't muster, soon under pressure to keep up with the field, no impression.
On-pace with no cover throughout the trip, kicked strongly when asked 350 M out, finished off soundly to score.
Travelled one-out-one-back, took long to quicken early in the home straight, ran on steadily final 250 M for 2nd.
Settled one-off behind the mid-division, hung in home straight, ran on strongly final 250 M for 3rd.
Tracked the leader on 2-deep, kept on soundly under hard riding, lost a place in the final stride.
Easily ran up lead on the rail, caught by the winner 200 M out, soon flattened.
Box-seated just off the lead, failed to quicken when cleared 300 M out, only one-paced.
Given a waiting ride and settled rearward, caught 3-wide, made up gradual ground final 300 M without threatening the principals.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, only one-paced when asked in the home straight.
Urged along to hold a fence spot in midfield, only one-paced in the home straight.
One-pace but caught 4-wide with no cover, held ground until weakened 200 M out.
Steadied start, lacked early speed and travelled near the rear, urged along 600 M out, only made limited progress in the home straight.
Awkward start, caught 3-deep in midfield, gave no response when asked for efforts 300 M out, soon faded.
Taken back towards the rear, struggled at the home turn, no progress.
Taken across behind runners and soon found a fence position behind the mid-division, failed to quicken when asked 350 M out, soon faded.
Began well, took a nice trail on leaders back, all favours in mid section, tracked leader turning, overhauled rival inside final 100m to score a deserved win.
Showed early speed to lead, set an even speed in front , pinched a break at the 400m, kept defying rivals until inside final 100m.
Even break, settled just off speed 3-4Ls back on rails, easy time in middle stages, worked into clear at 400m, chased hard to take placing.
Went forward however trapped 3 wide without cover 2Ls or so away, worked in mid section, unable to lift from 250m but did well to make frame.
Faded back from an awkward draw, back with last few 6-7Ls back, came wide turning and made good ground to be nearest on the line.
Settled behind midfield 6Ls back in running line, made some progress between horses from 500m, finished evenly without threatening.
Out well, slotted into 1 out 1 back spot, had all favours to bend, possible place chance at 400m but proved 1 paced final 300m.
Little speed as usual and settled back behind midfield, 6Ls back on rails, made some modest progress in straight without showing usual strong finish.
Began nicely, came across to race outside leader, had chance with fair run mid section, niggled turning and dropped off 300m.
No early speed, positioned in 2nd half of field, joined 3 wide line 7Ls back, kept making progress between horses but flat final 200m.
No speed from outset and ended up at rear, 8-9Ls or so away at tail, always well back to bend, made some minor progress late.
Worked across to a midfield position from a tricky alley, had decent trip 4-5Ls back, attempted to improve on bend but quickly under pressure and faded out.
Taken back from an awkward alley, raced 7 to 8Ls back on fence, never likely in straight.
Settled wide with cover in midfield, 5Ls back to bend, gave ground from 400m.
