Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Contested lead early, settled for 2nd inside leader on rails, became 1.5Ls off the pace from 600 M out, came to challenge inside final 150 M to just get up on line.

Began well from a wide draw, ridden to gain slender lead turning into back straight, went clear of 2nd to cross to rails 600 M out, extended break to 2Ls rounding home bend, just caught in the shadows of the post.
Began well, shared pace briefly, soon settled in 2L 3rd, still 3rd but further away from leader when pace quickened home bend, one-paced in straight.
Began with others from the widest gate, soon snatched back to last, commenced run shifting out wide around the bend, made up good ground down the centre of the straight, did best work late.
Began with others from a wide draw, soon held back to race in rear, remained similar to straight, produced late impression to be nearest at finish.
Began fairly, settled in midfield, saved ground on inside turning in, kept on steadily without quickening.
Ridden early to contest lead, soon settled in 4th within 3Ls of pace far side but was wide without cover, became further back when pace quickened around the bend, kept on same pace in the run home.
Began moderately, travelled mainly in rear of midfield, went wide into straight, one-paced.
Began with others, ridden along early before settling in forward of midfield on the rails, saved ground turning in, soon faded after straightening.
Jumped in air and stumbled on landing losing ground, remained well behind throughout. (Blood in trachea and lame next day.)
Began slowly, settled towards the rear on rails, saved ground turning in, dropped out under pressure. (Bled.)
Began with others, raced very wide without cover in forward of midfield before shuffling backward gradually far side, dropped to tail-end passing 400 M.
Went straight along the lead on the rails and made every post a winner. Recorded a relatively easy win.
Taken back from a wide gate and settled in 2nd last position, 1 off with cover. Closed off strongly.
Camped midfield, 3 wide with cover. Grabbed 2nd a furlong from home and fought on well, but was overhauled close to the line.
Began awkwardly and settled 3 back the fence. Railed up in the run home and worked to the finish soundly to make the frame.
Was unable to muster speed despite being hard ridden settling off the speed 3 wide no cover. Kept a reasonable gallop in the final stretch.
Raced midfield, 2 wide with cover. Failed to lift a gear in the straight and finished off one paced.
Stalked the leader on the paint and had every chance. Couldn't sprint early in the straight and paddled over the final stages.
Missed the kick and settled in last position, 1 off. Swung widest on the home turn but never made any notable impression.
Raced midfield along the fence. Kept to the inside in the straight but only plugged away.
Coursed wide early then shifted in and settled along the paint, towards the rear of the field. Battled away over the final stages.
Parked in 2nd position outside the leader. Faded early in the home straight.
Ridden along in the early stages but couldn't go the early speed of the race and was posted midfield 4 wide without cover, never likely.
Ridden early and took led on fence from 1100M. Held a lL advantage turning in. Ran away final furlong to score.
Prominent spot to home straight. No hope with winner but did the best of the rest to hang on for 2nd.
2-wide behind midfield early and middle stages. Soon swung out and got clear run home straight. Rallied on to snatch a minor placing at post.
Away in line. Slotted 2-wide at midfield first turn. Made run 3-wide home turn and was 2Ls down into final stretch. Kept giving but lacked finishing touch of the front trio.
Soon taken across behind runners and parked on fence towards rear. Dropped to last and took inside run rounding home turn. Made up good ground through runners and nearly made frame.
Raced ahead of midfield on fence to home straight. One-paced to conclude.
Never better than midfield to home straight. Plugged on without threat.
Raced 2-wide at rear to home straight. Ran on fairly.
2 to 3-wide at rear and came widest on straightening. Beat tired runners home.
Shaken up early but trapped 3-wide ahead of midfield first turn. Raced one-off behind leader from 1100M. Failed to pick up when asked home straight.
Travelled wide and without cover behind midfield to home straight. No show thereafter.
One-out-one-back to home straight. Faded final 300M.
Settled one-off just behind the speed, niggled along at home turn, kicked 250 M out, took the lead in the final stride.
Urged along to lead on rails, quickened 300 M out, kept on soundly, just caught on line.
Urged along to share the lead on 2-deep, kept on well for 3rd.
Settled on rails just off the pace, one-paced down the home straight.
Settled on rails just behind the leaders, made up gradual ground final 200 M.
Given a waiting ride at the rear, made up gradual ground final 250 M.
Sat one-out-one-back cozily, held ground until flattened final 100 M.
Widely drawn, sat one-wide in the mid-division, made the home turn awkwardly, finished off fairly well down the home straight.
Settled near the rear, made limited progress final 250 M.
Slow away, caught 3-deep behind the mid-division, failed to make up any ground.
Slow away, lacked early speed, pushed hard to catch up with the mid-division, never competitive.
Urged along to hold a one-off spot in midfield, niggled along at home turn, soon weakened.
Pushed up to share the lead on 2-deep, quickened 250 M, drew clear easily.
Urged along to find a rail-spot in midfield, kicked 250 M, finished off soundly for 2nd.
Easily ran up to share the lead on rails, headed 250 M out, kept on satisfactorily for a place.
Sat cozily in the box-seat, responded well when asked 300 M, kept on fairly, rather one-paced.
Settled one-off in the mid-division, one-paced down the home straight.
Taken from the high draw to the rear, made limited progress down the home straight.
Lacked early speed and travelled one from the rear, failed to make up any ground.
Pushed up to hold the one-out-one-back spot, held ground until weakened 150 M out.
Pushed up early and travelled near the rear, badly checked 500 M out, made no progress.
Travelled one-off just off the pace, held ground until flattened 250 M out, soon faded.
Pushed up early, caught wide just behind pace, gave ground round the home turn, soon faded.
On-pace with no cover, struggled round the home turn, soon weakened.
Settled in box seat, strongly favoured by the slow sectionals and the rail-trip, closed off well to win.
Eased to sit in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 250M to grab 2nd.
Midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 200M for 3rd.
Pushed forward, 1L off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, ran on until 100M flattened.
Trapped wide early, pushed forward to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on until 100M weakened.
In front of midfield, 3Ls off the leader along the rails, not suited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Settled in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, not suited by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Pushed forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, however flattened 200M.
Very slow away, 7Ls off the leader along the fence, harmed by the slow pace, little dash 200M.
Behind midfield, 7Ls off the leader 2-3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, ran on ok in straight.
Eased to rear, 9.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on fairly.
Eased to rear, 8.5Ls off the leader, trapped 2-4 wide, harmed by the slow pace, little dash in straight.
Steadied start, settled mid-rear rail, found gaps to weave between horses, led 80m out, drew clear, held on.
Fair break, taken back to rear one off, out for wide bid, finished fast but winner had first run.
Broke well, up to second one off, led early straight until headed last 80m.
Taken back to last, wide bid, finished well but never able to challenge.
Fair break, up along rail to third, strongly ridden turn and early straight, kept on but no kick.
Broke well, up to fourth one off, three-wide bid, no extra from 150m out.
Fair break, taken back to midfield one off, out for mid-track bid, driven but no progress from mid-straight.
Broke well, led uncontested, tried to kick at home turn, headed, weakened.
Taken back to rear rail, ridden early straight, kept on one pace.
Broke well, urged up to join leaders but caught three wide and midfield, wide throughout, kept on one pace.
Fair break, fifth rail, not corner well first turn, three wide throughout thereafter, ridden, found nil.
Moderate start, settled midfield rail, shaken up turn, soon weakened.

Restrained to a rearward position, switched to 3-wide entering back straight, came with a sweeping run around the field inside 400M, hit top gear mid-straight and caught leader in the shadow of the post.
Positively ridden, tracked leader in 2nd, took over coming out of the final bend, quickened well and drew readily clear inside 150M, looked certain to win only to be caught last few strides.
Settled in midfield, travelled smoothly to straight, stayed on well.
Never far off from leaders, loomed a serious threat passing 400M but couldn't find the extra to seriously challenge, kept on one-paced to line.
Dropped back to near last, pushed along nearing 450M, made some headway from off the pace but was never a serious threat.
Positioned 2-wide in midfield, raced a shade keen early stages, angled out into clear near 250M, ran on fairly and not getting to the leaders.
Settled behind midfield 5Ls away, shuffled back to near last approaching home straight, stayed on fairly once getting a clear run inside 250M. (Jockey questioned re his riding early straight.)
Towards the rear, raced 3-wide for most of the way, took closer order passing halfway, not quickened when placed under pressure, no impression.
Given a waiting ride, 6-7Ls off the pace near the tail of the field, last into straight, ran past well beaten horses only.
Raced keenly, crossed to the lead passing 1200M and took them along steadily, headed soon after turning in, found little under pressure and weakened badly final stages.
Held up in midfield, raced 3-wide and left without cover from 1200M, strode closer to leaders making the home turn but weakened soon after straightening.
Crossed to the rail before first turn, tracked leader one back, went for an inside gap but was badly crowded for room near 200M, eased final 150M.

Settled behind midfield after beginning from a wide draw, commenced run rounding home bend and wide into straight, sustained effort to claim victory inside final 200 M, won well.
Began awkwardly losing ground, settled in rear of midfield, towards rear and baulked for a run 300 M out, ran on to be nearest at finish. (Tactic questioned.)
Began with others, travelled keenly on rails in 3rd within 2Ls of lead, hit the front from tiring leader over 300 M out, only to be headed 200 M out.
Began with others, settled on rails in midfield, fought on steadily without threatening.
Began with others, settled in last few, found no clear run after straightening, finished off race well.
Slightly slow out from a wide gate, settled well back, ran on inside final 300 M.
Began with others, settled just better than midfield in 6th or 5th and awkwardly placed around the bend, saved ground turning in to be just 1L off, found no response under pressure.
Began with others, gradually taken backward to settle in 4th about 2Ls off the pace, similar turning in, kept on under pressure before fading inside final 200 M.
Began with others, settled just better than midfield in 5th or 6th, faded gradually after straightening. (Bled.)
Settled in midfield, weakened gradually.
Always in last few and without cover, never seen with a chance.
Broke well from a poor draw to quickly take up running racing keenly around the bend, headed over 300 M out, weakened.
Slightly slowly away, settled in last few, trailed the field into straight, ran home one-paced.
Raced wide in prominent position far side, chased leader around the bend, dropped out tamely in straight.
Rated behind the speed along the fence. Improved into a narrow run soon after entering the straight and managed to just hold off its rivals.
Raced midfield, the paint with cover. Closed off well.
Parked behind midfield 2 deep with cover. Chased home gamely.
Settled 1 out 1 back approaching the 800m. stayed on well after having every chance.
Led early before handing up near the 800m and racing in 2nd position along the rails. Was one paced prior to being checked near the 100m.
Camped midfield 2-3 wide with cover. Kept on evenly in the run to the line.
Missed the start slightly then was badly crowded. Had to do plenty of work to eventually go forward and lead after the 800m, 1 off no cover. Was a spent force passing the 100m.
Settled in last position 2 wide with cover. Worked home soundly through the field in the straight.
Raced midfield 3 deep with cover. Commenced to weaken inside the 100m.
Travelled back in the field along the fence. Kept to the inside in the final stretch but only plodded to the line.
Slow to begin, settled worse than midfield, 3 wide with cover. Made no impression in the straight. (Bled both nostrils.)
Raced with the backmakers, 2 wide with cover. Struggled in the home stretch.
Settled towards the tail of the field 3 deep with cover. Came widest in the straight but failed to close off.
Posted 3 wide without cover on the circle whilst racing behind the speed. Gave ground in the straight and tailed out. (Pulled up lame.)
Travelled well ahead of midfield to home straight. Ridden 300M and took charge 150M. Never seriously challenged throughout.
Raced behind midfield on fence to home straight. Rallied on passing 400M. No hope with winner but did the best of the rest.
Pressed early and took lead on fence home turn. Opened up a 3Ls gap with the main field turning in. Overhauled by winner 200M but hung on for 2nd until closing stages.
3 to 4Ls behind leading group to home straight. Kept on steadily to make frame.
Sat behind leader to home straight. Held ground thereafter.
Well enough away but was trapped wide. Gradually taken towards rear from 1300M. Swung out and was 7Ls down on straightening. Covered good ground thereafter.
At rear and came widest into final stretch. Made decent improvement home.
Never better than midfield and ran home fairly.
Behind midfield to home straight. Plugged on without threat.
Back with last few always. Remained one-paced home straight.
At midfield early and middle stages. Found nothing when asked home straight. ("Roarer").
Began well, 2 deep in midfield, hard ridden off home turn, 3Ls down at 300m, rapid forward move from 200m, led 100m, won readily.
Settled inner just worse than midfield, 5/6Ls down when switched out 900m to go, swift progress 5 deep round turn, led 200m, headed 100m, brave 2nd.
Took rail slot, mid pack 5Ls back, trapped on inner 400m out, switched in stretch, not clear run 150m out, quickened between horses final 100m, unlucky.
Awkward gate, raced 3 from last, niggled1200m out, 5Ls back off final turn, 6 deep into stretch, strong run to share 3rd.
Bumped at start, settled 2/3Ls off lead, clear third 400m out, hard drive 300m, one pace to line.
Slight bump start, raced in back few, tightened 600m to go, ridden off turn, taken wide staight, late headway.
Smart pace from widest draw, tracked 2 deep to 1st turn, settled 2nd, narrow lead 1200m out, overhauled at 200m, dropped out.
Early speed to lead, set even pace, headed 1200m out, still 2nd under drive at 400m, faded out.
Untidy start, raced at tail, progress around field from 500m, widest on home turn, one-paced from 300m.
Slow to stride, 3 deep toward rear, not quicken around final turn, last into straight, minor progress.
Raced 3 deep in behind lead, niggled 800m out, hard pressure and faded from 400m.
Prominent early, took rail position trailing leader, 2Ls down at 400m, wilted rapidly late.
Settled 2 deep in mid rank, hard ridden 600m to go, dropped away tamely.
Moderate break, midfield one off, wide bid, joined three way battle 200m out, strongest finish, led near line.
Broke well, ridden to join leaders, then settled back midfield one off, strong challenge off turn to lead narrowly 50m out, headed near line, dead-heated for second.
Broke well, ridden early, then settled fifth rail, found inside split to lead 300m out, joined by two horses, fought long battle, just missed, dead-heated for second.
Broke well, settled fourth rail, kept on well under driving but unable to reach leaders.
Fair break, travelled two off behind leaders, slightly short of room mid-straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, not rushed, back to rear rail, widest bid, ran on, not pace to reach leaders.
Fair break, not ridden for early speed, mid-rear three off, wide bid, kept on late but never able to challenge.
Fair break, ridden early to narrow lead one off, shared lead until went on early straight, headed, weakened.
Broke well, not rushed, mid-rear one off, bid between horses, kept on but no impression on leaders.
Taken back from wide draw, second last rail, slightly short of room early straight, made some ground till no extra last 200m.
Fair break, not much early, settled midfield rail, inside bid, not quicken from 300m out.
Broke well, up wide to join leaders three off, still three wide into straight, ridden, found nil.
Missed break, always struggling thereafter, fourth last rail, urged, kept on straight but no impression.
Broke well, led early, joined and pestered, headed early straight, faded quickly.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, dashed strongly 300M to score by a head.
Eased back, 7.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 4 wide, dashed impressively 250M despite not suited by the slow pace, just beaten by a narrow margin in 2nd.
Slow away, hard ridden to keep up at rear, 7Ls off the leaders 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, held up 4-2, dashed strongly when clear to grab 3rd.
Eased behind midfield, 6Ls off the leaders 3 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 300M, run ended 100M.
Crossed in front easily and shared the lead 2 wide at advantageous slow sectionals, ran on well until 150M flattened.
Pushed forward to cross, 2Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, lack room 400M, just held ground when clear.
Hard ridden early, 7.5Ls off the leaders 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 200M.
Pushed to obtain the box seat, suited by the slow tempo, lack room 400M, flattened 200M.
Eased to sit just off the leaders 3 wide, favoured by the slow tempo, however soon flattened 250M.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leaders on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, blocked whole straight, not tested.
Midfield along the fence, 3.5Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, blocked whole straight, not tested.
Took rail easily and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on until 250M weakened.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3-5 wide, checked 700M, harmed by the slow tempo, flattened in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, raced ungenerously throughout, hung out badly at bends, tailed out.
Broke well, led early then settled four length second, led and kicked for home early straight, fought on magnificently.
Moderate break, back to mid-rear three wide, three or four wide whole trip, wide bid, finished strongly, just failed.
Fair break, settled mid-rear one off, challenge between horses, had to wait for run briefly but perhaps crucially, finished strongly.
Taken back from outside draw, fourth last three wide, widest of all straight, ran on very well.
Broke fast, settled midfield one off, mid track bid, reached second place 200m out, outpaced late.
Fair break, settled third one off, shaken up early straight, kept on one pace.
Moderate break, lost ground start, rear early urged, still last halfway up straight, kept on well late.
Moderate break, mid-rear three wide, short of room and hesitant early straight, stretched out well when found room too late.
Broke well, up along rail to midfield, improved turn, up to second early straight, no more to give.
Fair break, restrained, to second last rail, inside bid, kept on till run flattened late.
Slow break, settled fourth last one off, mid-track bid, slightly short of room but never pace to challenge.
Broke well, not rushed, settled mid-rear rail, aimed for inside bid, outpaced. (Blood in Trachea.)
Broke well, midfield two off, came slightly wide for clear run, found nil.
Broke fast, ridden to lead early, soon four lengths clear, two clear into straight, headed, folded fast.
Tracked leader in a slowly run race, held up behind front pair 450M-300M, responded well once a gap opened up, came through swiftly and assumed control final 50M.
Dropped back to last in a slowly run race, patiently ridden, stayed on strongly over final 300M, got up for 2nd near line but not getting to the winner.
Caught wide early, went forward and crossed to race one out one back behind leader, benefited from a sedate pace, kept on well turning in, briefly led mid-straight, rallied late stages to hold 3rd.
Slow to begin, settled towards the rear along the 2-path, switched out near 500M to challenge, made smooth headway to join leaders at 200M, outpaced final 150M.
Settled in midfield and would probably not have been suited by the slow pace, had no clear run early straight, put in some solid late work but was left with plenty to do.
Always close up, driven 350M, worked hard to chase leaders but was found wanting, weakened final stages.
Quickly into stride, crossed to the fence with ease and led at a sedate pace uncontested, driven along passing 400M, headed nearing 250M by higher rated rivals, weakened.
In midfield, not going pace to challenge when the race got serious inside 400M, no impression.
Restrained to a near last position, couldn't match strides with main rivals turning into straight, never factored.
In mid-division, caught wide without cover for most of the way, dropped out soon after straightening.
Steadied start, 10Ls off lead into turn, progress from 400m, checked slightly at 200m, between horses to lead inside 50m, held on.
Smart break then outpaced, second last, niggled, 11Ls down at 400m, widest in straight, powerful run, just failed.
Slow break, ridden forward to midfield on rail, strong headway 3 deep straight, led briefly 70m out, close 3rd at line.
Slight bump start, ridden forward 2 deep to lie 9th rounding turn, switched very wide for bid, finished well.
Disputed lead from gate, settled 3rd, pulled out at 400m, quickened to brief lead at 100m, run flattened out.
Good pace from outside gate, trapped 2 deep in 6th around turn, taken wide for stretch run, maintained position under pressure.
Speed to lead, 1L clear with 300m to go, headed 100m out, faded thereafter.
No early speed from wide gate, dropped in last, wide stretch run, closed off well, nearest at finish.
Tracked pace on rail from Gate 1, ridden along in 3rd from 600m out, unable to quicken final 300m.
Broke well from low draw, ridden to lie 2 deep in 5th, under pressure turning for home, dropped out.
Soon outpaced, third last, last with 200m remaining, passed beaten horses late.
Took keen hold, raced 3 deep in 3rd, disputed lead on turn, faded out from 250m.
Raced worse than midfield, tacked wide into straight in 10th, found nothing under pressure.
Keen from gate, steadied back to mid rank, trapped 3 deep to home turn, wider for stretch run, faded to last.
Began nicely, slotted into 1 out 1 back spot, ideal trail with steady tempo, always travelling and let down strongly in straight, drawing away final 200m for a convincing win.
First into stride, went on to lead, pressured and gave up advantage at top turn, came outside leader soon after, suited to bend, fought on to 200m but found winner too smart.
Angled into a midfield role 3-4Ls off lead, followed eventual winner to bend, produced for an effort at 400m and tried hard just could get closer last 150m.
Drifted well back to settle at rear, best part of 8ls back at rear, came widest into straight and reeled off slick closing sectional to make frame.
Average beginning, mustered to race in midfield 3-4Ls back, travelled strongly to turn, in traffic and checked at 350m, clear thereafter but unable to produce usual close and just held ground.
Settled just off midfield, 5-6Ls back in running line, fair run in mid section, closed reasonably in straight but run ended at 200m.
Out well, pressed on and eventually took over at top turn, controlled tempo to suit, headed at 400m and unable to respond, struggled to keep touch and faded.
No Early speed, raced 3 wide at rear 7Ls back, pace not to suit, made run from well back turning, made some progress without looking likely.
Standard jump, settled behind midfield on rails, easy trip to bend, made some minor headway along inside but never really threatened.
Went forward, positioned well just behind speed on rails, right there turning, no turn of foot and dropped off final 300m.
Went forward from outside alley, posted 3 wide without cover, working hard 3-4Ls back turning, soon in trouble and dropped off when emptied.
No early pace, positioned 3 wide behind midfield, 6Ls back in run, had cover to turn, little response in straight.
Went back from a wide gate, 6-7Ls back at rear in two wide line, still well back turning, struggled in the run home.
Out in line, posted 4 wide without cover behind midfield, 5Ls or so back, hard run to bend, faded out soon after straightening.

Behind midfield to halfway, made rapid progress on stables bend to take up running 800 M out setting faster pace, soon drew clear after straightening.
Ridden early for pace, travelled not far off in 4th or 5th before dropping to midfield far side, saved ground on inside turning in, fought on for 2nd.
Always thereabouts, kept on under pressure at the same pace without quickening in the run home.
Travelled in last few, made rapid progress to 3-wide midfield coming out of stables bend, came under hard driving rounding home bend, failed to quicken to threaten in straight.
Began with others, restrained just off the pace on rails in 4th or 5th, shuffled backward to midfield at the 1200 M bend, just worse around the bend, fought on for remote 5th. (Questioned.)
Began with others, soon settled in last few, made swift progress on 1000 M to take closer order, improved to rear of midfield out wide passing the Rock, made no impression in the run home.
Began with others, settled in midfield and never any closer, made no impression in straight.

Broke well, settled 3 wide in prominent spot before taking over in sedate pace coming out of home straight, headed about 800 M out, chased leader eventual winner into straight, kept on before weakening inside final 200 M.
Settled in midfield on rails, shuffled back to last few coming onto far side, came under pressure at the Rock, made no show in straight.
Showed speed early to lead, ceded advantage to travel one back on rails passing winning post the first time, soon came under pressure to hold place far side, dropped out tamely in home straight.
Very slowly away, worked to join tail of field, gradually improved to rear of midfield before hampered a few times and lost many lengths on stables bend, no further impression.
Drawn wide, soon dropped well behind, badly checked at the back 1000 M out losing many lengths, never recovered.
Parked midfield, 2 deep after the 800m, with cover. Shot to the front near the furlong and won comfortably.
Crowded at the start, proved difficult to settle early stages and traveled behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Chased home gamely.
Began on terms then was severely checked near the 1000m, settling in last position 1 off with cover. Closed off strongly.
Led early before handing up near the 700m and box seating thereafter along the rails. Kept on soundly to make the frame.
Ridden along early but had a tendency to lay in, camping 3 back the fence. Stayed on fairly well in the home straight.
Made solid contact with another runner at the start, sent forward to eventually cross and lead along the paint after the 700m. Was gassed approaching the final 100m.
Travelled worse than midfield on the rails. Stayed near the inside in the final stretch, kept on evenly without quickening.
Posted 3 wide without cover after the 800m, midfield. Never likely.
Tightened on jumping, settling behind midfield 3 wide with cover. Was never really in the hunt.

Raced near the rear of the field along the fence. Railed up in the home straight and had some difficulty obtaining clear running near the 100m, whilst closing off reasonably, went to the line untested.
Began very awkwardly settling with backmakers, 2 deep with cover. Made little headway in the straight despite being checked to avoid heels near the 150m.
Copped a bump at the break then managed to go forward and settle outside the leader after the 700m. Faded passing the 200m.
Always leading. Challenged home straight but hung on well to score by a narrow margin.
Tracked leader throughout. Launched attack 300M out. Just failed.
Slotted 2-wide behind midfield after start. Same position turning in. Dashed satisfactorily home straight without threatening the front pair.
Midfield on fence early. Shifted 2-wide 1300M. Ridden home turn. Ran on steadily home straight to make frame.
Towards rear on fence to home straight. Made steady progress thereafter.
2-wide behind midfield until swinging wide on straightening. One-paced to conclude.
At rear to home straight. Angled out into final stretch. Finished off fairly well thereafter.
Towards rear early. One spot closer home turn. Plugged on home.
4-wide behind pace first turn. Parked 2-wide ahead of midfield 1200M. Pressed turning into home. Couldn't turn up a notch home straight.
Prominent spot to home straight. Failed to pick up when asked.
Pressured early but couldn't muster. Settled behind midfield on fence to home turn. Never improved thereafter.
Ahead of midfield on fence to home straight. No show thereafter.
Broke smartly, taken back to third last, improved going well turn, had to wait for run, burst through to lead on line.
Fair break, up fast to share lead, then half length second one off, led narrowly mid-straight, ran on well, just caught.
Fair break, ridden early to lead rail, pestered by runner-up, long battle between the two in straight, both caught near line.
Fair break, taken back to rear two off, wide bid, ran on well under pressure, not reach leaders.
Fair break, held up mid-rear one-off, out for wide bid, ran on quite well but not reach leaders.
Fair break, up to third three wide, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Fair break, ridden early, fifth one-off behind steady pace, inside bid, no kick.
Fair break, held up rear one off, ran on quite well but unable to reach leaders.
Broke fast, ridden but not pace to lead, back to fourth one off fighting for head, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Missed break and seemed slightly confused early, last over-racing, inside bid, kept on quite well when realized what was expected.
Fair break, midfield, three wide, unruly, wide bid, checked, found nil.
Fair break, midfield rail, up to fifth entering straight, driven, weakened.
Taken back to rear from wide draw travelling very comfortably, eased out for widest bid, surged past entire field to win going away.
Broke well, not rushed, settled mid-rear, improved four wide turn, reached second place 200m out but winner already going past.
Fair break, ridden to take mid-rear rail, urged turn, inside bid, kept on well, no chance with winner.
Broke well, fifth rail, urged entering home turn, inside bid, kept on quite well.
Broke well, urged up wide to try and join leaders, had to settle for three wide midfield, improved leaving back, still three wide into straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, ridden to share lead first turn, went on far side, kicked entering straight and soon four lengths clear, caught 100m out, weakened.
Fair break, ridden to lead narrowly but unable to cross, settled for second one off, no extra from early straight, weakened late.
Fair break, midfield one-off, back to fourth last as field quickened turn, wide bid, one pace.
Broke fast, up to fourth three off, then fifth one off, lost ground turn, ridden, no progress.
Broke well, shared lead rail, then trailed leader, out for three wide bid, no extra.
Fair break, held up second last one off, last into straight, driven, no progress.
Missed break, lost length, third last three wide, improved four wide approaching turn, ridden, found nil.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the good pace, enjoyed a perfect trip along the fence, progressed steadily 300M to score.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1.5Ls at good pace, hung out 200M, dominated until 100M overhauled, just beaten by a short head in 2nd.
Pushed forward as usual, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, ran on well for 3rd.
Eased back, 5.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3-4 wide, checked 600M, made good ground 250M.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the good pace on the fence, ran on fairly in straight.
Pushed forward, 1.5Ls off the good pace 2 wide, checked 600M, weakened in straight.
Midfield, 2.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, flattened 200M.
Pressed forward, 2.5Ls off the good pace, trapped 3 wide, checked badly 600M, just ran on.
Eased at start to rear, 7Ls off the good pace, raced 3-4 wide throughout, checked 600M, ran on ok in straight.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the good pace 2 wide, checked severely 600M, flattened afterwards.
Slow away, never a factor.
Awkward away, 5.5Ls off the good pace 2-3 wide, checked badly 600M, flattened afterwards.
Broke well, settled fifth last one off, swung out home turn, strong drive, led 150m out, comfortably.
Taken back to third last one-off, improved wide turn, strong wide finish, not match winner's kick.
Taken back to second last one off, out for wide bid, finished well.
Away well, slotted in fifth rail, gaps came for clear run through one off, kept on but no kick.
Good break, fourth one off, out to challenge early straight, led briefly 250m out, no extra.
Taken back to third last rail, had to wait for mid-track gaps, finished quite well when they came.
Fair break, midfield rail, urged early, one-off bid, kept on one pace.
Taken back to rear rail, mid-track bid, slightly short of room late, but never able to threaten.
Broke well, settled sixth one off, spun out for mid-track bid, already held by leaders when checked late.
Ridden from gate to second one-off, challenged leader early straight, soon no extra.
Well away, up to uncontested lead, ridden early straight, soon no more to give.
Broke well, third rail, shaken up for inside bid, unable to quicken.
Broke well, tracked leaders, strongly challenged inside 300M, dug deep under pressure final stages and picked off the long time leader right on the line.
Soon led, set steady pace, continued on well and kicked nicely clear inside 200M, faded final stages and was caught last stride.
Dropped back to near last along the fence, stayed on well down the inside final 300M, nearest finish. (Jockey reported his horse laid out during the race and was somewhat a difficult ride)
Settled nicely along the fence in mid-division, took time to engage top gear, did best work final stages, nearest finish.
Went forward and raced outside the lead, not pace to seriously challenge in straight, kept on to 100M then weakened.
Close up behind leading pair, found less than expected in the finish, no impression on leaders.
Towards the rear, didn't have the clearest of runs mid-straight, stayed on without threatening.
Checked at the start, ended up towards the rear 5Ls behind leader, driven nearing 400M, stayed on but was never a serious threat.
In mid-division never far off from leaders, found disappointingly little in the finish, one-paced over final 200M.
Began awkwardly and lost ground, ended up in last 7Ls off the pace, hung out making final turn, made limited progress final 300M. (Lame next day.)
Slotted into a 3-wide position just behind leading pair but left with no cover from 600M, not picked up when driven, weakened 200M.
Raced 3-wide in mid-division, lost touch passing 300M, eased.

Ridden along after beginning from a wide gate, gradually settled in one-back position on rails, cantered to lead over 200 M out, won easily.
Began with others, settled in rear of midfield, switched out for a run upon straightening, ran on steadily to reach 2nd spot 100 M out without troubling the winner.
Began fairly, race wide towards the rear, ran on steadily between runners down inside of straight, nearest at finish.
Soon dropped to rear, travelled in last or one from last to straight, switched out a run down the centre of the track, fought on well despite green, did best work late.
Began with others, settled mainly in 4th just over 2Ls off the speed on rails, kept on same pace under pressure until finding no extra inside final 100 M.

Began well, shared the pace before taking up running passing 1000 M, held 1L advantage around the bend, soon joined by the winner on straightening before headed 300 M out, weakened inside final 100 M. (Mucus.)
Began with others, gradually settled in forward of midfield, took closer order out wide around the bend, unable to sustain efforts soon after straightening.
Began well, with leaders early before settling 2-wide in 4th about 2Ls off the speed, kept on at the same pace early in straight before fading closing stages. (Respiratory noise.)
Began with others, gradually settled wide in better than midfield, one-paced when hampered 150 M out.
Soon taken well back from the widest gate, trailed the field most of way to straight, ran past well-beaten horses under pressure.
Began awkwardly losing many lengths, soon picked up along rails to rear of field in 9th, remained similar to straight, made no further impression.
Began moderately, soon improved along rails to midfield, raced keenly in forward of midfield around the bend, faded passing 200 M.
Box seated. Got a needle eye run along the fence soon after straightening and showed plenty of courage to drive through claim the prize.
Travelled in fourth position, 1 off the fence. Hit the front near the furlong, lay in under pressure over the last 100m, kept on gamely.
Speared forward to lead and ran along at a solid pace whilst travelling on the fence. Managed to hold to third despite having to be severely checked near the 100m.
Raced in 6th position, 2 wide with some cover. Worked home soundly.
Worked hard to go forward but was posted 3 wide without cover for most of the trip whilst racing behind the speed. Never likely.
Raced in 5th position along the paint. Failed to close off and gave ground over the last 100m.

Niggled early. Slotted 2-wide behind pace group from 1400M. Peeled out and was well positioned to strike turning into home. Battled determinedly with the 2nd placegetter final furlong. Just got up on line.
Ridden early. Took lead on fence from 1200M. Held a 1L advantage turning in. Fought on gamely with the winner final furlong. Nailed at post.
Switched to rear after start. Swung wide and was 6Ls down rounding home turn. Finished off strongly to snatch a minor placing near finish.
Box seat, pace good, just held ground.
Ahead of midfield to home turn. Shifted 2-wide for clear run on straightening but was blocked until 300M. Covered steady ground when clear to make frame at finish.
Behind midfield on fence to home straight. Kept on along the rail until final 100M when unable to obtain clear run. Not fully tested.

Well enough away but was trapped wide. Gradually taken to race 3-wide behind midfield from 1300M. Came wide and was 4Ls back into final stretch. Ran on fairly well top of home straight but couldn't sustain effort final 200M.
Taken across behind runners after start from highest draw. Tucked 2-wide behind midfield 1200M. Angled out leaving home turn. Made up some ground home without threat.
2-wide at midfield to home straight. One-paced to conclude.
Rolled forward from wide barrier and eventually parked one-off behind leader home turn. Failed to turn up a notch home straight.
Back with last few always. Never likely.
Travelled 3-wide at midfield and was left without cover from 900M. Pressured 600M but no response. Beaten well before post.
Always at rear. Never in the hunt.
Fair break, taken back to second last rail, improved wide entering straight, strong run to lead 100m out.
Fair break, up quickly to lead and cross, headed 300m out, battled on well to regain lead until caught by winner 100m out.
Away well, settled fifth rail, inside bid, kept on well, just failed.
Broke fast, up to join leaders then restrained to fourth two off, mid-track challenge, led narrowly 200m out, headed, no extra.
Broke well, third rail, inside bid, no instant kick but kept on steadily late.
Moderate start, ridden early then settled mid-rear rail, short of room, kept on along rail but never able to challenge. Blood in trachea.
Taken back to last from wide draw, aimed out for wide bid, ran on quite well but never able to threaten.
Fair break, midfield two off, mid track bid, faltered 250m out, no further progress.
Fair break, ridden early, sixth one off, driven 300m out, kept on one pace.
Fair break, second one off, challenged leader early straight, soon no extra, weakened.
Untidy start, bumped, mid rear one off, nowhere to go mid-straight but not much to offer either, kept on one pace. Substantial blood in trachea.
Moderate break, back to third last rail, pulling slightly, out for mid-track bid but little racing room, kept on one pace.
Fair break, fourth last two off, restrained but over-racing, wide bid, no progress last 300m.
Fair break, taken back, three wide midfield, improved wide turn, ridden, found nil.
Fair break, good speed to lead rail, went well clear final 200m, easily.
Moderate break, clear run mid-track, kept on well but no danger to winner.
Moderate start, bumped, race mid-track, ridden up to take second 200m out, outpaced by winner, lost second late.
Fair break then slight bump, tracked winner rail, ridden and outpaced, weakened.
Broke well, not much early speed, widest bid, kept on but never able to threaten.
Fair break, second rank mid-track, shaken up halfway, kept on one pace.
Fair break, second rank mid track, hard ridden, kept on one pace.
Fair start, raced mid-track, joined leaders halfway, driven, weakened.
Slightly missed break, cut across behind runners to two-off rail, ridden, one pace.
Fair break, led early mid-track, ridden, weakened.
Fair break, second rank widest of all, ridden, nothing left.
Fair break, leading rank mid-track, hampered after 400m, ridden but began to lose ground from halfway, soon beaten.
Broke fast, led early one off, headed after 200m, soon outpaced.
Hopped in air start, soon well detached, tailed off.
Settled in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader on the fence, dashed strongly 250M to score despite not suited by the slow pace.
Settled in front, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, closed off well for 2nd.
Pushed to sit outside the leader, enjoyed by the slow tempo, led 400M, overhauled 100M, ran on for 3rd.
At back, 7Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, blocked 4-2, dashed strongly when clear whilst hanging in badly.
Box seat, never had clear run in straight, harmed by the slow tempo, just held ground.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader 2 wide, checked 800M, little dash 200M despite not suited by the slow pace.
Pushed to sit in front of midfield, 3.5Ls off the slow pace 2 wide, moved forward 800M, flattened 200M.
Eased at start, more than 10Ls off the leader 2 wide at tail, harmed by the slow pace, lack room in most straight, never fully tested, dashed very well to the line.
Settled in midfield along the fence, 5.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, held up 400M, lack turn of foot when clear, checked 100M.
At rear, 9Ls off the leader, trapped 4 wide throughout, harmed by the slow tempo, made early move 800M, flattened 200M.
Eased back, 7Ls off the leader, trapped 3-4 wide throughout, not suited by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Eased at start, 9Ls off the leader at rear, raced 3 wide, harmed by the slow pace, ran on ok.
Hard ridden to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, however soon emptied 400M.
Midfield, 5.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Broke well, midfield one-off, improved between runners approaching straight, gaps came, ran on strongly to lead 50m out.
Ridden from gate but not pace to lead, fifth one off, driven to lead mid-straight and went length in front, caught close home.
Missed break and slight bump, taken back, then up along rail to fourth last, mid-straight bid between horses and little progress until clear run appeared, finished strongly.
Fair break, taken back to rear rail, mid-track bid, kept on quite well late.
Broke well, no route to rail so fourth three wide throughout no cover, ran on well until no extra last 200m.
Fair break, slight bump, ridden to lead rail, just headed early straight, fought on until outpaced late.
Broke well, ridden to third rail, bid between horses and twice short of room, kept on one pace under drive.
Fair break, up to second one-off, led narrowly mid-straight, outpaced late.
Missed break, mid-rear two off, lugged in under pressure straight and had to be corrected, no progress thereafter.
Fair break, taken back to third last one off, wide bid, little progress.
Fair break, not rushed, midfield rail not quite settling, inside bid, blocked for run and no progress from mid-straight.
Fair break, fifth three off no cover, ridden entering straight, no more to give from 300m out.
Fair break, held up second last one-off, urged turn and brought wide for clear run, no response.
Awkward start, fourth last two off, improved wide to midfield turn, spent force from mid-straight.
Tracked leaders, finished best of all going into final 200M, got up near 50M and prevailed in a blanket finish.
Sat prominently just off the pace, put in a strong bid final 250M and looked one of the possible winners, all out final stages and was just denied in a blanket finish.
Within striking distance, strongly challenged final 300M and pushed first two all the way to the line.
Handily placed just off the pace, responded well under a vigorous ride passing halfway, led inside 300M, kept on to line only caught by pursuers final stages.
Shared the lead, lost lead 300M out but kept grinding away between horses. Not beaten far.

Travelled strongly behind midfield, held up for clear running inside 350M, attempted a run down the stands' rail 150M out but was unsuccessful, would have been closer. (Protest against the 4th overruled.)
Slow to begin, soon recovered to track leaders, didn't have the clearest runs in the crucial stages of the race when tightened for room 250-100M, kept on well to the line and could have been closer.
Slow to begin, settled near last, made some headway from 350M but never got to the leaders.
Went forward sharing the lead and maintained a steady pace, weakened inside 200M, steadied nearing 100M and out of contention.
In mid-division, kept on same pace under pressure, never a threat to leaders.
Raced towards the rear after an awkward start, unable to obtain a clear run when placed close to the heels of a rival passing 400M, ran into trouble late stages and was severely checked.
Lacked pace, raced in the rear, pushed along in the middle stages to stay in touch, kept on same pace final 400M.
In midfield, pushed along 400M out, outpaced and weakened passing 200M.
Close up behind leaders along the stands' rail, not quickened when driven out halfway, eased when met with interferences approaching and passing 200M.
Dropped in from wide berth, raced 2 deep in last pair, widest into stretch, rattling run to make up eight lengths in final 400m, led last stride.
Fair break, raced mid to rear, two deep with cover on turn, run checked at 400m, clear passage from 350m, led at 90m, headed on line.
Sharp exit from widest gate, raced three deep in fifth, four deep and hard ridden at 400m, second at 250m, led briefly 100m, immediately passed, no extra.
Sloppy from gate, settled mid rank, 5 deep into straight, initially one paced when asked, progress from 200m, took fourth late.
Broke well, ridden to lead, headed at 1500m, tracked leader on rail, inside run to regain lead at 400m, headed at 100m, no extra.
Moderate start, third last, progress into turn, ridden from 600m, seven deep into straight, bumped, 300m, boxed on to share 6th.
Sluggish start, three lengths detached early, ridden to join tail at 1500m, settled in last pair, advanced from 650m, switched six deep into straight, closed off well.
Good break, raced fourth with cover, hard ridden at 350m, lost position, one paced thereafter.
Smartly into stride, sixth rail, progress to fifth approaching 400m, unable to quicken.
Quick break from wide draw, tracked leader three deep without cover, third turning in, faded from 300m.
Travelled three deep towards rear, niggled 600m out, last at 450m, detached at 300m, ran on past beaten horses.
Fair break, trapped three wide midfield, five deep into home straight, laboured at 400m, faded.
Missed break slightly, driven to lead at 1500m, under pressure when headed 400m, dropped out.
Sluggish start, ridden to race worse than midfield, 9th turning for home, unable to quicken, faded last 250m.
Out with them, angled into midfield 4Ls or so back, improved 3 wide approaching bend, let down and went to front easily, kept on under urging to score another convincing win.
Angled into midfield in running line 5Ls off speed, even trip to turn before striking some traffic rounding final bend, closed sharply when clear although winner had race well in his keeping.
Out in line, posted 3 wide from outside alley, had cover 5Ls back in midfield, made run at 400m and did well to go with eventual winner, couldn't sustain and lost 2nd final 100m.
No early speed, settled 5Ls or so away on rails, just off midfield, improved turning and came wider at 400m, made some gradual progress to make frame although well off 3rd.
Came across to take up ideal spot 1 out 1 back, enjoyed run of race, couldn't go with them at 400m and just battled away thereafter.
Ended up 3 wide behind midfield 6Ls away, had cover throughout, came wider turning, kept grinding away in straight.
Went forward and camped outside leader, had a fair run in middle stages, niggled turning in, just one speed in straight.
Drifted back from a wide alley, raced 2 wide sharing rear 7Ls or so back, set a task coming wide from tail turning, made only minor ground.
Ended up racing behind midfield in two wide line, 6-7Ls off lead, well back throughout, never any closer.
Showed early toe, settled behind leader, had even run to turn, in traffic early in straight but responded only moderately when clear.
Positioned well, 3-4Ls back on fence, quiet time in mid section, in behind runners turning but no extra when clear.
Slow into stride, settled near to rear, raced 7-8Ls away on rails, same margin down turning, no extra in straight.
Showed good speed to take up running. Proved difficult to settle in run, headed turning and soon gave in, dropped right out.
Pressed on from an outer draw, posted 3 wide without cover, did too much work to bend, faded and didn't fire on less than preferred surface.
Restrained from widest alley, settled 7Ls or so away on rails, well back to turn, angled wider and swept down middle final 400m, claimed lead inside 100m and scored nicely.
Rolled across to sit outside leader, travelled nicely with steady pace to suit, challenged and took over at 300m, out dashed by winner last 150m.
Fair jump, settled behind midfield, 3 wide with cover, improved turning, stuck to task in straight and kept making ground to snare 3rd. Nice debut.
Began with usual speed to take sit behind leader, had easy time with steady pace, right there turning, kept on well to make frame. (Lame)
Tardy into stride, raced 5Ls or so back on rails, saved ground taking inside runs turning, closed steadily to just miss frame.
Restrained form an outside alley, back with last few 6Ls or so away, tracked up turning but blocked to 200m, closed ok when clear.
Began well, settled 3Ls away on rails, keen when pace slackened, no clear run early in straight, made some even progress late.
Settled 2-3 wide just off speed, 3Ls back to turn, improved on straightening, kept closing before striking trouble in final furlong.
Showed good speed to lead, dictated terms to suit, challenged at 400m, headed inside 300m and weakened soon after. (blood in trachea).
Took a midfield role 4Ls back in running line, no excuses in run, struggled final 400m and didn't finish off.
Took up prime position 1 out 1 back, had all favours to bend, battled away before lost run when tightened at 200m, no extra thereafter.
Trapped 4 wide throughout from a wide draw, no cover on circle, worked too hard to bend, dropped out in home stretch.
No early speed, raced 3 wide at rear, not really suited when tempo slowed, well back to bend, no real close in straight.
Pressed forward but posted 3 wide without cover, did share of work to bend, began tiring from 300m and checked at 150m although didn't effect overall chances.

Began fairly, settled in forward of midfield just over 2Ls off the speed, finished off race nicely inside final 200 M to claim victory close to home.
Ridden along throughout, soon dropped to just worse than midfield, made up good ground down inside of straight to be nearest at finish.
Began awkwardly but held early lead, joined approaching Rock, re-gained slender advantage on straightening, shifting out throughout closing stages and caught close home.
Close up early, gradually dropped backward to midfield, saved ground on inside turning in, ran on to be nearest at finish.
Ridden along on rails in midfield, similar turning in, made steady headway under pressure, nearest at finish.
Always thereabouts with rails run, came under pressure to hold position upon straightening, faded close to home.
Soon taken back from a wide gate, travelled on rails in last few, kept on well in straight.
Soon dropped to tail-end, remained well behind to straight, kept on without quickening.
Began with others from the widest gate, settled just better midfield, ran home one-paced. (Blood in trachea.)
Always in last few, made no show.
Well there, disputed lead from Rock when wide without cover, soon weakened under pressure in straight.
Well there, jostled and lost position rounding home bend, faded in straight.
Camped 3 back the fence. Was 1 spot further back after the 600m, rallied strongly to assume control 100m from home.
Not the best to begin settling just off midfield, 2 deep with cover. Closed off soundly.
Enjoyed a nice run in the race 1 out 1 back. Stayed on well in the run to the line.
Settled worse than midfield but was left racing 3 wide without cover on the circle. Crept forward after the 700m and kept up a game effort to finish in the frame.
Parked behind midfield the fence with cover. Made some late ground between runners in the straight. .
Slow to begin travelling towards the rear, 2-3 wide with cover. Came widest in the home straight and passed tiring runners.
Pushed along early but managed to only settle with the backmakers along the paint. Worked home fairly without ever threatening.
Slowly away settling back in the field, 3 wide with cover. Swung deep on the home turn but made no impression in the final straight.
Worked forward to eventually cross and settled in 2nd position 1 off without cover. Faded after the furlong.
Did plenty of work early to eventually cross and lead along the fence after the 1000m. Handed up near the 600m, shifted into a 1 off line but didn't chase thereafter.

Broke well then was retrained and settled back in the field. Caught 3 wide without cover and was allowed to stride forward at the 800m and crossed to the fence near the 600m in the lead. Weakened in the run home.
Rolled forward and box seated after the 1000m. Was 3 back after the 600m, but nevertheless failed to make any impression after having every chance.
Good jump. Elected to sit on fence behind midfield from first turn. Took inside run and moved closer turning into home. Finished off strongly final furlong and just got up on line.
Quickly into stride and took lead on fence. Held a 1L advantage turning in. Kept on well and had every chance final furlong. Nailed at post.
Prominent spot to home straight. Ideal position to launch attack but lacked finishing touch of the front pair.
Taken to rear from high draw. Driven up home turn and reached the back of midfield into final stretch. Closed off fairly well to make frame.
Away in line. Gradually taken to 2-wide towards rear. Similar spot home turn. Afforded clear run final 250M and made up decent ground home.
2-wide ahead of midfield to home straight. One-paced to conclude.
Hard ridden early but insufficient speed to cross. Caught 3-wide at midfield back straight. Dropped further back rounding home turn. Covered minor ground late.
Slow to begin and then was checked. Tucked 2-wide at midfield back straight. Swung wide to make run approaching home straight but couldn't turn up a notch thereafter.
3-wide with last few to home straight. Beat tired runners home.
Travelled 3-wide without cover behind pace to home straight. Peaked inside 300M. (Substantial amount of blood in horse's trachea).
Always at rear. Never likely.
Pressed forward and raced 2-wide behind leader from first turn. Faded soon after straightening.
Broke well, settled fifth rail, improved on inside turn, three wide bid, ran on strongly under driving to lead 200m out.
Dwelt, settled midfield rail, strong urging to improve turn, inside bid, kept on well.
Fair break, looked for rail but three wide first turn before slotting in fourth last, out for mid-track bid then switched inward, kept on well.
Broke well, led rail then joined and headed, second one off, regained lead approaching straight, headed 150m out, kept on one pace.
Fair break, midfield one off, slight bump and unruly first turn, improved four wide home turn, wide bid, no kick.
Fair break, up to sixth one off, ridden turn, kept on one pace.
Fair break, up to join leaders two off, then went on, headed entering turn, ridden, no extra.
Fair break, taken back to third last one-off, ridden turn, kept on one pace.
Slightly missed break, held up last, urged to keep up, inside bid but slightly short of room, found little.
Taken back immediately to second last rail, ridden entering turn but blocked, ridden again early straight, found nil.
Broke smartly, joined leaders one off, then settled fourth one off, urged turn, gradually lost ground.
Broke fast, up four wide to share lead, then third three wide, lost ground quickly turn, tailed off.
Smooth break, sat 2-deep mid/rear, progress to 5Ls back at 400m, wide off home turn, strong run, led at 70m, won well.
Broke well, dropped in from wide gate, settled 2 off rear, niggled on back stretch, 7Ls down at 400m, switched out at 300m, strong late headway.
Began with others, hard ridden early, settled 4th on rail, hard driven to 3rd 300m out, briefly 2nd inside 200m, no extra in last 100m.
Began fairly, raced 2-deep 3 from rear, taken wide off home turn, solid run to take 4th final strides.
Ridden to lead from low draw, headed entering back stretch, regained lead at 400m, headed at 100m, kept on.
Fair break, rousted along to sit 2-wide in 3rd, 4 deep into home stretch, went 2nd at 300m, faded final 150m.
Fair break, settled mid rank on inner, switched 2-deep and awkward off home turn, kept on at same pace from 300m.
Smart break, tracked 2-deep in mid rank, 5th when ridden off home turn, centre track run, faded from 250m.
Began with others, niggled early, raced midfield 2-deep, ridden turning for home, checked at 300m, one-paced thereafter.
Fair start, hard ridden to 1st turn, mid/rear on rail, driven along entering home straight, one-paced to line.
Dropped in last from widest gate, some progress from 400m, widest of all off home turn, weakened final 100m.
Driven from wide draw, 4-deep into first turn, slim lead entering back stretch, headed 400m out, dropped away from 300m, well beaten.
Eased to sit in midfield, 3.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, harmed by the slow pace, demonstrated strong finishing efforts 300M to win.
Eased to sit in front of midfield on the rails, 2.5Ls off the leader, not suited by the slow tempo, dashed well 250M for 2nd.
Eased back, 5Ls off the leader 2 wide, raced keenly, dashed strongly 250M despite not suited by the slow pace, ran 3rd.
Hard ridden forward, 2Ls off the leader 2 wide, benefited by the slow tempo, just held ground in straight.
Eased to sit in midfield, 4.5Ls off the leader along the fence, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200.
Settled in box seat, favoured by the slow tempo, weakened 150M.
Hard ridden to keep up in midfield, 2.5Ls off the slow pace, trapped 3 wide throughout, moved forward 700M, flattened 200M.
Eased at start, 6.5Ls off the leader 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, dashed fairly.
Pushed to take the rail and led by 1L at advantageous slow sectionals, weakened 200M.
Hard ridden early, trapped 3 wide throughout at back, 5.5Ls off the leader, harmed by the slow tempo, ran on ok.
Eased at start, more than 8Ls off the leader on the fence, harmed by the slow pace, no progress.
Hopped start, settled third last rail, not rushed, found gaps for inside bid, strong run to lead close home.
Jumped well, settled fourth rail, out for mid-track bid, instant acceleration to lead 200m out and draw length clear, lost focus late, caught near line.
Broke well, fifth one off, mid-track bid, kept on but outkicked by first two.
Broke well, taken back to fourth last one-off, widest bid, finished strongly, post came too soon.
Broke well, ridden from wide gate to lead, dictated pace, kicked early straight, headed 200m out, weakened.
Broke well, ridden for lead but had to settle for second one off, mid track challenge, run flattened 200m out.
Fair break, taken back to second last one-off, out for mid-track bid, short of room, then kept on when free.
Fair break, ridden early, midfield rail, short of room early straight, kept on one pace.
Fair break, taken back to rear rail, soon urged to keep in touch, last into straight, inside bid, kept on.
Fair break, caught three wide midfield, no route to rail, wide throughout no cover, no progress.
Broke well, not pace to lead, third one off, shaken up entering straight, weakened from 200m out.
Fair break, midfield one off, lost ground turn, shaken up, no response.

Towards the rear in early stages, caught wide and moved forward entering back straight, reached leaders nearing 400M, kept on soundly despite a tough run and always holding off the persistent runner up.
Given a waiting ride as usual, turned 3-wide into back straight and moved closer to midfield after 800M in a slowly run affair, dueled with eventual winner over final 250M, went down narrowly.
Close up tracking leaders, well placed to strike turning in, kept on well but not pace of first two final 100M.
Fractious in stalls and was slowly away, guided to the fence and settled in midfield, loomed a threat behind leader near 200M, kept on steadily to the line.
Patiently ridden in last, possibly not suited by the slow mid race tempo, taken wide on straightening, ran on without reaching leaders.

Showed speed to take up early running, shared lead with a rival entering into back straight and set a slow pace from halfway, not able to shake off pursuers in straight, swamped nearing 100M and out of contention.
Held up behind midfield, kept on one paced final 300M, never factored.
Restrained to a near last position, strode closer to pace nearing 500M, made some progress early straight, flattened inside 200M.
Held up towards the rear, saved ground along the inside, kept on same pace to the line, never a threat.
Tracked leaders in early stages, dropped back to midfield passing halfway, couldn't pick up when the race got serious passing 400M.
Driven forward from draw 12, caught very wide for the first half of the race, had little left passing 200M, weakened rapidly.
Urged along to obtain a forward position, came under pressure making the turn for home, dropped away quickly. (Bled.)
