Placing: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse No: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Horse Name: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Jockey: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Gear: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Comment: Comments on Running is not available for this race.
Made all to win easily, drew well clear inside final 200 M.
Settled in the middle of the pack, baulked for a run until 200 M out, made modest headway to reach 2nd late.
Began with others from the inner-most draw, gradually settled behind midfield near the centre of the track, made steady headway inside final 300 M to claim a place closing stages.
Broke well, settled about 2Ls off the speed in 6th, came under pressure passing the 400 M mark, kept on same pace without quickening.
Slow out, settled in the middle of the pack near the centre of the track, looked a place chance passing the 200 M mark, only to be swamped close to home.
Began with others, settled just off the speed on stands' rails, kept on at the one pace under pressure.
Settled just over 1L off the speed, faded inside final 300 M.
Began moderately, settled in the middle of the pack about 3Ls off the lead, kept on at the one pace closing stages.
Jumped slowly, settled in last few, ran home one-paced.
Fair beginning, gradually picked up to a prominent position early, came under pressure coming onto course proper, soon weakened out of contention inside final 300 M.
Settled just over 1L off the pace, gradually weakened inside final 300 M.
Settled behind midfield, came under pressure passing the halfway mark, found no response.
Began with others awkwardly, soon dropped to the tail-end, never a danger.
Began with others, settled in midfield near the centre of the track about 3Ls off the speed, dropped out inside final 300 M.
Enjoyed the run of the race tracking the leader along the paint. Got a rails run early in the straight and had the event in its keeping a 100m out.
Parked midfield, 2 deep with cover. Raced keenly near the 800m, and was checked off heels soon after. Recovered and chased gamely to the winning post.
Had every chance after settling in 4th position the fence. Kept up a good gallop right to the wire.
Made its run from behind midfield, 1 off with cover. Peeled out early in the straight and closed off soundly to reach the frame.
Sent forward and led along the rails. Opened up a break after the 800m and was able to dictate. Hung out on the home turn and early in the straight, gave way inside the last 100m.

Couldn't go the early speed of the race despite being ridden along, settling last, some distance from the field. Was under pressure before the home turn and made good ground along the inside in the final stretch.
Settled close to the speed, 1 off without cover. Maintained a reasonable gallop down the running before fading inside the 100m.
Camped 1 off with cover, midfield. Lost its position when crowded for room near the 600m, kept on only one paced in the home straight.
Slow to begin travelling close to midfield, 3 deep with cover. Just plugged away in the home straight.
Hampered at the start and settled at the rear of the field 1 off with cover. Passed tiring runners over the concluding stages.
Settled just behind the speed but was posted 3 wide without cover. Never looked likely.
Settled near the backmakers 2-3 wide with cover after being taken back from a wide gate. Came widest on the home turn but failed to close off.

Moderate start. Gradually dropped towards rear despite effort of rider. Took inside run home turn and was 7Ls down passing 400M. Dashed strongly through runners thereafter to charge down leader final strides.
Pressed early to establish a 2-wide spot in the leading section. Fought on gamely home straight and hit front 200M. Looked set to victory but was caught by the winner near the post.
Driven early and soon settled 2-wide behind pace group. Peeled out and was well-positioned to strike entering home straight. Every chance inside 250M but failed to follow through close home.
Checked after start and raced towards rear. Improved to the back of midfield turning in. Came wide with a strong looking challenge top of home straight but couldn't sustain effort final 100M.
Niggled early and occupied the fence in the front rank. Gave plenty when asked home straight until no extra to fend off the principals final furlong.
Good jump but trapped wide. Ended up 4-wide behind midfield 900M. Dropped further back at bend. Made decent headway home straight when the race was all over.
Well enough away but was caught wide. Eased to race 3-wide behind midfield from 900M. One-spot back turning into home. Plugged on home straight.
Out nicely but trapped wide. Gradually taken to rear 800M. Last into final stretch. Beat tired runners home.
Taken to rear from highest draw. Progressed along rail from 1000M and reached midfield home turn. Shifted out gradually and was 3Ls back leaving the bend. Couldn't pull out extra thereafter.
Shaken up early to race with leaders but was caught 3-wide without cover. Peaked 300M.
Ridden early and raced at midfield. Struggled to keep up home turn. Well beaten early home straight.
Pressured early to race with leaders on fence. Dropped towards midfield home turn. Lost touch soon after straightening.
Taken back to fourth last rail, last entering straight, wove through under strong handling to get up 20m from line.
Good start, up along rail to follow leader, travelling comfortably, strongly ridden to lead 50m out, just caught.
Taken straight to uncontested lead, dictated pace and kicked early straight, headed last 50m, kept on gamely.
Missed beat start, soon up to fourth one off, out for mid-track bid, kept on well without quite the pace to challenge.
Steadied start settled midfield rail, shaken up straight, not clear run, never able to challenge.
Fair break, found slot midfield one-off, swung out for wide bid, ran on without being able to challenge.
Just missed break, took time to settle in fifth last, mid-track run, checked briefly then squeezed, kept on when free.
Not rushed early, settled fifth on rail, out for mid-track bid, weakened.
Fair break, back to mid-rear rail, shaken up for inside bid, some progress then run flattened.
Broke well, ridden up to second one-off, tried to challenge from turn, weakened from mid-straight.
Fair break, sixth one off, urged into turn, mid-track bid, checked, no further progress.
Fair break, taken back to third last one off, aimed wide, found little.
Taken back to second last, improved sharply approaching turn, slight bump entering straight, run flattened out.
Taken back from widest draw, last rail, improved wide turn, driven, no extra.
Broke well, settled fifth one off, led 250m out, drew clear under driving.
Fair break, taken back from wide draw to rear three off, spun off turn for wide bid, kept on very well late.
Not well away, taken back to rear, slightly unruly, wanted to improve along rail but had to wait, inside bid, finished strongly.
Fair break, up fast to lead and cross, harried by two horses outside him, tried to kick clear early straight, unable to shake off pursuers, weakened late.
Fair break, midfield one off, mid-track bid, kept on under strong driving but no kick.
Fair break, midfield one-off, mid-track bid, kept on one pace.
Missed break slightly, rear one-off, looked for mid-track run but held up, kept on well when clear.
Sluggish start, ridden up to mid rear three off, wide bid blocked for a while, kept on one pace.
Fast away, ridden up wide to share lead then third one-off, joined leader briefly mid-straight, hard ridden, weakened.
Not well away, driven but only reached mid-rear rail, urged turn, inside bid, ridden, no more to give.
Broke well, ridden up along rail to midfield, mid-track bid, no further progress, blood in trachea.
Fair break, taken back to mid-rear one-off, checked off heels then not clear run straight, no progress thereafter, blood from both nostrils.
Fair break, caught three wide midfield, up to join leaders still three wide, led briefly and narrowly early straight,, headed, weakened.
Broke well, fourth on rail, ridden early straight, dropped out very tamely, blood in trachea.
Eased to sit in midfield, 5Ls off the leaders on the fence, dashed strongly 300M despite not suited by the slow pace, scored by a narrow margin.
Pushed to occupy the box seat, closed off strongly for 2nd.
Pushed to take the rail and shared the lead at advantageous slow sectionals, hung on strongly until 100M overhauled, ran on for 3rd.
Pushed forward to share the lead at slow sectionals 2 wide, ran on well until 150M flattened.
Eased to sit in midfield along the fence, 3.5Ls off the leaders, not suited by the slow pace, just held ground in straight.
Hard ridden forward, 1.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, benefited by the slow sectionals, flattened 200M.
Behind midfield, 6Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, little dash 200M.
Eased at start to get cover at rear, 7Ls off the leaders, harmed by the slow pace, made ground around the field from 800 in 4 wide, ran no ok in straight.
Pushed forward, 3Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow tempo, weakened 300M.
Eased to rear, detached until 600M, harmed by the slow pace, never a factor.
Behind midfield, 5.5Ls off the leaders, trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow tempo, under pressured 800M, never responded.
Midfield, 4.5Ls off the leaders 2 wide, not suited by the slow pace, emptied 400M.
Eased to rear, trapped 3-4 wide, harmed by the slow tempo, never competitive.
Pushed to take a midfield spot, however trapped 3 wide throughout, harmed by the slow pace, weakened in straight.
Jumped fast and allowed to bowl along, led and crossed, kicked clear early straight, never in danger.
Good jump, up along rail to fourth, inside bid, chased winner all the way but never able to challenge.
Not fast away, urged to fourth last one off, picked suddenly mid-straight to finish strongest of all.
Broke well, ridden but not pace to lead, sixth one off, urged throughout, pulled out for mid-track bid, kept on quite well.
Fair break, midfield one-off, wide bid, kept on without pace to challenge.
Fair break, bumped early, quickly up to share second one off, one pace from mid-straight. Blood in trachea.
Moderate break, bumped, third last one off ridden, mid-track bid, kept on without being able to threaten.
Taken back to rear, tried to improve through turn, brought wide, kept on one pace.
Fair break, fifth one-off, up to fourth mid-straight, kept on along rail until weakened late.
Moderate break, second last rail, outpaced and back to last turning for home, one pace.
Broke well, bumped, ridden to second three wide, wide into straight, found nil.

Placing: PU
Comment: Pulled up, bled from both nostrils.
Well covered in midfield, showed a good turn of foot once switched into clear inside 300M, led near 150M, all out final stages to battle off the persistent runner-up.
Held up near last, wide on the turn, picked up well on straightening, strongly pressed the winner final 150M, just denied.
Reserved in the rear 6Ls behind leaders in a slowly run race, stayed on well from off the pace to get within a length of the winner.
Positioned one out one back, benefited from the slow pace, responded well to pressure and kept grinding away to the line, decent effort after a long break.
Travelled 3-wide behind midfield, came with a strong looking challenge passing 350M, turned one pace final 100M.
Raced under heavy restraint behind leading pair, 3-wide no cover turning for home, led briefly mid-straight, faded late stages.
Held up in last 6Ls behind leader in a slowly run race, swung widest for home, stayed on but couldn't get near leaders.
Raced a shade keen behind leaders, had his chance in straight, run peaked at 200M, outpaced final stages.
Led uncontested at a slow tempo, headed 250M, run ended near 100M.
Settled in mid-division 2 off the fence, kept on same pace to the line and was never a threat.
Restrained towards the rear of the field from the off, held up behind horses from 300M to150M, should have finished closer but would not have threatened the leaders.
Slow to begin, recovered to race in midfield along the fence, not quickened when asked inside 400M, eased when no chance.
Tracked leaders, outpaced from 300M, no extra final stages.
Didn't muster despite ridden, caught 4-wide without cover in midfield for most of the way, dropped out of contention near 300M.
Broke well, steadied and taken to stand rail tracking leaders, quickened from 400m out to lead at 200m, held on well.
Moderate break, ridden early but back to second last four off rail, finished very strongly under driving, just failed.
Fair break, slight bump early, widest of all in midfield, ran on strongly to snatch third on line.
Moderate start, last early tacking over for cover, improved 400m out, ran on well in mid-track without being able to threaten.
Broke well, tracked across to look for cover, mid-track bid, kept on but never able to challenge.
Broke fast, led rail, headed 200m out, unable to sustain gallop.
Broke fast, quickly up to second one-off, joined leader but headed 200m out, weakened late.
Broke well, outpaced early, rear group one-off, late progress inside, never able to threaten.
Broke well, up with leaders early, ridden from halfway, hung right, gradually lost ground.
Broke well, not pace to lie up with leaders, ridden from 400m out, no extra.
Broke fast out wide, tried to track across, headed, weakened.
Slightly sluggish start, tracked across, urgent demands by halfway, no response.
Broke well, urged early but outpaced, mid-rear rail, no improvement.
Fair break, urged but outpaced, last after 300m, no improvement.
Pressed forward to take up running, handed up lead by 1000m, tracked leader nicely on bend, challenged turning and wrnt clear, kept finding for a tough win.
Took up a midfield spot 4-5Ls back, enjoyed an ideal run throughout, angled wider soon after straightening, charged home final 300m to miss by narrow margin.
Away in line, in a prominent spot before lead changed and left in midfield on rails, 5ls away in mid section, gradually improved,
No early speed, ended up back with last few, raced 8-9Ls back on rails, angled clear at 400m and produced a strong finish from an impossible spot to make frame.
Worked across from a tricky draw to take ideal spot 1 out 1 back, left first outside leader from 1000m, edged closer on circle, chimed in strongly and kept on before losing place late.
Began in line, worked across to challenge for front, took over by 1000m, kept speed even, headed at 400 M, battled gamely to be not far away at finish.
Drifted down to tail from a wide alley, nearly 10Ls off top end, saved ground on rails, made even progress in straight to be nearest on line.
Reasonable jump, ended up in 2nd half of field on rails, 6ls away to turn, made steady progress along inside to 200m but just held ground thereafter.
Bounced out, took a hold to obtain cover, shuffled back on rails, to be 3ls or so back, right there on turning, offered little final 300m.
Faded back from an awkward alley, raced nearly 10Ls away 3 wide with cover, still near last turning, got passed only the tired ones.
Slotted into spot just behind midfield, fair run in mid section 6Ls or so away, tracked 3 wide with cover on bend, failed to dash as usual and just battled in straight.
Little early speed, settled back with last few, raced 2 wide 10ls back to turn, no impression in straight.
Ended up behind midfield, 3 wide 8-9Ls back, niggled approaching bend, no dash in straight and just plugged away late.
Away fairly, unable to slot in and planted 3 wide without cover 5Ls back, did share of work in run, struggling before turn and weakened right out. (See Racing Incidents.)
